nice
Great sound, bass, quick charging, decent quality headphones for the price , can't complain!
Sounds good, but they don't stay in place when making exercise. somehow uncomfortable.
I loved them!  The uses for the gym and the sound is great, they are super comfortable.

I use my headphones for working out, running and biking. The different size ear pieces make it easy to keep the headphones in my ears and the bendable ear hooks allow for a tight fit (I've had problems with other ear phones falling out to easily, especially when running). I listen to podcasts and books on tape and the quality is clear. Also like the button placement. The sweat proof feature is a plus for me as I look like I've been exploring a tropical rain forest, sweat wise, by the end of a work out. I had a problem with my headphones no longer charging after 7 months and contacted the dealer. They walked me through a couple of possible fixes over the phone and when they solve the problem, they sent a new pair which arrived in a few days. This was a no-hassel replacement process which I greatly appreciated. Would buy again from this dealer.

These headphones are awesome!! I previously had purchased a bunk pair of TRELAB XR500 headphones that I felt were "better" because of reviews and value, however, after 2 months of everyday 6HR use they fell apart! I got these yesterday and they are more clear, responsive, and the battery lasts 90 min longer. If you are looking for a good cheap pair of headphones these are an absolute must! Better than any PowerBeats! I never review either.

At first I was scared to buy em because I thought the sound quality would be bad if they only cost $22. But I love the sound it makes, it's high quality for just a $22 headphone. Battery life is very long and included in the box it's way more then just $22 in my opinion

I used my headphones for about six months, on and off, until out of the blue they stopped working. They were kept in their zip container away from everything between gym visits. I would save your money and buy something more reputable.

Amazing sound for price ..quality and the stuff that goes with it case and goodie make this amazing ..one slite flutter to great ...is the sheer size is big on ear compared to others..but yeah it's very well done
wish the volume would go up higher but they great. battery last my 8hr work day. i put them on the charger for my 30 min lunch. as far as how far i can walk away from my phone i would say 5 feet.
Headphones are awesome. Very comfortable 3 spare rubber earbud tips. Nice case to keep them in and includes a charging cord. And a couple other things that were a surprise that I enjoyed.

I bought these to use in the office and to exercise. The bass is awesome. I currently have the volume on low, maybe 25% of the full sound volume bar and it is loud. I can just barely hear a very low murmur of sound around me. I have not tried the mic yet, but that feature was not a deciding factor for me.
Really great workout bluetooth earbuds at a good price.  They were super easy to pair with my phone and very comfortable to wear.  So far so good.

My husband ordered these actually. We’ve always spent $80+ on headphones, just for them to break within a year so we decided to get something cheaper. So far these seem pretty great. He says they are Comfortable and the sound quality is impeccable. Definitely 5 star worthy. Sadly, my ears are to small so there’s no way I can’t get them to fit and stay. Thankfully, they are my husbands lol.

"Great Product — I own the PowerBeats3 and use them religiously for workout and travel and needed a pair of earbuds for my commute and work but didn’t want to spend what it would cost to get another pair.. I would get these before buying the PowerBeats, Bose or other high end brands."
I love these headphones!  They have great sound and are light weight. Also came with great carrying case!

Great headphones. Has a small microphone which is great for answering phone calls. I use for podcasts, those with more discriminating tastes might be disappointed in quality, but they serve my needs. I would recommend these headphones.
Quality good, but doesn't react on skype and viber

Bought these in July 2017. Survived trips to Ireland, Houston (through Harvey), and Italy. I get back to campus at Prairie View (about an hour outside of Houston) and the left earbud's sound begins to fade in and out, or cut off completely. Now only the right earbud works, unfortunately. Outside of that main issue, these are a solid pair of headphones; nothing to write home about, but good enough to get some use out of (or for people to mistake them for Beats). The only other minor issue is that the included foam noise-canceling ear tips are poor.
I bought two pairs of these because of the reviews and the price.  I was not disappointed.  They get loud and have very good bass.
Fantastic  Especially for the price. Comes with a car charger, charging cord and a free Apple iPhone charger- not sure why. Great value.  Actually amazing value.

I DON'T CARE WHAT ANYONE ELSE THINKS ABOUT THESE HEADPHONES,I BOUGHT IT JUNE 28 2017 AND THEY ARE STILL PERFECT
I DO LANDSCAPING SO YOU KNOW IT GETS A BEATING IN THAT HOT SUN.A MUST HAVE PRODUCT 100%
Excellent headphones

Fantastic headphones. These work better than my beats and are less than $30. This is the best purchase you'll make this year! I've had three pairs of the Powerbeats Wireless 2 and 3 and these are comparable. Not as much bass, but I prefer it that way. LOVE LOVE.
Great set of wireless headphones and were delivered a day earlier than confirmed.
Great value for the price.

These worked really well at first. I was underwhelmed by the sound quality, but hey for $35 I wasn't complaining. After a few months the connectivity started to decline. They cut out a lot even when they are right next to my iphone 7.
Senso support had me do a reset which helped a little bit, but I don't think any cutting out is acceptable - bluetooth technology has been around for a long time. They are willing to replace but not refund. So I will give the new set a try, but don;t have high hopes

I have bought similar items with this one and the quality of the material is much better in this one. It is the perfect weight for you not to feel like you will drop them. The price for this one was just  a little higher but it is definitely worth it.

I am slightly disappointed with Senso headphones. Not quite what I expected. I battled with keeping the left earpiece in my ear whilst running. It did not fit securely and I find that the ear flaps are a bit useless.
I am yet to still try the soft red foam buds in my ears ...but I really did not quite favor those too when on my other headphones. The sound quality was not much quality either.... Very deep and almost low and flat with no richness in stereo quality when connected to my ipod. It pairs well to Bluetooth.

I love this headphones except when I use them as bluetooth for a phone people complain about hearing an echo as they talk. I have tried to do a factory reset, which  helps for a little bit, but is only a temporary fix as the headphones soon pick up the echo again.

Fast shipping, quality product, great sound and comes with a few extras that are kind of neat. For the price it’s defi a good buy. If I HAD to pick something that wasn’t great about them, for me personally after wearing them for an hour or so my ears are pretty sore. Something about them, regardless of which ear buds/pads I’m wearing just doesn’t fit quite perfect in my ear, but it’s nothing bad enough to where I won’t use them.
Excellent sound quality, and they fit very very comfortably in the ears.  Great product and a great price!!  These are perfect while working out.
So far, extremely happy with this product, hopefully it lasts longer than regular headphones.
Excellent for in the gym, but there was a lot of wind when running outside. I do most of my workouts inside so I really love using  these!

The BASS! These little guys really give a lot of bass for their size, and they block out almost all background noise, but one of the buds regularly slips out of my ear, especially once I start sweating at the gym. Also they seem to wake up and connect to my phone if I move them, so took one star off cause that drains the battery
Love these headphones ! Comes in super clear and the battery life lasts me all day. Plus they are super comfortable!! I recommend them for sure!

Absolutely garbage. Sounds quality is tinny when it stays connected. Battery lasts no longer than 90 minutes. It doesn't stay connected to my phone in my pocket (Blu hdr1) yet all my other blue tooth devices work as expected. This is my first 1 star review. Don't waste your money like I did.

Just got these today but I’m am super impressed. Great quality. Connected right up. Love the foam tips! They fit super secure. Also comes with 3 different sized regular tips. My only issue is the unadjusted eq. It’s totally lacking highs and some mids so if your planning on using these for a music app like amazon music or pandora which don’t have an equalizer function these aren’t for you. I ended up downloading Spotify and with a few adjustments to the built in equalizer these things are perfect. I haven’t tested the waterproof side of things but I don’t plan on ever needing it.
I ordered one set for my daughter.  Then my granddaughter complained.  I proceeded to order a second set.  Both girls seem to be happy now.
Great Sound stays in your ears battery lifespan is really good

The size options for the buds themselves are fantastic! My number one issue with others I've tried. The sound is good and noise cancellation is great! I love having the strap, front or back. Great buy for me!
I'm quite happy with this purchase, these headphones work surprisingly well.

I am hard of hearing and this was my best hope for really good sound quality. After looking at other reviews, many said it sounded amazing and the sound was only at 50% volume. I figured this would be too good to be true at this price. I figured, what a steal! It came in and the packaging looked great. I took them out of the case which comes with everything as shown in the product images. I paired them with my Samsung S7 and it paired immediately. Then I put them on and for me, it was not as comfortable as I hoped for. I changed out the ear buds and it then felt better.

Time for the music! I eagerly then browsed through my songs looking for one with the right amount of bass and rhythm and found the perfect song. I started playing it at 50% volume and my expectations came crashing down. The sound was very muffled and i figured I'll boost it up. At 70%, the sound was obviously there but the lyrics were not clear and still muffled.Then brought it to 100% and it sounded tinny. Not clear at all and muffled. For those that praise this, it works for you but if you are hard of hearing, I highly recommend going with Bose, Beats, Sennheiser, or Sony headphones because those have always sounded crisp and very clear to me. Although they are more on the expensive side, it is will worth the value whereas these only led to disappointment. You do not know until you try though!

I bought a pair of these and had them for about a month before I lost them. I liked them enough that I bought a replacement pair. The sound is decent on these headphones. To get good base out of them you have to really have them plugged into your ears. I had no issues getting them hooked up to my phone (Samsung Galaxy S5). They can hurt the cartilage in your ear after wearing them for an extended period. The first pair I ordered came with a case, extra ear buds, a short usb charging cable, a long usb charging cable with an adapter for USB C on the end, and a car charger. The second pair came with a short usb charging cable, and a magnetic phone holder that was missing parts. The case for the second one also reeked of stale cigarette smoke, as did the headphones themselves. It took about two weeks for the headphones to stop stinking. The case was simply a matter of spraying it with Febreze until it didn't reek anymore.

While I am disappointed with the different items included with the second set I ordered, and with the stink of cigarette smoke, the headphones themselves are good enough to warrant only taking one star away.
Fit great and sound amazing!!!
Quality was ok for few weeks and after that it became so bad.

Ive only had these a few hours and they sound awesome!!  I own and have owned many pairs trying to find not only a quality solid sound but a comfortable fit that I can wear for 2-3  or more hours With technology ever changing my old powerbeats are getting left behind, plus they have issues. These have excellent sound w bass that beat my beats, they may 'break in' to sound better the controls are simple enough. Pairing w my iPhone 6 was a snap With the weight being extremely light combined with very soft ear hooks these should be able to be worn with out the ear fatigue ive experienced w others after just an hour.  These came w a nice case various ear tips a lightning/mini charger wire and a cigarette plug base! For under 35$  yeah an easy five stars! They we're very well packaged as if the company is proud of there product as a company should be! I usually wear earbuds for hours a day so the duribility will be tested soon. (I guess I will find out about the brain tumor my oldest daughter says I'm going to get from Bluetooth too lol) For what it's worth I put comply ear tips on these, but I use them on all my ear buds.
Great Headset, Use It To Workout At The Gym With No Problems, Great Battery Life.

Ordered about six weeks ago, and have worked great. Recently experienced sound loss in one of the earbuds, and after reaching out to the seller, I was quickly provided with directions to conduct a re-calibration of the set without having to send in or replace! Great service to say the least!

These headphones worked wonderfully for about 6 months when they suddenly refused to charge.  Customer service was prompt and helpful in offering me troubleshooting options and honoring the 1-year warranty.
People can't hear me and say I sound like Im in a tunnel.  Used best if just listening to music

Amazing bass. Almost to much. Almost. These things thump.
These are comfortable, the controls are easy to get used to, the battery lasts a long time and they sound great.

Everything I hoped they would be and more! The sound is outstanding, and I listen to a lot of songs with Bass so I was hoping that these headphones would live up to the positive reviews that I read on these, and they definitely exceeded my expectations. These wireless headphones are my FIRST EVER pair that I have ever owned and I wanted to get a pair with truly good sound quality as well as a good price and these were an amazing buy for me because I wanted to make sure I could hear all the background instruments as well as a good fit. I have very small ears and normally regular headphones always seem to fall out, but these fit my little bitty ears like a glove! So happy with not only the product, but the extra's that came along with it including the dual carport charger, the extra pairs of ear plugs, the awesome case, etc. If you are looking to buy a pair of outstanding quality wireless headphones at an AWESOME price THESE Bluetooth headphones are a MUST. Now I understand why they are backed up as an Amazon recommended purchase. I have only had them for about a week, but I am extremely pleased with them and glad they accommodate to my music loving experience :)

So far, I love them. They are comfortable and loud enough to play my drums. I was tired of a cord head set, so these are working great so far.

Regards,

Will Dillard

My daughter works out and uses them almost daily. What she likes best is the sound quality and the fit.  The only complaint is they are not good for making calls.  If you make a call it picks up all the noise around you and the other person can't hear you.
These are great headphones.  They sound great, comfortable to wear and are super light weight.  You get a kit as well full of accessories..i would buy these again.

Bought this mostly for around the house when doing chores like cleaning the yard and so on. I have Samsung S8 and for whatever reason the headphones kept cutting in and out. I have tried other wireless headphones and haven't had that issue. I bought another pair of these, and the same thing kept happening. Besides that the sound quality is pretty bad below average for what I'm used to. Even for the price (which is low) I don't recommend, spend the extra money and get some good sounding headphones. You do get what you pay and this is no different.

I was skeptical of how good the sound would match up to my other headphones, so I tested them out.

Wired, Apple headphones as my "low quality" competitor. Wired, on the ear Kraken headset as my "high quality" competitor. These headphones were miles ahead of the Apple heaphones in terms of sound quality, and nearly as good as my headset. The highs sounded great, but there was a noticeable difference in bass quality. The bass was still heard quite well, but of course not as earthshatteringly low as in my headset.

Also, there was no lag when watching videos and using these headphones. If any sync issue between video and sound would have been seen, these would be an insta-return.

So, overall these were a great purchase. Solid sound, waterproof, no lag, they stay in my ears while running, what else could I ask for?
Arrived sooner than expected. Great sound quality.

Used it in 5 work outs, charged them, brought to gym only to find the headphones dead. Completely dead. No amount of charging or holding and pushing power button does anything. Hope your experience is better.

They are excellent but they broke three days after receiving them.

Edit: Company responded to my email within 24 hours, offered to replace the headphones, and gave me a discount for my troubles. I have been using the new headphones for over 3 days and they are working well so far, no issues. As long as they keep working, they will easily become my favorite headphones for working out and listening to music wirelessly.
Arrived to the game late, my first pair of Bluetooth headphones, and I'm happy with the quality and ease of setup and use.
Comfortable. Easy to set up. However, only clear audio when holding my phone in my hand. Starts breaking up as soon as it gets into my pocket or a case.

I like the sound quality of this product. For the price price you pay for them you actually get a great sound. Yes, they need to work a little more on noise cancellation, but they work well. I’m sure that with time they will eventually better this headphones!
For music and talking on the phone works great.

201708 used for less than 2 weeks. For similar price range this one is still rather bulky with great sound if earbuds stay in the ears.

I waited to post this review, hoping I could get the right fit, but didnt happen.

Purchased these headphones in June and love them. Clear sound and comfortable to wear. Started having trouble connecting with phone and was past the return window with Amazon. Great headphones!! Quality - great sounds and really great battery life
Comfortable, sound great and block quite a bit of background noise. I would purchase again.

Great sound!

I've had this set of earbuds for about 10 months now and use them mainly for listening to audio books, music and for phone calls.  I own two sets of Senso earbuds (S-250 and S-300) and am very happy with both.  They have very good battery life and charge quickly.  They come with various size fittings for ears including a foam set that works really nice as well as a nice zip up carrying case.  In addition, they have a one year warranty.  When one of my sets began to fail, I contacted customer support through their website (during the weekend) and provided my Amazon order ID.  They verified my warranty and processed a replacement shipment immediately.  It's been a great experience overall.  I would definitely recommend these earbuds and the company in general.
I brought the headphones for my wife. She loves them.
Terrible
Initially had some issues with it. Now it's just fine
Great product and great price. Easy set up nice sound quality and it lasts all day while I'm working.
It's works well as a headset for media but it's not that great on phone calls. There seems to be a high amount of noise especially on windy days.

These headphones are decent for use in situations where you may not care much for audio quality, such as working out, running, cycling, doing yard, etc. They fit extremely well and are very comfortable to wear. However, when it comes to sound quality, they aren't very good. The treble is pretty much non-existent and the bass is way too boomy. Using this with my phone, I had to mess with my audio player's equalizer to get them sounding acceptable, but that will only take effect in the audio player. Any other apps I may be using while also using the headphones will sound pretty bad. If you have the ability to mess with an equalizer, these are fine for the price. However, I have a pair of $12 wired Skullcandy earbuds that sound better than these without needing to mess with an equalizer. I'm really only keeping these because they are bluetooth and I need something with no cables while doing yard work and cycling.
Love these headphones for running. Great value. Super comfortable, great sound, charge lasts FOREVER.
Surprisingly amazing. I had low expectations, but these really work better than most others I've tried. Very satisfied.

I purchased these headphones because it looked like a deal too good to be true.. well it was. I changed out the ear tips and they don't cancel out noise. Because I can't get them to fit properly they make a popping sound when I run, which is extremely irritating and makes me hate cardio more than I already do. They also don't cancel out noise effectively when I lay down while lifting weights. I bought them several months ago and thought I could stick it out but I purchased another brand of headphones today and will see if my boyfriend has the same issues with these.

Easy to connect and the sound is fantastic. Much better than the apple ear buds I'm used to using.  I'll have to play with the different sized earbuds to see which one fits my ear better, but otherwise is a very good buy.
These Rock! Are waterproof. Booming sound.  Mic works great for calls. Connects easily. Great sound quality. Would have thought they were $100 headphones
Poor sound quality. They broke after the 3rd use. Don't waste your money.

Iphone 7 and 7 plus perfect solution! You won't miss your wired headphones after you get a set of these amazing and inexpensive Bluetooth headphones! Allows you to charge your phone and talk at the same time. Great sound quality, long battery life and no more stressing out about not being a able to charge your phone while talking. I actually cut off the price that goes over your ear for a less nerdy look! You will never want to use wired headphones after you get these! After you use this technology you will see Apple made the right decision to eliminate headphone jack. They have always been at the forefront of technology progress and this is just another push for people into the latest technology which happens to be wireless.

I'm someone who usually just uses whatever headphones come with my phone but I finally decided it was time to get a higher quality set, and I'm glad I chose these! The sound quality is amazing, I was able to hear parts of songs I didn't even know were there before. They're a little bulky but still really comfortable (I have several ear peircing like my tragus and cartilage and these don't bother them at all). My only complaint is that it took a while for them to pair with my phone and I had to do a bit of finagling, but I finally got them working. Great purchase overall!
Never had Bluetooth headset, I will say that they are easy to pair and sound is great, like very much and the cord between ear buds don't tangle .
For under $30 they work great!!!
There is more sound on the right side then on the left, it was not worth the money I spent.
VERY HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT THANK YOU
Excellent product. Very comfortable and great sound. You wear these and forget you have them on.
These headphones are literally perfect for the price. My favorite set of headphones yet.
They're better than the beats!! Love them!!
Finally found blue tooth that has great stereo for music and excellent clarity when talking on phone. Thank you!
Works great so far best 40 I every spent☺️

I absolutely love these. I'm an avid runner and no matter how long run these stay put and don't hurt my ears. It's not only the quality of the product but the accessories are also wonderful. They come with different size ear buds which helps as I have small ears and struggle with larger buds. The price was great as well as the follow up from the sellers. I recommend these if you truly workout, build up a serious sweat but need the musical motivation.

Absolute garbage - died in less than 90 days. Never went even 2 full hours on a charge and declined rapidly from there. Range was very limited. I should get money money back, I certainly don't want a replacement. Don't buy them!!!

I have had these headphones for about 4 months. I have used them probably at least 4 times per week, much of which has been on runs and bike rides. They worked fairly well at first, but recently I have been having issues:
-The charging indicator hasn't been working, so I'm not sure if they're charging or not when plugged in.
-They have starting to lose signal repeatedly while on bike rides, to the point where eventually they just connect/disconnect constantly so that the audio doesn't have time to come through for more than a second.
-They no longer connect to my laptop.
It seems that they are just starting to fail in general, and soon won't be usable. I don't know if this is a common issue for this product or if mine just happens to be defective. The return-by date has passed, and I'm not sure about the warranty policy, if there is one. I will probably just buy new headphones from a different company.
Bought these for my son.  He said he loved them
worked great for the whole 1 day that they stayed together they the outer ear piece came apart just with every day usage.

This is a great pair of COMFORTABLE, Bluetooth earbuds. The sound quality is great despite not being noise cancelling (my preference for outdoor exercise.) The over the ear clips are great. I don't feel like I've got anything on or in my ear.
Works as advertised...great sound!

This is my second pair of these headphones. I use them daily on the construction site so they’re not necessarily getting an easy life. The first pair I couldn’t have wished for better. Obviously nothing is going to last forever. However, my second pair had issues only a few weeks after receiving them and only lasted 3 months before it became impossible to turn them on anymore. Will there be a 3rd pair? Not without trying something else first.

I'm really enjoying my Senso bluetooth headphones.  The sound quality is actually very good.  It only takes about an hour to fully charge them and they last a good 8 hours on a charge.  Included with the headphones were different size ear buds, a carrying case, and a magnetic car holder for your phone.  The different size ear buds were a nice bonus.  I was able to change the size and they fit perfectly in my ear with no slippage at all.  These are great headphones for the a good price.
Good headphones, recommendable!

They lasted a little over a year then quit charging. That’s pretty good for my usage. Seems like that’s as long as I can make them last as this was my second pair purchased that lasted about that long. I wish they would have lasted longer but for the price can’t really complain too much. Probably will buy again and expect 1 more year of service.
Super happy with these earphones. They seem to be very well made and sound great.

Bought these for both my husband and I to use while we work out, and we both LOVE, LOVE, LOVE them. He's thanked me 20 times for getting them, and we've only had them for a week, lol. If anything comes up, I'll update again, but they were a great find for us thus far!

I actually washed them through the washer/dryer, they still work!

battery life could be better, but gym workouts are now simpler... no need to worry about phone wires etc.
Comfortable ear phones, easy to use , and fantastic sound. Great headphones for the price.

Pretty good sound, comfortable secure fit and many different ear head sizes and styles for your best fit and comfort. Good quality and price. Great sound quality and noise cancellation. Best "cheap" pair of wireless headphones I've ever had.
Great sound (good bass), lightweight, perfect for exercise
