Excellent quality sound,everything works properly only time will tell if they hold up well to moisture and shock from my workouts.
These don’t work after 10 uses. I tried to fully charge and they won’t even turn on now.
They work great.  Stay in the ear without a struggle.
Ok zipper on case broken
My sons bought two pairs in different colors & they both have really liked them.

Just got them last week, but so far I like them. The fit comfortably and the sound quality is good.
I had a pair of Toshiba earphones and the "control" mechanism was on the wire in between the left and right earphone and when I ran it would bounce off my neck. Anyway the Senso earphone have the "control" mechanism inside the right earphone so it does not bounce off my neck when I run.

So after one week, I'm very happy with them. And if they last over a year with almost daily use then I would buy them again.
I bought these earphones for my spouse. He really likes it. The quality is good. The only negative is the left ear bud keeps coming out every time he runs. Otherwise its fine.
Terrific buy.  Worth the money.
Work as promised. For the price they're hard to beat.
Great product! Lost first pair and got another!

It was a toss up as to whether I would replace my iPhone's cabled earbuds or whether I would venture into the world of cableless bluetooth. I'm glad that I did. The SENSO Bluetooth Headphones paired easily and quickly with my iPhone 7. I'd read that after market , non-Apple headphones and earbuds sometimes have trouble pairing with the iPhone. Not a hitch. I was quickly impressed with the sound of these little things. I'm much happier than I was with the original equipment that came with the iPhone.

Good sound and they stay on my ears. I have a tragus piercing that prevents most buds from staying in my ears. But these stay in my ears even when I am running at the gym. Buttons are easy to use and I have no problems with connectivity.
Great headphones! Have not had to adjust them at all while running which is key.

These headphones do not work as advertised.  I use them to exercise in, so they do get sweat on them but they have never been submersed in water.  After about 4 weeks of use the headphones stop working.  Senso support will send you a replacement pair, which will break after 4 weeks of use.  Then, when you report that the headphones broke again, support will not respond.  So, I bought a second pair on Amazon and the exact same thing happened - worked for 4 weeks, stopped working, got a replacement pair that stopped working, and then Senso support doesn't respond.  These headphones are prove the saying that "you get what you pay for" - cheap, crappy headphones and poor support service from Senso.
These are much better than Beats. The placement of the control button is on the ear plug. Therefore no sweat would ever damage them. The sound quality is excellent. The price is right.

I really like this headset  when it comes to my music. I work in a noisy  environment  and the sound quality is very good. On the other hand  it  does not have noise canceling  ability so it picks up all the background  noise. I have owned 4 different  lg headsets. The sound quality of the  Senso headset is just as good If not better.
Excelente presentacion y funcionalidad, el producto es más de lo esperado, calidad y mejoría en el sonido inigualable a los headphone ya utilizados. Muy buen producto.
Better design than the other around the neck bluetooth headphones. It's probably the flat cord. This design is more durable. I'm a gardener and put these things through hell. Great purchase.

Great for the price you can usually find these for. The over-ear loops are a little big for my ears with no way to adjust, but the sound quality is good (all things considered, they don't compare to better brands obviously) and the battery lasts all week for daily 1-hour work outs.

I didn’t want to buy $200 headphones so I went for these and I haven’t been disappointed. I’ve had them for over a year now and they’ve held up great. The sound is great, they connect easily, the battery life is decent and they’re lightweight. If you’re looking for an affordable pair of headphones that won’t disappoint, you’ve found them.
Great for a quick run or trip to the gym good value
Good product but when lifting weights ( no sudden movements) they will skip or break up for a second. My cord earbuds never do this. Must be a Bluetooth problem.

I purchased these headphones because of the amazing reviews, however not impressed!! The headphones fell out multiple times while running and every time I would reposition I hit the pause button due to it's location on the headphones. The ear pieces are not adjustable and are made one-size-fits-all, however they would work better for a person with much larger ears. Would not recommend this product!

I purchased this product based solely off the price and customer reviews and I must say that I am totally pleased with my purchase. This product arrived the next day after ordering it on Sat, it was here by noon on Sunday and the headphones were easy to set up and work perfect. The only thing I would suggest is to buy an armband for your cell phone if using it with that. The sound will cut in and out with your phone in your pocket, however in defense of this product that also happened with every other similarly priced Bluetooth headphones I purchased.

These are my first an only set of Bluetooth ear buds. So I can't compare them to others but I can compare them to my corded setup and these are superior.

So far I have found the sounds to as good or better than my Sienhauser corded set. Battery life is great. Haven't reached a low battery message yet. They work great for cycling and seem like they should work well for running or other activities. Once you read the instructions, they turn out to be versatile and easy to use.
Best Bluetooth earbuds we have ever had!!
Great product
They just stopped working after a month and half.
Surprised how good they sound for the price. Have used for about a week and no issues.
This product worked great for the first month I had it. Now 3 months later it will constantly connected and disconnect. I have tried multiple things to right the problem but nothing has worked.
Just received them yesterday and used them today on a hike and at the gym. Works great, & stays nice and snug in my ears. Very happy with the price and quality so far!

Headphones work great! Right out of the package they had a full charge which I never expected. They fit perfectly over my ears and don't have an issue with my glasses being in the way. The extra 3 foot cord is nice when you do not want to charge them on your desk with the mini cord.

Great headphones that come with a nice complimentary carrying case and extra ear bud covers. Great quality product. Great sound. The hook that curves around your ear is bendable so it gives a custom fit for who ever is wearing them. Also can use as bluetooth for phone. Would definitely buy again.
Easy to use!
Look, feel, and sound very good.
Love these headphones. Totally comfortable and efficient with an amazing price point. Also love round zipper carrier and all the optional sized ear buds.
Great value!! Sound quality is excellent!! Better accessories than a lot of the more expensive supposedly high end earphones.

Bought this for my husband, and didn't realize that it can sync up to our smart TV via bluetooth. So he can watch tv while the baby and I are sleeping without the loud noise. It's a great product that I just bought another one today from the lightening deal!
Loving how easy it is to bluetooth. great sound and no cords to get in the way of bicycling. great fit to the ears with several sizes to choose from.
Exactly what I was look for. They sound great!
Nice feel & look for a wireless sports headphones.  It stayed put during my 2 hour crossfit workout.

I love the reception...so clear and it never fades in-and-out...and no static.  The only problem I have is with the fit in one ear.  One ear fits perfectly, the other not so.  May just be my ear, as I’ve had problems with earbuds in the past.  However, they are so nice, I’ll make do...
Great headsets. They have long battery life and they are comfortable.

I've bought several different sets of ear buds on Amazon because I am cheap and won't pay for Bose or other name brand ones.

These are by far the most comfortable. The bass is the best I've heard out of sports headphones. They are really quite comfortable. The Bluetooth covers a long distance. They have a great battery life. Most importantly, they stay in when I run and work out! Add to that it comes with multiple chargers different size buds, etc. I haven't found any negatives yet. Buy these headphones if you need a good set for running and you won't regret it.
I bought these for the gym and they are really great. The sound is amazing and noise cancellation is perfect. These are just as good as any other brand out there.

I bike about 15 to 30 miles  on dirt gravel and mountain bike trails. Lot of wind and sometimes heavy rain but these headphones have git me through. They have even survived a few crashes.  They can get loud and thte bass is actually good. Phone calls at above 10 mph are a no go.

These headphones did not fit in my ears, despite trying all ear tips provided. The sound was tinny because I couldn't get a good fit, and I was told the I sounded far, far away when I picked up a call using the headphones.
Raving reviews for earbuds/headphones on Amazon have no been very accurate for me. I think most of the people posting reviews about sound quality haven't had nice ear buds!

UPDATE 6/21/2018
I want to start off by saying that I meant to do this update for some time now. Okay, here I go.... Unfortunately, I have to say that I am not happy with my replacement headphones (that I paid for with my own money) as, if you read the whole review, I had initially purchased because I thought the first one was broken. So the very 1st pair that I bought continues to work like a charm. However, the 2nd pair which I received February 4, 2018 has turned out to be absolute garbage.

Even after I received the 2nd pair, I continued to use primarily the 1st one and didn't really use the 2nd one much. So honestly it took me a awhile to notice that the 2nd pair, whenever I used it, would not work right. It kept on losing the bluetooth connection. This is how it would go. I pair it to my phone, and less than a minute later, it's lost the connection. I re-pair and the same thing. However, since I have my original pair I would just go back to that and would chalk it up to maybe I forgot to charge the second pair. Anyway, it wasn't until I had misplaced the 1st one and had to rely on the 2nd one that I noticed once and for all that it constantly loses its connection, it's not my phone or our home wifi, it's the headphone itself. So now, I don't even bother using it as it's been nothing but a headache.
I hate to have to report this but I have to be honest about my experience.
Thus, my conclusion...I still don't regret having originally bought, the 1st pair anyway, which I still use. However, I am just a little saddened that the backup that I had always planned to purchase is basically useless. So, that's my 2 cents.
Thanks for reading!!!
*****************************************************************************************************************************************************************

UPDATE: 2/27/2018
I purchased these great earbuds back in December 2016 and proceeded to use them all the time. I even used them in the shower as I had originally stated in my first review. Well, about a month ago I thought that they had stopped working. It started after a 2.5 hour jog/walk and of course by the end I was pretty sweaty. So I had issues with it working properly after that and thought, oh great, my fault, I wasn't careful enough with these babies and decided to go ahead and purchase a second pair. Well to my absolute delight, as I was waiting to get my second pair, which was a very short wait. The company is really fast with shipping and they arrived in like 2 days. Anyhow, I decided to try using my first pair again, I just wasn't ready to part with it even though I knew I had another one coming. Now here's the delight part, it actually started working again. Apparently, it just needed to dry out. That's it. It's working perfectly again. So as I had initially intended to purchase a second pair anyway, I am just ecstatic. These really are the best earbuds I have ever come across and I still continue to use these all the time in favor of other earbuds. Also, I wanted to add as I hadn't reviewed how they work with phone calls before. I can truly say that they are great on that as well. The sound quality on calls and the ease with answering and hanging up, such a breeze. Additionally, pairing is also a breeze with connectivity occurring at around 5-7 seconds. They charge very quickly as well. If they are drained it may take about 2 hours or less to fully recharge, but half an hour goes a long way with these too . Thus, I continue to be extremely happy with this company and this highly recommended, stellar, well made, quality item and I am very thankful to now have two of them.
Once again I did not receive a penny for my review. I gladly spent money out of my own pocket for these and like I said before, money well spent. Thanks again Tekatron!!!

Oh and I almost forgot. The company, both times reached out to me by email, even one of the owners, just to check in on me and to see if I liked the product. They made me genuinely feel that they wanted to make sure that, should I have any issues that I could easily contact them. I truly appreciate their sincerity and I believe anyone reading this will too. Thanks again, so loving this company!!!

*****************************************************************************************************************************************************************

First off let me start off by making it absolutely clear that I did not receive anything for my review. I paid for these out of my own pocket. Very very happy with my purchase by the way, but I’ll get to that shortly.

Okay, let’s begin! Where have these been all my life or atleast since bluetooth earbuds became a thing? I have never ever ever owned such a boss, primo, whatever word suits you, throw your own in there if you have these already because you know what I am talking about, pair of earbuds. Earbuds, earbuds, I just cannot believe these are earbuds, these are A..M..A..Z..I..N..G!!! I honestly resigned myself to simply average earbuds until I found these. I can do somersaults over here, with them on. They are so super snug, absolutely no slippage. I always have trouble with that, always, but not with these. They have literally become my go to. I find myself making excuses to wear them. Phone calls, listening to music (of course), workouts, playing games on my phone, to make it seem like I’m on a call even when I’m not because I am trying to not be bothered. I even shower with them on, it’s like a spa experience. No, I do not recommend this, please do not try this and if you do, leave me and the company out of it. But these are just so good and incredibly comfortable!!! Plus, the sound quality actually rivals that of some of my headphones. Not listing any, not an audiophile, but trust me, I’m sure if you gave these a shot you would not be disappointed. Even the battery life is pretty plentiful at a whopping 8 hours which knocks my Soundpeats out of the water at a supposedly 6 hours (they never really seemed to really last for that amount of time anyway). Plus, the Peats were much more bulky in comparison to these pretty sleek buds. And did I mention the bass? How could I forget that? That’s one of the main reasons why I am so shocked these are earbuds. The bass is absolutely killer. It’s just the right amount, not too heavy, not too low, just perfectly pound-erific bass. I know pound-erific is not a word. But these are so great I feel like Willy Wonka, Dr. Seuss, (whichever fits the bill), when I wear them and I can make up words. I gain magical powers with the freedom and the pleasure that these provide me. It’s like having a soundtrack to my life. I obviously wear these a lot. Please don’t judge me. But it’s not just about the bass. I listen to just about everything with these, and the sound is remarkable. I find myself getting lost in the music, an absolute pleasure to my ears. Even the packaging is top notch. It comes with everything you need to get started. You get not 1 but 2 super quality charging cables with covers. Like I said top notch!!! You get a car charger, 3 ear tips, a wire tie, and a nice size, actually stylish case. Also, my buds charged up really fast at only 1.5 hours and I was ready to go. So very very happy with my purchase especially since I had my eyes on them for awhile and even more so that they ended up being so delightfully, deliciously, spenderificiously, (I know, not an actual word) lovely. So, basically as I come to the end of my review, if you’ve made it this far, stop, go back to the top of the page and hit the add to cart button. You deserve a happy purchase. A happy purchase, what’s that? Well let’s just say I would have gladly held up one of those signs on the side of the road for businesses trying to advertise, you know the people wearing the Statue of Liberty costume or in regular clothes, some spinning signs trying to get you to stop or go in to see a business. If this company ever said they were giving these away as a promotion if you do this, even though I already own a pair, I would do it. I really mean that, the company can hold me to it.
Alright, having said that I will, finally, officially, conclude by stating that these were in fact my Christmas gift to myself to block out some holiday chatter. Let’s just say they worked like a charm. THANK YOU!!!! So I say to SENSO, you rock, literally and THANKS so so much. My life isn’t transformed but I can block more stuff out, they really are that great at noise-canceling. Didn’t even know they would be great at that, but just another one out of the many great features of this product. Amazon, THANK you so much for introducing me to SENSO!!! One of my most happiest purchases, money so well spent that I plan on doing it again, (must have a backup pair or two). Thanks so much for reading!!! And finally, depending on where you are, good morning, good day and good night!
They were very easy to connect and sound great. The ear piece was hard at first but I finally figured it out, never use one that had a ear piece before. Great product great price..

These things are the real deal.  They fit well and work great. I work under jumbo jets all day and these headphones not only block out noise and deliver quality sound performance, they stay powered up All day. I couldn't be happier. Best purchased in awhile

Great headphones! Sound is clear and the controls are easy to use. I use them for the gym and will get about 6-8 uses out of them before I have to charge them. I will usually use them for an hour or an hour and a half at a time. Super easy to charge in the car. Stays secure in your ear. It only takes an hour or less to get a full charge.
Work well  Nice battery life

I have been using the headset for the last 4 days and they work just as described:

* Great sound. It Is better that what i expected.
* Comfortable enough in your ears. I have used them for 6 hours straight and my ears weren't husrting and they are pretty light (at least for me)
* It charges in hour and a half (10 mins give or take) and I think the battery died after 6 hrs of continious use (didn't timed it properly)...the description says 8, but I think that is acceptable. Although I will time it next time.
* All accesories included as described and the case is pretty cool.
* As for the distance I think it has a good range. I have gone to a considerable distance, gone inside a server room and still get the signal strong. I haven't made a proepr distance test (~32 open space) but so far it has proven to have a good range.
* The microphone seems ok

So I can say, so far so good. I still need to do more testing and see how it behaves in the long term.
Fits great and good quality sound
Great sound. Great price. I just wish the battery life was a little better. It's seems to play between 3 to 4 hours before it needs charging again.

These are fantastic. The sound is really good and pairing with my phone was a breeze. They are so great that my spouse keeps trying to borrow them. Comes with accessories pictured below, which includes three different size ear pieces. Comfortable fit as well.

**did receive at a promo rate.

It has been a year since I bought these headphones. they are now part of my gym routine. Bluetooth connection is very good so I can just leave my phone on a corner and walk around 50ft radius inside the gym. I usually use spongy heads for my ears. However they don't cancel windy noise while running outdoor. it is a little annoying
Love these!  Light weight. Sweat-proof. Great sound. Easy to use.
Perfect so far, excellent sound

I LOVE these headphones! Loud volume and great bass. The battery lasts a long time also. These pair, unfortunately, now has a short in one ear. I will contact support  to inquire about a replacement. But my 1st pair - I've had 6+ yrs are still going strong 😊 Noise cancelation is pretty good. I can make and take calls, no problem. The other person can hear me pretty good, which is great in my book, considering I work near an airport and take calls mostly outside.
Best headset for the price!!
good product , i will recommend to my friends , great sound and inexpensive

Really like these earphones, but even with the phone in my pocket, the playback is interrupted like on a walk...possibly by my earrings? Nice for working around the house when you can set your phone within a clear path and move around uninhibited.
For the price these are great little headsets. I was amazed at how clear and concise both music and conversations come through.  Love them!
Finally a reasonably price set of headphones that sound good and stay in my ears when I run.
I like everything

There are so many comprehensive reviews of this product already posted, it's hard not to be redundant. I bought these for my husband and he loves them. He had them synced and working with his devices in no time, including an old LG cell phone that has Bluetooth and some other limited capabilities but in no way can be considered a smart phone. (This particular LG model happens work as a pretty decent mp3 music player  which is why he paired the headphones it.) The Wi-fi range is somewhat limited - you can't be very far from your source, but the sound quality and volume control are good and the buds/clips fit comfortably on the ears, at least for my husband. These light-weight, easy to use headphones are, so far, performing well and proving to be a good quality product at a very reasonable price.

I use them for bicycling and weight training and the sound is excellent. Also they work great for weight training as the last pair I had kept falling off and it hasn't happened at all with these. Definitely would recommend them.

...6 months in and I'm having a very difficult time with the Bluetooth remaining connected.

This is my 4th purchase since 2017 (the other ones would either get lost or somehow messed up), but I've always enjoyed the quality of music and ready connection to my Android devices. Maybe it's just nearing the end of its shelf life?
the sound is very clear and the device is easy to use. However it is not very comfortable in my ears.

I've been using this headphones for a few months now, and I've gotta say, there're great! I listen to a lot of music, and these things last from when I leave the house at 7:30 to when I get home from work around 5. The sound quality is great. The design is great too.

The only thing I don't like about these headphones is that the bright LED flashes periodically, which is unnoticeable during the day, but can get a bit annoying when I'm listening to podcasts in my room at night with the lights off.

If you're looking for an affordable wireless headphone set, buy these!

Hands down worth the money I spent on these! I have some powerbeats3 which I love too, but the powerbeats3 have shut off, due to all the sweat! These have been perfect! I like to do lunges and use a class size room, to do them, and the music didn't cut off at all, so the range is pretty good too.. definitely worth it for me!

I have been using these for 2 months now and they still are going strong. I got tired of my beats breaking down and not connecting to bluetooth so I bought these. Great for the price. I use these 5x a week and they still are working good as new.
Very very nice of earbuds and Bluetooth

I like the headphones for the price. They occasionally get some weird static when the battery is close to dying or when I'm listening to something and then scrolling through sites that have videos. It has good range and pretty good battery life

I purchased these in February of 2017 and I have been amazed by the sound quality since day 1. Amazing clarity, good bass, and high quality sound. The battery life is also worth bragging about. Each of my gym sesseion lasts about 2 hours, and sometimes I go 3 or 4 sessions without charging it and they have only died on me once (my own damn fault). Just this month, a year and 10 months later, one of the earpieces started going in and out. I have put these things through the ringer and they have taken liters of my sweat and worked great for almost 2 years. I am writing this review now since I was so pleased that I am purchasing another pair. At this price point, there is no comparison. These things are AMAZING!!!

I've had this product for about 2 weeks. So far I have been pretty impressed, great volume good fit, battery not quite as described but I do listen on full volume so that could be the issue there. Let's see how they hold up over time but so far I would recommend these especially for the price
Easy to link to my Samsung 8. I am really loving them. Best purchase.

These headphones are great! They are of excellent quality and the sound is amazing. The battery life is great and I highly recommend them. They come with several accessories, a case, extra ear pieces and they adjust to your ears to be comfortable. Like I said, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM!
The ear straps aren't adjustable so these don't stay in my ear while exercising
Not a good quality item
Sound quality disappointing. They were cheap and they sound that way.
The best wireless headphones I've tried.  I like them better than Bose.
Robert Lacey
Same sound quality of beats... Few hundred dollars cheaper!!

They were great! For about a month. Now all the troubleshooting steps in the pamphlet will not make them sync with my iPhone blurthooth. Update: They responded to my email within an hour on a Saturday night, told me to reset the buds to the factory settings and clear it from my iPhone and start over. It worked. I'm back in business.
I bought 2 of these in June and one of them is no longer working. When it is charging it says that it is charge but once it is taken off the charger it does not work.
These bluetooth earbuds work great with the new iphones.

I thought these were great! I would have given them 4/5 stars... but, I was charging them and came home to them melted! Our home smells like chemicals and I’m SO thankful they didn’t start the house on fire or hurt our dog!

Will not buy again!

Full marks on being a quick source to outsourcing sound from your phone 📱 to a in ear 👂 device so I can hear my podcast, music 🎶 and calls all fine, the only problem is the device terribly fails at being a good alternate to the 🎤 microphone to take phone ☎️ calls on, people often complain of how I sound like someone inside a tunnel barely audible, while I hear them fine.
They work great and stay in place.

Love these earbuds!  They stay in my ears. The thing I didn't think about before going wireless is that if they do fall out, they're not attached to your phone via a cord. Hasn't happened but made me careful when I took one bud out. Love the tidy litttle case that comes with the buds. Great product!

If you want to buy some cool wirless headphone? This one would be the best item ever! Quality sound and light even looking good!
No regret ! I would buy this one again for my family and friends as well!
Thanks Senso !

I love these headphones! I love how comfortable the ear pieces are. The cord is so light, I barely felt it while I was running at the gym. Finally I feel like I can work out without having to mess with my headphones too much or worry about them popping out. I bought a Bluetooth wireless set before this but it was bulky & bothered me while running. Thank you for making these so I can run with ease!
Great Bluetooth ear buds for the price! Would buy again.
So far they are excellent great sound and the phone was crystal clear with comfortable ear fit.
Great product. Very simple to set up and understand functionality. Great value.

So far really happy with them. I've had them for about a week so far, and am really impressed. Sound quality is high, very comfortable after putting in the ear piece that fits my ear, they don't move or fall out even with heavy movement. Connectivity seems to be kinda short range, but it's something you can deal with. Only thing I would change, is the material the cord that connects the two. If you're sweating, it tends to stick to your neck pretty bad, so you've gotta adjust it quite frequently. If not, then once you turn your head after it's been sticking, it can rip it out of your ear. Other than that, still definitely 5/5 stars.

This is the second pair and both went bad within 6 months. The first pair the USB port fried somehow when plugged in overnight. The second pair started not holding a charge for more than 3 hours after 4 months of purchase. Within 6 months just turned off in middle of workout and then wouldn't charge anymore. I surmise that the rubber over the USB port isnt sufficient to protect from sweat. So don't buy these.
Awesome wireless headset. Good quality feel to them, great sound and they fit over the ear very well. Easy to use, links right up with my Andriod phone. Great purchase.

In my initial review, I gave this a 5 star because of the customer service. The earphone I received initially seemed to have some defect. They Customer service was very prompt to respond to emails. Based on my email, within a couple of days a new earphone was shipped.
Initially i though the replacement earphones worked very well. But after a week, i regret buying this. If I keep my phone in my pocket and go out for a walk or jog, there is severe distortion. It keeps losing connection every few seconds. Cannot even properly listen to a song. I take the phone out of my pocket, and no distortion. I have earphones from another brand (costs way less than senso) which works quite well compared to senso. Avoid buying this. Its a waste of money.
Very good product, came with a lot of accessories. Thanks

My headphones showed up promptly and everything works well.  I wore them at work and once to go running so far and I have to say that I am impressed.  After getting them connected to my phone they are pretty much hands free and I haven't noticed any issues with the Bluetooth cutting out.  They fit well and I haven't had any issue with them falling out (my last set was terrible for this and is what prompted me to buy this pair).

Excellent headphones, I wear them to run or go to the gym. Great sound quality, holds a charge for a long time. The earpieces are pretty comfortable too, unlike some other headphones I've worn. I sweat quite a bit and it doesn't seem to have affected them.  The microphone is ok, the people I'm talking to complain that I'm too quiet and hard to hear. I didn't buy them to make calls, so it's not really an issue for me.
Bought for my 11 years old grandson who use to play outside with ball and I am not afraid that he may loose it; if it's felt from his ear - it will stay on his neck. He said he loves it.

Really great headphones, especially for the cost. Fits well, sound is good, and they stay in place while working out. My left bud buzzes a bit but it is really only noticeable in a quiet setting. The standard noise of a gym with music playing makes it really hard to hear any buzzing. Customer service was excellent as well - very quick to respond and super helpful with everything.

These are awesome headphones! Very easy to connect to my IPhone. The sound quality is excellent! I love how they came with 3 sizes of ear pieces. I was able to find my perfect fit in no time. They were fully charged when I received them so I was able to enjoy them right away. I haven't used them enough yet to run down the charge, so I will update this review after my first charge. Very highly recommended!

It’s hard to complain about these because they’re so cheap. However, they don’t fit around my ears correctly. As long as I don’t move they fit just ok but the second I move they fall off my ear. So personally I would never wear these for anything but sitting still at my desk at work.

On the positive side the sound quality is pretty good. They synced really easily with my phone. I just turned them on and opened the Bluetooth on my phone and they were synced. They also make sound in your ear telling you they’re synced. Another thing I like is when they’re connected to your phone it shows the battery level on your phone so you know when to charge them.

Ultimately these are great for the price but I had to give them a lower rating strictly for the fact that they don’t fit the shape of my ear well or stay put.

Edited: I have upgraded my rating from 2 stars to 5. When I wrote about a problem here, Senso support contacted me and helped me fix the problem. I've been slow to edit my review, but they were quick with service. Very pleased.

Pro: Stay in the ear pretty nicely. Deliver good sound when they deliver sound.
Con: Don't deliver sound. (Edit 5/22/18: This problem has been solved.) Will signal that they are connected. But often they don't deliver any sound. Clicking the button will pause or unpause the application that's trying to deliver sound. You can hear this because the sound is coming from the phone's speakers. (iPhone 6+ in my case). But no sound comes through the earbuds. Restarting either the earbuds or the app will fix the problem, but sometimes it requires several restarts in order to fix the problem. In the meantime, you're annoying the people around you with sound from the phone's speaker. I would have been delighted with this product if not for this serious failing.
Product delivered on time and exceeds expectations. Outstanding fidelity and the "setup" was easy and fast. Highly recommend supplier and product.
Was hoping sound quality would be better than what it is. It’s a bit worse than the Apple wired headphones. Might only use these when I desperately need wireless when doing active work.
I had purchased a pair a few months ago and they were great. Unfortunately i lost them and I didn't hesitate to purchase another pair. They hold a good charge and have a really good sound.
These are perfect for running. I bought these to replace a pair without the earloop bc they kept falling out during my run. These were perfect.

works great...
stays in during a workout.
light.
good volume.
Junk don't buy this ...as it is low quality. Item lasted all of two charges before it stopped working.
I can't imagine better wireless headphones for the price.  I wore them running today on an extremely windy day and sound quality was great.  They are also comfortable to wear.

These are headphones I only use when I run for the most apart and occasionally when I take the subway to work. I bought these in late January and the left side has stopped working entirely. Super disappointing given how little they’ve been used and only stored in the container it can with. Additionally, the charger provided only works when I play with the cord after plugging it in to charge. Horrible.

These headphones are way better than I expected. The sound is amazing! Also they’re super secure. I like boxing (hitting mitts/heavy bag) and I didn’t have to adjust them at all. Oh the memory earbuds are an amazing touch! Complete cancel out noise and I hardly know I’m wearing them.

On the first day of using these, one side started not working. Not very impressed, hopefully they will answer my email and refund us or send a new pair. The LOOK great- but not working properly is a bummer.
I work out in these several days a week, running, weights, and HIIT. They sound great for the price and stay in my ears during all types of workouts. Battery life has been much better than my Tao's.

I have had these for nearly two years now, and they are still going strong. I use them almost every day at work, and they have yet to disappoint. The battery life is excellent, the controls are excellent, and they came with a car charger adapter, usb charger adapter, iPhone/micro usb charger, a clamshell case, it’s unbelievable. These are one of the best values I have ever seen!!
The cord for the iPhone doesn't stay i very well. Still trying it out. I didn't realize it was this complicated.

As others have pointed out the base is amazing... down side is there are almost no high notes.  I'm finding out that I am a bit of an audiophile.  Also the cord is too short, I often find one side wanting to get pulled out of my year when I turn my head.
Works very well when running
The head phones are great and are of the exact same quality as the major brand competitor but s third of the cost.  I highly recommend them.
I AM REALLY SURPRISED HOW GREAT THEY ARE.  I USE THEM AT THE GYM  AND THEY ARE AWESOME. STILL LEARNING  HOW THEY WORK BUT LOVE THEM ,GREAT SOUND, EASY TO USE.  THANKS.

These wireless headphones are the best I have used. Battery-power is amazing--I rarely have to recharge more than once a week. The over the ear straps make them comfortable and secure even when running. Sound quality is great. The extras, like the headphone carrying case, cell phone card carrier and car mount, are nice add-ons. I hope not to lose these, but if I do, I will immediately replace with Senso.

They stay in my ears, pair up quickly, and last quite awhile on a charge. For the price I guess they're OK but these reviews are questionable at best. Everything about them is good except for the most important part which is the sound. They sound like a $10 pair of earbuds. Voices sound muted and any kind of bass like you would find in a typical rap song distorts the sound considerably even at low volume. Outside, these things are almost unusable on any kind of breezy day as they pick up and amplify wind noise more than any other earbuds I have used.

Long story short, I gave then 3 stars because if you just want a cheap pair of sweat proof earphones for use in the gym and don't care much about sound quality then these are probably as good as any other in it's price range. If you want something that sounds good though, spend the extra money and skip these 'off-brand' models.
Great quality, I also like the way it fits in the ears comfortably

Great headphones for a very reasonable price.  I had an issue with pairing my headphones after 1 week of use.  Very frustrated I wrote a poor review.  Customer service responded immediately and provided a solution which worked perfectly.  Great product and even better customer service!
Easy to use- stay put- good sound
So far so good 2 months and counting.

Great fit. I run 3-5 miles a day and do interval training, and they never come loose. Bass is pretty good as well as loudness. Works great with my Samsung Edge. Also, the wire fits nicely around the neck or tucked into your shirt. The ear clip is a nice soft rubber that I barely feel.

Not sweat-proof but may be sweat-resistant. Found a few times having to wipe the unit down in order to get even sound.

There is no reason to spend a fortune for headphones for working out. They are sort of meant to be replaceable eventually anyway. If you're in the studio mixing tracks, then, of course, yes this is going to matter, but in the gym or outside, I just want to hear my music loudly and with a broad frequency spectrum. This will do it.
For the price these are a great deal. They stay in place while running which I have had problems with other headphones falling out.
The sound quality was really poor. I was shocked!!

Wish they had a smaller ear tip I have small ear openings. I used at the gym and they seemed to cut out now and then. Hopefully that was a fluke but very convenient and love that they come with a case!!
i love it great sound

By far the absolute best headphones I've ever owned..  they are exactly as described... Up to and including being waterPROOF worthy of IPX7 rating... And I can be heard crystal clear thru speaker phone by person on other end of the line even with wind racing past while biking...

I'm so disappointed I didn't get wireless headphones before now. These headphones are awesome for running or exercising. They don't budge at all and I don't notice the cord at all. Even while doing burpees, these don't budge! The only downside is that they don't have the greatest sound quality in terms of bass, but that's alright because of the price and convenience.
these were easy to set-up, i actually needed to change the size of the buds, which was a little bit of a pain, but so far there are exactly what i needed
These were a gift for my husband.  He loves them!  Says the music quality is excellent and loves that they stay in unlike traditional earbuds.  Thank you!
Awesome headphones. The fit is great and they sound awesome. They also came with an awesome 2 in one lightning/mini USB charger
Bought these as a gift for Father's Day.  He enjoyed them while cycling.  He said they were comfortable and easy to figure out.
Love that if you fall asleep, don't lose them like wireless, and don't end up chocked like wired. These are great, especially for the price
Good sound, comfortable fit and lasting battery life.
I like the bass that the headphones produce and the 8pin/mini combo cable is a nice touch.

Love the quality and the accessories that come with the product. Was a little disappointed that I could only by one at a time. I wanted two pair (one for me and hubby). I had to buy the second from different company
Just 4 months of using it and one side of this earphone is already not working. I liked it when they were working fine.

So far so good. The sound quality is great and they are so convenient. Just started back going to the gym and I needed a good pair of earphones that could drown out all the noise in the gym.  Very happy with this purchase.

This is actually the third pair of the exact same headphones that I bought. I bought my wife a pair, me a pair, and another replacement pair for myself. The sound quality is good (not amazing$, but what I really like is the fit. I’ve had many pairs of headphones, and they always seem to come out of my ears when I run, no matter what I do. These actually stay put.
Battery lasts for forever! Got these on sale and was extremely pleased with the outcome. I also have wireless beats and these are very comparable.

Seriously stop what you are doing and buy these. I've had them about a year and they are perfect. They don't come out when I run or lift, and have decent sound and can get REALLY loud if you need them to. I've tried about 4 different types of Bluetooth headphones for working out and NONE I tried came even close.

Don't buy under the assumption that these are actually waterproof. They had decent sound quality and were pretty durable for at least basic gym wear, but they don't connect consistently to iPhones and my pair broke after initial exposure to water.
My 16yr old purchased a pair of these for himself and loves them, his brother asked for a pair for Christmas this year!
I was excited to buy this product. It worked well for a few months and then just stopped working. I would not recommend these.

I love the SENSO earbuds.  They come with a USB car 12 volt charger, a travel case and a charging cable. They sound just as good or better than the Sony earbuds I have. And they are very comfortable to wear.  I am very happy I found them on Amazon.  You won't go wrong if you purchase these earbuds.  A1 product in my opinion.

Throughout the first few months, they worked great.  I loved the way they fit for my runs. However, after a few months, one ear just stopped working.  Kind of frustrating to have this happen for no reason. I wish I could give it 5 stars, but when a product only works for a few months, it simply won't do.

I have had these ear buds for a little over a week and love them!  I use then at the gym during cardio (elliptical), abs circuit and strength conditioning.  Absolutely NO issues with them falling out, even with heavy sweat.  As for the sound, I tried two pairs from Bose and cannot tell the difference, other than $110-$160 in price for the latter.  For the price, you can't beat them!
Product description on Amazon was completely accurate. Headphones work perfectly.
Enough said. Good deal for the price.
I am so surprised at the price of these awesome sounding earphones.  Keep up the good work.
I worked out with these often and within months of having it, it stopped working. It doesn’t charge and won’t respond to a reset. I am super disappointed.
This thing sucks, it does not pair with iphone 6. I'm assuming it doesn't work with any subsequent iphones either. So I couldn't do a proper review of the sound.

These are by far the best wireless Bluetooth headphones I have owned and have since purchased a second pair for my wife. I have tried others which either fell out of my ears while walking, or working out, and/or the battery life was dismal.

The pairing instructions were straight forward and worked without any problems, my Samsung 7 Edge recognized and paired with the Senso right away. The Senso headphones pack great sound, has good reception when the cellphone is in a pocket, and reception to/from while talking on the cellphone is excellent. The buttons are conveniently placed on the right bud, and the On/Off/Answer/Disconnect, as well as the volume controls work flawlessly.

The battery life is excellent, although I have not tried to go non-stop for the rated 8 hour battery life, I have used them on long walks, or working outside all day with the battery still holding a charge after 5-6 hours. I have a pair of Bose noise canceling earbuds which I use on airplanes, but whether it's working out, working around the house, outside work, the Senso's are now my goto for all my other activities.
The wireless headphone are AWESOME! not overpriced and great quality
This is my second pair I keep my last pair over a year And I wore them every day at work I think they’re pretty great

these headphones are even better than advertised! They are attractive, easy to use, comfortable to wear and the sound quality is exceptionally good. I couldn't imagine a better productive at such an attractive price. I listen to jazz, soul and classical music as i work out and find these far superior to other products of similar price range that I have owned. Congratulations Senso!
Excellent
Very uncomfortable. My ears hurt after a hour or so.If I knew they were this painful to wear, I would have just bought a more expensive set of headphones.
Great Sound and Very Comfortable. However, the attachment to power it is sunken and hard to attach
I’ve enjoyed them so much I bought an extra pair to keep at and one at work.

They work pretty well. Ok sound, good construction, good accessories. One small complaint: the buttons for next song and previous song should be swapped. Previous sing is towards the front of my head and next song is towards the back of my head, that's reversed from what I would expect. Same story for volume up and down which share buttons with next and previous song.
Works as advertised.  Very nice, comfy, and easy to use.  Totally would buy again. Great for mowing lawns, working out, or ignoring your coworker.
Love these headphone
Sometimes it works, It must be the connection problem.

I've had these for about a year and the left earbud no longer work.  I've used the almost every day for 8 hours. Pretty disappointed that they lasted only a year. Other than that they are great! Noise cancelling works wonders.

I synced these with my phone and hit the gym. The sound is great and they're super comfortable, but when I put my phone in my pocket and did some stretches sometimes the sound would go in and out. I guess having my body between the headphones and my phone cut off the connection a bit?
Either way, they were worth the money I spent! I use them for working out or watching a movie on my phone.

Excellent sound quality, volume can get bonkers loud, charges quickly, comes with enough ear bud covers in different sizes to get a a perfect fit,  ideal for working out. Had no issues pairing to my phone. Very pleased.
That are real nice. Come's with extras that would cost more if you had to buy them. I wish I could just buy a few of the lighter chargers they are great
Battery life is only 4-5 hours of music playing. The ear piece is a bit bulky. Can't activate Siri.
I love my new wireless headphones. Great for working out and they actually stay in your ear!!
I've only used them twice now and I'm impressed with the sound! It was super easy to connect to my phone! I'm hoping they last but so far so good 😊
Easy to set up and they stay on and are quite comfortable in the ear.  I really appreciated the price point....~$150-300 for other name brand bluetooth earbuds is ridiculous.

Comfortable headphones, they stay put during exercise even when sweating and moving fast. I like the case but you cannot keep the charger and the headphones in the case as both items won't fit. I don't really need that but some people may want to know.
The reason I purchased these headphones is because the reviews I read said they are comfortable, Well, they are! Buy with confidence besides, they are nicely priced and you won't have to buy new ones for a long time.

To pair a second device you have to go into the first device and disconnect it and then go back to the headphones and pair the second one.
The sound quality is bad and doesn't block out background noise. The earphones are fidgety to put on. It's difficult to know if they are on or off so you might leave them on and the battery dies. Just terrible and cheaply built.

Great sound and paired without effort! Fit is great which is important to me when exercising.
Work as expected good quality I’m happy with this senso Bluetooth
Charged and connected easlily.  Sound is great
Too big to fit around ears, fell off head.  No way to adjust to a tighter fitting.

We purchased two set of ear buds last spring.  One set stopped connecting to the iphone.  It was a breeze to receive a replacement set.  I would order from this company again based on my customer service experience.
Great product. Great company. Give them a shot, personally I'm not going to shell out the cash for jaybirds when I can get these at more than half the cost. Easy to use and sound great!
Great for gym/running

These headphones are excellent in high clarity sound and it is very convinient to set to your ear. Outstanding battery backup is a very special to this headset. but the only thing is you can't hear with very low volume other than these all futures are very nice. I strongly preferred to this haed phones with low price.
I love these headphones. They stay in through my workout with no need for constant readjusting. The volume is great. Everything I was looking for at a reasonable price

AMAZING!!! I had a pair of the wireless beats and they stopped working after only having them for 3 months and this pair hasn't given be any trouble! I use them about 5 times a week for about 2 hours at a time and I've only had to charge them ONE TIME since I bought them back in may!!
These are great, i recently bought some ear buds that have a rechargable case as replacements, but they're trash compared to these.

Decent sound, but the buttons seem backwards. As you're wearing them, the button to the rear advances the track and turns up the volume. The button towards the front turns it down and reminds... Also, for about a week, it tried to randomly connect to my coworker's phone, then stopped for no reason. Good range and good sound quality.
Great product even better customer service. So far 100% satisfied.

I received these on May 6th to give to my husband for his birthday on May 8th. He started using them a couple of days after receiving them, he said that they worked well and was happy when they were working. Just last week he asked me to get a receipt for him because they are no longer working (June 9th). I'm out of luck because I bought them on here Amazon and the window to return them was before June 5th.

Unfortunately, I have to give these one star. They should have lasted much longer!
Great sounds and easy connection. Very comfortable ears pieces.
I love my headphones. I am in the military and I do a lot of running. The headphones are light, loud and clear. Great bang for your buck.

I've had these for two months now, and since the beginning they've had Bluetooth connection issues with my devices. They randomly drop off often and I have to turn on/off, etc to be able to reconnect. Desperately seeking a reliable pair of earbuds without having to spend too much.
So far, all good. Cool technology with good sound, arrived quickly, great sale price. Now we see how durable they are!!

I bought two headsets to try for my workouts as I hated my last ones.  I failed to realize this pair doesn't have the mic to use for talking, too.  The headset is fine and seems to hold a charge for a super long time, which I appreciate!  But a bummer that I can't use for a regular headset, too.  My recommendation is keep shopping for a different option.  I'm keeping this as I've used them a few times but there are options for similar price that would give you a mic, too.  My bad for not reading the description more closely.
It's mic is not good as expected.
Blu tooth distance absolutely blows.  Basically might as well get wired headphones.
Very good product but stop charging .. i cant use it anymore :/
Pretty cool headphones. Fit great and easy to set up. The only down side is there is not a lot of bass.
Love them! They work great and seem very durable so far, also the case and double charger are awesome bonuses. Definitely worth purchasing.

Glad I purchased these. After fumbling with the apple wired earbuds for the past year while hiking I decided to research a set of BT Wireless buds. These SENSO wireless headphones had many 4 and 5 star reviews. Actually I think they had better reviews than the Major Brands which sell for $150-200. Several reviews talked about Excellent Customer Service as well as great quality. I cannot comment on Bass being good or bad since my only reference is the apple brand wired ear buds which I never felt were of great quality or fit. Not sure what ears apple was trying to fit?  I think the volume and bass in these Senso headphones are great. Sound quality is awesome. Waterproof feature seems great. I have had them for a couple weeks and I hike 5-7 miles a day and definitely give them a good sweat test. No issues. Connecting is a breeze. The "hooks" that go above your ears are so comfortable, they're soft and flexible and even with my glasses on, there is no pressure points or areas that are uncomfortable. I never even feel them.  The controls all work great. Funny, the volume up and down seem to be backwards to what I naturally would expect, but in a day was used to the setup.  I have Nike+ Apple Watch and have read it works great with it as well, but have not had the opportunity to try them connected directly to the watch since my hikes have elevation gains I want to track and the watch does not track elevation so I pair with the phone, start my music and launch NRC on the phone. The microphone works great, I have had several calls come in during a hike and have never had any connection issues, static or anything else. I have asked the first few people who called if it sounded ok and they all said perfect.  The customer service is amazing. I got an immediate response to an inquiry and two follow ups on the issue as well as follow ups from the ceo regarding the purchase and my satisfaction.  I RECOMMEND THESE TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY. I would repurchase these in the future should I need another set.  Customer Service also offered, free of charge to send spare cushions for the ear bud part. Although I have not yet received them, I have no reason to believe they are not going to show up. Very satisfied and very cost effective solution for me.

I wanted a set of wireless headphones to use with my iPod Nano but found there is connection problems of the same type mentioned by others in these reviews.  I found they have more to do with the order the devices are turned on.  If the headsets are turned on first and then the iPod I find the connection is poor - if I do it in the opposite manner the connection is fine.  Why this should be a problem doesn't make any sense to me. I wear my ipod on the brim of my hat within a couple of inches of the headphones so there should be no poor connection at all.

The head phones came in a nice box with easy to follow instructions. Therr were 3 sets of plugs, plus a foam set similar to ear plugs(guess for noise canceling/dampening).

Used them at my gym once and was very happy with the sound volume and quality. Did have some interference issues but that's most likely due to other equipment used in the gym. Couldn't go more than 10 feet before the sound cut out some. I tested them at home and could go about 30 feet before any issues.

Overall I'm very happy with them. Did not have issues with them falling out or when I got sweat on them.

Been using mine for over 3 months now, and still impressed by it. After breaking them in, I believe the sound has improved a little bit.
I use mine very heavily in the gym almost everyday with no reservations, sweat dripping on it profusely and all that--so far, it's been like a submarine. I charge it every 2 days, which does not bother me much really.

It sounds awesome, especially for the price point. Very comfortable and asking people I speak with on the phone and they say I sound good. Now I am going to see if it last, Always have an issue with other Bluetooth headphnes, down in Florida sweating is an issue. I will keep you all posted!. Not too worried though it does come with a 1-year warranty.

Theses headphones are really good,, loud HD sound and the the bass is really good. you can really feel the bass in these headphones. I use them for working out and they same in place the whole time.  Good job on these headphones

I was worry about the quality of the sound and feel due to the price, but after tried them for a couple of days, the sound is very good and they fit ergonomically in my ears, the design is cool, time will tell if they will last. But so far, i like them.
Nice sound, work well, and easy set up.  Great deal.
great sound and long lasting battery. Used these in the gym and on an airplane both times my sound was good with a good bass sound.

The product has quite the title; it is if course not accurate. The sound quality was tolerable, but the Bluetooth connectivity left a lot to be desired. Everything was okay for the price, but three months in, they stopped being able to charge. At the price you shouldn't reasonably expect much, but do not buy these if you intend for this purchase to be the last Bluetooth earbuds you ever own, because they are definitely not that.

Sometimes you buy something and you hope that it's everything it says, but you're not surprised when it's not. These headphones are everything they say they are! I bought them for the gym and, so far, so good. The sound quality is good, sweat is no longer an issue, and the volume is easy to control when they are on. They are also spot on in terms of being noise cancelling as I also used them to meditate. I still have to work on using them to make/take calls. However, that wasn't my primary reason for getting them; it's just an added bonus for me.

They are super comfortable.  Never even come close to coming out.  Pairs with my iPhone 6 and iPad Pro very easily.  Nice sound too!!  Only issue I have been having is it breaking up when playing music when phone is only in my pocket.  So that does suck.  But only when using my iPhone 6 which i can't be sure isn't the problem since it needs an upgrade.  I also just did a factory reset on headset as I read that can help.  So here's hoping tonight at the gym I have uninterrupted music since they truly are beyond comfortable

I had the same pair before, but I was not paying attention and tried to put the charger in and broke the charger port. However, this is a great product so I ordered them again. Great sound quality. Use them under my ear protectors at work and in the rain all the time.

Wow excellent bass music spectacular.....
Excellent support...

So far so good. For the price these headphones seemingly designed off the Beats by Dre PowerBeats platfoem offer surprisingly good sound, stable fit and useful features. I was pretty impressed.

Aesthetically, the unit is a bit bulky and thus not as visually refined compared to the Beats. Also the over ear stabilizing apparatus is almost too flimsy to be useful but on balance I am very satisfied thus far. Time will tell if the build quality holds up.

Very nice headphones! Great sound! Battery life last awhile. Only problem for me they won't stay in ears! So annoying. It's not the headphones iv decided it's my ears haha. Get this yal if you don't have problems with these kind staying in ears. You won't regret it. I've had them about 6m or more.
I purchased this product this past August but it just stopped working & the window for returning has expired. 2 months.
me encanta que se sostienen bien, se escucha impecable

Great for the price.
i love it but battery not good

I am extremely impressed with these headphones. The audio quality is exceptional, they are secure and comfortable to wear no matter the activity and they are user friendly to operate. I can safely say this is my go to headphone and I do intend to purchase for family members. Brilliant product!

This was my 1st purchase of wireless headphones, so I was a little skeptical as to the quality at this price! I was delightfully surprised at the quality of the sound & fit of the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones! They have great sound quality, but even more so they have great customer service! I would recommend these Bluetooth headphones to family & friends!

Regret this purhase. Does not live up to expectation. Awkward fit in ear. Bluetooth connection seems poor.
Impressive appearance and packaging.

Never worked right from the start. It charged and worked for about a month. Showed it was charged and will not turn on. sent a message and haven't heard back. Don't waste your money. Buy a good pair of wireless...these were not worth the 38.00 at all.
Great product! Plan to purchase another set soon
Great fit and sound
Long lasting battery and great sound. They do not stay on my ears very well. And of course sweating a lot doesn’t help.

I have really tried to give these a chance due to all the good reviews. I have other blue tooth devices and these are without a doubt the worst. If you don’t mind your music disconnecting and reconnecting similiar to an album skip then these are the head phones for you.

Holy moly.These earbuds are louder than ANY I have ever owned. I use them to ride a vstar with custom pipes and I can barely hear the pipes.
I give these a 5+. They are the real deal. I have never heard of the brand, but they rival, compete with, and sound as good as drs beats.
