Wireless earphones arrived quickly and are amazingly high quality. Talk about a Big Bang for your buck, these Senso earphones are!!
Really good headphones for an affordable price, easy set up, and nice fitting....good job...
Connected with phone easily. Great battery life. Comfortable.  Comes with an assortment of earbuds so you can fit the product to your ears.

I really liked hands free  listening while I was gardening good sounds no static walked all around the yard no cords I left my phone on the table. I have used these buds with my android phone and my kindle tablet highly recommended
Simple to use, work wonderfully
I am very satisfied with my headphones so far. they do everything I need them to do and more. easy to set up and use and delivery was fast!!!
I bought 2 separate kind of headphones. This set and a lesser costing pair. They are exactly the same. Sound quality is not the best. Distortion is bad at times.
Awesome quality! Great company. My headphones fit great.
What can I say. I abused these earbuds for 5 years and I bought them on sale for 15 bucks. Tell me beats or Bose can give me that much bang for my buck

Really good sound quality, good bass, just charged them finally for the first time since I purchase them after about two weeks worth of gym use. Also good connectivity, forgot my phone in my bag when I went to the bathroom and didn't lose connection from the other side of a wall. Very happy with these.
Amazing headphones. I love them. I use them daily.
Really work great.  I wear them walking, jogging and even working out in the pool.  So far no problems.
Great product...works great... initially I thought it will not have a good sound effect but, after using it for quiet sometime I really liked it and the battery backup is really good :)

These are great headphones, they do exactly what they say they will. In one example, I used them in a very noisy area to watch a video on my phone. The audio came in clear and sharp, the outside ambient noise still came in but very soft in volume. The ear hooks come in useful to securely hold the headphones, and the gel-like buds fit comfortably in the ear canal. As far as battery life, I haven't used them enough to know how long power would last, but I have never run out of power after using them again after not charging for a long time (a month or so).

This is my second pair of Senso headphones.  I love them but they seem only to last 1.5 years.  I tend to replace the a little after a year.  My first pair stopped working and my second pair lasted a little over a year and same thing won’t turn on anymore otherwise great quality if they can only last longer that 2 years
When phone was in the pocket sound constantly cut out. Was fully charged. Would not buy again.

These are my first pair of wireless headphones. I wish I would have gotten them sooner. So much better than regular headphones that need to attach to your phone or iPod. I work out every day so I need good reliable headphones. I bought these in March of this year and the headphones starting turning off on their own last week when the battery wasn’t even dead. I contacted the company and they gave me detailed instructions on how to fix the issue which I followed. A few days later the headphones turned off again while I was listening to them. Since this product comes w a one year warranty, I have another pair on their way. The company was extremely quick to respond and address the problem. This is literally the best  and quickest response I’ve ever had from a company when their product malfunctioned. The fact that they come w a one year warranty and they are inexpensive to begin with shows how much the company stands by their product. Excellent customer service!

I originally gave this a 5 star review, but almost exactly 1 year later...the right ear piece speaker sounds terrible.  For the money I guess it's ok compared to other products.  Just be prepared to buy a replacement or buy the extended warrantly.
Love it the best

I only gave four stars, because I just received the headphones, and only used them once so far. I can say during the first use that they worked great. Sound was loud and clear enough for me, and I loved not having the long wires from traditional headphones.
The headphones cut out only a handful of times, for a short short second, but this did not really bother me at all, as it was not a long buffering glitch. I was cutting the grass with my phone in a pocket.
Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase as of now.

All are good thus far testing this headset out for a few run. Sound is compatible with others I have owned.  the only thing that other me is that if I have only 1 in my ears, the other would fall on the other side. It is almost a must to have both in you ears when you use it.

Nice fit!
Very good sound!
Easy access to control buttons!
great product, great price. will recommend to my friends and family.
Bought a pair for myself, wife liked them so much that I had to order myself another pair.

I dont recomend this to anyone!!! Terrible product keep disconnecting from the phone! Also impossible to talk on the phone with it because its picking up all the noises from the background and no one can understand anything when i try to say something! The only good thing with this to listein music. It sounds very nice and clear exept when it decide to disconnect and the music will stop. Battery life if fair lest like 5 6 hrs
The ear hooks are too soft.  I bought these to wear while bicycle riding.  The motion of riding shakes the earbuds off/out of my ears - no matter how I bend the hooks.
They fell apart the fourth time I used them. I was super excited about them and then they broke.

Update: (from 4 to 2 stars)
After a couple of years since the date of purchase, the rubber on the wires that connect the earphone to the other, started peeling off until it was totally gone. What's left now are the thin wires that once were covered by the rubber. I tried taping it it all around the wires, but it wasn't pleasing to the eye so I disposed of it. It was expected and it did serve its purpose considering the price.

Great quality sound for the price. My only complaint about the product is that the silicone piece that wraps around the ear is too high and I don't see a way to adjust it. Although it is flexible, in terms of width, the height is way too high for my small ears. Good thing though the ear plugs do stick to the ears even with movements. Overall, decent headphones with good quality audio and design.
They kinda don't like to stay in ear but they work great
One minor annoyance is that the material that the cord is made out of sometimes catches on my neck and pulls at the headphones when I turn my head.  Otherwise, a fantastic product.
I liked the headphones, but I've bought two pairs so far and both have died within a year of purchase. Moving on to a different brand.

This is my 3rd set of Senso Bluetooth headphones. The first set lasted a year until I accidentally ripped off one of the ear pieces. It was an earlier version with the non-adjustable ear hooks which I liked. The mic feature never worked for that set and neither did the music control other than play/pause. I also noticed occasional skipping when my phone was in my pocket. Otherwise I was very happy with the product.

The second set I got was more or less the same. I actually DO NOT LIKE the adjustable ear hooks. I take them in and out regularly when talking to people directly and then find I have to take time to readjust them in my ear constantly as the hook doesn't seem to hold its shape very well.

I got the new model ones to see if they fixed the ear hook annoyance. It does seem a little better though it might be because they are brand new. It does seem they have fixed the skipping issue. So for the price they are great, just wish the ear hooks were even stiffer to stay as you form them better. I loved the original hooks but I understand that they wouldn't be a good fit for everyone.
Works fine so far. Seems like a good quality product. Thank you.
Good quality and easy to have two devices connected.
They mostly work as expected but there's a lot of wind noise when I'm running and into light breeze.  I can't imagine using them for cycling. I imagine they'd be fine for indoor use.

I do not reccomend these at all!
Really disappointed to have these quit working on third use, after diligently keeping them dry before charging, as other users suggested. I guess you get what you pay for!
Exactly as advertised. Love these headsets. Sound quality is amazing and great bass. However I wish they would work with my Ps4 but other then that a must have.

I'm a fault finder. I can find no fault other than they are a little bassy, and that's coming from someone that grew up putting subwoofers in every car ever purchased.
Other than that can't find any real fault. Comfortable, really are noise cancelling and seem to be on the durable side.
Battery hasn't ran out on me yet full day of landscaping.

I just received these so I will do an update once I get some time with them. Initial impression is that they have great bass for ear buds, they fit snug and have nice almost memory foam buds from the factory. (They come with extra rubber ones if you don't like the foam ones.) Also, they are LOUD. I only need to have them 3/4 of the way up at the gym, anymore and it's to much. I had the HD pump Bluetooth headphones before these. So far, these are much louder, have more bass and more comfortable. Will update as time goes.

so far i really like them, I'm not sure about the hook in the ear is way to fragile it looks like it can break any time but is kind of hard put it in, just for that i don't give 5, I love the doble connector

ok an update, it has some conection issues when you put it on takes time to pair or something, have to try few time...so sad on this

I bought these to wear for my outdoor activities and while they are performing well enough for my needs they do tend to cut out quite often and not just in specific areas. I do find them very comfortable to wear for extended periods and the battery life is sufficient as these are not top of the line ear buds but very budget friendly. Worth their cost
Blue-Tooth connection was terrible

Update: just went to charge these for the first time and the charger does not stay in. I tried another one I’ve used before, same problem. So the cost for this air is down the drain. Try the charger as soon as you get them. I didn’t and now can’t return them.
This is the 3rd set of these I have owned. The only reason I replaced them is that I lost the last 2 pairs. I need the over the ear piece because that is the only way the stay in my ears. The sound quality is excellent, but still allows me to be aware of my surroundings when I am out walking. I highly recommend these.
I bought these for my husband and so far he's really enjoying them. Thank you
To hear my music.

Now that I've used the SENSO Bluetooth Wireless Headphones for awhile, I can attest to the fact that they provide excellent sound quality! Battery life is really good. Overall, I definitely recommend these wireless headphones to my friends.
Very nice headphones sound really good and easy to use I work and I move a lot so at times the cord would move and that is a little annoying over all very good product

Great hands free device. Perfect for working out and so easy to use. Really affordable and overall best electronic accessory for any device. It'd be even more amazing with a fitted carrying case but that's a personal preference lol. Would recommend to any one looking for new headphones.

Got these this week. Here's why I love them. I've now run 10 miles with them, and I've had to touch them when I put them on and when I take them off...NOT when I'm running!!!

They're pretty hyped in the low end, but that's partially because they just do a great job of sealing off the ear. I have had 20 sets of headphones for running. These are the most comfortable so far.

As long as they don't quit working in a month, I'll call this a 5 star product, especially considering the price.

The only negative I've found so far is that the voice that tells you when your headphones are on and connected sounds like an angry astronaut sending a blotchy transmission from the moon, but it's such a minor thing I can't take away any stars. Super happy.
Great earbuds so far. Ran and trained with them.

I used to use expensive Earbuds like Dr Dre and bose all of yhem above 100$.

So after i watch alot of reviews about this product i decide to try it since its cheap price.

After two days of workout usein these Earbuds am so empressed for this price i got high end quality, amazing package, noise cancellation excellent its even much batter than the expensive Earbuds that i have, sound so loud if you want. Does not drop while u running or workout, real battery life around 8 hours this product worth every penny i paid for. Highly recommended. try it nothing to lose its just 35$
Very nice head phone. It is connects to my forerunner 645 watch and I used it for running.

I can still hear the surrounding areas but the sound is crisp. I love it that it only cost $17! I believe it was on Unbox Therapy on YouTube. Lew never lied!! Too bad that my 👂 just gets sweaty. Good product! Thanks 😘

I am sure these will work fine for many people but they would not stay in my ears no matter what I tried.  They were a bit heavy and did not fit securely so there was no way I could workout while wearing them.  I feel like my ears are pretty average size but my earlobes are detached, I am not sure if this was the issue but wanted to let others know.  The sound quality was nice but I had to give them away because it was impossible to use them without getting super frustrated
They fit my ears well and they stay still while I am running. The seller was also help with an issue several months later still within the warranty period.
Fit great and have extra buds for different fit. Battery last a long time and the quality of sound is really clear.
Receive these as a gift and These were great earbuds for the price but unfortunately only lasted about 2 months before the right earbud stopped working.
I love these! Great product. Great company to work with. Earphones exceeded my expectations. May get more for Christmas gifts.

These are legit. Range from my phone is about 30-40 yards. I walk the whole gym without them cutting out. Stay in my ears through everything. Snowboarding, running... and I used them all day snowboarding without turning them off for two days and hey still said they had 90% battery. Not sure how true that is but they didn't die! Get them! I just hope they last. Have only had them for two weeks. Time will tell
Great product and reliable service provided ! Happy to trade again.
Decent set for price
These are working GREAT for me.  Cost, service:both excellent.

I needed some Bluetooth headphones for the gym, as I kept getting all tangled with my wired headphones while exercising. I didn't want to spend a fortune on something that was going to be used during active activity, so I saw these on the top of the list and the price was definitely well within my budget. I received them and was surprised at the sound quality and especially the bass that came through in comparison to my iPhone headphones. The noise cancellation is great, as well, as I definitely have to pause my music if anyone is trying to speak to me. It's Bluetooth connection is strong, too - I can walk across the gym to pick up a weight and leave my phone at the equipment I'm using and there is no break in connection! The battery life is pretty decent, as well, but it doesn't give you much warning once they're running low. It's not joking around with you when it says "Battery Low"! Regardless, I highly recommend this product if you need something that is inexpensive but of good quality.

Do NOT pay for Beats! These work quite well. Battery lasts a very long time. Nice bass response! Good fit. My only complaint would be the mic not picking my voice up adequately in a phone call. And there is some wind noise when walking/running caused by the housing design.

OUTSTANDING customer service. They will make sure your are happy with your product!

Revised: After a year, these headphones constantly cut out. They sound good when/if they are connected.
They were super easy to pair with my fitness tracker and they are very comfortable to wear.
Fantastic little workout bluetooth headphones. Good sound quality and very comfortable. Would recommend
My son love it. Good sound and quality.
I don't have anything to compare these to, but they are wonderful for listening to music. I've bought 4 of these over the years and gave them gifts and they were loved by the receivers.
My headphones came fast. Awesome case. Great sound, great range. My dog walks have become a lot more enjoyable listening to music while we walk. Love them.
Great headphones ...  I use them to listen to music and talk on the phone.  I take conference calls for work on these headsets -- the quality is great -- clear --  Just perfect.  Thank you.

Aloha this is my second Bluetooth headphone, this by far is superior. I am totally pleased with the quality very well made. I appreciate Ken the owner for standing by is proud.
Mahalo nui loa
Robert Kuya Alamodin
good product . i like it

Update: this is my second pair. Using with iPhoneX now. My first pair just stopped working. I thought it was a fluke because I left it plugged in to charge for a long stretch of time. This pair also just stopped working out of the blue. Won’t charge or turn on.

Former review: Works great aside from very occasional interruptions in sound. Used with iPhone 6s. Sometimes when turning it on it wouldn't run sound through the headphones automatically. I'd have to go to Bluetooth settings, disconnect and reconnect.

I use these headphones while running and although I just started using them, so far they work well. I have some trouble keeping the ear buds fixed in my ears during long runs but that has been a problem with every headphone set I've used without rigid support bridging between each ear bud. The sound is good and the design should prevent sweat and moisture from shorting out the speakers.

I bought these after I got my new iPhone7 so I can listen to music at the gym.  They fit well since they wrap around the outside of the ears and come with 3 sizes of ear bud casings.  You just need to figure out which size works best for you.  They stay in place very well while exercising.  I would have given it 5 stars, but the only issue I have is that sometimes the button that turns on / activates everything seems a little finicky.  After turning them on, sometimes they say they're connected, but they get no sound.  I'll have to turn them on and off a couple of times to get them connected to the device.  The sound quality seems good, although I don't have any basis of comparison since this is my first set of wireless headphones.  But I would recommend these for anyone looking for a well-fitting set of wireless headphones.  They do block out almost all of the outside noise.

The package arrived within one day as promised and the headphones comes with so many extras, chargers, case, various charging cables and so much more.  The sound is amazing and is as good as other high price headphones. the headphones don't fall out and are sound canceling.  I absolutely love these headphones and the price was great.  high quality product and excellent vendor.  I highly recommend this vendor and headphones.

Very comfortable to wear, excellent sound quality! I like the additional accessories and the neat box :) Most importantly, the customer service is superb! I had a problem in one of the buds so I wrote them via the amazon email and they sent me a completely new set within a few days! Would definitely recommend to a friend.
Work VERY well. I do a lot of bar work and am upside down a lot for handstands and these suckers work fine.
Can't keep them in my ears even after changing the buds and the floppy ear pieces aren't much help keeping them secure in dynamic situations
Great

I thought there was a catch when I saw it was going for $25 but normally over $100.
At first I was impressed by the sound quality, but then I found that if you moved the right earbud at all while music was playing, the music would skip. Left bud was fine.
Really disappointed and not likely to buy this brand again. Better to stick with pricier buds that are more reliable.
Remember: if it seems too good to be true, it is.
I just received these and tried them out during my workout.  These things are great, stayed in place and the sound is very good.  Easy to set up via bluetooth, great product.

I have been looking at wireless headphones for awhile, but I didn't want to spend top money on a pair in case they didn't fit my small ears well or they didn't have the quality of sound output I was hoping for. These have worked out great, especially for the price and I have been recommending them to family and friends.
This is a great headphone at a great price! Very impressed with the sound quality and durability for a fraction of the cost. Great buy!

First pair of wireless earbuds. I am mainly using them to Bluetooth to my TV while working out. I am impressed with all the extra wires and chargers that Senso gives. The sound seems very clear. A decent balance between bass and treble.
I called into Senso tech support because the lowest volume was too loud for me (pairing to my IPhone). The tech support was very helpful and did a factory reset. That seemed to work. He also suggested an app (equalizer) to help.
Overall seems like a really good purchase for under $30. My only complaint was I wish the ear gels were a little more comfortable (they are kind of thin). I did workout with them and they stayed in and connected the whole time. I would recommend them.
I have had no issues with linking these up to multiple phones and ipads. I have it synced to my fitbit as well. No issues. Sound is great and they stay on.
Best bluetooth headphones!! I recently had Zipbuds,  pretty good but these Senso bluetooth headphones are much better. More bass in these headphones than the Zipbuds.

Well worth the money !  I bought these to replace of plantronic cordless Bluetooth headphones my dog ate.  This set was MUCH less expensive and in my opinion much better. The fit is much better. They feel good in the ears and don't feel like they are going to fall out and I love the case they come in. These are definitely worth the price.  They arrived quickly and in great shape.

Got a pair for myself and my boyfriend. The sound is really good. So happy when it came with three ear insert sizes and a foam ear insert. The carrying case is sturdy. Be careful if you get this since putting the headphones in the carrying case sometimes accidentally push the power button so the headset turns on when you may not even mean for it to. The volume works really well also.
Great for the price very comfortable and sound is very good.
Wonderful - I have a problem with running with normal earphones, because they fall off - these don't and have great sound quality
Sound good till used outdoors . A lot of wind noise is created by the portion that is not in the ear .

This is all opinion, but I seen the reviews before I purchased it. I think the company makes a well and affordable product. However based on my experiences sound quality takes a hit. The base from a song sounded a bit muffled, couldn't hear lyrics to clear and the button logo area felt bulky.  As I mentioned, its.great idea and affordable. Anyone should enjoy the product if you don't care about "DJ quality" sounding headphones.

I don't remember what the advertising blutooth range was for these headphones but unless my phone is in my pocket, they don't work. I would say max distance is 5 feet if there are no walls or windows in between. I am also still struggling to get them to fit my ears properly. So far, they're more trouble than they're worth but a) they hold a charge for a long time and b) they sound good when they're on, so 2 stars.

Update: I use these only when I mow the lawn. It's been a year, I use them once a week when for 3 hours at a time. They have a terrible short circuit happening in the wire, so badly that I can't hear anything if I turn my head to the right. Not a great product.
These are really nice headphones for the price.
These are great! Work really well, sound quality is great, and it’s easy to set up! Instructions it comes with are crystal clear! I definitely recommend this to all my friends now.

Sound quality is excellent.
Noise cancelling works and earbuds fit very well.
Wearing them is like being in your own world.
The only issue with that is possible safety - if you want to make calls or listen and still be aware of your surroundings then a single ear bluetooth would be a better choice.
I like these headphones, seem to have a good range, I've never been disconnected.  Stay in well while exercising.

I bought these headphones because I thought the wireless capability would help with listening during my workouts, but these really just ended up being more annoying as the headphones slowly slide out of my ear no matter the size of the earbuds used.
I am very happy with my headphones. Very comfortable and great sound.

I really liked these at first, very comfortable and fit well. But soon the charge went from lasting all day to only a few hours and now the blue light will indicate that they're charged but they immediately die. So, I've had them less than a month and they're already useless.
The sound quality and bass is awesome. Great at noise canceling. They fit comfortably with my glasses. The best part I don't have to keep readjusting them while I'm walking.
Good product for the price!

Battery life is okay.. could be longer. My biggest problem is getting it to play music from my iPhone (which is supposed to be the whole point of these earbuds) . There’s many times where I’m pressing buttons for 5-10mins trying to get the music to play through the earbuds rather than the phone itself, even while it says “paired-connected” on my phone
Great product. Extremely comfortable, sound is terrific, they have not lost connection in over 2 hours of use while walking.

I love my headphones. I had a problem when one ear began cutting in and out. When I informed Tekatron know of my issue, they immediately responded and walked me through a manufacturer reset. Unfortunately that did not fix the problem. They immediately sent me a replacement set. All of this transpired within a 24 hour period.

These are the most comfortable earbuds I have ever seen. They're so lightweight you almost forget they are in your ears until someone trys to talk to you.Which brings me to the sound which is just amazing for their size. They produce dynamic tones through the whole spectrum. Truly an Amazon best buy.
Extremely easy to set up and use sound quality is adequate for the price point

Foam earpieces seem far better then any other form if you don't mind them being a bit dirty. Sound quality is not as good as others -even very cheap pairs- but so far durability has been great, and having controls on the earpiece is far better then in line for balance on your neck.

I put 4 outta 5 only because evend though I am happy with this product and currently enjoying at this moment when I opened the box the only thing missing was the wire tie listed on the box. Now this doesn't effect the device it's self just wanted to make it aware incase other boxes were missing different items.

They're comfortable..have great range and don't come loose when you sweat. I've got them paired to my iPhone 7 plus and they're great. I gave them a 4 because they do drop connection sparingly but are good mostly...sound is a tad bass heavy also, but otherwise awesome

Best in ear headphones,  ive purchased alot of them,  these by far are the best! I thought about the beats by dre,  no need,  these do the job just fine! I will by another pair,  long lasting battery,  great sound.
I am more than impressed with these headphones. 30 dollars?!? Really that's it?? I'm very glad with the purchase they sound better than I thought they would for that price and wireless.
Amazed by the quality , I like the adjustability of the ear pieces and fitment.
Super super by excellent headphones great battery life great sound will recommend to everyone the price you can not be I promise these will Be just as good if not better then a very expensive pair
I really enjoy these. Very nice.
At this price, cant go wrong......i feel the high frequencies are a bit muffled, they are good enough
what a piece of junk! went off within few months of light use! doesn't boot-up anymore though I made sure it is charged

Took my ActivBuds S-250 to the Rec-center today. I liked them very much, Excellent HD sound, Comfort, fit, function, really great,
These are the real deal, Everything you need, Extra Eartips, wire tie, car charger, charging cables, right down to the carry case could not
have been much better at such a wonderful price point.

The sound quality is very good on these especially depending on how far you get them into the ear. The microphone on these is absolutely terrible and does not work at all. For example, taking a phone call will require to remove the buds in order to talk. Otherwise, the style is good and charging is fast. Just wish I had full use. I tried to contact the seller back in July and no response.

I used the headphones for 2 months after going trough 3 pairs of MPOW headphones and yet again I run into another brand that has a great price but if you use them daily don't last. At least these didn't melt.

These are great headphones! The fit took a few seconds to get used to but the sound quality is really good. Easy to install and they were playing music within seconds. And it comes with some additional goodies I was not expecting.

I've been using these for a couple of weeks now and they CONSTANTLY cut out.  Sometimes they are fine if I turn them off and on a couple of times, but finally decided today I can't take it anymore and will send them back.  Based on reviews I might try them again one more time, maybe I just got a bad set.

I bought these to connect to my laptop because it's SO aggravating to deal with my corded ear buds while moving around. They are very well made, the sound quality was excellent BUT they keep disconnecting from my laptop. I tried connecting them to my phone to use while I work out and I'm having the same issue. No matter how good the sound quality, if they won't stay connected, they are useless to me. I will probably give these away as I ended up buying a pair of wireless earbuds from
I found them easy to pair with my iPhone and were fantastic at the gym!

For this price, these are probably the best earbuds that you can buy. It's even better than some earbuds that I bought at a $40 price. The sound quality is very good, especially at this low price. What makes these stand out is the quality of design. The over-ear rubber doesn't just flap about uselessly and it's not too hard. You can literally bend them to the shape of your ear or however you want them to be shaped. I've bought several other brands of earbuds, and none of them deliver on the build quality that these have, especially the fit on my ear.

After buying 2 lemmons, tried the Senso headphones and they are good. Easy to setup and had no problems with my iPhone and iPad.
They come in a nice package with the accessories posted. I’ve used them in the gym, in noisy places (restaurants), and on FaceTime calls without issues.
Their only flaw is the bass.
If you lusten to rock music like I do they do the job, but I listened to bass heavy tunes and the lower frequencies sounded distorted. I was able to get around this with the EQ settings in Spotify so it wasn’t a big deal to me.
Again, high end Bosse will sound better, but I’m comfortable with this purchase.

I love the product, so much so that when I lost the first set I bought another one.  I used them mainly in the gym and I don't hear the music they play throughout the facility.  The sound is very clear, and when I talk to my husband while wearing them, he hears me quite clearly, and I'm a soft spoken person.
I've been using these for my nightly jog through the neighborhood and they work great!
So far the  great quality nice  sound and I love all the extras
I have used the headphones for a week and I am very happy with them so far. Sound quality is very good. The fit is great for working out.
I am not sure if the product is of cheap quality or the one delivered to me was a defective piece. It broke on the first day with the normal use.

My earbuds stopped working unfortunately. When I called customer care for support, without even asking any question, they offered me a free replacement!
Overall great sound quality and durability
I've been using it for 2 months and it works so good, charge very fast  and the battery really do as 7 to 8 hours also!

I'm very happy with this product. The sound is fantastic. The packaging was really well put together. I was happy to find a carry case and a car charger too, which I didn't expect. I've already recommended this product. Definitely a good buy for the money.

They did what I wanted them to do, which was to listen to audible books. I like them so much when my dog chewed off the ear buds, I bought another set. Pairing was also very easy once I read the directions.
One of the best purchases on Amazon in quite a while. I was not expecting such good quality for such a low price. A true gem.

Good value for the money. Battery lasts many hours between charges, and charging completes quickly. Many other included items, so I'm not sure how they're selling these headphones at this price...but, glad they are!  This is my first set of Bluetooth headphones (as I normally prefer wired sound quality), but I am very happy with my purchase, so far, and did not have unrealistic expectations about audio fidelity.  Some may find the overall size of these to be too big, especially if you wear a beanie or other hat that goes over the ears, but I have not had a problem with them, yet.
Sound cuts out constantly
Decent sound quality, but they stay in.

I own several pair of bluetooth headphones, and I was looking to expand my workout gear by adding wireless earbuds to the collection. I'm glad I picked this brand. They fit very comfortably in my ears, and they stayed put through a 4 mile run. The buttons are very easy to use, and the volume is nice. Now they don't have the most clear sound, but they get the job done for me, as far as working out comfortably is concerned. If I want concert sound, I have headphones for that.
So far so good.  Good sound and mic as well.  I am pleased with these!
Stopped working after two months of light use...
I love these headphones!  They work very well.and are easy to set up.  They come with multiple ear buds along with a car charger. The clarity is great and work amazingly at the gym!

Bluetooth connection for these earbuds is terrible.  I kept losing my connection – once when my iPhone was under me.  I realize that these are cheap, but don’t waste your money – you buy cheap, you get CHEAP.

Not bad earbuds for the price that I paid ($30). They do have good sound but sometimes the bass gets a little muddled. As in when listening to rap or dubstep or EDM or anything with deep bass, the earbuds kinda muddle the bass to where the rest of the sound isn't that clear. But what I can't figure why this only happens sometimes. Sometimes I use them and the bass is fine, no muddling at all, it sounds perfectly clear. So they aren't super consistent in that regard, but everything else such as acoustic music or music that emphasizes vocals like Sia's Chandelier they work perfectly. Battery life is pretty decent, i get about 8-10 hours most of the time. And for those curious people I'm using them with an iPhone 6s Plus. As far as exercise they are very secure as in they don't fall out, and previously i've just been using apple earpods. So I do like them alot but would they be worth the MSRP of $180? Absolutely not. Worth $30? Yeah I think so, although I would not have paid more than $40 for them. Overall not bad, just the inconsistent bass bugs me, but other than that no problems.
Headphones are great! My only complaint is the ear clamps should be a little firmer.

I had been in the market for a new set of Bluetooth headphones for quite awhile, and finally, after reading all of the reviews, decided to pull the string and order the SENSO headphones.  There was a delay in receiving the delivery...no fault of SENSO, but the customer service team helped identify problem & provide direction as to how to remedy the situation.  I received my delivery the next business day.  The quality of the product, carrying case and ancillary supply was far better than I expected.  The set-up/pairing of the headphones to my girlfriends iPhone was very simple.  The sound quality, intuitive design and comfort has for an initially positive buying experience.  I like them so much, I plan on purchasing a second set for myself!

Honestly, this piece is amazing and very high quality, i had the beats wireless and my son lost it so i start looking for another one but cheaper than beats and i just got the senso today 10.04.16 and it is better than beats in my opinion.
If it is still available get it because it's great for work and gym. And i used it for both today.

These are amazing! My husband ordered us each a pair of these. They are an amazing price for the quality. You feel like you're wearing one of those super fancy brands. They come with a cute case and lots of different choices for ear bud size, so you can pick the one that works for you. We have already recommended this to our family and they love theirs as well.
Was a gift and so far good reviews. Not as nice as beats but for the price it's a good buy.
Great headphones!

Sound is horrible. Nothing like the description. Bass distorts the music.
Not good at all
I use the earbuds when I do yard work.  No problems with them and nice to not have to worry about wires anymore.

I have purchased these for my husband and my father. They both rave about how loud, comfortable and long lasting they are, and they both wear them to run and mow grass.  My stepmother bought a pair for herself after trying them, and I’m just waiting for price to go back down to get them for myself. I just wish they care in different colors.

These headphones are a good value but if you are looking for high end sound quality I would not recommend them.  They do deliver good loud sound and the quality of the materials seems good for the money but there is distortion when the volume is high and even at lower volume levels the sound is just muddled.  I'm no sound engineer but I am a musician and if I play the same song through my air pods they blow these headphones away. Obviously there is a $125 difference in price so that has to be factored in.
They work great! It's nice to be cord free!
The sound is great! But the part that goes over your ear is too flimsy. It keeps falling of the ear. Otherwise, I would give five stars.

I recently purchased this product, i am really disappointed about this product. When i connected this to Samsung 8, while using the headphones suddenly it's disconnecting and some noise is coming when i was using this phones. I am going to return this product and ask for refund.. I don't recommend this product to anyone and not worth for money!!..
Awesome buy
These Senso headphones are poor quality. They quilt working after 6 weeks of gentle use.
Fantastic earbuds at a super low price!

I'm sorry to say these only worked for a couple of months, and then stopped taking a charge.  I used them perhaps a dozen times.  I kept them in their case, and charged them after every use, but then they quit on me in the middle of a song, and no longer work at all.
great buy don't miss this one

bought this for my 14 year old son and he absolutely loves it, he uses it for running at school.  It's also water proof and he goes in the pool with it, he just wanted to see if it was really water proof and it sure is

I've had these for almost 2 years now.  They honestly are worth every penny.  I use them mon-fri, 8hrs a day behind a grinder sharpening knives all day.  Even with the dirty atmosphere and metal shavings they work great.  Even if they only last 6 months I would buy them every 6 months.  Just reliable as heck.  Simple 3 buttons. on off.  volume up down. and change songs. If I had to complain it would be make the battery last a little bit longer. But like I said almost 2 years and they still last about 7hrs.  Can't beat the value. TRY THEM!

These are replacements for an identical-looking set I purchased a number of years ago. The sound quality is excellent and the base is true. They are very comfortable to wear in the gym and I find that they are far better sound quality than any of the non wired earbuds."

I lost my headphones unfortunately. I used to use it at gym. In office, if I put sound at (what's equivalent to) 7 - everyone around me would hear the noise. It is light, battery stays long and it looks good.

Bought these on eBay and they are the best earbuds I've ever used.

I used to have an old pair of wired Beats earbuds, and the conventional wired beats, plus I currently own a pair of bluetooth iLive headphones and these Senso earbuds work better than them all.

Be careful not to turn the volume up all the way for an extended period of time because it'll probably cause damage since these earbuds are VERY loud.
GREAT HEADPHONES!  I've had a few, but for the money these are by far THE BEST!
Sounds ok, none of the earbuds fit except the nerf type.

For their price these Bluetooth earbuds are hard to beat. No, they don't sound like high end earbuds, they don't have some sexy charging case, but what you get is a decent headphone that performs accetablely and is a great compainion for the gym. I would recommend these to anyone that needs a good pair of beater ear buds to use at the gym with no regrets!
Crazy good deal for the money.  Bought ear buds that cost twice as much that crapped out in about 2 months and didn't sound as good as these.  had these for about 6 months now and still going strong!

I purchased these to replace a pair that I have that are still working, but they hurt my ears after a while.  I was worried that they would not have enough noise reduction if I didn't shove them in my ear canal like I had to do with my old ones.  Surprisingly, you don't have to do that, and the ear clip is nice to keep them comfortably on your ear.  The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the blue light blinks regularly while the headphones are turned on and that is a bit annoying.  I also really like the cord that has the dual iPhone 6 and beyond port as well as the charging port all in one.  I've only been using these for about 1 week and am really liking them.

Comfortable, but even the smallest set do not fit in my ears, just my ears, not the fault of the phones...the generic wired iphone earpods do though???....they stay in place well,, I just don't get the best audio.  They come with a charging cord for your ipod/iphone and a zippered case both which improve the satisfaction of this purchase.  I love the charging cord and the case.  The earphones are reliable and easy to use, and I have run them for three-fours  hours or so, they haven't run down yet.  I wish there were some way of telling how much charge is left.  The company is very responsive.  I had an issue with the first set, company refunded the purchase and I bought another set.  I would buy these again.
The headphones work at a good distance from my phone and are comfortable to wear.
I used the headphones to run, they did okay but one of them kept twisting inside of my ear, kinda annoying but could just be a personal problem.
Great sound, quick connecting blue tooth, comfortable !  I like them
Very good so far.  Only had it two days.
Couldn't ask for more for the cost. Great value!
I love the sound. Battery is great!

I had only one issue after about two weeks of use. My cell suddenly wouldn't connect or recognize the headset. I was bummed and tried and retried every which way that the little instruction manual was suggesting. Message kept saying 'Connection failed".
But I finally just deleted the "Active Buds" from my bluetooth device list, and it reappeared with a reset.
So happy again. Issue hasn't happened again. But if it does, I'll know what to do.
Just simply a great bluetooth headset. Especially for the price!

These are the worst headphones I have ever owned. I bought them to use it when I ride my bike. The Bluetooth connection constantly goes in and out and they're unusable. I have tried rebooting the headphones by telephone, and the connection to no avail. They appear to be a quality product but they simply do not work the Bluetooth connection is awful. This is a brand new top-of-the-line phone and it connects to everything that I've ever tried to connect you via Bluetooth without a problem. I'm returning them. Can anybody recommend good Bluetooth headphones reasonably priced that I can use on my bicycle?
Did not work as well while swimming but they work well for anything else

Have been using my SENSO headphones now for about a week and I really like them so far.
I gave up on wireless headphones last year when I went through 3 pairs of Motorola headphones the would stop working after my first or second use at the gym... so I'm glad to have found these SENSO Bluetooth headphones and am very satisfied so far.
Sound quality is very good, there are buttons for every function I need. I'm very happy with this product.
These ear buds are awesome theyou connect to my phone with no issues real easy to understand and use an very comfortable and there soft thank you
Got it on time. Used it 20+ time. Not as good as wired version but it does not get in my way while lifting weights or running.Much better then the other junks at the same price.
Works pretty good for the price. Signal gets intermittent when windy. Good quality.

Extremely impressed with the sound quality in the price that I paid for this product not only do I work with headphones but I also work out with them and this is a perfect products or both and has a nice Sleek smooth and small design as well as offers premium sound quality and amazing price I couldn't Rave about it more I am completely satisfied with my purchase and the amount paid I feel like I got a steal of a deal thank you SENSO for providing such an amazing product
working great so fare

Love these. I've had them for over a year and they're still going strong. They put out pretty good sound quality for a low price. Perfect for using at the gym. Easily could get a 5+ hour battery life from one charge. Definitely hold on to the spare ear prices, they get kinda gross after awhile.

This is a great product and perfect for my workouts. However, more than that, Senso's costumer service has proven to be particularly exceptional and I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family.
Really good product
So far I love my headphones! Set up and controls are easy; sound great. Has some nice bass tones. Hope they work well for a long time. I feel like I found a bargain.
Very good headphones and nice price.

I have small ear canals. Finally a pair of headphones, bluetooth, that stay in my ears.
The fact that they are waterproof means I can use them while bike riding. They don't completely block outside noise. Some would consider that a drawback, but it's not safe when biking.

I just tried it on a long run, and it worked very well.  No glitches.  It stayed in my ears which is something I was concerned about.  The sound quality was excellent.  The ear hooks are comfortable.  They're soft, so I worry a little about the durability.  We'll see.  So far, so good.
Comfortable and great sound.
Clear sound and secure fit

Maybe it's me and if your like me none of the buds truly fit. They tend to slip out and you'll need to keep your head still to keep em in. Forget about cardio exercises. These will fall out in 2 min flat. Either the sweat causes the slipage or the rubber and buds dont seal well.

Maybe try using foam tips on these for good seal and better sound.

However the sound is great. Nice and loud.

And the battery can last you days which is sweet because I forget to charge them a lot. Beware the annoying female voice when the battery is low. She'll tick you off before shutting off.

It's waterproof and I can vouch for it since I've carried them through days of sweat and rain storms.

Good deal but beware they might not fit or stay on that well.
Excellent value for dollar. Very comfortable
Works great

Below I have pasted the email I sent in reply to Invotek, regarding the Senso wireless Bluetooth headphones I purchased-

"Wow!

Thanks for checking on me! :)

So far, the Senso headset has exceeded my expectations!
I truly am, super happy with them.
The sound quality is great and the fit....

set-up I've had.
