Thanks again for the email.
You give the impression of being a top shelf company!

Rebecca

I will add for this review, that the phone call capability is also remarkable.
People I'm talking to can hear me perfectly and the answer/hang up function is easy to use.
I am seriously happy that I bought these!!!!

I've had it for about 3 months. I've liked it so far. The pieces that hook onto your ears are a little stiff but it works fine. I wear glasses and they don't interfere with my glasses. The sound is fine. No problems, yet.

My only major problem with these is with, of all things, aerodynamics. The sound quality is fine and the battery life is great, but if I do anything where wind is blowing toward me, from walking on a windy day to riding my bike, generating my own "wind", the air blows around the earpieces in a way that mostly drowns out what I'm trying to listen to.
Received a broken product
I have several Headphones and these Senso sound like others that cost over US 100. Also great customer service!
More than I expected for the price.  Great sound and fit, even with sunglasses.  Secure with no movement during my trail runs.  Great product.
I have trouble getting the headphones to stay connected to my phone.
Very good for the price ! I like how you can bend the ear loops to really fit your ear .
Excellent product, easy pairing and good sound quality you got your money's worth.
These are hands down the best earbuds I’ve ever owned. The BASS is Astounding !!!!
The sound with music is good but voice is hard to hear.  The batteries do not last nearly as long as advertised.  Overall not overly impressed with this product.

The sound is amazing on these headphones!! I'm am 100% surprised and happy with the quality of these headphones for such a low price. I did get the 3 year warranty just in case but I'm already in love with the headphones!
To many wires

the sound is superb for the money and the small box is full of goodies, that make really happy :D

you get more stuff for the money.

:D
Great sound quality but really easily affected by wind; earbuds stay in place well

Easy to get hooked up to Bluetooth, the instructions were very good. The ONLY negative thing I find about them is that the earbuds don't fit real well in my ears. I am an average female, and changed to the smallest buds, but the fit is not great. The angle that they fit in isn't quite right for my ears. The sound is awesome when I press the earbuds in really well with the palm of my hand, but that's not a real comfortable way to go about my business.

I like the packaging, the charger is equipped for android & iphone. I dont care for the design of the headphones the string could be more adjustable also the headphone part that goes over the ear is very flimsy. The sound quality of the headphone is loud but doesnt drown out noise all the way.
Excellent sound and easy to pair and use the buttons. I was surprised at the quality of the sound. Ligth and soft in your ears.

Just got these yesterday. Syncing them was easy. Very comfortable and great sound. So far I'm very pleased. Now I'll see how they do when I work out.
Update: I never got to wear them while working out because I guess my husband liked them too and he stole them.
pretty good.
Great bluetooth headphones. I would buy these again.
Awesome product. Four types of ear pieces to ensure fit.
these are very comfortable headphones.  I usually find earbud type headphones quite awkward but have no problems with these at all.  Also the sound quality is very good.

I ordered these to use this summer because my $150 over the ear Bluetooth headphones can get to hot. I thought I was trading sound quality for comfort but I was shocked at how great these sound. They actually sound better than my other headphones. Plus there are lots of extras in the box. A nice carrying case, charger, etc. I am going to get another pair to use when I am exercising. I highly recommend these because they are well worth the money.

Sound quality met my expectations,  but the fit was very loose and lacked sufficient structure over the ears. The cord between the two ear pieces is especially long with no way provided to rein it in, so I used a twist tie.
Does not work well with my new Dell laptop.  Works okay with the iPhone 6 though.
I use them for the gym, I love how they stay in place and are not bulky.
So far I am please with my purchase, that I ordered another for my wife.  To my surprise, the headphones are extremely light and comfortable to wear.

I have ordered two senso Bluetooth headphones two my family members .. out of two one is not working as expected right ear was completely not auditable I have raised a concern about this but no response .. product I liked it . But only concern is one headphone is not working ..

Do not like the fit - keeps falling off.
Audio is good.

I would not recommend.

Great Bluetooth headphones for the price. Good noise cancellation especially with music on. Controls are very intuitive and easy to use. Charges fast and lasts.
Accessories provided are great and definite bonus.
Talk about quality. These headphones can survive. Accidentally put them through the wash. Work just fine still. Great product
Better put on the phone on the right side to keep a better connection

I'm reviewing these headphones in regards to 2 things:
1) sound quality: I am by no means an audiophile, but the music quality on these are a 3/10. It is not just a little bad, it s VERY noticeable bad quality.
2) Comfort for working out: The buttons to go next, pause, raise volume up and down and the fact you can talk without the phone in hand is very nice. When lifting weights it works fine, but when it comes to any form of high intensity movement such as jumping or running, the headphones become very loose. The strap that goes around the ear does not do a good job of serving it's purpose. I will be buying a new different set of headphones.

Very happy with the product, it manages to stay secure while doing high interval Fitness training. Great sound quality and easy to use. My only issue is the charging port, the part that closes up the charging port feels very tight and hard to maneuver out of the way to plug the charger in.  The part feels like it is going to break off. But again overall very happy with the product.  I would definitely recommend this product for anybody who's looking for a good Bluetooth headset at a very affordable price.

The sound is very good and the battery life long.

The customer service was outstanding. They took care of a problem I had very easily and quickly.

So far so good. Great sound. Fits well. I do wish that I could call specific phone numbers via voice command, bit that is something I can live with.  If there is a way and someone knows how let me know.
Excellent quality, easy charging.  Get 2 pair if you are a constant listener so one can be in use while the other is charging.

Not much of a difference in look or feel from the Beats by Dre.  Comfortable and fit well with plenty of different ear bud fittings.  Great product, and would make the purchase for yourself or kids who want Bluetooth earbuds.
Exactly what I was hoping for.  Well packaged with clear instructions.  Paired easily with the smart tv that we wanted the headphones for.
Very good product for the price. They might not  be the same quality as bose or beats,  But they are definitely the best bang for your buck.

For the price it's pretty good. However, what I absolutely hate about it is that when the device needs to tell you something, it does so at maximum volume. For example, you are in the middle of a call and *BATTER LOW* interrupts at 5 times the volume of the call, its enough to make me jump sometimes. It then continues to do that every 30 seconds until you plug it in, rendering the earbuds useless for the rest of the charge. Also, if you are using the volume buttons on the headphones, and you get to the top or bottom of the volume range, it lets you know by delivering a shrill, piercing beep directly into your inner ear. It's extremely unpleasant, to the point that I am reluctant to use those controls at all.

The sound is ok, bass is punchy as mentioned by some other posters, and I like that, but it's nothing special. Call quality is pretty good if you are planning on using these to talk to people often.

First off, these are the best Bluetooth headphones that I've ever owned. They are superlight and comfortable on my ears and great when I wear them on my long cardio workouts. The pairing with my smartphone was a snap and my phone easily recognized and paired with the Senso headphones. I've owned several brands of headphones in the past and none paired as easily as the Senso did. The controls are laid out nicely and the sound is excellent. This company cares a lot about their product and their customers and you can tell not only by the superior quality of the headsets, but the packaging and extras in the box are topnotch. They include a nice large case for the headphones, a pretty cool cable that is dual use to charge your headphones or iPhone. It is a nice touch. You know you're getting a high quality product when the cardboard box is thick and opens easily. When a company takes the time to design packaging that delivers their precious cargo, then you've got a great set of headphones in your hands. I'll definitely will be buying another pair.
wont turn on or charge 4 months in
El producto ya no me funciona. No se que paso. Tiene la luz que dice que esta cargado pero no logro encenderlo

First off, the good - the sound is very good.  Now the bad - the ear plugs point downward, don't know anyone who has ear canals that point directly down; no matter which extra covering I try the ear bud does not like to stay in, and the very floppy ear holders just are too floppy.  I had wanted a set to wear when I work on my farm, in the rain, snow, sun, etc., these just won't be those.

Worked well for 3 months and now it doesn't work. it turns on and stays on for about 15 seconds and turns off. same thing happened to my last wireless earbuds (not this one). just bought airpods and those should be good for a while.
They work great! Don't have to worry about the wire from my Ipod to my headphones.

These are some great headphones in my most humble opinion, they feel great in my ear, they fit snog around my ear, the sound is great and clear and is even better that i can change the sound with the equalizer on my music app. I can't wait to see how they hold up while in the gym. I am happy with this purchase.
So far great!
These worked for 5 visits to the gym.  Then they no longer would connect. I returned them.  You get what you pay for. I'm planning on getting Beats that will last more than 2 weeks.
Sounded ok, but the constant drop out of the signal was terrible

This thing, suck's it worked perfectly until it came...it said low battery so I go to put it on the charger it, said in the instruction's the light should turn on if it's charging but that didn't happen.... and I left it for 2 hour's and took it off the charger and it still didn't work.
I just started using these and I love them.
Price is great but on a long run I noticed I'm adjusting them in my ear quite a bit...can get annoying.

These are OK headphones and would probably sound good if the left side had bass. The left side has been defective since day one. The right side is about twice as loud as the left and actually has bass.

Works great, nice case but everything does not fit in it. After first recharge will not pair to device. Contacted customer support and they schooled me on how to resolve the issue. Works great again. Thanks.

I have used these for 2 weeks and so far I am pleased. Great sound and ENOUGH VOLUME! I hate getting a new set of earbuds, trying them out, turn them up and they just aren't loud enough. I am mixed on the soft silicone earpieces, I would like for them to be firmer. Of course time will tell.  I think there are many versions of this same headset out there. I had a set very similar to these that only lasted 3 1/2 months, just past the return expiration. We will see how these hold up.

As the headline says the second headset (bought it in December) failed in about 3 months. I also did not like the over the ear hangers of the second set. The material is softer (comparing to the first one) and wasn't holding its shape.
well built, long lasting battery

The echo on the other end of a call made me return it.  Noise canceling worked as advertised.  Music sounded great, so if you want to use this product for listening and not talking on the phone, it's a great deal.

no need to spend the extra $$$$ just to get a "b" on them unless you have money to blow!
I just gave the earbuds to my son for his 14th birthday yesterday and he is THRILLED with them! Every time he puts them in his ears he says, "WOW...I didn't know they did that!" Lots of cool accessories came with the earbuds too! Great buy!!

These worked semi-okay for several months. There were a few instances when it would not pair with my phone (even though I had it saved). I am mostly disappointed in the fact that I barely had these 6 months before they went out on me. They have a full charge but are unable to turn on, even after I restored them to factory settings. They will not respond unless plugged in to charge. Don't buy unless you want to spend $30 again in 6 months for a new pair.
Very good sound.

I never write reviews but I had to for these. I've spent over $200 for headphones that don't sound even close. I like all the nice little perks but sound is my main goal for headphones (go figure). I literally have them on right now and I've gone through all my Spotify genres from heavy metal to techno.  Classical to ambient and everything. These things are blowing my mind. When I first put them on I thought they sucked. THIS IS KEY-- SET YOUR EQ TO THE DESIRED SOUND!!!!!!!  If you have the wrong eq on your device they won't sound good at all!  Eq it to your taste and you will not be sorry. And for the price???? I mean come on.

just got these in the mail and used them at the gym. overall Im very satisfied with them. great fit in the ear good sound and they are not in my way when i do squats. the piece that fits around you ear seems to be a bit flimsy but i have only wore them once so i do not know if they will hold up over continued use.
it comes in a very nice carring case.  I really like the 3' charge cord with the dual function.  thats a very neat idea.  it works great and I am very glad to have it.
Very good headphones. Running or working out, these didn't move at all. Stayed in place very well.
The sound was great but it stopped charging after two weeks.
These headphones are inexpensive but very good quality. I have used them for a week and already love them. They don't fall out of my ear and have amazing sound. I would recommend them to anyone!
Kept falling out of my ears, had trouble making a call

great product with amazing sound. I was on the fence on whether or not to get more expensive headphones, but I decided to try these out instead. was not disappointed. the sound is great and does cancel out all excess noise at the gym.
I bought one for my use; it is clear and sounds great! My husband has used one from a competitor for 5 years, but after hearing mine he asked me to order him an exact match. Highly recommended.
It lasted about a year now it doesn't want to charge any more. Need to find mb other brands...

The headphones stopped pairing with any of my devices after only a couple weeks. Very disappointed that they only lasted this long-I will be switching back to Anker brand as those had much longer lifespan for me.
Use the product during cardio workout and quite satisfied until charging problem develp[ed. Contacted customer service and was very impressed with prompt resolution
Works great. I had to wait and extra day for delivery due to Hurricane Matthew.  Love them so far.
This is not what I want, those headphones don’t fit my ears. I would never buy them again.
Doesnt properly stay in my ear takes a while to attach it to my ear, it gets annoying also I cant connect the earphones to my laptop.
Worked well for the first month. Now after around 30 minutes there is static noise. Also sometimes it is hard to connect to iPhone 7plus.

I purchased this headphone with $36. The performance is okay for the price. However, the original price $160 make me feel bad. It can fool customer get a great bargain. I can't believe it was such a high price before. Also, I couldn't find the original price info from other website.
Thus, my three star was because of the suspicious original price. If someone show me the proof of the $160, I will change my review.
"My kids love these headphones, They say that the sound is great and they are so comfortable. The seller made sure they arrived on time and in great condition."
Great product, ordered FIVE so far.  Will order more for other people in the office.  GREAT SERVICE ALSO.

I bought these for use on vacation. I have a long flight in a couple months and I wanted small, lightweight, noise-canceling headphones for the trip. These appear to be what I need. The setup was easy, I paired it with my iPod and the music sounded fine.  My only concern is whether the headphones will be comfortable for an 8-hour flight.

So far, I love them. They are comfortable and loud enough to play my drums. I was tired of a cord head set, so these are working great so far.

Regards,

Will Dillard
Got my headphones yesterday.  Sound is excellent and they are very comfortable.  Great value for the money.

Bluetooth headphons are easy to set up.  Sound quality is great.  Very comfortable on the ears without falling off.  Does not have much bass though.  Perhaps, that's the same for all earphones with this size.
Everyone complains about how I sound when I talk to them and everything cuts in and out. Didn’t last more then a few months.
Shipped crazy fast.  Packaged perfectly.  Comes with everything you need.  The headphones are comfortable and for the price, you can't go wrong.  Would definitely recommend.
Great sound and fit. Excellent quality. Very durable. Also got a pair for my son.  Also great customer support.

Ive had these several weeks. I used them once and they worked great. Then I skipped a day and by the next day they were dead. I recharged them. 6 hours later went to use them. Dead. The charge does not hold even when powered off and charged within a day. I'm incredibly frustrated with these and want my money back.

I like these headphones a lot, they are comfortable and work well.  They also have a lot of nice features many others don't.  I wore them to the gym today for the first time and simply walking from the car to the gym I couldn't hear the music at all due to all the wind noise that I was getting.  I tried all three of the ear pieces and it was the same for each.  They are comfortable and I would purchase them again, just be aware they are not for outside.
Excellent battery life and sound for the price! My boyfriend is a mail carrier and uses these every day.

These earbuds have no range, only work if your phone is in front pocket, connection is frequently interrupted, have underlying hum while connected, do not stay in ear during running workouts despite multiple sized inserts. In general they do not perform as advertised. Company did their best to resolve issues by replacing with a second pair, but both perform in the same manner.
I love these! They're a great price and the battery lasts a good amount of time and they charge super fast. Would definitely recommend!

Great product and even better warranty service. I had these ear pods for about 10 months when they developed a short and the left side stopped playing. Sent a message to the seller and tried a reset. When that didn't work they sent out a replacement unit within the week. Easy no hassle thank you for supporting your customers!

I will mention this for you runners out there. This set of ear pods only problem is wind noise. If you are running into a headwind it can be pretty loud and drown out your music. Just FYI...

Hello Mr. Backstrom: I sent back the first order because I did not see the wire tie. I reordered the ear phones again and unless I,m going blind I did not see the wire tie in this order either. No big deal. I can go without it. Have a Magical Day! *@*. Carol

Great product.  Perfect for my workouts. And when I did have an issue with one earbud not working the customer service response was fast and accurate resolve the problem and I'm back on my bike I love these earbuds

Overall, I was looking for a decent set of bluetooth headphones that would stay in my ears while running and doing activities. I learned that the hooks over the ears are super flimsy and almost pointless. They don't help much for keeping the headphones in my ears - I have to wear a hat with them in order to keep them on.

Bluetooth distance - up close with your phone, the connection is great but when I get about 10 feet away, things start to break up a bit.

For the sound, it's not bad. My big gripe here is that when I'm doing an activity with a lot of background noise (mowing the lawn), the volume doesn't go high enough. I can barely hear anything.

These headphones are ok for now but I'll likely be getting some different ones in the near future.
used these for the first time yesterday, it was easy to setup and easy to use, love them!!!!
Just got them 2 days ago and have used them everyday, without needing a charge yet. They fit well, sound great, and stay on without falling off! I love them.

An excellent bargain for the money. I would give it 5 Stars if it would tell you the condition of the battery when you turn it on. You only find out it's about to go dead when it tells you the battery is low. If I had known earlier I would have charged it, wouldn't I?

UPDATE: Not much more than a year later, the left ear piece intermittently goes out. No way to fix it. obviously only manufactured to outlast the warranty by the merest amount of time. Don't bother.

Great sound quality. So far no problems with the Bluetooth connection. I have pretty small ear canals so I have to use the smallest ear buds that come with the headphones otherwise the sound is muffled. Otherwise no problems.
Great product. Using it to work out.

Great quality sound both playing music and good mic pick up for phone calls (a lot better than I'd thought it would be for calls).  As a result I ordered a second pair -- one to keep in my workout bag and another to use at home in our hot tub or sometimes I use them at my desk too.  My 4 vs. 5 star is the cord is long (which is fine) needs a small rubber grommet to tighten up around the back of your neck.  Obviously I have made it work which is why I ordered the second pair for my use (so I have them available in different places).

These are for sure the worst headphones I’ve ever tried. I am a long distance runner and not only do the earbuds pop out every few minutes they are very heavy and bulky over the course of a long run. I tried some of the recommended things other reviewers have posted here to see if I could somehow get these to work for me but they are going back. There is no wind reduction with these. The overall sound is heavy muddy bass with a small trace of upper range. The only thing I liked about these was the easy and reliable Bluetooth paring with my I phone. I am going back to my trusted  Rovkings.

This is the second set of Senso earbuds that I have purchased.  The sound quality is very good, and the over the ear fit is very comfortable.  I would highly recommend this product to anyone considering the purchase of a Bluetooth wireless device.
The headphone have a great fitNd fabulous sound. I just purchase them and love them. The are great for new iPhone 7
Work less than a month I bought this on March 9, and stop working! I DO NOT recommend this product.

This is my second pair after the first set stopped working after a year.  This set reluctantly connects and then will drop the connection during various activities.  Apparently, I just ran out of support for this item even though it is only a few months old.  I will be looking for an alternative to these for my next set.  Even though they are inexpensive, they should still work.  I am also looking to process a refund or a replacement under the warranty provisions and will update if/when that occurs.

The sound is amazing. I was looking for headphones for a while and reading reviews of course. I love everything that came with them as well. These are definitely worth the money and to me they sound just as good as the expensive ones. I got pretty excited when I heard them the first time. Easy to connect and charge quickly. I'm very happy with them.

Review after approx. 6 months ownership:
Pro
- Battery lasts ~5 hours
- No problems after running for 2 hours in full rain
- Audio quality is fair enough for sport acitivity
- They are not noise blocking / cancelling. When listening to audio books you can still hear shouts / bells of overtaking bikes.
- Can be charged with many USB cables (had issues in the past on smaller devices, where USB cables with a bit more plastic wouldn't fit)
Con
- There seems to be a distance where connection issues are more likely. E.g. when I place my phone in the pocket of a light jacket, I get frequent interruptions. However, no problem if it's buried deep in a large backpack.

Overall: worth every penny.
after using it they work well but at first the light is not visible that indicates it is on or off
Good sound, not great.

This headset works as described. They work well. The only issue is they are big, the ears buds have 3 sizes. I same is to small and the medium is to big. I use the small and at times have to push the earpiece back in place.

I wear hearing aids, but when I work out I use the SENSO because they are waterproof. The mic on my hearing aids pick up wind noises, you mic does not. My one telephone call while I was using the SENSO when well.

I do not leave many reviews... much less many 5 stars. Why? maybe im not a fan of the costumer review system as i feel it stears me wrong sometimes. I will perhaps say that i want to leave reviews that reflect customer service interactions. IF the product goes in that review then that is ok too! So... i had a pair of these headsets that i bought 11 months ago. They have a year warranty. Thinking the company was going to blow off my request for a replacement i just went ahead and bought these. I didn't even give them a try to make it right. Except the second pair that i ordered came with a software defect that was quickly fixed with a hardware reset. When i informed them that i bought the new one just to replaced the old one the immediately offered to replace the old pair. Now this i did not ask for. They offered! These are the things that i give 5 stars for! Good customer service! Read other reviews to see how good these headsets are ( they are loud clear and have plenty of base!) If you are looking for a great pair or behind the neck headsets at a bargain price these are it! But what makes you come back is a company that stands behind their products! THis felt like an Apple kind of response but this is a small company that wants to build its reputation! IM convinced! Good job ! Very impressed!

Had them for a few months and they worked well during that time. I thought the sound was good and they fit well. After a few months, they just stopped working. I've learned not to go cheap on earbuds, you are better off getting a reliable pair for more.

Love them.  Do not fall out of my ears and very comfortable to wear. Sound is great and using to answer the phone not having people tell me that they cannot hear me.  Someone mistook them for the really expensive brand...so for the price a great buy.

I have been struggling to find earbuds that would fit in my very small ear canals did a search specifically for that and this was one that came and it was my last resort but I'm very happy with them they fit my ear just fine the earloop helps to hold the the tip in sound is good I'm very pleased overall with them
The sound is very impressive and connection to my cell phone was easy. The flexible ear loops work well over my glasses ear pieces.
Good looking headphones but often would not connect to Bluetooth.  Just stopped working after only a short time.

Had these for just about two months. We're excellent for the gym. Put them in my ears and they stayed put. Took them down to Virginia on vacation. Found one of the ear buds slightly ajar and tried to snap it back into place. The volume control disappeared in the process. Was hoping for something a bit less weak on the quality side.
Great earbuds! Very good sound quality and it fits nice even to my ears, what is really rare.
Bought this for my husband and he loves it. Excellent quality and sound.
The ear hooks fit weirdly/didn't really do anything, and I'm not a fan of this type of in ear headphone that relies on suction on the ear canal to stay in.

I enjoy wearing these earphones around the house for my phone calls and also when I am listening to audiobooks while I take walks in the park. Comfortable and easy. Love the round box that they come in, as I also store a few other tech items in there as well. Bluetooth makes it a dream, rather than plugging in traditional earphones to my cell phone.
Little bit hassle to plugbon ear, but you will get used too. No complain so far.
Great earbuds!
Great product better than my bose earpiece love it and battery last long too.
They can be a bit staticky at times, but mostly work well. They stay on my ears unlike most other buds ive used and the sound is nice and loud

The quality of the music is good enough if you’re using it only for working out. I would not use these as your main headset. They begin to hurt if worn for more than 2 hours, and the wire that connects the two ear pieces is freakishly long. I cannot run with them as they flap around and disrupt the music. Basically you’d hear this “rubbing” or thudding sound as the wire hits your back. I have since got a hair tie that I used to knot the long wire and it isn’t so bothersome. Battery length is dependable.
Great headphones for the price. High quality sound.

much better that the powerbeats3 when it comes to battery life.  It connects with iphone without any issues.  The powerbeats died after 4 months however this piece of art is still working.  Updated 5/28/2018.
Nice product good quality

I bought these Senso Bluetooth Headphones in January 14, 2020. This month (August, 2020) they quit working. At first the functionality to adjust the volume and song selection quit working and then a few days later they completely died, and would not charge or power up. I called the service phone line (888-683-4941) and they attempted to assist me in resetting the headphones, to no avail. They recognized that they needed replaced and told me they were referring the problem to the warranty department and I would be contacted in 3 days. . .NOT. I have called the service line 3 times and sent 3 separate e-mails to the warranty department (2 thru there web interface and 1 directly from my e-mail account) and HAD ZERO RESPONSE TO MY REQUEST FOR REPLACEMENT!

If you want a headphone with a warranty DO NOT BUY THESE HEADPHONES!
These are pretty good ear buds for the price. There was some issue with the ear buds cutting out or static being heard.

I bought these for walking and working in the yard. The Bluetooth connection was fine when standing upright, but as soon as I was kneeling or bent over in the yard the connection was horrible. I tried for over an hour before giving up. Unfortunately, I will be returning them.

They sound great and support is fantastic during the warranty period, but I just had my second pair die 11 days out of warranty and they denied the claim. I'm looking for something better.

2 other pairs in the family are doing fine, but reliability seems to be a crap shoot.

I was hoping that these would work under my motorcycle helmet, but they stick out too far to fit.

The zipper on the case broke on day 2.

On the plus side, the pairing was simple, the fit is comfortable and the sound is not bad for earbuds. Full sound, maybe a little bass heavy to convince people that they're better than they are, but overall Im impressed with the quality.

"     I am truly impressed by the sound quality. Just now listening to: Beethoven, Diabelli-Variationen, a complex piano recording, and it is so crystal clear as to be almost scary. Now, I am sitting down, and have not gone running, but sound quality is important to me. At his price point, I am very comfortable recommending these to even the most discerning listener. "

They stay in your ears almost no matter what, but they are bulky. The size creates that good bass sound. They draw attention they are so large. Unfortunately one pair I bought has already developed a circuit problem when switched ON. It creates a terrible noise then shuts off right away. Into the trash it went.
Now the second pair quit and won’t even turn on. It charged overnight and is shot.
Going into the trash again.
The products works really well and it’s an affordable alternative for anyone that wants to go unplugged while practicing activities or talking on the phone
what i do not like about is the warr.
They work fine but the right earpiece wont stay in my ear. I switched to the largest earbud but it still wont stay in.
The customer service is a call center and all they do is read from a book.Do not waste your money on a piece of junk.....They have the nerve to ask me if I want to buy another one...Really!!!!

I work in a very loud noisy setting, these headphones do a great job with noise cancellation. By far my favorite pair I've owned. I bought another pair for my girlfriend once I seen how much I loved mine.

These are better than I expected!  I have difficulties keeping headphones in one of my ears and these stay!  And the sound quality is pretty legit too. I wish they maybe went one notch higher on volume but at its highest, pretty much drowns out most of the gym noise. Happy with my purchase!
Nice headphones, great for working out.

At first I really liked this product.  Ordered additional for friends and family as presents.  The sound started fading in an out and one ear didn't work after a few months.  Contacted the seller and they assured me "they would take care of it”but asked that I try resetting it.  This worked for a few weeks and then the problem resurfaced.  I recontacted them and now they say its out of the warranty period and won't stand behind their product.  Frustrating but you get what you pay for I guess.  Just beware that these will work well for some time but be prepared to buy new ones after a year.  Not bad I guess for $30.

So far i have any problems They were nicely
Packaged arrived very fast. I'm happy with my
Purchased

These are great ear buds. the price for what you get is absolutely phenomenal.. If it was safe I would use them while riding my bike.
They are great!!!!
Love this for running because it stays in your ears.
These are the best headphones I have ever bought and paid I paid much less for them!  Sound is loud and clear, highly recommend.

EDIT: I contacted customer support and they were super prompt and helpful

I was really impressed with these headphone when I first got them but I've have them for less than a year and the left ear peiece isn't making sound anymore. So I guess they are okay as long as you plan on replacing them :/

They were working fine, they did cut in and out a bit but for the bargain I wasn't too bothered. They just died on a run in about 40 minutes into a fully charged battery. They make a '2- boop' tone when trying to turn them back on, plugged in or not. It also shows a blue indicator light for fully charged as soon as I plug them in. 2 weeks outside of the return window too. Pretty frustrating. I wouldn't recommend these, very highly.

Edit 10/19/17 (next day) if your headphones just poop out mid use.. **So while plugged in, hold the button for seven seconds and that will initiate a factory reset, then unplug and attempt to re-pair to your device.** this did in fact reset the buds and they work again! Customer service got back to me super fast with help and asked for my Amazon info to get me into their warranty system so that was a relief too! I see these things are 20 bucks now instead of the 35 I paid a month and a half ago.. Lol I'd say go for it but get them registered with senso and read a few of these reviews to get an idea of what you have in these.

I'm just glad I can put off getting a new pair for another bit and I might actually get another for only 20 bucks. I get sweat all over these things so I gotta wonder if they eventually get a little in there but oh well. I see reviews on much much more expensive sets and it's exactly the same as these bargain brands so idk. Good luck ear budding out there!

Edit #2 10/19/17 customer service is definitely worth a 5 star. I think I said in here it looks like reviews are similar for these no matter how high the dollar amount. So I'd have to change my mind and highly recommend these with the caveat of them being definitely what you pay for. Decent. Customer service, to notch.
The volume is horrible  You can not turn up the volume to any reasonable level to hear. It does not go ups whisper no matter how you adjust your phone or the head phones.

I've been looking for a pair of wireless headphones for a while, and after a Kickstarter not delivering on their product, I started looking for a cheaper alternative. For $30, these are definitely worth the price. While they look a little bulky, they're really lightweight and the sound/connectivity is surprisingly great! At a medium volume and the correct sized earbud, they block out a good amount of sound. I have smaller ears and my daith pierced on each side and these are really comfortable sitting in my ears for some time on end.

Absolutely the freaking best. Took a month for them to die the first time. Makes my workouts sooooo much better. Don’t have to worry about them coming out of my ears. Can’t say enough good things.

update 6/24/22: guys. guys. these headphones. they’re still my headphones. only just now is there a small short in the left ear, so i have to wrap the cord around my ear for it to play, but damn. 5 years with no issues. Small issue now, but still extremely good buy. 10/10 would recommend
I have never had such an awesome  experience  with bluetooth  ear buds.
Love them, great sound & very easy to set up & use.
Good bass though highs are a little flat. But overall really good for the price
Great fit and sound.

I work outside doing underground powerline work, so these headphones are exposed to and put through quite a bit, and hold up fantastic. Recently I wore them in a heavy rainstorm during a job and they didn't get messed up. And they sound great and battery lasts forever. Very happy with these, they exceeded my expectations! If I manage to wear them out I'll definitely buy another pair!

I have been looking for a pair of reasonably priced Bluetooth headphones for a very long time. This pair popped up on my reccommended items and I'm so glad they did! I've had a lot of trouble with bass in headphones but these pick up everything! I did a test of about every song and YouTube video I would listen to and watch and I couldn't be happier. I have not done a running test, but I have done multiple sessions at the gym and they haven't fallen out as of yet. I also have small ears so I run into a huge problem when it comes to ear bud size but these come with replacement buds and the smallest fit perfectly. The instructions pamphlet is easy to understand and thorough. I really couldn't be happier with these, and I couldn't recommend them more.  I've also attached pictures of what came in the box.
Great sound and louder than my LG headset I paid twice as much for at Verizon a couple years ago.

As an old man (60 yrs of age); I'm still old school and I'm slowly getting into the 20th century.  Two years ago my son recommended I get a Smart Phone and in some way my world expanded.  However I still used a MP3 player for my music and was reluctant to use my S5.  Well I finally caved in but wanted to get wireless bluetooth headphones.  Well my son naturally sync the both devices. I listed to my music on the S5 and it was GREAT!  Answering calls was very easy.  Purchasing these Senso Bluetooth Headphones was well worth the money.  Outstanding Product!

I really liked these headphones and used them for just over a year. I work from home and enjoyed using these to listen to music and seamlessly answer calls as well. The range was great, I could leave my phone in the office and walk at least 30-40 ft away without losing signal. I had switched the ear pieces to the foam pieces that came with it and after a month or so they were hurting my ears so I wanted to switch them. One ear piece came off fine, the other actually broke the headphone instead of coming off. You can see in the picture that it broke at the seem. I owned these approximately 15 months when this happen and since they didn't break from my own abuse, I sent Senso an email. They responded with a mere 5% discount code and advised it was out of the 1 year warranty. Had this been my fault I would understand not wanting to offer further assistance, but this appears to be a weakness in the product. While I enjoyed these headphones I will not be purchasing another pair.
Great sound quality & superb noise cancellation.
Brand new these earbuds lasted about 3 hours on a full charge. A year and a half later of moderately heavy use, they last about 20-30 minutes on a full charge.

Great quality and value. I was really impressed with the sound these headphones deliver, and for the price, I can't see how they can be beat.

Update: One problem I have found with these headphones is that on my IPhone 7, I have to delete them from my Bluetooth settings after each use and then restore them when listening to books on Audible.com. If not, I get intermittent reception when listening to Audible.com books. It doesn't seem to be a problem with other Aps. Since I mainly use them for books, it is a bit of a nuisance. It may be an Apple issue for all I know, but I thought it worth mentioning.

About 3 months after purchase, the unit failed. Contacted vendor and replacement sent right out. Can't beat that for service.

These are great. Just charge them, then them on, and let your iPhone do the rest.  I have fairly small ears (I guess...) and the clip around my ears feels a little loose, but the earphones have actually stayed in place perfectly while I've worked out. The sound quality is great and the controls on the right earphone work well.

Pros: Low cost, functioned as advertised.

Cons: Sound quality is VERY poor, I'm not and audiophile by any means, but the treble is harshly muted and base is pretty much non-existent with obnoxiously tinny mid-range. No control over EQ with the music apps I use, and the general EQ on the iPhone has zero effect on the way these sound. These SENSO headphones are some of the worst I've ever used.

The biggest downvote is they won't stay in my ears while I'm running, and I've tried every variation of ear plug that came with them. I attribute this to their bulky and awkward design...they stay over my ears just fine, but won't stay in, and it just further reduces the already sub-optimal sound quality.

I'm not sure what I expected at this price point, but don't let the other reviews fool you. These are low cost, and very low sound quality. Pretty disappointed with my purchase

Just got these the other day to replace a broken pair of Jaybird headphones.  I was obviously skeptical due to the price being so low but after seeing all the reviews I figured they were worth a shot.  Wore them for the first time today and love them!!  I can't believe how well they work and fit for such a low price.  No issues connecting at all and I LOVE the ear pieces that came with them.  I have tried Beats headphones and I can't ever get them to fit right in my ears.  I was worried as these look the same - but the ear pieces worked amazingly well.  Tight fit and that helps block out the outside noise too.  I wear these during crossfit so lots of running, jumping, etc.  They stayed in great and there were no issues with sound.  Don't be afraid of the price - these are a terrific buy.

Great product. Bought these for my husband. He's been so pleased with the quality of the product and the sound. I've been impressed by the longevity add he tends to be hard on anything he uses frequently. Would recommend these to anyone in the market for wireless

I bought these so that I could listen to podcasts and audiobooks while I take my dog for a walk.  I've used these everyday for the past week that I've had them and these headphones are a major disappointment.  Whether I keep my iPod in my pocket, in my bag, or even in my hand, the sound cuts in and out constantly as I'm walking.  It really only stays connected if I am perfectly still.  It even cuts out if I'm standing still and just turn my head to the side.  It's also difficult to hear the sound on a mildly windy day.  These headphones would only be satisfactory if you were indoors sitting down, had your phone/iPod lying flat on a table within 2 ft of you, and you kept your head facing in one direction the entire time.  I'll probably keep these for when I travel on the train or in a plane since that's when I'll be stuck in one position for long periods of time.  And I'd be totally fine if I lost these while traveling.

So far these headphones are amazing.  They have great sound and were very easy to pair with my iPhone.  The controls work great and it has 2 charge cords, one which works as an iPhone cord and charging cord for the head phones. I have only been using them for less than a week but have not needed to charge them yet.  They come with a car charger but unfortunately it does not have a wall charger.  That is the only draw back, but again you can just use the phone charger.  Really pleased with this product.
best headphones ever
Great product and the price point is attractive too.
They work great!  Very satisfied!
Comes with a headphone case, spare plugs and charger cable. Battery lasts forever! Charges very quick. All positive aspects for such low price!
Great headphones. They are comfortable, sound clear and have great range at my office and home.

I bought the dre beat wireless headphones that look exactly the same and they malfunctioned after two months. I got these at 19.99 and they come with all the extras and even more accessories than I could imagine including an extra fastener for the wire band!! what a great value! has everything you need and stays perfectly in your ear while intensive running
Very easy to pair with other devices, easy to use, great sound
After 2 weeks will not turn on.

Looking for wireless gym headphones? You found them. I love these earbuds (for the price). They came with a really dope charging cable that accommodates the earbuds and my iPhone in the same cable- something I haven't seen before. They charge fully in about 90 minutes and will last me about 5-6 gym workouts that vary anywhere between 40 and 90 minutes. In addition, they include a dual port car charger and another mini usb charging cable. Excellent value for sure! I cannot speak to the longevity of the product, I can however say that for the price they have excellent sound quality and stay in my ears while playing basketball. Kinda creepy how easily/clear the calling is. Probably better than actually using the phone by itself. Unless you're looking for very high end headphones, I can't see anyone being unsatisfied with their purchase.

Great fitting earbuds for running. Much better than a pair that cost me 5X as much and didn't fit as well.
Sound for me is great, but I am admittedly not an audiophile.
I had a problem with the Bluetooth connection that quit working after using for two months. However, Senso customer service was very responsive and helpful. A new set was mailed to me the day after I first emailed them.
Very happy overall

I will give five stars if this product could fix this one issue: when battery is low, stop repeating to me frequently (per 30sec) and loudly (this volume is not controlled by you - it's default at loud) that battery is low! I got the message! It's just low, not dead, but keeping yelling at me "battery low battery low" could either give me a heart attack or kill my hearing someday. If you want to buy this, don't ever forget to charge it. The battery state of  charge stays at max for a long time, but once it drops a little bit it drops fast.

Love these headphones. I have had these guys for over 6 months. They are fantastic. The battery is great. I accidentally washed them in the washer once, and they still work. I use them for running, and I never have to fidget with during my run.
Pair easily, sound quality is good.  Can use as wireless headset to talk on the phone.  Holds charge for long period of time.

These headphones sound fine. They don't fit in my ear as well as I want. I've tried changing the rubber ear pieces (different sizes) as well as adjusting the over the ear piece. Maybe it's just me. I wear a headband over them to keep them in place when I'm exercising.
For the price these are great quality. Bought them for my spouse in 2018 and they still work great! I ended up buying a second pare to give to a sibling.
I love these headphones!
Stopped working after limited use. They would not turn on after only about 5 uses.

the product works very well, connected easily to my Apple devices without the use of PIN/Activation codes.
the items were also packaged nicely and professionally as to protect the product during shipment.
Great price..pretty good sound. However, the Bluetooth connection is spotty. If you don't mind the intermittent loss of connection, then this is a great buy.

Great range from connected device. Can walk at least 30 feet away from phone or ipod and still have clear sound, but the distortion quickly builds after the previously stated distance. Long battery life thus far. No signs of battery memory issues from charging thus far. Great bass and volume level for the device. As it is my first Bluetooth headphones purchase and use, it is not a bad introduction to the technology or particular brand.
These earphones rock! (literally) - water resistant, noise cancelling, and they stay in your ears during vigorous work-outs. GREAT PRICE! Already ordered another set for my wife A+++++++++
Very good headset, I enjoyed better than my iPhone headset

After looking at the reviews, I really had high hopes for these. After receiving them today I am very disappointed. I've tried messing with them, and kept questioning that maybe I wasn't wearing them right or it wasn't fully charged or etc... but it got down to the clearity of the sound is just awful. It cannot handle mid or high volume. The base is decent but pretty much everything sound like crap at mid to high volume thus making a buzz to the audio I've tried listening to. I even took the time to play sane audio from different device and from different sources but the result is still disappointing.

Use these everyday for working out or just when I want to hear music it’s great for it all it doesn’t cut off and it doesn’t get annoying when the battery is low but if you r bothered by the wire on these what I have done to make them feel better is put the wire on my head and loop the earbuds around the back of my ear so it won’t be moving around everywhere when I run

I must say that these ear buds are the best that I have had for several years. I work in a area that has a low noise level that will drive you batty.  These buds have done the best job yet of providing great sounding music keeping me sane.

Buy these, for the price you cannot help but be thrilled.

Are they the nicest, most refined or best sounding headphones I've ever laid my paws on? Of course not.

At $30USD are they an complete bargain? Absolutely.

I read reviews before buying pretty much anything, and went with these over a different brand due to the higher 4 star rating. I cannot say how thrilled I am, they pull double duty as a Bluetooth headset in the car and as the most convenient headphones I've ever owned for the gym. They sound great for the price, and I don't have any worries about sweating or showering with them. The car charger and dual lightning/microUSB cord are just a bonus with an already great product.

If you want something that just works, and is way underpriced, buy these and don't look back.
The Senso firstly, looks very masculine, which I like, i'm also somewhat hearing impaired and Infind it guite comfortable so far.
As expected.
Used them at home and they worked perfectly but on a plane with a screaming child in front and in behind me not so good
Works

I'm have been surprisingly pleased with the quality of the sound and ease of use, only thing I would recommend is the strap that ties them together is a little stiff and would have like to have one a little more flexible.

So far so good! I've only used them a couple times, but they were easy to pair, the sound is fantastic, and they stay on my ears. I have very small ears, so that's always been a problem. I used the memory foam ear bud cover on my left ear and left the other medium one on my right ear, and it seems to be working well. I would recommend these! For the price, they are great!
The fit well in my ears and have great sound. Very reasonable price. Would buy again.
I dig my new headphones! I just wish they had a toggle for the cord, rather than that little black piece.

From day 1 lasted less than one hour during long runs.  Bought in late June. Quit taking a charge at all in late October.  Now junk. Would also lose connection and skip or miss sometimes at minimal distance (i.e. my pocket).

These work fine when I'm at the gym.  Good sound compared to other Bluetooth headset I've had however when at home using the same phone, they do not work.  Continuously drops the connection to the point I can't even use them whereas my other headsets work fine.  The include car charger is a nice bonus but rarely stays in and continuously needs adjusted

So far they work great! Got them for my husband as a gift, he sweats a lot and goes to the gym every day. Good long charge, perfect fit.

Update, stopped working, requesting a refund.
Company sent out replacement earbuds asap, no hassle at all. Thank you very much!!
Paired easily. Decent sound and fit. Imagine their price and imagine how many expensive headphones you'd lose to break even. I'll take cheap this time.

Really superseded my expectations. Decent quality for a nice price- the case is convenient.

"For the price this has been a great set of headphones. I have not worked out in them yet to test the waterproof/sweatproof of the ear pieces yet. Sound quality is good and the ear pieces are comfortable."
Absolutely wonderful quality

Bought it back in 2017 and it still works. Battery holds charge pretty well. Sound quality isn’t comparable to Apple Airpod but it is significantly less. I would buy again if it fails.

I did get it replace once. They stand behind their product. I got a replacement without any questions.
Great headphones! Loudest I've had

I used these with the Lantoo 2-in-1 Audio Wireless Adapter. To save time I'll paste what I wrote below. Very nice product, came with accessories and a carrying case, simply plugged into USB and charged an hour or 2. I watched an entire movie, listening to the audio on my computer in these headphones, acrosss the room. I recommend!

On Transmitter Review:

"I bought this Bluetooth Transmitter to send audio from my laptop (which is attached to a bigger monitor) to a SENSO Bluetooth headphones. I was able to lay in bed and watch from across the room. Pairing was surprisingly easy, just had the headphones close and held the button on the transmitter until it began pairing. The audio dropped a couple times when I was first getting comfortable in bed, I think it was because I was resting my head against the wall?? I simply put a pillow more between my head and the wall and it was fine. Using the Senso headphones, I could walk around freely in my room and hear it the whole time. It's a simple to use product that's effective for the purpose I mentioned."

I was excited to purchase what sounded from reviews to be really comfortable Bluetooth headphones. I could not wear these for more than 10 minutes before I got a headache. The sound quality is very good, though, and it was easy to pair with my Samsung Galaxy s6. I like the hard case it comes with, too.

My ear openings are too big for the small buds and too small for the medium buds. I can usually work around this, but for this set, the ear hooks and the main electronics part add a weight and rigidity that was instantly uncomfortable to me. So, my search continues.

i love these things....they are not over powering with bass but other then that they are kind of perfect i wear them from biking to weight lifting and i do not have to adjust i i forget to charge them and they still work hours for me they connect to my phone (Samsung galaxy edge 7) and with my ipad air 2 cant say that about most.....i highly highly recommend you try them for yourself
The bluetooth headseat works great with a good sound.
My ears are really sensitive so I wish they were softer but I made some adjustments to the size of the buds so that has helped a little. It covers all of my other needs however!!
Surprised by the noise cancelling effectiveness.  Comfortable and fits my small ears!

Love these headphones, they are the only set I’ve found that will stay put while I run. No readjusting or moving around. My only complaint, the audio doesn’t work when I receive a phone call. Everyone on the receiving end says they can’t hear me. If not for that, I would give 5 stars.
Excellent!!
Disappointed. Takes at least 15 seconds to pair and sometimes it takes multiple attempts. Sive had to try 4 times to connect more than once. Doubt seriously these ever really cost the full price

Great so far, especially for the price. The only issue is they require a slight adjustment while you're running. They are still much better to run with than a pair of apple headphones
So far so good!  They fit very nice and have great sound quality.  Only have used twice so far, but I have no complaints!
I have tiny ears and these fit great. The music is very loud even on level one through my phone.  So if you like loud music these are a must.
Great sound, comfortable and long lasting.

Love them
!

First off just want to say I am not being paid for this review. These headphones are fantastic. I bought them to replace a set of lg tone pros that I bought back in November that went out. I use headphones everyday at my job and the design of these are awesome. I never worry about them falling out. And it's great to know that they will last me through the winter and spring rains. And the price was a lot cheaper than the LG's. A must buy!!!!
Has held up to daily use (and daily sweat) for over a year with ZERO issues. Best quality sound and durability for the money.
Not only was the sound quality really good, but it truly canceled out all sound.  I would highly recommend these to anyone.

The feel, fit, sound and quality is great. Love them! I am fully charging them right now and will use them at work and see how long the battery holds up, it says 6 hours and if they don't hold up close to the 6 hours I will be back to update my review but for now they are awesome!

My son introduced me to Senso. Very nice, quality sound, easy to connect with Bluetooth to all my devices. I recommend this product.

The only downside is when I am connected to two devices and I leave the area of one of the devices, there is a slight disruption. Problem easily solved by disconnecting the Bluetooth in the device I am leaving behind.

Just had my first workout with these on and they are awesome. Here is my feedback. If you are looking for inexpensive Bluetooth earphones for your gym workout, go for these. They are cheap and they sound really good for the price. I use them for my 1 hour long runs. Usually my ears pain if I use earphoned for that long. Nothing like that happened here, sound quality was good and they fit really well. As soon as I got them I got an email from the company where they just wanted to check about their product, so 5 stars for customer support as well.Cant really say much about durability and battery yet. But sound,fit,price and customer support all aspects call for a 5 star review.

Ordered two sets of these and they turned out to be much better quality than anticipated. Set up was not as intuitive as you would think and forced me to consult the directions but once I got them going they spent an hour with me on the treadmill streaming videos from my android phone.
No drop out the entire time in use. Bass response for their size was good, but of course not as good as full ear covering headphones as you would expect, but audio is crisp and speech very intelligible.
The extra accessories supplied kept me from looking for things to make it work, everything needed is in the box with a nice carry case, I like that!.
A side note other things that produce blue tooth signals do interfere with setup and you should move to a blue-tooth dead area for an easier set-up experience.
They are ok just not as good as promised
Absolutely the best Bluetooth headphones I've owned! Cannot beat the quality for the price! Awesome battery life and amazing bass and noise canceling! 5++++ stars!

These are comfortable earbuds, have good sound and noise blocking ability and joined easily to any of my blue tooth devices. They came with three additional ear pad sizes as well as car charger with 2 USB ports and a USB iPhone charge cord. It also has a nice zippered hard case to carry them in.
I have used these a lot and just recently bought an additional pair to keep at the computer. Everyone will judge things like this differently according to their own expectations, but I found them handy and reliable with good sound quality.
The fit and sound of the headphones are great.

They are pretty decent for the price, the bass isn’t as good as I would hope but for price what I expected.

Nice pair of headphones. The ear clips are soft but still firm. The sweatproof feature is great. Comes with 3 different size buds for your ears pleasure and are super easy to clean.

I needed these for voice calls not music and either way they are not as loud as you would want them to be. Trust me . You need complete silence to say they are not too bad .. Only used them twice but so far I love them. I use them for the gym and they seem to drown out the background noise pretty well. The best part is they’re a little heavier than my last few pairs which makes me think they’ll stay in place better

Amazed at the performance of these at this price. I must have odd shaped ear canals because I have a lot of trouble with fit. I was able to easily find one of the tips that worked in my ears. Great sound!

These are easy headphones to put on and stay on during workouts.  They have clarity and connected to the iPhone easily.  It was a good purchase.

These are my favorite wireless headphones - so far. High quality sound and very comfortable. With the ear loops, they stay on. I have a problem with this... I'd love to love them and keep them but, the power of the BT reach is too weak. I mean, you cant go into the next room without losing connection. Yesterday, on my way to the GYM I put my phone under my armpit and the BT set disconnected. Sorry, but I need something with a little more reach and power. Sound it's OK, but don't expect too much. I use my BT to listen to Audio books and movie reviews on YouTube and that's ok for that.

My last pair proved wonderful; people I'm talking to currently with this pair are asking me to call them back when I'm not using my Bluetooth.  My work is over the phone so the only time I ever make phone calls via Bluetooth while driving.

Quality of the sound is great, and I loved all the accessories that came with it, however the over-the-ear concepts doesn't work great as it's really more so just to make sure they stay on your ear and not secure in your ear. These make exercising so much more enjoyable! They come in an excellent case, and are perfect for listening to music, especially when lifting. So glad my wife found these for me!

These earbuds are amazing! The sound quality and comfort are just as good as all the reviews state.

Great set of head phones for $30. Only gripe would be the silicon that goes around your ear is not as rigid as I would like and adjusting volume on headphones is sometimes not responsive when connecting with my iPhone. Over all it's a good set of wireless headphones.

These got returned. They looked great, were comfortable and came with a wide range of accessories. My biggest complaint, and deal breaker, was that they wouldn't stay connected. I either had my phone in a string bag on my back or in an armband case. Either way, it was never more than a couple feet away from the headphones. I'd be out walking the dogs and they'd constantly be cutting out. I tried to put up with it and gave them a full week to grow on me before I had had it. It was dissapointing

Well made, packaged nicely and the sound is excellent. My only negative is rmthe placement of the volume controls. Hard to find them and I keep hitting the on/off pause button. Otherwise I am very happy with the ear buds.

I often rely on customer reviews before I buy something; seeing that these earbuds had great reviews, I decided to try them. I wasn't really expecting much, just for them to work and have decent sound quality. I was very disappointed; the sound quality is not as the product described. The earbuds don't really have that deep bass that it advertises, it more just muffles the rest of the music. Vocals sound very muffled and the highs and lows aren't really there. Ordered these with one day shipping and I returned them as soon as I got them. You can find higher quality earbuds at BestBuy for the same price or lower (I have better earbuds that I got for $25). An obvious red flag that I ignored was all of the additional items that came with the earbuds; if a product's not great then manufacturers throw in extra stuff to compensate.
PROS:
- They work
- Small and lightweight
- Power on and connect quickly
CONS:
- Bad, muffled sound quality
- Feel very cheap and flimsy
- You can find better quality earbuds than this for the same price

Girlfriend bought these for me back in May. I use these when I go to the gym and right when I first turned them on I wasn’t impressed with the sound quality. I’ve had cheaper bluetooth headphones that sound way better. But, I kept using them since I didn’t have another pair. I noticed that the range was poor. I couldn’t go past 6 feet without it cutting out. Then during my workout the music would cut out during my workout after awhile. I think it has something todo with the wiring or when I’m drenched in sweat. Not very waterproof I guess. Overall I’d recommend saving your money and buying a cheaper version.

good sound for the price
These work wonderfully, fit nicely and have options for different ear canal size. You can't beat them for the price.

Overall, I'm pleased with these headphones with regards to the quality of the sound and battery life. As I have only owned this product for less than a week, I cannot comment on its longevity. One minor disappointment is the advertised noise cancellation, which is non-existent apart from that which is naturally created by virtue of just having something inserted into the ears.

Nice sound quality, but it literally stopped charging after two weeks.  Sadly, that seems par for the course with this company as my last set made it approximately two months before the same thing happened.  Also, not much of a battery life.

Overall good headphones that function well.  Fit is good and comfortable.  Only issue is wind noise.  Even with very little wind the ear piece design transmits every bit of wind vibration that hits them.  Besides that, these are decent headphones.
For whatever reason, I was unable to charge these headphones after 7 months of using them.  Now, they are useless.  Save your $ and buy elsewhere.
light weight

These are amazing headphones. I use them when I work out on a rowing machine and all I hear is crisp, vibrant music. They produce the best sound I've ever heard through earphones and they block out the noise in the background almost completely. They're lightweight and comfortable and were simple to pair up with my phone. When I bought these from Amazon, they were right at $35 dollars which is considerably below their list price and the price of other similar big name headphones. I've tried the big name headphones just like these and couldn't tell any difference. These appear to be of a similar quality, so if they hold up, I think I will have made an excellent purchase.

Overall I'm very happy with these headphones. I normally find earbuds really uncomfortable in my small ears and these are the most comfortable I've ever worn. I don't use them for running or anything like that so I can't comment on whether they'd fall out but they seem very secure. The sound is clear, they're easy to use, and the case is convenient.
After about the third charge, the receptacle for charging cord dislocated, making it impossible to recharge. Totally useless after less than 10 hours of use.

I love them, sound is good stay on my ears while running or jumping rope... working out or just walking around... would have given them 5 stars especially for the money but the multi-function button is in a bad spot.... I sometimes hit it and shut the headphones off. Will definitely recommend to friends.
Ok I have used them for a while and if I am doing a standing leg stretch or anything where I am bent over and my phone is more than 4 feet away the ear buds cut in and out. If I have it in my pocket it is fine but if I put it down on the ground next to me it cuts in and out. Not sure if I would still recommend them...
Update... inside my gym I can be 20+ feet from my phone and I still have Bluetooth... great buy would highly recommend buying them and will be buying another pair
They have great sound quality, are very comfortable to wear and have a long battery life!

So far this is a very good product.  The only thing that I have had a minor problem with is hitting the button accidentally while trying to adjust the buds in my ear.  But it is ok if I am careful.  I really like the changeable ear clips.  You can mold them around your ears.  Not a one size fits all thing. So that if you ears are unorthodox, you can make it work with this product.  I use them now every time that I go to the gym.  The sound quality is excellent.  I also like the case.  I have a lanyard that I attach to the zipper and I can keep my earbuds attached to my belt so as not to lose them.  This is a solid, well made good quality product.  And the price was very reasonable.  I would recommend them to anyone.

Best headphones I ever owned.. my husband gave me his pair at first and just purchased another.. very good quality for the price and long lasting battery!!
Super simple to use, and great battery life. The cords also do a great job at not getting tangled.
As expected, as discribed, comfortable, great sound

I purchased these earbuds for myself and my girlfriend when I was in a long distance relationship. The sound quality is great, and they've never made my ears sore; however, the mic was nothing to write home about. The sound quality was good enough for talking but definitely not great. We also occasionally experienced some sort of interference while on the phone/Skype. I continued to use them fairly often without issue, but my girlfriend rarely used her pair.

More recently, I've been using them to listen to music while running on the treadmill. They don't give me any issue at paces over about 7:30 min/mi, but when I'm running faster than that, they will quickly slide out of my ears. My sister showed me a pair Beats that she uses when running, and the ear hooks are much more rigid on hers. Although I haven't tried, I imagine the Beats would stay in much better. The Sensos stay in just fine as long as it's low impact, but I imagine you would have issues if you tired to use these for high intensity workouts, such as Crossfit.

If you are looking for a pair of bluetooth headphones to wear around the house while listening to music, I don't think you can go wrong with these. I would give them five stars for music listening and four for Skyping/talking on the phone. Falling out during running is an issue for me though, and I am currently looking for a new pair that won't slide out.

Great fit, high quality sound, fast charging, long lasting battery- I listen for 4-5 hours a day and keep it on standby for the rest and battery keeps going on for more than 2 days! I love them. Still early days but so far so good.

Love this product have had it for so long and it still works like a charm.  Couldn't have bought anything better and cheaper this this product.  In the gym, on the rail, at home or at work this product is good to use.

These are the best!!! The sound is very loud and clear good bass as well. They are light weight and actually stay on my ears without any problems. Would definitely recommend for anyone wanting an excellent sound experience while connecting via bluetooth during activity ie: working out or yardwork.

-lasted well over a year!
-sometimes the exterior facing "plate" of the plastic shells can fall off, but the boards and electronics you see can be easily put back correctly into the piece and the plastic "plate" clipped back on.
-computer on the right, battery on the left
-music quality is definitely a step above cheaper wired earbuds (I listen to extreme metal nonstop.)

almost perfect besides the fact at least once every time i use it, the sounds gets muffled and after an hour or so it really hurts my ears, even with the smaller covers. other then that they are a great pair of earbuds💞

I don't know what I expected I guess because the cost was reasonable I just assumed they would work crappy. Honestly I could not believe how easy these were to install and how well and comfortably they fit around my ears, plus I love that these came with three separate sizes for the ear inserts, not to mention all the little gadgets - like an additional charger for my iPod - fantastic! The truth is I usually don't even like to give reviews unless a product is exceptional and thus far this one is so I will just say don't bother wasting hundreds on the larger name-brand competitors because Senso works perfectly!

I bought these after my Sony headphones were stolen, and these definitely aren't as nice of quality but that's probably expected. They do the job though and I'd probably buy again, especially for the perks they come with. Great headphones. Stay charged a long time. Get really loud. I love rhem

The customer support is excellent, the ear buds fit good(there are three different sizes that come along), a car adapter is included which is great, the volume level is perfect and can be adjusted accordingly. The battery life on this item is great! It lasted for two hours 40 minutes and it is still going. The package says it lasts for eight hours! Be sue to charge it at least 12 hours before using it the first time. The Bluetooth extends for a long distance(30-40ft). I can walk all over the house and stay connected while the cell phone stays in one place.. Pretty sweet. Two thumbs up!
Good product and price.
Sound and quality is great, but they do not fit in my motorcycle helmet due to how far they protrude out your ear, and that’s the only reason I bought them.

It's very great I like it

They don't have the highest quality sound for music, but I did used to wear them in the gym and they were adequate. Now I use them at my desk for Zoom meetings and they are perfect. During meetings I can turn my camera off, get up and go stretch a little, get a cup of tea in the kitchen, stand on the back steps of the building, all without losing the conversation. I've just bought a second pair for my daughter as mine are still going strong after 3 years!
I really thought this was the perfect bluetooth headset for me until it broke in less than 3 months. Perfect fit. Comfortable. Great audio. So disappointed that the earpiece broke apart.
These are the BEST bluetooth head phones! They are everything they say they are.. I wouldnt trade them for anything..

For $35, these Bluetooth earbuds are a decent buy.

PROS:
- Easy to connect to your Bluetooth-enabled mobile device or computer.
- They won't fall out of your ears while running.
- Comfortable to wear.
- No excess noises when running (like footsteps), blocks out noise somewhat well.
- Easy to turn on and off, and change songs / volume / pause music.
- They come with a ton of accessories including charging cable, other earbud inserts, carry case, car charger.

CONS:
- Sound: The main con for me, an avid music listener, is that they don't sound optimal and crisp at first. There is too much muddy bass on these and musician vocals are too low. However, you can fix this! Tweaking some sound options on your phone Equalizer in settings, or using an Equalizer program on your Mac will let you get a great sound out of these. They have potential, but it takes a little work to make it sound nice. But if you're someone who doesn't need perfect-sounding music, then consider these 4/5 star earbuds.
- Apparently the battery life isn't extremely long on these, so just charge them when you go to bed after heavy use. But if you use it for an hour a day, like me, you won't even tell.
- I'm personally not a fan of the 'shape-molding' ear inserts, so I replaced them with the rubber inserts from the AmazonBasics earbuds, perfect fit.

Overall, 3/5 Stars Earbuds

The headphones are easy to charge, easy to pair, and comfortable to use. Their sound quality is okay at best. My very old Asus laptop, my bare-bones Lenovo laptop, and my Nexus 6P phone all have better audio quality than these headphones. The range is not there, and everything seems skewed too much to the high range (no matter what I do with an equalizer the sound is too high and tinny, with anemic low ranges). And the volume control is pretty wild -- either it's rather quiet, or (one click up) deafening. There is no in between.
I use these for listening to music while working out. They stay on my ear (though not always in my ear, even with the correct tips, but that's likely because I'm sweating like a monster), but the sound quality is pretty rough. So they're adequate (barely) for working out, as long as you don't care that the sound quality is rather poor. If you care about actually hearing your music or feeling the beat, these are not for you.
If I could, I'd give them a 2.5/5.
