these earbuds literally have the same sound quality as the powerbeats 3, but senso somewhat sounds a bit better. they last pretty long and charge up pretty fast as well.
been using these for about 2-3 weeks now and i haven't had any issues.
i only use these for my workouts so using these for phone calling/voice calling might not be the best.
Easy to set-up and so far sound is good.  Great for workouts.  Good value for the price.

I love the headphones for listening to music but I've used them a few times on phone calls and the person that I'm talking to says that it sounds like they are in a cave and they can hear an echo of everything they are saying. Pertaining to the listening of music a 5 star rating but for calls 1 star
Excellent sound quality!!!!
great
Stopped working on one side.
Service was fast. Love my headphones and love the 1 year warranty too.  Good job and keep it up!

I love these ear buds! The sound is good for me (not an audiophile). I wear them on walks to help motivate me.
Based on the photo in the User Guide, I thought the "Wire Tie" was larger than in reality. I contacted the seller by email, and got a response the next morning, including photos to describe what it is.
These are OK.  The sound is actually better than the Mifo brand I bought that were a lot more expensive.

Easy to setup, good fit, good audio quality for a non-audiophile.

Minor criticisms:
A: Noise cancellation is not noticeable, not sure if there is anything beyond a snug fit of earbuds.
B: Doesn't work well with the Google assistant if you're not in a very quiet location. Any road or ambient noise ruins the "OK google" experience.

I bought these Senso earphones based on the reviews here to replace a
different brand (Letsfit) I had used. There are several earphones of the same
design on Amazon. I verified by phoning Senso that they all come from the same
factory in China. However, there are some small differences.
I found the volume of the Senso to
be inadequate for me (poor hearing) to use them on a home treadmill; noise canellation was
not evident. Also, the ear hooks are made from a fairly soft material so they are
too floppy and tend to come off easily. Otherwise, the Senso worked fine: decent
sound quality, good battery life.

Great product until it stopped connecting to my phone. I have an iPhone 5c and it was working fine until I charged it, then it stopped. However, the phone connects to my speakers, so I think that it is the headphones. Other than that the sound was great and it cancelled out noise.
Sound quality is real HD, incredibly easy to use! Love the wireless feature as well. Would highly recommend it to everyone especially for the price!

I bought 3 different brands(yet similar looking) Bluetooth headphones. This one lasted the longest. The other 2 died after 6 months to a year, this I have for 1 year and 3 months. BUT, I bought 2 of this, one for me, one for my gf- my gf's died after 3 months. So I guess it is a hit or miss. If it works, it works great. If not, well... Amazon did refund me.

Battery life is around 4-5 hours.

I bought SENSO ActivBuds S-250 for listening to audiobook while exercising. I currently have a Bose Quiet Comfort headphone, and this Senso ActivBuds noise cancellation cannot be compared. On the other hand, the sound is quite good. The earbuds are comfortable and stay in ears quite well. The hook is soft and effective, even while I wear eyeglasses. Pairing is quick and easy.

These have been great so far. I've primarily used them for when I'm in the gym to avoid hanging cords. They do well with (maybe tmi, but a LOT of) sweat, and don't get in the way at all. Very comfortable to boot. Not sure how much continuous usage you'll get (haven't tried it myself yet), but I've yet to have them die on me mid-use, or only plug them in every couple days when I bother to remember.

One caveat is there does seem to be some possibility for interference on the bluetooth connection. There's one corner in my neighborhood where the connection always seems to get spotty, and I can only presume some local phenomenon is causing it, because by the next block it's fine again. Might be a nearby cell tower or some such.
They are great, but battery life is not as described in the website. They don't last more than 4 hours at best.

Buy these+ ONLY if you need them for 3-6 months.  I've had 2 pair to stop working after a few months.  Both pair were well cared for.  Both times I followed the recommendation for factory reset and it doesn't work.  The quality for the price is excellent, with the exception that they don't last. The manufacturer sent me a replacement for the first pair.  I'm not so sure I want to go through this every few months.  Time to look for another brand.
Great sound. Fit well

First, the quality of sound is amazing for the price. Ease of Setup, that's an understatement. The set was fully charged out of the box, I turned on Bluetooth on my phone and connected effortlessly. Great quality of sound, great volume. Mic works great too. They are built with durability too.

And to show how much they believe in their product, you open the cool little case that holds the ear buds and peripherals, you'll find some really good quality charging cables, a car charger that doesn't look like something they got free bit rather very nice quality, and backups plugs sitting on top of a pamphlet that says call this number 24/7 if anything goes wrong. Wow. I got an email shortly after saying the same thing, 1 year warranty. I was blown away. It took my son all of 2 Days to see how happy I was with them before he needed his own set. Cool color options, I got him his own color, because these are mine! 😀
Comfortable, neat, affordable, and super fancy.  I've only had my headphones for a few days but I enjoy them.

It's great for what price I paid!! Comfortable and looks awesome. The sound is very nice but the only con about this product is the battery life as compared to my other wireless Bluetooth headphones. It will work for like continuous 7-10hrs but soon you have to charge them. Overall, I will definitely recommend them.
I’ve learned that I can fast forward or rewind to the next music track

This is the best ear buds I ever bought.  It blocks out  surrounding noise. Easy to use, also comfortable.  I like that it has different size ear piece cover, small, medium and large.  I don't turn it up because it's loud just halfway.
Gave it as a gift and they loved it
Go 4 it

This headset is damn fine for the price.
Good volume, clear and crisp, good bass.

Highly recommend these for those looking for a good pair of wireless headphones.

a lot of my prior headsets became useless (not useless, but harder to connect due to the need of an adaptor), so finding an alternative solution to get headphones connected FAST became a priority. i use this at work to make calls/listen to music and it's been working out great!
They work with my tablet, but I don't know how to get them to work with my laptop. It is likely the laptop's fault not the headphone's fault.
Seem to have good battery life. Bass is a little heavy and sometimes makes the overall sound quality worse.
Sounds great and connects fast and easy.
Love the look and feel of these. Unfortunately the bluetooth lag on these make them only ideal for music listening, not streaming video content.

Got these for my boyfriend who has had 3 pairs of Beats wireless that have broke in the past and didn't want to pay that kind of money again. Very 'look a like' in style and texture and great battery life for the price. Very loud just a little high on the base. With a warrantee included for the price whats not to love. Save your cash from beats and buy these instead!!

Excellent product, especially for the price. I have owned comparable beats by Dre headphones and these are better hands down! 10 month's after purchase I did have an issue where headphones got wet and stopped working. After emailing company i got a response right away and a replacememt pair. The customer service was top notch! I look forward to giving these guys my business in the future.

These are good headphones that are easy to use with an iPhone. My one complaint is that they aren’t aerodynamic. Therefore, when I wear them while running, there’s an irritatingly loud whooshing sound the whole time

Save your money and buy something else! First, they arrived without the 3rd set of ear inserts, second they were missing the wire tie, third the battery showed it was near full when received and dropped to almost zero after 15 mins of use. Fourth, they sound absolutely horrible, sure there is bass but at even a quarter volume they sound like the mids and highs are blowen. I've bought Bluetooth headphones in this price point before from TaoTronics and was blown away by their sound and quality, unfortunately they broke after 6 months and possibly someone stepping on them! Finally, the fit is not good...the over the ear part is almost worthless for me and I have average sized ears.

The best wireless headsets? Not even close. The product is and does as advertised. The out of box experience is first rate. I wear this item when I am working out in the gym. The earbuds are big, heavy and the ear holder thingies wrap around the front of the ear, not the back. As a result, the ear buds are not very secure or snug. The ear buds do not fall out but I find myself constantly pushing them closer to my ear. Some would say that's a good thing. Personally, I like to corkscrew the ear buds in to my noggin' and these just don not allow me to do that.
Just got these.  Easy to pair, feel comfortable and good support. Impressed so far and recommend them even prior to realizing that these offer superior value all round.
Only had them for a short time. So far they are the best heads I've  used. The sound is awesome.

works and sounds great, fast bluetooth connection.
just one problem, the usb connection has failed after a couple of months of use, it will not charge, and now it is useless.
Excellent bang for your buck! I would highly recommend them!

I used these for the first time yesterday and they sound fabulous! I was a little worried because in ear headphones tend to fall out of my ears a lot.  Not these! Finally found a great pair of headphones I can use for lounging around but more importantly, headphones that will stay in my ears while I do my workouts.  I tend to do a lot of HIIT workouts where I am moving a lot, up and down on the ground and lots of high impact.  These don't seem to budge.  So far, totally worth the money.

Excellent phones; great price.  Using them over the phone connection is clear as can be.  Fit well over the ear and are not prone to coming out while exercising. I've tried other headphones that cost twice as much and these are equal to or maybe even better than those I've tested.
"I have purchased 3 of them, my kids and wife love them. My kids have used them for about a year now, and they don't have any complaints."
Comfortable and decent sound for the price. I use them at the gym.
Broke within 2 months and haven’t heard back from customer service regarding replacing it considering it’s STILL under warranty
Bought them for my son who seems to love them. :)
they suck don't last bad deal!
Best wireless headphones ever. The battery life is great.
Very comfortable to wear for running. Sometimes it doesn't sync right away with my cell but it is okay.

Have used several wireless ear buds and usually disappointed with the sound quality.  These are, by far, the best sounding ear buds I have found.  They were out of the box, charged in about 45 minutes, paired and I was off to my first run.  Great, deep sound and the connection with my phone was fantastic.  I even took a call at the end of my run and it was very windy - the person on the line couldn't believe I was using wireless ear buds outside.  I highly recommend.

What can I say, I’m a very picky person when it comes to headsets. I have tried a lot of them, and a lot have been disappointing. Either I can’t hear the caller, or the caller can’t hear me. The sound is to loud, even on a quiet car ride, or I sound muffled. I have tried the stereo inner ear, I have tried the one ear mono, I have tried even the round the neck hanging retractable ear piece headset. Now there are a couple of those I tried that have been good, tolerable, even a nice sound on both ends of the call and when listening to music. So when I went looking for a new pair, when my old one broke, I ran across these and read some of the reviews. They sounded nice, so I decided to try it. Got them, tested them in a few conditions, even went to the store with a call on the line, and normally it would be over powering loud on the other caller’s end that I would have to hand up and call back when I’m in more of a quiet environment. These, they remained quiet. Yes, they heard the background noise, but it was not over powering that they could not hear my voice clearly. As in my end, the sound quality is really good. The earbuds provide a nice noise canceling that I can hear the stereo quality nicely as well as any calls that I may be on. Bottom line, these are a really good pair or headsets and I would recommend them to anyone that is like me, wary on buying headsets because of the sound quality.

Pros:
• Call quality is good. Both on my end and the other caller’s end
• Music quality is great, stereo sound is crisp and can be adjusted well if you have an app installed.
• Great for exercising, the loop fits on your ears nicely to prevent any slippage when you’re working out.
• Charging is quick for those always on the go
Cons:
• Battery life is good, but can be better. After an all-day of listening to music and a few calls, it needs to be recharged. (There are some out there with a good 10-12 hours of usage)

Great for the gym because I can move freely away from my phone and still follow the workout videos I use. I don't like that once it gets close to running out of battery it starts repeating "battery low" every minute until it dies. I had to get different headphones for more every day use, but I'll continue using these for the gym. They're also a little difficult to wear with glasses, but it doesn't bother me too much.

I've had some difficulties getting it to connect smoothly via Bluetooth on my devices. I've found that removing it from my Bluetooth settings and then adding it on again solves the issue but I've had to do it a few times.

I have had these earbuds for a few days.  I was pleased with all of the accessories that came with them  They sinked to my I-Phone instantly and the battery seems to last and last.  I fly for work a lot and am excited to use these during my trips.  The one year warranty is great.  I hope not to use it, but a nice plan to have.  They are comfortable on my ears and the buttons are easy to get to.  I had been shopping for a pair of buds for a long time and reading the other comments made these SENSO Earbuds an easy choice.
I only have a positive things to say and that is that they work beautifully they wrap around my ears and allow me to not have to hold back while exercising.

The fit is great. Over ear pieces are not firm, which I thought would be a problem. They are very soft and mushy which is good because they don't irritate my ears after long wearing time. I have other headphones with the same design and they hurt after a while. The in ear pieces fit well. The weight of the ear units is not noticeable and actually helps keep them in your ears. The usability of the headphones is great. Easy to pair, and very loud. The controls are simple and easy to use. However the sound quality is meh. They are very muddy, they have no high end. I like a bright, crisp sounding headphone that has a lot of upper end. These are lacking in that area. The do have good mid and lowered sound, so vocals and bass is strong. The weight and style are great. Plus all the extras that come with them.

Great fit, amazing accessory bag, still working after a week. Year warranty (that hasn't been tested) if you are reading this just hit "add to cart" if you don't like it give it as gift, price is right.

I workout out with these headphones and my 7 years old son use it also and it’s been a month now and I find sometimes under the couch or on his neck while his asleep and still works and sound like brand new. Who need the apple AirPods when you have this one 🤷‍♀️😍👌

I’ve had them for several weeks now, sound quality is really good the bass is way better than I thought it would be, phone call are clear battery life is a lot better than my LG headphones,the sound quality is as good as my wife’s $200 Beats, I drive a truck so a lot of time they are hanging around my neck, they are not easy to just put on when a phone call comes in, I don’t like that the buttons for the volume and to skip tracks are the same buttons and it won’t back up multiple tracks it will skip multiple tracks though and it’s a pain in the butt to get the dust cover off of the charging port, that’s really all that I can say that I don’t like about them.  If you’re buying them for your work outs you will LOVE them you really get a lot for the money, if you’re buying them to use for phone calls they do the job very good but ease of use is about a 6 out of 10. I give them 5 stars because of the sound quality, that’s ultimately what I bought them for and they are the best sounding headphones you’ll find under $100 I promise you!!!

Primarily used for workouts.  Workout 3 hours a day.  They sound great and only have to charge after every other workout.  Depending on ear canal size you may have trouble getting them to stay put.  However thet included some foam tips that work great for me.

I'm very particular when it comes to sports headphones. I'm a long distance runner and need headphones that will stay put, which means I usually go for the wrap around style. (running for 60+ minutes with earbuds just doesn't work for me)

I recently upgraded to an iPhone 7 and quickly realized that all my headphones won't work with the new phone. I got these bluetooth headphones to try, ran 8+ miles this morning and I couldn't have asked for better headphones. The sound was amazing, they really did block out other noise and most important, they didn't move at ALL! I'm buying a second pair to keep as a spare because when you find something that works like these do, you stock up!

UPDATE 3/1/17 - I'm updating this review because the product went from great to basically trash since my first review. Simply put, the headphones don't hold a charge. For example, after fully charging them, I used them Sunday for 85 minutes and Monday for 50 minutes. I went to turn them on today and they were dead. Completely dead. I barely got 2 hours of use on a full charge - that's really disappointing and wasn't happening when I first starting using the headphones. At this point, I would not recommend these.

The senso headphones are great! The sound is very clear, the distance is pretty far, and the 6 hour charge is amazing! The only thing that would make them perfect is if the part that goes around the ear was a little smaller, or maybe I just need bigger ears. But I would definitely purchase another pair!

If i could give it 4 1/2 stars I would. The sound quality is great and they are light.  I love the case that came with them. Also they include a car adaptor, a short and long charger, which is great!  I have only 2 minor complaints. The rubber  Cable Management Clip, used to adjust the length of the connecting wire, comes off easily. Also, when wearing while doing yard work the buds tend to come out a little too easily.
Excellent headphones. I bought them for my husband and he loves the fit. And I love how great he sounds while I'm talking to him.
Great fit, sound and comfort. Easy operation and setup. Package arrived on time and as shown.
These are great.  So worth it.  Working out just got easier.  Great great product. Highly recommend to anyone wanting a wireless Bluetooth headset for working out.  The price is right.

I purchased these off of the Amazon recommendation, and I should have read more reviews.  My ears are small and these are just too big.  Even after putting in the smallest ear bud, they don't fit well in my ear, the ear loops are way too big and therefore useless, and they are heavy and keep falling out of place.  As a female, with apparently small ears, I just cannot recommend these.
so awesome to be wireless!
The reason of the 2 stars is because I had a defective battery life unit that do not hold charge for stipulated time
work great for the gym. The vol adjuster could use a little tweaking, the volume does not get low enough before muting.
outstanding headphones

We love the clarity of the some and comfort in the ears and it stays in place. Love the product.I purchase 2 more after this purchase.
Unlike other headphones where after some time it starts to hurt the ears.

I misplaced my Beats Bluetooth headphones an d was thinking that the replacement cost would be high. I was pleasantly surprised to find the SENSO headphones that work at least as well as my prior phones at a much lower cost. Even better, the ear pieces are much more comfortable so I am totally pleased with the SENSO unit.
I followed directions. I can listen to music and to downlloaded movies. They fit great! Sound is clear and you hardly feel them. Lightweight.
Clear sound and easy to wear

These are amazing! Worth every penny. Hold a charge for a long time, connect easily to my phone, sound quality is good, come with lots of accessories and different ear pieces, the case is a nice hard case which protects them well.
Great headphones! Easy to connect and good sound quality.

These sound pretty good.  I have owned these headphones for almost 4 years and they have gotten some use. I recently washed them in my HE front loader and they survived! And they still hold a decent charge! I am super impressed and give them my highest recommendation.
I love this headset. I used them for a few months and then they stopped working but Senso customer service was great and they honored the warranty without any hassle and shipped me a new pair.

Great headphones for gym use.  Do not buy these thinking they are noise canceling because that is not the case.  I often hear the music from the gym speakers in the background at times but for the price these are a great thing to have.  It is very nice being able to just tap the right ear bud and pause the music that I'm currently listening to.  This definitely comes in handy when someone is trying to talk to you with your earbuds in.

I needed Bluetooth headphones that were comfortable and ideal for working out in. The ones I have had in the past, although very good, were very uncomfortable behind my ears and I couldn't workout in them because they would fall off. I had also changed jobs where I no longer had my own office but was now in a cubicle on an open floor. So most importantly I needed noise reduction, not cancellation because I still need to hear if my phone rings or someone calls my name. These so far have checked all of my boxes. The quality is really good! Not to mention the battery life. I rarely have to charge this. My only issue is that it can only pair with one device at a time. My other Bluetooth headset can pair with two devices. I have two phones, one personal and one for work so it's a bit inconvenient sometimes that I have to switch it from device to device. That's the only reason so far that I didn't given it all 5 stars. I have and would recommend it to others.

Update: I am disappointed to report that these headphones just stopped charging one day. There is no explanation for it as I put it to charge the same way I always have. So I guess it's not a long term investment. But while it worked it worked very well so I would not change my rating.

Overall amazing product and service. The audio is amazing and the volume at half the max is already loud enough for me, the sound quality is very clear. I use these to work out and being sweat proof they are perfect for the gym or any other indoor or outdoor activities. The price is right on, and they're better than some $100 or $200 Bluetooth headphones that are almost the same as these headphones. This product is worth the money, it is less expensive and as durable for being almost the same headphone as other $100 or $200 headphones. You need to have this if you want better sound, durability, and comfort.

I love the concept & the product, good sound, easy to use. Only one BIG problem - the ear hook would not stay around my ear (ear to small).  So I had to return. Hope they can figure out a way to make the ear hook smaller or something. I'm so disappointed as I really liked them = just couldn't move with them on.
Pretty good headphones ,
Great product and customer service!
Love them! Easy to use and are comfortable on my ears, sounds are terric.

It says WATERPROOF, do not believe it.
I had mine for a couple of months. I little water killed them.

much! much! better then I thought they would be for the price( which is great btw) the sound was crisp and clear with decent amount of bass to them
and pairing was simple and not dropping connections. Quality seems great as well and the delivery was very speedy. Battery life was the stated 8 hours for me. I would absolutely buy them again!!

Received my earbuds yesterday, paired them on my Iphone 7 in under a minute and took thim mountain biking with me. The sound quality while listening to music is great for the price. The sound quality while making a phone call is not the best but then again i was mountain biking! For anyone who is looking for a budget pair of earbuds i definitely recommend these.
I like the headphones, its sound, its price. But I do not like when the sound keeps going up. I have to keep turning them done and they go back up during the same usage.
Bought as a gift. The person really likes these for the gym or working out in the yard.

What a great head set! I'm really enjoying them. There light weight, easy to use,  wear them for hours! Often forgetting I even have them on when the music is off. They focus the music directly into my ears so much so I feel like the orchestra is in the middle of my head! Never experienced that before with normal head sets! The base is fantastic . The voice quality is  superb. Watching a movie I heard people talking off screen! It was so convincing that I turned around thinking there was someone behind me. I'm very pleased. Battery life is great and the indicator on the phone keeps me informed of how much power I still have. Going on 10 hours now and still 3/4 charge. Great packaging love the extras
Great headphones!
great headphones, i would buy again

I've had them for a week and so far so good.  I use them for running on road and it's winter so I usually wear a hat that aids in holding them in place on longer efforts.  They come with multiple buds so you can use the ones that fit best.

I've gone through 4 pairs of earbuds that supposedly were guaranteed not to fall out of your ears. They all did. I finally decided to try these just because they are so inexpensive in comparison.
I'm so glad I did. I've done several runs in these, the longest being 13 miles. They never once fell out or even felt loose. They are comfortable enough that I didn't feel the need to adjust them at any point.
I think the sound quality is great. I have a galaxy s8 and didn't need to adjust anything on the sound settings. I had them down relatively low. I can't imagine ever listening to them at full volume.
The controls are very easy to use (pause, play, ff, rewind, answer and hang up calls). I had no problem pairing them and they immediately connect as soon as I turn them on.
As for battery life, I've never tested them beyond probably about 3 hours, but had no problem with that.
The box comes with several different size ear buds, a wire holder, a dual car charger, a USB port with both micro USB and lightning connectors, and a carry case. I love the case because it's small enough to easily pack away but keeps them protected.
I'll update this review if I find anything to complain about, but so far, I really love these and highly recommend them.
too much bass. connection not so good.

Amazing Sound Quality, For The Price, Don't Go Buy Expensive Priced Ones For The Big Names, I Guarantee These Will Stand Up To The Test of Time and Then Some, Like Mine Have For Less Then $40.00 and Free Fast Shipping Can't Be Beat, I Was Recommended These and I Will Recommend These and Buy More As Well! Fast Free Shipping! Awesome Price! Great Sound, and Quality! Will Recommend! Thank You Again!

While I like the sound quality, batter life, and general usage of these phones, I ultimately have to ding them for being uncomfortable to wear. They annoy and eventually start to hurt both the inside of my ears as well as the top of my ears.
I had ordered these headphone in the past - and they lasted forever.  Ordered them again.

I was impressed with your product. It was attractively packaged and it felt, even smelt like quality. I appreciate that there was also a car charger included for both the device and a cellphone. My only issue is when I jogged, for some odd reason the left side kept coming off of my ear. Other than that I have no other issues with your product. Last but not least the sound quality is amazing! Pairing the device was also easy and quick.

I really have no complaints visit been perfect for me I have now purchased three pairs one for myself and one for each of my teenage boys. They’re comfortable and they sound good and they have different fittings for Different ear Comfortability
Work pretty well and dont get in the way when Im working out. The buds do hurt my ears after a while, but other than that its a great product and a good buy.
I love these. I've bought three pairs for my family. The base and treble rival my Beats at a fifth of the price.

Be warned, they worked great for 6 weeks and then they will not hold a charge.  Eventually no matter how long you leave them charging they just won't power on!  This is really unfortunate as the deign, fit and sound was great for the 6 weeks that they worked.  However, since 6 weeks is after the return period, they are now just an expensive paperweight to add to my fitness items.  I guess because they are not the higher priced headphones, the quality of their construction/durability is subject to "luck of the draw" as I see many people have left positive reviews (which was one the reasons I bought them in the first place).  However, I guess I fell into the group that experiences the problems with the battery/wiring (should have read more of the less pleased reviews).  Please keep all this in mind if you decide to order these headphones!
I was shocked with the quality of the headphones and even more shocked at the awesome custom service from sensor. Highly recommended. Good luck finding better at this price point.

I've had these headphones only about a week but I already love them. I hope that they last. I wear them to the gym all the time. I have only had to charge them when I got them and have got about 4-5 hours out of them already at the gym & no low battery warning. I can also leave my phone in the locker when I shower afterwards and wear them in the shower without worrying that they are being damaged. I am very impressed so far.

The headphones work well enough if you are into indoor workouts, but if you run or bike outdoors, the form factor has such a large front surface area that all you hear is wind resistance.  If you like outdoor workouts, look for something with a much smaller footprint

Wonderful headphones. Every run I have went one with these they performed well and have never fallen out (fyi I have small ears). There have been times where I left them on and threw them in my bag and sometimes while Im on the move a button would accidentally be pressed and they would recall the last person I had a conversation with.

I used them for a couple weeks okay, but then they just stopped holding a charge.

And heck if I know what they are talking about when their directions say "multi-function button" in instructions, there are only two buttons I can find, up and down volume.

I really like these, the sound is great the only thing is when running they start to slip off the ears a little so you have to adjust them. But if I’m not running and just doing some workouts then they work great
3 month life span
Great headphones and cord for 35$. However the wind is quite annoying with these headphones. It whistles if you are facing the wind and can get quite loud. But for 35$ they're great.

These are great! Sound is good the battery life is long and most important to me they are totally comfortable! Mile after mile when I am running they provide music and I barely feel them there. My previous pair was a lot more expensive and was forever falling out or causing pain. These do their job and stay in place! Couldn’t be happier

Very impressed with these earbuds. After receiving them, I got them charged up fully in about 20 minutes and then after a quick pairing it was time to test them out.

The fit is good and the sound is also good. Way better then some cheaper ones I purchased a couple years ago. I did need to adjust the equalizer on the phone to turn the bass down a bit but that was a personal preference.

I completed a decent 90 minute workout and they stayed on the entire time. Jogging, tire flips and some weights. I wear glasses so there is a tiny bit of movement but nothing that interruped my workout.

Overall I would recommend these earbuds.
Bonus points for the extra Iphone charger and Dual car charger.
Great sound and very comfortable in the ear.  Loved that they came with all the extra perks!
Great noise cancelling, good battery life but just stopped staying on for no reason so now they are no good

So far so good! I am extremely happy with my purchase.  I could not commit to a Bluetooth headphone set until my husband was given this as a gift, he raved about it so much and let me try it to test it out and immediately I made my purchase on amazon and received it two days later.  It comes packaged beautifully with a charger and an added iPhone charger also. It has a great case to travel with and the sound quality is excellent for both noise cancelling music and for phone calls.  Even with a hard workout session at the gym I have not experienced any issues with the earbuds falling out or being uncomfortable.  Highly recommend. Also they just notified me there is a 1 year warranty as well.  Amazing bang for your buck. Couldn’t be happier.

Great sounding headphones...the little rubber arch that goes over and behind the ear it's a little too soft and flimsy for me...probably not the high fidelity sound quality from more expensive brands but it's adequate, decent highs and lows and they also do a good job at isolating the noise....and very loud!!! Plus all the extra that comes with it...great value, you can't go wrong! 👍👍 Senso!!

These work find for music but they have a very prounounced echo with phone calls - and that's was the main thing I bought them for.  I've tried them with phone calls numerous times and always have to switch to another mode.  Very disappointing.
SO FAR SO GOOD. COMFORTABLE.
I am very happy i order from this company delivery so fast item perfect i recommended to my friends.Thank you so much

I am not experiencing the symphonic low bass sound quality that I read in other reviews. I have the highs but not the lows. When I put my phone in my back pocket, while connected, my blue tooth connection gets interrupted. I have not experienced this with other blue tooth devices.

I got this for use during my gym workouts and outdoor runs. Worked good for about 2 months, then I noticed spotty connectivity issues when playing music. It would skip beats in even slow playing music quite frequently. Since then it has been consistently getting worse. Now even while walking normally with the phone in my pant's pocket, the connectivity is very poor. The sound would skip for about half a second every now and then. I have tested this with multiple devices and it is the same. Would not recommend this product to a friend. I guess that is why it was so cheap.
Great base great price and comfortable definitely a good buy.
it worked ok but after few weeks, the sound started to break for whatever reason i could not figure out. and it's not about charging or having it far from the source
Super Bluetooth Headphones. Works as advertised.
Nice Headphones, excelente customer service
They work better than expected.  Am able to up the phones added base and these handle it.  I am so happy and for the price they are better than expected.
Perfect fit and can’t complain about the price. Sound is really good.

Excellent earphones. They arrived quickly and they work great. They are somewhat heavy on the bass but I am using them with Napster, which has a great equalizer built in and once I adjusted the bass down, they sound excellent.

Just what I needed for cycling and mowing the lawn.  When riding the bike wind noise can be so bad that you cannot hear other headphones but the good fit eliminated that.  Similar situation when using a riding lawn mower.  These block out enough ambient noise that you can enjoy the programming/music at a reasonable volume.  Comfortable enough that there is no lingering feeling after wearing them like is the case with some.
sounds great and works well. easy to use.
These have a much fuller sound than other bluetooth headphones I've tried, they stay in well while running also.
Awesome sound  Quality highly recommended
My husband loves these headphones. Thank you for such a great product and a reasonable price.
Excellent during my walks for weight loss and exercise. I can listen and keep my hands free.
keeps slipping off my ears...
So far so good, love the sound, people can hear me when talking.  Thanks
Great product!!! 100% recommended!!!
Sound quality is awesome! Comparable to expensive earbud brands. Would definitely recommend.
Love my new earphones! I read the reviews and went for it! I'm so glad I did. The sound is amazing. They are comfortable and very user friendly.
Finally found a set of earphones that actually fit good and have decent battery life... Not real impressed with noise cancelling...
I have had mine for about 2 months and while I was at first really satisfied with the quality, they are no longer syncing with my device.
Love these headphones right of the box. They are nicer then Power Beats I had previously Better sound and accessories for far less money.  BUY THEM. You will love them
All is well

Love these. Very good ear buds. I have used others in the past that suck. I like the attention to detail that Invotek paid to everything from packaging to including a cable and car charger as well.

Are these the greatest sounding not really they are very bass heavy but I still love them for working out.

Overall great product get these now if you are thinking about it!
Gave as a secret santa gift and they loved it!
Better than I thought they would be.
too late to return.

I love these earbuds, I exercise in a pool and they are perfect because they are waterproof. The sound is great and they fit well. This is my second set, the first just stopped working so I contacted SENSO Customer Service and they tried several things to have them work but they failed. I sent it back to Amazon and received a full refund and bought a new set which is working great. Fantastic product and outstanding customer service makes this company worthwhile.

I bought them for a small trip I was taking and I needed them for the flight. They worked great and they were packed away for a couple of months until I needed them again. Now they won't charge. They worked once and that was it. Because of the time in between use, I can't return them. So disappointed.
great device

I love the no cords to get tangled as I work around the house! I also enjoy being able to answer the phone with just a click of the button while listening to a book.  I wish the ear bud portion could be adjusted to point either straight into the ear or slightly to the rear instead of to the front.  I have tried reversing them left on right and right on left but this does not work well.  If I am missing something please let me know as I love everything else.

I loved these headphones and wanted so much to love this company, too! Talking quality for phone calls wasn’t great, but worked like a dream for listening to music. Imagine my disappointment when theu started having a crackly static that showed up every time I used them!! I contacted Senso with hopes they would provide support, and customer service was very responsive with troubleshooting until they determined the problem was actually with the headphones, not with my use of them. Immediately, the customer service department “mysteriously” stopped all communication with me, and refused to provide any offer of repair or replacement—or even a discount for future use! I am so disappointed.
terrible range songs cut out at arms length from my phone or in my pocket I plan on returning

These worked fairly well for my son for about 2 months and then they just fell apart. These are his second pair - we should have learned with the first pair. Don't buy if you want a pair of earbuds that will actually last a while.
Great for the price
Bought these headphones in January and Bluetooth no longer working.  Product description states there is a one year warranty
Great value for the price, I highly recommend it, I like all the goodies that comes with, very handy. Battery life it's been good so far
Work and fit great. Good sound for a pretty good price. I have used them for 2 weeks and haven't had any problems

The molding that is supposed to go behind the ear does not fit snug around the ear to hold the headphones in ace which affects the sound. If you stand still in one place they won't fall out, as soon as you move around I'm constantly having to put them back into place.

Living in a snow belt, I spend a lot of time outside to remove the snow from my driveway, sidewalk and roof.  I use my iPod with the corded earbuds, which I have to thread through my coat with the iPod in my jean's pocket.  At some point, I usually inadvertently snag the cord and have to stop and put it all together again.  Well never again!  The iPod is still in my pocket, but no cord connected to it, and the music sounds phenomenal! The price is real value and it was a snap to pair it with my Bluetooth devices - and I'm not tech savvy.  It's almost a pleasure to go out and shovel - almost😉.
After using 3 month my headphone is turned off after pairing with any device, please advise to solve this problem.
much cheaper material than my prior one.
These didn't last 6 months. Not worth the money.
Absolutely a great value compared to other high priced name brand.  These are perfect for sweaty boxing & gym workouts!

I love these!!  They come with car charger, extra cords, a great carrying case (wish I had the Sense on the plane last night), and extra ear buds.  I'm really impressed.  Charged quickly and the first use was great - if they hold up, they'll be the best value for wireless earphones in our house (2 pair of BackBeats).  My son asked me to order him a pair.
Stay stuck in my ear well and dont jiggle like some brands i've tried.

Good earphones with good sound.
Problem is they didn't work at all after about a month.
I am not sure if I got a bad pair but they never lasted longer than two hours at a time while in the gym. Last time I used them I had just charged them and about 30 minutes into my workout they quit working. Now they won't even turn on. The charging light wont even come on when trying to charge. I would try them out again if the company tried to make it right and send me a different pair to try. If they won't then I would look elsewhere.

I have a hard time getting buds to stay in. Maybe my ears are weird, but these work for me so I have purchased these as replacements. I like the brand. I like that they always include a little surprise extra thing in the package. . I’m am fine with the sound and the price is good.  I accidentally bought two and a good thing too because one set got tangled in my hair and the curved part got straightened out. And it would never hold a curve and fit over my ear again so the pair was useless. I’ve learned my lesson, and won’t do that again, but it is very irritating.
Reliable and nearly indestructible....had beats and they broke TWICE. Price point and quality are superb.
Sound is really great, took a while to get used to the floppy ear hooks but now I use them all the time on my commute to work and when I run or workout

Used these a few times and then they would not connect at the gym (where I need to use them and why I bought them.)  I contacted SENSO and they recommended resetting to factory settings.  I tried it with no luck.  They then said that they would follow up on these "defective" headphones and arrange a replacement pair.  There has been no follow up and no responses to my emails since that promise.  They talked a good customer service story, but apparently do not honor their customer service promises.  This will be my last SENSO purchase.
These are very secure and sound quality is excellent
Great quality and they stay in your ears easily because of the comfortable clips. Comes with a full on car charger for your phone/headphones. Great buy.

My husband got these headphones and he absolutely loves them.  He can walk around the house or outside working on the car and he has great reception.  He also likes that they are noise canceling. He would order again.

I purchased a set 4 + months ago they worked well with music & with my phone batters lasted 3+ hus. only small issue was the cord attaching the head sets needs a clip I work construction and move my hands allot but you get use to them ;I bought another type with no cord connecting the set but they disconnected and shut down allot so I bought another set IPX7 due to how well the first set worked the only thing with these is over and over telling you they are connected

I have only used these twice, and they seem to work just fine.  Took a few minutes to figure out how to get my phone to 'discover' the earphones, and the controls are very small, but once you get used to them, they seem to work just fine.
Great, I bought some wireless Bluetooth earbuds for three times the price and they were crap. These for under $40 are awesome.
Here's a crazy idea: make a version WITHOUT a MIC. Whenever I am running outside or riding a bike all I hear is the static from the wind.

I want to know how these got such a raving review!!??? I bought 2 pairs, and BOTH stopped working after 2-3 months.  Both pairs!!!!!  How have I somehow managed to attain the only two pairs of garbage, while everyone else received the best headphones imaginable.  Not happy.  Really not happy.
great headphones!  Takes a little time to get comfortable ear placement. Sound quality excellent, comes with a case different ear pieces for ear comfort.

Update: the company quickly responded and immediately rectified the problem. They are a reputable company and their customer service is OUTSTANDING! Don’t hesitate to get these well priced headphones. I previously owned Bose headphones which cost 3x what these cost. When I had a problem, they did not resolve it.

I bought these headphones a little over 1 ‘month ago based on the great reviews. The headphones have stopped working and it looks like they are melting at the connection point were they charge.
I have used these for a few days now, great sounding ear buds,  can't really comment on the battery life , as I am still on the first charge!

My daughter has the name brand that starts with a "B".  She cannot believe thati paid about a 1/4 of what she paid for what she called as good or better sound.  Great base, great battery life, I can go 25 to 30 foot before loosing touch.  Awesome 🎧 headphones.!
I love it!  Sounds great, ear hooks soft and comfi.
It is not comfortable to wear..it keeps falling off. I have tried several sizes, it all keeps falling off.
Bot these in February and they have stopped working and will not charge. Used outdoors and in occasional light rain they worked intermittently till giving up the ghost. Won't buy again
Comfortable and just as advertised!!
Good sound and fit but not enough low volume control with iPhone 7. Lowest volume is still pretty loud and I wish it could go lower...

I like everything about these ear buds comfort,sound and the battery life is the longest I’ve ever had. They last 10 hrs or more. I listen to books on my kindle. I would recommend this item to anyone. This is my 2nd pair they have a great warranty so if something happens they replace them.

Used it a handful of times and threw it to a corner.... never to be used again. Sound quality is lower than any $5 set of earbuds I have used before. Doesnt sit well in the ears and is not as comfortable as some users are claiming. This review is based on the pisted price of $35.0

Move over Beats! There is a new Bluetooth Headphone in town!!

Holy smokes, for the price and quality these are FANTASTIC!! Bought them first for my husband. He loved them so much we bought two pairs for my kids. They loved them so much we then bought a pair for my mom for Mother’s Day!!

Buy them for yourself or buy them
As a gift, you cannot go wrong!
I use these for running, work great; no bouncing and haven't come loose once. Also very easy to change volume and tracks just by reaching up to my ear for the button, great product!
Horribly uncomfortable design, buttons are unsecured and rattle while you run

I have had these wireless Bluetooth ear buds for 2 weeks now and they have very crisp, clear, louder than most for sound. The only thing so far that I find disappointing is the distance range that they lack; it seems less than 20ft from where my phone is set down. It is a little bit of a inconvenience if I need to walk 21 ft from my phone, the buds will beep out and "hibernate" until I walk over to my phone and hit the play button again, they will not automatically play again until this is done. Otherwise they are very comfortable to wear and do not fall out of my ears like most do (even my bose for high impact sports & runners fall out) when I am doing high activities such as running, jumping, etc.
Fairly happy. I alway push the bottom on the right earphone on accident when I'm putting them in my ear and I wish there were a few more varieties and sizes for the ear cover things
I am very pleased with my headphones.. The price was very reasonable and the company I bought them from has excellent customer service follow up. I highly recommend using this company

Broke in 2 days. Won't sync and won't play music.
Quality is not worth the 40 dollars it's on sale for either.
Too bad, I was actually needing a sporty bluetooth head phone :/

The ear buds are so comfortable, stay in easily and sound quality is great! I've had mine a over a year..love them. Battery lasts forever, now wear or quality issues. Bought a pair for a gift.bgreat product!

The SENSO Bluetooth Headphone is a great value. The unit pairs easily with cell phones, computers, and other Bluetooth devices. The sound quality however appears to be to the base side. There is plenty of volume and the sound is very clear. There were no dropouts as far away as 30 feet with no walls in between. Wearing comfort is better then most units of this type. It comes with a variety of headphone tips to fit big and small ear canals. They are made of a soft rubber material that conforms to your ear canal in a very comfortable manor.
The controls for volume, phone, track ahead or behind, and on off, are easily accessible on the right headphone. The phone functions appears to be adequate under most conditions.
I haven't had a chance to run the unit at length to determine run time before battery recharge. I have used it probably 3 hours at one time and it still appeared to have charge left. Other then the sound being somewhat to the base side, the unit operates well, is comfortable, and clear sounding.
I would recommend this unit to a friend.

For the price,  these are a really good pair of headphones.  I work out in these regularly and the stay put in my ears really well.  They stay in place better than some of the more expensive brands.  I would recommend these to anyone.  I am also getting better than 8 hrs of battery life.

I have only had these a couple days but so far they work great. I am very pleased and would love to rate them again later because I have had several similar items(other brands) that didn't last very well. These seem very well made. Great for working out and will be great for mowing grass (and cancelling the noise!)

I bought these headphones to replace a pair of Taotronic earbuds I had lost. First off the sound quality was less than I hoped it would be, but by no means bad. With such high reviews I just expected a little more.

I've owned three different sets of bluetooth headphones/earbuds and I have to say these were the worst at keeping a signal. For example I used to be able to leave my phone in my room and roam the house with very few places where I would lose signal, and these could barely make it to the hallway, let alone say the kitchen. But the real kicker was the first time I took them out on a workout. If I put my phone in my left pocket while wearing these, just moving my leg would be enough for the signal to cut in and out.

Now with those complaints, why give it three stars even? Well, if I was playing by "its" rules, as in keeping the phone in areas closer, or in the opposite pocket, they worked just fine. Not really any complaints. But it has gotten to the point where it's just enough of an annoyance I am looking into other brands.

Reasons for my rating:
- Great sound quality
- Quick charge
- Good packaging
- High quality Bluetooth headphones for the price
- Easy to use

One issue:
- ear piece is quite light, not always stationary
I've used them twice and the second time it plays about 10 seconds, double beeps and loses connection with my iPhone 7 right next to me. Terrible! Wasted my money!

The first pair I bought started out great, then the charge port ot messed up and would not allow me to charge them. I bought another pair
with intentions of returning the first pair, and ended up gving them to my daughter for her birthday. So, I then bought another pair and
after a month, the charging port is falling apart, and I am having a hard time charging them. Beside the faulty charging port, I just love them to death. If you send me a return label I will send both pair back for a replacement pair.
Julie Spradling
636 399 0892

I've been using these for weeks now, music and video sound great. Using the medium sized earbuds, they hurt a bit coming out after extended use, but much more comfortable than the other 3 options. Would buy again!

First pair stopped charging within 5 months. Sebastian at Senso as many ppl have mentioned in their reviews was great and they replaced the unit after weeks of waiting. Those burned while charging. I thought it was my wife who was cooking on the stove  too close to them.. assuming it could have been human error I ordered them again because you can’t beat the sound volume and charge time for 20 bucks. This new pair lasted one charge that they came with and then one more charge at home. As soon as the battery was dying I charged them again and when I went to use them again they had not charged nor could not be charged. Completely dead. Tried everything. I contacted amazon who listened to my experience and are shipping me a new pair overnight even though I’m passed the 30 day return and I told them that Senso take weeks to replace them.... i get it... 20 bucks or so is not that much and so we can only expect so much, but now every pair so far has stopped working well within the first 6 months... it would be better to just advertise them as the 20 buck Bluetooth headphones - you will most likely get your 20 bucks worth.... it’s crazy how many they have sold and how many reviews there are .... I assumed that so many positive reviews and qtys sold they would work and would be happy to buy a pair annually as I use them for the peloton only... it’s a sad world that all this fancy marketing and the amazon algorithm creates false value. They are just junk guys.... so what’s the answer? Spend 50 bucks, spend 70 bucks or spend 150 to 200 and get a branded name to which there are too many to list.... I don’t want to damage my AirPod pros or lose them while riding outdoors but will a pair that costs somewhere in the middle last longer than these ones? In the end rather attempt to find out with a slightly more expensive pair than this because as much as I want to see these work on the 4th pair something tells me they won’t.... you get what you pay for.... simple as that....
Very comfortable and they stay in. Sound is very good. I have Bose Soundsport and they don’t stay in as well as these. I would highly recommend, especially for the price I paid for these.
Lasted two months. One earphone stopped working.
Great sound great fit and great price.  Very easy to pair. Highly recommend and seller was very helpful.

This product is best money you will ever spend in your life.
Pros
1.comfort is best in class
2.quality is top notch
3.sound is very good
4. Pairing is easy and fast
5.battery life is very good and range is very decent .

Cons
1.distance of range could be better
2.the pause button can be accidentally touched ,however not a real problem
3.charge time is a little slow .

Bottom line run ..dont walk to amazon n get this product ...it puts beats and any other $100+ earbud to shame ...
Amazing headphones! I've never used bluetooth headphones before and these were terrific for running.

The headphones work very well, are comfortable and just as advertised. After a few months, they stopped working and customer support was excellent: first with suggestions on rebooting, and when that didn't work, replacement headphones sent out instantly, all with very quick email response. The product and customer support were both admirable.
Gift for my wife. She loves it.
They have good sound quality.  So far so good.

I used these almost daily for about 3 weeks until they stopped working. They would not turn on which is an apparent issue. I did enjoy them when did they work. I am a sad panda because I am unable to return the now unworkable pair back to the seller to get my money back for such a defective item. Grr.

the design is great. they stay on my ears and feel very light. the sound quality is very poor, however. very tinny, and the bass rattles in your ears like old speakers in a car. i expected a little better for $36 headphones. i can only really listen to podcasts or audiobooks with these, the music sound is just too aggravating.
I liked these very much for the year i had them and they worked properly.. Now they will not connect to blue tooth on my phone or any device.

when I first threw these on I realized they weren't going to fit my left ear (stage one microtia on my left ear ) but I threw on the large ear bud /eartip and just wrapped the ear hook a little farther back and it works better then the one for the right ear :) (you get three ear tips small, medium and large). I went from upset because of my funny ear to ecstatic because in the end it all worked out and the sound is great.  I'm able to run with them on and the sound is great. I'm listening to Paula Temple at Berghain which has a lot of bass and it sounds really awesome. Im not worried that one of these will fall out since they are connected by a wire. I'm very satisfied with this purchase, coolest toy I've gotten this year so far. Thank you for making a great product :)

Reviews were not so good on more expensive brands. Reviews were great on Senso wireless earbuds. Senso was less than 40$. Beats were 200$. Thought I would give Senso a try. Ordered on amazon. Two days later I was enjoying my new earbuds. I like them a lot. Good sound. Easy to set up. Works great with iPhone or iPod. May order another for spare. Would highly recommend.

Bought these for my college daughter. She LOVES them. She runs on the treadmill - or other equipment at the gym. Her phone doesn't have to be on her and the headphones pick up her music great and the sound is awesome. They stay on her ears, she doesn't mind the wrap around the ear, because it keeps them in place. I'm going to have to get myself some!
The Bluetooth connectivity was absolutely terrible I had to hold my phone no more than 2 feet away from the headphones if I even attempted to put my phone in my pocket I lost connection completely

Purchased these in headphones 8 months ago (3/8/17). Have logged hundreds of miles of pavement and trails with these in my ears. Great sound quality for all music types, as well as podcasts and audio books. Never had any issues with battery life.  With 20 mile training weeks, I get a few weeks of time per charge. Once the battery life beeping starts, you have less than a mile before they shut off. I always ensure a full charge before a big race in preparation for my uninterrupted motivational needs.

Unfortunately the unit I received must be defective compared to the other glowing reviews - there is some noise in the left earbud and the people I call say I sound "far away" or "in a fog" -  even after I made adjustments to the volume control on both the bluetooth earbud and my iPhone 6+.  Sadly the clarity is just not there.
The sound is great.
Good product for the price.
Volume buttons broke within 4 months. Should be still under warranty. Hope company provides free replacement.

Not bad, but feels a bit bulky. I was actually expecting the wire that connects to two earbuds together to be round but instead it was flat because I brought another brand that had the flat wiring but eventually lost sound to one bud due to the flat wire being easily bent at the connection point of the earbuds when I work out. But other that it's not bad because they came with many extras like a magnetic phone holder for your car and a credit card holder sleeve for your phone too. Fingers crossed that this headphones with the same type of flat connecting wires will hold up for my daily gym use.

Incredible headphones, especially for active people. I use these at the gym and on my runs (lasting over an hour) and they don't slip or come loose. Their sturdy but very comfortable to wear, Bluetooth that easily pairs, and they have as good or better sound as any headphones I've tried. Great Buy!

This is the third headset by this manufacturer/ brand/ model that I have purchased and it keeps getting better!!! The sound quality is amazing, the receiving quality on the other end is great , and the latest headset allows me to form the earpiece around my ear in lieu of it having a set shape. So, it becomes customized to my ear. Battery will last the day.

I listen to a lot of music at work and audiobooks/ YouTube videos in addition to phone calls. You must recharge the battery daily.

Bottom line, the best $30 wireless headphones I have purchased (because I have either lost or my kids have eaten the others!)
These work well and the controls are simple and responsive.  Very pleased with purchase

Muddy sound and a volume level that goes from nothing to high instantly. The sound these headphones produced is far from "HD". I listen to indie rock, electronica, the standards, jazz, etc... all sounded muffled and heavy. A number of reviews said these were a much better buy than Beats. Well, I've never owned a pair of Beats headphones but just about everybody knows you buy Beats as a fashion accessory to wear around your neck and not for superior sound. So that's a bad comparison to make.

The only positives of these headphones is the design which is perfect if you run, jog or whatever excercise/cardio you do that involves a lot of body movement - they will stay in place. Headphones with the controls on one side of the cords tend to jostle around.

The quality of the materials is very good as well as the packaging. But in the end, if your headphones sound horrible, then it doesn't matter how good everything else is. I ended up going with a $15 pair that may have a more hollow sound but at least it's tolerable.

I had a pair of $150 beats headphones that these look like and the Senso headphones are really good and well priced alternative. I did have and issue with the battery. Fortunately they got back to me quickly about it and are sending out a replacement.
These headphones are just what I need.  When I workout at the gym, what I need is a headphone that doesn't damage when I sweat.  I'm looking forward to experience this today.
I love these! They connect immediately everyday and fit great!

+Good battery life
+Perfect for small ears
+Stays in my ears during long runs
+Good sound really cancels out sound!
The only negative was that I would hear the wind blowing against my headphones on windy days. Other than that they are great.

I needed a pair of inexpensive waterproof Bluetooth buds so I could listen to music in my hot tub and hear the music over the jets and not aggregate my neighbors with my choices of music late at night.  These are perfect and will serve my needs. Sound quality is very good, obviously not like my Bose headphones, but my Bose can not accompany me in the hot tub.  Ccol additional goodies that came with,  3 pair of ear tips so you get that perfect fit, obviously the charging usb cord, since little carrying case, a wire tie, a cellphone card wallet and last but not least a magnetic cellphone car vent mount.  I’m actually really impressed with the sound quality of these headphones  at this extremely reasonable price!

These headphones will not hold a charge after a handful of weeks.  First 2 weeks, they would hold a charge for about 5 -6 hours of use.  Thereafter, the charge quickly dropped to about 2.5 hours.  Only 6 weeks after purchase, they will not hold a charge.
Poor sound quality. Bulky and uncomfortable. Not what I expected from the reviews.

Buds are comfortable and have great sound.
They are a little bulkier than I thought they would be, but they're light.
With the exception of my ear-covering headphones, these are by far the best headphones I've owned.
Good sound and grips the ears really well when I’m working out or doing projects around the house
Love them but the mic is not as clear and echos a little.
Love the product and works as advertised.  Customer service is prompt, professional, and very helpful!

Only used them twice and very happy with these headphones. Great sound, easy to use, more functions than you'd expect from headphones, fit perfectly, I can't imagine that I'll have any complaints in the next few years.
OK

Not understanding all the positive reviews. I wanted to like these so much and the sound quality is great and they fit great too!  But I cannot even put my phone in my back pocket without the Bluetooth cutting in and out. And I know it is the headphones because I connected to previous headphones just fine and other items like a speaker.
Running on treadmill they do not skip like other headphones.
I received unit yesterday. ON-OFF button stop working same day. Bad product

These are awesome. The sound quality and battery life are excellent for a value-priced pair of buds. I work out with them daily (and sweat all over them) and still never have a problem. Will absolutely own a second pair for the gym versus home workouts.
returned it
headphones wont turn on any more. I only had them for 3 months.
These wireless headphones with mic are great.  They're great for listening music or podcast.  They are also very  good for use one conference calls, the mic is much better than others I've used.
Battery lasts for hours and the sound quality is great.  I've worn them in the rain on long runs and still work great.

Just opened these and will let you know more once I use them at the gym. The sound seems reasonable for what they are.  Comes with two different chargers, 3 different size earbuds, well written instructions, and a Nice carrying case.  Super easy to pair with the phone.

I just received my ear buds and have used them for a couple of days and I'am very pleased so far. It came in a beautiful package and I love the ease of use and the water resistance of them. Thank you!

These headphones are AWEFUL! These headphones are a total gimmick. They give you a lot of accessories to distract you from the overall poor quality. First, the sound quality is awful so they compensate with extra base. Second, none of the ear bud sizes fit. Third, the over ear loops were so big and awkward they didn't even touch my ears or prevent the head phones from falling out. Fourth and finally, they broke in less than a week! Getting these headphones was a waste of time.
Great price. The sound quality is pretty good.  Haven't had any trouble with the battery life. Use them when walking/exercising or working in the yard.  Would buy them again.

Got these on a humbug and they turned out to be excellent. Fit great in my ear, and I have owned expensive Jaybird's and all. I'm definitely feeling these!

After a brief learning curve I was pleasantly surprised and the quality and output of these speakers. I will give them a test by working out but can see they are pretty damn great. More than likely would give them out as a nice gift.

It's currently September 2019, I bought these in November 2018. I bought these to use at the gym and running. They still work amazing after using it everyday and holds up to sweating. Haven't loss any quality in sound and hardware. The earphones stay in my ear without having to adjust. The battery works great. I work out for an hour and I can use these for 5-6 consecutive days in the gym. Since I use it only for this purpose, it's a great product for me and for the price. For relaxing, I prefer wired earphones because of the amazing quality that you just can't beat. Hope this helps someone.
I've had these for a year now. They still work great and hold the charge for about two days. Other wireless headphones I owned in this price range died within 3-6 months. Highly recommend these!

Just completed my first run with these and they worked flawlessly!  The sound is a bit bass heavy but throwing the iOS "flat" EQ on cleaned up my rock tracks nicely.  They don't really hold a candle to my Shure ES215s but for wireless sports headphones at this price I really can't complain.  If you're used to running with 215s you won't really notice a huge difference in sound while running...and if you do...run harder :D

Sound, price, customer service and comfort are awesome. My wife has a set of beats that cost 4 times as much and she is always trying to steal mine. My first pair had connection issues. Customer service tried to help fix the problem and when that didn't work I had a new pair delivered two days later!!

I bought my first pair and they were ok. Paired with macbook pro and iphone just fine. Calls were terrible as described by others, the people on the other end of the phone couldn't hear me at all, so do not use these for calls. Then after a bit the left earbud started buzzing. It was a constant buzzing that was super annoying. I contacted the seller and they were nice and sent me a free replacement. After a few months the right earbud started being super quiet compared to the left. I tried factory resetting it and unpairing and repairing and also fully charging several times. No change. These are just horrible quality earbuds. If you want to get these cheap ones, there are much cheaper options around $10. But just get something nicer or name brand. THESE ARE HORRIBLE

This ise my first wireless earphone. Seems to be a pretty good wireless earphone at this price. Sound quality is at par but could have been better. It does a pretty good job at noise cancellation. Yet to test the battery backup. Overall a satisfying buy.

Great pair of headphones. Setup was very easy. The extras that came with it went great. Unfortunately I didn't get the wire tie in the Box so I'll need to reach out on that. But I would highly recommend
I thought I loved it, until it stopped working six months after purchase.
I got these as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves them! They have good sound quality, charge quickly, and the soft ear pieces are awesome.

Awesome product!
Excellent while running long distance - very comfortable, light weight, and these have incredible sound quality.
very pleased with this purchase.

As a Bose Snob, I have to say I am so happy with my Senso wireless headphones, I just bought a pair for my husband and a second pair for me. I finally went wireless when I discovered the iPhone 6 jack has a problem so that my $200 Bose, noise cancelling headphones had a lot of static noise and didn't work on the right ear. I love that Senso lasts eight hours as I listen to White Noise or sleep music all night long to block out my hubby's snoring.  But, it only takes 90 minutes to fully recharge.  It's also easier to exercise with as the wire doesn't get caught up and I can put my phone in the pack when I ride my bike vs my pocket where it occasionally falls out.  Senso is also inexpensive enough to buy more than one pair so while one pair is charging I have another pair ready to go for my early morning exercise sessions. Next generation: waterproof for swimming please and a bit more noise canceling.

I had reviewed these head phones probably after having them a few weeks but by the 3rd month i had to have them replaced becaus they wouldn't hold a charge. Headphones are pretty good. Sound quality is great, they don't tangle and they fit comfortably. Only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because I never know how much battery life I have left. I wish when you either turned it off or on the voice would inform you. Otherwise I love them.

I bought these just for the gym thinking if these cheap headphones break soon, no big deal. I have had these for some time, the quality is surprisingly great. Cant believe that for 25 bucks I god such good quality. awesome case, looks like a very expensive pair of head phones. Again I'm was blown away by the sound quality. will definitely buy these as presents.

I'm really impressed with the quality of my new Senso Bluetooth earbuds.  I use mine for working out and the music quality is crisp and clear.  The ear loops keep them in place and the different tips make for a comfortable fit for me.  The buttons on top are small but I set mine up and use my watch to control songs and volume so that's not a concern for me.  I noticed Senso has another model with a larger red multi function button which you might consider if this is a concern for you.  I love the carrying case that I can slip in my gym bag and protect my earbuds when I carry them.  Also appreciate getting two charging cords and a car charger.  My friend told me he uses his Senso earbuds for running marathons because the battery doesn't die.  The only thing I wonder about is the rubber cover over the charging port.  It seems a bit flimsy and I wonder how it will hold up.  I'm very happy with my purchase.  I never expected this quality for the price.
Decent earbuds but unfortunately won’t stay connected to my Apple Watch Series 1, especially in the gym where there’s lots of other people using Bluetooth in close proximity. Returning.

OK.  So I have used another company for wireless headphones that is popular on Amazon.  The other brand seemed to break most of the time.  I would contact the company and they would replace the product. Their customer service department is great and always makes sure the customer is happy. I do applaud them for that.  It seemed strange that this seemed like a normal cycle for that company.  I even wrote an email to the company asking why their products fail most of the time.  After the last wireless earphone break I decided to go another route.  I love to run and needed dependable headphones that would not die on me while on a trail. The SENSO earbuds had good reviews and fit my needs.  They are wireless and do nat have the control hanging on a cord which is important for comfort.  The flexibility of SENSO buds is great too.  The only minor downside is the bass is high and there is some wind noise.  I corrected this by just going up a size with ear pieces.  Now the bad part....I wanted to go for a run yesterday.  I get ready to go and wham, headphones will not turn on.  I made sure they were charged (which they were) and tried again.  The headphones would not cooperate.  I am very frustrated at the level of quality of the headphones.  I thought I had a winner and I had invested in a good product until yesterday.  I will be contacting the company in the hope that this can be remedied.

I have tried all types of headphones to workout in. Some are too heavy and fall out of ear while running and some are horrible in sound. This is the first time I purchased this brand but so far am satisfied with the feel, the weight, and the sound. Fits snug in the ears for cardio workouts and that is what I was really looking for, along with quality of sound.
Very affordable for the sound

until until I connected to a mobile network​. That's definitely a technology issue, and definitely not an issue with this product!!!

For the price, these headphones are great. Good sound, sweat proof and are perfect for accompanying me on a run or at the gym. I would have given them a 5 if it weren't for a couple of things. The loops on the ear are a bit too tall for my smaller ears, so I wish they could be adjusted in some way, as well as smaller ear buds. They do come with different sizes, but I have really small ears, so I struggle with most headphones. This is not a knock on the brand at all. The other thing is that after about 7 months of use, the left earbud went out. Normally, this would be very frustrating, but I used these bad boys hundreds of hours, and abused them. Like, I would just wad them up and throw them in a pocket or bag, so I would expect even the best headphones to make it through that. But where they absolutely receive a 5-star rating is their customer service. These headphones are covered under a 1-year warranty. I told them that the left headphone went out, and they first tried to help me fix the problem myself, but after that didn't work they replaced them no questions asked. So, if you need some good workout headphones, you won't find a better product for the price, and I've tried more than a dozen different headphone (both bluetooth and not, over the ear and in ear) and these were by far the best for the money.
Great headphones and great customer service!
I could not believe the symphonic quality I am getting from these SENSO Bluetooth Headphones.  It is truly amazing.  Thank you SENSO

I love these!!!! I am big into running, and I've bought numerous ear phones. I've tossed earphones that have been cheap and stopped charging, or they continued to fall out of my ears during runs.

The biggest issue is finding earphones that STAY in your ears during runs. These stay and I don't even notice that they are there. If you're a runner, or you casually workout or just need something for the yard then these are a must have. You can't beat the price and the quality of sound they produce!
