These are great headphones. Battery lasts a long time and the sound quality is great. My favorite thing, however, about having bought these earphones is the wonderful customer service I received. My headphones recently stopped working very suddenly. One night they worked great. I plugged them in and the next day they wouldn't power on. I contacted the company. They gave me some troubleshooting tips, which I tried. When those didn't work I contacted them again and without any further questions they mailed me a new pair! They just needed my order #. It was so effortless and they stand behind their products and that 1 year warranty. Very pleased.
I bought one of this for working out. It is amazing! Sounds good and sweat proof. I decided to buy one for my brother! The customer service was excellent! I would recommend this to my friends!

Everything else about these is pretty great, but the Bluetooth range is so poor that it just ruins the experience. It’s obvious that the Bluetooth antenna is in the right earbud, because if my phone is in my left pocket, the sound constantly stutters and cuts out. Putting the phone in my right pocket fixes the issue. But, I wear my Apple Watch on my left wrist, and so the same problem occurs when streaming from my watch. Putting my left hand on my right shoulder fixed the issue, though that somewhat limits my ability to do anything but stand around. Oh, one other thing: the case is nice and compact, but not roomy enough to prevent the earbuds from turning on if the case gets a little squished in a packet or a bag. Funny thing, the same button that turns them on redials the last number called. Can lead to surprises.
Excellent sound. Very easy to use. My husband and I both have a pair
Still working six months later (I am usually very hard on these). Pairs reliably with Nexus, but can't get them to pair with iPhone no matter what I do, though.

This is a shame.  The headphones have great performance but because of the design of the cable they constantly catch and the likelihood of them falling off if you have them around your neck is very high.  I would love to find this product with just one side so the uncomfortable cable around the neck was gone.
Not a good product. It went bad after one week
love them, worth the price.

I love these headphones.  Great sound for a great price.[[ASIN:B01G8JO5F2 SENSO Bluetooth Headphones, Best Wireless Sports Earphones w/ Mic IPX7 Waterproof HD Stereo Sweatproof Earbuds for Gym Running Workout 8 Hour Battery Noise Cancelling Headsets]]

These are fantastic. The door to the charging port is a little difficult to open. But other than that these are a great pair of headphones. I bought these as a gift for my bf who has the iphone that doesn't have headphone jacks, so these were perfect.
Doesn't stay connected when in my pocket.  Worthless Worthless Worthless
These don't work worth a darn!.  If I have the phone in my pocket they wont connect or stay connected.  Not worth the money.
Bought them for the Mrs. and she loves them!  No more cord getting tangled when she is out jogging!

I have been trying different headphones and got mostly disappointed, but these headphones are great! They are my favorite so far! Good sound quality and they stay in place even if I jump a lot during my workouts! Love them!

These are not good.  I received these for christmas, 2017 and the wind noise is horrible.  When jogging, the wind noise is so loud, I can hardly hear my podcasts.  And its not windy outside, this noise is coming from me jogging, and I'm not that fast.  I have tired every ear piece that comes with it and no change.  I contacted Invotek via phone and they suggested triying the other ear pieces, which I had done.  I then contacted them via email and they told me how to reset the system, as they thought the mic was stuck on.  No change.  Im going back to my corded headphones and will return these for a refund.  I had liked the price point on these but will have to spend time researching another brand.
these sound great and are real comfortable
Great sounds lightweight

I bought these to replace my TaoTronics bluetooth headphones. These headphones have a much more comfortable fit than the previous ones. Plus, the bass and treble are a lot more crisp.  I also enjoy the feature that the headphones will tell you once you turn them on or off. These are great headphones for the gym.

I have been using them for about 6 months and they are Awesome!!! They stay in place. The control buttons are easy to find and manipulate. I get very little wind whistling when hiking. The wind has to be blowing quite hard. Very comfortable to wear for many hours at a time. The play time is right at 8 hours as advertised.
Very pleased with them!
They were uncomfortable for me and they lost reception as soon as my phone went into my pocket or I walked less than 10 feet away.
I really love these headphones...such a great sound coming from a small package!

Haven’t used the headphones extensively but I’m very pleased with the quality and sound so far. They fit snuggly and comfortably and do block out much of the background noise. A different set of earbud I had didn’t do this so it was a little strange at first but it definitely helps the overall sound quality.
Feel really nice on your ears. Work great so far. Charge up pretty fast. Hope they last. No packing slip in the box though.
They have the best sound I have found in a Bluetooth headphone; but they don’t stay in my ears. I appears the piece that goes around the ear doesn’t work for all shapes and sizes of ears.

I read the reviews on these and decided to try them out. Seriously, for the price? I couldn’t have been more pleasantly surprised when I tried them! My husband has Apple EarPods and neither of us can tell any real difference between the two. Of course, these are larger and a different shape, but for over $100. difference, these are amazing. I travel a lot, and the sound from these are amazing, and surprisingly, pretty comfortable even after falling asleep on a plane. They stay in, and when I’m working out, I won’t lose them. Great buy!!
Like the other reviews, the sound is amazing. From the moment I put them on, I  wore them comfortably for 4 hours. I can't imagine finding better quality for this price
Great quality and durability. charges fast and stays on.
the battery life is really good and they are comfortable.
Pretty good. Mic doesn't work that well.

The best review I can give this product is to recommend it to friends and family. After owning the earbuds for two weeks I bought a pair for my sister and father. I have recommended it to all my friends and acquaintances, many of whom now happily own the product. The best aspects of the product are as follows:

Sound quality is above that of other work out head phones I've tried
Fits snugly on the ear so that you can run with them, yet comfortable
Noise cancelling, such that I can hear my music on a loud plane without turning the volume all the way up
Long lasting battery life
Connects immediately to my devices when I power on, remembers the last two devices used

And besides all this, the customer service from Senso has been exceptional. Email correspondence is quick, and they seem to care deeply about my satisfaction with the product.

Positives: Great range and battery life. I charge them briefly before heading to the gym and they've yet to die on me after a month of use.

Negatives: The part that wraps around the ear is not sturdy. If the buds don't fit your ear, the wraps do little to help. Also, the red button on the right earpiece is a small issue for me. Pressing once pauses playback, pressing twice calls your previous call. I've accidentally called people numerous times because of this feature.

Overall, I'd recommend this product.

I love these headphones, Great sound very comfortable I love accessories. The dual port charging cable, the carrying case and the dual port car charger. I have the same style in the Beats by Dre, after using the SENSO I gave the Beats to my daughter.

I gave the cm Senso headphones to my niece and her initial reaction was very positive.  She has only used them for a week, so I cannot comment on the long term.  That said, initial reaction was very positive

I'm extremely happy with these headphones. From initial impressions when opening the packaging to pairing them with my phone and using them. The sound quality is the best I've experienced in a Bluetooth headset and they're comfortable to wear all day. I will definitely be buying another pair to keep around.

They are headphones. But the quality is exceptional. They also come with tons more capabilities than my previous pair. Additionally the customer service reps are out of this world. They truly do care about the customers experience. 10 of 10.
Best quality ,A++++++
The earbuds came well packaged complete with all the accessories that are needed. The product is well made and the sound quality is great.

I have had several other similar types of head-phones, but these are exceptional.  I bought a pair for a gift, and then went and bought myself a pair.  I would highly recommend.  Syncing is incredibly easy (and very fast), volume control works great, powering on/off is easy, and they recharge quick and last for several days.  For the price, get a pair.

Great purchase. Very satisfied with the quality and VALUE of these headphones.
No need to waste your money on more trendy overpriced brands. I have owned all of them
at one point and the Senso's are on par with all of them.

I have used the SENSO headphones now for several weeks now in my daily fast walks. At first, the controls seem a little difficult to find (they are really small) but once you get used to it, they are fine. The instruction diagram is also very small, and not easy to follow. Haven't had any incoming calls so far, so no feedback on this. The main thing however, is that the phones are light, comfortable, remain in place when fast walking, and produce good sound with excellent stereo separation. Possibly a little heavy on the bass, but that could be my high frequency hearing loss. The only small thing is that there are occasional momentary sound level reductions lasting for about a second (on both radio stations, Slacker & Pandora). Don't think it is a Bluetooth glitch, but is not really an issue I am concerned with.
I would definitely recommend them (have bought two sets).Tremendous value with exceptional features.
Great while they lasted but the side with all of the controls fell apart after only 6 months of lite use.
I bought this earphone and it work fine for one year, now i have to throw it away
Greatttttt
Just awesome perfect for running and have great sound .
The hooks completely didn't hook on my ears. They barely even touched my ear. For reference I have normal female ears.

It’s always great to read good reviews about a product and then have the product perform as reviewed.  That was my experience with these headphones. To make a long story short I agree with other reviewer’s that these are a good quality product at a fair price that perform as advertised.
It can have a few glitches but those are usually solved with a restart. It’s connection can also get spotty, but only when it’s at low battery. Great set for the price

I've been constantly using this after a full charge for 1 hour daily and the battery has not died yet. It's been 7 days now. And the bass is terrific. To get the perfect balance, use with the Late Night equaliser of the Iphone and see the magic. No noise while using the mic. Although you have to be a bit on the louder side since the mic is embedded in the earpiece. But that's not a hurdle at all since the light weight and extremely comfortable design makes sure that you don't mind keeping it on for longer hours. Good job Senso!!! I'm certain there's no point spending on the big brands for wireless earphones.

Wanted headphones that were wireless with good sound, My old wired headphones were good but I'm always snagging the wire on something, these are great, bought a set for my wife also, she really likes them too. Love that you can advance and reverse songs with the touch of the button, very happy with the purchase and suspect they will last a long time, thankyou for a great product at a reasonable price...

So far I think there great, just started to use them yesterday and found them to be very comfortable and easy to use.  Pairing with my I phone was quick and easy.  I wear glasses and found that they do not interfere with them at all.
Works great paired to my Win 10 desktop.

Very nice sound, comfortable and good battery life. Unfortunately connectivity is aweful and that's the important part. This set struggles to stay connected at any distances of more than 20 feet.  And if your floating in a pool the best you get is about 10 feet. The who reason I purchased em these were because they had a waterproof rating and thought they would be ideal while I was relaxing in the pool. Well if I need to stay within 10 feet of my phone what's the use? Being returned this week.

I bought these to use running and have been using them for a couple weeks. They are great sounding and the battery life is very good. I have to be available for work all the time and use them for taking work calls. The phone quality is great for hearing the caller but I've been told that I sound a bit far away talking, I assume that is because of the microphone location. Overall I am very satisfied with the performance of these headphones.
Pairing was easy. The only cons I can find are that when the battery gets low it tells you "low battery" every minute which is way too often. I get it, my battery is low.... warn me every 5 minutes or better yet, tell me it's low once then its my responsibility to remember to charge them.
On the wish list would be ear hooks that had some wire in them instead of just loose rubber, that would let the user customize the fit as they will come loose now and then while running. Also if you came out with a version that could operate with just the right side and unplug the left channel, lots of joggers like to hear what's going on around them, I'm sure you would sell a lot more.

Comfort, great sound! I love these headphones! They have a great range allowing me to listen to music and not be chained to my phone or bother my family. I really like the way the ear piece holds the buds in the ear. In the  past I've always avoided ear buds because of them not being comfortable, that is not the case here. Great job SENSO!!
Great sound quality

Battery life lasts forever, easy to pair and turn on. Sound isn't great/supreme quality, however it is good for wireless. I would recommend getting cheaper ones, but if you're not comfortable taking a gamble, this is a safe pair to get.
Does not fit well into my ears. They all when I run. The audio quality is also not great.

You literally can't lose. Why waste money on name brand headphones when you can buy these!! Sounds quality was almost too much bass but in Spotify I adjusted the equalizer and WOW! Really made these things even more worth the money. Excellent sound quality and noise cancellation. And Not to meantion all the extras you get with it. The charger and cord are worth at least half of the price so you are getting Bluetooth headphones for like $15! If you complain about that than nothing will make you happy! Just buy them!
Overall a good bluetooth headset, with easy controls, good battery life, and a snug fit. Definitely sensitive to wind when you run outside, unfortunately.
Ordered 2 sets so far. They both eventually have the same issue- the soldier lets go on the side without controls. They were recommended by a friend and used daily.

Based on the price I was unsure of what the quality of the product would be but once I got them and paired the headphones up with my iPhone they work great!  I used them for running, indoor cycling, elliptical, and treadmill workouts and they are excellent for active people!  They are comfortable and the sound quality is far better than I expected.

I just lost my yesterday... fell off while resting along my neck.  They are very light and they worked great since I bought them (about a month)... best review I can give is , I am buying them again.  They were great.  No 5th star because they do block outside noise which means no conversations when these re in your ears on or off... other than that they are great.
This is an excellent product and the value is wonderful. You guys got it right. Congratulations. Keep me updated with future products.
I really like it. Easy to pair with my iphone and they didn't fall off my ears as other one I bought
Work great.No issues!
Very nice for the price
These work great, and are a great deal for the money.
Works as well as the expensive beats ones I had
Ok
Great Product! and Awesome customer service! would definitely buy again.
They fit great and the sound is high quality.

Love these headphones! Great sound, pair immediately with my phone with a clear voice that says "connected", charge seems to last a long time, and they work as a phone headset far better than my $200 Plantronics headset - for less than 20 bucks!

I had been looking at a multitude of bluetooth/wireless headsets before purchasing this one, which I kept coming back to...then crossed paths with a friend of mine that happened to have bought these very ones...and he raved about them, so I bought them. To sum up my experience with them; when they worked, they worked great...but when they didn't work, they were maddening to deal with. They always seemed to be all or nothing...their connectivity seemed weak at times, regardless of charge-level. Spot on, or skipping like a scratched CD due (i'm guessing here) to poor connectivity,  whether connected to either the apple watch on my wrist or the smart-phone in my pocket. Pairing; sometimes they connected instantly, sometimes I had to turn them and the bluetooth on either the phone or the watch on or off, and multiple times to get them to connect...I have an iphone, and while I didn't use them a great deal of the time, after a few months of having to fight with them every other time I wanted to use them, I just bit the bullet and bought the apple air-pods...

I bought these to try to find a cheap decent sounding pair of wireless headsets to run with without really being devastated if sweat/heat eventually broke them down. First I'll say what I like about them, the build quality seems good with soft touch surfaces and sturdy pieces and they connect to my phone quickly.

Now the bad...they simply sound awful. I wasn't expecting an audiophile experience for under $30, but the sound quality has no fidelity (lows are non-existent and the highs just sound harsh and muddled). I was previously using the "Brookstone Compact Reverse Sound Earphones" (wired, under $30) for working out and they sound 10x better for the same price. If you can live with a wired pair of headphones, I'd just buy those instead. I already ordered another pair after hearing how bad these sound. Another downside to the Sensos is that the silicon ear bud pieces kept slipping out of my ear hole as I sweat more and the over-the-ear pieces aren't snug enough to hold them in place from falling out of your ear. The Brookstones already were superior in this regard with how they stay secure in your ear.

I'm only giving these 2 stars instead of 1 because I paid under $30. If I had paid $50 or more I'd give them a 1 and demand my money back.
So far I love these wireless headphones I purchased to use at work. After a couple hours my ear hurts, but could be I need try the other tips. Otherwise, I really like them.
Most comfortable ear buds I've ever tried!
Good fit, comfortable.  Good sound, fast shipping and arrival.  Worked great at the gym, no problem in hot tub or shower.
Great sound, Just feels good.
Good battery life.  Great HD sound.  Perfect for exercising.

I was excited, but unfortunately I am returning ...they will not hold a charge and this could not get them to pair.

Once I receive the refund, I do plan to reorder.

These ear buds were amazing. Great sound quality, settings, look, etc.. Then all of a sudden one day the left ear bud stops playing audio. I always keep it in the handy case it comes in and only use them when I watch videos and workout. I'm pretty sad because these are my favorite. I resistered for the warranty ages ago but don't know how it works.

Update: SENSO has some of the best costumer service I have ever dealt with. I emailed them about the problem and they responded within 1-2 hours. At first the representative tried to help me with a possible fix to the issue but after it didn't work they sent me a new pair of headphones free of charge.

Also I ended up purchasing a new pair because I stepped on the new ones but I didn't have the 10% off promo code that you get from buying them. I sent a short email to SENSO and the rep responded quickly once again and profided me with the code. AMAZING COSTUMER SERVICE.

I use the Senso Bluetooth in the gym when I'm doing cardio. I found that if you use the right earbud size, it works pretty well. It doesn't fall off. Sound is pretty good. Battery is good enough for me since I only use it for one hour per day and charge them twice a week.

These are my first bluetooth headphones and I couldn't be happier that I decided to cut the cord. It was so easy to set up, the sound quality is great, and the price was very reasonable. I am a very happy buyer and would recommend these headphones.

my first bluetooth device & I LOVE these. They stay IN my ears, charge easily, connected w/o any issues to my iPad & I HIGHLY recommend them to everyone.  I bought them for noise reduction as I'm going to be flying on a turbo prop. I am hoping that they work on the plane; they worked great in reducing the noise when I turned on my loud Dyson pet vac!
Excellent head phones

I bought a pair and it was going well until the charging port wouldn't accept a charge. I contacted the company and they sent me a new pair. The 2nd pair worked fine but now it shuts off after 30 seconds despite having 100% battery life. I noticed that the cords looked like they were spliced and you can see the wires which is funny since I took good care of my headphones. These were good at first but now I have no choice but to toss them out.

These Invotek Senso ActiveBuds are excellent! Bought my husband a pair first. We go to the gym often and our other ear buds just don't stand up to our exercising. The ActiveBuds not only stay in, they have quality sound and are great for phone calls! The charge lasts my husband's whole entire work day in which he has numerous conference calls, he charges it on the way home and it's ready for the gym! Very happy with the product. Ordered myself a pair and will order another pair for our 16 year old son! Maybe even for our older girls as Christians presents also!!

Wind noise unbearable at wind speeds over 5 mph. Probably not bad at the gym, but do not buy if you are planning to use them for hiking or biking. As one other user described, it's like you're listening to music with a hairdryer in the background. As well, forget making phone calls in the wind, as even a breeze makes it unusable. Surprised this product has such a high rating considering this huge flaw. Guess most people are using them inside....

the first impression is, well design, crystal clear voice quality and comfortable.The second review after a few month. Still connect fast, the sound is great and battery life is more than 6 hours at least. Recommend this product

- Charger plug is not durable.

+ Everyone has a different shaped ear, I have difficulty putting earpieces into my actual canal. The hoop thing around the earbud served great to keep them in my ears.
+ Battery outlasted a schoolday full of listening in class (Don't do that pay attention in school).
+ Cheap
+ If you take good care of these, they will last
+ Sound quality is nothing short of impressive for a pair of Bluetooth earphones this cheap. Don't expect hi-fi audio from these, but you can expect earphones that work well when taken care of. Bass is amazing, Treble is amazing.

I typically lose my earphones before they wear out, although after an entire school-year of shoving these things in my pocket, the cable came out from the charging port still attached, and the button was mashed in. When I expected these to have broken, THEY STILL WORKED. Everyone runs a different budget, but I can guarantee if you put these in the case, they are a major bang for your buck.

Let these headphones blow you away for the price point, it is worth every dollar of allowance/salary/giftcard you spend on it.
Very nice wireless earbuds. Good sound. Light and comfortable.
Absolutely love them!  Great service - great quality! My hubby loves these!
GREAT TRANSACTION GOOD PRODUCTS!
Surprisingly good.  Just right for my long walks. Good volume adjustment and effortless blue tooth connectivity.

If you're buying these for running or weightlifting where your head is relatively stable, then they're ok if you don't mind the low bass on your music clipping. Speakers aren't anything to write home about.
However I bought these to use during boxing and crossfit, and they refuse to stay in my ears. On top of all that the pause button is super sensitive and on the side, so if you push the earbud back in nine times out of ten it will pause the music. I returned mine because there are definitely better alternatives.
They fit well and it’s easy to use on my run!
It has a deep bass sounds good but the one I got cuts in and out all the time.
Bought these for my daughter and she LOVES them! Work great!!

I had a hard time with these at first until I figured out that you have to hold down the multi-purpose button until a woman's voice says that it is now on, and same thing to turn it off. But they fit well and nothing's fallen off yet. Lightweight and flexible, decent sound quality.

12/21/2020: I dropped these - not from a great height - but the volume control pad on top and the on/off pad on the side both popped off, about a month ago. I managed to get them on again but not sure how long they will stay in. I've not been running since. I don't want to use glue in case it gunks up the works. Shall update after I take them back for a run. Wanted to post this for a sense of how robust/long weariing they might be.

Pretty good while they lasted. They look really big, maybe just on female heads, but they stick out pretty far. I didn’t care they worked at the gym or wherever for a solid 6 months. In the last month they’ve been less able to keep the Bluetooth connection, so I constantly get kicked off of my phone by anyone else’s Bluetooth in close proximity. Need stronger Bluetooth wiring.
Been using these headphones for quite a few months now. Absolutely love the quality of sound that plays. As someone with small ears I was worried they would pop out easily, but they work great!

They seem to be a good value.  Easy pairing with my phone, comfortable in my ears, decent sound.  For the price you can't really go wrong.  They are a little bulky on the outside, bit this shouldn't be a big issue for me.
Good sound

The sound is great and nice long battery life. The only thing is that the over the ear part does slip out sometimes while I am running. Also I can hear the thumping of my feet when I run probably because of the noise cancellation. Overall great product!

I have used it for the last couple days and I am very happy with its quality of sounds and comfortable fitting in my ears.  For the price I paid, i think it is money well spent.
Bruce

Add to my earlier comment ~ I listen the music while riding BART in San Francisco commute. At least 40 minutes listening without battery problem. Before I purchase this product, i borrowed my friend Boss headset. It was good for noise cancellation but I was getting too hot wearing. This ear plug type is perfect for me. Bluetooth is also working nicely.

I lost my first one last month. I bought my second set. Meantime my wife also bought her own set. This is good product to listen music.

I had to come back in and say that they stopped connecting to my phone after less than 2 months. The earbuds are also not the most comfortable once you've used the malleable ear clip (not sure what to call it) lots. Overall, disappointed in what I thought was a great product.
I love this headset it can go behind my head and I don't have to worry about it. It's easy to make and receive calls. I use it mostly for listening to music on my phone.

These are awesome Headphones.  Comfortable and secure fit.  Comes with all of the charging accessories you could ever need.  It also comes with a sturdy case to keep your phones from damage.  Haven't had these wireless headphones long enough to comment on durability, but the sound is outstanding.  These replaced a set of JBL Reflect Sport headphones, which had a speaker go bad in under a year.
Good sound but two songs in and they busted not worth it prime garbage

Battery life leaves something to be desired.

Otherwise, it's a fantastic set of earbuds. The noise cancellation is always apparent, they don't slip out or off of your ears. Perfect for working out, chores, and studying.

love the earphones good quality, nice fit, bought my second one because the first one broke. totally worth the money.
great for exercise too.
These earbuds offer quality comparable to my LG Harman kardon wireless headset which I paid $120 for.
love them great on deployment
Sometimes it will cut off when water is splashed on it but it’s rare and does work in a pool
After reading the 27 plus thousands reviews,  I decided to buy them. Price cheap. They lasted 2 days. Not worthed.

I bought several pairs of these, and on each pair, the charging port broke free from the body and is rattling around inside of the headphones. This makes the headphones, not rechargeable. I bought 2 pairs in May and both have broken. Will not re-purchase.
02-23-2021: Great product.  Have had them for 3 years, but now they will not stay connected, no matter how many troubleshooting processes I have done.  Debating whether to call Senso about this.
Purchased in Feb 2018.  Unit is now dead and will not charge.  Will see if the vendor will replace them. ....they did....
I bought because they advertise an extended battery life. They do...
It does not feel confortable in my ears. They don`t stay in my ear while I try to run.

Product is as described and at a fair price.  I use them while riding my bike and the sound is very good.  The only is issue is the sound cuts out intermittently when I turn my head occasionally.  Other than that, I pleased with the purchase.
Very comfortable, good sound and paired easily

Very good quality and sound. Worked right out of the box and am really impressed with the accessory package. Bravo Senso for making such a high quality product at an extremely reasonable price. I buying more for XMAS gifts.
Fits good sounds good

Don’t waste your money. The Bluetooth connection is super weak. As a cyclist I carry my phone in my rear jersey pocket. As soon as I place the phone in my pocket, the buds lose connection and starts to buffer sound. Save your money.
They sound very good and they are very, very comfortable
Sound is great, but a little painful on the ears with they early it fits
I really like this product.
I love everything about them.  Nothing bad to say.
I absolutely love how convenient these headphones are. I was unsure if the bass and volume would be loud enough, but everything is perfect! Thanks so much for the product!

This is my 4th set of these earbuds. The sound and battery life are good as expected.

Each time the content and quality seems to be slipping. Gone are the foam inserts and the extra magnetic phone holder pieces. I can accept this - I understand that companies need to be profitable and optimize the product content for things the customer is willing to pay but I do expect basic things like minimal build quality and some form of customer service when things don't go well. .

I really wanted to like these earbuds but unfortunately, there is an annoying rattle coming from the right side earbud. The rattle drowns out the music while running/jogging. I have attempted to contact the company via their website but no response as of 2 weeks. I'm a bit concerned they will not stand behind their product. Just disappointing. Buyer beware...
Not perfect sound quality but works as advertised
I have had other earbuds that have not offered the great sound these provide. I love the fact that this is bluetooth. It was easy to pair with my IPhone and easy to use in general.
Very comfortable bluetooth headphones!  Instantly paired with my phone, long battery life, and great sound.  Highly Recommend!!!
Links to iphone easily. Keeps a charge well and stays in your ears even when you're being active.  What more can you ask for?

I’ve been looking to buy a first pair of Bluetooth headphones and after reading Several reviews for different brands, I settled on these and I’m not disappointed. The sound is excellent and I’m very satisfied,

Gave these to my 14y/o son and he loves them.

I misplace my Bose Soundsports one day and used these and I am impressed since they are inexpensive

Worked great! These have worked well from day 1. Never a problem connecting and I appreciate the message in my ear when I turn them on and I am told they are 'on' and 'connected'. With my Sony Bluetooth I have to ask Alexa what the hell time it is just to find out if the damn speaker is connected. Well done Sony. Anyway, these little suckers always work. I have to admit that I do not use any of the features with the controls on the unit (volume, and answer the phone, I think). The bottom line for me is that the buttons are too small and the juice isn't worth the squeeze. I use these in the gym, while cycling, and on my stationary bike. I recommend these, especially for the price.
A little sound distortion with each step when running, but not enough to knock these solid buds down from a 5 star rating.
I love this ear buds! I have never been able to wear ear buds because they never stay in my ear. But these are very comfortable and the sound quality is great! Me and my husband both have a pair!!

These are perfect for anyone needing hands free options in workout or just walking around town. Update: the left ear has short in the cord and now the left ear cuts out. Of course this is after returning period. The above only goes if they don’t start failing after several months.

I've really enjoyed using these while running during the last few months. I'm pleased with the sound quality and ease of use, and I rather like having the wire connection between ear pieces because if I need to take them out, I just drape them over my neck until I resume my listening. They've lived up to their water proof claim, too: I was caught in a torrential downpour a little while back and my personal soundtrack continued on just fine. My small notes: 1. Even with everything snugly secure in and around each ear, they do feel slightly loose. This lets outside noise in, but for me I'm glad to be more aware of my surroundings. 2. The audio warning that the battery is low comes on maybe five minutes before the battery runs out (at least at my volume level) so occasionally they've died while I'm mid-run. So I try to charge them after three hours of use so I'm not left without my tunes later. Otherwise, I'm pleased with the battery life. It can be easy to lose track of the total usage time per charge, so it would be nice to have an earlier warning. Overall: they're a solid and budget friendly set that I'm quite happy with.

I wanted to love these...but I just couldn't.
First, the good:
* great battery life and fast recharge time
* nice look and physical feel
* decent design
* pretty good sound - except when they slip out of place (see below)
* the company seems great; they even sent a follow-up email after purchase
* nice accessories included
Now, the key flaws:
* The ear hooks are very soft. In theory, this is good. In practice, this means it's very easy for everything to move around. The ear buds slip out of the ear opening just enough to be annoying. They won't fall out of the ear or off your head, but when they slip out a little bit, the sound quality drops big time (especially the loss in bass tones). This happens even with the right sized ear tips.
* The ear hooks would seem to be more comfortable than a more rigid option, but the opposite is true. I think maybe because they are so soft, it puts more of the work on the earpiece and is therefore less comfortable (and that might also be why it slips out more). See note below on a comparable option.
* The multi-function button on the side of the right earpiece is a horrible idea. It makes sense in theory, but again fails in practice. Every time you go to re-insert the earphone (see first flaw listed), you run the risk of accidentally pushing the button. It doesn't happen every time, but enough to be annoying.
Because of these major flaws, I'm not keeping them.
A few very minor annoyances:
* the extra USB charging cable included with the car charges is a nice thought, but it's only going to work with Apple devices
* the extra accessories are a nice touch, but if they are adding to the price, I'd rather save a few bucks and not have them; it's highly unlikely I'd actually use the carrying case, I already have a car charger, and the extra cable, as mentioned, is worthless to someone who doesn't use Apple stuff
I tried these [ [[ASIN:B01BV2BPVS TaoTronics Bluetooth Headphones Wireless In Ear Earbuds Sports Sweatproof Earphones with Built in Mic (Cordless 4.1, Secure Ear Hooks Design, 7 Hours Play Time)]] ] at the same time and found them to be better because they don't slip out of the ear (the ear hook is a bit more rigid, yet still somewhat flexible and far more comfortable). The sound quality on them is just as good if not better, and they stack up in every other way to be as good or better than the SENSO.
There is one flaw in the ear-hook design, as a category, though: if you wear glasses or sunglasses, they get in the way, caught up, and annoying. With the SENSOs, this makes them even more prone to not staying in the ear opening where you want them.
I really wanted to love these, but I just can't. With a few improvements, they could be great.

I have a Lenovo business laptop running Windows 7, a 5 year old HP laptop running Windows 10, and a 4 year old Android phone running Android 4.4.2.  These headphones had no problem connecting to any of these old devices, and they sound better than any ear-bud headphones I've ever owned, including wired headphones.  I was also surprised they do block some external noise.  I don't remember reading anything saying they would, but they do.  I wear them for about five hours a day while working on my computer and they are very comfortable.  The battery lasts a little over a day, so between 6 and 8 hours of continuous use.
