These headphones are great!! The battery lasts really long and they are super comfortable. I've use them for half marathon training and never had an issue during any of my long runs. They don't drain my phone's battery either. I was hesitant to get over-the-ear headphones, but they are flexible and soft and stay put and my ears got used to them after the first use.

The sound and bass quality is perfect, they really create that sense of being immersed in the music/sound. They are perfect for running. I once forgot to charge them before a distance run (my fault, not the headphone's fault) and my old backup pair of wired headphones didn't even compare! They also connect easily to my computer, which allows me to watch Netflix and I multitask doing chores or crafts. They have a wide range too. I'll charge my phone in the living room and am able to continue listening as I work around the house. It's only until I leave the house and go to the far end of the garage that they disconnect, but they come back immediately when I'm back inside.

These pair immediately and overall very easy to use. The controls are great and it's easy to skip around through my playlist and control the volume while running. I like the freedom of the wireless bluetooth controls and appreciate not having to pull my phone out in the middle of a run. I've taken phone calls on them without any issues and they automatically pause the music, tell me what number is calling, and restart the music once the call ends.

Other things to note: they're lightweight and hang around your neck when not in use and I like that they came with a little case for safe keeping. I think they look pretty cool too, similar to some name brand over the ear earbuds.

Also, Senso/Invotek have FANTASTIC customer service and really stand by their warranty. I definitely recommend both the headphones and the company. I can't wait to run my upcoming half marathon with these keeping me motivated!
Buy two! these are the great.....and what a kit! everything is included......you need nothing....pairs fast and great sound.  AS good as Beats!

Extremely comfortable. I don't even know they're on after a while and they don't come out regardless if you're running, jumping or trying to shake them loose. The sound is also great. Wasn't expecting this much base from these little buds. The volume control is conveniant and easy to push as well as skipping songs and answering calls and such. Can't say about battery life yet cause I charge mine everyday, but they've held out. No complaints really. Definitely worth the money. Don't hesitate cause they're a small company, these are solid.

Bought these after my 2nd set of Phaiser headphones died. Out of the box, they worked great. I plugged them in to charge when I received them for 2 hours like the instructions said, and they worked just fine. The sound is awesome, but I wish there was a way to check the battery level (my phaisers had the option to do a quick 2 press on the main button and it would tell you the battery level).

After 4 days of use, I got the "Battery low" message. I took them home, plugged them in for 2 hours, and noticed that the LED didn't light up. Oh well, whatever. Took them to the gym the next day, worked out for 20 min, and got the "Battery low" message again". Thought maybe it was user error, so I took them home and charged them again for 30 min, didn't see the LED light up, figured maybe it was just me, charged them for another hour. Today, they died after 10 minutes of use. Returning them, I had such high hopes for them based on sound quality, but yet again they were a letdown.
Great headphones for the price. I was surprised by the sound quality.
I'm satisfied with the stuff.

The sound quality was great, the battery life even better but the 1 downside for me is that it couldn’t stay in my ear while doing a bench press. I tried all the ear pieces but nun could fit tight enough.
I LOVE THEM! Best sound I've ever heard and what a value for the price! Very pleased. Recieved fast! Dave in Tyler, Tx
They are great

Bought 2 for my son. He loves them. I like the price. I bought them because the audio jack stopped working in his phone. He is a runner.

Note after 3 months one of the bud speakers failed, don't know if it was wire damage. My son is college kid who shoves everything in his pocket.
Very happy...great value product.
They work good, also the sound is loud and crisp. The battery life is decent. The only problem so far is that the ear buds tend to fall out of my ear while im doing quick movements.
This is a great pair of headphones, especially for the price. If I have one complaint its that the chord is too long, other than that no complaints so far.
Solid quality at a very low price.
They're not comfortable

So far very happy with the product, did arrive two days before schedule and in perfect condition. The performance to this point is the expected, very easy to pair with my IPhone, the sound quality can be better but is very good for running and also keep aware of the surroundings.

Sound quality is great. Might not be the best, but these are good quality headphones.

Also, the customer service was amazing. I was happy with how they handled my issue.

I have really small ears and these earbuds actually fit. Took off one star because when I run or do a lot of jumping, usually one side will start to fall out but it fits way better than any other Bluetooth earbuds I’ve had and the price is good!
I really like my headphones.  Easy to use.  I just like them.
These are awesome for the price! Highly recommend

I enjoyed these head phones for just about two months when the power button remained in the "pressed" position and now the device continuously malfunctions. I hope the seller will come through and offer me a replacement. I will revise this post once I hear back from seller.

You cannot beat these buds for the price.  Great sound, louder than most blue tooth earbuds.  They also come with a great little case for storage.  The micro USB/Lightning cable that comes with it was a nice surprise as well.

Just got these new headphones and like them alot! They are very reasonably priced and have a good sound. The carrying case is also very nice! I love the fact that it comes with extra earbuds which I actually needed to use. And the "extra's" they give you (magnetic phone mount and card holder) are a very nice bonus. The only issue I had was trying to change the ear buds (hahaha) but I got it figured out. :-)

Nice job!!!
Very nice
Great idea
I live in a windy area, and these are really hard to hear in the wind. Also, they don't stay in very well.

Used to have the jaybird bluebuds but they started dying on me. When searching for some new ones, I figured I would try something cheaper so it wasn't so disappointing when they mess up and I have to say I prefer these! The fit is soooo comfortable, they hold a charge for a long time and they are stylish. Would definitely buy this again if mine mess up.

TLDR: SENSO > Jaybird
poor warranty

By far the best and comfortable earphones I’ve purchased. The price is awesome as well. I’ve purchased these repeatedly (I lose them, break them while working-my fault!) and will order a replacement when the time comes.
I get 8-10 hours of straight play time.

Only two negative things, one is that I wish the Blue LED light was so bright at night. Dark nail polish will fix that!
Two, once you determine which soft plastic inserts fit your ear, dab a small amount of super glue so they stay on the plastic ear piece.
Other than that, the sound is great, price is great! Recommended. I love them!

had purchased another brand of wireless headphones a month earlier, but was not happy due to the fact that the sound sucked and they would not stay in my ears if I ran or even turned my head while working out.  Got these yesterday and wore them to work out this morning.  Couldn't be happier.  Stayed in my ears the entire time and did not pull out when I moved my head.  the sound was fantastic as well.  highly recommend these if you need a pair of wireless headphones when you workout.
These headphones are great! They have excellent sound quality and have a long battery life. They are easy to connect and use. The quality of these headphones far exceeds the price.10/10.

My first pair quit accepting charge after 2 months. No problem, replaced very easily and new ones are great. I can't believe the price. I have bought more expensive ones and cannot keep them in my ears. The ear buds on these are comfortable and stay in. Excellent sound. You can get and extra six months warranty by registering at their website. One year warranty without registering.
Can't go wrong with these.
They work great. So far,  I've used them at work and on a flight. I look forward to taking them for a run.

The not positive:
1) These are not aerodynamic so when there is a breeze there is wind noise, which although minor takes away from whatever you're listening to.
2) They are somewhat large and (just a little) uncomfortable on the ears too, after extended wear too.
3) Having my phone in my left pocket... or anywhere on my left side including my hand causes sound cut-out. This does not occur if I hold my phone in my right hand or even my pocket.

The positive:
1) Sound quality and quality is very good.
2) It comes with a nice case and extra ear bud sizes for almost any sized ear.
3) Over the ear wrap is something I prefer to keep the earbuds from falling out during intense workouts.

The takeaway:
It is a little annoying not being able to hold my phone in my left hand, having to keep it (always) on the right. The wind noise and the minor discomfort (I feel) over extended use are also negatives but overall the sound quality and quality is what I gauge as it's greatest attributes. I'll keep my phone on my right and deal with the wind noise.

UPDATE:
Add this to the positive column... the company is active and provides prompt feedback. They addressed the cutting out issue and following their guidance, I wore the headphones for an hour with my phone in my left pocket without issue.
The wind noise and discomfort exists regardless of what silicone earbud I try... including the ones from the LG headphones I've worn the past two years. This is minor and provided as feedback but not meant to dissuade.
My initial 3-star review was updated to 4 because the cutting out issue was resolved and also due to the company caring about customer service.
a little loose on the ear, but compared to its price, it works great. I had powerbeats 2 before buying this one and I can tell you that they have the same quality!
I have just started using these and so far they are very good, will see how they stand up to exercise sweat.

I bought these headphones to use at the gym and so far they are great. The sound was very good, they stayed in place, they are comfortable and easy to put in, and they are sweat proof.

The value is excellent. I paid $37 and it comes with a lot of extras like a carrying case, 3 sets of extra eartips, wire tie,car charger, a short charging cable, and 3 foot charging cable. Also the packaging is nice.

My husband has a competitors brand, these were a fraction of the cost so I thought I would give them a try. They fit great and sync easily to my phone. I would highly recommend these if you are in the market for some wireless headphones.

Headphones are great easy to manage and connect with my phone. Unfortunately the ear piece is to big for my ears and they keep falling down even if I'm not working out. Very dissapointing. I was out of the country and just came back I'm not sure if I can return them or is to late.

I purchased these, at first they worked so great, but after 3 months of having them, they won’t charge anymore and won’t turn on! The power button stop working. So sad that they did not last long at all.
The 1st time I tried to turn music up, I turned them off but otherwise happy with them.

For $40 I think they are pretty high quality. My husband has the Beats version and he said they look pretty much identical. The sound quality is pretty good. I like that I can talk on the phone using them. I have small ears so it was a concern for me that they would fall off. I went to the gym and tested them out and they worked out great. I have wore them around the house for 3 hours at a time and they didn't cause any pain or soreness. Score! I purchased the extended warranty to go along with them too. My husband is considering buying a pair too. Awesome buy!
Nice head phones for the cost.  Ablittle crackly ehen you try to push them tight in your ear
Such a great price and great quality! Love that it includes a lot of extras, such as a car charger and extra ear buds. For sure great value!
topped working after 3 months

Just sought these out after my hubby lost his old headphones.  I bought a pair for myself a few months back and they are GREAT for workouts!  He stole mine when his disappeared.  I had no other option.  :)
So far so good. Fit great and stay on during my long sweaty workouts. Would definitely recommend.
Use mostly when doing exercising. Sound is a little tinny but good enough for that.
The battery power lasts like they say it does. Very loud. Top volume can hurt.

Utter garbage. Been using them for a year with my iPod nano and there isn't a time that they didn't shut off, disconnect, skip or something. Finally had it and ripped them apart and pulverized them in the road with a rock and threw them into the road to let cars finish the job. Worthless garbage.
comfortable but a little bulky. the charge is lasts about 5 hours.
You won’t find a better pair for the same price. Great battery life and solid Audio quality.
Excellent Bluetooth headphones for a great price.
Second pair of these, I bought these as a gift since my daughter loves hers so much. Great sound, blue tooth wireless. Have help up very well with the first pair too
No problems to report at all.  These headphones are comfortable and easy to operate.  I would highly recommend.

These are quickly becoming my go to headphones for my iPad. The price is great and I love that it came with various earpieces, case, car charger, and lightning/mini usb charging cable. They stay on extremely well while I’m working out and most people just assume they’re Beats. The only thing keeping them from being 5 stars is that there is slight feedback when they are turned on and nothing is playing.

I've used the head phones for only three days in doors on the treadmill, but so far so good.  Sound quality is very good.  Ease of use is very good.  The over ear support is comfortable, but pretty flimsy.  I'm not sure if this will matter on long outdoor runs or not.  No indications of an issue thus far.  I'm pleased with the value of my purchase.
I worked fine for about 4 times. then quit working right after 30 day return

Although I really liked this product, I originally gave it a low review on Amazon because of a battery issue.  I intended to return the headphones to Amazon for a refund.  However, almost immediately after posting the review, I received an email from the president of Senso expressing his sincere apologies and stating that they would like to replace my headphones with a new set.  I replied and told him that I would be willing to do that.  Within a few hours, I received an email from Senso Support asking me to confirm my mailing address.  Long story short, I had a new set of headphones less than a week after I posted my original review.  Therefore, I am very appreciative of the excellent product support that I received from Senso!  Also, I do really like these headphones.  They sound great (excellent clarity), are easy to operate and very comfortable.  I wear them while using various cardio machines at the gym, and I hardly realize that I have them on.  They also come in a very nice carrying case and have several accessories included.  By the way, I am voluntarily changing this review for the reasons I just stated.
Great head phones. The quality is excellent. They fit well and have multiple adapters.
Comfortable and easy to use, good sound quality with good range from the sound source. Overall in the short time that I have had them I would rate the product very favorably.
The buds fit my ears like no others have and the sound is great!!
Great sound! I use them only while running. Very comfortable!
Liked so much that I bought 4 for family members.

Love love love! Everything is perfect. Used them today at the gym for the first time. Sound was great. Talking with them through the mic was great as well. The case and chargers awesome! So far so good. Glad I got these!

Great sound quality, perfectly comfortable fit, all for an extremely reasonable price. I've searched for comfortable wireless headphones for years and tried several different varieties. So glad I'm done with all that "noise."
These "waterproof" headphones quit working the very moment they touched the water.
Fantastic
Very light and they sound OK

These are great headphones.  I mostly listen to books and movies on them, so I can't say much about the treble/bass, but the sound is clear for what I need them for.  The only reason I give them 4 stars is for some reason they cut out when I'm at the end of my driveway, even though my phone is just in my pocket.  I have no idea why, but it's consistent, and if I turn them off and restart them there are no problems.  Otherwise they stay on my ears well whether I'm walking or running, and they were exactly what I was looking for!

I have a hard time keeping ear buds in my smaller than average ears while running, but these are a perfect fit! I don't love it when you increase the volume too much, it beeps really loud back at you, right in your ear, but maybe theres a way to change that?
Love them. Have two pairs, one set for the pool, one set for work. Great sound.

Excellent wireless ear buds, I was surprised by the quality. I get nothing for this review I just felt the need to let everyone know. These are better than my broken Beats!! The pairing is simple with a voice promt which is cool. The sound quality is very good and they are load which I love at the gym!! They may look bulky but they are very comfortable. Can't go wrong for the price so do yourself a favor and pick these bad boys up!!
Fantastic sport buds
Yes, happy and works well.
My boyfriend loves these more than his Beats. He loves them so much he's purchased 4 pair just in case they discontinue these or change the product

I don't have anything to compare these to besides my old regular earbuds, but these are annoying. Are the loops supposed to go around your ears? These just kind of float above my ears and I find myself constantly trying to wrap them while I'm running. I'm not a tiny person with tiny ears.
Can never go wrong with this product. Best headphones in the game.
Quality was good. The sound quaility was lot better than I expected for the price I paid. Overall great and fully satisfied.
They are awesome!!! The quality of the sound is outstanding. I never imagined that ear buds would sound like that.

I use these headphones almost everyday. They are not even a year old yet and the battery life is TERRIBLE. I don't know if I got a bad pair or something, but if I don't charge them the same day they're more than likely going to die on me the next day I use them. I don't even turn up the volume very high. It's usually very low.

Other than the battery, nothing else is too terrible. I think the worst part next to the battery is the cord holding them. They get caught/tangled up in my hair so easily it's annoying. If you have long hair, watch out.

The sound is alright, it's not amazing but it's not bad. Definitely does not have any noise cancelation at the level I listen to, but I listen to them really low.

The plastic for the ears isn't too bad, they don't seem to bother my ears. I wear glasses.
So much easier than having to plug headphones into my ipod and having to tuck the cord somewhere.  The sound is great.  I would recommend them.
The minimal level of the sound is a little bit to high. If we are using it at the gum, it's fine. But if I want to listen to music at bed. It's too loud.
Great sound. works great.

I've only used the headphones a few times but I'm extremely satisfied with them so far. They seem like a quality product backed up with a good guarantee.  And now I've gotten an email from one of the company owners asking if I'm satisfied.  That's kind of unheard of these days. I'm very impressed with this company. Keep up the good work.
These are great headphones for the price!

The headphones have a great sound and fit perfectly. I purchased a set for myself and one for my wife and she likes them as well.

She can take them to the gym or go out on a walk and completely zone me out. For that alone these headphones rock.

My third pair of these in about a year (yeah I lose them/break them a bit often). All of them have been outstanding products; this one, however, seemed to have a receiver issue in the right ear that caused audio to pop in and out. I responded to an email from the company (they send you one when your device arrives) stating the problem. After walking through the issue, we determined it was the headphones themselves. From there, it was simple and easy for them to ship me a new pair of non-defective headphones. Easiest and least stressful customer service interaction I've ever had.
Good sound, comfortable fit on ears and great price!!
Love our new headphones!  We were especially satisfied that they came with any and everything you need to use/store and charge them!!
Headphones ARE NOT USABLE IN WATER WHILE SWIMMING.  The signal stops as soon as your head enters the water.  Unable to use them in the pool.
Very happy!!
These earphones last a pretty long time if your not blasting them 24/7 and the sound quality it awesome. I thought these were some cheap quality earphones....boy I was wrong.
Excellent sound. Customer Service is polite and prompt.
Excellent headphones
Headphones are legit. Crystal clear with deep bass. Also comes with a car charger and iphone charger.

I do love these bluetooth headphones. Out of the three brands I've tried, these are my favorites. They are the only ones that I can seem to stay in my ears, although they do have to be readjusted every few minutes or so while running. The others I've tried just fall out within seconds. The sound quality is great, and my phone can be up to 15 yards away with no interruption. I can use these for one hour a day at the gym and only need to charge once a week. The ear piece is very malleable, so they are comfortable, and surprisingly stays put. Other than having to readjust every few minutes with vigorous activity, these are perfect.
They don't stay seated in my ears quite as well as my last pair and as such I lose some of the Range of the audio but the long battery life makes up for it.

Liked how they felt and the sound quality, when I could actually hear it. If I was more than a foot or two away from my phone it completely cut out or would sputter and break up. I would love to like these but they just aren't usable.
sounds great, the volume control does not seem to be sensitive enough for me personally.
Nice!! They work great...

Very impressed so far. I never liked ear buds because they always fell out of my ears. These stay put, and the sound quality is surprisingly good.
I exchanged the buds that came attached for smaller ones that were included in the box. The Bluetooth was easy to set up and works well.
Overall, great headphones for the price.

Good functionality and connectivity, but poor quality for some kinds of music. Good deep bass, alright mid-range, crap treble. Anything with symbols, hi-hats, especially anything from the electronic and EDM genres is hopeless to listen to. Prospective buyers: if you're wanting good sound quality (and I'm comparing to basic Skullcandy headphones you can buy at Bartells), look elsewhere.

Pretty good so far, battery is good too. I worked out 3 days in a row (1-2 hours at a time) without needing to charge it. They also come with a car charger and stuff which is really cool. I'd recommend them.
I love the headphones! the quality of sound is awesome, the price is right and not having a cord in my way when running or working out is so convenient! I would definitely buy again!

I wanted a nice sounding Bluetooth headset that was affordable and this fit the bill.  I use these when I work out and perspiration doesn't bother them at all.  I can charge them on the weekend and they last all week.  They also pair very easily with my iPhone.
I often gets disconnected and there's a weird background noise or something like an echo. I am returning it.

For the price the headphones are okay I guess. They stay in place when running but they do cut out, almost sound like a scratched CD. I thought at first it was because my phone was too far away but when running I keep my phone on my arm with a workout band so I don't think that's the issue. They serve their purpose. The only really bad thing I would say is that they came with the wrong charger- which was really weird. These literally came with an iPhone like charger even though they have the port of an Android. Luckily I have extra Android chargers so I didn't see the need to return them.

I would say if you can afford better, spend more, but if you just need something to make due these are a good choice.
Worth it for the price.  No complaints

For now I will only rate it 3 stars because I just received it and don't know how is the sound quality, battery life an so on. I will for now give it that rating because as soon as I took them out of the package I started checking everything that came in the little box with this headphones, which I have to say I'm pleased. The only negative thing I have to say about this is that the USB charger was slightly bent and couldn't plug it into my USB port. Since I bought two of this items, one for my husband as well, I compared them and his looks perfectly fine as you can see in the pictures. Other than that it looks pretty decent. Now I just have to put it to test when I workout. I will be coming back to rate it again.
They don't come out.!  I tried to head bang them out of my ears but they won't come out!  They are comfortable, easy to use and sound great. And they won't fall out of your ears.
They don't sound as good as I expected them too. I'd like more treble. But I do like them and they are comfortable to wear. They connect to my phone super quick!
Love it so much gonna get one for the wife
I used these yesterday mountain biking in the hills. Worked perfect! Awesome product!
Amazing sound! Easy to use for hours

I bought these for my college daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves them! She's used them on a run outside as well as in the gym during her workouts. She's amazed at the level of noise cancellation and the comfort. These are a great product. I'll be ordering some for my son as well!

Originally I was hesitant because as a consumer we here a brand and expect quality. I was working towards my 3rd pair of Beats...and extremely upset about that given the brand. I came on here and decided to give Senso a chance and I am glad I did. My son cracked jokes on me being an Apple guy....but he himself gave me the stamp of approval once he heard for himself the sound quality and comparing them to his Beats. In any case...I havent had any issues at all. And based on the reviews even if I get 8 months out of them I still would feel I got my moneys worth and I didnt dish out another $129 for name brands. Highly recommended.

I bought my first pair of these in May 2018, and they were fantastic-- 8 hour battery, good sound quality, snug fit, good price. I then bought a second pair for my wife in 2021, and they are now clearly more cheaply made. The sound quality isn't as good, the housing material is cold hard plastic (the old ones seem to have a softer coating, maybe vinyl?), the button is a bit loose so it clicks loudly, and the voice that announces power on/off and connected/disconnected is now so loud it's literally painful regardless of your volume setting. I can tell when my wife turns them on or off in the other room because the "power on" voice is so loud.

I would have recommended the pair I got in 2018 to everyone, and I would not recommend the 2021 version to anyone. Unfortunately my 2018 pair just stopped working (it is now 2022, so about 4 years after purchase). The show up as charged 100%, but they immediately shut down after being turned on. I won't be purchasing these again.

For the price, these are really nice headphones. They fit comfortably on the ear. Have not had a chance to workout with them yet. They are simple to operate and sync up very quickly. If I could improve, the highs could use some help but overall sound is good.
We really like these headphones.

They are great and connect right away to my phone. I use them to run. One thing I have noticed is the wind interferes with the sound more than with my wired ear buds. I am experimenting with the different sized buds. With that said, I still will not go back to my wired headphones

The hooks are much too soft, to be any use.... Tape on box separated ..... maybe another set, but not this one......did not try. Turned off from experience.....update!....
Loud, bassy,.....hooks soft, But!, they do offer some support, soft enough to forget you have them on.
As I said, package (looked) opened or tampered with

Beware! I love these headphones but they barely fit my ears. If the top of my ear was a few millimeters shorter then the over-ear part would just slide right off.

Also: It's really annoying how it beeps when setting the volume to either the lowest or highest value on my phone. Especially since the beep is super loud when it "warns" me the I've reached the highest sound level. It just about blows up my ear drums.

Sound quality is average, battery life is tolerable, noise cancellation is kinda there.

Now for the important but, Bluetooth strength, yeah this shit starts getting choppy at at 4 feet. Phone on your left hand side? Nope not if you want a connection, phone more then 3 feet away, better be prepared for to start losing connection..

Maybe they're actually waterproof I dunno, bout to find out but I honestly doubt it at this point

For being a bluetooth headphone set, it's great for a workout. It stays on AND in your ears. The sound quality leaves a little to be desired, but functionality-wise, it's great for running, lifting weights, or other aerobic exercises.
Wow, great product, I wished I would've given up my mp3 player a long time ago.

My new Senso ear buds are the best I've ever used. The sound quality is great, even the bass. They fit comfortably and securely over each ear. The on-off switch and volume control are on the right ear bud, very easy to adjust while wearing it. There is even a voice notification that they have been turned on or off, so you don't need to wonder. They paired very easily with my TV. I highly recommend this Senso product.
I was sold a used dirty pair of headphones. Disgusting!
Sounds is great and they don’t fall out or come loose like others.

I've only had them a day but they fit 1,000 better than my beats wireless that I had. The beats lasted a year and then made a cracking sound and died. I'm hoping these last longer because I like them so much better!
work well and stay on in the gym.
i Would like to know how much  warranty come with this senso Bluetooth headphones ?
These are great for the price and the sound is very good.  Bought 3 pair.
Stay in place really well. Great volume and easy to use

I've used these headphones at work and thats about it and today they randomly decided to stop working. I know when I bought them they were only about $30 but still you would hope they would last a tad longer
Good product for working out with.
Wireless must I say more
the sound is very good but the mic not much good when i talk in the phone call the sound seems far and not clear enough i think you need to work on the mic sensitivity

Decent sound and great build quality for the price! Materials are good quality. I had one connection issue but it was most likely my phone as after restarting my phone(iPhone 6s) I have had no issues. Headphones came with a full charge. Package included 3 different sized buds that you can change out as well as foam "earplug style" buds. Also included was a USB charging cable, an Android/iPhone cable, cable clips, and a carry case.

I workout five times a week for about an hour to an hour and a half. These headphones have lasted me a week and a half with only one charge. Great sound quality and they really don't move when you workout. I am a sweater so this was really important to me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone interested in wireless headphones.

EDIT:
My pair broke after five monthsof purchase but the excellent customer service and one year warranty don't make it a problem at all. They immediately agreed to send me a new pair and I'm so thankful again that I bought these amazing wireless Bluetooth headphones five months ago.

I wanted to give them a 4, but the issues I have had kept me from doing so.  I do like them.  However, I am a little disappointed with the range.  I was expecting more.  Maybe it's normal compared to others.  The other issue I have been having is the connection keeps dropping.  I don't know if it's the buds or my phone.  I did not have this problem with other Bluetooth ear buds in the past. Just something to keep in mind. I would still say they are a good deal for the price I paid ($35 I think).
So far these headphones are great! The only thing I'm having an issue with is they fallout of my ear but besides that they sound amazing and work great and last all day!

I have been wanting to buy bluetooth ear buds for some time now. I am so glad I found these, the quality for the price is outstanding. Every piece of this product feels solid and I love the way they fit on and in my ear.  I have small ears and right out of the box these are perfect. I don't use them for sports but these stay in place for regular daily talking on the phone. The black and red color is perfect. They generously  give you a short and long cable and the carry case is quality as well. I would recommend these to anyone.
These headphones work brilliantly! They were easy to set up, and deliver great sound when I am out mowing the lawn or doing other yard work. I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

This was my second set. The first set died unexpectedly and I figured it was something I did, so my husband got me a pair for Christmas. Here we are in June and those died also.
This set suddenly wouldn’t hold a charge. They will charge and work for one workout, but the next time I use them, they are dead. Total crap. Disappointed because I liked being cordless. I’m looking for suggestions for brands that last longer than 5 months.

good sound, comfortable, good price,good shipping

design can be better and also if include a magnet to hold together when not wearing

Purchased and liked these headphones - for the money, they were good to listen to my audiobook. Soon after getting them a small piece broke on the casing and while the audio still worked, I was unable to wear and play theoff, etc. I contacted the seller and after a brief conversation with customer service I was sent a brand new pair of earbuds, which I have been using for a few weeks. I'm happy with my earbuds and more than happy with the customer service I received from them Senso!
I'll definitely order from this company if I have a need in the future!

I've contacted Senso multiple times after my headphones stopped working entirely in the left ear piece but have not received any response.  I registered my product on their site and followed the contact directions.  I'm going to switch to a company that follows through on the warranty.

Bought a pair and liked them so much I got some for my 10 year old son.  Only pair he’s managed to keep and not lose/destroy.  And he likes them too, imagine that!  They also come with some cool accessories bundled in.
My wife loves these. Great 👍 job guys.
Sounds is impeccable, quality is great. Did not like the ear loop.

The headphones lasted 3 months. I dropped  them from 2 feet, they disintegrated when they hit the floor. The warranty did not cover the damage. I am going to buy another pair from a different manufacturer.
I can't wait to go out on a jog with them on. So far they work great. Amazing and clear sound. I also like how fast they connect to my phone.

I've had this product for two months and it was alright in that period of time - especially for the price, however after two months the plastic holdings on the earphone began to give out after normal use (just going to the gym) and it fell apart. This might of been a defective product, if this wouldn't have happened I would've rated this product a 4/5

The audio is clear, the battery life has been great so far. My main issue is that the loops for my ears are far too large. They stay in decently well on my jogs despite this - the different earbud size options help.

Overall these earphones are legit one of the best compared to others and there price is just absolutely great seeing how these earphones are of such high quality and for such low price. Not just that, but their customer service is one of the best ones I’ve seen in such a long time in any other online company. If you want to look at great and affordable earphones then this is the best choice by far!
I love this product so much that I've given this pair to my brother and purchased the newer version.

I’ve had these headphones for a handful of months and I have no complaints. The battery life last longer than most Bluetooth headphones I’ve ordered from amazon. Sound quality is good enough for me and people can hear me fine on phone calls.

A good value for the price. Easy to pair with my phone. Comfortable fit. And I love that a case came with the headphones.
The sound quality is really good. Serves the purpose while working out at the gym.
I would recommend these.

I've used these for several months at the gym and while running and they are AMAZING. The sound was great and they even worked pretty good to make calls from to. Unfortunately they just stopped working. They went totally dead with no audio or indicator lights. Fortunately, SENSO support has been trying to help. I'll update this review with my outcome but I really hope they do right because when these were working, they were great!

Update 12/10 - They suggested a procedure to reset them, but it did not work. They say they will be sending replacements. I really hope they do because I love these headphones.

Update 1/14 - I got my new pair and they work great!

Love the headhones.  They work all over my 2 story house with the phone plugged into a charger on my desk.  Came with extras such as magnetic holder for phone to car vent, cell phone credit card holder, wire clip and carrying case.  They are a little buggy when connecting to iphone 6 Bluetooth  but it is probably the phone as much as the headphones.  You get a little voice prompt when turning on and off and when connecting to Bluetooth which is nice.  They seem to keep extraneous noise out while wearing.  They should be a great help when mowing season begins - not being connected with a wire doing yard work.
works well
Excellent sound quality
Works great!!!!
Ear buds sound great long battery life great for the money

Quick delivery and so far sounds great
Easy setup and connection
Best headphones I've bought in a long time. They fit nicely, they pair up easily. Wonderful sound. Great buy.
I got these for my fiancé and he LOVES them. He said they're just as good as beats but a fraction of the cost. Bluetooth works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase !
Good product, quick delivery
Range limited but sound great

Best quality available at this price point, hands down. Given that these are a budget set of headphones, I was pleasantly surprised by the audio quality, as well as battery life, charge time, and bluetooth range. I can imagine that some might take a bit of time to get used to the fit, but it I, for one, had little issue in that regard. Furthermore, it's that same fit that ensures that these things are just not very likely to fall off.

Now, extended use can get a little uncomfortable, but that's true of many, many ear buds, and again, stressing the price point, I find that this is a fairly minor down side.
For the price these are awesome...quick delivery and easy to use and the battery last for weeks

While the sound quality worked for what I needed, two separate pairs lasted less than one year. I only wore them for about 3 hours a week while working out and kept them charged. I would not recommend.

Having received these headphones last week and having used them consistently for quite a while, I can say that I am satisfied with them so far. The sound quality is pretty good and for 36$, they have greatly exceeded expectations. They come well packaged with a car charger, a regular charger, different sizes of ear buds and a warranty card! Great product.
Not even sure how it happened but I think I've only used it 2 or 3x since purchasing in July. This doesn't seem repairable and I've lost the return window. There's that. Good luck to others.

I knew these headphones wouldn't be the best quality, but they are a little more subpar than I expected. I have had them for about four months now, but the issues I am having have been happening since a few weeks in. These headphones are not great in the wind - the air flows right through them and makes it difficult to hear. These headphones also have trouble connecting to my phone through bluetooth, and even when they do, the sound quality is usually pretty bad. For example, the sound might be quiet (even at maximum volume) or it will make glitching sounds like they are out of range, even if I am holding my phone in my hand. Furthermore, no one can ever hear me if I use these headphones for a phone call. Overall, based on my experience, I would not recommend these headphones.
Great.
Good Headphones for great price! Great sound! Really happy with this purchase!!

These speakers sounds good for the value. I was using mostly for the phone calls and hardly 4 hours a week. Right after 6 months, it stopped charging and never came back. Tried to contact manufacturer but showing as product support ended where initially mentioned as 1-year manufacturer warranty.
Love these

These are impressive and extend way beyond their price point. The sound quality is plenty good for active headphones and actually good enough to listen to when not bike riding, hiking, etc. I was very impressed by how comfortable they are. I am very sensitive to textures and these were just right. Soft where they need to be and firm where they need to be and you can barely feel the ear loops, which is a first for me. Ussualy the ear pieces are uncomfortable and that is not the case here. The carrying case and other accessories that come with the headphones make them seem like a much more expensive product. For this money or even double, you can't go wrong. Just buy them.

The headphones are a very good product. The sound is very good, I used them for running and worked perfect.
I strongly recommend this product.

I really wanted to like these and with such a high user review rating I thought I would. But I don't, because:
1. They are uncomfortable around the ears.
2. They pull whenever you turn your head/neck due to the cord lying on your neck (yes, I adjusted the cord with no improvement)
3. They make you look like you have mini Princess Leia buns on your ears and not tough nor cool whatsoever.

However, pros:
1. Very fast pairing
2. Decent battery life
Work great for exercise. Long lasting battery. Easy to recharge and fast.
quality of sound is really good. it just keeps falling off of my ear. had to buy separate buds that fits my ear

I just received this product but without the bonus items that are advertised:
Bonus Items:
• Dual Port USB Car Charger
• 3ft. Charging Cable for Apple (Lightening connector) and Android (Mini USB connector) Devices.
Is there anything I misread?

Very easy to pair and sound great. The rubber ear loops are helpful but don't seem to really do much to keep them in my ear. I wish they fit a bit more snuggly. I tried a few of the different adapters but the default size were the best. Well made and a long lasting charge. Good for grilling or working around the house but would not stay in the ears well enough for running or other more strenuous activities.
Left side does not stay on. Wish the rubber retains the ear shape more so it clings instead of sliding off.

3rd time purchasing this brand and probably my last (insert sad face). The issue I have is with the design. New style has adjustable/flexible ear wraps (the rubber part that goes around the ear) which sounds like a great idea but they are sooo malleable that they easily get bent out of shape and never really sit on my ears well.

Its a great deal, and these are very comfortable to wear unfortunately the battery life pooped out after one week. The car charger that is included has been very handy, I was charging them on my way to the gym. It got to the point where they wouldn't turn on unless I pulled them in, even for a few minutes. Now, the blue light will indicate a full charge however, they won't even turn on. I have tried resetting them several times. I dealt with the poor battery life for quite some time, but it times for me to move on to a different product. For the price, there is a lot included with these ear buds, but be prepare for them to not last very long.
Love these headphones. The sound quality is amazing. I downloaded music, so I listen as I take my walks. Great buy!

Just what I was looking for.  Great price for great buds.  The ear buds are light weight and comfortable.  They stay in place during my workouts.  The nose reduction is good.  The extra accessories were a nice bonus (I.e. storage case and chargers).  Overall,  I'm very pleased with my purchase.

I have bought these for a long time and they usually last 6-8 months with steady use.  Most recent pair was shoddy manufacturing and broke in just over a month.  Moving on to another company that has more consistent quality.
Very nice
Must buy good headphones great price and quality. Forget any other brand buy these.

I haven't had them long, but...

The Good:
1. Pairing was spotless—super quick and easy with an iPhone 7.
2. Battery life was great; I used them for a long work-out (about 90 minutes) and then didn't shut them off. When I woke up the next morning, they were still paired with my phone, and still worked fine. Obviously, if you walk around all day listening to music, it's going to be an issue, but for the "let's go for a run" and occasional use, it's going to be fine.
3. Controls are easy to understand; I haven't read the manual, and managed to figure it out. It has the right amount of "obviousness."
4. There was no issue with the slipping out, and they're comfortable.

Also, I need to make a point exceptionally clear—they come with the most awesome charging cable. On one end it's a standard USB, but the other end contains a clever connection that allows it to work with an iPhone Lightning cable or with a standard micro-usb. It's among the best part of the product—it's now my favorite cable.

The "meh"
1. They're "in the ear-canal" style, which blocks sound and adds to the bass. That's a good thing, although if you're used to ear-buds that just rest in your ears, there's definitely a weirdness to outside sound and you can hear your blood pound when you're running.

They're solid, and done well.

So far so good! Great sound! -They Rock!

And the company is an absolute pleasure to deal with as well. Refreshing!
Great sound quality for the price. More bass and noise cancelling than I anticipated. Great value buy and I have already recommended them to friends and family.

Won’t sync with either my IPad or Iphone. Wrote to manufacturer and asked for help. In response they sent the manual. I’m past the return date so I guess I just have to eat the loss. Wish they had been more helpful.

UPDATE
Although the seller couldn’t solve the problem, he did refer me to the manufacturer. They explained that after a reset you have to delete the earbuds from your device in settings so that they can be recognized. I did this and they now work great. I’m a happy customer.

I usually can't wear ear buds, because they always hurt my ears.  I haven't had any problems with these.  The over ear piece was a little softer and more flexible than I expected, which was actually good, cause it didn't bother my ears either.  Pairing these with my iPhone and my Apple Watch was super easy.  The sound is good.  Really, considering the price of these, the sound is pretty great.  So far, I love these!
I buy these all the time ... but this time the left side was defective... 🥺
The headphones have stopped working and I am very disappointed in them

These headphones word really well and this is my second time buying them, I lost the first pair.  The reason I give it 3 stars though is because they start saying "low battery" every minute at 30% battery and then they completely die at about 25-30% battery.  This is very deceiving to me, you think you have enough battery for a workout then they quit 10 minutes into your work out and that's very frustrating.  So as long as you keep them fully charged, they work great.
I loved this product, while it worked.  My headphones just stopped working after about 4 months. The button stopped responding and now I have to order something new.
Grear product! Thank you!
Got these for my boyfriend. He loves them. Says they're the best headphones he has had.
Quality is excellent, I’m so happy with it.
I got these to listen to the TV without my wife having to listen. I am really pleased with the sound quality and the battery life. And the price was right!
Love this product. Great value for a high quality product. With case, car charger, cables etc for the price. Great value, great sound and high quality. thank you

These headphones are the best ones ever. Simple to pair, & they look & feel great on. The sound is better than all the rest that I own & have tried. They are better than somme costing hundreds more & are well worth the price. I have a half dozen sets but by far these are the ones I keep using time after time. You can't go wrong getting a pari for yourself. This is the best way that customers can let other shoppers know how a product works & by far these are the best on the Amazon market. Threat yourself to the best sound around.

Awesome awesome product. I'll buy another pair when these go. Great quality, great sound and they hold a good charge. If I had to give one negative moment about them it would be the sounds breaks up if you're typing and listen to music at the same time. Not a big deal though
I got these for my fiancé and he LOVES them. He said they're just as good as beats but a fraction of the cost. Bluetooth works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase !

The "wings" on these that are supposed to keep them in place are pretty much useless. It's made of a flimsy, pliable plastic and never keeps its shape. You'll feel it flopping around on the top of your ear if you move at all. I finally took a pair of scissors and cut them off entirely.
This headset is the best deal for the price. The wrap around and are surprisingly soft, yet still hold them in place.

So far they are a good deal. They fit my big ears thanks to the selection of ear pieces. Sound is good. Lots of bass and no complaints about sound quality on phone calls. I go 8 hrs at work on a charge without problems. They connect quickly when turned on.
12/17 update. They work very well except they don't always connect properly when turned on. The pause play button works but no audio is sent to the headphones.
Love this headset. Easy to use and the sound is great. Sound is consistent and I like being able to move around.

Overall, these are a decent pair of wireless earbuds. The biggest drawback is the bass. The bass is heavily distorted with these.

The signal is strong and they connect to my iPhone quickly. It is seldom that I hear a skip in my music. They last for hours and charge quickly.

I've purchased, used, and discarded a number of Bluetooth headphones over the last couple of years and these are the best by a long shot. Syncing was a snap, comfort is great out of the box, and sound is fantastic. I do a lot of long-distance bicycle riding and have grown tired of constantly adjusting and re-adjusting the headphones as I ride. These stay put even during the roughest, sweatiest rides. I wear these in the office to listen to music in a rather noisy (talking, phone calls, and general office noise) and the sound dampening is pretty good. It's not on par with over the ear headphones but they're not supposed to be. If you're looking for highly functional, very comfortable headphones with great sound at a good price you really can't go wrong with these.

I'm so impressed I will be buying more as presents. These are truly a great value for the quality of product. You also get a warranty.
Easy to use - Easy to set up. Comes with great accessories.

These actually sounds amazing, not for how cheap they are or in their price range, but actually truly good. I'm actually very surprised. If you're looking for great sounding affordable Bluetooth headphone you need to get these!
These are easy to pair and work great!
Already quit working while I was working out just bought not even a month ago 🙄

Wow!  They came packaged so nice, with everything you could possibly need to use them.  Very soft plastic, easy on the ears.  Quick charging and easy to pair with IPhone.  I've used them a couple of days and so far, they are 5 star worthy!

The headphones are great for listening to music at my desk and walking. However, they don't stay in place well while doing my cardio.

This is my second set. The first stopped working after about 2 1/2 months - it would not charge anymore. After posting my review, the seller, Tekatron contacted me and sent a replacement.

They quit working on the 30th day after receiving them by lose of Bluetooth connectivity and the next morning 3/25/2018 when I went to return them I couldn't as the window closed last night on 3/24/18 while I was in bed trying to get them to work!
A little too bulky like someone else said. I like all the extra stuff it came with. It was very well packaged. Still a 5 star item
one week -  so far so good, sometimes first few seconds the audio shutters like the sync is not exact but no problem after that.  Very comfortable.
These headphones are very comfortable and easy to use.  The sound is super clear and they are very light weight.
going to the gym

I bought these for my husband for his birthday and he loves them!!  He wears them when he works out, does lawn work or relaxes on the back deck. Great sound quality and comfort. I was surprised that they also came with a nice case and an extra long car charger (in addition to the regular charger). Great product at a great price and they were delivered on time
Love it :)
Nice Headphones. They were easy to set up and sound very good. I'm taking a long trip soon and I will really put them to the test.
I used my headphones for the first time this day on a 9 mile run. Sound and battery life are great! Linked up to iPhone 7 very easily.
I'm very happy with these headphones, they are very comfortable and have a good sound for the price.

Purchased primarily for use with Apple Watch 2. Paired flawlessly with my iPhone 6+. Sound and comfort are pretty good for the price... the only problem is that they would NOT PAIR WITH APPLE WATCH 2! I tried everything in the troubleshooting guide. When I contacted them for assistance, they responded with a link to a discussion forum on other earbuds that have difficulty with the Apple Watch and a reminder of their return policy. They are obviously aware of the issue, but choose not alert consumers before purchase.

Pros:

Lightweight
Easy to use and get started
Sound quality is pretty good
Noise cancelling is excellent
Stick in your ears well
Charges fast
Holds a charge on standby for a long time
Volume and switching between songs are easy to change

Cons:

Run time isn't the greatest, but still pretty decent. I've experienced about a 6 hour run time on one charge.
The volume range is a little too loud. I typically have it on the lowest volume and that seems loud at times.

Definitely would and have recommended to friends and family.

I wanted Bluetooth earbuds for my work place these are just what I was looking for!  Fast charging comfortable fit and awesome sound quality.  I had my husband try them and lived them too.  I ordered a set for him also.

I bought 2 (1 for my boyfriend, 1 for me). My boyfriend's worked perfectly... mine not so much (because, obviously... me and my bad luck). I tried them for the first time yesterday - charged it and then connected it with my phone via Bluetooth. I tried using it at the gym (very anxiously might I add) but noticed that the connection was constantly being disrupted... I was literally 1-2 steps away from my phone and the the music was going on and off. I tried putting the Bluetooth on/off, tried "Removing this device" from my list, and even pressed the power button for 7 seconds while connected...nothing worked. I just sent an email to SENSO so hopefully it'll be resolved soon...

I exercise every other day, religiously, for about an hour and a half. So roughly, that's 3.5 days out of a week, for a total of about 5.25 hrs a week. With roughly 52 weeks in a year, I used these headphones for 273 hrs in a year for the gym alone. After roughly 819 gym hours (three years) and who knows how many hours outside of the gym, I've finally lost connection to the left ear. These earbuds survived extensive phone calls, music & video watching, and sweaty thrashings (that is accompanied by an intense workout). I can't speak for other people's experiences, but these earbuds have served me quite well and I couldn't have been happier. I think I'll buy another pair too!

This headphones impressed me. I like the sound and how they look. Love the fact that they came with so many accessories, and they were easy to set up. Main thing I like is that they stay in place without hurting my ear. I tried so many kinds and nothing would stay in while I was running etc. except for some really painful others. These I had them on for like 2 hours straight and I didnt feel any discomfort. I would recommend them, probably top choice for the price they cost.
There is a little downside it is the mic. I dont know why but the other person almost couldnt hear me and when I tried to record a voice message it was very unclear. Maybe it's because of the position of the mic... or maybe not... anyway they do the job.
It's great...light and fits well.  Was surprised there was no plug-in charger with it, only a lead to charge it from the computer.

The sound is awesome! I am guessing  I sort of have to turn the earbuds in my ears because I am very small and the rubber part that is the ear clip is way above my ear. Not a deal breaker just an adjustment

I had another bluetooth earbuds that have quit working. I loved having the wireless connection so looked for another pair. I initially had some trouble connecting the sensos and contacted support. They responded quickly and resolved my issue completely. The earbuds are very comfortable and lightweight and they connect to my phone without having to go to settings on my phone

I tried, I really did try to like these.  The first set weren't waterproof and died after a couple weeks.  No big deal.  They didn't connect to my iPhone most of the time, anyway.  Got the replacement set and same issues.  Sometimes it would connect, most of the time not.  If I played with it long enough, it would eventually connect with the iPhone.  Then there is the range issue.  If my phone is in the kitchen and I walk to the bathroom, about 25-feet, I loose the signal.  Continuously listening to a book, these earphones are good for about five-hours before they die.  I dared not take them to the water because the "waterproof" cover for the volume controls came off one day.  Now for the good news...for the price, they aren't too bad, assuming you don't mind playing with them all the time to get them to connect...let me restate that...they almost always connect but it is almost always a one-way connection.  I can control the iPhone but no sound comes out the earpieces without my messing with it for five-minutes turning off and back on again.  You get what you pay for.

After a few months of regular use, the left earbud on the Senso headphones stopped working. When I sought support, the company told me to factory reset them. When that did not work, they stopped communication and did not fulfill their warranty.

These headphones are an absolute great buy. The sound is clear, crisp, and all around great quality with a good balance of treble and bass despite some more active sessions when I'm working out or running and do not seem to be impacted by the moisture in my ears. The build quality is excellent and they seem to withstand everyday use very well. They fit great in my ears and I don't have to worry about them falling off especially when I'm running. They have excellent battery life lasting up to 8 hours with one charge and was even fully charged when they were first delivered. I am also able to see the battery level on my phone when they're connected which is very helpful. They connect almost instantly to my bluetooth devices which is a welcome change from some of my older headphones which would either takes a couple of minutes to establish a connection or experience an intermittent connection loss from time to time. The volume and other controls seem pretty responsive whenever I engage them. They also came with a few great accessories including a carrying case, charging cable for the headphones, charging cable for either a phone or other mobile device, charging adapter for my car, 3 sets of ear inserts to fit a range of ear sizes, and 2 sets cable clips to be able to tighten the cable that goes behind your neck for a tighter fit. Overall I and pleased with this purchase and would definitely recommend getting if you're looking for some great headphones that excel for active workouts as well as just basic everyday use.
Awesome sound quality, very comfortable, comes with all of the chargers and accessories you'd ever need.  I have no constructive criticism for the manufacturer because i have nothing to criticize!

Love these ear buds. I never write reviews, but this product really impressed me, and thought it was worthy of my time to share my thoughts. So comfortable and easy to use. The quality and sound is exactly what I was looking for. I plan on buying two more pairs as a gift for each of my boys. They go thru the wired buds like candy, always wearing them out so only one side works. I hope these stand up to the test of time.
Run/work out with these daily.  Love them!
Well worth the money!!  They do cut in and out if battery is getting low (especially in a windy day), but overall very good!

I love these headphones! I love how comfortable the ear pieces are. The cord is so light, I barely felt it while I was running at the gym. Finally I feel like I can work out without having to mess with my headphones too much or worry about them popping out. I bought a Bluetooth wireless set before this but it was bulky & bothered me while running. Thank you for making these so I can run with ease!
The best! I’ve have these over a year and beat them up but they continue to perform beautifully.

I bought these for running and working out. When you sweat the cord sticks to your neck and pulls the ear buds loose from your ears. I'm a big guy and the over ear part is too big. I can put my finger on top of my ear between the headphone hoop they are so big. If this was smaller I don't think the cord would be a problem. Also I think if the cord went over the ear it would be better. By pulling down it pulls the ear buds loose.
It's good so far :))
Great headphones, works wonderfully, awesome sound, very comfortable. and awesome service, would definitely recommend and buy again.
Perfect arrived just in time for memorial day weekend by the beach and pool.  The sound quality is perfect and even experienced some water splashing without issue.  Charge lasted all day.
Outstanding product.  My son loved it so much I let him keep mine and I bought a new pair. If you buy them you will definitely love them.

Broke after one month using:(

I use them to walk the dog and love them! They have great sound and hold a charge well.  They paired very easily.  I wish I had bought them earlier.  They are a good price for what you get.  Even the carrying case is a nice extra!
Like ease of use and sound quality.
Very weak Bluetooth receiver and they don’t stay in very well

Got it for my daughter and she seem to like it a lot

Very good deal !

Work great, awesome sound, and they don't fall off my head. I like the ear straps, I have a big head with big ears, its hard to keep ear buds from falling out or off but these stay in perfectly, even while biking.
These will randomly disconnect from my phone. Battery life will show 90% but they will only last about 20 minutes after they get to this point. Battery life is probably only 3 hours.
Good wireless headphones, comes with a lot of extra things and case which is awesome. I enjoy using it during workouts, just wish the noise cancelling was a bit better.
The Headphones are very comfortable, great sound. One issue is distance from the device, more than 50' the sound breaks up. But overall very happy with the product.

Great sound from these earphones at reasonable price.  Very easy to pair the my I-7 and stay in place while exercising at the gym.

Great sound, the bass is better than my Bose earphones.
I am really enjoying using my new Bluetooth headset.  I didn’t have to spend a fortune for good quality. The only issue is that it is not noise cancelling but still good value for the cost.
They are so inconvenient. Every time I try to use them they say they are connected but I play the music and it doesn't play. DO NOT BUY THESE THEY ARE A RIP OFF
Arrived on time, comfortable fit, great sound, ingenious charging cable fits Apple and USB Micro, great pricing, happy customer.
Love these!

Work well with my Moto G4 plus and with my iPad Pro. Quick connect. Fit well even with my glasses. Feels and looks little odd as they are a little rectangular box hanging on your ear. But sound is good and controls are easy to locate. Battery charge life has been good for my use. I have not tried them in running or exercise. My principal purpose for them was wearing in the evening while I review schoolwork from a website. My over ear headphones with cord would end up tangling up in notebooks or textbooks and be a hassle. These have eliminated that. I cannot speak to the sound cancelling qualities, seems to me that is a function of how well they fit your ear canal.
They work good
Great product, fast ship, great price. 5 stars all the way!

it was perfect, good sound, good everything. I charged it and it didn't take the charge.  i got them exchanged and after a month of use the same issue...  I wouldn't recommend this product.  I want my money back
The sound quality is perfect, love the fit
Love these headphones.  Sound is great and the price is very reasonable.
For this type of headphone I'm not too picky, but if I have to turn up the music 10-20% just to hear over jogging speed wind noise; sorry no thanks.

I've had these headphones for about a week and a half now, and have used them pretty much every day. My first impressions were great. The packaging and accessories are nice (USB car adapter is quite handy), they look great, paired easily on every device I tried, and they certainly feel solidly made. Sound quality was another issue.

The clarity on these are nice, and they are plenty loud, but they just sound muted. Not distorted or muffled; just......off. The bass is ok, the highs are pretty nice, but the mids feel less present than they should be to me. I guess a good way to put it is that the mids lack pop. They're clear enough, but are somewhat lower in tone than you may be used to. I've tried them on my phone, my tablet, Echo Dot, and computer. Each gave the same results.

Voice calls seemed ok, but I haven't really used them in noisy or windy environments, so YMMV.

They do come with quite a range of rubber pieces to fit your ears, so for most people fit will probably not be an issue, and they are comfortable. I just found that over a 30 minute span on the treadmill I have to reach up and adjust them in my ear a couple of times because they tend to shift on me. Maybe it's the really soft material used for the part that goes over the ear, or maybe it is just my ears, I dunno.

Range is ok for my use. I guess I got around 40ft between rooms. I'd suspect you could get a bit farther outdoors. I mostly have the device I am listening to close by, so that works fine for me.

I will say this though, customer service seems great. I was confused by one of the cables they sent. I assumed it was the wrong one, so shot a message to customer service. I had a reply within a couple of hours telling me that the cable is multi use, and explaining how to disconnect the iPhone plug from the micro USB to use it for charging the headphones. Kudos on that.

All in all, they are ok for the price. It's not something that inspires brand loyalty to the point where I can say definitively that my next pair will be these, but they work well enough (assuming the fit issue doesn't worsen). I don't regret the purchase (I still use them daily), but if I should lose these tomorrow, I may want to try a different set. Not because they're bad. They're just not quite the pair that would be the end of the headphone journey for me.
Doesn't fit comfortably, sound quality not great.

They lasted only 2 weeks worth of workouts and died.  They don't turn on or charge.  Complete garbage.  Spend a little more for something better.  When they did work, they were great.  Don't expect anything amazing on longevity.  Note: I do sweat a lot when working out if that is what killed them.

Great product, excellent service and great price.  I purchased a pair of Beats PowerBeats3 earphones for $130.  Took forever to pair and the volume was not as loud as I thought, especially when used flying.  I just purchased these SENSO bluetooth for $38.  They fit great, sound incredible and paired with ease.  They come with a great case, USB charger for power outlet in car and several additional ear buds.  I liked them so much, I bought 2 pair.

I receive an email from one of the owners, Kenneth B.  Sound is fine with music, but the mic is not operating as it should with making calls.  I try to make a hands free call through mic and once the call begins dialing I hear a fluttering sound (almost like an old phone dialing).  I cannot hear the person talking to me through the phone, and they cannot hear me.  I am going to return this item but am open to hearing back from the owner.  thankyou

Great headphones. I use them everyday at work. Music sounds great also the Bluetooth for phone calls is really nice. Good price

I used these to listen to music while running outside and around the house. They lasted about a year. First, one side went completely dead, now they wont stay connected for more than 2 minutes and it says its charged, but they wont make it 1 full song before dying.
Excellent earbuds. Long battery life, exceptionally quiet.

I have never been able to wear earbuds or have them stay in place. I love these. They are so secure in your ears. The ear pieces that go around your ear is super soft and pliable. Very comfortable. Running and jumping rope no problem. I am very satisfied.

Love these headphones. Great sound and easy to setup. So nice not having to deal with a cord attached to my phone anymore. Can't beat the price of these either.

I LOVE that it can pair with two Bluetooth devices simultaneously, so I can stream on my iPad and still get calls on my phone.

That being said, they are much more comfortable and work better than other more expensive earphones that I've purchased. Easy to connect to devices. The on/off/pause/play button is easy to accidentally press while adjusting them while on. I would have like to see them advertised as ear phones or in-ear headphones, though.

These Bluetooth Headphones fit well, and feel great. They sound stage is very large and has deep bass, more that I had expected. The range is pretty good as well as the battery life is spot on, even at near full volume (not recommended to use full volume they get LOUD). I was weary of the wire getting in the way but since the controls are on the the ear buds the wire is never in the way and is super light so it feels non-existent. Also since the controls are on the ear bud, it is easy to locate them- on top of that the controls work really well; I might recommend flipping the volume up and volume down buttons but that is my only recommendation. For me the memory foam ear tips work the best, they seal extremely well, after contacting Invotek they were able to track down some replacements that I could buy for feature use, I highly recommend getting a pack: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01ABWGHHG/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1

That brings me to my next topic, their customer service is on point, very quick to respond, very devoted to customer service and experience. I had the delight to work with Kimberly Pollak and I would like to give her a shout out. I have seen other reviews that say this product sometimes fails a few months into use, so don't forget to register the product for the amazing one year warranty that they provide; remember the device is not water proof so don't go swimming with it either.

I bought these upon the recommendation of my son, who has had used his for 2 1/2 years with no problems.  They are comfortable and easy to pair. The sound blocking quality is good too. I am disappointed now as I am having to start the search for new sound blocking earbuds that are comfortable and have quality sound.

FINALLY! I have bought over four different pairs of wireless headphones. These are the only ones that both fit in my ears and stay in my ears during my workouts (because they do not have the mic as a part of the string around the head). GREAT product to use at any time, including while running!

I want to hear details and a full range and they deliver well beyond their price point.  They stay in and are comfortable.  Range is solid.  I do not stray more than 20 feet but over that range there is zero degradation.  They come with really  nice accessories too including a car charger and dual iphone/usb cable that is quite innovative.  So this is a great deal all around.  I thought about downgrading a star because outside, on days with a steady breeze, they get a bit noisy the way the wind whips around them.  Something I have not experienced with other headphones. But it is too sweet a deal overall to do that - so 5 stars it is!

My only caveat is be aware if you have multiple bluetooth transmissions going at once (my house can have up to 4 devices transmitting at once)....it will probably pick up the device you are closest to first when pairing.

When I first got these, I was so excited. I hated the corded ear buds I've had in the past when at the gym. These wireless buds worked, sounded fine, but the battery drains WAY too quickly! After every use, even if only for a half hour, I have to recharge it or the next time I go to use them, the battery will be drained. Recently, I had charged them up to full, popped them in my purse, and went on a train. About an hour into my ride, I pulled them out to listen to a podcast. And they had NO battery life.

If the battery would hold a charge longer, if I didn't have to charge them every single time I use them, then I would most certainly have given them a higher rating. I never had issues with sound cutting out or connectivity. They worked fine for that and the sound, while not high quality, certainly wasn't terrible. But the battery issue - that's a deal breaker for me.

I use these 3-4 days a week while working out. At least 3 of the days I am lifting weights for around 2 hours, as I do powerlifting. The fourth day is some sort of cardio, usually running. For both the gym and running, these are perfect. You can get them quite loud (if you’re like me and turn it way up when you’re about to do a set) or just mild enough to hear it and not destroy your eardrums. Bluetooth them to my iPhone for the first time and I find that the best EQ for them is “Rock,” which balances the bass out a little more. Sometimes (without the proper EQ and/or adjustments) the bass can be a little crackly and sound like a blown speaker in a car if the volume is up too much or the right adjustments haven’t been taken. “Well why would I want to buy these if I have to do a bunch of stuff to use them?” Well, they’re 20 bucks and you’re just going to workout in them. Go drop 200 bucks on some powerBeats and tell me how long they last. These have lasted me two solid years before I finally broke the earpiece while deadlifting, and the manufacturer sent me another pair.
liked my  pair so much I bought a pair for my wife as well. easy to use and great sound. great value for the price.

These speakers are amazing. They are great for my Gym workout. They say they are waterproof but I have not tried that so I can not speak to that claim. They do hold a charge for a long time, and when you need to recharge them, they seem to charge quickly. They are comfortable in the ear and come with a lot of great accessories. These are a winner in my book. The price point feels like I should be paying double for these.

These actually stay in my ears!  The sound is very good, with both speaking and music.  It is easy to connect with my Iphone.  The button to turn it on and off is just the right size to touch when they are still in my ears.  I like that it tells me when they are connected and when they disconnect.  The part around the ear is very flexible and does not bother my ear, even when I am wearing my glasses.
The mic is not great for phone calls.  The sound is good.  It stays connected.

- Update: less than one year, they will no longer charge. Not sure what the deal is, but I'm pretty frustrated. Tried another cable and still wouldn't work. Tried in a different port, no go.

Really nice bluetooth headphones.  Great sound, excellent battery life.  I have not had success with bluetooth headphones until I got these.  A voice tells you when they are connected and disconnected; a really nice feature that was a beef with my prior headphones.  The description on Amazon doesn't say that they come with a really nice small hard shell case that keeps your charging cord, extra buds, and the headphones themselves safe, which fits perfectly in a pocket of a gym bag.  For a name I hadn't heard of before, I am very impressed with the quality and performance of these headphones.  If you are on the fence, buy them!!!
