Yjisbis  great product long life battery.
This bluetooth headset does not disappoint. The headset is easy to use, comfortable, and it comes with a nice box to keep it all together in.
This is my second pair I have purchased. I have one for work and for home. I use them both for daily workouts and to listen to audio books, pod casts, news and music .
Love it!, best for the price, good quality excellent  sound and I’ll  buy it again

Use these all the time in my wood shop and cutting grass. They work awesome. 3 hours of battery life and enough bluetooth range I can set my phone down and walk around my garage without losing connection

Shockingly good for the price! I needed wireless new headphones for the gym, seeing as my last ones were hardly loud enough to hear at the highest setting. The audio quality is really good and when I'm huffing and puffing along at the gym it cancels the noise out.

Very comfortable. The sound is great. I bought them to use for walking in the pool as part of an injury rehab. The ear hooks are barely noticeable. The only issue I have is that the volume does not go low enough. With my phone's volume all the way to its lowest setting I still can't hear what's going on around me. It's almost too loud considering the semi-quiet environment I'm in.

don't write reviews much, but I've been trying out a lot of bluetooth headsets recently (Oh Pixel 2 why have you gone to the dark side and done away with your 3.5 mm audio jack). For the price these just can't be beat. The sound is perfectly respectable. They hold a charge. My phone friendos report that the mic works great.

These are my first wireless earbuds and I love them. I use them to listen to music. It seems like you can  hear each instrument. I just wish they lasted longer between charges, but good for the price, I think.
Item left ear-guard damage/defective. Right phone bass not functioning.
love these great for my walks

Great for running.  Pairs with phone, tablet, TV.  Does not work with the ps4 but that is not what I bought it for.  I travel a lot for work and these headphone deliver great sound, compact and love the traveling case.  Great product at a fantastic price.

had these since January of 2018.

They just died for the first time. I charged them all day. now they keep flashing red and blue and they won’t connect to anything. And they turn off! I’m pissed!
this is my second paid. First pair lasted three years. This one about a month. Won’t turn on or charge
Earbuds work wonderfully, highly recommend.
I've purchased a few headphones similar to these.  These sound a bit better and will hopefully last longer than other brands I've tried.  Comfortable fit and, at least so far, good customer service.

Come in a great little case with charger and extra ear buds. Easy Bluetooth connect. Very comfortable and charge lasts a long time compared to the ones I had through my cell phone carrier. Sound is good and clear for phone calls and music.

For the few minutes that I used these headphones sound was nice and clear.  The headphones didn't fall out of my ear per instruction should be easy to use.  Come with additional ear pieces for different size.
Easy to use - good quality. Nice sound for audio and for phone calls as well. Good investment

I just hooked this item up after a couple of months' wondering whether or not I'd give it as a holiday gift. I didn't realize what a good value this is: It contains everything you need for charging via wall charger or automobile, a total of three pairs of earplugs in sizes, and thorough instructions for set up and troubleshooting. Sound quality is fine for jogging or walking, though not "audiophile" quality. I would recommend this item!

These earbuds worked great right out of the box.  When they needed to be charged, I charged them and now they won't connect to any of my Bluetooth devices.  I will be returning for a refund and will try something else.
Love this product. Great battery life. Good sound.
Sound quality is just as clear as my kids Beats headphones. Email from the CEO making sure I was nothing less than thrilled with my new headsets makes for a great customer experience.

The sound quality is very good and they easily fit my ears my only problem is the button to turn on and off is so easily accessible that I find myself accidentally shutting them off when I adjust the fit around my ears
Nice earbuds great sound. Can't beat for the price

My experience has been very positive. The pairing was incredibly smooth and easy, and the headphones work extremely well. So far I have been very pleased with the quality of the headphones; I would recommend them!

They are okay for audio only (music, podcasts, or audio books).  There seems to be audio sync lag no matter how close you are when watching video.  I had hoped to use these for gaming but there is 1-2 seconds of audio lag and my desktop/BT receiver are right next to me.  Still happy with the price, I will use them for audio books and music.
These are great! My iPhone shows the battery level on them also. Would buy again!
The wind noise is brutal.  Seem like great quality for indoors.  If you are running I don't see how you could use these.  I returned them.
Great head phones, reasonable price and I love that there are multiple ear bud sizes. I hate having anything pushing into my ear canal but the small huds work great and are very comfortable!
love them, very comfortable and the charge lasts a long time
So far so good. Have used it a handful of times and it’s seems to be working great so far. Loud enough & it does cancel out noise.
Worked exactly as other reviews have stated.  Comfortable, Great sound.  They do not come off.
Great head phones for a low price. Highly recommend for others to purchase that are looking to purchase Bluetooth headphones.
After one month it did not take a charge

Love them! 30+ year IT guy, It takes a lot to impress me. These are worth every penny. Sound is great, Fit is great, Soft rubber ear surrounds are very comfortable, other ear surrounds are hard plastic, I like these better. Battery life is awesome. Charging is fast, Pairing and Verbalized Connected and Disconnect. Power/Charge LED is excellent. 3 sizes of ear buds and case included. Excellent packaging and instructions. I have been using for about 3 weeks. Very pleased. Note: I did install a sound EQ APP on my android to make music sound better. I have also used a Blue tooth extender with these for TV, PC and Phone (Avantree LONG RANGE Bluetooth Transmitter and Receiver 2-in-1 for TV / Speakers, Voice Prompt, aptX Low Latency, Support Optical & 3.5mm Audio - Oasis https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01H6I3YGK/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o03_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1) This extender works excellent and gets me about 5X the normal BT range. Great for working around the house and yard. Cutting the lawn and working in the garden. I place my phone and the BT extender on the patio table with a portable battery plug them in and sound everywhere I go up to 60ft (no obstructions), indoors about 25ft depending on walls. Both are excellent.

I bought these headphones so I wouldn't have to hold my smartphone with my hands while out walking in the cold.  Unfortunately, this doesn't work so well.  Either the Bluetooth from my phone isn't strong enough or the receiver on this unit isn't strong enough to pick up the signal.  I still have to walk with my phone in my hand and my hand raised up a bit above waist height.  The volume on this unit is either too strong or too low.  There is a volume rocker (?), but I can't adjust the sound as I would like.  Usually when I am walking, I leave the earbuds out a bit from my ears so I can hear but I don't hurt my eardrums.  When I am inside and don't have to deal with outside noise, though, I the lower volume setting is just right.  I like that I am not attached by a wire to my smartphone.  Recently, I have begun using these with my new computer which has Bluetooth.  I am enjoying these earbuds.  I just wish I had a better connection to my smartphone while walking.  I don't know where the fault lies.
Great sound quality. Easy to use. Fast shipping.
It's so nice not to be tethered to a device with the headset.  This is convenient and sounds great!  Love 'em!

Pros- Great sound and battery life
Cons- they seem to collect moisture in your ear after awhile. Noise Cancelling should not be listed as a feature, as the only noise they cancel is due to the plug being in your ear muffling sounds- but not a big deal cause who expects these to cancel noise.
Unknowns- waterproof? never got them wet other then sweat from workouts.

I’ve ordered this product twice. I ordered the first set two years ago. They lasted two years, and I have nothing bad to say about them. They had great sound and microphone, great battery, and fit well around the ears. I recently ordered a second set since the original set topped working, and the quality is terrible. The microphone is not effective, the ear pieces feel cheap (the original set were a nice gauge rubber that felt substantial), and the plastic used feels very cheap. Overall, a tremendous downgrade from past products and incredibly disappointing.

I would buy them again...and almost had to. I had them for two months, took one out and it broke apart. They weren't eligible for return through Amazon so I thought I might have to buy them again but then I noticed that they had a one year defect warranty. I contacted the main company's support team and within a day, they sent a replacement. They were very nice and the replacement process was smooth.
About the headphones: I love how noise-cancelling these headphones are. I wear them on planes and I don't hear any external noise.
I go straight from the workout to the shower with them. I don't run them under the water or anything but a little splash doesn't seem to damage them.
I'm a short distance jogger and they stay in my ears.
They are comfortable too. I wear them for hours at a time and I have even slept in them before.
I didn't want to spend the money to buy them again but I would :)

My husband loved these and said they were the most comfortable headphones he'd ever worn.  Unfortunately they quit working after only 5 weeks of gentle use during his dialysis treatments. So disappointed!
I have had a set for a while now, I liked them so much I bought some for my girlfriend.
Best Headphones I've ever owned!
Giving these a 4 only because I haven't had them long enough. So far I love the fit, sound, feel. Very good set of headphones

These headphones do not fit my ears. The loops that go over top of the ear are easy to big. My previous Bluetooth headphones had multiple sizes of ear wraps, as well as the plugs. These would also benefit from that.

That being said, they are light enough that they stay in anyway. They work great, despite being the wrong size.

Only giving it 1-star because it works when you aren't moving. If you are wanting to sit on the couch and listen to the game, these are good. On the flip side, if you want to do any time of movement, such as running or biking, DO NOT BUY THESE. They cut in and out constantly. You can't even hear the music. Better off spending for money for quality ones than these, the ones Amazon Suggested. Not worth you wasting money. I am going to return them and get my money back.
They're everything I ever wanted. I would have given 5 stars but the thing that goes behind your ear is a little too loseriously for my liking. I'd rather it be a little tighter.

i recentely purchased senso.to replace wireless ones that my dog ate.. However I had ulko prior.Senso plugs do NOT STAY IN MY ear walking let alone running..You would think the flexability around the ear would be an advantage.IT IS NOT!
It is a major disadvantage and im very disatisfide.i will be giving this product a poor rating due this.

Love love love these headphones..Just what I was looking for. I had to order another pair for my Husband.  Great quality on sound, perfect fit, and I love that you can use it to make phone calls. I can control just a touch of a button with having to stop my workout to answer a call.  Awesome! I highly recommend this product. Great price, great quality. I give it 10 stars if I could. Great job SENSO!

Great bluetooth headphones that compete very well with very expensive competitor name brands. The battery seems to last about 6-8 hrs depending on how loud, how often you change songs, or use the other features. It's not crazy impressive, but it's good enough to last about an hour session at the gym all week.

I bought these for my wife's birthday. She was very pleased with the ease of use and the ability to connect with two devices at same time. She consistently got 8 to 9 hours of use per charge and full charge took less than 2 hours.

Unfortunately, after 5 months of steady use the headphones lost the ability to charge. We contacted Senso customer service and were pleasantly surprised by the truly 5 star customer service. The support team responded within an hour. They were courteous, professional, and provided troubleshooting steps in a clear manner that was easy to follow. When it was apparent that recalibration would not solve the issue they arranged for replacement headphones to be shipped. The whole process, from our initial contact to receiving order information on replacement headphones, was completed in less than 5 hours and this was on a Sunday! We received the new headphones 4 days later.

We have recommended the headphones to other family members who have not had any issues and even with the charging issue we still feel comfortable recommending them to others, especially since we know the quality of care the company puts behind their product.

These are perfect for the gym.  I use the foam earbud pads that come in the set.  They stayed in my ears perfectly during a rough workout. I was surprised to find by pushing the button on the right earbud you can cycle thru the last number dialed, the music on your device and another Bluetooth option.  I’m very glad that I got these and not another set!
The headphones are very comfortable and they have a very long battery life.

I used these headphones when jogging 2-3 times per week for about 10 months and they worked great.  Then one day they just wouldn't turn on. I had a lot going on personally at the time and didn't get around to checking on the warranty until it was literally 363 days after I'd purchased them.  I emailed Senso to tell them the issue and got a pretty quick response back with a troubleshooting tip to try.  If that had worked, I would have been happy with that, but it didn't work for me, which I told them (through email) and they are sending me a new pair, no more questions. Totally standing by the one-year warranty.  If you're thinking about getting these, I would recommend it. Hopefully you won't have issues, but if you do (within one year) you have nothing to lose as the customer service is great!
Sounds good. Feels good. Great case. Wonderful battery life. Comes with these sweet memory foam type ear pieces as well. They don't come out of my ears. Buy these. Oh and impressive bass as well.
Great purchase

Good sound; good battery life; not as easy as it should be to put on, although not bad; comfortable, although if worn for a prolonged period it could get a sore; excellent price; very good quality. So far it's a winner.

The good - very good sound for rhe price.

The bad - these drop out frequently. Very disappointed. The bluetooth connection is simply is too unstable.

Delivered quickly, well packaged. good sound and comfortable,

Had a problem with one channel cutting out after about 6 months of use (I am hard on headphones). SENSO's customer service was above and beyond all my expectations. **Highly recommended**

I have had the Wireless beats by Dre for a couple years and wanted to test out these. Great for the price but the sound quality is just not the same as a more expensive pair.

Also forgot about the battery low issue. On my Iphone it shows you the battery percentage of the wireless device connected. So anywhere from 30-50% battery life it starts saying "battery low" in the headphones. With 30-50% charge left it says this over and over and over...
Sound great!
I've had these headphones for about a week. They are comfortable, have very good sound quality and quickly connect to both my phone and to my computer. They are just as advertised.

Devices on each ear are too big and the advertised noise cancelling feature is nothing more then just good earplugs with sound.  I just took these with me on a flight and tried them out.  NO NOISE CANCELLING!!  I'm so glad I brought my Sony Headphones (noise cancelling) with me so I didn't have to listen to the whine of the jet engines.  Thank you Sony!!  Returning these.

These earbuds are amazing! I’ve owned them since nov 2016 and never had one problem. I’ve recently purchased beats studio 3 over ear headphones and Powerbeats 3 earbuds and these blow both of them away. These have better bass way more volume and just plain sound better in every way. They are way more comfy than either of those. I also paid 377 dollars for Bose quiet comfort qc 35 II and those made my ears extremely hot after 30 mins and put pressure on your head. These 30 dollar ear buds blow all of them away in every way. I only have to charge em once a week also. I’ve never had any connection issues once. As soon as you turn them on their connected instantly. The Powerbeats 3 I had to reconnect everytime I turned them on and off even tho I use Apple phone and they have that Apple chip. If you want some great sounding buds n wanna save a ton of money I’d but these. They came with so many accessories and a way better case than the 200 dollar Powerbeats also I could go on forever but trust me I know what I’m talking about. The Powerbeats 3 buds had not enough volume or bass these blow them out the water!

I really enjoy using the Senso ActivBuds. I had been using the Senso ActivBuds S-250 for about two months when the right microphone stopped working. I contacted customer support after hours and received immediate feedback on how to fix the problem. I was not able to fix the problem so a replacement was immediately shipped to me. I am so impressed with Senso's fast response and willingness to honor the one-year warranty. I recommend the ActivBuds not just for quality and great performance but a responsive customer service team. Thank you Senso.

Had these for six months now and have a problem. Very static yin left ear and will shut off if the cord is flexed. Called customer service and told the issues. Sent me a new pair couple of days later. Very happy with my experience
Great Product
Very comfortable and great sound. Excellent for work outs.

Just did my first workout with these headphones. The sound quality is great, and they really do block out a lot of background noise. The earpieces are comfortable, and did not bounce around or move throughout my workout.

Comes with its own carrying case as well as car charger which is perfect for charging on the way to the gym. The charger also connects to USB, so it can be plugged into a cube and charged on the wall as well.

Overall great product so far, no real complaints. Although I'm not a huge fan of the over the ear piece, but only because I don't like the look of anything over the ear. The piece itself is very flexible and much more comfortable than other in the ear headphones that have over the ear pieces like this. Helps to keep headphones in place, and does not irritate after a while of being in place.

Would recommend!
The sound is not clear and almost everytime there is a problem with bluetooth connection.

I liked everything about these, with the exception of the part which fits over the ear. It's uncomfortable and doesn't stay hooked on the ear, allowing the buds to come out. Otherwise, the quality of them is very good.  I hated to give it a 3 rating, but if they don't stay in your ear. . .

I Bought a pair for my tweenie daughter and niece for Christmas after reading all the good reviews.  I was looking for good quality buds at a reasonable price. I hope these are it.. Giving it 3 stars for packaging, for now.
Y'all I HATE ear buds, seriously, I'm 29 and have never owned a pair because they all feel too big and bulky for my ears. But...I LOVE these ones! I can't believe I actually like them and they fit!

Major Value!!  Really nice protective packaging. Charged, paired and connected with no problem whatsoever.  Instructions specific, clear and easy to implement.  Sound quality even better than I had hoped.  Very pleased with this purchase.
Really comfortable and stays on with extreme exercising sound is what you would expect ok

The main issue I am having with these earbuds is the L and R printed on the side of the earbuds is extremely small.  Even with reading glasses and a magnifying glass, the letters are just too small.  The area available for the L and R is large, but they chose to only use 1% of that area.  Not sure why, but it makes the product difficult to use.

Poor sound .. I am not sure how the other  reviewer's are reading this high. The sound is poor quality and doesn't have the bass or treble. They do have good packaging and comes with lots of accessories. If you're not interested in good sound. This is a good headset for you
Sounded ok - then all of a sudden the power button broke. Now they're in the garbage.
they are amazing.  Sound is great.  Love the feel, not too bulky and very comfortable.  my only regret is not getting them sooner.  Buy them now, thank me later!
These are excellent! Better than the big priced earbuds

Wow. I really love these. I wear glasses and they fit comfortably with them. Oh and bonus items came with it.
They have a great volume to them. Although the person next you may hear your music if it’s fairly quiet, if you bump your music like I do and turn it all the way up.
Wear test: comfortable, and I bounced around and they didn’t come off easy!
They were great while they lasted. Stopped working after 3 weeks ! Won't charge or anything!!!!
Way cheaper than Bose or ipods! And Sound as Good 👍
Awesome sound!

They stay in just fine while jogging or lifting weights. However, the hooks don't hold the earbuds in, the actual earbuds hold themselves in. I doubt they'll stay in for everyone because I the size of peoples' ears are different. They also hurt after about a half hour or so of listening.

I'd be fine with all this, but for the fact that the sound cuts out if there is too much movement (such as jogging). What's the point of getting these to work out with if they cut out with movement? I definitely do not recommend, and am in the process of returning them. I give two stars because, if you stay still enough, they don't sound bad.
I recommend it ! Finally, I found an excellent headphone and it is a reasonable price.
Would not stay on. We're bulky. Also kept shutting down my kindle which I've used bluetooth headphones on before with no problems.
Really good headphones but some static when talking on the phone with them
Excellent headphones, they work great. Had to edit right ear bud stopped working after three months. Excellent customer service new pair sent out right away.
Love these! Excellent headphones!

Excellent, I was surprised of the quality of the active buds but also the entire package presentation. It was followed up by an email from the supplier which to me not only a great customer experience but standing behind their product. Very happy!

These earphones are exactly what I was looking for! Extremely light, the sound is perfect, they won't fall off during training and the price is right. I've been using them for a couple of weeks now and I'm really satisfied!

I know reviews for this product are great but I myself have had many connectivity issues with this product. It is very hard to connect it to multiple devices and there is interference when connected to multiple devices. I did not expect it to have same performance and stability as some of the high end headphones but I think connectivity issues I’m facing are basic Bluetooth 101.

It could very well be that I received a defective unit
had a small problem but the support group was very helpful and knowledgeable the headphones are good with good sound.

I was really exited about these..I'm an audiophile..love my music
I listen to music in the shower but live in an apartment complex so I worry bout bothering my neighbors...
if you want these for listening in the shower you better have your blue tooth source about 3 feet away
as soon as it gets wet...PPPPPPPPPPPP
constant disconnections and blips
just to let you know..I have a top of the line blue tooth extender too
and a set of Tranya bt ear buds that ABSOLUTELY ROCK!!!!
sound great and I can go across the hall and do my laundry and go completely out of the building to get my mail and they still stay 90% connected
don't get me wrong...for workin out,maybe rain...ok
but takin a shower with em,,,,not so much
I'm hopin Tranya will come out with a "shower"set
P.S.
the whole "shower" thing isn't advanced enough yet so beware
I bought a set of
True Wireless Earbuds xFyro xS2 Bluetooth Headphones Microphone IPX7 Waterproof
they were even worse
so the both of them will sit up in the top of my closet doin nothin
just beware and give the shower thing a little more time to tweak
good luck
good life

I finally decided to try the cord free life, and this was my first stop on the journey.

Pros:
-Comes with nice case and a bunch of different size earbuds
-Also includes magnetic adapters for all kinds of things
-Pairing is very easy
-Controls work well, even with two features using the same buttons (volume and track skip are the same buttons either pressed or held)

Cons:
-Had what I can only describe as syncing issues. The audio would sometimes cut to silence, and then suddenly play back the missing few seconds at super speed to catch up to the phone. I have plenty of other bluetooth speakers that my phone and apps pair with flawlessly, so I can only conclude it's an issue with the headphones. Seems to be once every 2-5 minutes while listening.
-This is something I never thought to look out for, but the control boxes are so boxy that you can hear even a slight breeze whipping around them. It's loud enough to make it hard to hear the sound coming from the headphones! Seriously, I don't know what's up with that.
-My ears are really small and a not properly shaped, so getting the headphones to sit properly and comfortably was an issue.

After a few days of trying to acclimate to this pair of headphones I have to give up. I will be returning these to try a different style
Great sound and quality. Very impressed. Only thing that needs work is the ear clips. They are loose and slide around. If the ear straps were smaller the earphones would be a 5 star
I love them
These are an excellent addition to our workouts.  I also use these under a pair of ear protection and they work fine.

WARNING! These earphones are being marketed as useful during physical activity.  They might be, if your ears fit the earphone perfectly.  They do not fit me at all.  There is no way to secure them to my ears because the ear hook is too large and flimsy.  It is not adjustable.  How they managed to get so many positive reviews is bewildering to me.  There must be a lot of couch potatoes buying these things.  They're fine, if you don't move while wearing.  Unless your workout regimen consists of sitting in a recliner while wiggling your toes, be prepared to be disappointed, if your ears don't fit these things perfectly.
Comfortable and clear listening to your favorite playlist

The sounds quality is great.  The only thing that I am not fond of is the fact that they do NOT fit my ears.  If I were the manufacturer, I would at least make a pair that targets female ears, or add an adjustable ear holder.  Otherwise, it is easy to charge, setup, and connect to my iPhone.  I would buy again as a present to someone with big ears for sure.
I use my Senso wireless headphones while working out and stay put and provide clear, crisp sound. They're easy to use while wearing.

So I haven't use them much but from what I've used them the quality is good the build quality  good packaging is good they're very user-friendly in the sound quality seems great so I'm all for that price I'm very happy with them

These were Christmas gifts to my adult children who are runners! I haven't used them myself but I've watched and inquired. They were easy to set up to phone. They are perfect for running and work great!

No auto shut off. stupid thing turned back on after i fully charged it and placed it on my night stand only for it to fully drain and stay on all night. the best part is finding out at the gym after taking a preworkout. So mad.
Excellent headphones for the price, really impressive sound. This is 2nd pair, first had one ear stop working after a year - still worth it
Got it today. Sound is amazing. Thankyou for a good product.

Great headphones.  I already used them at gym and there excellent.  It has hardly any inner echo . What I mean is like hearing ur heart beat or when u move them around u hear all the inner movement in ear. 1 important thing is u need to use ur music players eq to adjust sound quality.  If not everything will sound flat. Great way to save money and still have good sounding product. The scale of 1 to 10 . I give a 7..

This product is a cheaply made knock off from what the Beats are supposed to be.  When I received the headphones, quality issues were immediately noticed.  The plastics are cheap and the headphones start falling apart as soon as you start touching them.  The bluetooth connected right away and I was able to hear music.  The sound quality is extrememly poor.  Huge amount of distorted bass and very little mids and lows.  Sending the item back ASAP.

Received the headphones very quick and loved them right away. They work great and well worth the money. Love the case and dual charger too. Great product for the money and would recommend to anyone looking for wireless headphones that are affordable.

The sound quality is pretty good but the headphones keep falling off. I am using the smallest ear piece and they are still not staying in while excercising. However, I've discovered if I use the headband, they will stay put. I will give them a try since I do not want to spend a couple of hundred dollars on Beats!

I just received these today and noticed I am missing the "wire tie." A little disappointing but apparently I'm not the first that was missing it. The headphones took awhile to connect to my S7 which was odd. They sound good let's see how they hold up tomorrow.

I have purchased 2 pairs of these thinking that the malfunction in the first pair was maybe a coincidence. I purchased the 2nd and within 6 weeks they stopped working while charging over night. No sound, no charge light just dead. Fool me twice shame on me. If anyone actually reads these, as a courtesy I'd like at least my money back, or even a 3rd pair to prove that the product isn't a waste of money.
Not bad for the price, but has a metallic sound, fits well.

If you're an active user and choose to run or bike ride with these, the wind is what you'll hear most. It's overpowering the music almost 100% of the time. Also the battery life is great, but when it came time to charge my headphones, it wouldn't charge. Now it is past the return date with no juice. They are basically now heavy ear plugs
They don’t seem to stay connected to my iPhone 7plus. Not what I was expecting in head phones.
Great sound. Fits great on my ears.
Great product
I am so disappointed in these! Sound was great, loved the wireless.. have rarely used these and they no longer charge.. bought a new charger.. nothing! Guess the price was too good to be true!!

The hooks over the ears are too floppy and large for me, they do not stay in my ears.  In particular my right ear, and I'm not sure if it is because of the mechanics in that side making it slightly heavier; but it will not stay in my ear.  I have tried all the sizes of buds.  Outside of that, connecting was easy, and they play music with decent quality.

I work out in noisy gyms and walk near noisy traffic. These are my first Bluetooth headphones. They paired right away, sound great, overcome the noise, the battery lasts . . . Great deal, especially for the price

[[VIDEOID:42e5c45aff743ad02868d3c448366c21]] [[VIDEOID:8f18b152964df1cc08174464c68b9298]] Best of the best.
Perfect, quality of sound is superb.
Bass are great.

Best feature to me: they can be used on multiple devices with no need of re-pairing all the time.

I think it takes a while to accomodate them in the ears, but this was a great purchase.

Watch my video to realize how strong is the output from these headphones.

Update
They don't work when running outside, background noise and interruption while working out in the open air. I am not sure if this is due to the fact that I also have the Fitbit charge using the Bluetooth. I will disconnect it on my next run and see if the situation improves and let you guys know.

Good for exercising , sweat resistant, relativly stable.
Produces some static when not playing
Great sound and are very comfortable on my ear.
Bien

Amazing product with good quality sound. Very apt for exercise and also for regular use. The greatest thing to sci can pair two devices. Certainly this product has an edge over similar products in its sturdiness and design. The company was also promt in attending to queries.

I really loved this product until the charging light would not illuminate upon plugging it in to charge.  Of course, if the product doesn't charge, it doesn't matter how good of a sound or length of battery life the product has.
The sound is good quality and the battery holds a charge well.  Better than expected quality for the price paid.
Wife loves them sound great work perfectly
On/off switch failed after a week and I couldn't turn the unit on.

I LOVE 'EM! Great sound, nice and high like I like it, no booming bass but that's okay and I recommend these 'phones for audiophiles like me who want to hear nice CLEAR sound without that overwhelming bass sound I've found in many of today's 'phones. Fit is excellent, the ear hooks bend easily and fit perfectly and are very comfortable., the extra ear pads included help to customize the fit. The 'phones charge up quickly and last a good, long time! Linking with my phone via Bluetooth is easy. I think these SENSO 'phones are the best I've had!

The construction of them seem fine but if i have the phone on the left side of my body, the connection keeps cutting in and out.  Also, I got these primarily to run in but there's so much wind noise coming in around them that it becomes distracting.

We just received the earbuds this week and have used them at the gym.  They sound good and I love how I don't have to constantly reposition the buds in my ear like my previous ones.  No wires to fuss with!  So far so good!  :)
Everything went smoothly. Got them when promised. Great sound!
Great Bluetooth earbuds at a very reasonable price.  Purchased them a couple of weeks ago and been happy with the sound quality and battery life.

Bought these headphones in December 2018. They are good quality for the price. They didn't fit me great, but ears are weird, so not too big a deal. They just crapped out on me last month; one of the ear buds stopped working, so I only get audio through the right side. I give them a 3 because they were good while they lasted, but I had hoped they would last longer. Then again, for the cost, maybe 2.5 years is as good as one should expect.
works very well and for a good price too!

Had them 1 day now and I have used them out in the garden listening to an audio book.  Also watched youtube and my husband sitting next to me did not even know I was watching anything.  So far I am enjoying them.

Sound quality is good, but the bluetooth constantly loses connection for no reason on multiple devices, literally when the device is in your hand. If you raise your arms over the head, like doing pull ups at the gym, connection is gone. Not only does the connection to the bluetooth go out, sometimes the headphones turn off completely. If I could give 1 star I would. This problem began about 3-4 months ago. It would be nice if a full refund could be issued, because I'd expect headphones to last for more than 9 months.
Great product, great fidelity. Connects quickly and is comfortable to wear. It charges fast and battery life meets or exceeds the advertise charge life.

I love them. They fit perfectly and include several size ear pieces for that perfect fit. Syncing the Bluetooth is very simple.
They are great
These buds are great. They fit well and were very easy to pair. Sound quality is better than expected.
Works great.

Fantastic for the money! I have cycled through several bluetooth earbuds in the $40-ish price range. One with solid neck bar which remained in position OK, but was very tinny sound. Another had large control on connecting cable which caused ear bud to pull out due to control's weight. Sound was also sub-par for that unit. This unit stays in place and the sound is as good as any ear buds I've had short of some wired Bose earbuds of several years ago. They stay in place, have good range with even sound, Highs are a bit lacking, but I attribute that to bluetooth range. Quite a good set of buds for the money.

Update: above review based on pairing with iPhone 5S. Just paired these with laptop (Asus Ultrabook) and sound is much richer! Even using cheapo bluetooth micro adapter. Way pleased with these. Highly recommended!

I purchased these a few weeks ago and paired them with my IPod and went for a walk..the kept cutting in and out so I called customer service. The gentleman had my do a factory reset and pair them again. Second run, same thing...so I called again. That gentleman confirmed my purchase not sure where this going, he said I should have a new pair with 7 business days, I asked where I should return to other pair to he said to just keep them, totally didn't see that coming...even though they don't work properly I would think they'd want them back.
Just received the replacement pair today, fingers crossed they don't cut in and out. Beyond that they are great for running, working out,etc. Lastly the customer service was excellent!

Wow.. this is my first ActivBuds to own. and to be honest the sound is the best and so  incredible to hear. And not to mention the affordability and kquality of this product. I will definitely buy one more to keep and additional one for my wife. I'm giving this a five star review due to my personal experience.
Great head phones but do read the manuel first.

After having this headset for just under two months, I couldn’t stand and take the quality of it. I had read reviews and actually believed what I read. When I ordered I realized I had ordered 7 years ago and believed they improved in quality. Boy I was wrong!!! Never again. I decided to be Beats headset that are known for the quality. I guess you get what you pay for. Really disappointed. I was truly hoping they were going to be good.
Good fit, good sound, easy setup, good price.  Can't beat it.

Terrible sound.  Much worse than the similarly priced Plantronics single-ear unit I was replacing, solely because it repeatedly disconnected itself.  Can't send back because 'god-awful sound' isn't among the reasons Amazon will let me return it.
These bluetooth headphones work great. Wonderful sound and easy to wear for a long time. Lightweight yet sturdy.
Much better than anticipated
I love these headphones ! Easy to use love the sound and also the design on them.

I like these ear buds, they have good sound, stay in place while working out, are comfortable to wear, and are priced very fairly. I own quite a few headphones and ear buds, although I don't own the beats wireless ear buds, so I can't compare them. A number of reviews have compared them so I'll just I am happy with these. They are better looking and fit better than other wireless buds I have. Nice for working out, going for walks and office wear. Especially for the price you can't go wrong.

I've had these for three months and they die at 30% battery, so the battery life is lacking. They also hurt my ears if I wear for more than 30 mins at a time. I wouldn't get these again, a complete waste of money.

Sound quality while playing is decent, and they are comfortable to wear, but like others have experienced, there is a CONSTANT high pitched buzzing very noticeable in the left ear, I guess from the active Bluetooth connection... it continues to buzz for about 5-10 seconds after pausing a song.  I can't remotely listen to anything with quiet nuances because the buzzing is incessant and overshadows it.  Cannot recommend these.

These things are so nice, no more cord getting in my way when im working or doing house-work. Sound is very good, doesnt fall out of my ears when im running. Only problem im having on my Note 5 is that sometimes when my phone is in my back-pocket the signal drops (mainly when i was hiking / kneeling down ever)
Excellent. Great purchase for the money.
These are great!!!
Wow. Where did these come from? These buds are absolutely amazing, truly. I've never heard anything like how these sound, even from $400 over the ear headphones. Amazing buds, amazing deal.
Thank you very much 5*****
Sound quality good, not enough treble.  I don’t like the fixed earpieces, the loops are too large.
excellent product and  good price
A very good pair of ear buds for the price. Has great sound quality and battery life last a really long time.
Just started using them tonight. So far very impressed. Relatively comfortable with long wearing. Great sound quality. So far good battery life.
Great value for money
Worked for 30 days and then the right side quit and the left side is super faint!
Decent headphones, not much noise reduction however.
I bought this headphones back in january and they were great, but now, less than a year after I bought them they have become useless. They dont recharge anymore thus I can't use them.
Wow. nice for the $$$
Sounds like mud. There's little more to be said except that you can't hear much detail at all in these. Returning these immediately.
I bought the product about 2 months ago and all of a sudden it stopped linking to my phone. I have tried all the troubleshooting tips they mentioned in the guide but nothing seems to work.
Overall, I’m happy with the purchase.  The one con is that there’s very little warning when the battery is about to die- about 3 minutes.
Great product! Easy to set up and use. Really great Value!

The Bluetooth took multiple tries of disconnecting and reconnecting to get sound to come through the earbuds. The charge held for about 8 hours of continuous use with a full nights charge. Calls sounded distant through the microphone.
Love these headphones! The sound is crisp and you can't beat the price for the packaging and extras included. Would highly recommend.

My old pair of Bluetooth headphones were struggling to pair with my phone, so I figured I'd give these a try.
Pros: decent battery life, sync instantly, sound quality is above average, comfortable, stay on my ears.
Cons: if you want the sound reduction, you have to jam them in your ears like you would with ear plugs, which isn't my favorite procedure.
Over all I'd say they have met all my expectations, and I'm a happy customer.

PROS

I used the headphones while jumping rope, lifting weights, and running on the treadmill, and on the train. I sweat a lot during workouts and had no issues with it slipping off. Can’t hear background noises on the train

I’ve only been using the headphones for two days but so far so good. The headphones are also light weight.

Carrying case is genius

CON

You are able to talk on the phone but my friends heard an echo or a lot of background noise.

Some of the songs I listened too off of Apple Music had better quality than others.
Sound good ! Wanted to get some and see for myself. Will be ordering some more for Christmas presents !
The work well for the money

These are the best ear buds I've ever purchased! Very comfortable, don't move or get loose in your ears and don't end up hurting. Sound quality is very good as well. I lost my first pair and immediately proceeded to buy a replacement set.
Went to ear buds with these and I am pleased with fit. They also have a pretty good sound.

These earbuds are great! They have excellent bass response and good treble tones.  I find these easy to use and work well with my Android phone.  The zippered storage container is a perfect size and works well. Would buy again!
These work well but have a limited range. You need to be somewhat close in proximity to your device when streaming. Comfortable with all different earpiece shape and sizes to fit a range of ears.
Most comfortable in-ear headphones I've ever had. Sound is great too.

These headphones seemed pretty solid.  Got them as a Christmas gift for my husband.  Now, after less than 3 months of use, they are no longer taking a charge, making them totally unusable.  I just contacted customer support at the manufacturer.  We will see how good their support is, then I will update and revise star rating appropriately.
Not good for working out. Almost terrible for running. They'll get you by in a pinch though. And they won't tell you there out of battery until they're 30 seconds from dead

the headphones are ok but the microphones didn't work right out of the box. I had actually bought another set a few months ago and the exact same thing happened. I think the microphone set up is quite poor.
Exactly what I was looking for.  They sound great.

It worked well for 10 months or something. Then, first you will see minor problems like button for playing next song is not working. So for few months you will use phone to change song. You will feel its a minor fault and still be happy about it. Then, after few months around a year of buying, you will find now the volume is low. You will think, may be it was not charged well. Next time you charge well and viola volume is back to normal. Now after a year of buying, the volume will be permanently lower and the next song button not working. So, you will have to buy a new one now. Throw the junk, create more electronic garbage every year for lovely planet earth and again you are back to buying another one. May be they want to convey this is what you get in $30.

Lesson: Good product if you want to put $30 every year. Or else buy a warranty and keep sending it back and forth. Basically, no peace for someone who wants to use only 1 hour of his day, 4 times a week during workout. I had higher hopes from it as I went for little more expensive one than many other cheaper products that were available. But now I regret my decision. I wouldn't buy it if its available even for $10 now.

I like these -- when they work. Too often I can't get them to connect. Sometimes turning off the Bluetooth on my device and turning it back on will allow a connection, but not always. I can't tell if maybe the connection issues get worse if the battery charge is low. Speaking of the battery charge, it will drain just sitting and powered OFF. I fully charged them, and then unplugged them from the charger but didn't use them for several days. When I went to use them they were pretty much dead. I really don't want to leave them plugged in all the time, as I've heard that's not good for the battery, so I feel a bit screwed. Finally, when they are working, I occasionally get some static or crackling through them.
UPDATE: I have already heard back from customer support. Impressive--this alone made me give them an additional star. They asked me to do a factory reset. I will do that and test things out for awhile. For now, I rebooted my computer and eventually was able to connect and I'm listening to music now. I have to say, when these things work they are truly AWESOME. I hope the factory reset fixes my issues. But if not, I feel confident that they will replace them with no hassle.
Great value, great product. I hated ear buds but these have change my mind.  I love all the features.

Dre Beats who?!! Lol best wireless I’ve bought !! Definitely want to invest in a back up pair just in case ... I tent to misplace then since they are so small !! He sound quality is amazing and LOUD!! They stay in your ears and is very durable to sweat and any other moisture!!
Excellent for the price. I wish they were a little tighter on the ear but they suffice and I weight train and cardio very intensely with them.
Excellent sound quality, easy pairing, and every accessory included (what a plus). I’m very particular with headphones, having paid $100+ - these are as good, if not better. I’m buying another!"

Sound quality was good for music, but the call quality on these are subpar. The person on the other end of the call couldn't hear me well because these earphones have an integrated mic on the ear piece. People I've talked to complained about it sounding like I was really far away from the mic. I also could hear a little static feedback in the background while I was in call.
Battery died and wouldn't charge anymore
Sound quality is great. Only had it a month and headphone on one side keeps going in and out
best bluetooth  headphone ever had
Great sound. Deep powerful bass.
Work pretty good, and quality is clean

I bought 3 sets of these for our family vacation. 2 work great.  The third set works only as long as the phone it’s paired to is right next to me.  Even if you turn around, the music cuts out.  I’m very disappointed with this.

So far so good. I use them for about four and a half hours straight yesterday and they worked just fine. I was in a loud arena there were times that the noise inside the arena was a bit too much for the headphones to overcome, even at full volume.  But for the most part they worked great. I answered a phone call with them and even with the loud noise the caller could still hear me. I believe as long as they keep working at this level they will be well worth the price.
Bought these for my wife for Christmas.  She really likes them.  The charge last about a week while using them about 1 hour a day, 5 days a week.
purchased to use while working out.  Did not disappoint.  Excellent quality & quick delivery
Great head phones. They work better than the expensive brands. Also great customer service when needed!

I ordered 2 sets of these headphones and both have the same problem. No matter who I'm speaking to and what type of phone they are on (mobile, landline) they hear an echo of themselves when speaking to me. Everything sounds fine on my end, but they hear a very frustrating echo. I have emailed the company directly regarding this issue, but this might be why they were originally over $150 and are now selling for less than $40. They work fine as headphones as long as you don't plan to make a phone call using them, which is the only reason I gave them 2 stars instead of 1.

Hope they can fix this issue, although from looking online it doesn't look promising.
Very nice for the $$$!  My husband broke his Apple Ear Buds and bought these as a replacement. The audio is much better than the Apple EarBuds.

I first synced the set to my iphone and loved them.  Used them twice and then tried to sync to my new Bose stereo in frontroom - would not work.  My husband then tried to sync to his iphone and they would not sync. I removed from my phone and tried the Bose and 2nd iphone again, still would not work. When I tried to sync to my iphone a second time it would not work.  I checked to make sure they were fully charged and tried the steps several times.  I never was able to get them to work again. I know how to use bluetooth sync and have other devices that sync - so I do not believe it was my problem - just a defective pair. Too much time passed for me to return them - very disappointed.
I love these headphones. They fit nicely in my ear and the sound quality is wonderful. I would definitely recommend these. Great price too!
Stopped working after four months.
Junk. Died after a month
I had a problem with the unit powering up after a couple of months and the customer support team quickly found a solution.

I am blown away by this product. For the price it is deceiving but This Bluetooth headset is outstanding. Excellent sound quality good bass. Battery lasts for a long time and automatically pairs with my phone. Great packaging and fun little free accessories that they throw in. I bought a set of beats for 120 bucks and returned them to get another pair of these.  I did a side-by-side comparison on sound quality and full rich bass and I was amazed that the Dr. Dre beats we’re not nearly as good.  I even bought two pairs of the sensos this Bluetooth headset is outstanding. Excellent sound quality good Bass. Battery lasts for a long time and I medically pairs with my phone. Great packaging and find little free accessories that they throw in. I bought a set of beats for 120 bucks and return them to get another pair of these. I even bought two pairs of the senso to have a spare.

Excelente sonido y durabilidad, a quien los regale lleva 3 año con ellos y vive feliz en la calidad y en la durabilidad, es un buen regalo para navidad. Salieron tan buenos que acabo de comprar unos para mi. Espero que salgan igual de buenos a los que regale.

UPDATE:
1/9/18

I bought another pair (my 3rd) for my wife to use in the gym. They arrived and I find that this unit has a very poorly made USB port cover which is much smaller and flimsy compared to my earlier pairs. It's almost impossible to open the port door with your fingernail and given the force required this door will tear away soon exposing the port to damage. I contacted the company and they made an unclear statement about a design update (hmmm, updates usually improve a product) and suggested I send the headphones back to Amazon for a refund. Not terribly helpful, could have figured that out on my own...expected the company to make it right.

Anyway, I'm a bit disappointed...there may be a reduction in quality with these newly designed models. I've reduced my rating to 4 stars.

ORIGINAL POST:

I have a pair of Klipsch as well as a pair of Bose earphones I use. I paid more than 3 times as much for the Bose then l paid for this SENSO brand. The sound on these SENSO's compares favorably to both the Klipsch and Bose.

At this price point including all that comes in the box, this is an outstanding value.

Bass response is often weak in ear buds especially in the sub $50 range. Not these, quite frankly at times the bass is almost too much and it can muddy up the sound...overwhelming mid and higher ranges when listening to a song with a heavy bass track. I find if I reposition them not so deeply into my ear the separation of the sound improves.

I can easily recommend these little workhorses, you won't be disappointed.

I really enjoy the product. Been using them for the past 3 years; however they tend to only last between 3-6months. I sweat alot when I run I feel like they're not as water proof as advertised. The warranty support is great, very easy to get a new pair and comes with cool accessories. overall great sound quality. Easy to setup and intuitive functionality for pausing, resuming switching songs and raising/lowering volume without ever reaching for my connected device.

Already one ear not working.  I've had it about a month and one ear kicked out on me.  Not only that it's bulky and annoying. Wish I had returned it sooner but wanted to give it a chance I regret this purchase.
Great sound and great quality. Nice cords and carry case.

These have a longer battery life than some of the other bluetooth headphones, but they often don't like to pair.  It can be frustrating as, at times, you have to unpair it from another device so the new device will pair with it also.  Yet, I believe it is supposed to be able to pair with more than one device at a time.  Technically it does...it just won't work on the newest device until you unpair it from the other.
I love it i give it five star

The main reason I got these over some others were the over-the-ear hooks, but they turned out to be flimsy and not really adjustable - just some loose silicone doodads that do nothing to keep the buds from falling out of my ear. I have big ear holes, so no buds stay in. Sound quality is mediocre, as you'd expect in this range, but fine for running.
Super convenient and battery life is wonderful compared to other wireless headsets

Decent for what they’re worth, I bought my pair 14months ago and stoped working two days ago. they started acting funny and stopped connecting and just shutting off  after you turn them on, even when fully charged. I wouldn’t call them noise canceling they cancel about as well as any other regular ear bud.

Sounded great for an hour...then it started cutting out. I charged fully when I got it, so I don't know if it's a battery issue or a connection issue. Really disappointed. :(

::Update:: Tried the reset per the manufacturer's suggestion. This time, I was cutting out within about 10 minutes. Returning. The sound quality is wonderful if you get one that works. :(
Great sound.  Only improvement I would recommend is different sized ear pads

Very good product; excellent bass tone. Take a little time and read the instructions! Otherwise, it might take a bit of time to set up the headphones - I know from experience. You won't be disappointed with this purchase. Not being tied to an iPhone via regular earbuds is a real treat.
Awesome

I love these headphones! They sound great and stay in my ears very well. My only complaint is that sometimes they have issues pairing with certain devices, but that might not be an issue of the headphones.

Good sound for the price. Range is about 10 to15 feet but after that the sound degrades quickly. at about 20 feet the Bluetooth disconnects. The charging cable it comes with is not the best quality so the rubber wire cover pulls away from the charging plug. not a huge deal since its a universal usb charging cable, just grab one from your standard android phone charger and you'll be alright. The sound is good and does a good job of emulating surround sound. It is a comfortable fit around the ear and a couple hours of game play later you forget you have them on... that is if they aren't blasting your ear drums cause these guys can be loud or quite and everything in between. The reason these are not 5 star is because the quality of the sound misses some lower frequency sounds that you would get from a high end headset, then again for 30 bucks the quality is sufficient. another reason for four stars is that the battery looses charge quickly when not connected to a charger. it retained power for about 3 days while off then it needed a recharge before I could use it. I use these for gaming on my laptop so to me this isn't a big deal as I just drop them on the charger once I'm done and don't usually touch them again till I am going to be playing on my laptop. any avid gamer and or music lover would probably not want these for their main headset but if your looking for portability and quality for under 50 you cant go wrong.
Good seller. Item descriptions are accurate.  "
In terms of battery life and sound quality these are the best definitely recommend it for running or just listen to music on regular basis to vibe away
Ok sound quality, but for some reason wnot stay firmly in place, I continuously keep reseat them.
Great product great service!!!
Bluetooth connection was very poor when active. Worked ok when seated at a desk. I returned them
great!
Very good ease of connection and sound is superb. I don’t know about battery life yet but so far I’m very impressed with these bluetooth headphones.

I purchased these originally in 2017, and got four good years of heavy usage out of them. I would rate that model at least 4 stars.  When they stopped charging a few months ago, I purchased the same product. I noticed right away they were cheaper, lighter, and much lower quality.  The on/off button was a bit tricky and never worked well, and is now locked inside the unit, and will not work.  I've used these fairly lightly in the last few months, so it's really disappointing to note such a drastic change in the quality of this product.  I've ordered a different brand to replace these.

I like having this wireless apparatus, but the design has some problems. The controls are all on the side of the right ear (no problem at all), but the buds don't stay quite stable in the ear. When I want to adjust the fit, it's impossible to manipulate the right-ear bud comfortably without pressing one of the control buttons, which discontinues whatever I'm listening to. Not great.
these are some really good earbuds for music and talking.

Perfect headphones in every way, unfortunately stopping taking charge after 10 months. Called customer service and they replacing for me!!!
Highly recommend!
Working great very pleased with purchase. Thank you
They were very good to get on my devices great sound
The customer service is fantastic as well as the product!
The se are the Best ones I've ever had. They work perfect and have a great audio quality. It was a recommendation from a friend, and I'm still thanking her for it.
VERY HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT THANK YOU
did not like it. would always fall out from your ear while running. returned it thanks
I've had these for 5 months now, and they still work great. I do a lot of running, and these don't slide around or pop out. Simple design with easy to use controls. Good battery life.

Well let me start by saying I've only had these senso Bluetooth headphones for 3 days and I'm absolutely hooked I was just going to wear them to the gym and I end up having them in my ears for phone calls and music constantly it sounds like I have Bose speakers in my ears the bass is incredible I started with the little red earbuds and they stay in my ears just fine and I can wear these things for hours without any pain that's a five star in my book so with the quality of sound functions and hopefully durability I am so incredibly happy with these . for $35 this is a killer product... PS I like the product case cables and charger and the extra earbuds quality made if I must say so myself
These were Awful and didn’t even work. Returned them.

I have only had ear buds in use foe a few days.
so far I like them fine, but will need to get back to you after I have used them in different sets of circumstances.

This is my second pair of these headphones. The first pair lasted about 3 years then the left earphone stared shorting out probably because I just stuff it in my gym bag. Overall I’ve been satisfied with theses therefore decided on another pair.
easy to use, easy to sync, 8 hour play time, I can work, run, bike (i use them at work and for training) and they didn't cost me $150.......
I purchased this item in order to listen to music while doing laps in pool. Bluetooth disconnects when phone is less than 5 feet a way

I have only had these headphones less than a week. I haven't worked out in them yet, but I use them nightly. So far they were very easy to pair, pretty comfortable and I have only had to charge them once. The packaging was great, they come with a case and several accessories. I would say that they are a good value for the money. I will revise my review once I have had more opportunity to use them. I received a company email with warranty details. So far great!
These are great headphones that have a good lasting battery. I also think the sound quality is good. For the money you can’t beat them.

I LOVED these headphones, I purchased them back on April 19, 2017 and they were so awesome. Starting July 22, 2017 they have COMPLETELY stopped working!!! They will charge and will say connected and will IMMEDIATELY disconnect.  I have tried to reconnect several times over the weekend to no avail.  I was so happy bc my ears are small and it's hard to find earbuds comfortable--so these WERE incredible.  I'll have to buy some other ones and go over all the reviewing process again of reading comments. So annoyed and disappointed.
They are great love them very comfortable and great sound

These headphones are great! I know a lot of other people who have them and love them as well! The only issue I had was after about a year of use, they started to malfunction. When I brought this to Tekatron's attention they immediately (and I do mean within minutes) reached out to rectify the problem. They actually shipped me a replacement the same day! No one else I know has had any issues with their headphones so I am sure mine just happened to be a lemon.
The headset is great!  The car charger and phone charger that comes in the package are horrible!  The phone charger does not charge the phone and the car charger broke in less than a week.

I highly recommend these headphones for running.  I ran with mine consistently for about 10 months, unfortunately they stopped working.  I contacted support for the default 1 year warranty and it was incredibly easy.  No hassle from support and got a new pair ASAP.
Outstanding quality. Very competitive price. Very high durability. Great for gym use.

Pros: Sound quality is great for the price range. They fit comfortable and are perfect for any type of exercise you do. I could not believe how great they were once I took them out and put them on. Too good to be true.

Cons: After less than two months of use the headphones are completely dead and won't even charge. The LED light won't turn on. The only charger used on the headphones was the one it came with. I also have a pair of Jaybirds that I purchased over three years ago and they are still going strong. At the end of the day you get what you pay for.

The body is made of cheap plastic. The equipment came out of the plastic covering and I had to stick it with glue. This is not even after 2 months of very nominal use. Put in some more money and buy from a better brand
I used it during my meetings but all of sudden mic stop working, contacted customer service they asked me to reset. But did not helpful. Thenafter they are not replying.
Work great, good sound, stay in place, great price.
I accidentally put these through the washer and they STILL work perfectly! Comfortable, affordable, and great sound quality

The sound quality in the head phones are great and I love that it comes with three different sized buds. My only complaint is the part that wraps around the ear is rather loose on me and becomes challenging keeping them in my ears during long runs. On the other side my husband also got a pair at the same time and he's a mild runner and heavy weight lifter and he loves the head phones!

For 7 months I used Dime Blacks. They would not last through a 3 hour podcast. They weren't very loud and the volume would not change. Wouldn't stay in my ears if I bent over regardless of the size dome I used. So I gave these a try. What an improvement. They stay on my head no matter what. Mid volume on these is plenty loud. I've never reached the end of the battery so 5 plus hours so far. They are a very good value for a low prices set of ear buds for active people.
Can't pair headphones with anything and can't find Senso support. Will return worthless junk if I can't pair.
These thing work great.  The only complaint is I don't know of any way to tell the battery level.  A voice recording comes on when the power gets low.
Great Item/Use it all the time.

Headphones just did not work.  The red light came on when I tried to charge (Had plugged into power supply for over 4 hours) but the device would not turn on, pair, reset, nothing.  Literally, the only sign of life was the little red light which you have to view at a certain angle or you might miss it.  I am returning.  Sucks to get the one bad one.

Great value.  I've tried other bluetooth in-ear headphones, and these excel at battery life, comfort, and durability.  Comes with great accessories for the price.  Sound quality is good, not the best, but better than average. Good bass.
I like the style and feel.. i must have little ears dueto the ear pieces felt ynsecure.. wore then right out of the box in excitement.  I need to write more as soon as I can rest them out more

There loud which I love and they fit perfect for my ears.  I connected the Bluetooth to my phone first and it worked right away and I love them. These are very good ear phones and also good for working out when you don't want to use or have your phone on you all the time.
Piece of junk. Dropped once from a distance of 3feet and they fell apart and now won’t work right with Bluetooth. ?? Leave it up to the company who sells them to do something about it.

This is the first Bluetooth headphones I ever bought first off they are really easy to connect to your phone they fit my ears really well the only thing I wish is that the wires that go over your ears were adjustable but they are not other than that I'm very pleased with this product and would advise anybody to buy them
Already stopped working . I should get a full refund for this terrible product !!!!!!
Crisp, clear sound from a head phone set that can take the volume with distortion. Well worth the money!

They stick out a little more than I'd like but I love the comfort of the headphones and sound quality is great. I have had these a month now and use them 2-4 times a week for about 45-60min each time and I have yet to charge these. Great battery life from my experience so far. Great purchase and excellent bang for your buck, definitely recommend!

This is one of the best purchases I've ever made. I've had apple earbuds, headsets... and they really can get in the way when you're a university student constantly pulling out stuff from your bag (I've destroyed many earbuds because the strings get tangled or get stretched). This is a compact set of headphones that don't need to be charged often, stay in your ears and around your neck, really light while also sporting a pretty good audio quality. Also, the bluetooth system is really nice, and the design is pretty nice. Overall, very, very satisfied and am considering buying a pair for a friend.

Bought this just one year ago and did not use it that much until last month after the COVID-19 force me to stay home more.  It connected and worked OK, not too secure in my ears so I have to adjust them from time to time during my one hour daily jogging.  But since a few days back, it started to suddenly lost the connection, power on/off would not help.  And a re-charge the phone will get it connects again.  This always happens after about 1 hour usage, happened 3-4 times already.  It could mean the battery faded?  What to do next?

I enjoy using the earbuds, but there are a couple minor issues I do have with them.  It would be nice if the volume control could have more adjustments between settings- also a longer warning time that the battery is about to die... Mine completely died after 4 months of use.  There was a "fix", but it didn't work for me, but the company quickly replaced it!  I hope this one lasts much longer.  If it doesn't, I will update my review
pleased

This product is pretty awesome. With everything it comes with its unbeatable for its price. Another great thing oh get with this product is the customer service. I have already had to represent ice reach out to me and make sure that the product was what I wanted and to see if there was anything else I would need. The pair is pretty easy. It sounds good and it's pretty stylish. I like how they fit into your ears for security and then on top of that they have another part to go over your ears. There is no volume box on the cord like many other which is awesome and less distracting.
The only cons I have is that the part that goes around your ear is a little flimsy for me and when I first tried tried them it seemed like one side was louder than the other but have used a few times now and they seem to be fine but if there is a consistent problem k know the Senso company will help me become a fully satisfied company. These are the best Bluetooth headphones you can get for the price that has everything. Definitely telling other about this product.

Recieved my headphones in the mail and instantly loved them. They have different earbuds so you can fit it specifically to your ears. I run a lot so I have very much enjoyed them and they’re loud, and block out the sound which is what I like when I’m running.

I have a severe hearing loss. These earbuds have been a life-changer! Paired with a TaoTronics 2-in1 wireless adapter, I can now fully enjoy entertainment from my tv, Roku, and Kodi box. Amazing fidelity. Been years since I experienced such audio.
Comfortable fit. Easy to operate.
I use a wireless transmitter plugged into the headphone port of my television because Kodi is tricky and unreliable when trying to connect directly with bluetooth.
No comfort at all. Can use more than 10 minutes.
Great Sounding headphones!!! I enjoyed them so much I ordered a second pair

Rated five stars for price, quality construction, durability and packaging. Extensive research on Bluetooth headphones led me to the SENSO headphones. Compare these reviews to Beats, BOSE and others and see for yourself. The sound could be better in the higher frequencies (treble) but I happily accept the balance (with solid bass) over flat low-volume sound found in other products. Showing the product marked down 78%, from $169.99, is misleading as I have not read where anyone paid that much. Regardless, great product overall. Buy them.

Over all these ear buds are great for the price. The battery is good enough for exercising, but not for working all day, which was expected. The bass is good, but kind of friend out all the other sounds. Would definitely buy again.

I ordered these a few months ago. They sometimes quit working while I am in the middle of a workout. The voice that tells you if they are or off becomes deeper. Restarting my phone does not help and it takes a couple of hours to get them to pair again. I have to carry a backup pair to make sure I will be able to have music for my entire workout.

These have decent (not good) sound quality, a bad microphone, and they don't stay in my ears that well. They are also large and clunky as you can see. For $30 I could have gotten much better wired earphones, but if you want inexpensive bluetooth earphones, you might have to settle for these.
So far so great. Great sound quality, east to set up and sound didn't fade even when I started sweating during my run.

Good Bluetooth headphones. They stay on your ears, sound good and are easy to use. I like the battery charge indicator on my iPhone screen. Very cool! I like them so much I got another pair for my wife!

I have used these headphones almost non stop since I charged them after their arrival, I took them on a run, went to the gym, and with me to classes. The entire time I was extremely comfortable with them on and did not feel as though they interfered with my movement or disconnected from my phone at any point.
Sound quality is what is expected from ear buds, although they do a better job hitting the lows in comparison to the high pitched sounds. Outside noise blocking is decent as well, if you truly don't want to hear the outside you only need to go up to ~1/3 max volume, so needless to say they are fairly loud and cancel noises fairly well.

I've been buying my earbuds based on Consumer Reports' recommendations, and was never disappointed, but never blown away either. Somehow, I got turned on to Senso's Bluetooth S-250 phones and was blown away. This is my second pair so that I have a charged pair always at hand. I can hear words in songs that were so crisp and clear that I couldn't believe my ears...literally. Maybe you can get clearer phones for a couple hundred dollars more, but WHY would you bother? These are great; they last (for me at least) a minimum of 6 hours on a charge; and are comfortable as all get out. Do your ears, and bank account, a favor and get these phones. They are, quite simply, great.

These ear buds are mostly comfortable. I find my ears ache if I have them on for longer than 6 hours. Some days, they bother me entirely because I wear glasses and the arm just bugs me. But that's more based on my mood.

I am a normal person with normal expectations sound wise (a super well-trained ear I do not have). I listen to classical music at work all day and these ear buds do the music justice. When the music is playing, the background noise of my office is inaudible.

In terms of charging, they take forever to charge. I typically let them charge for an entire day once the robot voice starts telling me "battery low." I tried charging them for two and four hours but would still get "battery low" right as I turned them on. The bluetooth Reader for them does not have a far range on the PC. If I walk three feet away, music jumps in and out.

Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.
These headphones are really nice. They have a good sound quality and are easy to recharge and sync with bluetooth. They work really well at the gym and stay in place during workouts.

Wicked easy to charge and to pair with my phone. Insanely clear sound and so light! Walked all around my house, and it is not a small house and was still clear and cranking!! First day with it, tomorrow at work will be the true test lol but I will admit so far it has way exceeded my expectations :) I do not know about the moisture aspect yet, that will be tested but for now, I am a very happy bunny :)
Battery lasts quite a while. Works great for running.

This is by far the best ear plug style head set that I have ever purchased.  I bought this for its strong bass support and I am not disappointed.  The quality of the sound is very good.  I wear it for work out and the design allows the head set stay on my ears all the time.  Granted, I don't shake my head much.  So if you move your head a lot with it, you may need to test it yourself.  But the sound quality and price is great.  With that said, I did run into an issue where the led light won't shut down and it continues to drain the battery.  I bought this back in Oct 2016 and it is now Apr 2017.  So this does concern me a bit.  But when I file a customer service issue, they walk me through a reset process and it didn't work.  So they ship me a replacement one because I am still under warranty.  So their Customer Service is very good in taking care of my issue.  Overall, I am happy with the device and their customer services.  Great product.
Great headphones

The music quality is excellent, and that's what I care about, and the battery life is very good.  The price compares very favorably with the much more expensive big name brands with similar features. I am glad I bought this. Now I  have only had it for a day or two, so I hope I am not disappointed.
Great bass and overall sound. Definitely worth the money.
These earbuds have excellent sound and are exactly as described. They come in a case for travel and have extra rubber tips to adjust to smaller or larger ears.
Work perfectly

these things are a piece of garbage if you plan on using them for working out. They do not stay in your ear and the over the ear parts are so big and flimsy that they serve no purpose.
