I had to keep the phone in a front shirt pocket. I was disappointed to say the least. I was not sure which earpiece the receiver is in but I tried locating the phone on both sides.
I was also surprised at the over the ear rubber pieces being so flexible, I'm not sure if the will keep the headphones in place during a run or a vigorous hike.
These have failed already after just a few months and limited times of use.

I will be honest - I purchased the SENSO headphones by price comparison  only thinking  if they  were marginal at best I would not have much invested in them.  I was pleasantly surprised.  I don't know much about specs but I do know what I hear through these headphones is awesome.  I would highly recommend them if you are looking for great sound at a fantastic price.

I bought these for my daughter so she could aqua-jog without worrying about ruining her ear buds.  She has smaller ears so they don't stay on great for her but she solved that problem by wearing a headband.  I would purchase these again.
battery life is less than expected, you loose the signal a few feets from the device ... didnt fit my expectations

I received this headphones yesterday and tried it out last night at the gym.  It has clear sounds and easy to operate and connect via Bluetooth.  I've tried more expensive headphones in the past to which they have failed me.  For this price, this has been the best wireless headphones I've purchased.  It stays on nicely in the gym even when I'm doing heavy movements.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for Bluetooth headphones.

What an outstanding value. Comfortable. The medium ear buds fit well. Clarity of sound with an muddled base was a pleasant surprise which is typically what you find with lower priced wireless ear buds.

I have used them for about 5 hrs so far with no sound degradation or need to recharge. They claim 8 plus. We'll see.

Providing a dual port car charger was nice. A separate wall unit would have been helpful

Pairing was a snap. Customer service follow up excellent..

For the price, I have not found a better wireless head set. Recommend without reservation so far.
The product was not durable at all, lasting less than 6 months under normal use
Been out of town, haven’t used yet however my son said they are the same ones he has and they are th Best! So I will give you five stars trusting I will have the same experience.
Decent sound; poor fit; little, if any, sound cancelling. 15 ft range.

These are pretty awesome. I wanted something wireless so the cord from my iphone headphones wouldn't keep swinging back & forth when I was on cardio machines at the gym. Once I figured out how to actually turn it off, I've found out that the battery life is great. I've gone about 4 90-minute gym sessions without having to charge them. There's a battery life indicator that shows near the phone battery (on an iphone, idk about other phones) so you know when to charge it. They do hurt my ear a little, but most earbuds hurt my ear so that's more my thing than the fault of the headphones. They're also a little bulky, but they do fit very well and I've never had a problem with them moving. Overall, I would recommend them. Great value.
These head phones sound almost as good as my Bose for a fraction of the cost -- plus they are water resistant.
Inexpensive, but terrible sound quality. the base gets distorted at low volume and higher notes get left out too. Don’t buy these

I am a runner and I use music to keep my cadence. I replaced my older "sport" headphones with the SENSO phones and it is phenomenal! I get all of the deep tones without having to ratchet up the volume.

Brought as a gift. Main comment is the weight of the headphones is a bit bulky on the ears. They stand behind their products and their quality. They do what it takes to make sure any issues are resolved quickly.

Great headphones!  Nice feel on the ear with not too much weight. Good sound as well. Multiple ear bud options and good accessories.  There were some delivery issues but i don't think it wa the sellers fault.
Good sound quality but I'm having trouble with static or something.... that I don't have with the standard apple earbuds
They are ok for what they are, the flexible ear piece doesn’t hold its memory too well, and I came from beats Powerbeats and sound is terrible compared to those

These earbuds sound amazing and fit nicely to the ear, I have done a lot of workouts and I never notice anything except the great sound. The best part I am never distracted by them falling out when I am working out.
Very nice headphone I would highly recommend these headphones. They are very nice quality, comfortable and sound amazing. Would buy again
So far I've only used them a few times the sound is good and they are very comfortable
I’m very happy with headphones- their comfortable and easy to use good sound - I like the longevity of the battery time - nice product I’d definitely recommend to friends and family
Good sound quality and comfotable for the ear.

Love the sound from these buds but I have this very little thing that happens with them. I use my buds on Samsung galaxy tab A. I get little static
when when the tablet changes windows or when I change apps. Over all great headphones.
Nob to turn ON the headset broke 1 month after purchase, it can't be used to turn ON this headset anymore !! $36 Gone :(

Signal was cutting out even with my iPhone6S in my front pocket. Wanted to love them for the price but ended up with PowerBeats3 & IMO well worth the significant price difference.

Also the headphones gives off a loud low battery warning like every 2 minutes even when the phone bluetooth claims there's 30%+ battery left & then just shuts off.

Goes back to you get what you pay for in this arena apparently

So far, so good.  Just received my Senso headphones a couple days also so have only used them a few times.  However, pairing was a snap to my iPhone 7....they came with all the accessories....are very light weight and the sound quality is very good, even though a bit on the bass side.(could use a bit more treble). Had a pair of JBL Bluetooth that short d out on me after just 6 months at 3 times the price, so I'm anxious to see how these wear.  Overall, very satisfied with my purchase.
These have great sound fit comfortably and are a great bargain. Definitely recommend them.
Decent quality. My boyfriend likes them
Awesome headphone. Good for while working out.

The product is well designed: good quality sound, fit the ear comfortably and securely, and very reasonably priced. Moreover, the technical support was outstanding as they stand firmly behind their product. I highly recommend this product.
Love this item
did not work after a little while
works great no problems at all
Awesome for the money.  They sounds good and are perfect for running.
Great product. Love it.

After using these a few times the first time they ran out of battery they would never fully charge or be able to connect to Bluetooth again. Wish I could return but missed the window. Very disappointed.
Second pair did same thing stop charging after couple of months. Do not buy unless you want to constantly replace
Very easy to use and great quality.

These headphones are incredible for the gym, they're comfortable and the battery lasts a LONG time. However, my pair started off sounding a lot lower on the left side until it broke completely. I'm not really sure if mine came defective.

The sound quality while listening to music was very good. The ear hooks are very pliable and did a fair job holding the headphones in place but not great. When using the headphones for phone calls, the people I called said their was a strong echo on their end. I contacted the seller who told me how to do a factory reset on the headphones but this did not resolve the problem. I returned the headphones at no charge and got a full refund. The return process was very easy.

It is a bit of a distraction to have to keep adjusting them. With the bendable wires that shape how they are positioned, they don't stay in place and need to be occasionally repositioned. Not a deal breaker though. I enjoy them very much. Not such good quality for talking on the phone though. Everyone complains when I would do that and so I stopped.
Decent product.  Better quality than most more expensive products.  Not extremely comfortable.

These are great! I always envied people at the gym that didn't have wires to get tangled around their necks. This has great sound and a nice case. I just wish there was a way to see if I turned them off, instead of hearing it that is is off. Just an indicator light would be nice. But other than that, these are excellent.

These are the first bluetooth headphones that haven't messed up within the first few uses. I like them a lot and hope they continue to hold up. I workout 6 days a week for an hour or 1.5 hours and the battery almost lasts me the entire 6 days of workouts! They also come with an awesome charger AND a car adapter. All in all this is a great deal.
very happy with the headphones sound great and work flawlessly
These connected well and didn't cut out like other wireless headphones I have used.  They were also able to be turned up very loud.  For the price range, these are very good.

These were comfortable and felt as if they could be worn for extended periods. Unfortunately, I did not get to put them to the test because they didn't work. They constantly cut out and continually disconnected from my phone (galaxy s7) unless I held my phone within inches of the headphones. I ended up returning them. It was disappointing because I wanted something to run with, and these felt as if they could have been really good. Four stars for comfort, one star for usability.

I was honestly amazed at these headphones, I mean the connectivity isn't remotely an issue, plus the sound quality is amazing. Every single set of wireless earbuds I have bought have had terrible sound quality, but I didn't expect much due to the price. These however were cheaper yet sounded perfect. Best purchase of my life.
Love them! So very easy to use while running or just lifting weights.  Light weight and they actually stay in your ears.

Just got them but so far so good! Love that they include an adaptable car charger and various other sizes/replacement ear "buds". They stay in place for my workout without hurting my ear which is the best part.
Having to switch to Bluetooth headsets in order to charge my iPhone 7 and listen to music at the same time I found these headphones to be very good for the price.
Amazing headphones. Great fit and sound quality, exactly what I needed

They're good for working out and commuting. But the left earbud has a ringing sound in it. I thought it was a defect so I returned my first pair. The second pair had it too, so I stuck with them because they're not awful. They have good sound, and work decent (sometimes getting it to pair with my phone is a pain), but don't try to sleep or study with them on. The ringing sound will drive you crazy.

I had issues with the Bluetooth pairing to my cellphone. After speaking with Senso's support team, they quickly acted
to the problem and replaced it with a new one. Great customer service! The new one arrived within 2 days and is working great.

Brian L
Easy to install and operate
Nice and Light!

Would be nice to have an auto off when charging instead of overcharging. If you forget to remove if from charging, it kills your available usage time. It only lasts a couple hours now. It lasted a solid 8 hours before I forgot it on the charger one time. My fault, I know. No other issues.

I have had these for 2 months and used them every single night in the gym and have loved them since. I haven't had any problems with them and they dont get in my way while I workout. Personally suggest getting them for their price and the fact they come with 3 different sized earbuds. I love the earbuds that are moldable to your ear canal! Over all 5 out of 5 I love these so much!!

Not sure why these get such great reviews.

Unusable in wind.

Going back to wired Skull Candy.

The stupid things behind the ear are aggravating as all get out.

Wire behind head is BS.

Go with LG.

I purchased these headphones for exercise and I am very pleased with them. They are comfortable and stay on while running. With the proper ear peice you can still hear cars or barking dogs from behind. Their sound quality is average, wish they had better low end frequencies. They work perfect for what I wanted them for. Yes I would recommend them for active people.

Work greats, bummed that it doesn't come with wall charger, but glad it has car charger.
Got everything on time, great customer service with them checking in with me to see if everything was working.
Great set of BT headphones. Light weight, amazing sound quality, fast easy pairing and set up.
These were a gift for my husband. He is in love.
The best headphones ever bought

I bought two pairs. Both of them died around the 3month mark of use 4 - 5 times a week, only charging twice a week. other then the battery dying they are good, Just wish the product life lasted longer.
I've bought multiple pairs and left earbud keeps breaking. Last pair I bought lasted 15 days.
I have only had these headphones for a month but so far I love them! Work perfectly as described and battery lasts a long time.

I was so excited to find a pair of headphones that actually fit and stayed on my ears. I have very small ear canals and most headphones are way too large and fall out constantly. These thankfully had attachments small enough that they could fit as well as having the extra security of the wraparound piece, which I loved. Unfortunately, the bluetooth keeps randomly disconnecting from my phone. It's very frustrating to have to keep pressing play on my phone or having to turn off and repair the bluetooth connection. Huge bummer.
These are the best headphones for the buck. Amazing sound quality

Noise cancelation is GREAT!
I can’t hear a word my wife is saying...

Impressive. They fit my ears great, batteries last forever, and sound quality is better than I expected for the price. Not getting that humming issue I've heard about. If they last a good lifespan of buy them again.
Awesome head phones with great quality of sound and long life! Although mine quit working within the first 3 weeks but the customer service was awesome and immediately sent me new ones.

I purchased two sets.  Both were simple to set up and worked well; but one had a problem before or during shipping and was missing the little charging cable.  The company already had sent me a message looking for feedback. so I replied to that email and explained my problem.  I received an immediate answer (this was on a Sunday night, mind you), with instructions for return/refund and a discount code for my replacement purchase.  Well done!
Great product, good quality, good sound and very comfortable to workout I recommend it!

Amazing! I've used these headphones at the gym and mowing grass for about 2 months now and they have to be the best bluetooth headphones I've ever had. I originally bought $100 Plantronics headphones for use at the gym, but they didn't make a tight seal like these do. The foam inserts are the best by far. They assist with canceling out the noise, and don't get wet and slip like the gel inserts do. I sweat like a whore in church on a Sunday in August so I have put these to the test. They have yet to fall out and I don't even need to adjust them more than once during my hour and a half workout.

ONLY PROBLEM: I need more foam inserts, my are becoming dirty and would love to find more somehow!

I actually enjoyed it very much. The sound was more base but like it.  The manual was easy and connecting was easy too.  Since I have had it for less than 2 weeks I can not tell you about the battery performance.

I really recommend this headphones, they are very good quality and very easy to use.I run a half marathon las week and they worked wonderful no issues to connect or sweat.I bought the jaybird 2 weeks before the half marathon and honestly they were so complicated to adjust and for 2 days i was trying to figure it out and them finally i returned them and order this ones,easier and no problem running.
i recommend this Bluetooth headphones and for the price and quality you can not find something better
These headphones stay put while you are moving around.  Great sound!

Bought these hoping they would fit my cauliflower ear for my runs as I wrestle and do brazilian jiu jitsu. Sadly they were too uncomfortable and did sit on my ears properly that would make them fall out. Gave them to my girlfriend (no cauliflower ears) and said she loved them and worked perfectly. Can't blame the product for the fit but buy beware to all my cauliflowered brothers and sisters out there.

How can you beat the price of these?  The sound quality may not be the absolute best but if you are working out, playing golf, or washing the car, these are incredible.  I have small ears so the combination of the buds and clips are perfect for me.

Just got them, so far so good. I don't think it's the best earphones on the market, but they might be the best I've heard for the price. They seem to be better than at least the earphones that come with your phone, which is impressive for wireless.
The headphones need to be charged every single night and are such a pain to connect to different devices. Not super pleased with this purchase.
Thought these would work out but they keep dropping connection.  It makes them unusable.  Would not buy againl
Great pair of headphones. Good sound and they stay in place no matter what I am doing
Good sound. I can't get them to connect to my Apple Watch 2.
Works great love it.
Only listened to music for 5 hours and it died.. It says up to 8 hours of music..

These headphones are great. Overall I love them, and they are exactly what I was looking for if not more.
Pros:
- They stay in my ears, which was a huge issue with more other headphones.
- The battery lasts a while without being charged (I’m not sure exactly how long, but it’s lasted me 3 hours so far)
Cons:
- They aren’t noise cancelling whatsoever.
- The sound quality isn’t great, but it is still pretty good.
These are okay, sound is good but when I'm wearing them I constantly have to adjust them. Always falling out, not a good fit.

Extremely good headphones considering the price. Tested them out on my run and they were perfect. Headphones are a tricky thing and I don't see the point in spending a crazy amount, as those expensive will break sooner than later. Happy with my purchase

Beautiful product!!  So easy to pair with my iPhone and that made me very happy as I am the least technical person you'll ever meet!  Sound is outstanding and I am enjoying it on my streaming and workouts. Very pleased I purchased this product. I read all the reviews and now I agree with them. This is an excellent merchandise!

These are the best wireless earbud type headphones I have ever had! They fit perfectly, have great sound and bass levels (loud enough to be heard clearly while I mow the lawn) and have great connectivity. I highly recommend them!

The earbuds are light weight, provide clear sound and just enough noise dampening to help me ignore outside distractions without totally cutting me off from what's going on around me. I used them in the gym for a good two hours and they never slipped out my ears. Better still, they were comfortable to wear from the beginning to end of my workout. I'm looking forward to using them on my next plane flight to listen to music and watch videos!

These are the best headphones and the customer service is outstanding. I have purchased them numerous times and have never had an issue. The last pair I ordered had a defect and the company responded immediately to my problem and replaced them even faster. I can't say enough goid things about this product and company. If you need headphones, don't buy from anyone else. You will not regret it.

These are great!! They stay in place, have clear sound and are sweat proof. I like that they are cordless and don’t get knocked off by me accidentally pulling the wire. Looking forward to enjoying these for a long time to come!

I will buy these again without hesitation. They fit my ear perfect, I have issues with finding ones that fit my ears comfortably. I go running in these and they stay in my ear the entire time. Would definitely recommend. It came with extra pieces to better accommodate, car charger, USB charger, wire wrap, headphone case. I've gone through many headphones and these are worth the price.

If there were a 4.5 or star rating, that's what I would give.

I have had them for over a year and they're my primary running set. Good sound quality, consistent connectivity. Overall very pleased.

Two minor gripes:
1. Having to hold the buttons to advance the song is annoying to me
2. Sometimes the wire gets stuck on one side of the neck or the other and feels uncomfortable. Not sure there's a remedy to this.

Would 100% recommend.
I loved these wireless earbuds. Sound quality was good and the battery lasted a while, imo.  However, I've only had these 2 months and they have stopped charging?!?!?! Can anyone help with this??
Used once thus far, but very pleased. They have good functionality and ability to adjust volume, skip songs, etc. No problems during a run yesterday.

I was a little wary of the quality Bluetooth headphones would deliver, but wow! They were also simple to set up and are very comfortable. I usually buy foam earplugs to pair with wired headphones, but the fit is so secure, I don't think I'll need to. These sound as good as the $100+ wired headphones they're replacing.
These buds stated running out of juice quickly at 11 months. Then would not take a charge. I would not recommend this product.
Very clear when making and receiving calls, This blutooth is really water resistant, battery could last longer tho.
Product came  as promised and as advertised. The ear buds fit snugly and come  with a handy case.

I just got these things after looking to purchase other brands. I am very happy that I purchased these instead, they are great quality for the price! They fit nicely and are not uncomfortable, as I find most ear buds to be. The sound quality is pretty good, and they are easy to pair and use. They also come with extra ear buds, two charge chords, a D.C. adapter, and a cool little carrying case. Definitely satisfied and would recommend to anyone looking for some Bluetooth earphones. I can't wait to take them snowboarding!

Update: I like them so much I just bought another pair!

You can't get any better headphones for running or working out, for the money, then these.
Exactly what I needed.
Works great!  Connects easily and every time.  Accidentally went through the washing machine and still working perfectly!
Worked great at first, used them while mowing the grass and going on walks, started disconnecting intermittently then finally quit pairing altogether after 2 months.

I purchased these for running with and a more cost effective version of the beats. They work jut great, sound is good, last ages on single charge and are well made. I am very pleased with them and the only downside can be if your out in the wind, they pick up wind noise badly, so best for inside gym work or outside on calmer days, otherwise brilliant wireless headphones at a great price. I’ll be buying a second pair for traveling.
These were just what I was looking for.  They stay put, have great sound quality and a nice case to keep them in when they're not in use.
These sound great and the battery lasts forever.  A friend has the Beats and said these sound just as good.

Hello,
I really like my head phone except I keep loosing connection with Bluetooth. I tried many different ways, but it will only connect and stay connected if I am not near another person with a smart phone or any where near my house. Even while walking I still lose my connection while on my walk/run. They are very comfortable and while running I do not lose them. The charge last for 4 days which is a bonus since I always forget to charge them.

Thought these were great headphones for the first couple months until I found them melted in my truck. These actually had the best sound of any Bluetooth headphones I’ve owned, but that doesn’t matter if they’re melted. Luckily I didn’t have these plugged into an outlet that was always hot, so I was able to catch it before a massive disaster happened in my truck.

These are an amazing deal!  For the price they are top of the line and would even surmise that they compete with the lower end (but still overpriced) beats earbuds.  The car charger and cord is a nice extra.  I recommend these to all my friend!
works great easy to connect and use , may be a/little longer batter life
I was more impressed than I thought. I had tried similar devices but this by far out performs anything I have previously used. Excellent quality and sound.

Have tried many Bluetooth headphones, that inevitably fall out, or have no battery life. These Senso are AWESOME, the earbuds are super soft & you can't even tell that the ear hooks are there, battery life great & best of all I love the sound. I'm going to pick up a second pair for my son. The extras are great, it comes with a dual charge android & lightening, great case, all in all excellent.

I got the SENSO's as a birthday gift and what a gift. I class myself as bit of an Audiofile and was completely blown away by the quality of this product, both sonically and cosmetically. My old collection of headphones are now in the trash! Great product and exceptional value.
These headphones were amazing until I stepped on them and broke them. 😂 I had them for a solid 6 months, and I’m reordering them now!
I'm currently having trouble listening to my music while my phone is in my pocket or while I'm riding my bike. the movement I guess disrupting the Wi-Fi signal or something to the headset

They work. Not the best sound. Worst part is their size. Two big boxes sticking out of your ears. The rubber cover over the charging port makes is annoying to hold out of the way when plugging in the cord. Not a huge deal but irritating.
I mostly bought these for running. They still on my ear pretty well. I’ll stick with my AirPods for other because this product isn’t very stylish.

I had these earphones for about three months when they suddenly kept disconnecting.  The slightest movement and it just cut off.  Resetting them did nothing to fix it.  Great when they lasted, but three months is way too short.
Lots of wind noise when I was on my bike but for $35 you can't really beat it.
Really good Bluetooth, comfortable and clear. Keep on and make a lot of business!!

Given a 5 star rating based on the price I got it. This works perfectly with my work out and other general purpose . Plays smoothly and no connectivity issue

The sound quality is not definitely the best (however it is good), however I would take it based on the price.

Great headphones for the price. I use them when lifting weights and running - even in the rain, and that has caused no problems.

They fit well, form a good seal, and do not readily fall out. The "noise-cancelling" claim is dubious. I don't think there is any actual noise cancellation going on, but the seal and the sound quality are fine anyway.

I've never intentionally tested the Bluetooth range, but forgot my phone in the other room once. I was about 20ft away and the sound was still crystal clear.

The battery seems to last maybe 4-6 hours. It warns you when the battery is low with a voice in your ear. You best take that voice seriously, because you get the notification three times in about a minute before they power off.

I like these headphones and would recommend them.

The sound quality is excellent.  In fact it's so good that my wife insisted that I order a second set.  The company has also been very pro actively supportive.  They are very comfortable to wear,  but on heavy running do tend to come loose a little. I highly recommend these as well as this company.
I loved them but unfortunately someone stolen them.
Great sound and very light. Still playing with earpieces to get a more secure fit.

Worked right out of the box.  Buttons are well placed and intuitive to use.  Sound is great.  Nice collection of accessories were included.  Price is right.  Great warranty period.  Would recommend this purchase to anyone.

Sound is good. For a budget headphone, product has lots of options. Comes well packaged with extras you would get with more expensive headphones. Setup was easy. Major problem is the ear pieces are to flexible. Ear buds don't stay in place when walking much less running.
Fantastic sound, lightweight, great battery life.
These Senso headphones have excellent sound quality for the price. The controls are simple and easy to use. Highly recommend.

the item is slightly heavy. I bought this around April 2017, and used it well until October 2017. In October, I used it in a hot tub, and one side of the headphone sound dramatically died. I still hear some sound, but it is very weak. for IPX7, the item should still work.

It took all of my willpower not to chuck these headphones in the trash on my first and only run with these. They were extremely flimsy. I spent more time trying to shove them back into my ears than actually listening to any music. The sound quality was not evenly distributed between the two ear buds. The over-ear loops were basically pointless, as they did nothing to keep the buds in place. Same goes for the neck strap -- which was too long and kept catching on my clothing. Additionally, the volume buttons are in a terrible place -- every time I went to adjust the right headphone, I would accidentally press the volume button, which would release an ear-piercing screeching noise directly into my head. I was extremely disappointed with these headphones and am 100% returning them.
Great headphones, especially for the price.  Easy to connect, comfortable, good battery life.
This is my first try with anything bluetooth.  They fit great and sound great. Using them at work to cut the office noise.

Bought as a cheaper alternative to the Powerbeats. Was fooled by the reviews and price. The material was cheap, obviously they were only 27 bucks. The sound was good awful and I’m partially deaf so I like stuff to sound loud and good. These turned halfway up had distortion from the bass. Nope, Terrible even if they were 27 bucks. I’m deciding on wether or not I want to return them but it’ll cost me 8 dollars to return 27$ headphones. Might just give them away.
Product worked less than 2 months

So far these are awesome! They paired instantly without hassle and sound very good. I purchased one for my and one for my girlfriend to replace sets that were nearly impossible to have a conversation on. These are clear and the noise rejection works well. Nice variety of ear buds in the package. Did not see the cable wrap accessory though. Bonus gifts, phone magnet and wallet are nice.
These lasted only a couple months. Constantly cut out while trying to exercise. I would never buy again!

These look a lot like the rock sport brand.. but they aren’t.. they came in and did not even turn on I pressed and held the power button for like 10 seconds and nothing.. I charged em and nothing.. I tried turning them on while charging and nothing!!!!! -.- bro don’t even waste your money I’m never buying this again.. thanks for sending something that doesn’t even work smh.
Works great. Sound is good. I can make phone calls on walk/runs.
Work well and are comfortable due to the soft material. Seems to hold a charge reasonably well too - perhaps 4-5 hours?

I bought these headphones in June of 2017 and 8 months later, they are not working as engineered. The skip song and volume control functions no longer work. They advertise a 1 year warranty, so hopefully they will be replaced...now I just have to figure out to contact the company. Amazon sure does make buying things easy...contacting the seller when the product isn't working as advertised? Not as easy...hmmmm, I wonder why that is?

Was looking for a good pair of wireless ear buds with ear loops for working out at the gym because the wired ones always tend to fall out. I purchased these because of the price and reviews. I am amazed at what you get and the sound quality they fit in ears nice and are comfortable. My kids have the beats wireless buds and these sound just as good!

Great sound, excelente battery life. I dont think these are noise cancelling headphones.
Mic never worked on mine, only useful for music.
Never had issues with Bluetooth

Sound quality is very good given the price. Material is sweat friendly and the buds stick very well while running. Pairing was seemless and the multifunction button is intuitive to use. Overall a very good experience.

Easy to set up with my IPhone 7. The comfortable, the around-the-ear holder easily re-shapes to fit your ear. The sound is very good. At a price of $19.95 these headphone are a steal. I am extremely happy with this purchase.

Great quality and amazing sound, is really easy to use and pair with any phone!
It was such a deal for an amazing set of headphones, it was worth it the money.
I will definitely buy it again because it came exactly like they said and the customer service is so polite and worried about your satisfaction which I think is awesome!
They broke within two weeks of use. Sorry I bought them. They were awkward, wouldn't stay in my ear. Waste of money.
These headphones are easy to use and deliver good quality sound. I've used them only a few times so far but have really enjoyed them.

Does the job well.  I need music when I workout and that's what it does.  BUT... when I am running outside and the wind picks up in front of me then all I hear is wind and I have to turn up the volume.  I tried putting on a headband over the headset to reduce the sound of the wind but it didn't help.  The bass level is good but could use a higher tuning with the treble.  All in all, it does a good job for the price.

Just did a tri this weekend and these held up great for the bike and run (both connected to apple watch).  Please with sounds and they stayed in the ears with no issues.  Not sure why I waited so long...
We bought 2 more sets!!! Great for working out.
Very easy to talk on and very clear for the other person!

I paid for these with my own money.
Great earbuds. Good sound quality for my use which is to tune out noisy office mates and listen to college lectures on public transit. They are very comfortable to wear for hours. I live in Oregon and have worn them in the (light) rain with no problem. Battery life is amazing.
Bought these on July 11 and sent them back July 31. I run and these were supposed to be sweat resistant but they just don't last. Don't waist your time or money.
Great! Compact. Good battery life. Fit well, sound great.
Great service, great quality, awesome sound!
I've gone through about 4 pairs of BT ear buds and these are my favorite ones I've ever had. Fit great and really loud. Also I've sweated all over them plenty of times and they still work great.
Great value. Better then I expected.
Battery live around 6hr not bad

For <$50 i would say they are excellent. I have Bose QCII but to be honest i use these headphones a lot since they don't put lot of pressure on my ears. I use them regularly during workout and they are sweatproof for sure. They are little big compared to Powerbeats but there is a difference in price also so i cannot really complain.

It comes with a lot of accesories. The sound quality is not the best but it is good enough for 19 bucks. Whenever I moved my head to the right the sounds cut or if I put it in the pocket of my jacket or some other random situation. Other than that worked fine. I would gladly return it but yesterday, it open up the right side of the headset. I found the cover at the floor in my room but I lost the volume control. I didn't hit it, that is why I didnt realize when It open up. Don't waste your money, I have given a chance to unknown brands in the past but this is the first time I see such a bad product. Again, it is just 19 bucks but still. Psdt: It is kind of painful after an hour wearing it.
Nice product.  Good battery life.  Easy to use and set up....even for me!!

Very satisfied with this purchase.  Headphones pair up quickly and easily to iPhone.  Sound quality is excellent and earphones are comfortable and easy to use.  Use them when working out and have no issues with moisture.
A really nice looking headset lightweight earbuds are out slightly uncomfortable at functionalitity is great and easy to use.
I really enjoy these wireless headset  Charge the battery & they are simple to use !!
Great price, easy to use, sound quality is decent for the price but I'm an audio snob! I'm using these for exercise so the convenience of not having a chord is the bomb!
Easy to setup, works well for phone calls as well. Neat carrying case. No regerts!
Love it

First time I went with wireless headsets, pretty amazing, no more cables and the sound is WAY better than my AKG headphones. Today I had my first call with it, i was outside walking my dog, I was able to hear the other person crisp and clear, I asked, if I was good to understand to and YES my voice was crisp and clear as well and no background noise distorted the experience. I give it all thumbs up!

I LOVE the sound quality! The noise cancellation is great and I actually can only wear one headphone in the office otherwise I don't hear people come up behind me. They do hurt the inside of my ears after wearing them for about an hour straight and they are a little heavier than I expected, but I still love them!

I got one and it was supposed to be IPX7 but it is NOT. You should be able to wear it while in the shower but you CAN'T. To make matters worse, water barely even got on it while in the shower and it still broke. So I got me a new one and I was supposed to send the broken one back, well when I got the new one IT WAS ALSO BROKEN. Just broke after a few weeks of use and I didnt even put water on it. This is the worse headphones I have ever bought. STAY AWAY. I was working a lot at the time and I didn't have time to return them so I was charged for 2 broken headphones.  The same might happen to you.
Works great
The sound is great and the battery life is amazing. Very comfortable. Good for working out or even just studying.
Not even a week after trying them one of the speakers has almost completely gone out. It is at half of the working speaker at best. Can't even use them because it gives you a headache .
Awesome headphones, these really have great sound. The bluetooth connects quickly, and the battery life is amazing! I highly recommend this product!

Phenomenal. For the price I paid, you will not find a better sounding set of ear buds. My co worker had the Beats version which pretty much lol the same and these sound better than his. Especially in the mid range. Responsive bass, doesn't bottom out or distort. Super comfortable and well made. I've used for a total of about 6 hours so far and I'm still on the first charge. Comes loaded with charging accessories, different sized soft rubber tips, and a nice carrying case. After seeing all the reviews, once they went on sale I jumped on them especially with prime.
bomb.com they are equivalent to beats without the price
Ear buds are bulky and big. Not good for exercising.

Good headphones, and the customer service when I had a warranty issue was great. The bass is a little strong but it's better than weak bass and not too hard to compensate for it with equalizer settings. Great package of accessories included. The construction seems durable, but as I said I had a problem where one of my earpieces stopped working and I'm not sure of the root cause.
Absolutely love these!  They are comfortable,  they pair quickly and easily.  They sound great.  Very happy with the purchase.
Headphone hooks don't work. Flimsy.
Wonderful Product!

TRASH TRASH TRASH! I got these as a gift and out of the box the cord appeard frayed and the sound didn't work in one ear. Horrible! The worst part is that whoever my secret santa was wasted almost $40 on CRAP and I'm out my headphones!
Love it.... use everyday!

Great sound quality.  Easily molds around ear. Have had for 2 years and still going strong.  First pair were defective but were were replaced immediately with no issues.  I live the connecting cord in case one comes out they don't get lost.  I wear during water aerobics and there's lots of splashing.  Good range from music source.  I can actually think of no negatives.

I bought these for running after spending a lot of money on powerbeats2 wireless headphones and having them break repeatedly. These paired easily, have good sound and the charge seems to last a while. My only complaint is how flimsy the plastic pieces are that go over the ears. UPDATE: I've been using these for a month, I've run a few hundred miles with them, including the Chicago Marathon, run miles in the rain, and these have held up well.  The battery seems to last 6-8 hours as advertised.  Great value for the money!
Love these!

Don't like that it doesn't go into standby -  If you walk out of range or input stops (end of track or video) it continues to beep and search for signal until it batteries are all worn out.  IE -  I fall asleep after 30min of Tablet TV and when I wake power all used up.

Stopped working after only a few months of very light use. These earbuds were turned on maybe a maximum of 10 times before they stopped working. Never got wet, never left in the sun. Just stopped turning on. Disappointing.

Great value. I cant speak to the longevity of the product, but my initial reaction is "wow, probably the best $30 wireless headphones out there"

Fantastic for running and outdoor use. You hear the music, not the "cable noise" or whatever it is that causes most headphones to suck in outdoor active use.
This is an excellent product that works really well and at a good price.
Have already used it for many hours. No problems. Clear audio, good quality - and we do a lot of talking.

I inspected the headphone and they appear to be well made.  The sound is good and they fit firmly in my ears.  I haven't had a chance to run with them yet but they look like they will do the job well.
Lasted 3 months and now wont charage at all.
Awesome headphones, easy setup, easy to use. Crystal clear sound, have been using with iPhone 7, music and calls are clear and perfect volume. Couldn't be more happy with my purchase.

Not active noise cancelling but passive as the fit is tight but comfortable (I switched to the smallest of the three optional insert covers). Really good sound and I have yet to run the battery out plus easy/quick charge. Very satisfied.
These linked up and work extremely well with my new Moto 5g Plus phone.  I highly recommend them.
I need to return this because it stops working after a month!! this is very bad!!

Just received and work as advertised. Love the foam fit earplugs included as the rubber collapsible ones usually don't fit me well. Holds the signal, easy to pair, good sound, good volume.  If they hold up these are a winner for twice the price.
I've used my ear buds twice already and they are great! During workouts there is no skipping a beat with these. The price is reasonable too, I would definitely order them again.
Amazing sound quality, lightweight, durable and great product for the price.  My only issue has been that the ear buds (even smallest size option) are too large for my ears.
Great sound and setup took one minute. They're very comfortable too. I use them while lifting weights and they're perfect!

The folks at SENSO are very courteous. They wanted to be sure I had received the headphones & how I was treated & liked them. I work out of an 18-wheeler tanker truck 12 hours a day & I'm a senior citizen. Many of us talk to & help each other through out the day. The wired headset I had for my phone worked sometimes but most of the time not. These are 1000 times better. Once I left my phone in the truck, a call came in & I answered it from the back of the tanker over 30 feet away. Some guys wear the headsets with an external mic. I prefer the integrated mic. With the smallest buds on, I can wear these 12 hours & don't feel them. Next I need to get my sons to show me how to put music on my phone so I can listen to it when not talking oilfield-trucker talk to my co-workers. No more CB radio.
Love em!  They tend to slip out of my ears while mowing, but i sweat alot..riding my bike is not a problem, which is great!  I would buy again

This product is great deal. Sound quality is awesome, the ease of use, battery lifetime, and price is relatively cheap for the package. it comes with a case, two usb cables with iphone adapter, and the car plug is a nice add to the package.

I've got to say, I trusted most of the great reviews for this product, but I am very unimpressed with them. Here's why:

1- Earbud material actually becomes uncomfortable as it rubs against your ear. I tried putting felt pads on them to eliminate the issue, but product should be made of a softer material. Ear holders wraps are soft but easily slip off if you're moving on an elliptical or treadmill and actually working up a sweat or wearing a hat.

2- Sound quality is not impressive, earphones usually distort at normal volumes or simply don't have a strong Bluetooth connection.

3- Battery life is not as advertised. I end up having to charge these after approx 2 hours of use.

Wanted to live these, but they don't live up to the hype with my experience.
These are great headphones they are replacement headphones because my dog chewed up my other pair of headphones
Exelent

This product is great! This is the second pair that I’ve owned after losing  my first  pair. My music is always so clear and the headphones are easy to operate. The only downside I’ve noticed is, after having them for a few months the person on the other end of my call can’t hear me that well. However, it’s not a big deal since they are mostly used for music.

I haven't used earbuds in years because normally I can't find any that don't fall out of my ears, regardless of material that supposedly molds itself to your ear or a multiplicity of different sized inserts. I've been using headphones but they're bulky to pack and I travel a lot, so I decided to give one of these hook-over-the-ears models a try. I did a lot of research and these SENSOs had the most and best reviews for something under $50. I'd had Shure earphones before (cost $150) and they sounded great but always fell out.

So far I'm very pleased with the SENSOs. They sound close to the Shures and they stay in my ears, plus they have the microphone and controls to answer the phone, which the Shures (which were wired, not Bluetooth) didn't have. I also like the audible feedback for power on and off and pairing state.

I'm not an audiophile, so I don't need the absolute best sound quality, but I hate tinny sounding audio. These provide good balanced bass and clarity and that's good enough for me. They definitely sound far, far better than my Samsung Galaxy S7's speakers.

I've only had them for a few days so I can't speak to durability, but they appear to be well made and I'm hoping they'll last a long time.
Great product! Highly recommend it!

These are my first Bluetooth headphones and I happy that they work well. It is easy to pick up a phone call while listening to a book and then switch back. People seem to be able to hear me well on a phone call.

For this price point, these ear buds are unbelievable. Unparalleled battery life versus anything you can get at Walmart, and the sound quality leaves nothing to be desired. Yeah, if you are an audiophile you can probably find some better sounding ear buds but no where near at this price. I have had these buds for over a year now and they are my tried and true pair whether I am going out to eat, going to an event, or even during work. They double exceptionally well as a way to answer phone calls while in public with their intuitive and easy to use controls. You can even skip a song by pressing the volume "+" button twice!

Honestly, I was looking for a replacement for my JBL bluetooth headphones, I could not be happier with the SENSO headphones I chose.  They are SOOOOOO much better than the JBL.  They are manufactured well, have a long range of bluetooth connectivity (twice as much, if not more, than JBL), the thin wire never gets in the way or annoys me while exercising. The battery life is amazing. The earbuds come in three different sizes, and you get so many more accessories with your purchase.  I was truly caught off guard with the additional cords (plural, yes that is intentional) and the adapters (also plural).  Really one of my favorite purchases in a long time. Wish I had known about these before buying the expensive, disappointing JBL headphones.
Left side did not work out of the box. Returning today
Bought these as a gift for a person who enjoys running.  She loves them!  I have since bought other pairs for gifts.

I got these for Christmas, but unfortunately just got them out today. It's now last the return date. The charging port is not intact, you can hear it rattling around inside the headphone. There is just an empty opening where the charging connection should be. So I can't plug them in the charge them and use them!!
Good quality headphones, function exactly as advertised.
I don't like them the volume is not loud  I wouldn't recommend them to anyone I threw them away never again
got my new headphones delivered in 1 day and after charging them took them out for a test spin.....Fantastic sound! very comfortable also. Highly recommend  these!

I have only used these twice, and they seem to work just fine.  Took a few minutes to figure out how to get my phone to 'discover' the earphones, and the controls are very small, but once you get used to them, they seem to work just fine.
Very easy to pair, comes with everything you need and is very comfortable.. i am very pleased with my my headphones.. 5 stars for me!
I'm quite pleased - they work really well and would recommend them
Nice soft rubber piece to go around the ear, the volume is easy to adjust, and the sound quality is very satisfactory.  Very happy with them so far.
Loved them, but everytime they say  battery low when they are on Like 60% then they turn off

This is a really good earbuds. I'm not really into the sports kind and end up throwing it away or not using it for a very long time but I can tell you this that these earbuds are amazing. I still use these and the bluetooth part just makes it better. IDK about the waterproof part since I am a bit skeptical with electronics and them being water proof. But it is definitely sweatproof lol
bought this for my son he has no complaints and is always wearing them so I give this a thums up
broke up at short distance

Find myself having to re-buy these once every three or four months. This pair I received Nov 10th, theee months later almost to the day (Feb 9) i have to reorder because they will no longer turn on. Have tried resetting, they simply are broken. When they work, they are great. But using them at the gym 7 days a week is apparently too much wear and tear.

After my favorite "Blayz" headphones " stopped being available, I decided to try the Senso - as they seemed very similar.
I would say 90-95% as good as the Blayz, which is quite a feat for a sub $20.00 pair.
I haven't tested the 8 hour Battery time, but for sure 5 hours, and they rarely miss a beat. Sound over Voice calls and Skype are excellent. Good Base, could be better on the High's. Very comfortable - A winner!

So Much better than any of those "Ear-Bud" systems. My sons who use The Apple AirPods are amazed at the sound these produce, but they just aren't as "cool" as the Ear Bud/style they say.

I'l go for sound and quality!
sounded like a tin can-not good

Best wireless headphones I've ever used in my entire life. I switched from Wireless PowerBeats3 to these SENSO headphones because of the outstanding quality. 10/10, best wireless headphones. I love the fact I can use Google assistant too. They came with so many neat little things along with the product itself, also 1 year warranty??? Literally the best thing I own.
For the price, this product is awesome!! I hope it doesn't break! Will buy a few more for friends as gifts in the future
Good product, was a gift for my brother and he loves it.
Great headset!  I do HIIT training and I never worry about losing them.
Love them, only thing is they stick out of your ears and I get wind noise riding my bike. Other than that they work great. Last long as stated.

Sensor provided 5 star customer service. I was very happy with these headphones when I received them. I had a problem with them and had the opportunity to deal with Senso’s customer service. I’m very glad that they quickly responded to my issue to my complete satisfaction. I didn’t give them 5 stars overall because of the initial quality problem that I had with my headphones.
Awesome sound, no wires, easy pairing,  What more could you ask? Oh, and the price is phenomenal.

I owned a pair of these before and was pleased with them - unfortunately I lost them. They were a great product for the price.

Unfortunately my second set won’t stay in my ears, no matter what I do. I spend my entire workout or flight putting them back in. 2 stars because sound quality is good.

These are great. I like them better than my last pair, and I really liked those. The sound on these is real nice. With my last pair, the wire would sort of grab the back of my neck when I would turn my head, tugging at the headphones and sometimes causing them to fall out. So far, with these, I don’t get much if any of that. I find they sit in my ears nice. I would definitely recommend these. Obviously, find the bud covers that fit your ears and your in good shape.
Very comfortable and easy to use.

Great headphones for the price and the packaging was very impressive!! I have been using these in the gym for a week and have no complaints. Noise elimination is great and stays in place when running on the treadmill. Could use a little more bass.

These headphones are all right relative to the price. Nothing special & have some quirks.

They're comfortable enough after trying out all 3 sets of ear tips. I settled on the medium sized ones. Not a fan of in-ear phones but these don't seem to take up too much space or hurt the area around my ear hole like others I've tried. I can't get earbuds to stay in my ear, so the hooks are a nice feature to keep the tips secured in my ear.

I don't care too much about sound quality and these are fine. The controls are in the right ear piece and I have to wear my iphone 5c in an armband on the right side otherwise the music cuts out every time I stride. Sometimes it cuts out if a make a sudden move with my right arm.

It's tough to control the volume or skips songs while running. Also when opening the port on the ear piece to insert the charging cord is extremely difficult and I worry it may break off if I use too much force.

I only run 2-3 times a week. So might keep using these. Might just relegate them to beach and things that don't require a lot of movement.

To reiterate, an OK product for the price.

I bought these headphones in May 2017 and they lasted till February 2019 - until one side stopped working
as a person who would buy new headphones every couple of months, it was wonderful
and as a first time user of wireless headphones, it was great!!
i did a lot of sweating and they stayed on very well
You do have to treat them with a little TLC, but its worth it.
One of my best buys on amazon
Bought as a gift. The recipient extremely satisfied with product.
Luv these. Charge lasts for a few days. Not sure why anyone would ever purchase headphones that weren't bluetooth, especially if you're active!
The charging port broke inside the headphones the first time I went to plug in the charger. I got one use out of them.

I’ve ordered these headphone three times not because of how much i love the ease fit and quality.

However after 4-6 months of everyday use there always seems to be something wrong. First time they wouldn’t charge, second time the connection between wire and headphone was poor and kept showing wires. This time the headphones are fully charged and will connect for 3 seconds and then disconnect and turn off.

If you’re looking for short term Bluetooth headphones... these are great! But if you’re looking for something to last you longer I would chose a different brand.

It’s a bummer because they’re my favorite headphone to run in and they are not expensive. however at this rate with the amount that I’ll need to keep buying them I’ll be spending a lot more and will invest in higher quality headphones.
Love these headphones!  4th pair. Dog chewed up 2. I can't tell the difference between these and the $200.00 beats I bought the wife. Will definitely buy again.

Good overall sound quality. Still wondering how waterproof they are because I sweat a lot at the gym. They can last about 3 2-hour gym sessions before needing a charge, but they use the same microUSB as my phone. This allows me to charge them during the day when my phone is not being charged. I do get interesting feedback occasionally, which makes me worry about their long term reliability. Sound quality is good overall for earbuds.
After 6 months of use, the Bluetooth is not working. Very disappointing! Do not recommend.

I really wanted these headphones to work. I work outside, and have the luxury of being able to listen to music, podcasts, audiobooks, whatever I want to, while working. I bought these to replace an old, worn out pair of bluetooth earmuff type headphones.
The sound quality is pretty decent, and the 'noise canceling' plugs are great. I could actually keep the volume at a decent level and still hear what I was listening to over the noise of the equipment I am operating (old headphones I had to turn volume up all the way, and depending on what I was listening to, I still couldn't hear anything sometimes).
My disappointment comes from the constant 'drop' every few minutes (for lack of a better term). No matter what I am listening to, every few minutes the headphones just cut out and back again for just a second or so. It's annoying. It is not because I am going to far away from my connected device, because I am carrying the connected device in my pocket. They are always within 2 feet of each other.
The second thing that disappoints me is the battery time. Perhaps all devices of the size operate the same, but these earbuds only last me 3 1/2-4 hours. I only need them to work at most, 5.
One other thing I'll mention that has been said by other reviewers: the size of the plugs. If you have small ears, (I do) they will hurt after having them on about an hour, and the 'loop' that goes over the ear doesn't even touch my ear because it is so big. The plugs are staying in because I have to cram the buds in my ears (because they are so big) and that's what keeps them in! I'm not sure how someone running keeps them in.
I think I may have to return these and go back to the bulky headphones.

Everything seems almost perfect with these. I have used them for 2 weeks to run without charging them. Today, it consistently reminded me that the battery was low even though it said it was 30%!!! After a few times, it began disconnecting. I tried multiple times to connect them only for them to disconnect seconds later. They're great but I rather them lose battery quicker and go to 0% than stop working at 30%. Extremely misleading!!!

I've been very happy with these for over a year now. They are taken care of, mostly worn around the house. Yesterday they started to disconnect from Bluetooth randomly. Sometimes after 10 seconds, sometimes after a minute. Reset my Bluetooth settings, charged fully and they just won't stay connected. While watching a video say on YouTube, the video will pause itself and when I hit play the sound is no longer in the headphones. Departing on trying another brand. A little disappointed!
They worked great for about a month and now they don't work anymore.  Conveniently, they died after the return date.  Not happy at all.

Very good build quality, especially for the price. I have had many cheap no name and expensive name brand Bluetooth headphones, however these headphones have been the best I have purchased so far. I will be buying these again when I loose them. Sound quality is for bass heavy music and comparable to beats style headphones.

Excellent headphones!  They are very comfortable to wear, relatively easy to apply, once you get the "hang" of it, and produce a marvelous sound quality.  They also hold a charge for a long time.  The package also comes with a complete set of accessories, even a chord to power  up your IPhone!  Overall, I am delighted with these headphones.

Nice headphones to workout and listen to music. They are not noise cancellation in the outdoors, but can definitely work in quiet places to talk. I also have small ear which they fit perfectly without falling out.
They don't stay perfectly, and because they're so big I bump them with my towel a lot, but otherwise I like them. Good sounds and feel durable.
Deffinitley worth the buy👍👍👍
Very comfortable and great sound. Easy to wear too.
Great product while they lasted!!!  Good audio and battery life.  Stayed in place well.  Had them for 2 months.  Probably used about 20 times.  Will not turn on  anymore.
Pretty good deal considering the quality. I've got many different headphones including jbls and beats. This was a pleasant surprise. Loud and good bass. Work really well for the gym.
Awesome!
Well done. Confortable. Pretty good sound.
This exceeded all expectations.  great headphone
Great sound. Let's see how they hold up.
paired easily and sound great.also very comfortable

This is my first pair of wireless headphones and overall the product works great for my needs. When I spoke to a few friends through it they said my voice was muffled but they could hear me, so while the mic may not be perfect it does work well for listening to music or audio books. The battery life so far has been great as well.

This is a much better quality set of headphones than I expected for the price.  Even the packaging was good quality.  These charged quickly ,paired easily,and sound fantastic.  The little extras that came in the box was a magnetic dash mount to hang your headphones on. A nice little cellphone wallet.  Attaches to back of cell phone to keep an I’d or credit card and a very nice sturdy carrying case.  I now can only hope that the headphones are as durable as I think they will be

Let me start by saying I have no other motivation to review this product other than how satisfied I am. This is a quality product that is superior to others in its price range. I've owned many others. At this price I am planning on buying more

Highlights: Much better sound than competition, much better battery life than competition, I personally like the flexible ear straps although I can see some disliking, no connection issues so far, really nice accessories, not flimsy, comfortable. The end

I am surprised to see this product has so many 5 star ratings. I bought this headset to use  during runs. I wanted headset that stays in place and not falling off every 5 minutes. After reading positive reviews, i ordered this product. It was delivered in good package and on time. When I tried it on, ear hook was too big for me. I tried to adjust to clamp on my ears but did not fit. I gave it a trial run outside. Wind interference is terrible. You can hardly hear the music when it is windy. Left ear piece kept falling off my ears. I tried to fix it several times but no luck. Sound quality is mediocre, it was loud but i didnt mind.  I am returning this product.

Updated Review: they just died in me after only 7 months of use. Battery won't hold a charge and keeps disconnecting from both phone and tablet that I've used the whole time. Unfortunate, because these were my favorite so far. Wish they lasted longer.

Previous review:These are great! I recommend them. I've had them for months now. Use them daily at work. Hold at least 8 hr+ charge. Connect quickly. Sound quality is clear, crisp highs and deep full lows. Volume is powerful, sometimes have to lower volume because they are that loud. They stay in my ear and don't fall out. Work well with 2 devices at the same time. They work well at cancelling outside noise. Only reason I don't give it a 5 star is because sometimes on a call, I'm not heard clearly because the Mic picks up too much background noise. If I'm driving it's great, but in a public place not so much. I would purchase again, since I don't use them for calls, but for music and videos.

These were great headphones most of the time. Good sound quality, complete noise cancellation,  ok fit, decent battery. One side stopped working after 8 months use -no sound whatsoever.  The other side continued to work but the mic became staticky to the listener. The fit isn't great for jogging or exercise... a quick head turn causes the slack to catch and can pull one of the buds out. They also require a frequent wipe down as they get sweaty. Two stars due to early failure with routine use and poor fit.
Ear buds don’t fit well..  speakers distorted.  Even at low levels..... returning.
Muy bueno todo pero al final los cables se rompen
love it, but only about 8 hours used
Works as advertised.  Matched with my Pixel first time, quick charge, great sound, and comfortable through my entire workout with no slip.

There's nothing more discouraging than leaving for a workout with the battery level at 70% then having it die 0 minutes later, after only about 3 hours of total use. Sound is great, they're very comfortable, but what's the point of wireless headphones if you they die so quickly? Especially when the description puts the battery life at 8 hours.
It works great for me during workout and running. Poor sound (echo sound of other person) thats annoying for others to whom I call using this  Bluetooth device
I have spent hundreds of dollars on earbuds,and these are just as good if not better then the way more expensive ones.
I like these headphones for working out.  Cheap option that works great
Great device. Light, good sound and easy control. Came on time and was in super shape.
the best earphones for working outside in the heat all day.  great sound
Delivered fast, easy to use and the bass is tight. Use mine for workouts, no slip, no problems. Great product.
So far, my husband like it, and no issues.
Love the headphones, and if there is a problem, the customer service is prompt and super!

Range was pretty bad. Walk more than 10 feet away and it starts cutting out. I have another pair of bluetooth headphones that I can walk at least 30 feet with before they cut out.

Can't control music apps. Press pause, paused spotify, hit again to start playing, opens up phones default music app and starts playing that. Not sure how that works, but not too pleased with these.

Only had them a couple of days.  Use them for running.  So far excellent.  Much better sound quality than my Jaybird X2s and they stay in ear better and I don't have to worry about finding that I lost an ear tip on the way to my run.  They even audibly tell the number of the caller when a call comes in.  Two charging cables and an adapter so I can charge for the car  AND a nice case.  Exceptional!!!!

For me it is difficult to find a comfortable set of earbuds that actually sound good. I would say they are pretty comfortable but not perfect. Everybody's ears are different so don't go by my review... your mileage may vary.
These pack more bass than I expected and are loud. I have a Samsung Note 9 that has good EQ tuning capability and I am finding that is a huge advantage as you switch between different headphones since most have a different sound signature. The Samsung EQ allows for your custom EQ and profile saving.... perfect.

Here's what's funny.... I bought these for a lightening deal last year (2017) and paid $15. I threw them in my drawer and didn't break them out until last month. Never even opened up the box! These were the cheapest ones I bought last year and just assumed low quality. WRONG! I have been using other BT earbuds that are nowhere as nice as these. These are pretty darn nice for working out, traveling, or just listening around the house.
You get a lot in this package! case, cables, extra earbuds... and today I just noticed the foam pads... nice!
I know that the real wireless buds are the rage this year but I bet most of them cost more and don't sound as good and the wire isn't really that much of a hassle... I would much rather save the $$, have longer battery life and much better quality.
I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again for sure!

These headphone are amazing, they work great when working out or just listening to music on the go. Sound quality is perfect and the range of Bluetooth is not bad. Customer service is outstanding, they reach out to me with timely response when I had a question about the headphones.
It fits great and doesn’t fall off during runnings.
They are great you can hear great

I actually had to put a decent effort into getting these off once I put them on so when you're running or biking or whatever you're doing these things will not abandon you however I haven't tested the longevity of the battery yet but we shall see and they sound great lots of bass
AMAZING!
I recommend these headphones for all. they are great.

Comfortable and secure in the ear although a bit bulky. All controls are on right earphone and are easily accessible. Charging slot cover doesn't always stay in place. Doesn't always work if phones are 30' away from main unit. Anything closer than 30' they work flawlessly. Charging is quick and simple. Haven't yet maximized the battery usage to see if I can get 8 hrs. of battery life as claimed. Noise cancellation is acceptable but don't expect 100%. The phone connection feature is also acceptable. Only used the earphones several days so I can't comment on longevity. However the unit feels and looks solid and of good construction. Most importantly for anyone using earphones to listen to music...The sound is EXCELLENT.
Bass, treble, separation... all working as good or better than any other much more expensive earphones I have used in the past.
Nice product. Great seller. Item is better than advertised!

I know I shouldn’t expect much for the price but the sound quality is mediocre. I think the frequency response of the speakers is a bit treble heavy and needs more low end before I touch my equalizer settings. Truthfully, I bought these as an interim pair of headphones until I can find a quality replacement that I’m willing to shell out more money for. I will give this product 3 stars though for being decent enough to work, even after the punishing amount of abuse I tend to unleash on sport headphones and other Bluetooth devices. They seem to be constructed well for the low price. Whether they survive being drowned in my sweat after dozens of spin classes will be the true test.
Excelente
Very nice set of headphones, I highly reccomend them.

Love the sound and the high volume capability. The only negative I found was sound quality while using them for cell phone calls. There seems to always be an echo on the far end and distortion on the near end. I highly recommend for listening to music or movies.

if I would've payed full price for these earbuds I would have been not too happy sound quality is just OK

I recently received these headphones, and thus far I'm very pleased. The only reason I am giving two stars and not one is because these are the first pair of in ear headphones that I've been able to run with and not have to constantly mess with them to keep them in my ears. That being said, they are worthless to have on a run because the bluetooth tech is not nearly good enough. Using these headphones reminded me of the day when you'd run with a discman and the music would just constantly skip. You'd try to hold it in a way so that it wouldn't skip as much, then you're paying more attention to the device than the music, run, or anything else. My first attempts were with the apple watch and those results were by far the worst. I ended up just taking the headphones out because they were just distracting with the skipping. I thought, ok maybe it's the combination of the watch and the headphones that they just don't have a strong enough signal, so I tried running with my phone. That did improve a bit, but it was still not good enough to continue using. I'm just passed the window for returning or I would. If you are going to run with bluetooth headphones, don't buy these.

Great sound and quality

The phones themselves are compact and light, fitting comfortably and snugly (with small, medium and large ear buds) all waterproof, making them ideal for exercise use. The sound from such light and compact phones is excellent, with good ambient noise suppression. Overall I very pleased with the purchase and with the very reasonable price.

I got these so that I could leave them at work for days when I forget to bring my headphones to work. They are not super comfortable, the over the ear part causes pain in my ears at some point during a pretty regular 1hr workout. There are great for when I forget to bring my other, newer, senso ear buds.

I have had these headphones for a week now and they have exceeded my expectations.  I have a Lenovo business laptop running Windows 7, a 5 year old HP laptop running Windows 10, and a 4 year old Android phone running Android 4.4.2.  These headphones had no problem connecting to any of these old devices, and they sound better than any ear-bud headphones I've ever owned, including wired headphones.  I was also surprised they do block some external noise.  I don't remember reading anything saying they would, but they do.  I wear them for about five hours a day while working on my computer and they are very comfortable.  The battery lasts a little over a day, so between 6 and 8 hours of continuous use.  Not too bad for such a small package.  I recommend these to anyone looking for a good sounding pair of ear buds.

This is my second pair I have purchased of the same earbuds. I want to clarify something, I am not a crazy, gotta be a perfect pitch kind of guy, please understand that. My first purchase of these buds was in April of 2017 and I paid about 35 bucks. They lasted almost 2 1/2 years of constant use as well as abuse and whether I was at the gym with volume maxed out ( and they handled that) or relaxing watching a movie these buds did the job for me. My recently purchased 2nd pair work as well as the first set and only cost 20 bucks. If you are looking for a very inexpensive set of buds that deliver great sound, then these should work for you. Looking for say Bose quality, then no, but I am pretty hard on my buds and these hung in there with me for over 2 years originally. I went back to them and am not disappointed. I still haven't received my free gift as promised, so I wouldn't count on getting it if I were you

The tips really stay on which I like because for some reason I tend to lose these on all the other earbuds.  The wrap around the ear piece is flexible so you can bend into what position you feel is comfortable.  I've never had an issue with the other earbuds wrap around ear pieces even though they were hard but this is a nice feature.  And not something about the earbuds I appreciate the bonus card holder that sticks to your cellphone (handy for those of us that don't always want to carry a wallet as well as a phone).
Great sound, stays in the earhole. My biggest issue is the ear hooks...they feel flimsy. Make no mistake they stay put, but the feel is off putting.
Good head phones with good sound quality. Comes with plenty of charging cords, a very nice car charger, and a CASE, which most do not. Great buy for a great price.
The sound quality was much better than I expected since the price was so good.

I workout in front of a fan, and the wind noise in the headphones is bad. I can tell that it's is from physical wind, as opposed to electrical or radio noise because the noise stops when I cup my hands over my ears.  Otherwise great sound and fit.
Good wireless earbuds for the money. Sound is great but no noise canceling as stated. I use them at the gym and they stay in place and are comfortable. I would buy again.
Very impressed so far!
Headphones work great I will get a lot of use out of them.
over hyped. I didnt like the sound. Cracking/static noise if I listen to music at high volume.

Great sound for the price, no problems while doing constant moving like running and hitting the heavy bag. No complaints.
