They out performed my overpriced $110 monster.
I've logged over 60 miles using these. I sweat profusely and not have a problem with them falling out. The over the ear clip holds well. The lack of wire in it make wearing sunglasses comfortable. I've taken a few short calls during my runs and it was clear on both ends.
You get more than what you pay for.

I totally love these.  I opened the box, asked my iPod to connect, within seconds, I was jamming to amazing bass.  Next, I asked my iPhone to connect, tried Pandora, amazing.  Immediate bluetooth connection.  They fit in my ear (buds) and around my ear perfectly, couldn't be happier.  Perfect for workouts or anywhere.  I haven't tried phone calls yet, but have had one week and these are over the top.  The price is in line for quality received.  Come with a portable carrying case, car charger, extra ear bud pads and more.  Love, love, love.  Oh, and I got an email from the company president, Kenneth Bastrom to follow up on satisfaction.

When these first arrived I was initially quite happy with my purchase. The only problem initially was the audible low battery indicator gave me only a few minutes before shutting off the unit. Although the percentage of battery remaining was indicated on my phone via the Bluetooth function, it was always a mile off. I had to guess when it needed charging unless it was completely dead.

The stems that go over the ear (to hold it in place) are very flimsy. If bumped or squished they'll bend very easily. I cringed each time I re-bent them because I was always concerned the rigid wire inside would eventually break.

These flaws I could live with, but it wasn't long before the sound in one ear shut off. No doubt it's something in the connecting wire as it enters the earpiece. So pretty useless now unless I just want to listen in one ear. It didn't get heavy use. I suspect I got about 50 hours of use out of it.

Sound quality is okay. I usually listen to news or books, so quality isn't as important.

Pretty weak microphone. Even when I speak louder my usual voice on the phone, people still complain about not being able to hear me. Once I was asked if I had a wall between me and the phone.
Other than that, battery life is wonderful, synchronization time is flawless.
Comfort, once you get used to them, they're ok.
ONLY if they improve their microphones issue.
I am using them only in the gym but when I get a call, I have to turn them off so people can hear me. It's a bit hassle.
I would try something different next time.
I've only used the headphones ones so far but they seem to fit well, have great sound and easy to use and setup with blue tooth.  I'm very happy with this purchase and the price is a great value.
I was so impressed with tha quality and sound, I immediately purchased another set.  Absolutely amazing. Great product
Great sound quality and comfortable. Easy to pair and charge/recharge. Excellent product.

These were a Christmas gift for my son who originally asked for Beats wireless headphones. As everyone knows they are very expensive so I started doing some research. I came across this product and read many of the reviews. Since I don't use wireless earbuds I had no personal experience with any one company. Many of the reviewers had that experience and named several Brands I had heard of that were way more expensive and not as good as these. I decided to give it a go and purchased these. My son loves them. He uses them every day. He's taken them on long sports bus trips, gym workouts etc and they perform well. He just said it again last night--"I really like these wireless headphones. And they charge really fast too". My husband has a pair that are way more expensive than these and I think he's on his fourth pair (getting exchanges thank goodness) because they don't hold up. This is a great product. And a really really great product for the price! Will definitely purchase again!

I don't know if it's operator error but the sound frequently breaks up and crackles. I'm not satisfied with the product and have gone back to wearing my Mac earbuds. I wouldn't recommend this product.

Love these headphones but last weekend they stopped working. I emailed Senso and asked how to access the warranty to get a repair or replacement. They sent me info on how to reset the headphones in case it was a calibration issue and I followed instructions without success. I expected more of a hassle but they asked me for the order info and got information to send me a new pair. It isn't the exact pair, they were replaced with sports headphones, but they feel and sound the same. I love that it was a no hassle replacement. Top notch service really, in a world where that isn't seen often.

These earphones are a great value and deliver Good sound for the money.  I am also impressed by the inclusion of a long USB charging cable with a dual mini USB and apple connector port and a car charger.

I really liked these headphones. The sound quality was great for the price and they stayed in my ears for all my runs. I have tried charging it both from the computer and from the wall and neither will work.

It's disappointing because I thoroughly enjoyed these headphones, but they stopped working so quickly without any heavy wear and tear.

the treble isn't as crystal clear as what I get from the beats solo but it makes up for that in the volume and depth of the bass output. i love it because it drowns out the surrounding noise and makes me focus on my workout. i'm giving it a 5 star because the sound difference dissipated within minutes of listening to full track and getting used to it.

Buyer beware, these are NOT sweat proof and should not be used heavy exercise or running. This is my third pair and was initially attracted to the best seller rating and large amounts of reviews. They worked fine and fit better than most headphones I had tried for running during the winter months, but as soon as it started to warm up and I started sweating a bit more, I lost audio in one ear.

Giving them the benefit of the doubt, I ordered another pair and one for my dad as well. After not even a week of the new ones, the same issue happened. I returned that pair and received a new one. Well, around two weeks later I was out of a run, felt a drop of sweat running from my ear and the second it hit the earbud, I lost all audio. Now they are completely dead and I can no longer return them.

I suppose for everyday use these may be fine, but I heavily advise against using them for the gym / running. To advertise as the "Best Wireless Sports Earphones... IPX7 Waterproof... Sweatproof Earbuds" is disingenuous and wrong.

Great pair of nose cancelling bluetooth headphones.  Great feel,  sound and most of all a great price. Pairs easily and automatically to my bluetooth devices after the initial pairing. Highly recommend.  I use them when I do yard work and I am very pleased with them.

These headphones are not quality connecting at all. It is taking me 5 or 6 tries before they will connect to my phone, even after they've been paired. The overall quality of the headphones feels like cheap plastic that will soon fall apart; which is confusing because the actual quality of sound and noise cancelling is decent especially for the price. It doesn't help if I can't enjoy the music though.
Seriously considering returning them after only a day.

I gave these my best shot, kept them beyond the time to be able to return them (honestly die to covid) but I am decreasing my raing to only star. When they connect and actually hold, decent sound quality. That's all I will give these. Not recommended at all.

Was not expecting the quality of sound for the price I paid.  Because of the hype about Beats and other high priced Bluetooth earbuds, I expected what you pay for at a much lower price you get.  Boy was I ever wrong.  This product far exceeds my expectations if fact as I type this I'm listening to beautiful crisp Christmas music with I think has great base sounds.  They fit comfortable to my ear and I enjoy the lightweight of the earbuds.  Comes with three interchangeable ear buds.  I would highly recommend this product if your on the fence for buying someone a great gift for Christmas gift at a affordable price.

Great Ear set! Very fast charging, great sound, light and easy to use.
But just after a few months in the gym they stopped working and I dont know the reason. I guess maybe they are water proof, but not the sweat proof, after all...
sounds good, stays on ear while running, battery life is more than expected.  Good buy!
Good earphones quality sound

They're too bulky for my taste. They also cut out even when I'm close to my device. I use earbuds daily so I am rather picky. My last pair had a much better range, but they eventually died.  These just dont fit my needs.

I bought these because my other pair was started to only work if it was plugged in and so far i haven't have any serious issues with it. 2 things that i found out early on about these were, 1 The plastic parts supposed to keep it connected to your ear are either flimsy or to loose which defeats the purpose. The other is that though I couldn't hear outside noises while listening my other set also had great noise reduction outside the headphones so no one could hear, these on the other hand are a one way noise reduction streak, people can hear it outside of yourself.

The pluses are that the sound quality i believe is not only louder but better than my other ones. I haven't had them long enough to know if they'll keep up but hopefully they will.

Would i recommend this? Like i said it's a time based decision but for now i'd say if you need some and don't run marathons for them to possibly fall out then it's a good buy. Their Customer Service is almost instantaneous and there's a 1 year warranty so there's that. That's all I got for now, maybe i'll update this later, for now 4/5 rating.

I bought the first pair of these earbuds for my son, who is selective in what he uses, and he LOVES them! So I ordered a second pair for my daughter! She too is very happy with them. The earpiece is soft and flexible and keeps the ear buds in place nicely. My son says that they do a great job cancelling out other noise. For the price, they are amazing and rival more expensive brands. I highly recommend the SENSO Bluetooth headphones! I also recommend this seller, who was fast with delivery and everything was packaged well!

These are surprisingly much better than expected. Good sound and "noise cancellation".

These are by far the best headphones I have ever owned. They fit perfectly in my ears and drown out all noise. I even wore them cutting grass and could not hear the noise from the lawn mower.

I  purchased this April 2017. It is what I call "standard". It functioned for listening to music while working out and doing yard work; nothing too strenuous.  Unfortunately, they lasted about 6 months. They stopped working and would not take a charge. For the price, I expected a longer time of use. This is not an item I would purchase again; and have not.

For the price, these headphones are really good. They obviously go around your ears so they don’t fall out unless you start violently shaking your head so they’re good for gym use. My one issue with them is that they keep saying “battery low” and turning down your volume when they start to get low. I understand if they do it once or twice but they interrupt each song like 4-5 times and that’s pretty annoying. Get rid of that feature or just always keep your battery high and you’ll be all set.

These are a great buy. Reasonably priced and work great! I've struggled to find a pair that I'm not constantly readjusting or putting back in during my workouts, these stay in place even during the toughest runs and heaviest lift days. Plus the sound is fantastic!
The battery life is terrible. It has to be charged every 2 hours. If I ever buy any wireless again it won’t be Senso brand wireless.

These are terrible, the reception is awful. I run with my phone in a holster clipped to my waist no more than 2 feet from the headphones and the reception is still awful. My advice is to buy a better quality pair of headphones.
Received as promised with extras like dual port car adaptor included. Fits well and sounds great
Exceeded my expectations!!  Love it!  Easy to use, excellent sound quality, GREAT Value.  I have had other EarPods and these work the best.

Best sounding earbuds I have ever owned. Have had several wired and bluetooth sets. Sound ranges are clear and accurate. The buds fit my ears (small) with no noticeable discomfort. I do not have to stuff them way into my ears to get clear sound as with other sets. Great value for the price. The only problem I have thus far is I can see the indicator light reflection in my glasses at night. Still giving a 5 star. Thanks for a great product!

Incredibly impressed with these headphones.  So I've bought a few bluetooth headphones before but there was always something I did not like.  Either the sound quality was garbage or they did not last long, or actually fit my ears.  SENSO changed that and blew it out of the water completely.  Opening the box and seeing everything included, you can tell that the company takes pride in their brand.  There are plenty of instructions and the headphones are easy.  For the price, these are the best headphones I've ever used. I train hard in the gym and do quite a bit of cardio and I don't sweat, I rain.  These are truly sweat proof and stay in my ears and are super comfortable.  The sound quality is crystal clear compared to other bluetooth headphones I've had.  These are a seriously high quality product for the price and I would order these all over again.  Well done.
Headphones worked great until the charging port broke and stopped working.

These headphones are good quality however the design is poor. First of all they are fairly bulky. Primarily, the fit is uncomfortable as it starts to hurt my ear after awhile. I have owned a few other brands of headphones so I know how to fit them correctly. The plastic sits too close to the ear so it applies pressure and hurts after awhile. I tried to bring this to Senso's attention so they could have an opportunity to possibly improve their design but they instead blamed it on me stating that I do not know how to properly fit the headphones. I will keep them because they work, but I am not too impressed with the fit. I will say they have good battery life and sound quality. I have not had trouble with them breaking yet however I may have to wait another few months and see!
I love the way they fit.
Complete junk - worked for a few weeks, but battery doesn't last long at all and now won't work at all.  Price was really good, but now throwing  in garbage and looking at alternatives

I got these earbuds for my boyfriend to use at the gym because the music they play there isn't his favorite and like most people good music motivates him to work out harder and longer.  He loves these and is so happy he isn't dealing with the cord being ripped out of his phone and having to plug it back in.  The battery lasts a long time and once it runs out it charges up pretty quick, too.  Two satisfied customers here.
my wife and she finally found a set that works well for her. THANK GOD, cause I am fed up of buying and returning headphones. She uses them at the gym and work great, so does the mic.

These earbuds we're way more than I expected for the price. Excellent sound quality,easy pairing superb when in phone calls. I was so impressed with the set I bought for a friend I immediately ordered a set for myself.

Great product . For the price the sound quality is excellent . Connectivity can be a bit clunky  and can disconnect at time depending on your device but nothing out of the ordinary when it comes to Bluetooth . Functionality is great and easy , alongside with a decent battery life of 8 hours (for me that’s about 3 full workouts ) the issue was that it did not last long as it stopped turning on and charging . However the product gets 5 stars still because when it works it’s awesome but thanks to their super responsive customer service they’ll be sending me a replacement (within my 1 year warranty ) I will say this is due part of a faulty unit as most of the reviews here match my experience with it when it was working . Going through customer service was no hassle at all - all tthough very quick responding email . If you need a gear pair of workout headphones that won’t break your bank, grab these !
Love these headphones! Sound quality is great!

I bought these for both my husband, truck driver, and myself, I own a cleaning business and for both of us hands free is a necessity. Not bad but no what we were expecting.

Also, there is nothing negative I can say about these headphones.

I love this headphones. Unfortunately they stopped working within a month. I talked to someone in customer service and they are sending me a replacement. They replied pretty quick.

For the money, ($38 or so) I think it's a great deal.
I bought these for my boyfriend to workout with and he is beyond happy, and satisfied with this product!

These are the second pair of iPhone 7 compatible headphones I ordered from Amazon. I went with plug ins (CCTRO MFI certified lighting) first and they were awful!! Didn't work straight out the box! So they'll be getting a terrible review.. but these Senso's are really good.. the price was right and the battery life seems to go the distance.. haven't needed to use them for more then two hours at a time before I was able to charge (but according to the little bar I hadn't even used 20%) so for $35 or whatever they cost I'm happy.. the ear hooks should be removable.. if I had one complaint.. There a little big and if you're wearing sunglasses and a hat they kind of feel odd.  But you can adjust them yourself to make them comfy so... 4.5 stars.. but I've only had them a week so talk to me in a year lol.

I did replace the inner ear plug with the smaller one and that helped it stay in my ear. The clip that was supposed to shorted the cord fell off the first time I wore it. I originally gave these 4 stars, but after wearing these almost daily since arrival on January 14th, 2018- as of yesterday, January 24th, 2018-I started having Bluetooth connectivity and volume issues ( had to turn almost all the way up to get certain songs to play loud enough for me to hear). I have to say, the more I used these earphones, I did notice they just couldn't provide the level of bass I like hearing in songs. What's a major drag though, is that I really loved the fit of these earphones. The silicon outside covering was quite comfortable. Unfortunately, I am going to have to return these to buy a better pair that are hopefully just as comfortable.

After reading others reviews I decided to purchase these as an addition to my bluetooth head phones I use in the gym. Upon arrival these are packaged great and come with all the little items as described. Paring was easy with iPhone6.
Comfort of the over the ear hooks its super great, don't even notice there hooked on my ears. I changed out the ear buds for the larger ones that came with it to secure the bud in my ear canal better which also provided a better Sound/Base aspect to the music.

Sounds is great and clear and Bass is decent. Now these are not as high end sound as my gym noise cancellation over the ear head phones I use in the gym but these are darn Great! There is minimal outside sound I hear in the gym so that's a plus! Charge seems to last about 6 hours on a above average volume level for me.

For the cost of these I am super impressed as I've sent more and got less quality/charge/accessories on other brands.

If I had to pick a negative aspect of these I would say I should have ordered them sooner!!

UPDATE: After using these for a couple weeks they seemed to loosen on my left ear and continually fall out, meaning the ear bud comes out of my ear no matter which ear bud pad is on. I thought maybe my ear was bigger on one side than the other but what ever it is, these just do not work for me any longer after a couple weeks. So while the sound is great, quality is great and use is great, they are just not functional so I decreased my Star Rating.

These bluetooth headphones are fantastic. The sound quality is impressive for such inexpensive headphones. And it comes with a dual-port car charger, a short and a really short USB charging cable, and a nice case to store the headphones in. Great product!

Sound was very good. My reduction in stars comes from fit and connectivity. It did not fit well to my or my wife's ear. It's front edge sits hard to your ear so that after a short time it becomes irritating and also makes it not hold well in the ear. As I would get active I would have to keep pressing it back in no matter which fitting I tried. also the connection to my phone had a lot of drops even with full charge. I saw a helpful review here that said how to reset it which I did and it did help with connection. The problem began to resurface again though.
Follow up review I would say that it's not been a very good product. Constant loss of Bluetooth connection is irritating, resetting is not hard just frustrating to have to do all the time. Not for active users, more activity results in faster lost of connection and fit.
These headphones are great, the sound is awesome, very light weight and comfortable. These would make a excellent gift to give or treat yourself. They will not disappoint, enjoy.

The best I have had for working out.  This is the 7th set of Bluetooth headphones I've bought based on people's recommendations.  These are the only ones that keep battery life, sound good, and do not die from my sweat.  But these.  I'm buying another pair.

I've loved them every since and now over a year later, they are finally beginning to wear out after a ton of use including drops, being stepped on (repeatedly), tugged on by kids, tangled up, thrown around, drenched in sweat, ect. (and run over by a car once...)

The casing around the main button popped off fairly early in, but a little tape and it holds just fine. The inner circuits and cord are tough as nails though which easily makes up for it. Sound quality is decent for the size, and it works well for taking phone calls in noisy environments or if you just need to be hands free. I use them for a few hours sporadically throughout the day so I can go a couple of days before I have to charge them again which is nice. Definitely buying from Senso again.

These did not stay on or in my ears at all. I tried all the different size ear fittings, and no luck. I think it’s due to the ear hook being playable. It allows for them to slowly slide out of my ear. I have another pair that has the ear hook and it’s silacone, but not playable, and they work great.
My son plans on taking them to college with him. They come with a nice little protective case. I have had this brand before so I'm hoping they workout okay

These headphones have great sound and a very fair price. I will second what others have said about the negatives:the over the ear hooks don't do much to keep them in place for vigorous exercising. For jogging and weight lifting they fall out easily. When I am doing work around the house, taking the dog for a walk, etc they are great and don't fall out. Battery life seems to be about 4 hours for me before they beep every few seconds or keep saying "connected" every few minutes. The beeping for low battery is annoying as I can look at the light and see if it is red or blue. If you have eye glasses on at the same time as the headphones, you will get a flashing blue light reflecting of your right eyeglass lens every 5 seconds, which gets old.
Overall, for the price they are nice, but not awesome.

I had a pair of these that I used every day for almost two years and this pair replaces those which got misplaced. For the price, great earbuds.
The good: The sound is good, in call sound is a little harsh. They connect fast and easily every time. They hold a charge for a long time. They are loud and reduce outside noise ok with the well fitting earbuds.
The not so good "but I can live with it, probably": Wearing them is kind of like driving a first generation car that is now 4 or 5 generations old. They're blocky, chunky, and one side sags a bit. But, you own it free and clear so you drive it with pride. Or whatever. The weight of the earbud drags on the flat wire that connects them to each other, so if I have just one in, the other pulls down and prevents me from moving freely. The on/off/control button requires a good hard press that your ear and head will definitely notice. The ear loops are flexible and moldable. That's good for different shaped ears. it's not so good when they stretch out during active use.
If you are looking for good, reliable, cheap earbuds and don't mind the smell of stale french fries and a slightly worn driver's seat in order to get the retro-cool look and still have performance, you'll probably love these for what they are. If you are looking for a 2019 Tesla on a 1990 Prelude budget, they might still be ok. But if you just want the Tesla, get something else.

Product looks awesome. I am very happy so far.
Headphone do not alot of bass.
Headphones are very loud. So you will hear your tracks.

CONTEXT
I think we all know how crappy corded earphones are! Especially for me, because I go running with my dog, they get in my way and sometimes even tangled! I ended up seeing these on a Buzzfeed article and thought why not purchase them? The price was right, after all.

PROS
- These are very easy to use, just make sure you read the manual first, LOL.
- The sound quality on these is actually pretty amazing.
- Noise cancellation on these puppies is real! I can usually her cars approaching with different earbuds, but not these.
- Obviously, huge pro that they are cordless!
- They come with a handful of different ear bud thingies (LOL, not sure what it's called). This was a huge plus for me, because I could choose the ones that fit my ears best.
- The part that goes around the ear is adjustable!

CONS
- While the part going around your ear being adjustable is a pro, it is also a con in that my ears are probably on the smaller side since I am petite. Because of this, I don't get a good fit and they often fall off my ear. :( This is a huge con for me, since I am having to adjust them on runs and sometimes, they even fall off! Super annoying.

OVERALL
I do like these and think that they work great. However, for anyone who is petite and considering this, maybe look into a different set.
A friend turned me on to these headphones. I use them daily during my workouts and I also use them when shopping in the grocery store weekly. They charge quickly and they sound great.

If you have time read this review, I think it will help you decide to buy or not.  First,  I dislike earbuds and find them annoying because they never stayed in my ears. So after going through 3 sets of headphones in one year and damaging them due to sweat and having to clean the headphone pads to avoid them from stinking of dry sweat, I broke down and searched for a pair of earbud style with a clip around the ear to help keep them in place better.  Like most of us, I searched for them here on Amazon. There were three things I looked for:  one is the reviews, second is that it's fulfilled by Amazon ( so I have some backing if these things are bad ) and third is warranty period for them. Paying $125 to $200 was not what I wanted to spend on name brands that don't deliver and are hyped up for their name, that's just me !  I figured I take a chance on these earbuds for $34.00, and must say I was pleasantly surprised by their performance and quality so far.  The sound coming out of these earbuds is just incredible to me. At the gym, I have them paired with my iPhone 5S and at 50% they are loud as hell. I will probably never need to go higher than that . Connection with my iPhone was easy and no issues. The fact that they are sweatproof was a must for me. The 30 ft distance in my home worked fine through 2 walls to the other end of my home.  I made calls with them and the mic worked well.  I tested the running time of 8 hrs, and it was on point with what they said . The comfort wearing them to my ears was great and guess what they stay in place. The clip around the ear is a soft rubber or silicone material that surprisingly works to help keep the earbuds in my ear. Then you get other little gifts like hard carry case, dual car charger, a short charge cable and 3 foot charge cable that works for as a lightning cable and mirco usb cable..... Both will charge the earbuds.  Also you get two sets of ear tips small and large and the earbuds have a mid size on them already.  My Amazon friends things are mass produced and during production you will have like in any other product defective units that leave the factory, but remember you have a one year warranty and I'm sure that they will back it up or Amazon will.  All I can say is that after a full week I am very pleased with my purchase and guess what I did,  I bought a second pair....the gray ones....lol !  The only cons I have at the time of this review is that they charge you more for the gray ones, than the red ones, and the earbud pads are little in different in feel from the gray and red earbuds, but in no way is it a deal breaker.  At their price point and with what you get these are a very good deal, especially from a unknown brand.  I can only see with time how they do, but for now these earbuds rock.  I have a one year warranty on them so I'm not worried. Wish you all good luck.

These headphones are amazing!! I've tried several pairs of Bluetooth wireless headphones and they never stayed in my ears very well, but these were a perfect fit. It also comes with great accessories - a car charger, an adapter for the iPhone jack in addition to a regular charger. I feel like you can't do much better given the price point. I rarely leave Amazon reviews but felt compelled to given how much I love these. Amazing sound quality, excellent fit, totally reasonable price - can't ask for much more!

These are the third pair of wireless headphones I got (after returning the first two) and I absolutely love them. I'm a runner and have taken them on just a couple of runs so far (~10 miles), but they've stood up to sweat as well as to the constant motion. Things that I love about these:
1. Sound Quality - Bass, mids and heights all sound awesome. Who knew that I didn't have to give up quality sound on a run (at this price)?
2. They don't move around while running - an earlier pair that I returned had to be adjusted a lot
3. The wires do not stick to the back of my neck as I sweat - again, the other pair stuck to my neck and pulled on one earbud or the other. I had to put the wire to the front of my neck with that other pair to avoid this annoying feature.

If I were forced to mention a downside - they're a bit larger than I expected, but nevertheless still very light - so really I do NOT have a complaint about these headphones.
The Bluetooth keeps disconnecting when I run.

I use these for bike rides and work. When there is a lot of wind the signal can come and go but nothing serious.
They went thru the washer and dryer and came out unscathed. That earned them a 5 Star. I have had them for 4 months and still work.
The rubber insulation is pretty good. When they came out of the dryer they were missing the side piece. The water didn’t get in because they are covered inside as well with like a melted rubber cover. All the junctions are covered inside.
The sound quality is good. The connection is sometimes sketchy but nothing serious. I use an iPhone 8plus and I have issues with other electronics as well. So it could be either.
Over all a great product that I will be buying another.

So far im very impressed.  The sound is great,  comes with alot of accessories I wasnt expecting and so easy to connect to my smart watch.  Can't wait to use them at lunch tomorrow.
So far so good
One of the best earphones for the price. Awesome customer service.

They sound pretty good.  I bought these to wear to the gym, but I was not  crazy about the over-the-ear fit.  I passed them on to a friend who really likes them. The come with  a clever case, a charger, several bud covers and some other stuff.  Worth the price.

These were great. Even better than I expected. Unless it is super windy , the noise cancellation works well . Battery stays charged for a long time . Definitely get eight hours of use on every charge .

This is my second pair of these headphones.  I use them to listen to music at work.  For some reason, this pair is a lot louder at work using the lowest setting (I wish I could adjust the sound one notch lower, but there must be an issue with my worker computer) than at home using the web based GooglePlay to listen to music.  Nice sound.  Con: plugs will move a little out of place while jogging, but not big deal; you can bend the attachments but it still won't be snug on your ear for a long time while jogging.
Mediocre sound quality and also mediocre blue tooth connection. Would not buy again.
These things only lasted 7 mo.
Excellent headphones for there cost.  Works well with jogging although you will encounter some wind noise.

Was a bit sceptical when I ordered it. The build quality is good and the sound quality is good. It packs in quite a punch for its size. The bass might be slightly higher but I liked the quality so far. I wore it for a couple of hours and it is comfortable to wear. Overall I am very happy with my purchase

For the price these headphones are a steal. They deliver the quality, sound, and features as promised. I have had these for over a week and used them daily. As for fit they take a little bit to find exactly the best placement to put in your ear as is with most headphones of this type. The sound is very good and they do a great job with the noise cancellation aspect so that you can keep the sound level down on your music. I like this because you don't feel like you destroyed your ear drums once you stop using them. The battery life is great and when drained they charge quickly. So far I have found them very easy to use and have no issues with pairing them to my iPhone. They will work for a good distance from the phone allowing you to keep your phone off to the side somewhere safe with less chance of damage from a dropped weight while working out.

Please note that this review is based on using them for their intended purpose as workout equipment. If you are looking for the same comfort and sound quality as Bose you will be disappointed because you are looking at the wrong category of product. For a durable and easy to use headset that will suit you well in the rough sweaty world of a gym these are a great product.

I'm training for my first half marathon and purchased these for the training runs and workouts. I've been very pleased with the performance and how they stand up to sweat and long distance runs. We just got back from Florida and I used them to train in the humidity and they worked great. I love the price point and the quality.
I just got it 2 days back. Initial experience is great!

They are very nice. I can't keep them in my ears but I haven't found a pair yet that I can.
But the design is very nice.

The headphones were great!! I use them to run and they hold up very well. No issues yet and I’m very happy with what was included in the package, very well designed and product seems durable. Will purchase as a gift for relatives! Thanks!

This is or would have been a great product if I could have better volume adjustment capability.  These are LOUD!  I had the volume down to the lowest possible setting and even with volume control and limit set, it was just too loud.  I would have rated them higher than two stars as their packaging is great and so are the accessories but the main function of the item doesn't work correctly.  I guess I will just have to keep trying and see if there is another pair which may work better for those of us who love music but don't want to go deaf listening to it.
Working great...bought them once they didn't work.. i return them with no problem and order them again and work good

Really liked these until they suddenly died yesterday. Bought them 8 months ago. get moderate indoor use but nothing crazy. Very disappointed they didn't last longer. Would be reluctant to buy again given life of product
Never worked

Very good sound, good deep bass
Fits well in ears
No conection problems with iPhone
These headphones are great. The Bluetooth worked right away on multiple devices and are very comfortable.

The volume is excellent. Charge time is great. My only issue is the ear piece that goes over the ear is big. Although it is adjustable, with the right ear, my buds sometimes fall out. I have really small ears. Otherwise these are my second pair and I love this brand.
Great pair of headphones - light weight too!
Using these on my walks, I power walk 3-4 miles a day and so far the quality has been good!  Haven't had them very long so can't comment yet on how they hold up.
Amazing value for the price. The battery lasts for at least 8 hours. The sound is clear and the ear buds are very comfortable. I’m very happy with this purchase.

Tbh i got the same thing about a year ago but i broke it so i wanted another of the same kind bc i really liked it but then i got this package and it was nothing like b4. The sound quality was decent but the ear hooks and the connecting wires were made of completely different materials that was very uncomfortable. Dunno wat went wrong.
Easy to use with great quality

This is the second pair of Senso ActiveBuds I have ordered in the last 48 hours. The first set that arrived was a dud and would not even power on and after completing a factory reset, they would show they were fully charged, but there was no response when trying to activate the device. I reordered the headphones and Amazon delivered them THE SAME DAY!!

This second pair is wonderful!! I am very much enjoying the quality of sound and the comfort of their earpieces. Thank you for your product!!

I have to say these are pretty fantastic. Before purchasing, I always check reviews on Amazon as well as outside Amazon (what sold me was the NerdyTech article on them). So far I have had them for three days and have used them for activities of various intensities and have thoroughly enjoyed every second.
Potential buyers should be aware that, as with every wireless headphone, there is a maximum distance you can be from your device before there is signal failure. Even so these headphones do a wonderful job of fighting to connect when I walk too far away and the always connect when I'm back within range.

Great balance, rich bass, and comfortable to wear while jogging! I have been using these headphones while I jog for the last month. For those who love to workout and listen to music, I highly recommend using the softer "foamy" red earbuds as they do not chafe your ear. Great customer support as well. SENSO is doing it right!
Works and sounds good.

Sound quality is good. Much better than what I expected for $35. Pairing happened right away. Not sure the range but i keep my phone in my pocket or hand and they never cut out. They come with multiple ear adapter piece things(not sure what the term is :p). I had issues while jogging with them at first as they would fall out constantly. They come with a red ear plug feeling adapter that worked great for running once I used those. 6 miles and they didn't even budge. Those ones cancel outside noise really well so make sure to pay attention to your surroundings with those in. Headphones didn't feel uncomfortable at all after wearing them for a couple hours straight. The headphones themselves have a volume control as well as taking your devices set volume into account so they can get ridiculously loud. Definitely would recommend as a nice budget headphone.

Worked out with these today for the first time, and they were EXCELLENT. I didn't have to have my phone on me, they have about 20' radius. They didn't move, and the sound is great. I also used them for a Phone Call, and they worked great. Clear and they could hear me clear as well.

I purchased this product from a friends' recommendation and was surprised to find that it was sold out. I had to wait a few days before I was even able to purchase them, but I'm glad that I did! These headphones feel much more expensive than the price would have you believe. They are very comfortable to wear and are very loud. Honestly sometimes they seem TOO loud, but I am not used to in-ear buds. All in all I would recommend this product.

These headphones aren't great. They lose connection very easily. Whenever I was at the gym if I moved my arm in between the headphones and my phone, it would start skipping. Also, it took forever for Spotify/podcasts to connect to them, even though they said they were connected. Finally, they will no longer charge. I tried charging them over night at home, as well as in the car, but they say "battery low" whenever I turn them on. I bought these only 2 months ago. Would not recommend.
Product didn't arrive as described, with missing in-package components (the three foot charging cable was for a different device). For the $ the sounds is fine.
Very happy with these. Sound is good, very comfortable, and great price.

Works great! Good enough sound quality and good fit with the assortment of ear pieces included in the box.
It's nice to be detached from the iPhone for workouts, walks, yard work, etc. Bargain price and very good quality.
My son got these for Christmas and is very happy with these.
My husband loved these! We replaced a pair of beats with these and the are a far better quality. The sound is great and they are dependable.
These are great - much better than the jaybirds I had previously owned - great fit, great quality of sound, and delivery was very prompt - it exceeded my expectations!
I use these for listening to audiobooks at the gym or out walking and they are perfect. Simple to set up too. And I love the price.

Got them for my girlfriend and she seems to like them alright so far. She says others have been difficult to keep in her ears as she runs but reports that only one of these buds slides out every mile or so.

These are great! I have had them for a3 months and they hold p great! the battery last a good while. When it dies its annoying for that bus ride home but I just charge it (at work or home) and its great. Quick to recharge, and easy on the ears...no fear of falling off.
I have only had this product for three months and it has already stopped working.
Very impressed. Was about to spend my usual $100 for headphones, i thought the pricier the better but gave these a chance and wow.
Product stop working properly
Worked for about 2 weeks then stopped syncing to any device. Junk
Works great.  Paired easily with both devices I use it with. Sound quality is good.  Will be ordering these again if I ever need another pair.
bluetooth headphones that sound great and work while i'm across the house from the device it's synced with? All for the $36 i paid for them?!?! Psshhh, killer deal! So glad i bought these!
I like the fit and the sound is not bad, but the battery lasts only about a day.
Incredible sound,The ear piece is kinda big, I have had trouble with them fallng off my ears.  I still give them 5 stars because for the price they're the best available with true HD sound.

I bought these ear buds thinking they are not beats or fancy ones; but to my surprise they sound excellent and are easy to use love these ears buds I am glad I purchased them I use them every night for bed and when I cook I am happy
They are astonishing with their customer service . I really like their product.

My biggest problem with these is that they are FAR TOO LOUD. I've never used them on any setting above the absolute lowest, because even there they hurt my ears after just a few minutes. I've ended up wearing them with the actual ear buds outside my ear and to the side a little bit, which at least is made possible by the ear hooks. They're comfortable, and the buttons work well. I just wish there was any possible way to make them softer in volume.

Excellent heaphones for the price.
Although it could used a little more bass. But it is almost perfect for my taste.
One size ear does not fit all. The earpieces need to be adjustable. Was not a snug fit and was loose while running. Sound was ok but not much bass.
They are complicated to figure out how to put on. Only fell off my ear once, though.
Great product. As good if not better than more expensive models. Used them in the rain and no problems at all.
Great bluetooth earphones! The sound is very good. Connection to a device is simple. Got these on sale. If you like the freedom of bluetooth get these.
Excellent product.....I'm very happy with it.
It was well received
These really are GREAT.  Comfortable, loud, nice bass, and they come with a few car accessories and a nice carrying case for them.  Seriously, worth every penny.  I guarantee it!
When on a phone call - the other person couldn't hear my voice. Looks like the fact that the microphone is up by our ear - doesn't help.
Arrived on time. Work as promised.
Bad headphones, the connection is horrible, with three feet of distance it starts cutting off.
The life of the battery is as advertised!  A+

This was my first bluetooth headphone purchase. I was not especially thrilled. Sound was fine for the price, but they never seemed to stay in place. And the foam ear pieces came off far too easily. They did not re-connect to my phone as readily as another brand I bought last week.

And - the sound on one side partially went out after a bit more than a year. Disappointed.
You get what you pay for. Trash sound quality and the Bluetooth range is really small. Battery life is ok

Comfortable, good in ear fit alternativesx and good sound. I had some connecting issues with Android devices but then realized it was my horrible cheap smart watch app that was messing things up. I uninstalled the app and now all works like a charm. Highly recommend this headset.

After all the other glowing reviews, I guess had higher than average expectations for these.

They're not good.

They pair fine, battery is long-lasting enough.

But the sound...they are about on par with the earbuds you get handed at trade shows or on airlines. If you like music to sound good, don't buy these.

And the fit...earpieces strangely shaped and too heavy to be supported by your ear alone. Not to mention the over-ear hook is completely useless as it is too large to properly fit any normal ear. VERY uncomfortable unless you have HUGE ears.
These earbuds stay in place and the sound is great
I like em. They're surprisingly comparable to the Beats I paid 150 for a few years back. So far so good!!

Solid ear buds, I have had them a little over 2 weeks and use them mainly at the gym. They have a good sound with a decent amount of bass. The price was what really sold me on them, would recommend to a friend.
the sound quality isnt the best but for the money im happy
Amazing headphones at a great price.  I would absolutely buy these again.
Amazing sound! Even while running on main roads it is loud and clear. They do bobble a little, one ear tends to fall out more but my ears are small (even for the small headphone size).
These earbuds are awesome. They work perfectly and do not hurt my ears. The sound quality is excellent and the Bluetooth pairs easily.
Extremely light, comfortable in the ear, links quickly with my TV, and the voice notifications are great.  Workout headphones so the audio quality meets my requirements.

I am an endurance athlete, tough on products.  I was pleasantly surprised at value for the money.  Great packaging, accessories, and sound quality is excellent.  I have yet to run//train with them, but hopefully will have positive results.  Very comfortable.
Shipping was quick and I love my headphones. Easy to use and sound is awesome

I purchased these back on October 2017.  I use them almost everyday for work and working out.  I thought of buying the more expensive ones only because I wanted something that would take the work I do and that I wanted comfort, long battery life and good sound. At the price, these are awesome. These do a wonderful job and have taken a lick’in in all kinds of weather.  When I’m listening to music I enjoy a nice base and hou’ll Be very impressed especially if you use the noise cancelling foam covers. If your wondering about their customer service, that’s another story in its self.  I lost one of my earbuds and so I thought I’d send an email to see how I would get new ones.  Within an hour I got a response and they’ve confirmed my order and are sending me new bud covers.  I am in sales everyday and this was over the top.  I thought I only did stuff like that.  I am very pleased with the product and the customer service.  I’m not knocking the big guys but I can tell you they would have probably not gone to the extent that Senso customer service did.
It was too big for ears, so wouldn't sit properl. Unfortunately had to return it. But I liked how it looked, shipping, cost, and customer service.

I've had these headphones around two months now and they sound phenomenal. The noise cancellation is incredible, battery life is around eight hours exactly. I recently had the headphones start to fail to sync with my devices, and after a short back and forth with a customer service representative they shipped me a new pair free of charge. It's incredible that they can sell such a great product for such a reasonable price, and still include a one year replacement warranty.

Excellent head set.  Bass could use some boost but this is standard for this type of device.  Treble and mids are excellent. The packaging includes multiple earbuds sizes and charging cable.  5 stars for excellent performance and great value.
I love them.  Happy they are water proof,  so they are great when working out.
Work great so far!  Ran with them and they are comfortable and love that there are no wires.
Very nice and performs as advertised... Charging and pairing was easy... Sounds great and very comfortable...  Pleased!
Great product. I have heard a bit of echoing on occasions, but for the most part,  great sound quality and range.

Really disappointed by this earphones. I purchased them to use when I am running. At first the sound seemed to be fine. The earphones were a bit uncomfortable and were falling out all the time but I thought that I will get used to them. It's been a month and a half since I bought them. Now, besides that they still feel uncomfortable, the sound started to be really bad and it hurts my ears to listen to that extra noise. There is some weird noise on the background of any song and I cannot even turn the sound louder because it gets so bad that it is unbearable. I wish the problem started earlier when I could still return them. Otherwise, it is too expensive earphones  for one month of usage only.

My expectation was high because of the customers review and the rating. But I found
this item as ordinary as it could ever possibly be. I used to have a better sound quality headphone
for half the price. To compensate for the low quality, they will give you a few dollars worth of chargers
and cables and wrap everything together in a nice package. No, I want primarily a quality sound - all other things are secondary.

Good quality and well put together. A bit tinny compared to wired headphones and the bass, if the volume is too high, tends to get fuzzy on the heavier bass lines. Otherwise it's pretty satisfactory for the cost.

My review on March 21: Sensor headphones deliver clear sound and are easy to use.  They are more than adequate for receiving and making phone calls.  I rate them a three because at their lowest setting the volume is way too loud.  I've adjusted my Samsung 7Edge volume and tuning and it is still way too loud.  UPDATE:  Senso Customer Service reached out to me and provided assistance to reset my headset.  The volume issue is resolved.  I am impressed with the quality, affordability of the headset and the excellent customer service.

Good headphones/ lasted little over 2 years. I used it mainly during workout. Now the wire started to break and internal wire is exposed and only one side works. Nothing lasts forever but for the price this is as good as it gets.
It is good item and the customer service is perfect.
They work great, easy to use & I love them when I workout at the gym!
They do not stay on my ears-I do not see how they can be called sports head phones- the plastic ear loops are worthless and do not keep the earbuds on my ear even on a gentle walk.
the best earphone i ever  had, and got it  for this incredible price.
Thanks
Nice product holds a charge very nicely. I wish they were more comfortable.

They work very good have a great battery life, I use them on and off throughout my work day and they have not died on me during the day. My only downside is they don't have very rich bass, but hey for the price these are some great little headphones.  I have worn them to the gym a couple times and no issues with my excessive sweating these guys just kept pumping out sound.
Fits snug, comfortable and clear!
Bought two pair and we love them.  Very comfortable and great sound.
Great sound. Easy to use!
Such an amazing headphones. The price is amazing, best headphones ever.
Wife and I love ours.  Connect up great and very good sound.
I absolutely love these headphones. These are the best headphones I've owned. The sound is excellent, they are extremely comfortable, and the noise cancellation is perfect.

I ordered this after seeing lots of good reviews. Sadly for me, the headphones arrived with one of the silicon bud malformed. Since I need the headphones for my gym I decided to keep it. However it was a wrong decision. The headphones died after about 2 week usage. They no longer charge.
Really good deal!
I Use the at work and at the Gym they  Work Great, Sound is always Crystal Clear and you can walk a good 50 ft or so away from your source device before it starts breaking up.

I was in a double mind to go with Poerbeats3 or Senso...149$ vs 36$... My friend bought power beast and I gone for Senso.. Seriously telling there is no difference at all.. Senso is very good and perfect fitting. If you are a brand freak and huge bank balace then go with other bands.

Senso is simply Awesome and fits in perfect.

I BOUGHT 2 SETS OF THE EARPHONES...  1 FOR ME & 1 FOR MY ADULT SON. HE USED THEM ON A TRIP AND JUST TOLD ME HE IS VERY HAPPY WITH THEM. I HAVEN'T TRIED THEM YET BC I WAS WAITING FOR HIS OPINION FIRST..
Great audio, battery life, and charge time

Headphones are comfortable and easy to use. I have to say I don't really care about sound quality cuz I just use them while I workout normally and I'm focused on other things than the music. However the sound quality on the headphones is outstanding. When I first turned them on I was actually blown away by how they sound. Great product for a good price!
Afree thing ok
Headphones are garbage, stopped working completely after 2 months. Won't turn on or charge at all.
I loved these but sadly they stoped working after a few weeks very disappointed 😔

The headphones alone are worth the price...and then some. High-quality sound and the controls are easily accessible. Add to that the accessories and carrying case, and it's a great deal all around. Highly recommended!

These were a gift for my mother and she loves them. Super easy instructions and the clarity is great. She says the fit is nice and they are secure. Bought them a few days ago but seem to be working extremely well.
The headphones are fabulous a great buy for the money
Great product to workout and comfortable to wear
I love them!! I'm impressed by the sound quality and fit!!!!

I had to write another review these are the Goats!! Battery life is okay just charge daily I use them for work so I have them on for 8 hours a day. However; these things are the toughest I've ever had, I accidentally (I don't recommend) washed them left them in my pants pocket and dried them and they still work and nothing seems to have been malfunctioning and it still hold a charge. I highly recommend owning a. Pair of these.
Good product.  Had no problem. Similar to brand name headphones.
None
Very nice bluetooth earbuds. Work great at the gym, nice sound reproduction, excellent battery life, and very reasonable price for what you get. Would purchase again.

I’m so over the Beats by Dre wireless headphones because the ear piece breaks every time. I sent them back to Apple & they broke a month later in the same spot but on a different ear. This has also happened to my friends. I bought these Senso pair about 3 months ago & there just as good as the Beats but they only cost $29. Why waste money on Beats when you save money.
I like the Bluetooth headphones and will be purchasing another pair for my mother.

"ActivBuds feature ergonomically designed flexible ear hooks with gel flex silicone earbuds to ensure your headphones stay comfortably firm in place to guarantee fatigue free ears and tangle free comfort." This statement is really true!  I wear glasses, and I can still have this pair of earbuds on my ears for hours and not feeling any discomfort.  They just stay on my ears perfectly.  I don't have to readjust their position when I walk or run - they just stay where they are.  The voice quality is crystal clear.  they are easy to hook up with other bluetooth devices.  I really love this pair of bluetooth earbuds.

I have had these headphones for a little more then a month now and they are great. I mainly use them for the gym. They are definitely sweat resistant and the battery is long enough to last me 3 trips to the gym without needing a charge. These are my first Bluetooth headphones I have bought and I am very happy with my purchase. I would highly recommend these headphones.
I really like these.  Easy to pair on bluetooth, very good sound quality.  A charge lasts several hours.
Exactly what I was after.....I use these when on the riding mower.......great product!

I tried two other types of bluetooth headsets for running and had problems with them falling out of my ears.  This set stays put.  The sound is pretty good not great but I listen to podcasts so no biggie.  I use these with my TomTom Runner with music.
Great sound and stay on while jogging
I bought these when another pair from a different company fell apart. I'm very happy with the quality of the sound and the build. They feel substantial and sturdy. I'm very happy with them.

I love these head phones. I use them every day. I wish the cord was a little longer because my neck rubs on it an since it's rubber it pulls the headphones. I just wear the cord in front and it's fine. It's loud enough to hear when I mow. I think the battery last a long time. I probably listen to them an hour a day and only have to charge it once a week. It starts to beep when the battery is about to die. You don't have very long after that before it's dead. I also use it to talk on the phone. I didn't purchase if for that reason but it's a great bonus. Another thing I like is that you can pause your audio on your phone by just clicking the button on the ear piece.

You can actually work out in these things! No more worrying about them slipping off, or putting up with uncomfortable extra parts and unnecessary wires. Now if only they could eliminate the wire between the two sides...
Very happy with the sound quality.
Very comfortable with fairly wide range sound. Smart to have all controls at earpiece instead on the wire.

The headphones do what I want them to do. They stay in my ears while exercising, stay connected to my phone via bluetooth without losing connection or making weird noises, and they have decent noise cancellation. The sound quality isn't as good as default apple headphones, but that's to be expected from headphones this cheap. I'm really annoyed by the really loud "paused" and "power low" notifications, but it can be avoided. I've been using them for 4 months and they haven't broken or stopped working at all, which is a good sign.

The headphones seem to work well and it comes with a lot of accessories which is great.  The only downside I've noticed so far is that the hooks are rather big.  They don't sit on my ears the way they should and I think they will come off when running. I just got them so I haven't really been able to try them with a variety of different exercises.

Sound quality is good. It is a little awkward with my glasses, but after a few adjustments it is fine.
1/21/20 update, the headphones will no longer charge. Some cords work sometimes, others not at all, although the cords work with other devices. The headphones aren't a year old yet.
Very impressed and happy with overall quality
Love these ear buds. Easy to use and the sound is great. Especially the bass tones

I can't believe there are this many favorable reviews for these headphones. The fact is, a lot of people are going to buy these for working out, and the main flaw is the over-the-ear piece, it is simply too flimsy to hold in your ear. They absolutely cannot withstand any pounding or impact whatsoever without falling out of your ear. Sound quality is ok, battery life is a few hours at most. Pretty lame that these garbage headphones are labeled "Amazons Choice".
Very good. Easy to use and very good sound quality.  Long battery life.

Headphones arrived quickly and pairing them was a snap.  So far, I've had relatively good luck with them.  I wish the range were a big more - audio starts breaking up at what seems to me to be a short distance.  But they are very comfortable and the sound quality is excellent.

after two weeks using it broke!
No good!!

Item is great, price point is amazing! My only issue with these is that even just walking the dog when the wind blows causes wind noise. The different ear buds don't appear to be able to fix this issue. Newer versions of the product will need to find ear connectors that conform better to stop the wind noice. I have some BOSE wired ones and the ear buds are perfect and no wind noice is made even in high winds. Other than that, this item is perfect on all other fronts. Buy it and you will not be disappointed!

The product is great and an excellent price.  Customer service is fast to respond when contacted.  I was so impressed I bought a pair for the whole family as other head phone I have bought would not stay in my ears.  I highly recommend SenSo.

So far so good.  Fairly comfortable, decent sound.  A little bulky, but they work well.  They don't fit or sound as good as the Plantronics Backbeat Fit headphone I had (and lost -- grrr) but they were a darn sight cheaper.  They sound better and fit a lot better than the Jaybird X2, which were constantly falling out of my ear.  I needed a good pair for the gym, these do the job and at good value.
Great battery life, sound quality. And a great price !!
They Help if u Have a job requiring Both Hands 🤲🏾
Ear pieces come out when sweating after 20 min of running. Had to constantly push right ear piece back in during run. Do not stay in well!!

I've only been using these for 15 minutes, but... wow. These are my first wireless headphones. I had heard can achieve superior performance because they can have their own drivers and amplifiers and circumvent the impedance of the long cable, but I didn't expect this much of a difference! Before these, I had been using the [[ASIN:B00JPK9T1W Klipsch R6i In-Ear Headphones]]. The R6i was my third time buying Klipsch, whose headphones were consistently rated best performance for the money on CNET. The R6i were notable for their very good bass, but these SENSO headphones blow them out of the water [not that the R6i would have survived in water, of course ;) ].

As was mentioned, the volume is very good. In a quiet environment, I don't need to go higher than the lowest level. I'm no audiophile, but as someone who appreciates higher sound quality enough to have tried several < $50 headphones to replace Apple's generic ones, I can say the average person will see a VERY noticeable difference.

Naturally, I haven't had time to evaluate the durability or battery life, but I will make an update if they are any different than advertised.
Bought for my son and he absolutely loves them!
Great sound compared to the Power Beats 2. Great Price and great for use at the gym.

I’ve only had these for a week but they are awesome. I love how comfortable they feel (I have walked around in them and cleaned house in them and have they had felt very secure). The sound quality is great. I have also
Used them several times for conference calls and had zero issues. I have never tried a very expensive pair of ear buds but my coworker just spent a ton of money on some beats wireless ear buds and I think these look just as great if not better due to the price point. I like the case that comes along as well as the charging cords and car charger. I would HIGHLY recommend purchasing these before dropping a ton of cash on the expensive brands. Overall great shopping experience!!!
Very lightweight, comfortable to wear. Great sound!!!
Its plastic  started to peel off within 1 month of light use maybe 2 times week . Also the bass not that good . $15 Panasonic earphones sounds better.
Sound great worth the money!
I'm happy with these headphones: good sound, ease to use, light, really a pleasant experience.
Awesome!!! Reliable, waterproof, comfortable, and great sound!!!! Exactly what I needed for the gym!!!!

Thank you!
The headphones are great. In fact they sound just like beats... But for a mooooore reasonable price! I love it. And it came with an iPhone charger, which is really cool! Thank you again! Really awesome product!

Worked ok for about 1 year and a month, then the on/off button stopped functioning.  Customer service said they would replace under warranty but then would not budge with it being a month over the 1 year warranty.  Went elsewhere for a replacement

Needed a set of Bluetooth headphones for work. I was beyond frustrated using the wired headphones which came with my Galaxy S8 due to the wire constantly getting caught in anything and everything; thus yanking the ear buds out of my ear(s).

Let me say I am more than satisfied with my purchase. These earphones perform ALOT better than I had initially expected. The sound quality, clarity and bass level are perfect. The pairing process was simple as every, there are several options for earbus sizes, a nice storage case a charger and other items. The earhook sits comfortable around my ear, the hook material is soft and flexible. Due to being so light and comfortable, one can't tell a set of headphones are on. The noise cancelling is pretty good as well.

Prior to my purchase, I scrolled past many, literally several other Bluetooth headsets reading through all the customer reviews and obviously I decided to go with this set. So happy with the choice I made.

- Bluetooth works well and connects quickly
- very good sound and volume
- fit is fine

Very bassy. It’s distracting for listening not during activities. The button on the side turns them on and when double tapped it dials the last number. That’s a little annoying. Call quality is great though. They stay in place quite well. The wire is a little sticky and can start to pull a little. The over ear arms are bendable and really help dial in the fit.

I read that the part that goes over your ear is a bit lose (there isn't a wire that makes it able to bend to the shape of your ear), so I was worried they wouldn't stay on my ears securely and would fall out while I jog, which is the problem I have with most headphones. I worried needlessly - I've jogged 4 miles a day for the past 3 days, and these were great! The sound is good, the buttons work, they stay on. Thumbs up.

they don't stay in my ears good. I've tried all the different covers...the foam ones do the best for me. The battery life is good however there is no warning of when its getting ready to die. The sound is great.

Not terrible but the signal does cut out every now and then until they get restarted and reconnected via the Bluetooth. One of the parts that goes in your ear broke off on mine and I had to super glue it back on, although it didn't seem to effect the sound at all.

Purchased for child in HS and one in college.  Consensus is that these are great value--decent sound fidelity and versatile.  Easy to connect.  Definitely recommended.  The star system is troublesome--they aren't Bose but they are quite good--reason for four stars.

Sound quality is very nice for wireless headphones at this price. They feel very well made and the battery lasts for the full 8 hours claimed.

**Editing this review because they seem to have changed manufacturers and the quality isn't as good on the new ones. One ear bud is louder than the other and the passive noise cancelling doesnt work as well. They also changed the design of the ear hooks and they're not nearly as comfortable as my old ones.
They having amazing bass compared to the other similar Bluetooth headphones you find online.

I could not walk or go to the gym with these earbuds. Sound was constantly dropping out, so if I wanted to listen to a book or podcast I was missing about 1/4 of the conversation. Would not recommend.
The headphones have been working wonderfully for the last 2 years, but they just would not turn on now.
Thanks

My observations after months of use
(1) Connectivity problems...takes 30+ seconds to establish a connection to my Iphone 6 and now Iphone 7.
(2) Low Bass - could use a little more bass in feature versions
(3) Range is inadequate; living in a 3 story home ... and cannot connect when I'm in the basement and the phone is on the 2nd level.
(4) Goes off and comes on randomly; this wasn't the case for the first month of use.

Overall, good product per the price, however, a little improvement will do to correct the problems listed above.

These earbuds are great, especially for when I am running. No need to worry about wires getting in the way. Love the sound quality and design. The noise cancelling works great saves on battery power, which was also great. Did not have any trouble with pairing.

Waited with anticipation for my SENSO Bluetooth Headphones based on the positive reviews but was sadly disappointed with the inferior sound quality. I first used the headphones to complete a technical support call with my cell phone carrier but head an annoying echo after talking. After completing this task, I tried the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones with my iPhone 7 Plus for music but found the sound quality varied with different types of music. For vocals and orchestral music, the sound quality was fair (about a 6 out of 10) but with classic rock and roll, the bass was really distorted. I tried adjusting the iPhones equalizer and nothing really improved the sound quality dramatically compared to other headphones I have used. In hindsight, you get what you pay for and I wished I had spent these funds toward higher quality headphones such as the Bose SoundSport Pulse Headphones ($149) because I had hoped that the SENSO Bluetooth headphones would be almost as good as Bose for 25% of the cost.

Amazing sound, great battery life and the customizable fit / ear buds were perfect! Right out of the box, which comes with a few extra little cool items including a nice carrying case, I powered these up and mowed my lawn. They stayed perfectly in place even with the sweat and I couldn't even hear the noise of the mower. The sounds are crisp, clean and not overpowering.
Love them accept that they don't vibrate to notify of an incoming call.
Fantastic! Battery lasts for almost 9 hours! Very Descent Sound Quality for the price!
They made it 1 year and 2 months and then just died. Waste of money

Pros:
- Price is right(ish)
- They stay in my ear very well
- Mildly noise cancelling (better than I expected)

Cons:
- Noise cancellation goes right out the window if it's windy (as is the case with most headphones)
- The buttons are right on the side attached to the earpiece (as opposed to on the wire) so it is a little awkward to change volume/go to next song without moving the earpiece uncomfortably in your ear.
- The sound quality is a little worse than I was expecting. I have a pair of $15.00 earbuds which have slightly better quality, and an $8.00 pair with slightly worse quality.

Overall I'd recommend these headphones if you are prioritizing headphones which stay in your ear during a run or eliminate noise at the gym, but I would NOT recommend them if you are into super clear sound quality or you like to skip songs often during a run.
works like majic
Sound was not as rich and deep as I had hoped, but the earbuds are comfortable and do stay in your ears. Headphones are also easy to use, and the carrying case is perfect.

These are pretty nice.  They are comfortable, sound good, and are easy to use.  I haven't tried them on a full fledged run yet, but I ran around my house with them on and they were comfy and didn't pop out.
Excellent headphones. This is my second repeat purchase. Bought them as a gift both times and were really appreciated

Love them - lightweight and very comfy in ears. Lost them and ordering exact ones again - happy with purchase.

Good bass and adequate mid/highs. Signal strength as advertised. All for a budget price.... Whi can ask for more?

These are the best earbuds I have ever had. I am hard of hearing and have tested a lot of brands and models that can play loud and clear enough for me. These are the best by far! I highly recommend them even over the expensive brands such as Beats which are far to heavy on the bass and not loud enough for me.
I had the AXGIO verson of these headphone, until I lost them. Still good equipment, same lady's voice in my ear. Easy connection, good sound.

These are great. I've gone through 2 pairs now, my first pair lasting me a year of frequent use. I use these 8+ hours a day while cleaning pools. The battery does indeed last 8 whole hours of continuous use. They've gotten wet and even be dipped into water and continue to work. The material they are made out of is soft enough to not hurt my ears with constant use. I really can't say enough good about these. Buy them!!!

Senso includes a carrying case, extra ear pieces and charging cable (which I love - dual platform is nice) making this a winner.

I bought these for my wife so that she could move around wirelessly as she works and excercises.  She loves these headphones as they have a crisp and clear sound without sacrificing the bass. Have been using these for about a week now and really like them. These are my first pair of wireless headphones so I don't have much to compare to but comparing them to standard wired headphones, they're awesome. It's SO much nicer not having to deal with the wire hanging between which bounces around annoyingly when jogging so you have to hold it or tugs and gets ripped out sometimes when lifting. Loving not having to deal with that at all anymore.

I like how these came in a hardshell case with several different ear bud piece sizes and car port charger. The button functionality on the ear piece to modify volume, answer/end calls, pause music and etc. seems nice though haven't used it much.

The only dislikes I've experienced so far is the wire between the ear pieces that goes behind the head seems like it could be shorter. It's good, though, that they provide a little thing that you can feed the wires through to tighten it on the back of the head. The first time I wore these jogging I wasn't wearing glasses and the right ear piece kept popping loose so ended up just taking it out and only using the left one. The other times I've been wearing glasses which helps anchor the pieces. Not holding much weight to this criticism right now given I'm not sure if I just didn't properly input that ear bud that time or what, but just wanted to be transparent with my views.
I am loving this thing. Its amazing.

These are exactly what you order. They're a good quality and sound. I use them in the gym and have no problems with them falling out. This is my third pair I have purchased. Highly recommend as something for the gym or any activity where they may get messed up. Plus there is a lifetime guarantee.

Bought the headsets in August of 2016.  They failed in March of 2017.  Who saves all the packing stuff when you have your item on hand?  Email Amazon, they provided the Customer Service 800 #. Normally I just read reviews good and bad both then decide on purchasing. Quick and to point review. Very impressed with these ear buds. First impressions. I have waited a few months to write this review to see how these puppies hold up. My impressions are overwhelmingly positive. These are the best cheap headphones I've been able to find.

Pros:
-Comfortable, adjustable fit that actually STAYS in your ears unlike a lot of other earbuds I've tried.
-Fantastic bass and decent sound isolation. They're not "noise canceling" but they definitely get the job done if you're trying to ignore your mom when she's telling you to do chores.
-Actually waterproof. I wouldn't recommend it, but I wore these in the shower a few time and they were totally un-phased. Which means they'll definitely be great for a run on a rainy day...once I decide to start exercising.
Solid design - the large central button is easy to find and push even when wearing gloves, allowing you to pause, play, or answer phone calls with ease. Volume buttons are well placed and easy to access.

Cons:
Though it has excellent bass, the hi frequencies are only so-so. But...you know...twenty bucks.
Questionable microphone: Sometimes people on the other end would have great difficulty hearing me even though I hadn't physically changed positions. I'm not sure if this is something that could be improved on my end so I ain't mad.

I have bought this product in the past but needed a new one because it finally died on me. I abused it and It worked great!! Battery life is terrific. Sound quality is excellent. Can’t beat the price either.

Worked great at the beginning but around 1-2months later, theres trouble with the connectivity for my LG V30 and my laptop. Not sure why but I guess you get what you pay for..
