These headphones pair easily, have a reliable Bluetooth connection, and great sound quality. Battery life has never disappointed. I am very pleased with this purchase
Love love love these! For the price these have an awesome sound and great quality. Couldn't be happier.
These headphones are amazing. Best wireless headphone ive ever owned.

The sound quality is solid, but a huge draw back is the adjustable hooks. Every time you take off the earbuds you have to readjust them the next time they go on. Seems little, but the amount of times you take out one for a second and have to waste time putting adjusting them back in place is crazy

Really good fit with the out-of-the-box silicone earbuds. They're comfortable and they don't fall out of my ears when running outside or when using the elliptical trainer, NordicTrack, rowing machine or treadmill in the gym. Easy to pair with my tablet and phone. Sound is a little too heavy on the bass for my taste, but I use these headphones to listen to recorded TV and lectures, so it's no big deal.
Earbud broke off while in my pocket.  The wiring that holds the earbuds to your ears is finicky and requires frequent adjustment.
Great product.

First pair I got as a gift where great, the second pair I purchased seemed to be built a little cheaper. The only reason I had to buy a replacement was because I lost the original pair. The new pair I bought broke only after a few months. Really disappointed.
Easy to use and the sound is great. I am very happy with this product and also the "extras" that were included in the box.
Nice headphones, high sound quality, good fit, good price and easy to use.

I use these headphones to work out. I have zero issues connecting (unlike some I've had in the past). The sound is actually quite good -- once you get them on correctly (and that wasn't super easy to figure out for me -- I suppose some people it would be no problem.). It's not noise cancelling, but I am amazed at how much it does cancel, and still keep me aware of what's going on around me during workouts. They are not the ones  want for really getting into my music, but they are perfect for working out.
This is my first set of wireless headphones and think I hit a grand slam; love me headset and makes my workouts so much more enjoyable!
Good
You get a lot for a great price. Sound is good. Blue tooth reception is ok. Phone in my pocket it's choppy but if I hold it, solid connection.
Excelent sound. Great quality
I liked the package it was very well packaged, and it looks like a higher quality headphone
This earbud will not hold in ear, despite changing earbud cover to small, it still won't stay. I suspect there is faulty design that prevents it from having a tight fit in external ear.

I love my SENSO Bluetooth headphones they are exactly what I was hoping for, they were super easy to connect via Bluetooth to my phone, the sound quality is great and loud, and the ear buds are comfortable. Glad I made the decision to purchase these.
Love the product! Has great sound and I got it extremely fast! Awesome!!

👍👍👍👍👍..as of now I don't see any issues of senso. It is very convenient to used.

Thank you..

Disappointing headphones. Cannot hold a charge. Light stays on all the time when not charging as well, so battery drains when not in use and disconnected. Would recommend trying something else.

EDIT: Customer service sent me a replacement pair of headphones, so service is excellent. But will evaluate the second pair and see how this one fares.

EDIT 2: Second pair didn't last long either. Not real rugged. They just don't last.

These work great. I did have an issue with them but after contacting the seller, i was given a fix to try and it worked.

Fast shipping, item as promised and top notch customer service.

I will be a repeat customer.

Just barely got these earbuds so I cannot vouch for warranty, battery life, or durability yet. However, I just had to write a review for probably the most important quality for earphones -- sound quality. Once I got these buds paired with my phone and started up my Spotify account, I was blown away. At about 1/3 volume, these headphones were crystal clear. At 1/2 volume, they were definitely loud enough. And the bass, WOW. I will consider adding to this review after I have used them for a longer period of time and will update the review to take into consideration the durability and battery life, but I am certainly satisfied today with this purchase. Lots of extras and great sound.

Time will tell if this was a good buy.

This is my 1st week with the product.  I have taken them on (4) 5mile runs, used them for 6 consecutive hours of yard work,  and have sweated on the like Niagara falls. So far they have not failed me.the ear hook does seem a little flimsy, but other then than no issues.

Great sound quality and comfort.
Only complaint is that the mic is positioned in a way that it's not really useful. The other party can not really hear my voice clearly or loudly enough.

This is the first Amazon review I’ve written but I felt compelled to warn people to stay away. I bought these headphones because I just wanted something to use for an hour a day when I work out. Evidently that’s a hard sell. When you start to sweat, the sound cuts in and out. After 6 months, they totally died. I was still under warranty, so they sent me a new pair. Those ones died shortly after too. Such a disappointment and these 5 star reviews are very deceiving. With two failed pairs in a year, I just can’t see how they are accurate.

Unhappy with this product I bought. Headphones worked great when I first received them. Then stopped working after 2 months. Unhappy with amazon allowing this seller to sell products that don’t work. Would not recommend.

Super great sound quality sucky reception if I have it in my back pocket it stutters and pauses every 20 seconds even less but if the phones in front of me on my chest Flawless amazing so unless you're putting it in an armband not worth it don't buy it but it's good if you've got nothing like today I forgot my speaker and I found these in the bottom of my glove box so it's better than nothing and you can't argue the price

These ear buds are a pleasant surprise! Easy to use, great case and the sound is excellent. Being a Bose snob these buds are fantastic for working out. Especially if you sweat like me. The left bud keeps wanting to slide out of my ear. That’s why I didn’t rate them 5 star. Still I’m impressed!
Sound is great and can get very loud. Very easy to use and good at noise cancelling as well. Stays charged very well.
Great wireless Bluetooth headphones. I use with my iPhone at the gym and they work great.
Poor quality Product worked well for one month then power button broke and cannot turn back on.  "Conveniently" 5 days after the return window closed
Great headphones. Use them every day and they charge well and hold its charge. Great sound and fit really well.

To Whom It May Concern,

I received these headphones and did not expect anything spectacular due to its price. After using it for a week, it already has problems. When placed in my ears, it seems to never fully sync with my phone. My music will stutter here and there, and the connection from headphones to phone is weak. It's annoying working out and having my music stop and play continuously.

Could anyone connect me with their customer service team? I could not find anything online. I am not angry, and would love to remove this review because the sound is great, but I am hoping to receive some kind of compensation in regards to its warranty.

Thanks
Fits nicely. No problems with popping off. The sound isn't too bad either. But it could use just a bit more bass. And I wish the bluetooth could reach a little further. But overall not too bad.
Very loud base.  It's alright for the price
There must be a manufacturing defect - the blue tooth connection goes in and out  - when the left earbud wire is moved it loses sound.  I'm sending them back

Excellent battery life. Great sound. I really enjoy not having to connect a wire to my phone. Had an issue after 4 months of use where the main power button somehow got stuck and wouldn't power on. Contacted the company. Within a few days they sent out a replacement set. You can't ask for better customer service than that! They have gained a loyal customer should I need any of their products in the future!

The headphones are decent enough. OK sound quality, but given the price I wasn't expecting anything incredible. The only issue is that when the headphones are at a low battery percentage, an annoying voice will repeatedly say that the battery is low, making them unusable. A bit annoying, but overall a decent set of headphones.

I never expected wireless headphones to sound so good!  I'm super happy with these, and I'm even happier with all the little additions...long charging cord with multiple connectors, short cord for desktop charging, extra ear pieces and mostly the great little case to carry them all in.  Super happy!
Great while they lasted. I've had about 3.5 months, charged last night, but won't turn on. Hard to find the warranty information thru Amz.
They lasted six months for me but it was a great six months the sound quality was great.

I bought a pair for my wife. These headphones sound the same, may be even a little better than my beats. These are the headphones that I will buy when my beats stop working.
It comes in a really nice box . The headphones also come a car charger with two outputs and two cables

Update
I bought three pairs of them. The first pair stopped working after my wife use it in an Aqua Aerobics class. These headphones are listed as IPX7, but the ones that mi wife was wearing didn't resist a splash. She didn't swim with them. I better be careful with the remaining two pairs and keep them out of the water.
These headphones are not IPX7.
Just ordered my second pair.  Perfect for the gym, or around the house.
Love these!!!  Comfortable and great sound...
I love it. The sound quality is very good and it's easy to use
I don't know if it's common, but my left headphones have buzzing noise. It's not noticeable during the day. But extremely annoying and noticeable at night.
Great value for price.  Sound is good and headphones are comfortable to wear. No issues with connectivity.  Have not tested waterproof claims yet.

I only just starting using them but I connected them to my cell phone easily. They work fine and it sure is nice to not have a wire hooked directly to my cell phone so that I can listen to music. Thanks for a great product!
not fit to the ear

These are surprisingly good bluetooth headphones.  They pair easily and fit my ears very well.  Sound is good but not audiophile but that is not what I got them for. I find it hard to believe that they can sell these for less than $40.  Highly recommend these for anyone wanting bluetooth ear buds for exercising or casual listening.  They stay connected up to thirty feet from your device. And they include 2 charging cables (one has a convertible end for iPhones or miniusb), a dual car charger and really nice case.
I like them, they're loud and I use them to workout in the pool....... Head above water. Great Deal.
Came with an awesome multi-charger for both iphone and headphones! Love these! Bought 2 of them!
Works good good distance
The buds have been very good and reliable. They were easy to learn to operate.
Grandson loves them!!
I was skeptical about the fitting of the headphones. I'm very happy with the results. Fits well and very pleased with them in constant use.
Sound quality is great. Easy to setup. Use almost everyday. Only downside is some times the wrap around ear part doesn't stay snug against my ear. This isn't a big issue, just something I noticed.
I have to hold my phone directly next to these headphones to make them work, so I never use them. Would not recommend.

This is my 2nd pair of Senso headphones.  My first pair finally fell apart at the charging port. I use them daily in construction and have passed the word to some of my co workers of how good these headphones are for the money. They are durable, sound very good, fit well and the battery life blows away wireless headphones that cost much more. Try these out. You will not be disappointed.
Great product

I purchased these for work. I work in a fairly noisy environment. I’ve used these 6 to 8 hours a day for the past three days, sound quality is good as is battery life. I have Bose at home and in comparison these do well. In a world where your expensive earbuds / headphones could get trashed easily, these are a great alternative. I definitely recommend them.
Fantastic Deal for Bluetooth Headset. Easy to use, comfortable, I use them when I'm on my elliptical everyday. Right from the box they lasted 6 days before I had to recharge them!
They won't stay in my ears when running.  They fell off within the first two minutes.

Excellent earbuds! I used it right away to workout at the gym and I am extremely satisfied. It is comparable to the Dr. Dre Beats wireless earbuds. It kept me in the zone and focus for my workouts. I have made an excellent choice of purchase and have no complaints. Thank you!
Wow, i was very skeptical about this headphones, but they are just amazing. The hraphone is loud and has devent bass.

Like other reviews have mentioned the product includes a TON of accessories for the price, but its not useful because the base product was awful.

With most headphones there is a little bit of wind noise but these sound like someone has a leaf blower next to your ear. On top of that after an hour run I took out the headphones and my ears ached for several hours after taking them out. I may have had a defective product because the connectivity was awful as well.
Works as expected! Easy to use and stays in place during walks

I was impressed by the packaging enough to give a 5 star rating before I had even put these on! Seriously, the headphones are shipped in their own zip-up carrying case (pleasant surprise) in a solid box that cannot be easily crushed. There are plenty of earbud options: large, medium and small rubber buds and even some foam buds that closely resemble earplugs. The charger is a double USB 12V car charger with a long cord that is interchangeable so you have the option to charge your headphones or any Samsung or iphone - with just the one cord. The headphones came charged and ready.  Connecting to Bluetooth was a sinche and syncing to my iPhone was simple. I put them on and was shocked at the Bose-like sound quality and comfort. I consider myself some what of an audiophile finding quality headphones is a challenge. These are quality headphones that produce a full, tonal rich sound and are comfortable to wear. My only complaint is that there is no way to adjust the framework of the headphones to accommodate different sized ears. They are not going to fall out on run or even doing jumping jacks for that matter, but I would like the frame to fit more snug to my ears, or my wife's when she uses them. I clearly cannot say enough good here. I am happy with the purchase.
I weight train so no running but they stay on my ears really well and do not get in the way. I like the bass and sound quality. If these die after a year or so I would get a new pair of the same ones

Great wireless headphones, amazing price! They were very easy to setup and connected to my smart phone and smart watch without issues.

It's worth mentioning that since the power and volume controls are on the right earpiece and I was wearing my smart watch on my left wrist, I initially had some connectivity issues while on a run. Switching the watch to my right wrist solved the issue immediately, as our bodies can cause minor electromagnetic interference. So if you're having issues with the sound cutting out constantly, ensuring your device is on the right side will likely fix that!
These ear buds sound fine but I have been through 3 pairs that all failed due to sweat. Find a better brand.

They're much bigger than I anticipated.
Since they're at an angle, they go into the ears in an odd position.

I got these for listening to meditation while I sleep, but they're much too big for me to sleep on my side with them in my ears.
Nice design but left ear bud is not as loud as the right. Also like other reviews there is a slight buzzing electrical sound in left bud. Returning. Will try a different brand.
Amazing!
love these, great for working out
Excellent

Really nice for the price. I've been wanting Bluetooth headphones for the gym, but the price of most on the market put me off of them. I haven't actually been to the gym with them yet, but I've been listening to an audio book as I do housework, and they stay in nicely.
Delivery was excellent, sound quality is awesome, great fit also
Great sound, perfect length cord, even comes with a car charger!  Great product at a great price.
Great product after 3 weeks of use and also great customer service.

Just received my Senso Bluetooth headphones. I have been able to use them only once but so far they are everything that I had hoped they would be. the sound is excellent and the distance from my device is good. I am old school as far as my phone (it is a flip phone) but I use the headphones with my ipod and my Kindle and they connect perfectly.

I received these at least a day early! I have gone through at least 5 different earbuds in the last couple years because they end up shorting from sweating. I figured I need to spend a little more for better quality. These are great! The best quality yet. They feel more durable than my others. Super easy to pair, fit perfect. They do not fall out and the sound it clear and loud! Super happy with this purchase.
Stopped working within a month of purchase.

Sound quality is good. Fit is not bad, I like the over the ear ones personally so not a lot of choices for those but they fit pretty well for ones that do not have an adjustment to them as some do. No issues pairing, and easy to understand controls. Did have headphones go unresponsive after 2 months, but Tekatron help was very responsive and took care of the issue immediately, great customer support. Overall good headphones for budget conscious person.

Originally was happy with these but after having them replaced now under warranty twice over 8 months, the third pair has gone out as well and I am pretty convinced that they don't hold up to sweat overly well. The company this time around responded and suggested a "reset" procedure which does nothing when the headphones won't even charge anymore or turn on period, I tried to explain that but followed the procedure anyways to no luck of course. Now they just won't respond to my emails anymore and I will find another brand to buy. Maybe for the price it is fair to only get so many replacements under warranty, but just be aware that seems to be the case.

Great depth of sound and ease of use.  After debating over getting Beats for a while, I found these to be just as good at a fraction of the cost.  I would highly recommend these!  The only downfall is that the part that fits over the ear is not adjustable.  It will keep them from falling off your ears, but won't keep them glued to your head if you decide to do high intensity exercise.
This is a Christmas gift

Hey folks, received the headphones the other day, and I love them. They are a perfect fit for my ears, can't tell that I have them in. The volume quality is outstanding. And the stereo is amazing. The placement of the buttons are conveniently located and easy to use. The range is fantastic. I sometimes leave my Fire IN MY OFFICE WHILE I AM IN THE KITCHEN FIXING A MEAL AND THERE IS NO (AND I MEAN NO) degradation of sound quality. GREAT JOB. I know I will get many hours of good use from these. Thanks!
Awesome for the gym
I purchased these to hear turn by turn GPS directions while driving my motorcycle, they work perfectly and can be heard over the exhaust and without wind noise.
I really enjoy these headphones. They sound great and I love the earplug earbuds. They are made out of earplug material and work very well.

Was not sure I would like these at first, but quickly fell in love with them! My only complaint is sometimes they don't connect right away so I accidentally play my music out loud (have this issue mostly with the Pandora app on my iPhone). Other than that they have been great!

This product for this price is just amazing! What's more amazing is the customer service they have.
So, no wonder this amazing product with such amazing customer service has found a place in Amazon!
Seriously, I bought a two headsets recently - one for me and one for my son - to make sure we don't
bother each other with loud TV. The quality of sound is just great. It can match many of the expensive
headsets in the market. The battery life is great. You can watch almost two full length movies. Charging
is very fast. Range of Bluetooth allows me to go to bathroom to take leak without having to reconnect.
But what I was most happy about was their prompt customer service. One night I found it was not
connecting to Bluetooh transmitter of my TV. I was going to try out a few things, but I sent an email
to their customer service, just in case. They responded back within 4 hours. I was given some instructions
to try out. I tried but couldn't get Bluetooth to work and let them know about it. Within the same day, they
sent me mail telling me not to worry because I was covered by their one year warranty and then, I got
a mail saying that they have already shipped me a new one! I'm waiting for the new one to arrive but,
couldn't wait to write this review because I have to be honest for once and say, "Hey, this is a great product and
what's more, their service is even better!"

Mine started losing sound in one side and plastic cover fell of after a week and now had this for bout a month now and I ain't satisfied with this thing ... expected better , I can't even turn it on now so I'm stuck with broken earbuds
Very good earphones. Great quality and stay in the war during a run
Just quit working. Won’t turn on and won’t won’t light up when they charge. I only use these when I run on the treadmill which isn’t often, probably used 90 days in the last 8 months.
easy to use. Sounds great for the money
just got it a few days ago, but so far I love the design and they way they feel... Awesome for running or any kind of activity you want your buds to stay in.

They work for a short period of time, then the blue tooth connection keeps dropping out.  The only fix is to reset them as recommended by the manufacturer.  Gets annoying real quick.  Manufacturer wouldn't allow a refund after 30 days.
Excellent value overall for what you get.
I've used these almost every day for nearly two years. They work very well, with good battery life.

I agree with previous reviewers. I have bought these headphones numerous times since I have a tendency to lose. However, the pair I most recently received is NOT the same. The main headphone part is now hollow, cheap plastic as opposed to the more comfortable rubber from all previous pairs.

Furthermore, when turning on/off, the voice in the headphones is extremely loud and that doesn’t seem to be able to be adjusted. Pretty disappointing in this pair and won’t be ordering again when I do eventually lose (which may happen sooner than later for a reason).

The headphones have a good quality sound. It does have a little bit more based in trouble, which is not always a bad thing. I'm very happy with this purchase

Update
After listening to these for a week I am a little disappointed. The headphones cut in/out about 1x per minute. I know these are not the top of the line, but I think it is a fair expectation that they will not "skip" by cutting in/out.
It cannot be opened after a few times' use. Bad quality!!!

These had easy access buttons, and were easy to use, but I wanted them to wear while running and I couldn't get them to stay in my ears for anything. During a half hour run I probably had to adjust them six times. Very annoying. They also were more noise cancelling than I wanted.

After just a few days, I am absolutely Amazed by the sound quality!
After about 10 days I have but one problem...Keeping them in My Ears
The stereo is what I noticed first and base is nice also .

I WAS ALLSET TO WRITE A GLOWING REVIEW BUT THE SHODDY QUALITY OF THEBCHARGING PORT LET ME DOWN AFTER ONLY 2 CYCLES. WE ALL HAVE GIZMOS THAT ARE RECHARGED BY THESE TINY PORTS WHERE WE PLUG OUR GIZMO INTO OUR COMPUTERS SO THAT WE CAN SUCK UP A FRESH CHARGE.THE PORT ON MY HEADPHONES DEFORMED BADLY AFTER ONLY 2 CYCLES RENDERING MY HEADPHONES USELESS. ANOTHER CONTRIBUTION FOR THE NEAREST LANDFILL.IT'S ALL MY FAULT FOR EXPECTINE TOO MUCH FROM THIS $20 PIECE OF JUNK.

These ear buds are excellent.  I use them daily for my gym routine.  I mentioned to another person about them who had just bought another brand and paid a lot of money, how much I liked them he was very upset of the price he paid and the Senso headphones sounded just as good, fit great and the price...  Excellent set...
I have really small ears and these fit perfectly.
confusing doesn't always pair together with my I phone

Previously ordered a set for myself
Ordered again as a gift
I look cool with them on and the sound is great..

These are easy to pair and work great for the gym! The package includes SO much for the great price: cigarette lighter dual USB adapter, 2 charging cables, carrying case for earbuds, and multiple sizes of ear buds to fit your ears correctly. I'm so glad I purchased these!

Dog chewed up the first pair, and back for a second. Comfortable, stable within ear during exercise, and excellent battery longevity.

Audio quality is so-so as there is too much bass (not a flat response), however at this price point no complaint, nor can I even get upset at the dog. She's a Boston Terrier, therefore infallible.

Have had less than 5 months! Purchased after reading great reviews. Great at first then terrible reception. The big disappointment is that they only support the item for 1 month. This forces you to pay extra for extended warranty. I don’t think more than 5 months is too much to expect for decent performance.

So far so good with these headphones. Pretty good sound and battery life. The accessory pack and carrying case are handy too.

I’ve had these for a little over a year and the battery life has dropped to about 2 hrs.
Husband loves these. Uses them in our workout room and feel good and fit good."

The sound quality was like static. Contacted the company to let them know, and they said that maybe it will work better with more use. Then they stopped working all together. All within two months.

Update, 1/15/20:
After being contacted by SENSO here on amazon, I spent the last few weeks having an email back-and-forth with them, they ultimately gave me a 5% off code if I want to purchase something again. Spoiler, I won't.

My experience has been that these earbuds are terrible. They won't connect to my Apple Watch. Connected to my phone they cut out constantly. And the audio is so bass heavy and distorted that I can't even listen to them without EQ'ing the heck out of the signal. My pair is going in the trash.
Love these headphones...sound great, pairs well, stays charged for great amount of time.
Stopped working. Only 4 months of use. Wear them for finning in the am - 1-3 miles. That's it. : (
Loved this purchase. Teenagers are hard to please when it comes to earphones, but my son loves these. With 2 others coming up behind him, we will definitely order again.
Worked for one day, then the left bud stopped working altogether.
30$?! Broke after 2 weeks just died. I would change my review in exchange for a replacement.
Bought 3 sets of wireless earbuds. Good quality and sound for the price. Came w car charger, as well as a nice compact carrying case for everything.
Sounds quality and fit of the earbuds is really good.  The wire seems to get twisted pretty easily.  If not for that, I'd give them five stars.

Love these headphones. Had them for about 4 months before they were either lost or stolen. Great sound quality, and the maximum volume is quite loud, even for a loud teenager. For commuting and exercise, you won't find a more versatile pair of headphones. Comes with a few earbud choices, I prefer the expanding foam style. Fit is comfortable and adjustable. Only issue is the carrying case does not have a clip or other means to affix it to a backpack, etc. Overall the best value headphones I've found.

Got these for my son for his birthday. He absolutely love's them. Sounder great! Build quality is above average and battery lasts a good solid 8 hours of constant use. And...I don't have to worry if he breaks them or they end up MIA.. If they do.. I'm only out $30.. not $200 if they were Beats..
Love these.. Have had them for some time
Works great! Paired with multiple apple computers and Android phone.
The wire between the 2 headphones is a little long, but other than that I love these headphones.
They worked great for 2 1/2 months and have now stopped working. The return window was only one month.
Great set of earbuds. Good bass. Battery life can be better . I

Bought a pair about 3 years ago and loved them. Purchased a 2nd pair last fall and the ear loop is NOT FORMED!! One bends them around the are but about 3 minutes into run the ear loop loosens and they pull off the ear.

Total waste for running...wish I had returned them. Just them them away

Very surprised by these ear buds, I was looking into beats, jaybird x2-x3 but I couldn't justify the price I saw these and read the reviews so I gave them a whirl and am thankful that I got them, sounds great, fit well, highly recommend these
Easy to operate. Clear, crisp sound. Lightweight and comfortable. These are what I was looking for at a reasonable price.

I've wanted a pair of wireless ear buds for a long time. I've purchased 2 different pairs in the past but could not get them to sync to my phone.  But thought I would try again with the SENSO Bluetooth wireless headphones and I had them synced to my phone in less than 5 minutes and I love them!!  Thank you.

Got these and they worked great for about 8 months- then they quit charging. Called them and they replaced them for free with a new pair which are working great. Just a note- there were a few times when they wouldn’t connect to my phone. I just had to go to settings and “forget” the device and then reconnect. This solved the problem.
Got these for working out at the gym, my corded earbuds keep getting caught on stuff... These sound great, and are much safer to boot.

Best bang for your buck! You can't go wrong with this headphone. The music sounds crisp and clear and Bluetooth to boot. No more tangled wires to get in the way when running or working out. I highly recommend!
This is my 2nd order for this headset. I purchased my last set for my wife. Overall quality is fantastic and the blue range is such that I haven't yet found it's limit.
Fast delivery, great product....did not need bulky $300 headphones because this does the job...great buy especially for the money....
The sound is very consistent and comfortable on the ears.
100% recommended. Easy to use and very good price!
Great at work and the gym.
Work great! Exactly what I was looking for.
So far these work great.  Haven't used them very long but am very impressed with their quality.

I just used this today for my run/walk and really loved them! They stayed in my ears and the sound is excellent. As a matter of fact, I the sound was so good, I needed the volume to go down another notch or two but it was already at its lowest. I use it with my IPhone 6 and it paired without any issues. Unlike the Skech earphones I have and although I liked them because they do not go inside the ear, I always had to have my music on before pairing. Odd. These are a wonderful value, you get a hard case, 3 different sized tips (I ended up switching to medium), a short charging cord, a long one, a car adapter, and 2 cord control clips! I compared these to others that were more expensive, and alomost ordered a different brand because it had the cord clip, then I checked this one again and saw that it was included so based onthe feedback, I made the purchase. I have never liked in ear buds, but I am a beginning runner and needed something comfortable and reliable. These fit the bill so far. The around the ear clips seem flimsy at first, but it helps to adjust them based on your needs, mine after to work with my glasses and once I got them set, they were good. I like the clip for the cord because I can cinch the cord up if I don't want it flopping on my neck. Can I just repeat how excellent the sound is!! Be extra careful though, because when they say noise canceling, they mean it. I recommend without reservation! (That's just my doggie in the pic, he likes to sit on my desk...lol)

Awesome sounds quality. Great quick function buttons on headset. Overall definitely worth the money. Great product thank you guys! Not to mention the suburb customer service of the Senso Support Team. Six months after I purchased these awesome Headphones they suddenly stopped powering on, the blue light indicated that the unit had a full charge and I still could not get the headphones to turn on. So I reached out to customer service via emailed and I had a response within minutes, I tried to troubleshoot the issue and preform a factory reset but still was unsuccessful, it turns out I was covered with a 1-year warranty and they sent me out a new pair the same day. I could not be happier with the end result.

I don't use headphones very often and didn't want to spend $100+ but I knew I wanted Bluetooth.  I am VERY pleased.  I read a lot of reviews on Amazon before deciding.  While there were similar headphones available in this price range, what made me decide on these was the little case that came with them.  It's small and fits the headphones and extra ear cushions perfectly.  I used them listen to music and watch movies/television on my iPad.  They were perfect!
These work well wear them every time I work out cord is not off balanced/ doesn’t get in the way while performing exercises.
I've been using it since a month and sometimes I think that are really great, better than my skullcandy, but when I use in my daily exercises sometimes they lose connections or had some kind of lag.

Really like these Bluetooth headphones! They arrived with a charge so I could use them right away and the accessory pack was above and beyond what I expected for the price.  Sounds is good, I’ve never owned Beats or Bose but for running I think these sound great and stay on through a lot of sweat.
Great product
Phenomenal.  I'll never buy the high-priced headsets again.  These sound just as good at the three $125+ headsets I bought previously.  (All of which stopped working, by the way.)
These are my favorite Headphones for the gym. Great sound very comfortable. Can’t beat the price.
I bought these for my wife and she loves them.  She uses them to work out and says they don't fall off and have great sound.

I really wanted to like these earbuds. Good price, highly rated, good packaging , but... lots of wind noise. I bought replacement tips but it didn’t help much. When I finally learned to tolerate the noise, they just died - won’t charge or turn on. You get what you pay for.

I really can't complain. These are solid in sound and design. They are comfortable and deliver on every point they claim. I could buy 10 of these for the price of some other higher end headphones. Why spend the extra on a name? These will work just as well and save you some cash in the process. Way to represent senso. Very pleased.
These headphones are great! The call quality is ok not great but good enough. As far as sound for media, I'm impressed. The battery life is on the money. I bought a pair for my wife.

I have owned three of these earbuds. The first lasted for several months and then one side stopped working. I thought they were pretty good for the price, so I ordered them again, thinking maybe it was just something I did that caused one side to go out. The second pair would not charge or turn on when I received them, so I exchanged them with Amazon. The third pair worked fine for about four uses and then the ON/PLAY button got stuck and will not pop back out, rendering them useless (unfortunately just after the return window was up). THESE ARE LOW QUALITY earbuds with poor quality control. They would be worth the price if they were more reliable and lasted. I would suggest Anker earbuds in this price range instead (similar sound, much better range, longer battery life and have lasted me several months of daily use so far).
So far the best wireless headphones I have tried at this price level
I've only used the senso earbuds once but I like them. The sound to me isn't quite as described but still really good. I only gave 4 stars because I don't know about the battery life yet.
Awesome !! Better than expected. The sound quality is great and the fit is perfect. I would recommend these to anyone.
Works exactly like the reviews said it would. Great gift!!

Started off as a decent affordable pair of headphones. After a little more than a year, here are all the things broken:

- Audio only out of right ear. Nothing in left.
- Bluetooth drops connections all the time. Sometimes mid song or video.
- Bluetooth sometimes says it’s connected, but it’s not. Have to power cycle it an try again. Occasionally takes many cycles to pair.

I bought this headphones thinking that the hook around the ears would stop them from popping out during my workout.  I couldn't even go for a walk with them in without them falling off.  Very flimsy and loose for people with small ears.  They also kept disconnecting from my phone it I was actually use them.  So if I received a call I would have to put them on hold while I figured out how to get my headset connected.  This was a let down for me.

Bought them in April and 5 months into it... it won't charge anymore.. very disappointed. Otherwise love the headphones while it lasted.
Update: 10/12: Called the seller and they sent a replacement immediately. Quite happy about that. Hopefully this time it will last longer. Fingers crossed!
Update: 11/19: The second set didn't last long either. Won't charge anymore :(

I have tried many different brands of headphones that were twice the cost of my SENSO headphones and I can say without a doubt that my SENSO's have been the best! Sound is great, love the ease of use answering calls, pausing music with the touch of a button!
Was a little worried about customer service when I did have an issue, but was pleasantly surprised at the extremely rapid response and resolution to my issue. Guaranteed I will be coming back to SENSO for my next set of headphones.
Great for the gym.

I can't wait to use these at the gym! I was skeptical at first because I used them from the box, assuming they were at full charge because they turned on—they kept skipping until they finally died. I charged them for about an hour. PERFECT. OH MY GOODNESS, THE SOUND IS AMAZING THE BASS COMES THROUGH NICE AND THOUGH YOU CAN STILL HEAR THINGS IN SURROUNDING, THE SOUND QUALITY IS SO GREAT, ALL SURROUNDING SOUNDS ARE INAUDIBLE. IM SO GLAD I TOOK A CHANCE ON THESE. I just hope they last me and speakers don't blow out or anything else. YAAAAAA IM ACTUALLY MOTIVATED TO GO TO THE GYM EVEN MORE. Will buy again! **ALSO, the packaging and "extras" they give you make owning these that much better :)
Love them. My son bought a pair and said they were just as good as his old beats. So I got a pair also cause I need to play music while I work!
good for the money
I gifted this headphone to my friend. He was so amazed by the quality and especially sports purpose. I proudly recommend this to anyone who is really looking to buy gym/sports wireless headset.

Incredible ear buds for the price! They sounds great, fit perfect and the battery lasts forever! I love that it speaks when they are turned on and off, letting you know they are completely off. The also speak to let you know when a call is coming in. Overall I love these!
As advertised, decent bass, handy controls
The sound is pretty good, but it doesn't fit my ear properly and need to return it.

Terrific pair of headphones.  They sound great and are really comfortable to wear.  The packaging is compact and the zippered storage case is small and lightweight.  I plan on purchasing a second pair for my wife to use while we workout and go for walks.  The fact that they come with a one year warranty is commendable.  The additional items that are included in the order was a nice surprise, especially the cord that has the USB connector on one end and the convertible connector on the other end (iphone or Samsung type).  Since this review is based on a short ownership time, I will re-evaluate this product after several months of usage, but as it stands now, I highly recommend these.

I recently received my new Senso headphones and can actually say, I love them.  I wanted something that wouldn't fall off my ears when working out and these are perfect, they stay in place.  The sound is excellent.  So far, so good.  Definitely recommend them.

I liked them, a little uncomfortable and I did get complaints of it being hard to understand me but I can’t be sure if it was the headphones fault on that. But overall I was happy with them, they sound great. But they stopped charging after a couple weeks rendering them useless. So I reached out to the manufacturer since they had asked me how I liked them. And they let me return them and offered me 10%(which is only a couple bucks) if I wanted to buy another pair. But it left a bad taste in my mouth and with them being uncomfortable I went with a different set of headphone

Best headphones at the price, and I would also say at a much more expensive price point too. I have Jaybirds and Plantronics as well. I've have other pairs before those, but these are great! Great sound, great look and great feel!
These headphones are good quality for the price!!

After my old pair broke I decided to get a new pair of Bluetooth headphones and after a reading a few reviews I settled on this one. Ordering was easy, shipping was fast, and I was exited. But all it took was 30 to hate these things. The one thing I need to talk about it audio quality. The quality is attrociouse. It sounds like the sound is being filtered by a potato. I know at this low of a price point I shouldn't expect good audio quality but my old pair that sold for $27 had audio quality 50x better than these. It was cold, crisp, and a pleasure to listen to. But these.... the sound resembles that of when your underwater and you scream. It's so murky and muddy it hurts. I think there's a high possibility mine are defective as no company should get away with something this bad but a fair warning to everyone looking into these. GO ELSEWHERE

I read a lot of reviews prior to purchasing this item, none of them addressed the problem that because of the shape, if you run outside all you hear is the wind and you have to put the volume to the max to actually hear the music over the wind.

I really wanted to like this item so I gave it several opportunities and ran several times in different wind conditions and all I could hear was the wind noise created by the shape.

We bought two sets, one for me and one for my girlfriend my girlfriend's ears are small and the rubber piece is not adjustable so the rubber piece does not sit on top of her ear and because the weight of the earphone and not being supported by the rubber piece they continuously fell out.

I do not recommend this item if you run outside in any kind of wind conditions or if your ears are small .
Great for the price.  They sync right up.  Bass reflex isn't the greatest but overall decent sounding.  Easy to use for making and receiving phone calls.
These are awesome!  Works great during workouts, plus the sound is amazingly clear!
The sound is great, easy to setup, price is ok.
I've been using these everyday for about 2 weeks and no problems.  I am very happy with this purchase.

6 months later and these things are still going as strong as ever! Battery life is still strong and the sound quality is excellent! I chose these as a cheap alternative to beats and I've been very pleased

Excellent headphones.  I have a wired Bowers and Wilkins headphones and Senso outperform them. I have run wearing them and they seem to stay on our ears.  At the price point available at AMZN on June 2017, I bought additional two for my friends.  Unbeatable, if you are looking for value.

The headphones worked great initially.  However, they suddenly stoped working and would not turn on, even before finishing their first charge.  At first I thought the battery was depleted.  So, I tried to charge them but got a blue light indicating that they were charged to capacity.  Still can no longer get them to turn on. When they did work, they sounded good and were comfortable.

I am so pleased with the SENSO wireless earbuds!  I've tried three other sets in the past year and a half and none were of this quality nor did they last more than a few months.  I'm using these with a TV transmitter to better hear the dialogue in movies.  Pairing with my TV transmitter was easy.  The reception is clear, no static as I had with other brands.  I changed the ear buds to the smallest size and they fit comfortably for hours of movie viewing.
Good value for the money! Nice quality audio.
Connected fast and easy when i turned them on. Great quality sound. Great battery life. Durable
Love it, way better than any other Bluetooth headphone I have owned. Worth the money !!!

Awesome and the sound is really good, which I am particular about. Wear these for running in the morning and listing to webcasts, etc. When running you can hear the wind blowing by but just adjust them to minimize the rustling sound. You won't eliminate it completely. Also tried to use for a conference call but was told it was difficult to hear me so check your other device volume in advance. This is only a secondary concern, as for me it was running and listening that I bought them for. 2 thumbs up.
Update: Feb 21st Have now used these for several Webcast/Skype meetings and the audience could here me clearly which is great..... They also warn you when the battery is low. Have found the rubber insert/cover for the charging port difficult to open but this is a minor inconvenience. Overall 5 stars
Thanks you! Love the SENSO headset. Exceeded my expectations for sure.
It's cheap. It works... and It hasn't died yet. Has a little more bass than normal but I like that and so it doesn't bother me much.
For the money, you can't go wrong - these are great.  Best headphones I have ever owned!
They're about what you expect for 30 dollar headphones. They fit well and sound ok. No complaints, really.
beautiful and just as good as overprice beat headset.

These are just good headphones for under $40. I can run or bike with them and the sound quality is quite good. They feel sturdy and although i haven't tested this yet, claim to be weatherproof. i like the controls and it also uses a standard charger that I have in abundance from various other electronics. One of my biking buddies bought these to replace his pricey Beats and he likes them just as much.
The frustration with these though is the controls. The headphones are constantly making beeping sounds that I have no idea how to stop. It seems to switch to other functions randomly, and I have a lot of frustration getting it to do what it should do, which is play music. So I spend a lot of time angrily pressing the button trying to get it to stop beeping when I just want to run and listen to some tunes.
Love the headphones. Sound is great. Only negative is thst yhey are uncomfortable after long periods of usage.

The sound is great but my problem is that I have small ears so the hook just sticks out over my ear more than it should.  I've tried to adjust it bu pulling and bending the hook in hopes it would fit my ear.  No luck. It's very inconvenient that the hook does not fit my ears and it's not adjustable.

Bought them in January... Died today.... that is exactly less than 6 months of use.....

Now the review...

Pros: Incredible sound!, I bought these because I wanted to use for working out, I have a pair of apple AirBuds, I did not want to lose them as they come out of my ear easily. I must say; these headphones have incredible sound, most inexpensive headsets you have to crank up the volume to get good quality sound. Well, you wont have to with these ones, lows are solid and mids and high are clear to the point that the volume can stay consistently in the mid range of the music and it will be pleasant whether you are running or at the gym or simply working with them.

Cons: They died today... I have yet to put these thorough real hell, I am an avid runner and most of the time I run in dry weather, I do sweat, but no different than anyone who runs 5 miles at 8-9 minutes per mile.... For whatever reason, when I hit the 3 mile mark today they just stopped working and the blue light stayed on..like solid ON! I was not able to turn them on or off again... so I put them in my pocket and finished running... I placed them in my bag after getting ready and drove to work, just now as I type this review I am attempting to revive them and nothing... the light is now Solid RED! and they do not connect... SO I take they are finished... it is a shame that they did not even last 6 months...

I guess is the last time I buy them
Very good product fot the buck, battery last super long.

I have a Samsung 7.  I don't know if it is my phone or what, but, this is always cutting out no matter how charged up it is.  The only way it works is if I hold my phone up to my ear next to the headphones while I am walking, which kind of defeats the purpose.  This is my second pair.  I returned the first pair after having the same issues.  The second pair was actually worse.

My Powerbeats2 died after soaked by sweat for a year. I think any BT earbuds with a volume control on the strap is susceptible to sweat damage. This one do not have an volume control that is on the strap. I hope it will last. The sound quality is ok, at least for jogging. The ear hooks are a little big and loose for me but I can manage. Pairing seems to be a little slow (comparing to the much more expensive Powerbeats2). Sometimes, I need to re-connect to make my phone switch audio to the earbuds. Overall, it works for me. Could be a great deal for the price if it lasts. I will find out.

Two stars because they stay put on my ears. But I dont like that it does not block out all of the external sound. The charge does not last very long! For the price I paid, I think I would have been more satisfied.

They didn't ever sound very good, and I always had to keep adjusting them around my ear to be able to hear what was playing. I would have to turn them up all the way. Also, the cable in the back kept snagging on everything, including my own skin. I tried using the little black cable clips to shorten the cable, but they were too flimsy, fell off, and couldn't be adjusted without completely redoing them.

After a while, the right side started kept getting quieter until there was only a faint sound coming from them. I assumed I had gotten some ear wax on the speaker and tried to very gently brush them off with some paper towel. They promptly died after that.
These are just so so! Not really that comfortable or easy to use

After using them for 2 months the headphones started cutting out, they wouldn’t turn on again until charged, even though they were fully charged. Now, after 4 months, they stopped working completely, not turning on, not connecting, but show “fully charged” when plugged in. Save yourself the hassle and buy something else!

I have comment on this SENSO bluetooth Headphones and is should be corrected by the manufacturer, There is 15 seconds distortion after connecting the device before going back to normal sounds. I have other brands of headphones like beats, sennhieser and I had never experienced like this. Sounds quality is good.
Love these ear buds! Bought a set for my daughter and her girl friend and they love them too. Perfect for workouts!!
Having the most difficult time charging the unit. The plug is difficult to stay connected.

I got these headphones, because my favorites broke and that model is no longer available. I'm happy to say that I've found my new favorite. They are light, clear sounds, and easy to use with my Android.

I've went through a couple of different brands of wireless sport earbuds in the last year. Ether; didn't fit, or didn't sound good at all, or you could have a conversation while wearing them, and the list goes on.
Then, I found these! I've only used a couple times so far, but they have nailed it! Every things on my check list was acheieved by these earbuds and I'm extremely happy! I have to turn it on half volume because they're so loud! In a good way, true crisp HD like you're in the movie theater.
If they had ones without the ear hooks I would get a pair for my wife (*hint hint to mfg.*) DEFINITELY RECOMEND!
lets just say we liked them enuf to order another set for another vehicle!
Great sound for a great price.
and connected to iPhone bluetooth quickly. My cursory inspection and use has been good so far...time will tell about its durability.
I love the headphones. Best ones I've had. I love how they are over the ear and don't fall out while I am doing a rigorous exercise.
It's comfortable and does it's job. Really easy to set up and doesn't get in the way as I work out.
Great product so far and a company that seems to care about their customers
Really enjoy the freedom and ease of pairing. Nice carrying case and all the cables you need. I have an older pair of LG wireless but they wouldn'the pair with my Kindle. Good purchase.
Love these use them from music to gaming as well as call my family. For the price they are amazing!

Best value for the money. High Fidelity or HD sound. Last year I became aware of bluetooth and came to buy several of them at least 5, one of them was on-the-ear and the rest were ear buds like Senso; so I have a good idea  how good this Senso  bluetooth headphone sounds. Also the hooks over the ears keep these earbuds in place when I walk around my house. Definitely a  best buy.
Very clear sound with great battery life. Liked the fact it came pre-charged. Fits nicely over ears. Highly recommended.
Great fit, and great sound.
These headphones are awesome they pair easily great battery life amazing sound can't say anything bad about them. Best headphones I own. the customer service is amazing too. thanks senso
Comfortable and noise canceling to hear

The problem I have with this earbud is the connection with a smartphone (iPhone 5s in my case). Seems the Bluetooth connection gets established between the earbud and the iPhone, but when I try to play a podcast the sound quite often comes out of the phone itself and not from the earbud. I have to reconnect the earbud with the phone a few times and eventually I get my podcasts played from the earbud. This is annoying as it is unpredictable. Seldom I get the earbud connected from the beginning, but most often I have to turn the earbud off/on multiple times. I can't figure out the rules of the game. Once the connection is established I see no more problem. The earbud can play for hours (4-5 hours at least) on a charge. But the connection problem drives me crazy and I think twice before using the earbud every time as I know I will have to wrestle with it.

Update
Following the advice from the customer support (reset the earbuds and reconnect to iPhone) totally fixed the issue described above. Now the earbuds are functioning exceptionally well, and I am very satisfied now. Five stars (for their customer support too)!
Like nice simple headphones

I bought these for my son . He likes them very much says the sound is excellent and they are mostly comfortable with the exception of the plastic earbuds could be made a little better so they fit the ear better. Sound quality and appearance and price he says they are the best headphones he has owned. I would recommend buying these Over beats I spent $129 on and could have spent only 40 to get just as good a pair of headphones if not better.

I bought these because the reviews said said they stayed on and low and behold they really do!  I've never had ear buds stay on until I bought these. The sound is really good also.  I would recommend these to anyone
I love these headphones. Comfort is essential in these. No hard plastic around my ears. Very good sound quality. Easy and very fast connection to my iPhone.

These are very good headphones and met my needs very well for several reasons. First, they stay on the ear so you con't have to worry about them falling off. They are not tight allowing you to hear sounds around you, though they do not have the robust base of tight headphones. Bluetooth works well, connecting easily and working for the distance advertised (30 feet). Battery lasts a reasonable time and I have not needed to recharge for 4 hours, the most I have used them. Connected instantly to my phone. Easy to operate when they are on, just press the button to start/stop music or answer a call. Speaking of a phone call, they work fine. Quality is adequate for infrequent use. I would get a bluetooth set specifically meant for phone use if that was a key need. They come with a nice car charger that will replace a very old and slow charger. A great freebee.

Bottom line, this is a fine set of headphones that will meet your needs unless you really want audiophile quality. They work great for my walks, runs and while working around the house. One final note, the company, SENSO, has been very active in contacting me to ensure I was satisfied. Three e-mails to be sure I received my headphones and was happy. While I hope I never need to take advantage of their service, I am optimistic they will be very responsive.
These work well and are comfortable. They stay on when I jog and sweat, but the things behind the ears are let tight and don't hurt.
These are some great sounding earbuds. I have issues with earbuds staying in my ears, and the foam tips work for me. The sound is terrific.
Easy set-up and headphones sound great!
It's only been a day but my sister really loves her headphones

These headphones have very good quality of sound. The right headphone fell apart on me (literally) after a few months and the volume control button fell out, and I wasn't able to find it. I am still able to adjust the volume through my phone, so it's not that big of a deal. Overall, I'm still satisfied with the purchase.
Package looks great. works very well.

Loved them for the two times I used them for my runs. Then they died. Just completely didn't work. Here is the GOOD news... I called the 24/7 number and they are sending a new pair. So hopefully it was just a fluke.
I've tried a bunch of similar bluetooth earbuds in this price range. These are the only ones worth buying.
perfect

These are the best headphones I have ever owned. When I first put them on, I was amazed at the sound quality that was coming from these little headphones. It's got a rich sound and really good bass. The price was great. The companies customer service is great. I do not regret this purchase at all.

The head phones work very well for the most part. The ear hooks are okay, kind of finiky to fit around your ear at first. Some connectivity problems depending on the device that I am paired with. Overall I like them. sound quality is good and battery life is great. Charges quick too.
I love my headphones, I wear them everyday for work & to play my music & talk to my friends all 8hrs.

Loved the headphone , I have had them for couple of months but for some reason once charged they wouldn’t turn on. I have to commend the senso customer service , quick on answering emails and when they couldn’t resolve my issue , honored the product warranty to ship me a replacement! Not to mention the replacement arrived in 2 days! Probably the best customer service on amazon aside from a great product.

These headphones are exact what I wanted. The sound is much better then the OEM earbuds. The day I received them my wife immediately demanded a pair for herself. We are very happy with them. A main reason that we went Bluetooth was working out with wired ear bud was irritating these headphones aren’t, very comfortable and they stay on while running a high intensity workout.

Worked great for 2 months. Was a great accessory to my peloton and made rides so much better than using a wired headset. Battery life was even pretty impressive....

...then, one morning, completely dead...just a dead battery right? Plugged in for a full day, and next morning still dead. Can't get it to respond at all to any inputs. Can't be revived.

These headphones are just okay. I was really expecting more but they work fine. My issues have come when my phone is in my pocket, when it is farther than 5 ft away from me, or when I'm off wifi. When I bought them just a couple weeks ago for Prime Day, I saw that the ratings were outstanding but I'm not so sure.

Update 9/22/2017 - I'm really struggling with these earphones. Some days they work and some days they don't. I called the 24/7 number the first time this happened and they said to redo the connection with my phone so I did but after a few weeks, it's doing it again.

The headphones are an excellent purchase. The accessories that come with them are more than I expected and are very useful.  I have always had a trouble with in the ear earbuds as they keep falling out and this soft over the ear how old are keeps them in place perfectly.  When I charged them up and turned them on,  the Bluetooth showed up immediately  on my iPhone and my iPad and with one press on the screen they were paired.  I did not find that the bass was overbearing or dominant at all in my set,  but I do  favor acoustic music.
Battery life listed at 8 hours.... not much over 4.5 - 5 so far, overall -- Okay for the price I paid.
Love them so far!  Packaging is great and definitely worth the price.

These work well at the gym, but as soon as I'm outside for a walk with my phone I'm my pocket, they beep until I'm a half-mile from home.  They also beep in the house.  I think they're trying to pair with other devices or are responding to my phone recognizing other devices, but I can't find a way to make the beeping stop.  So annoying.
These are quite good. Nicely balanced sound, comfy with good battery life. Very nice package for a good price.

Although I always read a lot of reviews before purchasing a product, I don't typically write them. However, beyond frustrated with these things, I'm finally going to voice my opinion.

First and foremost, the bluetooth connection is terrible especially outside. The sound cuts in & out every time there is a gust of wind. The same is true if I'm wearing my phone to the side or the back of my body, or if I bend at the waist. As my primary use for them is working in the yard, they're almost useless. Crouching over to garden... forget it!

Secondly, every time I move my head the cord drags on my neck unseating the earbud a little at time so that every 5 minutes I'm readjusting them back in my ears.

Basically the only time I have no issues with these earbuds is when I'm in the house doing very little and the phone is worn in front of my body. Then the sound is decent enough for the money. But this clearly isn't enough to recommend the product.

I was satisfied overall. I had no connection issues, the buds fit comfortably in my ears, and the sound quality is fine however when talking on the phone callers always complain about the sound quality. They complain that I sound like I’m under water, mumbling , or the noise in the background is too loud. I did a reset as the seller suggested as a possible remedy but it didn’t help. Still have the same complaint from all callers.
Very good. very comfortable and recommended
Really happy with the product. Comfortable earbuds, easy to use buttons.
Fantastic.
ExcellentR

Been using it for just over an year and the earphones stopped charging.
So far the product has been working great, no issues with sound quality or battery life. But just after 1 year, when the warranty ends, my earphone stopped charging and completely dead. I would expect this earphone to last longer.
Fantastic clear sound, good bass level, and stay on while jogging, excellent headphones with no skipping
These headphones are great. They're definitely waterproof also.

mine has static in the bluetooth. people on my call tell me to turn it off.
its exactly one month since i purchased this and there is no return or exchange button here. I will be happy to exchange this and provide another feedback if it works okay. but this one did not work for me.[[ASIN:B01G8JO5F2 SENSO Bluetooth Headphones, Best Wireless Sports Earphones w/ Mic IPX7 Waterproof HD Stereo Sweatproof Earbuds for Gym Running Workout 8 Hour Battery Noise Cancelling Headsets]]
The sound quality was very poor. Lot's of crackling. I was very surprised, considering all the positive reviews.
They work like a charm.
Good and cheap.. Not the world's best quality but for the price they are top notch

I have used these in a few different settings so far , such as on an outside run, in the house and in the gym. I have pricier name brand wireless headphones with the hanging collar and the other wireless ear buds seem to have a farther range but they are also clunkier and more expensive. SENSO HEADPHONES are great for the price and they do the job. The controls are easy and comfortable to handle without having to take the ear buds out. The weight is nice and the wire behind the head is comfortable. The loops around my ears keep the buds from popping out on the run.

Update 2019 : They still work well but I warn you that they may disconnect from your device and you wont be able to use them. Delete them from your device and add them again and that should help them reconnect.
These do not stay on the ears while running

So far- so good. I used them this morning during my exercise routine. They fit well and stay on my ears. I like them, they are very light weight and easy to use, I didn't even know I had them on after awhile. I like the controls and being able to answer my iPhone while in use. Also, they automatically sync with my IPhone when I turn them on and I don't have to reconnect every time to bluetooth, just turn on and I can play my music. Don't expect them to sound like your stereo at home but they have good sound. Cable is very flexible.

Instructions were clear but very tiny print, I had to get out my magnifying glass to read it. Took me awhile to figure out that the Dual Port Charging cable didn't really apply to the product but the auto adapter and cable are a nice extra that I have put in my glove box. I charged them before using, lets see how long a charge lasts now.

I like the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones so far. I have only had them a few days. They were delivered on time, as promised, and in excellent condition and are working well with my iphone. Fingers crossed all continues to go well. Thank you!!!

The only way they work is by holding the cellphone on my hand less than a foot from my head, which makes it lose the advantage of being wireless.

I only have one complaint: They are LOUD, even at the lowest volume. It may not be an issue for everyone, but for me it makes them unusable/uncomfortable to use for much more than YouTube.

They sound great, but if you have a not-huge head, they look really silly on you. The range is great, the bass is GREAT, and if you use an equalizer they're just plain amazing. They don't fall out (though I never ran with them), and they lasted longer than eight hours of nonstop music playing. They also connected right away and never got disconnected. Super easy.

BUT, you look like a crazy person if your head is too small. After the third person asked me in a concerned voice what was in my ear, I gave up on them. They stick out an entire inch from the side of my head, and the little band that's supposed to go behind your ear can hardly even reach, so it will never stay and it just hangs there all floppy. The buds stay in without it, but it looks super crazy. I love them, but they make me look like a maniac. I've bought two other sets trying to find some as good as these. No dice. At least now my husband had a great set of headphones...... And PS, I don't think I have an abnormally small head, either. Maybe it has to do with your ear anatomy.... Either way, buyer beware. Ordered my first pair of these headphones and they worked well for a month or so. You need to charge them pretty regularly if you use them every day for an hour or so. I would say every other day if you workout every day. After a month or so my headphones just stopped working - they would not turn on and no light came on when plugged into the charger. I contacted customer service and followed their instructions to reset, but that did not fix the issue. They sent me another pair because it is still under warranty. The same thing happened after a short usage time. Again I contacted customer services, but now they are telling me I have to send the earbuds back to them, at MY expense, so they can see for themselves what the issue is. I asked for a shipping label weeks ago, and still have not received a response. I tried countless times to reset and charge these earbuds but that did not work. They are good for the price and decent for working out - that is, when they work! There are so many companies out there that sell similar earbuds at comparable and even cheaper value that have higher ratings. I may write this company off altogether, but hoping they get back to me soon to resolve the issue.

I've tried many types and brands of earbuds in the past six years. I decided to try the Senso headphones based on the price, reviews, and 4-star and above ratings. Bought as a replacement for my running headset. Previous was cheap and did not work right after a month of running. When I received package it was like I got something from Apple. Received company email after receiving headphones in mail and was impressed. Haven't had any problems and the material is stable and seems built to withstand sweat from shorting or damaging headphones! Will keep you all in mind when I need a future replacement! Thank you!

PS. Perhaps attach an elastic band to wires so it feels more snug around head. An adjustable wire of some sort.

Simply fantastic. Will buy another set for backup.
Great buy. A+
Only used a few times now, but received fast and as described. Nice quality headphones I would buy again if needed

Pros - The headphones is very light weight and I do like the flexible ear hooks because I don’t need to worry about a break from an accidental bend. On the right buds is where the controls to change audio, skip songs, answer/end phone calls, and turn on/off resides, which do feel comfortable to reach for whenever I need to use it. The extra earbuds that is supplied is essential for different ear types. The battery is more than long enough, from when I bought it to now, I’ve yet to charge it. The cord between the buds look a bit “flimsy” at first glance but appears to be a durable cable, and the sound is more than sufficient to my liking. Lastly, as a bluetooth headphone, it sells for great price compared to pricy options out in the market. The car charger and lightning cable bonus are pretty great as well.
Cons - As mentioned, the there are three different extra earbuds to come with this as I’ve tried all three to find a “perfect” fit. None of which really “locked in” nice and firm and I would find that sometimes my buds are rotated forward or backward (These are all subjective). HOWEVER, I had ZERO issues of it falling off, especially when I’m doing cardio or running a few games on the basketball court. Secondly, I’ve had minor issues of detecting the product via bluetooth, on my phone, even after following directions for pairing and/or resetting. After sometime, I’ve connected it to my iPhone 6 and my MacBook. Third, connectivity. As advertised, it does remain connected up to 30ft and sometimes a bit after. HOWEVER, I’ve had many instance when my audio would be “breaking up” as if signaling is affected. This would happen whether my phone is directly in my pocket or on the side of me during a lift of cardio session. It happens randomly but it is not enough to deter me from my activity, however, a minor nuisance. Regardless, I can’t say my issues with the connectivity is consistent with all other units with the numerous positive reviews on this product. But these are cons pertaining to my experience with my specific unit.
Conclusion - For the price I paid for in comparison to other pricier options, this is a excellent purchase. I do have a pair of powerbeats 2’s and these activbuds work just as well as them. I would recommend these buds for individuals looking for headphones of quality and not looking to make a dent in their savings. The cons that I’ve experienced is not enough to be suggestive of unsatisfactory purchase. Overall, I am satisfied, trust the other positive reviews, and at worst, you have a 1-year warranty and EXCELLENT customer service.
You can hear it skip sometimes, like it starts to  get out of range but your phone is right next to you . The sound is decent

I like the SENSO ones, and they are quite good value, but they are a bit big and heavy, and the hook over the ear is soft and thus does not actually hold the earbuds in place. I use these all the time to listen to podcasts, hockey games, and even music. On the bus, at work, at the gym, and at home- connection is solid and strong, charge life is decent, and sound quality is great for the price. I did have to tweak some of the equalization on my phone as there isn’t a ton of low end, but adjusting the EQ helped with that a little. You can hear things around them at lower volumes, but it’s not a huge issue and could probably be solved by swapping ear pieces in the kit or turning them up. Carrying case is sturdy but will occasionally turn the power on if it gets pressed in my backpack. These headphones are an incredible value! They sound great and work pretty well. My main struggle with these types of headphones is that they don't stay in my ears very well.

The rubber that wraps around the ears isn't very stiff so for people who already struggle with the rubber type of earbuds are going to continue to struggle. The wrap around piece keeps it in the general location, but isn't stiff enough to hold it in the ear canal. As a result, when I'm running, I'm constantly pushing these things deeper into my ear. Without an airtight seal in my ear, the bass goes to crap and I go from listening to booming Lindsey Sterling to something out of a Super NES game...

I give my genes 1 star for giving me crappy ear canals, I can't blame the company for that. I just wish the wrap around portion was stiffer to hold it in better.

I have small ears even for most women, and after about an hour wearing them I had to start fiddling with them to keep my ears from throbbing. If they were in the right position for sound, they were awful for comfort, and vice-versa. I also noticed that they changed my ringtone (in my earpiece at least) and read out the number calling - fine if you like that, but I get so many junk calls at work that I have my ringer off for most calls and I don't need to hear their numbers as I send them to voicemail.

At the $36.97 price point these are unbeatable. I use them at the gym, running outdoors, mowing the lawn, and around the house.

Pros
-Price
-Fit my ears perfectly out of the box (other earpiece sizes are also included) and, most importantly, don't fall out when I run
-No BT connection issues so far. I mostly use them with my phone in an armband (about 12" away) or in my pocket (about 3' away).
-Clear, full sound. I listen to rock, punk, country, hip-hop, podcasts, etc, everything sounds great.
-Battery life is great. I use them about an hour a day and charge them every couple of days just to be safe.
-The big, easily accessible pause button on the right earpiece is very handy.

Cons
-Just one: The cord that connects the two earpieces will twist itself into knots behind your head if you don't smooth out all the kinks before putting them on. As long as you take a second to make sure the cord isn't twisted first, you'll forget it's there. If you don't, it will eventually bunch up behind one of your ears and become very irritating.

HIGHLY recommended if you are in the market for inexpensive BT earphones to throw in your backpack, gym bag, etc.

I wear these headphones for all kinds of weather conditions and so far they work no matter what. I can use them in the gym, and they are affordable when I misplace them.

Let's just say these earbuds are great if you want two sub-woofers directly in your ear. For rock and alternative music, they sound tinny and very bassy. I've never had to use the equalizer on my phone, but I had to turn the 60 Hz frequency all the way down around -8 dB to get a normal amount of bass and increase other frequencies.

With that out of the way, the headphones powered up and paired with my phone in just a few seconds. Fit is comfortable and the wire isn't intrusive. I wish there was a way to tighten the wrap around my ears, but they'll keep them on my head in the case that they fell out of my ear. They have a good weight and design.

The extras weren't necessary, but look high quality. I don't have a micro-USB or Lightning compatible device (I have USB-C), but the cable looks very nice and allows you to switch between the two (micro-USB and Lightning). Haven't used the car charger but it looks nice; I already have a good one but I'm sure a friend will snatch these up. The case for the headphones are good quality with a nice faux carbon fiber look - great if you want to take them in a bag or backpack.

All in all, these headphones are great if you want to take your music with you, but don't expect great sound.

Update: The sound is actually decent if you heavily modify it with an equalizer, though not many people know to do this. Not sure if all apps and phones have one, but if you have Android and Google Play Music, you're good to go. Not entirely sure if I believe any of the reviews on this product - be aware.
