Improvements? Yes.
The package in the box is sort of overstuffed. I'd prefer a more organized packing.
The Senso Pouch is OK The zipper is sort of a hassle and I'd prefer a clip or velcro instead, although the zipper is more secure.
The controls in the earphones need some learning to do and you'll be OK.
The instruction and troubleshooting booklet needs a rewrite to make it somehow more informative for not so savvy customers (my case) The R vs L sign should be made more conspicuous or visible.
Awesome headphones.  Especially for the price.

If you encounter any wind at all, these headphones are not great. Wind sounds are amplified by the shape of the ear buds, making it extremely difficult to enjoy your music. I really can't run outdoors with these headphones unless there is absolutely no wind. Definitely wouldn't recommend using them while on a bicycle for the same reason.

I think senso makes other models with a smaller form factor, which may be better for outdoor use.
Gave this to my daughter for Christmas.  She is excited to try them out at the gym.

I used the earphones for about 6hrs straight listening a number of different types of music, some talk, and about 5 pod casts.  Sound quality is really good.  All the use was outside.  Although only mildly windy there was no perceptible noise picked up by the earphones.  With the buds firmly is place all outside sounds are eliminated.  My wife tried shoutin at me with my back turned.  Did not hear anything but the music.  The build quality and materials is first rate.  Finally, what is included in the box is more than I expected (i.e. multiple charging cable,ear pieces and a car charger).  I purchased with a substantial discount which made these a tremendous value, as well.
These are a much better alternative to spending hundreds on "name brand" products. Sound great and easy to set up.
Great product!
Booming sound quality and a so perfect for running.  They can be a little sensitive to the touch and for go a bit too far into my ears.  Otherwise, they get the job done,

Sound quality is really good.snd they're  Easy to use. I use in the gym and the reception was good. I have a little trouble fitting them into my ears but because they also go around my ear, they never fell out. I noticed they have different buds that I can try, so I'm sure that with a switch they'll be a great fit.

I've only used this pair twice so far while running since I just received them. Comfortable fit, good sound. A little noisy with the wind, but I switched the earbud piece to a slightly larger one and will see if that helps with the wind.  I recommend these headphones for running/jogging/walking.

Had these for a while and they stopped working/charging. I reached out to Senso directly. They got back to me right away with troubleshooting tips. When that did not work, the shipped out a new pair of headphones right always

Easy to use and good sound. I have been looking for a pair of Bluetooth earbuds for the gym and these are perfect for me. I haven’t explored all the features yet, but so far I am satisfied with my purchase. They even came with a couple of cool free gifts!

I just got them and hands down are the best headphones I've gotten I've had jaybirds jlabs beats skull candy and these are way better for the price and the fact that the company emailed me asking how did I like them they just gained a lifetime customer
I've only used it once Walmart in the yard. I think they were great, stayed in my ears, great volume.

This is my second order of the exact wireless earbuds.  I needed a second set so I could leave one at work and have the others at home.  The sound quality and battery life are quite good... much better than one would expect for the price.
Love the battery life. About 8 hours is what I am getting.  I like how comfortable they are. They stay put and do not easily shake loose. Overall "nice"

Customer service was kind enough to provide follow email.
The product arrived earlier than expected.
Overalll, great price for the items provided. (2 charging cord, car charger, case, extra buds, etc.)
Item is definitely well done and charged when received.
Sound quality is definitely above average and the battery lasts a long time.

Nice clear sound and pairs and connects super easy.  These easily will fit in a pocket or the palm of your hand so they're flexible and soft. The only complaint I have is I wish I could adjust the part that hooks over the ears.  I have small ears so the distance between the hook and the earbuds is a bit too long for my ears.
I am amazed at the quality of the sound for the price. Definitely better than what came with my iPad and phone. More comfortable as well.  Love not being teathered.
The sound is very good and so many accessories! I recommend you test these first.
Great headphones for jogging.
Love the wireless feature. Great but on deal dash

This sport bluetooth is great the Bass is like listening to 15 inch speakers in your car and the sound is great.  When you are at the gym or exercising you will block out background noise so you can focus on your exercise goal ☆

I just used these headphones at the gym for the first time today and I am absolutely blown away.  For the prize, these are an EXCELLENT pair of headphones.  The fact that I don't need to fiddle around with headphone cords is a huge plus when I'm weightlifting and running.  The sound quality are awesome and I love the volume features on the right side that make it super easy to adjust.  Overall these are such a bang for your buck!
Yeah! First pair of headphones that stay in my ears when working out.

For the money, these things are great. I sweat a lot so I never expect my headphones to last too long but, when these go, I'll be buying another pair. They stay connected to my iPhone 8 very well. The connect is almost immediate at start-up. The bass is outstanding and the clarity of other frequencies is excellent as well. The phone calls are clear to the folks on the other end. (I always check this when I get a new pair of headphones.) This is a great product.
These are excellent reasonably priced headphones that function with great sound quality for just listening and for telephone calls!  Love these headphones!
So far, I haven't had any issues. They work great.
Minden nagyon jó.

had issue with one of the headphone and stopped working, I contacted the seller and after few email back, I received new one since it was on 1 year warranty. The headphone is really good though. recommend everyone.
Very reasonably priced, good sounding, easy to connect and use, comfortable headphones
Good product, lots of useful accessaries. I recommend it to my friend, and help her buy one more.I would say it is a good experience to use it.

Meh...everything is just - ok. The buds don't fit in my ears well, even with the smallest inserts. The part that goes over the ear doesn't do much to keep the headphones in place either. This could all just be due to my ear shape - I have small ears but they stick out like little satellites (think Will Smith with long hair). The sound is ok, nothing special. I can hear a lot of background noise with these on but this may be related to the fit. The battery life is pretty good though. I've worn them for about an hour a day for 5 days and they still show 1/4 battery life remaining. I was looking for Bluetooth headphones that I could wear while running and have them stay in place. These are not them.
I like this.it is my 3rd wireless earphone. I do not know can i use more than 1year. I could use 1year with privious one.
They no longer hold their charge after being used 4 times at the gym and sweating.
Have purchased 4 pair.  Love the sound quality, for a reasonable price.
Comfortable headphones. Excellent accessories accompany the headphones. The headphones hold about a 3 hour charge.
These are awesome for the price! Highly recommend

I've owned several pair of wireless bluetooth earbuds and these rate right up there with best of them at a much cheaper price. The sound is quite good and they are fairly comfortable. I don't use them for exercising, so I can't comment on how well the ear loops work on keeping them in place during vigorous activity, but they seem to stay put pretty well when I'm just moving about the house.  I had a bit of trouble pairing them with the two devices I connected with so far, but with some persistence I succeeded eventually. So, if you but these and have a similar problem keep trying and if you are like me you'll finally succeed. Once I did make the successful pairing they have connected flawlessly ever since. I would recommend them to my friends who are in the market for wireless earbuds.  I can't comment yet on how long the battery charge lasts because I've only used them for a few hours, but so far they have lasted at least 3 - 4 hours on the initial charge.  Failing batteries (which aren't replaceable) after just two years is what caused me to replace my last set of wireless earbuds (another company).
Fantastic buds! Quality product and for the price I was able to score them at, I couldn't ask for a better sounding set!
Ease of use...good volume very comfortable fit

Just received these today, and they paired easily and work well.  Also received an email with service phone number and one year warranty information.  The phones come with a carrying case, a car charger, usb cable, mini usb/apple lightning compatible cable, extra ear tips (3 pair), and more plus clear instructions.  Excellent sound quality too.  What's not to like?

The earphones are comfortable, the battery life is as advertised, the sound is amazing, and I really liked the voice prompts when connecting/disconnecting.

However, they suffer from a major design flaw, and I've sent them back.
When I'm on conference calls, the microphone - which is located right next to the earbud - picks the sound coming out of the earbud, resulting in a feedback loop, and ultimately an echo for all other participants.

I've been on 3 separate conference calls, and the issue is very noticeable in the following scenario:
- I'm not muted and not talking
- Two (or more) other people on the call are having a conversation.

In this scenario, everyone hears an echo until I mute my line.

Too bad. I was really excited about these earphones.

I'm a bit of an audiophile and a former hip hop producer, and while I did enjoy the deep bass, the treble just isn't there. I EQ'd while connected to my phone and computer and could never balance things out properly. The bass is so intense that it really muffles anything on the rest of the spectrum. I bought these so that I could listen to music and take a phone call as needed while at the office, but the mic quality is awful. I attempted to make a couple phone calls in my office at work and my home office and the audio was so poor that using them for calls simply wasn't an option. I returned them and purchased a similar item.

The positives: they have great battery life. Although I didn't use them for long phone calls, I did listen to music on them for 7+ hours a day and found that the battery life on them was around 9 hours, which was more than I expected. They charge quick and are easy to use. The additional accessories were really nice to have, so I'm disappointed that I had to send them back.
My son loves them! he said they were comfortable and sounded great! Thanks so much for the quick delivery!

I bought these because I liked the price, and read some reviews about them. Going from Beats to these - I miss my beats . The sound quality isn’t the best . When I try to sync with Bluetooth sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. The volume can’t just be low, it will just go off. They aren’t the most comfortable in my ear . I was hoping for the best , but was really disappointed.
Comfortable fit, and  buttons are easily accessible while wearing.  Sounds amazing and stays in place during my entire workout and 5 miles jog.
These sound really good and pair up easy. I like how functional they have made the buttons and the accessories that comes with them is a nice bonus.
Owned less than a year and they just stopped working

The headphones are pretty nice, a sleek design that you can put away and take anywhere. However, If you wear glasses like me then you might have to mitch and match earbud sizes so that one side doesn't back out of your ear if you so happen to have one irregular ear shape. The dual ported car charger is nice as well, I haven't run using it on the headphones just yet, but I have used it to charge my cell phone and tablet with little to no problem whatsoever.

Pros:
-Very long lasting battery life.
-Pretty darn loud, I can only listen to them at half volume which also helps save battery usage.
-Comes with nice accessories that are multifunction and can be used on other devices.
-A great carrying case that helps protect your headphones if you need to store them in a safe place, I normally just toss them in and put the case in my pocket.

Cons:
-If you are using this on a certain android device like an Amazon Fire tablet then you should be sure to download an app called Bluetooth Connect and Play, you will need to assign the headset to control your preferred music app since the headphones have an issue with starting the pre-installed basic music program on your device by default everytime you pause and start tracks. Which is very annoying when you have to take your phone or tablet out just to restart your preferred player.
"Great headphones! They completely block out the sound around me. They just took a while to get my order shipped. :( Worth the wait though!"
pretty good. Not excellent, but good for the price. little bulky.
At the sound that these tiny earbuds play the sleek design and the cheap deal this is basically a steal, it's absolutely worth it if you plan on using these on a workout or to listen to at home

I actually haven't used these yet since they are a Christmas gift.  But they seem like very good quality they're packaged very nice and the package is heavy and sturdy! I can definitely tell they're not cheaply made. Ive read nothing but good reviews on these so i know they will be great!

Sadly, they don't fit. They're not adjustable, nor do of the buds fit in my ear. I took their email advice and purchased memory foam buds. Sadly, they were a waste of money, because the earphones still don't fit. May want to check out another brand if you're a member of the small ear gang.

Color me pleasantly surprised. I needed something for an overseas trip coming up, and this is even better than hoped for. Great call quality, too, which wasn't even a feature on my wish list (will be using it for power walking in the mornings, when everyone back home in the U.S. is asleep).

These are great! I was hesitant to purchase them just due to not knowing what to expect, but the pair I received are amazing. The sound quality is great and I only have to charge them maybe once every couple of weeks- and that’s with gym visits! They stay in my ears and I rarely have to adjust them.
Listen to audio books, works great unless I am running the vacuum, then it doesn’t quite muffle all the vacuum noise.

I use these for my long runs and whenever I'm working outside so I can hear my phone if/when it rings.  I have used these in the past and they have a long life.  I only replace them when one of the ear buds stop working but I probably get a full year out of them before that happens.  For the price, you can't beat that.
Awesome headphones great replacement for the beats headset.

I lost my original pair of these headphones. I LOVED them. I went ahead and just got another pair but for some reason, these just aren’t as good. They don’t loop around my ears as well for some reason. Otherwise, same good quality audio and I like that the battery lasts FOREVER.
I really liked this product while it worked. I have been using it for less than 2 months and they won't turn on any more. I'll try to make use of the warranty.
Good product so far. No static or bluetooth disconnect. 100% would recommend.

I was searching for a pair of headphones that I could use at the gym which would have a fairly decent sound quality but also a good microphone for taking calls. After doing a lot of research, the Senso headphones and their thousands of good reviews caught my attention and I said to give them a shoot. I was not disappointed at all: the quality of the materials is very good, the sound quality above expectations and so far the microphone does the job.

Everything from the packing, to the extras in the box and the headphones themselves show a lot of care for the customer and attention towards a quality product! I can only join the other happy customers and totally recommend this product.

I love these. I previously wrote a review. Sorry to say it but these are better than Beats. Both the sound and the fit. These are the best way to go. I own a swimming pool service company so I bought more of these for my guys and they love them. Seller was also great. As of this review this seller had them for the cheapest price so I bought them. Great product and great selling experience
Product ear covers were sent slightly bent and would not stay on my ears. I dont recommend these for people with smaller ears.

Although, the sound was good while they lasted my senso headphones suddenly stopped charging. I tried different placements to make the earphones charge but no luck. Also, the year warranty is not honored. I have attempted to request for a replacement pair due to this problem but customer service is no longer accessible. False advertisement at it's finest. I understand if you cannot replace a damaged item but do not promote 1 YEAR WARRANTY if you do not honor it.

First Of all,
Whats Good.
Its sound is good , and battery life is good
Whats Bad :
Noise reduction in Calls ,, Al most Zero noise reduction.
The button that increase and decrease the sound was working at the beginning but now after almost 2 weeks of use they are not working .
The main Button by clicking it one time it suppose to stop the video or the sound track , now this function is not working.

When I buy headphones, for work or play, I want good quality sound. Historically, I've bought Sennheiser and Klipsch ear buds and those are amazing! After breaking up plugs and wires I thought I'd take a shot at Bluetooth earbuds. The reviews sounded good and the cost was such that if I hated them or broke them then I wouldn't be disappointed.

The UPS guy dropped them by, I charged them up, and then synced them with my iphone. And sure enough: they sound like music made from a cardboard box: flat, lifeless, and no range. AARRGGHH!! I played with the EQ for a while and the sound may have gotten slightly better. But seriously, it's like lipstick on a pig: the sound still sucked. Bluetooth isn't really made for music but these just add further insult. I'm back to wired earbuds. I consider this experiment to be a failure.

Sound quality of these headphones is great.  I was genuinely surprised for the price at the overall quality.  The only thing that I still struggle with and it is not really for the fault of the headset is that despite getting several ear pieces I still do not get a good tight fit.  The ear loops definitely help keep them in place when working out, but I just can't get them to fit well in my ears.
Good sound quality,  comfortable

I wanted a bluetooth earphones set for sometime and I bought Senso because of the reviews and cost.
I was not disappointed. The earphones last for a while and I like how they block out the noise around me.
The only downside was that the earphones stopped connecting in Nov. 2018. I contacted the company
and they sent me a new one. I don't know why the old ones stopped, but I've very happy with the
product and service.
Broke after two months. Would not turn on when charged.
Well done Senso
Easy to install

I was using 2.4ghz wifi settings before I got these... the signal interference was ridiculous! Every time my iPhone would connect to the wifi, the earbuds cut in and out without regard to distance. After swapping to the 5ghz wifi settings, no issues.
Battery life is fantastic and they have a great sound. But they are very loud
Muy buenos auriculares, buena calidad de sonido, buen tiempo de carga.
I mean, these aren't that expensive, but it just fell apart about 3 weeks after the return window closed.

Perfect for working out. I used them when I run and they stay put. Plus the battery run time seems to be very good as well. They are light and pretty comfortable. One thing to note is they come with interchangeable rubber tips so you can adjust as needed which is nice. Also, another added bonus is the USB car charger (which has two USB ports). Sound quality is okay (not a lot of deep rich sounds) but my primary concern was comfort and ability to stay in my ears while running/working out. Perfect price point for these.
Was going to get Beats or Bose but couldn’t bring myself to pay that much so took a chance on these and glad I did! The sound quality is great and they stay put in your ears. Highly recommend.

Unfortunately, after only a few weeks of use, these headphones have stopped working. The left side cuts in and out. However, the seller offered me tips to get them working again. When those things didn't work, the headphones were replaced. Great customer service.

Have not had the item long enough to really give a detailed report but so far they are working fantastic. Pairing with my Galaxy phone was very easy and very quick. They are very easy to use and a very comfortable on my ears and the sound quality is excellent.
Sound quality is great.  Reviews speak for themselves.. would recommend.
OK for the price. The sound is good but there is an intermittent drop in signal that only lasts for a second or so. Battery life is very good.
absolutely the best Bluetooth i ever bought .. sound great laud and clear .. love it

really great sounding ear buds with plenty of bass response.. comfortable with flexible ear grips and options for ear bud sizes...comes with bonus material including magnetic car vent mount and wallet card (not sure how that works tho?)
highly recommended esp at price

I’ve had three pairs of these now. Each stopped holding a charge at about the six month mark. Unfortunately, there was almost no indication the failure was coming, so they’ve died on me out on a long run (while traveling no less) and in the middle of workouts each time. Obviously, I’ve kept buying them. At the price, it was a bit simpler to just get another pair vs. taking a chance on a set multiple times the price with questionable reliability. However, the third pair is my last – time to give something else a shot.

In fairness, for a little over $20, quickly shipped to your door, you get a decently usable set of headphones and a useful magnet mount phone accessory. For what it is, it’s crazy cheap. But with that, it will eventually fail on you. Just know what you are getting and have some kind of backup (e.g. wired headphones).

Bought in January...broke completely in May. Put on charger, everything was usual and when I came back to get them they wouldn't turn on.  4-5 months of little use.... Should have just sunk the Money into decent headphones.

Compared to the other expensive sets out there , this one is fabulous! for 35 bucks this thing is a steal.. It has been a week since i have started using this... save  your money buying beats or the other expensive one from Bose....

I did hours of research before I bought these headphones and am so disappointed! The good aspects are that they were comfortable on my ears and didn't fall out. The other good is the company was very responsive when I emailed my problems, The problems? Reception deteriorated when I was 10 feet away from my phone but in the same room. Controls very difficult to feel and to use. Charging port didn't work. No way to tell how much charge is left.  No mute function. Noise cancelling very limited. I ended up returning them and buying LG Tone Pro 770, which is an "around the neck" bluetooth set up, great to use, just $5 more than Senso.
Bought for my 22 year old son for Christmas...he LOVES these headphones!  I wasn't sure what to order for Bluetooth iPhone 7 compatable headphones, my son's review is 5 star!

These worked great for me when I was sitting at my desk and tried them out initially. When I got a chance to use them for a daily walk I ran into all kinds of dropouts and choppiness. I have a Samgung Note 5 and play music with Spotify and use the Zombie's Run to motivate my exercise. These headphones stutter and drop out constantly. I thought it was a bad network connection so I turned off my wireless and that didn't help at all
When I plug in wired headphones everything is OK.

I wish I had found this out before the return-period had passed. Now I'm stuck with them. Glad I bought them on sale.
Works great. They are eassy to use
The Sense bluetooth headphones are great. Delivery was quick, easy to connect, fit well and the sound is very good.

I think you could use a smaller box to ship them in but other than that nothing else is wrong. It came pre charged and the user guide was simple enough to read. So far these are the loudest earbuds I've bought and I love it! The sound is clear, the fit comfortably and they come with charging cables which is awesome! Though I'm writing a review the same day I got them so in about a month or two or if I spot a malfunction with them I will review them again but I'll talk to the company first if they malfunction.

I've had a hard time finding a pair of headphones that don't fall out while I'm working.  These fit snugly (after putting a smaller earpiece) into my ear and the best part is the way you can mold the piece that goes over your ear to fit firmly.  They can be a little troublesome to get on but once they are on they work great! Getting a second pair for my husband who works in construction

I've tried several bluetooth headphones, these are my faves for any type of cardio. Lightweight, dependable, super simple intuitive controls, long (enough) play time per battery charge, and truly sweatproof. The "over the ear" loops are flexible and rubbery - if you're like me, and wear a headband as well as glasses, that design is a lot more comfortable than the harder, rigid designs.

Headphones was dead on arrival. not charging.
money has been refunded.

They are awesome! The price was great. Got them the day they said they would be here. Very easy to set up when you really aren't a techno guru. Love them. They fit in my ears! Thanks for making my walks enjoyable!

I have had these for about a week and I love them!  They are so easy to use, the sound is awesome and they feel great.  The little buttons that change volume, change tracks, and pause or shut off are all very easy to find and use.  This is seriously the best headphones I have ever used.  Today while listening at work, I walked all around our floor while leaving my phone at my desk, and the connect was barely disturbed.  It was well over 30 feet with lots of walls, desks, computers, etc., in the way.  They are amazing.  I'm still trying to see what the actual battery life is.  Today they only lasted the morning, but I'm not sure they were fully charged so I'll keep testing that aspect.  The 2-hour charge time is great though.  The case and other accessories are also very nice to have.  Thank you Senso people for making  such a wonderful product!!  :)
Great for regular exercise but absolutely do not work for swimming as was advertised. Sound cuts in and out
Great. Easy to set up and lots of extras in box. Little bigger in ear than I thought. Def value for money. Would buy again.
These buds are crystal clear and stay on perfectly.
Very happy and satisfied with product
Good sound quality and when i emailed tech support for an issue they helped me quick and effectively.

Comfortable, easy connect to Bluetooth,
Delivers good sound but if the wind is blowing when you run with these you get a lot of wind sound leaking through.

Also if you bend over to touch your toes during a work-out and your Bluetooth device is in your back hip pocket, the sound cuts out until you get back up.
Battery life is average to short. A good value, great sound.

fits well, sounds great and an amazing price.
lots of extras make this a great deal. ( I have not taken
them under water)
They were great. Unfortunately they stopped working after only 7 months
Very good I like the big on off button on the side and the voice notification when you turn them on and off... so far the best I've ever had and I've gone through a lot

I watched a video on the headphones before I purchased them in the review section that helped me chose these and he was right. I like them quite a bit. My only concern is at times the volume goes down suddenly without any adjustment. I've tried turning them on and off and the volume does not come back. Also when using the Bluetooth feature, sometimes people tell me they hear an echo on their end however my end is crystal clear.
completely satisfied
Works well with phone but music quality is bad. Music has noticeable lag between ears.
I love my Senso headphones! I use them primarily at the gym, they stay securely in place while exercising and sound great.
I received items different than what is shown on the images of product.

Really enjoying my headphones! I like the choice of 3 size earpieces (most come with one pair, which are too big for my ears and dont stay in well) the small fits fine. Sound is great, much better than my last 2 pairs of wireless headphones. Good job blocking out noise when listening to music. Like the cute little case.

I purchased these for my wife and she absolutely loves them. They stay put during her workouts and the sound quality is pretty darn good. I like the fact that there are no controls in the wire itself " usually causing the wire to pull to one side". I'll definitely be buying a pair for myself.

I just opened these (Senso Bluetooth Headphones) The packaging is gorgeous and you can read and understand the instructions. Easy to read and decent sized print which is important to me because my eyes are not that strong. I listened to Pandora on my phone with these earphones and the sound was wonderful. I then called a friend and she could here me well. It has noise cancellation. I like the curved over the ear wires because they hold the ear buds securely in place. My experience with ear buds without the wire over the ear always seem to fall out of my ears when exercising etc.

They also include a long charging cord and a short charging cord, a double USB port to connect to the car power, a nice attractive carry case etc. A lot of thought went into the packaging, the instructions the design etc.

In the past I have had Plantronics and other fancy brands and none of them compare to these and the price for these is incredibly low. Given the low price I did not expect this quality but it is there.

I have only put them on and tried them this evening. I do not know how they will last but given the design I expect they will perform well over time.

I love how great these sound.  My only issue is that I wanted them for running.  It worked fine when the weather was cold and I wore a hat but now that the weather is better they don't stay in my ears very well.  I realize we all have differently shaped ears but there is no way to customize it to mine.  I am constantly adjusting during my entire run...what a bother!
Ear buds did not fit well in my ears but it still provided decent sound. Battery life was good.
Excellent-nice design, great sound quality and very high quality materials . Easy to get on and off. Love them!
Pairing was easy. I didn't like the default audio settings treble too tinny. Made adjustments in Control Panel and the audio now is perfect. Glad I bought this product.

Overall these are what I expected. I was not sure if I would like the around the ear style but I find it very comfortable. Easy to use. It syncs easily to my iPhone 6.
My only issue so far is that the lowest volume level is a still to loud.

I waited to write a review until I had used these for a week or so.  Today I sat on conference calls for 3+ hours then worked out and listened to music and an interval app for an hour.  It wasn't until the cool down that I got an alert that the battery was low!  The sound is great on these!  My workout was full of up and down movements, jumping jacks, etc and these headphones did not budge--sweating and all!!  I purchased these based on the top review and he did not lie!!  I have told several friends about these--some that workout and some that are on calls a lot during the day.  The case, chargers and car charger with adapter were amazing bonuses!!!  Amazing deal! Very pleased!!!
I've had many different head phones, but this is by far the best!  I've referred this item to several at work and all love it!

These are the best bluetooth headphones I have ever owned.  They are comfortable, and stay in place...and great sound.  I waa especially impressed with the reception.  I walked all around our house, which is fairly large with basement and upstairs, and the sound was perfect.  Great buy and they were delivered as promised. The packaging and accesso were nice, too.
The headset are working fine and very happy with the product and quick delivery.
Love these headphones. Just what I was looking for
Work well so far.
Great product, great price. I've had them for about 3 weeks now and they are pretty good. Good sound and stay on for weight lifting or cross training, fit tight. Great wireless headphones.

I REALLY want to like these headphones. The sound and fit is fantastic (for the price). The headphones also lasted a LONG time without needing a recharge and always recharged fast. I even bought a few pairs as gifts for other family members, as I was initially VERY impressed.

Fast forward a few months, and there are some problems. The bluetooth pairing is getting weird, and is no longer convenient or automatic. About half the time, you have to go into your bluetooth settings and make your iPhone forget the device in order to get these headphones to actually connect to the bluetooth. Another issue is that these headphones no longer hold or take a charge very well. They aren't lasting nearly as long on a charge, and it's becoming normal for these headphones not to charge fully, regardless of how long they were plugged in. My headphones, specifically, are dead because they will not take a charge from either provided cable.

All in all, they're not really worth the price. Poor build quality makes these otherwise great headphones worthless.

[Update: I emailed Senso about my issues and concerns. An actual person replied back, on the same day. Senso support is great to work with; I’d give them an A+. After checking a few things, Senso decided to send me a new pair of headphones. I received that new pair within a week of my last contact with them. I’m excited to see how long this pair lasts. I updated my star rating to reflect this.]

These headphones are a breeze to set up and fit very well with the multitude of different silicone adapters for the earpieces. The sound quality, however, is just OK. The bass response is very good, but vocals and highs leave much to be desired (they sound somewhat distant and hollow). The included case, lightning/micro usb cable, and car charger are a nice bonus.
The reviews were good for these headphones which is why I purchased them. They meet and exceeded my expectations. I love them!

I've had a  few pairs of wireless headphones in the past and have been disappointed in their performance. I thought I would give it one more try to find something  that would be comfortable and sound terrific for my workouts. After reading the reviews on the these and seeing how reasonably priced they were I figured I would take a chance on them. I'm so glad I did. Not only are they comfortable they sound terrific. They come with a 1 year warranty and the box comes with charging cords and a charging adapter. Give these headphones a shot. You wont regret it.
Battery life is awesome, fit perfect in my ear, I loved.
Impressive, quality headphones! Unfortunately, Bluetooth problems with my phone made pairing impossible. Returning, but will re-order when phone issue resolved or have new phone.
I bought these to wear at the gym. They sound great and fit so well, I barely notice that I am wearing them. A total steal.
Ordered this product based on a recommendation and have been happy so far.  These were a fraction of the price of beats and are perfect for my needs.

Awesome head phones, some songs bass is too heavy and distorts music a little bit. 98% of songs do sounds amazing though. Great alternative to beats which I’ve owned and lost numerous times. Bluetooth range is great as well.
Great product. Sound really good. Easy to pair to Bluetooth device. Love the Red and Black colors!

I want to like them for a lot of reasons, but I don't. The nit picky issue is that the little plastic flap that covers the charger doesn't fit back well again after you take it out to charge.

The real issue, though, is that the range is awful. I am six foot two and if I have my phone in my back pocket and turn my head, the sound starts to cut out. So it is a little less than a three foot range, unacceptable.

Edit:

I am still not sure what the issue is, but I left my phone sitting on my desk the other day and wandered off and found I got a good 10 to 12 feet before there was an issue. Yet when the phone is in my back pocket or my backpack 24 inches away I get weird sound issues whenever I turn my head. I am upgrading to three stars as there are no issues when the phone is not somehow covered.

Incidentally, I have tried this with different phones so I do not suspect it is a defect in the phone.

Excellent sound quality for what you pay and solid battery life. I bought my first pair and loved them so much I bought a second after they got stolen after 2 weeks at the gym. The second pair came with broken ear piece and was easily refunded. Got my 3rd pair 2 months ago and now they can’t stay connected to my phone for an entire song. I have no issue with my wireless headset or my blue tooth speakers or my vehicle connecting to my phone so I know it’s the ear buds. They definitely aren’t made to last and at the price I can’t say I’m shocked. If you hardly use ear buds these are a great option, if like me you use them daily for an hour or more look for something better that will last.
Only had them a few days, but they are great so far. I lost my more expensive pair, but actually like these better. Great sound and great value.
I love these headphones. These sound amazing!

I just got these and I love the way that they fit. Sound quality is excellent and most of all the battery life is long enough for me. I was hesitant at first but this bluetooth headphones are definitely worth the price I paid for.
Came quickly, packaged nice, the sound quality is fantastic and the Bluetooth connection is good.
These are the best bluetooth ear buds this is my second set because I wore out my first pair from overworked walking they fit perfectly even running
Um these SENSO head sets are good. Yeah good, really.

features matters to me:
can save pairing for 2 devices. I can pair this on my windows tablet and my android cellphone. switching devices requires you to manually connect to the bluetooth devices, on windows that is playback devices - right click bluetooth earphone - connect instead of going to bluetooth settings.
battery is approximately 5 hours.
sound quality was having some trouble at bass at first, then somehow fixed itself after charging. I'm no expert chasing that hifi quality, so this works fine.
awesome sound, great product!
Upper part that wraps around the ear okay but the noise cancellation and music is second to none!
Great product for the value.

I have used these bluetooth ear buds two times on an evening run. They paired with my IPhone perfectly and I have yet to have difficulty with the single dropping during a run or work out.. However,  I am not thrilled with the sound quality. The higher frequency is lacking, which makes the music very muffled, the bass and the midlevels are decent.
I have had the worst experience with this product. Went from being a good cheap Earphones , to only one side work. Then to  only turning on not connecting to not charging. Negative 5 stars....
I had these before but they stopped charging. The new pair seems to work even better. Sounds wonderful and easy to pair with my iPad.

I couldn't get the mic to work beyond a bare whisper. Tried to reset the headset and everything. The clarity of sound in the headphones seemed good, but no one on the other end could hear me, even with my phone within 1/2 foot of me.

Sound great.  Adjusted base as suggested in another review and it helped.  Accidentally ran them through the wash on sanitary cycle and they stopped working (though still had power).  Contacted support.  Told me to do a factory reset (plug in and hold down power button 7 seconds, unplug and turn on).  And then re-pair (forget pairing and follow steps to re-pair).  They work!  Yay!

I don't love these headphones. I have to keep messing with them so that they stay in my ears and to get the best sound. After using them for an hour, I had to take them out because my ears hurt. No wonder they are so cheap.
These were for my son's birthday and he is happy with them.  Thank you!
really impressed with these earbuds so far
they do not work. 2 months out of warranty. they do not care.

I have had these headphones for almost a month now, and am still impressed with the excellent quality sound. They fit my needs very well for providing a bluetooth earphone/microphone combination. The rubber "over ear" pieces are very comfortable. The battery life listed is accurate, and they recharge quickly. I use these headphones for listening to music and for over-the-Internet teaching, and this equipment makes it so much easier to hear clearly and to talk with my students. Because I have really tiny ear canals when I was having problems getting the earbuds for these headphones to stay in my ears, the Senso company suggested I purchase "extra small" memory foam replacement earphone tips. I bought [ASIN:B00659KQSG 3 Pairs, Black - fits extra small to small ears - "Squish Fit" memory foam earphone cushions by Earphones Plus] which fit perfectly and enable me to successfully use earbuds for the first time in my life! The customer service from Senso was prompt and informative. I highly recommend the Senso company and these headphones.
Bad, bad, bad ... Thumbs down! I cannot get them to work

So far so good. Just have to be mindful to charge the battery fully before an event away from home. Used it yesterday while running a half marathon and got the low battery alert after about 2 hours into the event before it died. Had been listening off and on the day before and thought I had 8 hours of use to work with so was not vigilant about the time. Other than that the product works well and the carrying case is handy. The easy to read laminated instructions are nice too.
Really sweat proof and has a great sound. The battery life could be longer but its long enough for my workout.
Senso headphones work just fine! I like that it came with a case!

I use this while exercising at home, and wanted something to be able to move freely without being teethered.
I decided on this one, but it's larger than the old one that I had, which had no battery life left.
Despite trying the different size silicone tips, I find it doesn't stay in my ear super well. I find I'm always tweaking the shape of the over the ear lobe piece, but it doesn't retain it's shape real well, and no matter what I try it doesn't sit tightly around my ear.
The extra stuff it came with was awesome! Sound is decent but for wireless headphone I do like them

They are just what I was looking for. I like the fact that they attach to the earlobes, so there are no problems with the buds falling out when I am working out. The company was also really great about following up with an email to ensure that they arrived on time and that there were no issues with the delivery or the product. Thank you Tekatron, you guys rock!

So I loved this headphone initially but recently I have been having some problems with the Bluetooth. Everytime I put my phone ( iPhone 6 ) in my pocket the sounds cuts. I've tried resetting multiple times..
So far so good! Nice headphones
These stopped working after about 3 months.

For 19.99 I thought it was going to be just ok. It was more then ok, it was a good buy! The battery feels like it last forever, blue tooth connect right away, and the incoming call and notifications where on point. I applaud Senso, why spend 200 for some ear buds when for just 20 dollars you can het a long lasting, comfortable product. Good product indeed, a must buy!
Great earphones!
Great headphones. I use them everyday at work. Music sounds great also the Bluetooth for phone calls is really nice. Good price

Very good sound quality.  Easy to pair with my phone (Samsung Galaxy S8).  Will take time to familiarize with all the features.  These are the first wireless headphones I have purchased and so far I am very pleased and would recommend them.
I am a woman and my ears are small and the buds do not stay in. Good quality otherwise!

My only complaint with these is that if you walk a short distance away from your device they're synced to that they start to fade in and out. Sound is great! I work at a textile job and it is constantly noisy with all of the machines and with these in I barely hear the humming of the machines.

Excellent product. Use mainly for outdoor work and this product fits my needs perfectly. Easy to use, fit is fine, holds a charge for 6-7 hours maybe longer (I always put them back on the charger when I'm done using them). Accepting incoming calls is very easy with this device and the caller can hear me perfectly-device announces the phone number for the incoming call so I can determine if I want to accept the call prior to answering.
I did have a problem with the charging mechanism on the first pair, but I contacted the company and a replacement pair was shipped out immediately with no problem at all-I had the replacement within 3-4 days. Great value for the price-I would highly recommend this product.

I have been looking for affordable Bluetooth headsets forever. After trying literally 5 different kinds my search is over. These are great! They are comfortable, they actually stay in my ears when exercising and so far seen to muffle background noise when on the phone. I haven't tested them as noise canceling on the plane yet ( another reason I bought them) but early indications are they will be great. Stay tuned...
I was a little hesitant to buy this brand at first as I had not heard of them previously.  I am quite surprised with the  build quality and the sound.
Very pleased with the sound quality, functionality, and price. I will definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for a headset.

Fantastic bluetooth headphones! Great battery life!
I listen to music all day with them and they stay charged the whole time.
I have weird ear canals and many eardbuds/headphones occasionally fall out; with the over the ear they don't get far.

The only downside is the strap the connects the two sides was tightly bound with a rubber band during shipping and it's permanently kinked, that means the strap snags on clothing when I turn my head. (Pencil is pointing at the kink in the photo)
Not impressed.  Crappy product.

Unfortunately, these did not work for me, in spite of me hoping they would due to the low price point. First of all, I had no problem with the audio quality indoors. I did change the iPhone to low base for a more true sound, as they were pretty base heavy out of the box. But I downgraded the rating for these two reasons; 1) The over-ear loops were way too big for me, and not adjustable. They actually rode completely above my ears (I do have small ears). 2) The biggest complaint is the amount of wind noise they pick up. I ran on a completely calm morning, but just the air movement caused by me running was amplified in the headphones and quite annoying. I cannot imagine what these would be like on a bicycle where actual speed or wind was present. Granted, after a little while, you may get used to the wind noise and you can always just turn the volume up higher, but those did not seem like reasonable compromises to me. I returned the headphones and will seek a different option. Note, I am coming from a $140 pair of Jaybirds which I really liked, but they finally died and I was hoping to replace without spending a large sum of cash. I ordered a $50 pair of Phaiser BHS-750 and we'll see what they are like.
Love them!!  Works great every time!

The quality of the sound is very high. When the Bluetooth connection starts the sound brakes up for 5 - seconds, then it stabilizes. The buds is coming out of the ears all the time. I tried changing the eartips but couldn't solve this problem.
These work very well and excellent sound quality. Got them for the gym and they stay in my ears really nice

Great headphones. These volume of these actually goes high unlike other Bluetooth headphones. Had an issue with them, and received a response immediately, and the issues was solved quickly and promptly

I bought two..one for my boyfriend and one for me. I am a very frugal spender. I couldn't believe I was paying 35 $ for some headphones,but you know what? No regrets. Easy hook up. Last OVER 8 hours (which means they last longer than my cell phone.) I am getting my money's worth cause i wear them everywhere. Dunno if so far they are water resistant, but they say they are, and sweat proof. If not ill change my rating later. But these are a must buy AND a great gift. I never leave comments. But the president sent the most diligently, meaningful email asking me too. If I see this companies name on anything, I trust it and will buy it no questions asked. When you finish reading my review go ahead, click and order. Cause I couldn't wait for ours to arrive. Enjoy! I know I do.
Jerrica
Sound is great.These arrived as advertised. Included unexpectedly was a second charging cable and a car cigarette lighter USB charger.

I bought it five months ago and the device was great, but this week the rainy season started, I went cycling and ended up wetting the device.  Now it doesn't work anymore.  It was good while it lasted.  For those who practice outdoor sports, I recommend a waterproof one.

I only recently received my new wireless earbuds but I love them already. They were delivered quickly and everything has been as promised. They have great sound, they are comfortable and the additional items like car charging block and extra earbud covers are a great bonus.

If you are looking for great noise cancellation, this is not it. But if you are looking for a portable bluetooth earbud for a light workout, this would be perfect. It's light, the cables don't snag, it pairs really easily with any device, and bluetooth will stay connected for a good few feet (but too far and it will drop). It is what it is for the price and it's great for what it is.
I have bought several pairs of wireless headphones and these are by far the best values!  I liked them so much I bought another pair for my husband.

They're loud. Some may not think that's a bad thing, until they need to turn them down. On an iPhone you have to have at least 3 boxes of volume before they work, you go any lower than that, they'll beep and switch off. Sometimes stuff is uncomfortably loud and you just have to deal with it.

These earphones work well.  They are a bit uncomfortable at times with the ear tip that was on when they arrived, but there are other sizes provided so I'll have to figure out which one works best for me.  I also wish that the part that hooks on the back of the ear was a bit softer, but all in all, these work well and the sound is very good.  They synch easily with my iphone and I'm really glad I bought them.

I use these while traveling, working out, and doing yard work.  They work great.  The only con I have is that it seems like when it's connected to my phone it always reads 90% (sometimes it shows 70% but rare) then out of nowhere seems to beep and indicate it needs to be charged.  Don't get me wrong, the battery life is great and gives you hours of life but it's hard to gauge how much life is left.  Would recommend!
Love these headphones.  Excellent as I use them between my smart devices and or laptop. Perfect price; great clarity

Just received my headphones the other day. They arrived securely packaged and well before the delivery window closed. After charging, they were easy to pair with my iPhone. They are comfortable and stay in the ear. It did take a while to learn the controls because the buttons are multifunctional, but they do work the way the instructions indicate. As for the sound, they sound good, but I wish they had more bass. For the price, though, these headphones are well worth every penny. Hopefully, they will last a long time.

Amazing headphones. I bought these after pulling my wired set off my ears over and over. They are so easy to set up. I leave my Bluetooth on so when I power these on they immediately connect to my phone. The sound quality is great. I've never bought really expensive headphones so I can't compare these to any other but I definitely enjoy the sound. Also I love that these go around my ears and can be molded to fit tightly on my ears. I can't wear earphones that stay inside the ear. They always fall out and my left is smaller than my right ear hole. With this set I don't have to worry about them falling out. They are also very comfortable.
Great quality.

I've never used wireless headphones before. I had some old noise cancellation wired headphones that went bad on me. I replaced them with the Senso Bluetooth Headphones & I am not disappointed. They have a great sound and are easy to use. My only complaint is that I prefer foam earbuds that are moldable to your ears, where I feel I can get a deeper bass response and a better protection against noise.

So I purchased these and the same version sold by Otium for 50% less money, and the Otium's were much better quality sound.  Either I got a bad pair, or this firm is riding on its past reputation.  I suggest you buy both, compare them, and return the one you dislike.

They sound good, but they don't fit that well. They also broke and I lost the sound in one of the ears but was able to get it replaced for free without any issues. Unfortunately, my new pair also started having the same issue after only a few months.. It seemed like one of the connecting wires broke inside both times, as one ear was great, they other would turn on/off as I just wiggled the wires.
I'm happy with my purchase

Beautiful packaging and they seem to be excellent so far (6 days in).

I did notice that if I'm riding at high speed on my bicycle, the air catches the earbuds funny and makes a whistling sound. It's hearable if you don't have music playing.

But for Running / working out (which is what I use them for) they are perfect.
Product is a good value, and very easy to set up.  The packaging is well designed and canotes  value.  My initial impression of the Senso brand is very positive.
Garbage.. broke after three months of use. This is unacceptable. Don't buy these, pay more and get better ones.

This is now the second pair I have bought that has stopped working after a few months for no apparent reason. I'd love to have these replaced or be reimbursed the $60 dollars I have now spent on this product.
These are amazing. They have great sound and battery life. Very comforatble and yeah all around perfect. I had doubts but i would buy again.
Really nice sound, comfort and ergonomic controls.

These headphones have incredible sound quality. I was also impressed by the battery life. They are very simple to use and are far more convenient than the older wired headphones. Just bought a second set for my wife!
these are so easy to use! and the sound is good!.. very very happy

Ear pieces are not adjustable so they don't stay on your ear very well. And I have an awful hard time keeping them connected to my iPod if my iPod is not in my pocket. Sound is okay as long as the iPod or phone is within 5 feet of you but if you go much further than that they get staticy and disconnect
Great little set with nice, clear sound

I've now gone through 2 pairs of these, the first pair which invotek replaced with a second pair. Then, the second pair died of apparently the same randomness.  They just quit working one day out of the blue, a couple of times they quit in the middle of a workout.
The Sensor earbuds work great, however. I can not get the Bluetooth to voice activate.
I would not recommend this product. I used it not more than 10 times and it stopped working.
Won't charge. micro usb won't fit in the buds.
The flexible ear part takes forever to form around your ear. It is quite annoying as people buy these for exercise. Other than that the sound is pretty good for earbuds.
The sound is great and they have a far range, but they are somewhat uncomfortable and don't stay in my ears well. A bit too big for me.
These are amazing!  Put them on, put my phone down, walked around the house listening to music and never even got a glitch of reception loss.
Had for 3 days now.  Works well, light weight.  Battery live good. Amazing piece of technology.
35% of the time they cut in & out a lot....  beeps in your ear as it cuts in & out.  intolerable.  works good when it does work.  think I'll upgrade to Bose, use the for
The sound quality is like a bad walkie talkie very disappointed
These head phones are comfortable and are easily workable for when I do my running routine in the mornings during the week. They have great volume and don't fall out of my ears.
Sound good, good price, good fit, can take calls with them and calls are clear.

So far I have been very pleased with the SENSO ear buds, the sound quality and comfort are exceeding my expectations. I was also impressed with the accessories that came with this set and so far the customer service has been great.

First off, the headphones are decent for the price, my only hesitation on a 5 star is due to limited treble. That said, they still produce great sound, block external sound and are comfortable to wear. The Seller is amazing. Unlike any other I have dealt with. I had an issue, sent them an email and they responded within minutes. Great customer service!

****UPDATE - After using these for about six months, I have to remove another start. I get interference ALL THE TIME while at a heavily populated gym. Whenever someone is within close proximity to me with Beats headset, these are almost unusable.
I've worked out with these a few times now and think they're really great! They do a good job of blocking out other sounds and they are flexible so they can fit anyones ear!
I've purchased a few pairs of the sesno ear buds throughout the years. The quality has taken a major hit. Nowhere near as loud and the sound quality is way down.

I was so excited when I ordered these because I had not trouble getting to connect to my phone or computer via bluetooth, and was impressed with the bluetooth range (I could walk around my apartment no problem without compromising sound. However, within weeks of using the headphones, one of the earbuds fell off. I was able to place it back together, but it was such a drag to have to do it over and over. Pretty soon after that, sound stopped playing from that ear bud, and then the front end of it fell off, so I was running around with just one work ear bud. I was excited because these ear buds were recommended for runner and did not break my budget, but I now realize it might be better to place down more money for a sturdier, albeit more expensive, product. Very frustrated!
I recently lost my original headphones in flood waters. They were great to use so this new headphones were to replace the loss.
Just got them and went for a long run!  Super great. Stayed in place and was able to clearly hear my news podcasts as well as awesome sound for my music. Very happy!
very solid product for the price!
Out of the box, easy pairing. SOUND is amazing. I walked about 30 feet before I lost signal from my phone.\ Easy to work. price was nice too!

The product is awesome!  I have hearing issues but due to the range of volume, I have no problem with hearing all the dialogue on Netflix.  FYI, I tried two other brands and they don’t come close to these.

I was excited to receive these headphones and looked forward to using them. I put my iPhone in my pocket and listen to audiobooks on YouTube.

The sound would keep cutting in and out. The tech guy at target and a genius at Apple told me that the metal in my artificial hip was interfering with the signal and there isn’t really an solution. So, I’m sure the headphones are fine but I’m really disappointed that I can’t use them.
the worst headphones I have ever bought. the sound is the worst and the audio quality of the calls is horrible.
Back up to my mpow’s.  Good enough to keep the work distractions away.

Headphones work great, but since they are small, a bit easier for something to happen.  Mine got hung up and broke in vacuum.  Recommend using included protective case when not in use.  Sound quality and battery life are both excellent for the price; in the few times I got to use them.

Bought two for my wife and I over two years ago to use while exercising in the gym.  Use them for ~1 hr 5-7x/week.  No problems so far.  Connects quickly and sounds ok to us.  I like that they are secure on our ears unlike ear buds which we cannot stand. We are not audiophiles just looking for a quality sound for a reasonable price.  Recommend.

I paid full amazonian price for this item, and my views here are strictly based on my experience with the product.

Pros:
-Insanely good value: comes with car charger, a nice case, different sized earbuds, a dual lighting/micro USB cable, another (shorter) micro USB cable, a coupon and a one year warranty.
-The Headphones have tangle-free wire and very soft and comfortable ear loops (unlike the hard plastics that others use).
- These sound great, the volume is one of the highest I've heard on bluetooth, and the sound is punchy, clear and responsive.
- Perfect for what I use it for. Gym time...8hrs of juice gives me about a week of use without having to recharge. They don't move or fall out on any of my workouts.
- I have a smart watch, and use this to take calls while I'm working out, feel like James Bond. Works really well if you are also using to call or receive calls.

Cons:
- These aren't $500.00 headphones. If you are an audiophile that is looking for super accurate sound, you will have to shell out to get that. You will get great sound especially if you listen to more bass oriented music.

Conclusion: There are few ways to spend ~$30 and get this kind of a haul. I repeat these are great sounding headphones, probably one of the best sounding bluetooth devices I have used. I'm very impressed with these headphones, and you will be too.
Great headphones, great price. Lots of extras included.
Great sound but battery life is a bit low. 4hrs aprox.

As you can probably tell from the title of this review I am impressed with my purchase. Aside from the amount of accessories that this product came with the headphones in cells are very lightweight and easy to wear. Pairing was easy and the sound quality is impressive given the connection. I have already recommended this product to a number of my friends and coworkers.

It's hard to tell how good the sound quality is--these earphones don't fit in my ears. The design is horrible. I can only imagine they tested them with one subject--an elephant named, Dumbo! These things are gigantic and unwieldy.  I do not recommend purchasing them.
The volume buttons came off after a few months. Hopefully the company reaches out if they can replace this for me but I'm not sure to reach out directly.
Love these buds. What I love is that was easy to setup up with my Samsung Galaxy A3. They are light, and the sound is good. They fit great on the my ears.
Muy buen producto Buena calidad de sonido y buena durabilidad de la Batería como al usar
Great reception and very loud indeed.  Very happy with this purchase, would definetly recommend.
Are a good product. A little dificult with the ear attachment
These did not work out of the box.
Great headphones. Way better than having a wire running from your device to flop around getting caught on everything. I like the additional accessories that come with them too.
Excellent wireless headphones just as good and Beats but a fraction of the price

Comfortable headphones for running. Sound is pretty good too.
One thing I don't like about it is that it does not "mute" wind noise.
Overall good for the price. And it came with a nice case with a bunch of ear plug replacements and more.
We've only had these headphones for 6 months and the sounds has started to be come static in the left headphone.  We're very disappointed, especially after seeing the other great reviews.

they work is about all i can say. when i compare the hard-line factory headphones i can honestly say that the hard lines are a better sound. These make my phone calls sound soft but still comprehensible. They are great for running outdoors i guess. the first time i wore them in the gym, i would occasionally get interference and the audio would occasionally dip in and out. I reached out to the support contact and was told that was normal with Bluetooth devices. I now use them when i go running or if i am in the office, not at the gym.

Great headphones! Idk why someone would spend an extra 180-200 dollars on other wireless headphones. I dropped these outside of my car and it was left outside in the rain for a night.. next day they still worked! No problems
I would rather have ten of these over other expensive headphone
sound quality is excellent, not sure if the bendable behind the ear attachments will last seem like they may bend too much and break . but only time will tell
I don't like how loose they fit around my ears, but the sound quality is solid and they do block out a look of ambient sounds while taking the ​metro and on airplanes.

The sound of these headphones are very good.  The packaging and the accessories are exceptional. I am hopeful that I will have these for a long time.  (I generally only have a pair of headphones for 3-4 months, I'm really hard on headphones) If I have these for more than 6 months they will go beyond my expectations.
Nice

It works. But fit is a hit or miss , depends on the person.
There is some weight due to the housing style.
Microphone is alright.
There is an emphasis on bass, so if that's your thing....
Battery life is average.
Wworked perfectly for one year and nine months. Then stopped working inexplicably. If you’re okay with that duration, purchase by all means.

Best pair of headphones I have bought. I just used them for a road race. They stayed in the whole time. Easy to use (change songs and volume) while running. Good sound quality. I recommend them for sure. And cant beat the price.

I gave these headphones 5 stars because I've had them for a year and a half and still work great I use them for my gym workouts they last about 4 hrs and the sound is great. Just like any item if you take care of it, it will last.

So far so good. Usually have trouble with headphones staying in my ear, especially ones without the cord. These have been great so far. They connect easily, the sound quality is good, and they stay in my ear. Would recommend.

These are very nice except for the ear clips... the ear clips need to be tighter and or adjustable to fit ones ears... I bought these because I workout and the only problem is the clips don't fit my ears good enuff.. please make an adjustable ear clip  or make the current ear clips a lil tighter for smaller ears...
Excellent product and excellent customer service

I love everything about these headphones. I use them for running. They tolerate the sweat, have a long lasting battery life and good sound (especially bass response). A few weeks into usage, I believe the charging post in the jack got bent and I no longer could get them to charge. SENSO customer support responded immediately with a brand new pair. They were super easy to work with!
I've owned these headphones for several months but they are now becoming nonfunctional by constantly turning off which is unacceptable during my workouts or anything elae
Ear buds work great, great sound and the wireless range is better then I expected.
This headphone sucks, not working after just one year. It is not charging at all. I guess 1 year warranty means buy another one after a year. Will never buy anything sense again.

I bought these for my teenage son who exercises daily and sweats a lot. He wanted Bluetooth earbuds that were waterproof. Yesterday he stated "I love these earbuds". That's a pretty good review of your product.
Soft, comfortable, easy to use, great sound, very good sound cancelling.
Best set of buds I own no negatives so far
Have used 1 tim since they came yesterday but so far I am very pleased! Great quality and sound!

I had one pair last two years. I didn't like the "upgraded" version so I purchased another pair of the original model. They were constructed flimsier and cheaper like the "upgraded" ones. Yes they work, but aren't nearly the original quality.  I'd  look elsewhere for bluetooth headphones if I were you.
They are affordable, the battery lasts & they came with accessories.  Great deal!

Recently bought a much more expensive brand of wireless headphones, but wish I would have found these first. Great sound, love the carrying case, and fits easily into my ears. Charges very quickly too!!
Never had an issue.. 2nd pair but only becuase my cat ate the wires.... Will buy again and I recommend others to buy it too... Dont waste $200... These are great....
Fast shipping, good value

I have only had these for a little over two months, and they no longer work. They won't charge, and have essentially turned into a useless piece of plastic. The fit was medicore, and the sound was okay, but now no matter what I do they don't work.
Randomnky cut out

I would pick these over Beats any day! High quality sound and very nice sound blocking, they take just a tiny bit of tweaking with your equalizer since most computers and phones try to make up for the lacking bass in other sound systems.

I actually love these Bluetooth headphones. Ear pieces and over the ear loops fit perfectly. For me, comfortable, and secure. The sound quality is awesome. I don't use them to run or exercise so I can't comment on how they preform under those conditions. Primary use is for my Samsung Tab 4 and my HTC cellphone. Pair quickly and easily. On/Off button. Volume controls. Microphone. Blue/Red led indicates current function. Charge quickly. Best of all, when turning ON/Off you hear (while still wearing) an actual voice saying "Turning Headphones On/Off." I have not used the microphone or calculated the number of run-time hours before recharge. I was pleasantly surprised to receive an email from Senso reminding me of my warranty and their 24/7 help line for any issues with my headphones. Thank You, Kenneth.

UPDATE 10-20-2019 Two years and these little Bluetooth Headphones are going strong. Still take a good charge and the sound is great.

Works great and fairly hardy design has held up well from several months of hard use. When outside in high winds the noise is a bit higher than expected using the well fitting silicon ear buds, which it comes with several sizes and an expanding foam pair as well. The functionality of volume, song skipping and calling using the onboard controls is nice.

I had a feeling the reviews were bound to be too high because these headphones are so affordable. Let me start by saying it's a great deal, to be fair.

The quality is pretty incredibly poor though. I have substantial crunch in my ears from the bass at very low levels. I guess it's okay if you're listening to songs without bass, but I bought these for the gym. Not to mention the charging flap on the headphones is incredibly flimsy, I almost want to just yank it out because it gets dislodged so easily.

All in all, good for a cheap pair of headphones, but awful if you care about the quality of sound.
I have ordered them before last a long time

This is a classic example of a very nicely designed and marketed Chinese product which cuts corners in the most important area - in this case, sound quality.

Pros:
-Nicely Designed
-Decent fit & finish

Cons:
Sound quality leaves much to be desired. The primary job of headphones is reproducing quality sound. I don't expect too much out of $40 headphones, but these are just awful. Seriously. I have $5 wired headphones which sound WAY better than these. I also have $20 bluetooth earbuds which are WAY better.

My advise for the manufacture, is to put a little more effort into the primary function of the headphones, namely spend a little more on the drivers and a little less on the bundled gadgets.
Sorry to say they wouldn't stay in and the hurt my ears. I had to return them. The sound was good however.

I can't comment on noise canceling or moisture wicking. I bought these earbuds so I could answer phone calls while I'm moving around the house or somewhere where the phone can be near me. I'm tired of holding the phone up to talk into the speaker and really don't like holding it up to my ear anymore. So far, so good. I like the earbuds; they're comfortable to wear and I can hear my callers well. For what it's worth, I love the nifty case they came with. That's quite an extra bit of swag for the money.

First off, I have NEVER been able to wear earbuds. They irritate my ears and I have just never found them comfortable, no matter the brand. Needless to say, I was hesitant about purchasing a pair. Well I am happy I did!!! For the first time ever, I have listened to music on my phone while I work, as well as answer phone calls. I am in love with this product. The sound quality is great and they are easy to operate.

I never thought to give 5 stars to a product bought by internet,, after having read a large part of the feedback I decided to order the headphones. Not only arrived on Sunday, the sound of the headset is spectacular, I am not a salesman, but I tell you, if you are interested in buying a headset that will listen well and for a low price, do not even think these are the headphones for you . Believe me you will not regret it

I have not used them for swimming yet which is what I got them for but I have worked out with them several times, easy to set up, good sound, so so far I love them, cant wait to take them in the water!
First pair stopped working after 3 months.  Second pair broke after 3 weeks (see photo).  We'll see if they send me a 3rd pair.
Simple to use, with good sound quality. I bought them for the gym, and they have exceeded expectations. These will stay in my ears even through sweaty, active basketball sessions.
You get what you paid for. Not so bad tho
very comfortable, never falls out of ear, music is ok, would prefer a little more bass, but I care more about it staying in place, and it does so perfectly

These phones have all the features you could want, and they are very comfortable to wear. BUT they have awful sound. There are no highs, and lows are boomy and muddy. I listened to Béla Fleck, and you could not tell he was playing a banjo. They are fine for listening to old-time radio while exercising, but NOT for music. Very disappointing.
