I followed the manufacturer's suggestion and did a reset. Thats fixed the problem. But actually I think the lousy sound came from pushing the buds too far into my ears. I found out that as I put them in, the sound was better!. So, when inserted lightly, it is quite excellent. I think that the sound channel got pinched.
The headphone provided fantastic quality and will provide a solid 8 hours of battery power. After a year the headphones finally will no longer receive a charge. Great product while they worked
Rarely do you find quality and value in the same package. I use these daily as a runner and avid gym user I find these to be very comfortable and the battery life has been great.

I bought these for my wife and she says they're great:
-Fits well and don't fall out while running
-Sound quality is good
-Don't need to keep adjusting while running
-Controls are intuitive

She also said the noise-cancelling feature is a bit too much, sometimes making her nervous that she can't adequately hear her surroundings.

My kids used it, I have not they like it
HOpe it works without any problems.
K
Awesome ear bugs for running!

1. blue tooth connection had to be deleted then re loaded fter 5 days. has been working acceptably since then.
2. Volume unstable. Gets louder as music or video plays. Happens with amazon video, CD music in the computer cd player, or you tube. Volume for amazon video or you tube needs to be adjusted very low for acceptable listening.
3. Charge time is longer than expected and charge lasts much shorter than advertised.
Evaluates as a lot of work to get an acceptable listening performance at this point.

This is a great product, my husband works in a very loud paper factory where he is getting wet (like drenched with a fire hose wet) and these hold up great!! A very good deal for a good working product 👍🏻

I purchased these blue tooth headphones because more than 5,000 reviewers had given them 5 stars, and for good reason.
Even the packaging is well thought out. I have always disposed of the packaging my new gadgets come in, but the tidy box becomes a drawer in which you can keep your accessories stored. And that's just the box! I was alone when I opened the packaging and was literally saying, "Oh Wow! Cool!" as I found more and more included accessories.
After getting everything charged and synced, which was very quick and easy to do, I tested the headphones out with a few phone calls to friends to test the mic and sound. They got a thumbs up from everyone I spoke with. I tested some songs with decent bass and was really impressed.
Then next test was fit and staying power. Many reviewers tested them during workouts with great results. My test was cleaning out my garage, wearing a mask and eye protection. There was a lot going on in the ear area that could have interrupted the headphones' ability to stay put, but they never fell out. I also have exceedingly tiny ear canals and have trouble with pain caused by the hard parts of ear buds where the soft rubber ends and the hard plastic electronics casing begins. These left no soreness at all.
They came with an offer of 10% off a future purchase if I registered for the warranty (a simple step of entering the Amazon purchase number from my order), and after testing them out, I'm positive I'm going to be buying a pair for my husband. The kids will likely end up getting their own pairs, as well :-)
These really are a great product, and the price point makes them available to the masses. Kudos for integrity on all fronts!!

I bought 2 pairs of these for my teenage boys for Christmas. They abosilutely love these headphones. No need to go buy 200 dollars headphone. These are very comfortable on the ear, and the sound is terrific!
These headphones have been great to me so far. Just had em a week but sound awesome.
I've had these for a month or two.  I liked my pair so much I bought my husband a pair.  We wear them while running.

Great all around headphones, especially for the price I got them at. Easy pairing between devices and good sound quality. Also the built in microphone makes talking on the phone very easy while walking or doing physical activity

Probably doesn't get any better than this for price + quality. I sweat a lot, especially when I run and living in the south. These don't "wick" any moisture from my sweaty ears and I'm often pulling them out and wiping them when I can because they slide around when they get sweaty. I wear a hat now when I run so that helps. They cancel noise pretty well, except for the wind "whooshing" sound you can sometimes have on a windy day. The sound quality is superb. These aren't Bose or Apple headphones, but I was blown away by how deep and clean the sound was for how much they cost. You're also not paying Bose or Apple prices. Plus, if you're using these to workout/run, you don't need the crispest sound--at least I don't and I'm very picky about audio and headphones.
One other thing: My headphones actually stopped charging about a month after buying them. I tried manual restarts and different chargers--everything. So, I contact customer support and within hours they responded, and within days they had shipped me a new pair of headphones that, so far, are working fine. Just be sure to register your headphones on their website.

I love these headphones. They're so comfortable you forget you have them on... except for the great sound as a reminder. They have enough bass to satisfy your need for a full, well rounded sound.... and all at a good price!
Very happy with these.  Work great. Great price. Come with a nice little case.

So far perfect. Great sound for bluetooth. Have covered about 500 miles on bike and they have held up well capturing my music streaming. Affordable I thought I had lost them and knew if I had I was ordering another set. Do not feel cheap.
Arrived very soon. I ordered midnight and got it early morning. Works well and has a very good sound. Also noise cancelation. Has extra stuff and pretty box. Great and I recommend to others.
Not as comfortable as I would like, but excellent quality.

They are a bit hard to get situated into my ears but the sound is pretty darned good. I got these specifically for when I do yard work. I was always getting them caught on the mower or weed trimmer and having my ear buds ripped out of my ear.
Use then everyday they charge fast and stay charged for about 8 hours

Ugh... I was hopeful because there are so many good reviews but no such luck for me. I can only assume that many people haven't actually had GOOD headphones before?!?!? They take several attempts to connect through bluetooth... it sounds like listening to a scratched CD. Also with every other bluetooth headphone set I've had, I can walk away from my phone to grab something and it not cut out... I take 5 steps away with theses and no music. And I don't why it says that there is 8 hours of playback?!?!? I had 2 gym sessions, the first, an hour and a half and the second 2 hours... and these things died with 30 minutes left to go, so I got 3 hours of playback before they died.... SO FRUSTRATING!!
Lesson learned and returned!!!
Sound and battery are great but the ear bands are too big for my ears and not adjustable so the buds the only thing keeping them in. Which they stay in for the most part.
The power button is flimsy.  I pushed it through easily. The plastic is easily separated to line up the button, but that’s annoying.
I love these headphones they are much better than the beats I have. I threw my beats away. These headphones are so good I gotta buy another pair someone stole mine from the gym

Awesome for jogging and general adventuring. There is an issue where if my phone is on the other side of my body, the connection can cut out, hence the 4 out of 5 stars. Sound quality is really great, though I admit I'm not an audiophile.

I ordered two of these one for my wife and the other myself. So far we love them and seem to be working fine. The only reason I’m giving them a 4 instead of a 5 is one of them appeared to have been used and repackaged. When I buy something new I expect it to be new not used.
Terrible. Uncomfortable. Have terrible bluetooth- phone in your pocket...sounds like a skipping record.

I've owned mine for about a year. They're comfortable, loud (adjustable), and have a good battery life. Mic is good, I haven't had remote callers complain. These earbuds stay perfectly in place during workouts. I don't often write Amazon reviews for consumer electronics, but this truly is a wonderful device, and the best I've ever owned in its class. Highly recommended.
As advertised; works great; good quality. Excellent case and charge cord also.
So far I'm really impressed with the sound quality, ergonomic fit. I can't wait to try it at the gym.

I have only been using them for a few days but I already think they are awesome. I got them because the original earphones that came with my iPhone kept falling off when I'm using them and I use them only when I'm sitting down at my desk in the office. These Senso ActivBuds don't fall off because of the over the ear hooks. Both the hooks and the earbuds are very comfortable. Now I will be able to use them when I go hiking with our dogs. I'm also going to buy a set for my daughter. Did I forget to say that the sound quality is also fantastic? Yes, it is!
Came with a lot of accessories and sounds great!  Easy to pair...  no problem!  Now I can charge my iphone and listen to music at work.  Ditch the dongle!
Love these headphones. They connect easily, multifunctional buttons work well, and give great sound quality.

Great product exceptional sound. I had bought the hausser magic buds. But accidentally ran them over with the car. 😭 The magic bud sound quality when talking on the phone was awful the other person said I sounded like I was in a tunnel. These senso are much better at that aspect. The only downside is the center button doesn't seem to activate Siri but not a deal breaker. Music sounds great
Good price. Works great! Easy instructions. Very happy with my purchase! 5-Stars all around!

The battery level on my device always shows the headphones being fully charged and then they'll start cutting out and die unexpectedly. That said, they do hold a charge for several hours and I'm pleased with the sound quality.
seems to break frequently, customer service will replace within 1 year

Love these headphones and the price is fabulous!

I have found these headphones to be very comfortable and perfect for the gym.  The bass response is quite good and very clear.  The unit charged very quickly and a[pears to have very reasonable battery life.  It has been three days and I have not needed a recharge.

For this price you can't get anything better. I had always bought fairly cheap earbuds and was tired of them always breaking so I decided to invest in slightly nicer ones. The outstanding noise blocking, waterproof, Bluetooth headphones also come with 2 cables, extra ear pads, a car charger, and a case. One of the best valued things I have ever bought from amazon
Second time buying these, they're great!
The headphones are great. Very good sound and very comfortable. Always had a problem keeping buds in my ears. These headphones fit great. Short charging period and pair easily with my IPhonee 7.
My dad is obsessed with them. 10/10

I bought my first pair in summer 2017 and used them mostly for running and workouts. I bought my second pair in fall of 2017 so that I would have a set at the camper. These have held up through workouts, running, lawnmowing, etc. I really like the over the ear style, as most ear buds fall out of my ears. I just put in an order for my third pair, as I somehow cracked the plastic on one set. Pretty good for headphones that cost less than $30, as they lasted 3 1/2 years!
Not an improvement over old Bluetooth.
my phone has to be on a armband or else there is too much interference to the weak wifi in the headphones.  Have a galaxy 7, so I'm pretty sure it isn't the phone.

Wow the sound on this are  amazing love the fit being a  cyclist  they are great stay in my ear

Great sound and battery life. I would purchase this again.
Just what my daughter recommended, easy pairing ease of use, good value!

I put blue tooth transmitters on the TV downstairs and the TV upstairs.  I have a set of earphones for each of the TVs and for my MP3 player I listen to while jogging.  the earphones are great and lightweight.  One of them stopped pairing with the TV so I use that for my MP3 player.  As a curiosity, the newest pair of earphones will disconnect my wife's earphones when she's on her phone or Ipad and connect with them.  I had no idea that the earphones had noise cancellation.  I guess it works . . . when I first received the 3rd pair they were defective.  they replaced them right away
easy to use, comfortable, sound is pretty good...not great. But for working out, they are perfect.

Bad sound quality. I actually had to EQ out some bass as they were really muddy and bass heavy. Bad battery life. After a few months i removed them from the charger, took them to the gym, turned them on, and they immediately were beeping about low power. Threw them in the trash. Hard pass. I dont normally write amazon reviews but these were that bad.
Took the place of my Nose headphones. Less cumbersome while working out.
Great.
These ear buds have worked as advertised, extremely happy with purchase. The sound quality is good and all features work well.
Excellent

Sound is good, fit not bad, extras included. But, Bluetooth connectivity is very bad. Put a cell phone in back pocket of pants and the signal is distorted with every step.

Also, these ear buds need line of sight to source. Even putting a hand between source and right sight ear bud the bluetooth sounds is distorted or connection is lost.

Yes, I've tried the reset process. Did not help. Sounds like an antenna issue? Anyway, returning them.
Sound is fine but they do not stay in place while running.
My son loves these headphones.
Very pleased with the buds. Easy to pair to iPhone. Good sound. Comfortable fit. Quality packaging and customer service. And they come partially charged so they can be used out of the box.
Love it. It took awhile to. Get use it but now im loving it

Easy to setup (to bluetooth).

Just got these from UPS today and tried them out as soon as they arrived....... Very impressed with the sound quality and volume. These things are really loud. I have a another pair of Bluetooth earbuds and these blow them away by a mile.... Again I'm very impressed.
Glad I made the purchase...

I really wanted a wireless headphone for my workouts but didn't want to shell out $99+ for designer ones because I knew there was a good chance I'd misplace them. At the same time I wanted good quality. These did the job and then some! They stayed in my ears during all my workouts- treadmill, outdoor running, weight lifting- and especially came in handy when doing guided workouts through my phone in the gym. There were 1 or 2 times where I thought they died- customer service got back to me right away, instructed me to reset and I was back in business. A car even accidentally ran over them (long story) and they still worked!

Needless to say after 7 months I did misplace them so I will be repurchasing again:)
I enjoy these headphones. The sound quality is good and they pair fast.

These are AWESOME. Well worth the money. I've had other pairs of blue tooth headphones before and none have been this good. They don't hurt your ears after wearing them, they have great range, and great sound. They hold a charge for a long time as well. I do HIIT (high intensity interval training), run, jump, everything with these and they never fall out of my ear or lose sound quality. Love em!
The eyepiece takes little to get use to when putting it on. The left is not as loud as the right. A little bigger than expected.
These are awesome

The SENSO's were a great purchase originally for myself, however the only thing that did not work for me personally was the hooks over the ears...they are a little too big for my ears but made ano awesome gift to my husband and he absolutely loves theme! He said the sound quality was amazing!
Thank you for providing such quality products! The extra bonus accessories made the purchase even more valuable!

I bought two of this sports wireless headphone, and satisfy with the quality of the product. One for myself and another for my friend in New Zealand as Christmas gift. I want to make sure the product has no any issue so I did open the one for my friend and test it before I ship it to New Zealand. The sound quality was pretty good, and everything went well too. The shipping time was kind of long since Utah had snow during the time, but it was not really matter to me. If someone wants to ask me whether I would recommend this product to other people? The answer is yes. Hope this product will go well after a while.
These headphones are great! I wear them every day when I work out, I love that they cancel out all of the noise at the gym!

Comes with case, charger, and multiple rubber covers for different size ear canals. They connect easily via Bluetooth and they sound great. Mic works pretty well for phone calls as well. I wear them in the gym and they never slip out and they are waterproof.

I pair these with my Nexus 6P. Initially I had issues pairing and the audio was choppy when I held my phone at any distance that wasn't right near my head.

However, SENSO reached out to me asking how my experience went and I explained my issues. They promptly replied with how to reset the headphones to factory settings and this did the trick!

Here are the instruction for resetting the headphones:

1. Reset the Senso headphone to factory settings (while plugged into a power source, press/hold the power button for 7 seconds).
2. Unplug the headphone from charging cable and power them on.
3. Enter the earbuds into the pairing mode and follow instructions for connecting.
Easy to use, fit nice and snug and sound great. Good value for the money I spent.

It came with a lot of great little random gadgets but the headphones are pretty big and the right headphone was bent pretty bad. Gonna return and try another pair to see if it was just a fluke. Will update when I get the next pair.
great sound, good bluetooth connection, nothing to complain.
Easy to pair, great sound, made well. I believe I will enjoy them for a long time.
Work great and that's what I need. Something reliable and affordable. And that's what I got!
Good sound and comfortable.
Great headphones easy to pair easy to work. I love them

your product  impressed me greatly i wish i had known about them sooner i will be in the market for some noise reduction  over the ear headphones  soon and look forward to checking out your product first. if these headphones hold up to normal wear  and not come apart like my others after  30 days i will be a customer for life

I was not very happy with the purchase.  They do not stay in the ear. The part that wraps around the ear is to flimsy and doesn't stay in place and was constantly falling out. Only plus was the battery lasted very long.

Great headphones, especially for the price. I'm not that discerning, but sound quality seems really good to me. However, they're fairly useless as a microphone. During phone calls, people can hear me only if I'm in a quiet area, no one can hear me if I'm driving or in a noisy space (which incidentally is why I purchased them).

I believe the run time isn't quite 8hrs but damn it, these are the best headphones you can buy for under $35.

Charges fast, holds charge, stays in ears. GENIUS idea, the charger has both ends for charging the head phones AND for charging your iPhone. They nailed it.

If you're in doubt, buy them. They are perfect.
These are great!! I'm super happy with them. Easy to get set up and sound great!!

Too big for my ears, wouldn’t stay in place just sitting still so I didn’t even try working out with them. Not really a quality problem-I just have small ears. Otherwise sound was good. Gave them to a friend who loves them!
Alright sounds quality for the price. When the battery gets below 30% it will say, "battery low" once a minute

As an active runner (daily), these ear buds have a great sound and are steady on the ears. With other brands i hve struggled with constant tugging and adjusting of the earpiece, not with these. The charge is great and the feel is good. The best quality is the fit and the sound.
Hi marks from this marathon runner.

I had absolutely no issues using the Bluetooth headphones it’s audio & build quality is great plus it comes with cables for iPhone charging! Used for working out and doing chores around the house never had any worry of them breaking/falling.
The connection to the bluetooth device (my phone) was inconsistent and would often break up or disconnect, and the headphones stopped working altogether only a few months after I bought them!!
Great sound, great value. Nice packaging too....

I had bought the beats earbuds recently and was pretty happy with all but the price. I found these on Amazon and after considering the reviews, bought a pair. The quality of sound is primary to me and these do not disappoint. They sound better than the beats at a fraction of the cost. The right controls in the right places is also huge, and they are comfortable. I wear these for hours at a time, all day at work, lengthy gym sessions and for long runs. I went ahead and bought a second pair so that I have a backup always charged and ready to go. I like background music in everything I do and these are perfect for me. Nice job on a great product!
Excellent product.
Awesome headphones. feels light on the ears, yet powerful sound.  It would be even more awesome if it were to tell you how many hours of talk time was left when you power on the headphones.
These headphones are great, they take some getting used to (for the behind the ear part) but I use these when working out and it's perfect.  Bluetooth range is okay and the sound quality is great.

I bought a competing set of Bluetooth wireless earphones a month before and I have to say I prefer the other pair which was about double the price. I bought the SENSO on a lightning deal based on the great reviews and have to say they have not lived up to the hype. The biggest con for me is the lack of bass. The music sounds tinny and not as full. I would not be happy if I had paid full price for them.. Sorry SENSO.
Hold a charge well. And not uncomfortable. They do hold up to sweat well.
Hit and miss quality it seems, with only 3 light uses these began shorting out. All reasonable trouble shooting has been done. 4 days outside the return window. buyer beware!
Great sound. Little mo

These headphones are easy to pair and have pretty decent sound. However, I have a few issues with them.
1. I have to constantly reconnect them to my phone. For some reason the connection drops even when I'm standing next to my phone.
2. The range is subpar
3. It doesn't automatically connect. If my phone is connected to my car's bluetooth and I step out- this headphone would not auto reconnect. As a matter of fact, it doesn't respond when I try to manually connect it myself either. I have to turn it off and back on for it to pick up....annoying
4. It needs weights.... Like seriously. If you only use one earbud, the thing is hanging all down your back. I don't have that issue with my Beats.
Did I say the range sucks?
Didn't expect to be so imprsssed. I am an audiophile and this is pretty good. Wow

The sound for the price is really good quality. The ability to adjust the volume and skip songs from the head piece is a nice feature. The only thing that drives me crazy is the cord that connects the ear pieces. It is made of rubber and sticks to the back of my neck so when I turn my head, it pulls one of the ear pieces out. The alternative is to put the cord under your chin but personally, no. So great blue tooth headphones for the price with only one small draw back. Would recommend if you are looking for quality sound without breaking the bank.

i love everything about these headphones, especially the extras- however, the connection is at times extremely poor.  when the connection is good the headphones are great.  when connection is poor, the headphones serve no purpose.  also, i stream music from my phone which is always in my pocket.

I just bought my second pair of headphones because the quality and sound are very good for the price. I put these headphones through a lot, as I workout every day hard. The battery usually lasts 2-3 workouts about 2 hours each. Ultimately it’s a good buy for the price and quality

This is the third pair I’ve bought. Given a pair to a couple of friends as a gift. Consensus is that they are great! I have a pair of Powerbeats 3 and the Sensos are ever bit as good. You get a lot in the box as well. This at a 10th of the price? Outstanding. Highly recommend

I like them a lot. No issues so far. Great fit with small buds. I like that it comes with 3 sizes of ear buds. Easy to use. Great sound. Great price. I'm all for small businesses so  I wish you great success. I will s probably get another set down the road for a gift. Thanks

I was deciding between these and the Skullcandy bluetooth earbuds. I went with these because they seemed lighter and more practical for my activities while wearing headphones/earbuds. Also the price was a bit cheaper. I really like Skullcandy, but looking at a majority 5 star rating with these versus the 3 to 4 star on the Skullcandy's, I went with the previous reviews and bought the SENSO earbuds. Thus far I have had no issues with these headphones. They are very loud and connect to my Samsung Galaxy S4 very quickly (and easily). The sound quality is good and they seem to be somewhat durable. My lack of a star (from 5 stars) is due to the "active" portion of the sale. Whilst you can be active with these headphones, it is not ideal. I ran with them in/on and there was a lot of wind noise. I'm not upset about it, but for the asking price on these (originally $100+)...yeah... So all in all, I should have gone with some good over-ear headphones. Yes, they are bulky and somewhat obnoxious, but I would not have had to worry about wind noise while running. Also...all of the "they never fall out of my ears - it's so wonderful" reviews...must be nice. Unfortunately for me, they can fall out of my ears with a small amount of force. In other words, I won't be doing jumping jacks with them in. I did light jumping to test that bit of it and they technically stayed on my ear, but the buds wiggled out. If you're not hurting financially, you may want to consider these. May God bless you all.

First, let me say that I never make a purchase without first doing some research. Amazon has so many different brands of headphones available, but I decided to try the SENSO based on written product reviews, product review videos on YouTube, and finally price. I ordered these specifically for use at work where I work in "cube land" and it's difficult to drown out background noise. The day these arrived at my office, I opened the package and had these powered on and connected with my iphone in a matter of seconds. Super easy to set up. Now, I have found since a few days of use, that I need to fuss with them a little more when switching devices (iphone, ipod and Samsung Galaxy S3), but nothing that would make me want to pull my hair out.

Comfort: These are so comfortable that I forget I am wearing them at times. I like the soft, flexible loops that goes over my ears. I wear glasses and don't have any issues or discomfort from the combo of these with my glasses. I also like having the option of ear piece sizes. I haven't tried running or working out with these yet, so can't say how these feel/fit when being very active.

Sound: I will admit that I am not the biggest sound snob. I know that I do not like distorted bass or vocals in a song when the volume is turned up. The sound from these headphones is clear with a good mix of bass and treble. The biggest feature I want to talk on is the noise cancelling capability of these headphones. I have found myself forgetting that I am in an office full of people as all background noise is gone. I have actually had a few people standing in my cube talking to me without me even knowing it. It's not until they tap me on the shoulder that I know they are trying to talk to me.

So far, after a few days with these headphones, I have no real complaints. If you are on the fence about what brand to buy, then buy these. I don't think you will be disappointed!

I really wanted to love these earbuds. Unfortunately, after a few weeks use I learned the following:
Pros:
1. Very comfortable
2. The over ear loops keep the buds in place during heavy exercise without any discomfort
3. Lightweight and balanced: unlike the earbuds with the inline mike and controls, the weight of the cable is distributed equally, and I don't have to keep adjusting it as I work out.
4. Very good sound quality. Much richer tones, particularly bass -- compared to other similarly priced wireless earbuds.

Cons (two big ones)
1. Several people have told me they have trouble hearing my end of the conversation. The mic on this unit appears to be positioned poorly
2. Heavy wind interference when outdoors. Even when I am just standing or walking, the slighted breeze whistles across both earpieces. While lightweight and comforable, the body of each bud is very blocky and not at all aerodynamic. When I am running outdoors, I find it very annoying. Nothing can be done to reduce the amount of noise.

These would befine earbuds for someone who uses them indoors and does not use the mic very often. BUt, given my needs, I would not purchase them again. Next time around, I spring for a little bit more to get both very good sound and an overall better experience.
