Linked up good ,Music was good, every time I made/received a phone call the person on the other end heard an eco. I had to disconnect,use my other headset or speakerphone on my Iphone6s. Im back to using my older bluetooth Noot earbuds. I guess Im sticking to the older ones that's lasted for over 2 years.
Love them

I decided to write a review even though I rarely do. I wanted to wait until I had ran at least 40-50 miles in them. I will start with the negatives first, simply because they are very few negatives. I have one nitpick and that is that sometimes you push the actual bud deep into your ear when you use the multi-function button. If the multi function button was the other bud on top you would never feel discomfort pushing it. The other negative is a positive for many. These block out outside noise extremely well. Great at the gym but I lower the volume settings when running on the road.

Now positives.
Seem very sturdy, and nicely packaged. They may have a bargain price but feel much more premium then price would indicate.
Sound is very good( coming from wired yourbuds so not a complete audiophile).
They stay in very well. I have ran rugged trails to roads and they have stayed secure. I have strange ear shape so I have my left and right bud with different size bud tips.

I did have slight skipping on one occasion, although I am unsure if that is the earbuds or if that was network issue streaming music using google music

They are very good so far but the part that holds the ear is flimsy I wish it was more rigid so I could put It on my ear and not worry about it falling off but other wise they are a very good headphone
Amazing product, using it since yesterday and already in love it, high quality with very resonable price , keep it up.

It worked great for about two months. Then gradually the sound quality started to deteriorate.  I am using this device mostly for the TV audio.  It started to get static and break off when I move away even for 5 feet from my usual spot I sit and speeches become unintelligible.  I tried to adjust it with my Appletv thinking it wasn’t the device that had the problem.  I finally decided to contact Amazon Customer Services so I looked at the order number: well, I paid $36 or so and it went down to $19 something.  I discussed it twice with Customer Reps and they would not take it back nor adjust the price. After I contacted the customer services first time, the price on my “order again” went from $19 something to $29!!  I know that the return needs to be done in one month; however you don't expect the product to fall apart in 2 -3 months either.  I am very disappointed in the way Amazon is now conducting their customer services.  Don’t buy this priduct!
Charger does not fit the ear buds and keep falling off my ears. The hook is to high or the buds need to come up some. It would be nice to find adjustable ones.

I sweat pretty heavily, so I shy away from the more expensive models of headphones to use for running.  So far these headphones are doing very well.  The sound is the best so far for a lower priced model.  The big test will be the controls once they get wet.  I have learned not to mess too much with the controls when they are wet.  Just wait until everything dries thoroughly before charging, etc.
I have only had these a couple days, but so far they sound great, and fit comfortably.

Original review: Died after 3 months of usage.

CORRECTION: Headphones did NOT die after 3 months. Somehow the setting got accidently changed from stereo to mono causing the problem. Once changed back to stereo setting, they still work great. Sorry for the temporary 1 star review. User error!

I bought these so I could more easily work out. They are really comfortable, I was surprised. I don't know if I can change the settings, but they are plenty loud even at the lowest volume setting. As long as I don't accidentally have it higher it's at a good volume. The sound quality is great too."
Great headphones, easy to sync and clear audio

I do not know how this company stays in business. Why? Because the product is worth more than what they sell it for. Nice packaging, sleek sexy carrying case, car charger, micro usb cable, and an additional long sturdy micro usb cable with a freaking iPhone adapter?! Now to the head phones. They feel great and come with tons of ear bud sizes including a foam one that shapes to your ear! Sound quality is phenomenal for the cost. Bass is deep, but a little distortion when playing loud.  DEFINITE MUST BUY! Very impressed.

These earphones are very loud with is a great quality and fit my ears perfectly. Most earbuds fall right off of my ear because my ears are pretty small. However, I went to the pool to take a swim thinking that these earbuds were waterproof/swim-proof and they stopped working the very moment I submerged my head underwater.
Sound good at first, however within 2 months they started cutting in and out.
There is a buzzing in one of the headphones on first use.
Great product for reasonable price. Fit good around my ears and do not fall off when working out. Volume is good, ease of use is good as well.

I was reluctant to purchase them because is a brand I never hear before and you know the phrase "you get what you pay for" and that's more scarier. Let me tell you how wrong I was and now I wont follow that rule again. Senso wireless headphones are 1- easy to set up
2- Very confortable in my ears
3- The quality is very good at the same level of the expensive ones I know my son have one of the expensive brands
4- the sound is amazing love it
5- I leave my phone in the living room and can go to my kitchen and still it doesn't fail however my distance in not to far from each other
6- I highly recommend them and will let my family and friends knows
Thank you so much now I can say we can have affordable wireless headphones high quality without have to pay much amazing :)

These were purchased for me as a gift and work wonderfully for running. I am a serious marathoner and use the headphones for running easy, hard workouts, or long runs. The headphones stay seated in my ears and sound great even with all of the movement. I am very sensitive to changes in my running gear, therefore, I was concerned about the cord irritating and bouncing on my neck and shoulders, but this has not been an issue. I don't even notice the cord when I run.

The only reason I gave 4 stars for the material quality is the cord clip to adjust the tightness between the headphones detached and is lost.

The battery life is awesome and lasts as long as the manufacturer states.
Great quality and excellent customer service.

Absolutely amazing headphones. To spare you reading, I'll just jump right into the pros and cons.

Pros:
1) Great sound. The bass is noticeably present but it isn't overdone. If you're an audiophile, you will obviously be disappointed, but if you're a general user who DOES know the difference between good and bad quality audio, you'll be colored very impressed, as I was/still am.
2) They fit very snugly into your ear canal, without feeling intrusive. Because of this, it generates very good "noise cancellation" as these headphones don't seem to have "noise cancellation" as a feature, but the headphones DO a good job of cancelling outside noise when listening to music.
3) These won't fall out of your ears at the gym whatsoever, unless you're being punched in the face repeatedly.
4) Lightweight, but good quality build.
5) The amount of THINGS you get!: carrying case, car charger, micro-USB cable, extra buds

Cons:
1) Not the most aesthetically pleasing to look at from the outside in, but for what they are meant for, who cares?
2) People will glasses (like me) will feel a slight discomfort the first few times wearing them. You'll have to adjust how you wear them so the loop sits comfortably behind your year.
3) The wire connecting the ear pieces is very thin, so just be careful during storage. Would NOT recommend shoving these in your pocket.
4) MicroUSB instead of USB-C :( but this is so minor I don't know why I'm mentioning it

Overall, I'm really happy I got these; I've had them for all of a week, and I'm already recommending these to everyone I know, and I'm getting similar responses back.

Love it, it literally tells you when its turning on and off. It also beeps when you can't turn the volume up higher. Great audio feedback. 5 stars because it's fun to use, but 4 because the sound quality is great great, just pretty good.

I bought these headphones during Prime Day and was initially very pleased with the fit and sound.  But, I noticed that the bass in some songs was extremely distorted.  I originally thought that I shouldn't expect much from a $30 pair of headphones and could live with the inferior bass range.  But, I reached out to the company to see if anyone else had a similar problem.  They responded very quickly and initially had me reset the headphones, which didn't improve the bass.  I contacted them again and they immediately sent me another pair and the sound is great!  No problems with the bass at all!  I don't know if I'm more impressed with the headphones or their customer service!  Definitely worth purchasing!

This was a gift, but my sister seems to love them.  She wears them all the time.  She says it's really nice to not have a cord connecting her to her phone and getting caught on things.  Also, not having to carry her phone on her all of the time.
Was gonna get the Beats cordless ear buds but read about these. So happy I did! These are amazing. And not just cuz they’re inexpensive. Love these!

When the  work, they are a great product. Sound quality good, stay in when I run, comfortable and easy  to use. Second pair in two years, though. This one didn't even make it 5 full months. Won't turn on after full charge. Won't purchase again.

I just tried these headphones for the first time and I'm surprised for good. The sound is very good and they are perfectly designed to fit well and without being a hassle while running. I would definitely recommend it.

They were working great till the sound started breaking in one bud. The warranty was still in place when the sound went out and the customer service and support team were awesome at solving the issue. I am grateful for their speediness and efficiency.
These took over for my motorcycle riding. They work terrific! Good product at a great rice.

Not sure if I got a dud, but I will be returning these headphones.

In comparison to my previously owned, now lost Plantronics Backbeat Go 2, these headphones -

WON in areas of
1) Pairing/Control Functions - I like the fact that the controls are on the earbud. The separate console on my Backbeats often weighed down one side of the my earbuds
2) Price - my Backbeats were $20 more expensive when on sale at Costco
3) Comfort - would stay in my ear longer when jogging

LOST in areas of
1) Connectivity - my biggest gripe. These headphones did not have the range that my backbeats had and would even lose connectivity while in a clear plastic sleeve attached to my arm. I'm probably dating myself when I say that it sounded like a skipped CD player
2) Fit - I would hear wind whistling through the earbuds while on a jog...thought that was a bit strange and the over the ear wraps were too large for my ear.
3) Sound quality - was pretty terrible compared to my backbeats. I'm not a big audiophile, but I could easily tell the difference in quality between the Senso and Plantronics. I would have kept the earphones otherwise, but with the lack of connectivity, the earphones had to go back.

I wouldn't recommend this product on the connectiv
Absolutely fantastic sound quality but the Bluetooth is pitifully weak.  Would be a five star product if the Bluetooth worked well
This is probably the best head set I have ever purchased. The price is ridiculously low for the comfort and quality of sound!
I love all the accessories it comes with and the hey sound great. This product will definitely save you money compared to its competitors, and the sound is great!

These headphones are awesome! They pair easily with the iPhone 7. They fit well and haven't had any issues with them falling out of my ears. They are also extrmely lightweight. I am going to buy another pair for my fiancé. If you are looking for a solid pair of wireless headphones try these out.

Here is how it was. I got my first pair. Lasted 5 months. It was ok not perfect but suddenly died.
Got first replacement lasted 2 weeks
second replacement lasted 1 week.
Clearly a piece of garbage
Clearly various quality versions available. You never know how lucky u are

This is my first pair of wireless headphones and they work great.  I use them for listening to coached-music routines while training indoors on a stationary bike.  Nicely packed, chose the earbuds that fit me, paired easily to my old iPod touch, good sound, easy to use volume control on the headphones.

The sounds are horrible, it comes off breaking. It looked great from outside and then the charger was also good but when it comes to the sound, it comes of breaking off. I am very upset. I am tired of products that keeps being sent to me  that are bad. I would not recommend to buy it definitely.

This are good headphones. The only, but major, downside is that they stopped working after 2 years. And its not that I used them every day during this time. I use them mostly during the weekends. Meaning they lasted around 200 days which is the equivalent of 6 months if you use them daily. Sound quality was good.
Were working perfectly but then died of no apparent cause. I've seen similar reviews. Sad because they worked perfectly in their less than 4 months life.
Long battery life, comfortable on my ears. The over the ear part tends to fall off ear tho

The listening quality for books and music seems good, but phone calls and the ability for the receiver of my calls is lacking.  Many complained about the lack of volume and the connecting to audio books was ragged and unreliable without 'fiddling' to get it to connect.  Something I never had with other headphones.

Got these march 20th 2017. WAs very happy with them at first. Good sound quality for price, and stayed in my ears just fine on my runs. But last night they just decided to quit working. I thought they had just died, so I charged them all night. Won't turn on at all. Very disappointing.
Customer service was amazing.
The headphones are satisfactory. After 6 months of using them the sound in the left earpiece started to fade a bit but for the price I paid the performance was pretty good.
The headphones are great.  No complaints
These are great, professional grade headphones at an unbeatable price!
Trash. Right bud is all static. Left "works" but sound sucks. Got these for the gym bag but they won't see the front door.
Excellent. Been using it a month. Good sound. Battery has a long life. Range is also excellent. Anywhere in my house with no drop out from the source.

I like it loud without compromising on sound quality. I've tried JBL, Beats, and Plantronics, all to my disappointment. They just wouldn't get loud enough for me. These were not only plenty loud at 80% volume, but I had to go into my iPhone settings and adjust the EQ to my taste because there was too much bass!
The signal is slightly compressed, but not to the point of annoyance. I haven't heard any distortion yet (Probably thanks to that little bit of compression.) Frequency response is good. Harmonic distortion is a little better than normal for earbuds. (At high volumes, you can't really escape those detuned low notes, without going to big over ear phones with desicated low-end drivers.) Very impressed, especially at this price.

This is one the greatest headphones I have purchased for the price and the quality. I am runner and it makes my run fun. I listen to music for long hours and the sound is excellent. What I like is that it sticks to my ears and do not come out no matter my running speed. Rain or shine it is still works perfectly.
I have been using it since July 2017. The first one I bought has a manufactured defect and Senso customer service addressed the issue quickly and replaced it. I really recommended these headphones. No one should spend money on expensive headphones when these are just as good.
Works great.  Easy to setup.  Highly recommend.
I'm only giving these 4 stars for right now because I've only used them once but the one time I did, the sound was amazing and they were comfortable on my ears. Good buy for the price!
Awesome headphones love all the accessories just ordered 2 more for family members

Great range, (better than Plantronics) for listening to music.  Mic picked up my voice nicely.  Battery life so far, has met my expectations.  Bluetooth sync's easily to my galaxy S6.  Finally, the ear buds sit well on the ear.  Overall good value.
Great Product

I had bought a pair of headphones and they stopped working within the warranty so I called the company and they are replacing them now! Love this sound quality and the ear piece size options. I still use the car magnet!

Like the sound quality, but....purchased for the stated - noise cancelling feature.
These did not cancel any background noise from the plane engines.
If you press them in tight, they muffle the noise, but then you have to turn up the volume to hear music.
Loud volume is not what I wanted for the flights.
seller needs to change product title - these are Not Noise Cancelling headphones. Misleading

love these things.  they stany on, even in really intense tumbling/gymnastic sessions.  i sweat a lot and they have kept up for over a year now.  the charge is pretty decent considering the size.  and not only is the audio output great, but the audio recording is great as well. it took me a long time to find a headset that would do all of that and i am really impressed that people on the other end of the phone can hear me clearly without background noise.

I was looking for wireless headphones that had good audio sound and wasn’t going to break the bank. These are quality headphones with crisp sound and loved the price. I know you get what you pay for and so far these have been great!
These are great head phones. Sound quality is Great. I use them to workout and the stay in place

I own a pair of power beats 2 and decided to try the Senso due to all the positive reviews. They are pretty decent, but the sound quality is not near to the power beats. The lows and the bass sound is way better on the power beats. Senso are a good choice if your budget doesn't allow you to buy the power beats.
The fit is a little loose, but sound is great and setup is easy.
Love my new Bluetooth headphones. Definitely worth it

Love these. Very nice quality.  They work quite a good distance from my phone. Easy pause ability by pushing large button on right ear. Volume controls also available on top of right earbud.  No issues at all. Quite comfortable. I use them mostly to stream The Tom Leykis Show every afternoon, but music quality is good too.

I've had 5 BT buds..
these pair great
range great
Best battery life ive ever seen by far by far ..I could say 12 hrs no prob..sounds like over hype ..
its not..
comfortable and hooks are formable and stays how you want,,,great
sounds great
cable is not annoying ..lays flat,,
cable is not on the hook part,,Great
nothing I don't like

These headphones are an amazing find! They sound and fit great... come with extra charging cables and 3 sized of earbuds, all of which fit into the perfect size case. They are 25% of the price of comparable sets and the quality is exceptional. I highly endorse this product and I paid full price for this product, this is not a paid endorsement.

They beep ALL OF THE TIME. And it’s super loud in my ears. Since I’ve gotten them this has been happening, I wrote in and never heard back. Even when they are fully charged they will beep. I did read in the reviews that some people said this happened and I was naive enough to think I would get a pair that didn’t. Don’t buy these, I’m sure there’s better blue tooth headphones out there.
If you don’t mind random beeping the entire time you use them, yes the sound quality is good.
Amazing quality for great price

Sound keeps cutting out as if it has a bad connection despite being wireless and has minor yet routine static, popping and other white noise issues while using it. Its range is also confoundingly bad. I can leave the connected device laying on a table about 6 feet away and the connection will get no worse than stated above, however If I simply have the device its linked to in my front shirt pocket (so that it's no more than 16 inches from the headphones) and I so much as put my arms in over the shirt pocket as if working on something in front of me or so much as turn my head to the right, I lose sound. Let alone if I keep the connected device in a pants pocket, then it becomes unusable. I tried to link it to other devices and had the same issues with the headphones and I connected other Bluetooth headphones to my devices and had no issues with them, so through process of elimination I've concluded that the problem is indeed these headphones and not the other devices.
If I could give it zero stars I would. It's absolute junk. Don't waste time and money
Light weight, blocks noise out well, and plenty of volume. Great so far!!
Great with music or using to connect the phone in the car, comfy fit too.
Great product, in fact I was pretty amazed.
great product and easy to use

Really solid headphones for the money.  They have good battery life and hold a charge very well when not in use.  I find them to fit well and stay in my ears when I'm running.  My only complaint would be that the sound quality is somewhat muddy and dark.

This is the second pair of earbuds I buy here. These were for my wife as she bought a cheap pair at Marshals and they gave out on her. These stay in your ear and have good sound quality. I use foam plugs I bought here on Amazon to use in the buds. They help with blocking out noise. You can’t go wrong with these earbuds . They stay in place,good battery life and the wire almost guarantees you won’t lose them.

The designers tried to make the ear piece extra flexible for either comfort or conformity to the ear, yet it just ended being ridiculously soft and malleable so that the ear piece falls off with any head movement.

Sound is amazing for the price. Only gripe, the rubber pieces that go over the ears, are a little flimsy and will occasionally allow the whole piece to fall out of your ear. Its only happened twice so far, and I was doing fairly intense cardio. Definitely a great guy.
I do not recommend. Voice is deteriorated in few weeks. Do not buy.
I bought these hoping I could use them in the gym. I have small ears and even with the smallest ear caps, they do not stay in my ears securely. I'll be searching for another pair.
Product works great while I exercise.

While I already have earbuds for my i-Phone which I use while walking to listen to my music, I really like these not only for the sound quality but because I no longer have  a wire trailing out of my clothes.

The first pair I bought was very good. I left them at a friends house while traveling so I bought a second pair; they were not the same.  No one can hear me when I use them. I was sorely disappointed with the inconsistency in quality. Thank God my friend sent my older pair in the mail.
Very easy to setup.Great sound good fit very satisfied.

Use them all the time for the gym.
They hace great battery life.
BEYYER THEN BEATS

I love these headphones! I’m a big time runner and these are seriously the ONLY earbuds that stay in my ears when I run! Others are ok when I walk but running is a diffeeent ballgame. Plus my ears are smaller I love these! The sound is awesome and comfort is the best!

The good: very reliable Bluetooth connection, truly waterproof headphones that seem totally impervious to sweat a few months in, battery life seems far stronger than advertised, great universal charging cable for lighting and micro USB

The OK: sound quality is passable, lots of wind noise when running
Better than I expected!! I purchased these for working out. They don't fall out of my ears while running.  Sound is great, easy to use! It even came with extra adapters for my car!!  Bonus!!

You get what you pay for. The sound is adequate, coming from Bose earbuds they're a very noticeable step down but not terrible. The pairing works quickly and I never had any trouble with them disconnecting.

My biggest gripe with them is the weight and fit. More specifically one bud is heavier than the other since it houses the controls and the battery. For me the result is that the heavier bud never stays in my ear while at the gym. Even the slightest tilt of my head and it falls out. I tried all the different tip sizes and still it falls out. Readjusting it constantly made it even worse than my wired headphones getting caught so I just switched back.

They were only 30 bucks so I can't really be that mad and they do work fine if I'm sitting at my desk but I bought them for the gym and since they fail there they fail entirely for me.

Had a hard time finding the perfect set of earbuds. Til now. LOVE these, Great sound, very comfortable and don't come out of my ears like the last few pairs I have tried. I WILL definitely buy more of these!
Awesome value! Great headphones.
They work great. Very happy with them
Not bad.  Not stellar either.  Could use more volume.
Nice headphones and good price.
My husband and I love the head phones. The sound is awesome. We have recommended them to other family membees
Waste of money. I am a light user and mine broke within 3 weeks. There is a plastic coating on the outside and it came off after 1.5 week of use. Don't by it not worth the money.
the ear piece is larger then I expected it to be.

This is an awesome headphone for the price.
The sound quality will put many headphones at triple the price to shame.
I bought the first set for my wife. I liked them so much, I'm ordering another one for myself.
work great  sound is excellent

Briefly dropped a pair in my dog's water bowl, dried off and they stopped working.

Ordered another pair and they changed the over ears to a more stiff uncomfortable material.

Blu tooth "Battery low" yells at you even when the sound is low.
Awesome headphones for the price, good clear sound and also comes with a lot of little extra great buy would def recommend to everyone
Overall a great cheap set of headphones. Only problem i have is they aren't super comfortable in your ears.
Not bad for a cheap product. Material is cheap. Comfortable when running.

So far so good. I keep turning it off by mistake because of where the buttons are so I need to get use to that. I also have to adjust the ear buds so they stay put. I think a lot of these reviews should done after a mont or two of use.
I like that they offer different sizes. The range is great at the gym so I don't have to carry my phone around to listen to music.
I haven't had a chance to take them on the road yet, but they work great on the treadmill.
These are so easy to use. The clarity is great and they last longer than I expected on a charge. Recommend highly. Very pleased. I am a 65 year old user. If I can use them anyone can.

My headphones are amazing. I liked them so much I bought another pair for a friend. I am able to hear sounds from my music I never knew existed. The battery is advertised as lasting 6 hours at 3/4 volume, I've never needed to raise the volume over halfway. This product far exceeds my expectations

So far so good. They are exactly as described, arrived quickly, and followed by a friendly email from the manufacturer checking on things. These are very nice for in the gym or mowing the grass. I like the extras too, a car charger and converter cable for charging. Nice.
The ear holder is to loose it does not stay in my ear and the distance is less than 10 ft before i hear static
Great comfortable fit with great sound quality and strong signal. Ideal for.all around fitness, running, biking and outdoors.
I've used other earbuds for running and found The Senso  headphones to be the best. Audio was very clear and battery lasted at least 7 hours. I would recommend it to anyone.
I loved them, light weight, perfect for running and airplane mode
I like these better than my beats 3. I'm not an audiophile. These are easy to use, charge, turn on and off, etc.

Love these!!! Great price point and great value! Love the  ear size options as I have small eats/ear canal and often times ear buds hurt. There do not. Very simple to use. Use it all the time at the gym!

I just got these two days ago and, so far, I love them! I fully charged them before I first used them and they seem to be holding a charge really well. Sound quality is great and the range is good too. I was listening to music and left my phone in my room, it wasn't until I was on the other side of the house that I started to lose signal. The house has an open floor plan but there were at least two walls between the headphones and my phone and I was probably right at that 30ft range.
The only suggestion I have is to have a pair of headphones with different ear buds. I'm not really interested in noise canceling (although it can be nice) and I really like the style of earbuds like you get with a Samsung phone. These would be absolutely perfect if they had that style earbud with this device. But that's just a suggestion, otherwise, great product!

Great quality sound but volume is too loud even at the lowest setting on my computer and phone. Unfortunately on an Apple device there’s no way of adjusting volume at the lowest setting without sacrificing the quality of the sound. I’m afraid of damaging my hearing so I rarely use these.
They are awesome. Sound quality is great. Very comfortable. All the accessories rock: lightening and mini USB charger & Two port USB car plug in. LOVE THEM!
Excelente  sound long battery life
Bought these for my boyfriend for Christmas when another brand failed to work well.  He loves them!  Sound great and comfortable.

These headphones work great. The sound is great and they have a good range.
The only thing I don't like us that they don't fit well in my ears. I tried the different sizes that came with it, but none of them are comfortable. Maybe I just have strange ears!

They keep disconnecting at a certain battery charge level but most the time its seems
to work pretty good and the cost was pretty decent so it was worth I'll keep them
Long battery, inexpensive, sound quality is poor for my taste. Replaced with a set of Mpow.
these things are dope as hell.
I bought beats last year that were stolen these headphones are the same quality if not better at a fraction of the cost. I absolutely love these headphones very affordable and good quality.

I had these for barely over a month and they are already dead.  The battery wont take a charge.  They seem of similar build quality to much more inexpensive options....and I was wrong to think paying more meant higher quality with these

I would give it a five star if it had extra features like voice notification when the battery is low vs looking for the ligh. The other feature missing is the reverse or fast forward unless I don't know about it yet. The sound is great and the bass is good. I use this for my gym and walking/hiking activities. So far it fits well and barely notice its on my ears. For the price I would recommend.

Unfortunately my ears are much too small, even for the smallest little rubber replacement pieces. They wanted to fit but the ear coil went WAY over the top of my ear and they just couldn’t stay on properly. Sound was okay, not incredible, but they would have gotten the job done if they had fit my ears.

I used these head phones a lot to work out. They are good, and they stay in your ear very good but they are not durable at all. The first pair I ordered stopped working in less than a year, but I was able to get a new pair under warranty. The most recent pair now only works in the right ear. The left ear stopped working. For the price, they are not bad...but don't expect them to last more than a year before needing to be replaced.

Good buy! Exceptionally easy to use. Put them on and link up. Simple, easy to find button press turns 'em on and links to bluetooth (once they've been set up). I especially like this feature. These are probably the easiest bluetooth phones to get going I've had. I generally don't like ear buds--they never seem to fit my ears--but the clips hold these in place. The clip is soft and not at all uncomfortable. In face they are quite comfortable when worn for a long tme. The sound is above average. Overall very satisfied with these and a happy customer
Used them twice so fdar and they work great.

Great battery life
Good fit and comfortable
Little deep on the bass
A great affordable wireless headset.

Great for gym!!
Not a long range but good quality sound.
My son loves them for running!!

It provides the right ratio cost-benefit. It performances as I expected, and the most important, I am based in Mexico, I purchased it online, and I got it here with no issues at all. Thank you for manufacturing a great product which meets high expectations.
Only issue is random skipping of songs on my playlist

These work great for my home exercising.  They sound great and they stay on really well.  It's so nice not having to mess with cords.  I use them connected with my tablet and they were very easy to set up.  I would recommend these.

I'm on my second pair of these.  First ones lasted fairly well, second ones died today, one day after the 'warranty' ended... That's just wrong.  Looks like it is time to explore a different brand.  Update - I contacted Amazon who contacted SENSO support.  24 hours later there are a new pair being shipped to replace the faulty ones, that is all I can ask for!  These were my third pair of SENSO buds.  The first lasted two years being used for working out every day.  My wife has the second after about a year, and they are working just fine.  I'm very pleased with the support, no hassle, a response via email came about an hour after they were contacted.  Had me try a reset (which is good to know for future reference how to do), and when that didn't work they shipped me a new pair.  The sound is very good and they work well for my purposes.  Performance plus the support and I'm going with 5 stars.  and then 5 months later, same as the previous pair, dead.
Second pair of them since I wore the first ones out. They’re great!
It's ok but when cord gets wet from gym it sticks and pulls earbud out!
Nice product
These are my first set of Bluetooth headphones and I love them.  Super easy to set up and connect to my device.  Couldn't be happier.
They are light weight and great for running. Also the air vent holder for the car is great and works perfectly for my phone that previously didn't fit in any.

I've had them for about a week and they sound great. I went through 2 pairs of more expensive "name brands" and these sound much better and actually stay on your ears. I did a 5 mile run with them and had no problem whatsoever.
I am very happy with these headphones. They are comfortable and pair easily. They are not noise canceling, but a good product.
3 months in, doesn't turn on anymore. Don't waste your money
Brand new out of the box and only the right side ear bud is working. The left is dead silent. I should have known better than to buy these.

2 problems with these headphones. 1. The blutooth is very weak. If you are indoors at a gym, then they are fine. If you go outside, then something interferes with the signal, and the sound gets real choppy. 2. If you are outside and the wind blows, you get a lot of wind noise coming through the headphones. I have a different set of blutooth headphones, and those don't do that. In addition, my other set has no problem with interference outdoors. If you are only going to use these inside, they are OK.  If you are walking from your car to the gym, then the sound will break up.
This is my third set so I obviously love them

The main issue I am having with these earbuds is the L and R printed on the side of the earbuds is extremely small.  Even with reading glasses and a magnifying glass, the letters are just too small.  The area available for the L and R is large, but they chose to only use 1% of that area.  Not sure why, but it makes the product difficult to use.
Sound is awesome
Set up is easy. The cords, case, etc are great. Sound is HD. Comfortable to wear. Would definitely purchase again.
I got these 2 weeks ago and so far they’re awesome!
That are great.
Awesome!
Amazing product. Nice sound, very light, good battery, speaks and says connention and power status
This is a great pair of headphones. I have had issues with fit with other brands, and these are perfect.  Sound quality is great.  Microphones is clear outdoors. Very happy with these headphones.

Avid music and podcast listener. Extremely pleased with the performance and cost of these headphones. Like most headphone users I have purchased many that didn't deliver or stopped working after a brief period of usage. The SENSO Bluetooth Headphones have delivered with quick easy link up to my device and really nice balanced tone, bass and clarity for music, movie and podcast media. I will be purchasing these units for gifts this holiday season which is probably about the highest praise I can give any product. You won't regret buying them for yourself.
Repackaging was GREAT, feel good and the sound is really clealy. Bass is really good and for the price you can't go wrong. Well worth the money!!!!
Have only used them once, but so far they are awesome. Great buy!
Had sporadic cutting in and out.  Stopped working after a few weeks.
Great sound, great fit, great price, great customer service follow up to guarantee my satisfaction. You will not be disappointed in these headphones!
Didnt like it. I would prefer TaoTronics
They aren't very comfortable to wear & the sound quality isn't great.

Got mine in November 2016, so I've had them for about 10 months.  Sound is fantastic and they are extremely comfortable and very easy to use.  The microphone sound is very clear, and I have sync'd with my computer, an Iphone 6, 6s, and a 7.  I'm giving it four stars for two reasons: (1) The battery life is not great.  I travel quite a bit, and the headphones start dying between 4 and 5 hours.  That's barely airport and flight time.  (2) Not Noise canceling.  Trust me, it does not cancel noise.  It says "passive" noise canceling, and if it is, its VERY passive.  Other than that, I don't think you can do much better for $33.

Great set of headphones! The sound quality is good, the product quality is great, and it comes with all the extra little pieces. Great buy, I highly recommend!

If all Senso products are this good and priced as well, I will buy more.
Works fantastic...sounds amazing...Only small issue is with mic and its little weak to the listener on the other side.
love it!
Good sound!
I bought these for my husband, and so far he loves them!
This awesome little headset has some great sound inside.  Great value for the price with a very impressive set of features and specifications.
Great sound, fit and easy pairing.  I use a pair of $200 beats ear buds and these don't have quite their range I enjoy them more because of the freedom.
I love them!!

No bass in these earphones. And they broke in less than 3 months of use. The left speaker got a faulty connection. The warranty site provided doesn't provide much help, getting them replaced. Otherwise good earbuds for the price.

Gave these as a gift, followed up to see how my son enjoys them and he likes them quite a bit. Only complaint is they don't have magnets on the back of the buds so when he takes them out of his ears he needs to make sure they don't fall while he's doing other things..

I lost the last pair I had so I purchased another. These are the best they they were great and stay on when working out. The price is great I have no complaints and I recommend this product to everyone
They work great and very comfortably for long periods of time. Connects instantly to phone when turned and seems to have very good battery life. Works great for thr gym would recommend.
Well I haven't had any problems, until now, they won't charge and they just quick working. I used them two days ago and then to turn on it doesn't work! So was wondering how to return them!
Exactly what I was hoping for.  Great sounding blue tooth headphones at an affordable price.

Maybe I have small ears, but these things were way too big. The left earpiece wouldn't stay in (admittedly, I have trouble getting things to stay in that ear, so maybe my ear canal's a weird shape) and the hooks that go over the ears sat way above my actual ears. So by the time it was low enough to touch my ear (where it should sit), the actual earbud was totally fallen out of my ear (this was on both ears).

So I guess if you think your ears might be a little on the smaller side, you probably want to try a different product.
Excellent product. Loud and fits well in ear, charge lasts over 4 hours. Delivered on time and as expected. Clarity of sound good and a bit of noise cancellation.

My first wireless, bluetooth headphones and I didn't know what to expect. I haven't used it much (3x), but I've realized that the over-the-ear piece is kind of flimsy BUT it stays intact when I'm running ... I just wish it was a little bit more firm.

The quality of the sound is nice, really nice. The only drawback is the loud feedback/noise I hear when it's windy outside. Yet I'm not sure if I need to adjust the size of the ear piece or just wiggle it around to minimize the noise (still experimenting on this).

What also dropped this review from a 5-star to 4-star is I like to wear headbands that cover my ears when it's cold outside and because of the profusion of the earpiece, it makes it somewhat uncomfortable. It presses into my ears and after long periods of use, makes my ears sore. I'll have to see what happens when I put my snowboarding helmet on how the comfort level feels.

I really LOVE the fact that there are no wires to get in my way!

Reviewed MANY other wireless, bluetooth headphones and these are the reasons I chose the SENSO:
(1) wireless, bluetooth, tangle-free capability
(2) waterproof, sweat proof protection
(3) positive reviews
Do not stay on my ears secured

Great price for the product. The Bluetooth does get lost eveyonce in a while during a run if my phone is in my pocket, but it quickly regains connection. Sound quality is just okay. For the price though, totally worth it! And the charge lasts great!
Affordable and work great. Not as cool as AirPods. Gets the job done.

Amazing support team and great customer service!!
I had an issue with my order and they replaced it for free.
Great earphones for an awesome price!!
So far they are good. I had a couple of times where they would cut off. My phone was in my pocket so it was not far away. Sound is good so far. Will update.

I returned these because they did not fit my ears. The ear “hook” was just that, a hook! They were silicone & soft, but not flexible! They would not wrap securely around my ear, and as a result, they fell out. Don’t buy these if you plan to use them for running. I contacted the seller and was told maybe a pair slipped by quality assurance. So I bought 3 different models from this company, and yes….they all “slipped” off my ears. I returned them all.

For anyone trying to decide which earphones to buy, you may wanna consider these . I was almost put off by the lower price, but after reading the reviews, I decided to buy. I bought 2 sets, one for me and for my trainer. Sound quality, cost, comfort won't disappoint.
BY FAR A SUPERIOR BLUE TOOTH LISTENING EXPERIENCE  QUALITY GREAT LIGHT WEIGHT SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE AS USUAL I LUV YOU AMAZON
Light weight, great sound, they stay on, great product.!
Perhaps I'm being unfair and it should be five stars, but it cuts out sometimes almost like a short. The sound however, is terrific.
Better than expected. Comfortable to wear and sounds very clear.

Why is there a continuous blinking light on at all times? I use these primarily in a darker setting and the blinking blue led is ridiculously obnoxious. I've put electrical tape over it. All the blinking is completely unnecessary. Otherwise, they do the job. I've had them for almost 2 years now and they're still going strong so that says something.
great sound & very loud, too.
Works great! I loved it so much I ordered another one for my mom.
Works well and is as described
my wife thinks the world of them. great sound im very happy with my purchase
The sound quality on these headphones was good considering the price, but the build quality is cheap and they broke after only 10-12 uses.
I really really liked these for the first couple months. Lately they are having some issues though, only one side works well. But i did get the warranty.

I bought these about 16 months ago. I’ve used them for everything from exercise to garden/yard work to computer work. They stay firm and comfortable for me.

They have been very durable for the price. A little bulky looking at first, but they have great battery life. I still get over 8 hours from a full charge.

Unfortunately, it’s time to replace them since the wires have developed a loose connection from wear and tear. No complains, they have been well worn.

The only negative marks I could give these are there seem to be a few bugs in the firmware. This can cause disconnects and difficulty connecting. Nothing a headphone/Bluetooth reset can’t fix. This may be fixed in current versions.

Also these a VERY loud. Even the quietest volume is too loud for casual listening. I fixed this by stuffing a tiny cotton ball in them. Though... at times the excessive volume is a great feature... like when drowning out loud kids :).

Overall ... I’m very satisfied with price, performance and durability.

Comfortable and easy to use. They paired beautifully with my iPhone 6. Having the car charger and extra cable so I can charge both my phone and earphones is very convenient. Because they are waterproof, I don't worry about using them if it is snowing or raining.
great sound , great price, great fit

Really great headphones; I was pleasantly surprised given the price point.  As good as the more expensive brands on the market.  Packaged very nicely and works wonderfully with my iPhone and Apple Watch Series 2.
bluetooth worked okay..with two different devices..but the sound is god awful...anyone that says different needs their hearing checked..but for the price i took a gamble

Have had mine for 1 1/2 years last week after a 3hrs bike ride I forgot that they were placed in my back jersey  pocket and they went into the washer....after two days of drying I put them on thinking that they were cooked but they played with no base. I let them dry for another day and the base came back they are functioning normal now. The only caveat I have is be careful when charging make sure you don't bend the cord back too far as it's pretty close to the charging port and you can create a short that can cut out the left speaker, this happened with a previous unit several years ago,
awesome sound.  much better than i expected! Great job Invotek

I have no real complaints except if i purchase another set I would look for the ear buds that have the controls away from the ears to cut down on the bulky look. I do like the wireless part of this technology over the wired earbuds I was using.

Amazing headphones simply superb.

Little bit of advice though don't double click the big red button or it ends up calling your ex girlfriend. Thanks invotek

Great for the price. Nice, solid feel and clean finish. Easy to use and plenty of functionality. Pairs easy. Sound quality is what you would expect at this price range via Bluetooth, nothing audiophile but great for the price
For my job it works great

The sound is at par with earphones twice the price I had before. Bluetooth pairing fast, and battery holds all day. I have no complain though Im sure the customer support is responsive judging from the personalized after-sales follow-up on their product.
Good sound...great controls...but i really wish the ear pieces were flexible and adjustable.  I wanted these for running and the ear pieces dont really hold them in place.  Good value though.

Average set of headphones.  I use it mainly for running and so far so good.  Sound is good, but a bit on the muffled side.  Connection is simple via bluetooth.  One star off for intermittent drop off of sound between device and headphones.  Decent quality for the price.

Great, does the job except the cord is a little too long. My wife has the anker sport headphones and it fits perfectly. Only reason I went senso is because of its overall ratings and the fact that the audio buttons where on the actual headphone and not the cord. Might have to switch over to anker and deal with the buttons dangling on cord.
I could not pair it to my smartphone any longer after I used for around a month.

These headphones worked great until they completely cut-out and stopped charging... I used these at the gym every day for about 2 months until they completely failed...I don't really know what happened, but very disappointing.
Paired well with iPhone 7 plus. Working well.

Did my entire workout with these headphones. Great sound quality, crystal clear music and it blocked out the annoying pop music over the speakers. Felt very light and comfortable. Never once slipped out of my ears while running or lighting weights. Great product!
Too soon for a meaningful review but VERY impressed so far. Will follow up 👍

Don' let the 3 star rating turn you away, I just am not that fond of them. They just don't fit my head / ears and are kind of heavy, and tend to slide off when hanging around my neck, even under light movement.

On the other hand, they are LOUD! They have pretty deep bass response, almost too much for me! They connect quickly and easily, and have an AMAZING battery life in comparison to most other devices I have used. Truly 6-8 hrs of continuous playback on high to max volume. That is rare.
Good price and quality !
I really love my new headphones.
They fit perfectly nice and light  great batter life

Didnt have the highest expectations, just wanted headphones that wouldn't fall off while i was on the treadmill. Kinda crappy sound quality but way better and more convenient than some of the other options

The Senso Bluetooth Headphones came a day after I ordered them.  The directions provided were easy to follow and I was able to quickly sync the headphones to my Android phone.  They were easy to adjust, and I liked that three pairs of tips were provided so I could customize my listening experience.  A compact case is provided and it's protective enough that I can throw it in my purse or backpack without worrying about damage to my headphones.  Finally, they were inexpensive and the best wireless headphones I've owned.

They worked ok at first. Within the first 6 hours of use they started dropping Bluetooth connection randomly and only got worse. Also became very uncomfortable after about 30 minutes. The one good thing I can say is the battery life lasted as long as it was supposed to.
Was very sastisfied until last week when it stopped working.
It sounds awesome and is great quality for the price!

When I first got them, it was great, sound was great, no sound interruptions great bass, etc. I got this end of Jan, and they’ve recently started having sound interruptions. Definitely not something you want when you’re in the groove exercising on the treadmill or something.
Terrible, fall out of my ears all the time. The sound quality sucks as well and could be better. Guys if you buy a headphone invest in a good one. You won’t use this.
They work well and sound good. The only annoyance is that the cord is a bit gritty and when working out, it can get caught on my neck when sweaty. Generally happy with the item.

All I have to say is that after two and half years of serious use, training, abuse, etc - these things have NOT failed me.  They sound great, last a long time, take all kinds of abuse, charge quick and easy - they just do EVERYTHING right.  There is not a single doubt that I am buying these again - if they ever even die on me.  I love finding a great product at a great price.  I almost want to buy three or four more sets so I have these for the next ten or twenty years.  Seriously, for $20 - my goodness.  God bless this company.
These earbuds are great for the price. I own a pair of Bose earbuds and these are a great alternative to the higher priced Bose. I am pleasantly surprised how good these are!
Easy to use and awesome sound.  I have purchased other Senso products and they back their products with a great warranty and service.
Great sound quality, comfortable to wear, and come with a nice case. I took off one star because they fall off my ears fairly easily and because it would be nice if the battery lasted longer.
I bought these for use at the gym and trail runs. I absolutely love them! They stay put, have great sound quality, and we're really easy to set up.

These were a gift for a family member who is active and uses them while working out. He likes the quality of sound and bass response. He mentioned that it took a while to get used to the shape/size/weight of the product at first, but since becoming accustomed to them he is quite satisfied. Battery life is good also.
Awesome product.
Great for the price!

I LOVE THESE! They charge super fast, and have stood upto daily use for months. I'm a woodworker, so I always have headphones in to listen to podcasts / music / etc. It's also great to talk on the phone with these. After owning so many bad headphones, I'm so glad to have found these.
Unfortunately I have a hearing problem so this did not work.  It was not loud enough.  Sorry I can’t be of more help.
love the headphones, they are great  and for a great price, will definitely recommend

My wife is a dedicated runner and has been using these for a while now. She is good at testing the headphones that I buy her and these have held up well with sweat exposure. The only difficult part is getting the charging port cover open, but that's probably what makes a good moisture seal.
they work good,,,but what i wanted them for..for the pool,does not work...not very happy

These buds are awesome!!!
They stay in during heavy workouts!!!
Just what I was looking for..

Love, love, these earphones. Sound quality is wonderful. They fit nicely in the ear and are comfortable. At first I had trouble getting them paired with my iPad. They worked wonderful with the iPhone but could not get them to work with iPad. I wrote the company via email and in about 10 minutes I had the response and easy solution.
Now I'm all set to using them daily. They came with a nice carry case and charge cord. Quick to set up to use with a good eight hours of use before I need to recharge.

Love these earbuds..I would like to say this product is of fine and durable quality for a very good price. The wireless Bluetooth connection works well and gives a very good sound quality.  It comes with a neat carrying case, usb short charging cable, a car charger, extra ear earbuds cover and a wire tie. I own a pair of beats headset so i was able to compare the quality of sound and I can say the sound from the SENSO is very good.  it looks very smart and I would most certainly recommend to others..
Perfect for working out - volume is loud and I can get into my zone. Good purchase for the money.

These headphones performed extremely well I’m purchasing another pair because I stepped on mine and broke them. My only concern is the bass drowns out the mids and highs. But for $30 I’m not complaining.

After one week of use. Fits really nicely on my head and very comfortable. Battery level indicator on phone is helpful. Battery life is accurat Bluetooth pairing is a snap with my iPhone. Great value for the money. Compare Senso to expensive Powerbeats: Senso sound is almost as good as Powerbeats. The distance you can put between devices is about half of Powerbeats (Powerbeats will receive signal two rooms away, Senso will receive one room away) The big difference is that the Senso is so affordable that if you lose them it won't break your bank to replace them.
Works grest for me. Good sound on music and voice isnt bad. Great for price.
Senso's  response was immediate, simple and satisfactory.

I like the sound, but find that it starts breaking up whenever I leave the room that contains my tablet or computer.  It also breaks up if I move around a lot.  The design of the earbuds make them difficult to fit the ear and they are uncomfortable after wearing them for more than 15-20 minutes.  The fit would probably be better if the part that goes around the ear was more firm.
Sound is good and easy to connected. Shipinged was fast! I loveit.

The pair I ordered in December stopped charging. Not sure why, but I tried all of the resets advertised. So contacted customer service. With a few email exchanges (no big deal) they sent me a brand new pair. Awesome!  The new pair works just fine. Great customer service!
fit great.. love them!!!

Got a chance to work out with these in yesterday and was very surprised by how comfortable they were! They stay connected to my phone the entire time I worked out and the sound quality was absolutely amazing! I would definitely buy these again.
Very happy with them.

If you ride a bike or run fast or even walk on a windy day. You will hate these headphones. The wind noise hitting the large headphone body make them pretty unusable. They are also so bass heavy they will make your head hurt. I had to Eq the bass in order to even make them usable. Not much high end, they sound muddy. For the price they are ok. If you are using them to work out in a gym you will probably like them. But the wind noise is crazy on them. be warned.

Love these buds! I've been used to wearing the LG around the neck buds but decided I'd like to move on to lighter weight buds and a design that wouldn't fall off when i do situps in the gym. Had my mind set on buying the Beats brand but decided to give these a try given the price difference along with the awesome reviews by nearly 3,000 people.

Getting the Product.
I live in OH so the package arrived the next day as it came in from KY. Opened the box, put the headphones on, and immediately impressed.

Comfort.
Feels completely weightless and VERY comfortable. I normally can tell right away if earbuds will not be comfortable long-term and will immediately look for another product (discomfort doesn't get better with time...right?)....I CANNOT feel the buds rubbing against my ears. I know they're there because music...beautiful music...is being pumped out but man the comfort is ridiculous.

Sound Quality - The sound quality is amazing. With my LGs I had to adjust and turn up as loudly as possible to get the desired effect and still wasn't satisfied. I put these guys on and the sound is amazing....so i think I MUST have the volume on my phone up high....NOPE.....my iphone 7 is at about 3 bars for volume....I'M FLOOOOOOOORED! So i turn the headphones up to see the differences and it's just amazing. Played different types of music Nina Simone, Lenny, Adele, Chaka etc JUST TO CHECK and it's amazing that every track sounds crisp and clean.

Definitely would recommend these headphones. Won't be buying another brand as long as I have these. Considering purchasing another set for my wife just to have a back up in the house. I won't post a pic as the pics in the add are spot on and true to what they say comes in the box.

After owning two sets of the PowerBeats wireless and being disappointed with their reliability given the price I am happy to report the SENSO option is a suitable replacement. The ear piece can be manipulated to fit your ear and the sound is just as good as the powerbeats in my opinion.

Very poor bluetooth connection - just about anything in the line of sight will cause a connection cutout.  Sound quality is subpar.  Somewhat painful in ear ( no, I don’t have small ear canals). Don’t stay put during active movement.  Pushing pause tends to open some other random app and start playing something or dial your last call.  If you're looking for a cheap bluetooth earbud, these work, but you get what you pay for.

I ordered these to wear at the gym and I was very happy with the product, the sound is great especially for the price, even better than $175 pair that I had. But on that note do to me sweating at the gym the first pair failed But I contacted the cellar/ manufacturer and they replace them pretty fast for me and II bear have been great.

These pair easily with my phone and stay on. Sound quality good.
These were a returned pair/used pair - it was not fun to change out the earwax flecked earphone covers ( but I quickly put on a clean pair and kept as I was leaving for a trip the next day and desperately needed headphones.)
Has not failed me yet. Good packaging, nice that they included several sized ear buds. Great value for cost

I bought these headphones for running and strength training and am very dissappointed.

They are a huge distraction during both activities.

For running:
They constantly come unseated from the ear canal, only hanging on by the loop that goes over the top of the ear. Also, the free cord that connects each ear piece is very annoying as it flops around on your shoulders. I tried using the tie pieces but they slide down after a few steps due to sweat and their purpose is defeated.

For lifting:
The free cord is a major issue with head turning. It will drag on the back of your neck with head movement and constantly tug on each ear piece. This has me constantly readjusting how they sit in my ear canal.

I'm skeptical that any of these reviewers have actually exercised in these headphones....
Pretty amazing!  I was able to go to the garage, 30 feet from computer, and maintain perfect reception. Easy to use, easy to charge.  Good sound.
Excellent quality or sound.  Easy to use and the charge lasts a long time.
works as expected. the product also includes a quality iphone/android cable and a car charger. good value.

I wanted some bluetooth ear buds so I could get rid of the cord. I listen to audio books while working in the shop and the a dangling cord gets in the way.
These ear buds work great. The connected to my phone with no problem.
I like the voice that tells you if they are on or off, no guessing if you hit the button right.
Added plus was they have a built in mic. I must have missed that in the ad.
With the mic, I can answer the phone
Great ear buds.
In the gym. A good product

My old pair worked great, but then my dog chewed them up. The new pair cut out Everytime I turn my head. Very irritating and I didn't manage to get them in the mail before my return label expired. I am going to order a different brand this time.
Just incredible.  These are comfortable and the sound is outstanding.  Maybe a little too much bass for some , but these sound much better than many high dollar pairs I have heard!
I have been through at least six headphone over the last 15 years. This set works great and I hope it continues to do so. Bill E

In ear headphones never seem to work for me although the memory foam earbud adapters for these worked great, until 1 month in and the foam fell apart. I guess you get what you pay for. I’d buy replacement foam covers if I could.
Love them. Like the on/off ability to change to next song and volume control. Plus other features I haven’t used yet. Sounds great to me. I use them to run with
Good value for the peice

Purchased these primarily for workouts and dog walks. Great value for the money - I wanted something inexpensive so I don't need to worry about losing them or destroying them. However, they don't seem flimsy - they worked well even though I put them in the wash by accident.

Pros:
* Cost
* Stay snug in ear during different types of exercise (running, weightlifting, yoga, walks)
* Audio quality sufficient for audiobooks/podcasts, haven't tested on music as much
* Charge seems to last for a while

Cons:
* Controls are sometimes counter-intuitive. Have had it accidentally "Dial last number" rather than power off a few times. I wish they were simpler - just on/off and pairing mode.
* Placing phone in my pocket can lead to very choppy noise. I haven't compared this with other BT headsets though and don't know if this is a simple interference issue that nothing would solve, phone issue, or headset issue.
ok
Awesome quality and sound...  I bought a 2nd pair...  better sound quality than my former pair ... beats
Long battery  ✌🏽♥️
I am very satisfied with my wireless headphones. They were easy to use. They're light and the earpiece is flexible so it molds to my ear shape.
These work great!  Very comfortable and easy to use while running. You can adjust volume, skip songs, on/off and pair to your device very simply.  I would recommend to others

Very nice packaging. Comes with everything you need to get started along with power cables for the ear buds and your iPhone/android phones too with a car power adapter. Give them a charge and listen. Btw don't judge the sound quality right away, while quite good to start with, they do get better after a few hrs of use. All in all, these 5 star reviews aren't a fluke, or SENSO employees, these seem to be a really nice Bluetooth earbud especially at this price point.

I didn't expect studio quality sound, but I loved the price point and great reviews. The product has met my expectations perfectly. The item is well packaged with a few bonus extras that were welcome. The headphones are lightweight, easy to pair, remain secure, and provide more-than-adequate sound quality for my needs. People on the other end of the phone said the quality was just fine, but I also didn't have a lot of background noise. They stay in place well both during weight lifting and running. I also took some time laying down to stretch and never felt like they slipped around. They honestly were easy to forget you're wearing despite the music in your ears.

Dropped a star because: The ear hook feels flimsy, but I'll admit they stayed secure. The LED indicate is tough to see and a little sketchy IMO. Last, and most important, I was having connection problems when the phone was in my left pocket and, apparently, the bluetooth antenna is in the right ear piece. I never lost connection, just a few brief losses of audio.

I’m a sweater and the earpieces still pop out. I’ve tried every size. Still haven’t taken them to the pool but I lose connectivity with in 10 ft so I doubt going 25 meters away from my phone will allow it to work.
Works great, just wish it had a little more volume.  Other than that, cant complain.
Absolutely love these earbuds! Sound quality is great

If you are looking for a low priced semi-decent sound quality BT earbuds then give them a try.  After years of running with wires I decided to give wireless a try.  Set up was easy and I had no problems with connectivity.  The problem soles im with the sound. They have WAY too much bass for me and not nearly enough trebile. Unfortunately there isn't a way to adjust this. For some it might be ok but for me I'm going to have to spend the extra $$ on a better pair. Hope this helps steer some of you in the right direction!

I was excited for these headphones some thing were a down fall- they do stay on your ears and block out enough noise. The hook that goes over your ear is not adjustable, so when the buds are in your ear the hook either fits or it doesn't. For me, my ears were too small...I sort think most ears would be too small. I went on a run for the first time with them and they kept popping out of my ears and I kept having to shove them back in or put the hook back over my ear. I was fiddling with them so much that I wasn't paying attention to the sidewalk while I was running, stepped on a pinecone and severely rolled my ankle. I would have gone down hard but lucky for me there was a car parked nearby that I caught myself on. As it was it was some time before I got up to limp home and I hurt for the next several days...so yeah, I really hold no kind feelings toward these headphones.

[[VIDEOID:bae93076bdbd5e80dae1e573c4837854]] I needed new running headphones after my first pair had an unfortunate run in with a thorn bush. I've used regular plug in earbuds forever, but definitely get frustrated with tangles and having them fall out when my ears get sweaty on a hot day.

Enter these Senso Bluetooth headphones. They're a huge value for the price; the build quality is very high, the sound quality is good for running/general use (they're not going to blow away any serious audiophile, though), and they come with more accessories than a teenage girl.

Connecting them to my phone was seamless, and I had no issues with the audio cutting out like some other bluetooth devices. The headphones are light but don't feel cheap; my only complaint is that the over-ear plastic piece is pretty flimsy. I have small ears, and wish it was a little sturdier so it didn't move around so much. Not worth detracting a star for (they still fit my head and ear fine), just surprising as the photos make them look pretty rigid.

The headphones have independent volume control, and a power button. They do need to be charged, but come with two chargers AND a car adapter, which is pretty huge, give that some products come with no cables these days. They seem to hold charge for ~7-8 hours. I used them for a full work day and they still didn't die from low battery.

Great value, made even better by build quality and abundance of accessories.
Love these earbuds! Great sound, comfort and service!
One of the best Bluetooth headphone I ever used, and I tried many, only thing is, after using it for 5-7 hours it starts irritating my ear.

Work, I only wanted them to remove cord tangle, does it. No base, just good for casual listening, don't expect apple or beats sound. Works, paired flawlessly, I am not a sound aficionado but I do like a little base.

I purchased senso headphones March of 2017. They were great! In November 2017 somehow during my workouts they started to get low in volume. I emailed customer service their response was fast. Senso customer service made me feel comfortable with my purchase and future purchases I will make.

Most satisfied I have ever been with a product ever! Let me start from the beginning.  Im a crossfitter and recently decided to put a little bit more running into my fitness lifestyle. I only like to run in running shorts that have the built in briefs, thats another story in itself, but lets just say I'm pretty happy (with the fit/ not so much price) so far with the 4 pair of UA running shorts I just purchased.  Next I head over to Target to look for a pair of bluetooth headphones.  Many pairs upwards of $80 to $200, I elected to go with the $57? wireless around the ear "whatever" brand.  Fast forward to a test run on a treadmill and I'm totally POed.  I want the music cranked when I'm working out and all I could hear was the treatmill, with a little whisper of music in the background.  I found myself continually trying to max out the volume which was already pegged out.  Not to mention that the ear piece was extremely uncomfortable.  Fast forward again to Amazon Prime's best seller and this purchase which came in in a quick 2 days.  Never had something more comfortable on and around my ear, sound will make you go deaf, the wire is short enough so its not bouncing around on your neck when running, and the accessories and carry thing well constructed.  So purchases these now, and hit me up for any questions.  Mr. B O B

TL:DR Review
Sound Quality: 4.9/5
Comfort: 4/5
Battery Life: 4.8/5
-annoying buzzing noise

Full Review:
I almost gave these Bluetooth earbuds a five-star rating. They sound quality is great if you are listening to music on anything above 20% of the maximum volume. When listening to anything lower than 20% max volume (podcasts, breaks between songs, soft songs), the left earbud will emit a pesky electric buzzing noise. The buzzing noise will overpower the sound of any soft music or podcast that you may be listening to. I would not recommend these for non-music purposes because of the buzzing noise. Also, I'd like to point out that the right earbud does not emit any buzzing noise whatsoever. The ear hooks are not adjustable and are too big for my ears, I typically let them dangle on the outside of my ears because of this.
The only thing I dislike about these are the arms that go over the ears,  they are not hard and sturdy but Soft and flexible A little too flexible as they tend to fall off.
Great headphones. Right out of the box easy to use. Sound is really good.
