bought them as replacements - much nicer, came with additional chargers which was great - shipped very quickly - thanks!
Easily paired with all my devices. Good sounds. easy to handle.hands free.
Headphones are great.  Only had them a couple of days, but they work great and are easy to use.
Great for the price but wish the ear hooks were adjustable.

I really like these headphones. Bluetooth works great and the earpieces are incredibly comfortable, including the silicone-type flap. The sound is alright, but what more can you expect from $34 headphones? It said they were originally over $140ish but I don't know if this was just a simple markup or if this was a consistent price. Anyway, I think they're well worth the price... at least for now.

Will update in a few months if and when sound goes out in one earpiece :)

2nd set I bought. 1st pair lasted two years. This set didn’t even last two weeks.
Just completely poor quality. The speaker part would always separate from rest of housing so rubber ear piece is just dangling.
The stupid flexible ear supports are trash. They have no strength to maintain the shape of your ear so are easily pulled off and aren’t durible at all.

I just bought a different, cheaper costing pair that had same or better reviews.
Love these.  Easily connected to my iPhone 6 Plus.  Easy to charge with a regular wall charger...like I use for my kindle or phone.

I love these earbuds! The volume control is easy, the volume is amazing, the bass is awesome! Unfortunately, I only gave it four stars because I purchased them in February and as of October, the left ear went out ☹️... BUT I'm going to purchase a new pair because I really love the comfort of the ear hooks on my little bitty ears- not to mention the quality of the bass and volume. I highly recommend these. Hopefully, I don't have the same problem with the new pair. 🤞
The ear loop ,is too big for my ears...
Excellent sound! Very comfortable to wear for several hours while I work and listen to my workshops. 100% recommended. And it has 1 year warranty. I do appreciate that very much. Thanks.
Amazing for the price!
Better than the Beats By Dre!

Buying Headphones on Amazon might be one of the most difficult things due to some of the questionable reviews. I have bought several "budget" Bluetooth headphones on Amazon, and they continue to be a disappointment.

My problem with this Senso Bluetooth Headphones was its quality of sound. I listen to a lot of podcasts at the gym and my ears literally started hurting from the sound quality. There is a lot of bass and echo that makes it hard to hear. I had to take these off because I just couldn't stand the sound anymore.

Another thing is that the mic barely works. So don't expect to use the mic because the person you are talking to will not hear you very well

I think the only thing I can do now is to move up the $ ladder and buy a more quality headphones.

Purchased in March of 2018, and product randomly became defective in April 2019.  Used headphones for roughly 40 minutes a day for 4-5 days a week until they stopped working. Did a factory reset, but headphones were not able to enter pairing mode.  Called Senso technical support and they confirmed that the headphones were defective, but that they could not offer a replacement since it had been just over a year.  Product not designed to last.  Sound quality and fit were “eh” to begin with.  Strongly recommend you buy a different product.  These are cr@p.

I love them!  I bought them for work since I sit in a cube farm. Now I can walk around the floor and still hear my music without carrying my phone. The ear buds are very comfy and callers can hear me clearly when we talk. I'm thinking of ordering another pair for home.
I am pleased with the sound quality of the headphones. I am learning how to not make "pocket calls" to friends in earlier time zones when I am at the gym at 6:00AM EST.

I had an issue with the earphones. I really like them but they stopped working after about 5 months. I contacted the seller. It was no problem to replace them. they were very nice and easy to work with.
They were as advertised except for the quality of bass in them. If I want poor quality of bass I might as well spend less money on Bluetooth/headphones that are cheap.
I use the daily at work and to work out and they stay on very well are comfortable and last awhile before needing a charge. I would definitely recommend these earbuds.
sounds ok, but they died in 60 days of normal use.....
Great sound & price!!

Love this thing. For the price and the strong sweatproof performance, I give this 5 stars. It lasts roughly 4-5 hours of usage though. So I'm recharging after every 3rd time I use it so it doesn't die while I'm on my 1 hour commute on the 4th usage.

I've had no reception issues even in the subway. The jaybird I had previously would stop working once i was underground even with the phone was right next to it. I can walk away 20 - 30 feet in the gym and still be connected to this thing.

I do have to say that the i phone and this thing sometimes have trouble connecting on the first go with Spotify. But nothing a few restarts of the bluetooh and headphones can't fix.

Guys for real, these are amazing. I'm hearing stuff in music I've never noticed before. Such clear, awesome sound. And they're super comfortable to boot!

I even got a phone call with them in and had the microphone near me and my friend commented on how clear I sounded before I even told her I had the headphones in.

Definitely invest in these bad boys, especially with all the extras that come with them.
The noise cancelation on these headphones is horrible

They are durable, but the sound is muffled. Not comparable to LG but the price is low. The control buttons work great and they have a reliable distance from phone. In the gym I can venture far from my phone and they don't loose connection.
These headphones are amazing. You have to remember what your paying for them to before you compare it to boss or beats or any other high quality head phones. They honestly are better than my LG pair
Not much to say, these work flawlessly and for me the sound is fantastic..
Perfect!! I purchases the headphones for while I run!! Love them!! They stay charged for a long time. They stay on and in my ears very good.  I would definitely recommend these.
My only complaint is that I wish the battery lasted longer before a charge.  But that's minor compared to their performance and price!

Loved these headphones, they stay in my ears and don't flop around. Really good sound.

Cons: They block outside noise so it might be a bit dangerous for cycling around.
I like the headphones stay in my ears, comfortably, without fighting with them.  Good sound quality for audio books and music.

Bought these to see what a $30 replacement for my $150 Bose would sound like, and I'm pleasantly surprised. They certainly have way more volume capacity than the Bose, and for $30 these are really hard to beat. Battery life is good, still 5+ hours after 3 months of moderate to heavy use.

Minor downsides:
- Plastic pieces that wrap around the ear are flimsy and can crease easily, so be careful if packing the headphones loosely
- Audio quality is good, but not great. I like to use them for podcasts, but if using for music the headphones lack a bit of low end depth, though not to a point where I would say it sounds bad.
- Not water proof, so avoid using in the rain
Not really as pictured. The loop that goes around ear is a little big/loose which made the inner part come out of my ear while I was lifting weights, so I just took them off. :/
They are awesome.
They are not very comfortable. They do not stay in place when working out. They do not have as good of quality as I hoped but for the price they work fine.

These headphones Are Great!  I am extremely impressed with the sound quality and comfort at this price!!  Also was very happy with the free gifts....I started using the cell phone holder in my car immediately... much better than setting my phone in the cup holder😁

battery never dies out, I use them at gym , makes wireless working out better than being tethered to my iphone I don't have earphones yanked out of my ears anymore nor do I drop my phone . can't beat price
I'm having a problem with the right side earpiece ,there's static in it.
Everything I wanted for the price! They work and are mostly unobtrusive -- now I can hold my baby and listen to music or watch a video without disruption or the fear of her getting caught on wires.
Excellent sound quality, great clarity, comfortable fit, can't enough about these headphones. Great purchase!
Amazing product and amazing customer service!
Great item for the great price.

I mainly use these for listening to podcasts.  What I like best about these headphones is they stay in the ear unlike some other brands that keep falling out while wearing them.  Sound quality is excellent.  Had an issue and customer service couldn’t have been more helpful.
Great sound

So these might be great headphones for listening to music as the reviews said which made me buy but I need them as a headset for my cell phone and they are dismal for that.  No one can hear me so this is money completely wasted.  Bummer as I'm not spending stupid money for the apple headset.
Great sound and well made.  Manufacturer took extra time to include accessories which are helpful.  I will not hesitate to recommend this product.
Easy to use, comfortable, sounds great and even my granddaughter gave them a thumbs up!

Granted, I just purchased this and set them up today but they compare favorably to the Beats that just broke after a year and a half. About 70% less than my original Beats. Not quite as clear on the bottom as the Beats, but I'm using them for the gym, so who cares? The telling thing will be if they have interference from all the machines at the gym. I would expect not as they are the latest Bluetooth technology. They are lighter than the Beats so I expect to have less falling out of my ear issues. Fit the ears great.

UPDATE: June 12, 2017. Absolutely no interference in the gym from any equipment. Stayed in place in my ears for an hour and a half workout on elliptical and bike.
Outstanding product!

They cut out constantly while on my bike, which very rarely happened with my old Plantronics headphones.  They don't feel secure in my ear and constantly need readjusting, the sound quality is average.  Had a little bit of trouble pairing.
Great product...

Not the greatest. . .  I find it turning off for no reason on my runs and I have to synch it back which is a real distraction when you're running on the streets of NYC.  Would not recommend.  Feels kind of flimsy.

I like the headphones. They seem to last and be somewhat durable, but my biggest issue is there is no noise cancellation on the headphones. So yes, I have hands-free talking and they work well while I'm running, sweating and working out, but when I talk on the phone (which I do a lot), I always have to transfer the sound back to my phone, because the headphones pick up every bit of sound around me and anyone I'm talking to always complains how they are unable to hear me. This is deeply frustrating since I am always on the go and me being able to talk hand-free is the main reason I purchased these headphones.
great value - only wish they offered one with a microphone too.  But great value!
stopped working after 6month no reason- it shows battery fully charged then when you unplug from charger they dont turn on.
The sensor is The best earbuds I have ever used!

Out of the box the Bass was why over the top at the normal equalization I use with my Bose wired earbuds or my car system. After 20 minutes of adjusting on my Galaxy S8 I got them sounding pretty good but not as good as the Bose Buds. I had to use the manual adjustments since the the Bass on all the built in phone equalizer settings was overwhelming.  If you really, really like loud Bass or you device has a builtin equalizer they are ok. If you can't adjust you equalization manually they are probably not for you.
They are working great. I have had a pair of these before and like them so I bought new ones.

Speakers play clear, charge last about 2 days..I only use when working out 2 hrs a day. The cord from left to right ear is way too long! Constantly getting caught on clothing or hair as I workout causing them to fall out of my ears. Will buy aomething different next time
I love these headphones, they connect to Bluetooth instantly and the sound is great. Extremely happy with them. Love them
Impressive what you get for the price. This is one of the best deals out there. Simple pairing with my iPhone. Very good sound, secure on my ears. Everything I wanted.

Had these about a week. So far so good. They fit well, work fine (i.e. pair quickly and then play music well), and seem to generally work well for me (I use them in the gym). Will update if anything changes.

Great pair of wireless headphones that in my opinion are much better than the beats headphones that look like these.  The reason  I say this is that I bought a pair last year and spent the 150 dollars on them and had them break within two months of going to the gym everyday.  I looked after them as best I could and the only moisture that came in contact with them was sweat.  The same amount of fatigue was given to these headphones as well and they are still working very well.  The battery longevity is also better with these as well. I should also note that I am not a sound snob and cant tell you about the finer points on bass and etc.  I just use these everyday to listen to music for working out for at least an hour.

Very happy with performance. I used them for about 5 hours listening to an audiobook and they did not die before I plugged them back in to charge. Easy to get the hang of and no problems connecting to my phone. I liked these headphones so much that I recently bought my husband a pair also.
Good clear sound and very easy to control the music
Works great as expected!

I love my Senso bluetooth!  I really appreciated the company contacting me to welcome me to their brand.  It made me feel confident that I made a good choice in my bluetooth needs.  If I have any problems, I feel they will be taken care of right away.
Skip while running and cause an echo when speaking on the phone.

So far, so good! I have only used them twice, but so far they are very comfortable and they produce a great quality sound. I only hope to have many more great workouts with them in the future! I will definitely recommend them to people looking for a good workout wireless headphone.

Purchased headphones 18 months ago. Used them about a half dozen times throughout that period. Started to use them again and they initially charged without an issue. Once I tried to recharge them again they would not charge. They are out of warranty and I am out of luck. Would never buy again.
These headphones are great and very clear and easy to wear and I will recommend anybody to buy they.  I love them
Awesome! Exceeded my expectations. They sound just as good as beats version of these headphones. I'd give it 6/5 if I could.
Easy to pair with device.  Noise cancelling not as good as expected on airplane. Seems well made.
Product seems decent enough especially for the price but both pairs I ordered did not come with the wire tie so 4 stars
I thought these are good headphones. They have clear sound and hooked up to bluetooth really fast. They have good battery life and fit well.
I’ve tried them for 3 workouts and evey time I’ve had issues connecting to my phone so I am returning. I’m not going to fight with my headphones all workout

Earphones are solid, waterproof as advertised, and have good batter life. Sound quality however, is not that great.  There is way too much bass, and you have to use the equalizer to reduce it to make music listenable. But once you reduce the bass, the quality when listening to music is not bad. Call quality can't be helped, since you can't equalize call audio. The biggest issue, however, is the microphone. Since the mic is inside the earpiece, it has trouble picking up your voice, and sometimes the other person can hear themselves talk.
SUPER FAST shipping. I received these and absolutely love them! The sound quality is great, they charge quickly, and are super comfortable to wear. Highly recommend for workouts and running!

After extensive search, reading every review, these are not what I expected. Definitely not any different than the $10 dollar pair that you can get right here on Amazon. My iHip headphones are way better.
Awesome product
These are exactly what I was looking for. Lightweight and they stay comfortably in my ear while running. Great sound quality I'm really glad I took a chance on these. Love them!
Would not pair with my Nano

For this price i expected some cheap headphones that i was just gonna use for running. Turns out the quality is amazing, sound quality is really good, strong bass, battery lasts longer than most wireless headphones ive owned
Superb sound
Had an issue and SENSO was supet quick at fixing it with the warranty.

I received these headphones as a birthday gift last fall, and wasn't too sure about them. I had never used wireless headphones before, but my parents were hoping that they would be a little bit "safer" for me to use when lifting (if you've ever had your headphones fall while you're lifting, you know what I'm talking about). As soon as I tried them I knew that they would be my babies.

Some of my favorite features:
The noise cancellation is real with these!
The sound quality is amazing! I honestly thought that my family paid upwards of $100-200 for these beauties because they were so great.
They're lightweight.
They come with a pretty durable case.
The battery lasts forever (I usually only charge them once or twice a week depending on whether or not I use them for watching Netflix and home and whatnot. I go to the gym six days a week, so I think they last a pretty good amount of hours).
They're wonderful for running, wonderful for lifting... they're just wonderful.

The only thing that I don't particularly love about them is that sometimes people don't notice I'm wearing them and try to talk to me-- but I can't blame that on the headphones. In fact, I actually kind of like that their discreet rather than big and bulky.

I would recommend these to absolutely anyone and everyone!
Doesn't have enough battery life. I like to listen all night. Didn't lock out ambient noise.

I loved the look of the headphones and this style. The carrying case was slick and light weight, all the include attachments were helpful. Where I feel these headphones need to improve
-The microphone, no one can hear you unless you hold the left side to your mouth
-The battery doesn't last 5 hours
-When they connect to my iPhone 7 you can't hear anything for 2 minutes

Update. After using these as my primary headphones for about 2 weeks, I can honestly say they are pretty good. The sound for lyrical songs isn't the best, but you get past it after while. Everything came that was originally advertised. Will buy again in the future
Very happy with my purchase. Great Deal!!!

Got these today, charged them a bit and ran a 5k listening to a podcast. I usually run near cars and some trucks that make a lot of noise + overhead planes usually kept me from fully listening to my podcast. These headphones fixed that, and the strap is perfectly snug behind the neck. These are absolutely amazing, thinking of buying a second pair.
They are decent for the price compared to the ones i was getting from dollar tree.  Ive noticed the sound fades in and out and its not much noise cancellations.

These have great sound quality.  I have bounced and moved around and as long as I am within 30 ft of my device I great reception with no skips.  The stuff that came in the box is great.  I would have liked a wall adapter too, but the car charger is awesome.  The only other extra that would be nice is a clip.  I have ordered a clip so its something you can fix yourself.

Broke in 2 days. Won't sync and won't play music.
Quality is not worth the 40 dollars it's on sale for either.
Too bad, I was actually needing a sporty bluetooth head phone :/
It was a gift to my wife and she loved it

These are really comfy, but the battery life only lasts a few hours. I listen to music constantly at work, so I have a different brand whose battery life is better, but the headphones are uncomfortable. All in all these are might favorite’s, but I wish the battery life was better.
Edited the first one failed and got replacement device which is working as expected.
Works well.  Great sound!  Would buy again..
So far so good! Great sound quality and battery life.
Very Happy with them. great deal
Only used them once so far but they seem to work very well.  The bluetooth connection was quick and easy and the sound seems excellent.  Great product so far (particularly for the cost!).
hard to stay on and does not fit my ears
I had a couple of wireless headphones in the past and they were not as solid as this one, it never failed me so far. Recommended buy!
Best value for the money that I spent on them.  Very clear sound for music. Phone calls could be better but still works great.

Bought mine for use at the gym. They stayed in place while running and lifting weights for over an hour at a time for the last 2 months with no loss of power. They even manage to deaden the sound of the lawn mower when cutting the grass.  Great sound, particularly at the low end. These are rightfully rated high by most folks. No problems connecting to my LG G4 via Bluetooth.
Sound is excellent.  They actually  fit in my ears. Easy to sync with my Samson smart phone. Love it for race walking.

Sound quality isn't bad. Packaging is nice. But these are horribly designed. The "ear hooks" extend way above my ears so they don't even wrap around them and hold the buds in place. It defeats the purpose of having them in the first place. They're not adjustable aside from the actual ear bud size.

I must say that I really like the Senso headphones. They totally meet my expectations! Very easy to use for listening, plus the quality of the microphone is great. The customer service is just outstanding. I had some questions and emailed them, and they responded the same day with really thought through answers. Can't be happy more with the product. Highly recommend!

I bought these for my wife, who wanted to listen to music while she works out at a nearby pool. We were both pleased at how quickly and easily the headphones paired with her iPhone 6, and were very impressed at the quality of sound as well as the bluetooth reach it was capable of. She hasn't had the chance yet to try them at the pool, which is why I'm not able to give it more stars right now. But we both agreed it was a good buy! You've got a good product, Mr. Backstrom.
I returned these because they hurt my ear canals after a while. They were heavy and just didn't sit right on my ears.
Very comfortable to wear and the range is fantastic!  Love!!

Easy to use. Perfect fit. Love the power cord - unique. The Amazon Customer Video is great for the actual product. Works perfect. No issues. Delivered on time and without any damage. Highly recommend. Pairs easily with my iPhone and buttons easy to use.
Great Bluetooth distance.  Sounds great!!  Always work perfectly at the gym
El articulo correspondía con la descripción, muy buen producto llego a tiempo.  Es eñ tercero que compro para regalo.

I have had these earbuds for about a year and a half, and am sad to have to throw them in the garbage today. They worked great at first. When they quit the first time, customer service was quick to reply with troubleshooting steps that fixed my problem. I had to go through the reset more and more frequently since. Now, they won't even power on so after trying for weeks with different power sources, I'm just giving up. I paid about $35 and hoped they would last longer than this, but maybe I'm old school.

I did return this item, but that’s only because my wife has the ear canal of a newborn baby(She’s 30). For normal size people these are pretty amazing they come with everything you could possibly need. Cables, 12v car connections, apple and android charger. Good buy if your normal size and looking for a wireless headset.
These are amazing

I don't want to spend too much on headphones since they're pretty much "Here today, gone tomorrow" whether they are expensive or cheap. I had a similar set that lasted almost a year. These were great, until one day they just stopped turning on, even after having charged them up. Lesson learned: stop buying these kinds of items from Amazon. They last long enough that you cannot return them, but two months is ridiculous.

So far so good.  I'm still trying them out.  They are very comfortable around me neck and ears.  I actually wear them all day.  I'm a truck driver and charter bus driver.  I have to stay in constant contact with my dispatcher.  This make so much easier than those other bulky around the neck head phones and reaching for the phone.
Didn't fit well in my ears and the company told me just that, it must be MY ears that are the problem. Did get a refund.

I bought this earphone thinking that it would last long and would be confy. It has high rating in Amazon.  I just got it for few days now so I can't talk about durability. Convenience wise though, I thought it would stick to my small ears better than the regular type of earphones. Find out, it doesn't stay long.  I don't think this would help me on my running because I have to keep it in my ear every now and then.
This is a great product!! The sound is great and a great company to work with!
Wonderful headphone.

These headphones are perfect for exercising. They have great audio quality and stay in place when you're active. The accessories are great too, especially the carrying case and the various ear bud adjustments. The original pair I bought stopped working (zero power, wouldn't turn on or charge) after six months. I contacted Senso support and because of the 1-year warranty, they were extremely friendly, responsive, and they shipped me replacement headphones the very same day.

Paired easily. Like on/off/pause on outside of earpiece. Some headphones have buttons too close together, causing you to turn off or increase volume when that wasn’t what you intended. Sound quality is decent for a relatively inexpensive headphone. Headphones are comfortable too.

The quality control here is not ideal - ordered my wife a pair for Christmas and they were awesome! Ordered myself a pair a few weeks later, they look the same as hers but the big problem is that my ear pieces don't bend so I can't shape them to fit. No big deal, I send them back for a new pair. Get the new one - same exact problem. Super bummed but it's a sign for me to move on to a different brand. On the bright side my wife really likes her pair!
I like these, they are cheap but I have had them for 2 years now and not a single issue. I actually bought 2 times not sure if whit this same account
Great sound great price. Rival my sons beats
It's only been one week but So far so good.  I love it!!!

Good sound and good volume. I think about four hours charge, which is OK, considering how light they are.

Died about six weeks after I got them. Appeared to charge but didn't turn on.

Invotech responded promptly with instructions for reset (which did not solve the problem) and an offer to replace. Received new pair within two days.
Very nice system. One star removed because I rubber ear hooks and thin neck strap look toovfragile for constant use. I will know better after more usage. Comfortable.

I've had these headphones for a couple years now and the bluetooth radio has finally failed. However, up until this point, these have been great headphones. They sound really good, battery life is as-advertised however there is no noise cancellation that I can tell.

If I could make one change, I would want to have a fabric-coated cable. The current cable has a rubber-coated feel and when you get sweaty, it sticks to your neck, which is annoying.

Other than that concern, I will likely order these again as you can't beat the price for what you get.

Worked for a few months then stopped working. Would disconnect and turn off without warning. Wouldn't want to turn on, and would say its connected but the music would still come out from my phone. DO NOT BUY!
I love it being cheap great sound and good quality on phone calls
We are on our fifth pair of these headphones.  Love them and customer service is great.  My first pair stopped working and they replaced them quickly.
Affordable and my son loves them

I initially thought these headphones where amazing. However, the bluetooth distance seems it to fade if you use it for a little bit. It starts to break up and get crackly at even 5ft away.
Ex. I used the headphones for an hour, then went on a run with my phone on my arm and when my arm distanced from the headphones it would get splotchy. Now i just make sure I've charged it before I run!
Very pleased going to order some for my sons
Great sound quality not too much comfortable to wear

Big, bulky and heavy on the ears with the wire in front of the ear which is unsightly. Charge did not last through the next morning although I used it once. It also lost its blue tooth connection and I couldn't get it to find my phone that was right next to it. I thought it would be great as it was waterproof, but not for me. Going to get the one I used to have that goes around my neck and battery lasts for days/weeks.

I bought these Bluetooth headphones for my 15 year old and he loves them so far.  We got them in less than 2 days and they were about 1/3 the price of beats.  He goes to a very prestigious (snooty) high school and many kids have them.  He told me they perform as well as the beats.  They just are a little bit bigger than the beats.  Good buy and they work well.  Thank You!

As long as ur prepared to buy new ones regularly
They are fine.
great soun, great fit.
bad don't buy it
Excellent Product!!! As described.

Fantastic product! So God I bought a second... Really amazing sound and very simple to use, was trying to find something like this for ages.
It beats by far all the other more expensive competitors. Like I said before fantastic!
I like this product as it fits comfortably in my ears and the sound is very good.
My everyday workshop headphones. I have purchased 4 sets of these so far.

Worst workout accessory ever. Songs just keep cutting off/skipping. Phone is on my armband. I just realized only way for this thing to work is when I hold my phone high above my head. How do I fix this problem? Does my phone have to be at a certain angle to listen to music? Makes no sense.

I went through 4 pairs of Bose headphones before discovering these babies. It’s been 2 years and I just purchased my second pair of senso headphones last week. The first pair broke from wear and tear. I go to the gym 5-6 days a week and sweat profusely. I love that I can’t hear anything when I wear them. These have never let me down and never fallen off.

Bought 2 of these. FANTASTIC! The shipping was quick. The product is absolutely FANTASTIC! I've bought 3 sets for working out over the last 4 years. This set is the best. They sound great. They fit and wear well. Loud... OMG... they totally drowned out the overhead music garbage at the gym and that is only up halfway. The wife and I totally loves these headphones.

Now to see how long they last. By the way they sound right now, I have extreme high hopes that they last. Even if I only get a year or two out of them they are totally worth the money. There is a reason why they have 71% 5 stars. #InstaChub
mic doesnt work, horribe. returned it.
Good battery life. Good water resistance. Great value
These earphones are great! Extremely loud and comfortable!

I've been wearing these earbuds for 3 hours now and they are very comfortable. Sound quality is good and volume reaches louder than I care to use. 3 pairs of ear tips, two charging cables, dual port car charger and hard case: all for $30! That's a deal.

Great when they work well, but I find that it sometimes dose a double beep and the connection cuts in and out losing 3-5 seconds of audio at a time repeatedly even when the device (computer or phone) is very close by.

Battery life is around 6 hours. I'm a heavy user so this isn't very long. It always seems to be dead when I most need it. Furthermore, you can't charge and use at the same time which is somewhat of an inconvenience. Sound quality is good but not impressive. Holy hell is the functionality ANNOYING. Takes forever to turn on sometimes, I'm pushing a finger into my ear like an idiot waiting for the bluetooth lady to yell "POWER ON" into my ears. And sometimes when I'm trying to power down at night she'll go "LAST NUMBER REDIAL" while I scramble to find my phone to cancel a 2AM call to my ex girlfriend. Jesus. I don't want all that. I just want this thing to power on and power off.
Clear and load sound even whine riding bike with wind noise. mic works great
These worked really well. Was able to spend all day at the Rugby field without disruption of sound. Phone calls were clear. Very happy
Great product. Sounds good.

I've had my pair for several months and absolutely love them. Fantastic Bass! They hold a charge wonderfully and last several days between charges. I use them mostly at work when I need to tune out the rest of the open floor plan.

I actually bought Bluetooth earbuds to run in and the connection was horrible. I'm buying a second pair of these this weekend for running.

I have only had the earphones for a few days, and already been contacted by the company with AMAZING customer service making sure I was satisfied with the earphones. Excited to use the headphones and know if there’s any issues they will be resolved right away.

You receive a very nice carrying case, 2 extra sets of ear plugs, a short charging cord and a 3' charging cord that can fit apple products as well as the headphones.  Also a 2-port car charger.  I've use the earbuds over the weekend and they work great!

It worked well for 3 weeks and then stopped working. When connected to get charged no light turns on and nothing happens.

The sounds are great, it is stable on the ear in running
Perfect for working out. Great sound and easy connectivity for an even greater price!
Never fit my ear no matter how many times I change the size + doesn’t work well with sweating.. microphone is very bad... this product is waste of money and time.

I've now purchased 3 pairs of the Senso Active Buds one S-250 and two S-255. We use them with our smart phones and tablets, we use them at the gym while working out and on the go when we have to wait somewhere, like a plane ride. The sound quality for the price is excellent and the bass reproduction is strong. They come with a hard case, charging cable, 3 pairs of ear cups and 1 pair of ear foams for form fitting and sealing out surrounding noise.

Customer service is superb. We had one pair that began to shut off when the connecting wire was bumped. I contacted customer support and received a response within 30 mins giving me suggestions on resolving the issue. I followed the steps, but unfortunately, they weren't successful. I contacted support again to let them know and within 30 mins they had responded again and stated they would replace the unit since we were within our warranty period. I'm a business owner and I can tell you from dealing with a lot of companies where I needed support for a product, this has been by far, one of the best and quickest responses I've received.

When the time comes to upgrade or replace, Senso will be at the top of a very short list of options. You won't be disappointed in this product or it's customer service, should you need it.

For those who have complained about the sound quality, they simply need to make adjustments in their devices. I come from an audio/video career background, so I can speak to the quality. There are options out there that may sound better, but you won't find them even at double the price of the Senso's.

When they coupled to my Iwatch they would breakup unless I put my Iwatch on my right wrist. I did a master reset of the headphones and after an iOS update to the watch they would not couple and they had to be returned to Amazon.
Awesome quailty
they are amazing.  the sound is perfect and the charge lasts a very long time.

I absolutely love these headphones!!  They are the first pair that I have owned that I can honestly say that are comfortable to wear and have absolutely beautiful sound.  The staff at SENSO also offer great customer service!!  They actually contacted me to see how I liked their product and to see if I there was anything that they could do to increase my satisfaction.  I would definitely buy something else from them and I am recommending these headphones to family and friends.  Great buy for the price!!!!!!

Just received these today and out of the box look and feel great. I’ve got small ears and seem to fit securely... Haven’t used them yet so test that out better and will update when I do. A little disappointed as that would have been a helpful tool.
worked for a couple of weeks and then would not connect with iPod or iPhone. I am returning
Just received.  So far so good.  Nice that a voice tells you on or off.  Interested to use on upcoming flight for noise cancelling compared to the wired set I have.  Let you know how that works.

I received my SENSO Bluetooth Earbuds a few days ago. I paired them with my iPhone, iPad and television with no problem at all. The sound quality is excellent and I have had no problems with them falling out of my ears while using the treadmill or exercising. They are very comfortable. For the brief time I've owned them, I'd definitely recommend them to others and give them five stars.

The sound gets distorted at level 7/10. Don't bother going any higher, otherwise all clarity will be lost. The bass although gives a good thump, the music occasionally cuts in and out like there's a mechanical issue. For those reasons, I give it a 3 star.

These headphones are great... with awesome sound and good range.

Received them on time and in good packaging. Have only used them once since receipt and everything went fine. They are comfortable to wear as the ear pieces are quite soft. Remains to be seen how well they stand up to use. I am not a audiophile so the sound quality seems OK to me. I mostly use them while riding by bicycle. Used them once around the condo and there is a issue as they cut out when in a separate room when not carrying the phone.
Sound is hollow and they’re not super comfortable.  They do work but you get what you pay for.
Work very well. Good stereo sound, and battery lasts a good while.

I bought these headphones based off of the reviews and they have exceeded my expectations. The sound quality is very good, the fit is good and they are easy to use. I'm a multi sport athlete needs rugged while mantaining high quality sound becuase I have mild  hearing loss.

Very satisfied with these bt headphones,  I wanted something that I could wear while doing yard work and it didn't disappoint. Have a pair of Beats that are seating idle now. Great price,  great product. Bought an extra one for a x-mas gift.

Gets the job done! Pretty good quality & stays pretty fit in my ears that can be sensitive to holding up ear buds. I run a lot with these. The only thing that stinks however, there is no warning of low battery only 10 min or so before it shuts down, which tends to happen in the beginning or middle of my run. Good part is, it does last for about 1-1.5 weeks before charging again.
Great headphones. Great value. Purchased these a few months back and they are still going. Use them mainly at the gym.

I purchased my first pair Oct  2016. Love them. Just recently there was a problem with the volume changer. I reached out to Invotek customer service. Had a new pair in my hands within 5 days. I listen primarily to rock and roll. These are quality sounding headphones at a great price. Your expectations should be for a great sounding headphones at the price of  $36. For the record I have 3 over the ear beats. A pair of beat earphones and MEE On-Ear Headphones and not much of my hearing left!

I have had to re-sync about 3 times and today after a full weekend charge and Monday gym use for <2 hours, the headset was completely discharged. Recharging now and will see what happens the rest of the week. Stand by for a follow up.

8 hours of charging... the blue light (charge complete) did not come on and holding down the "on" button does nothing... it is dead!!!
These were very uncomfortable to use, and fell out every time I ran with them. But when they did stay in they sounded really good

I do a lot of crazy body movements in my workouts- sprints, barbell thrusters, hand-stand push-ups, burpees, you name it. Once in a while the buds will fall out, but it's understandable since I'm all over the place. Very happy with them!

Just start using them and so far so good. Came fully charged, easy to connect and ready to use out of the box. No hassle setup made them very pleasant to use, and the sound quality is pretty good. Not the best but definitely good for what you pay for and they have surprisingly good bass.
Excellent quality & sound.  Good value -
I use these when walking every morning.  They are very comfortable, easy to use, and the sound is very good!
Not quite sure but barely after 6 weeks the headphones are no longer charging!

I really like the headphones and they are great for listening to music!! But the call quality is pretty bad. It's very choppy sounding. Even for my Rosetta Stone app I can't use the headphones because it's very choppy sounding. But to just listen to music I love them.
In love, they are so soft!! And blocks all outer noise
Battery life lasts a longggggg time. Perfect for a week at the gym!
Nice

First the good. The packaging and items included with this set is exceptional. Everything showed up exactly as described, and I was surprised at the quality "feel" of the pair. However, this first set was not working correctly. I tried them every day for about a month during my workout routine and they were constantly dropping signal - cutting in and out. I emailed customer support and was promptly sent a brand new set.

This second set arrived and worked flawlessly. The sound quality was superb, especially given the very reasonable price point for the product. The microphone was clear (according the people on the other end of my calls). I had no issues with sweat during workouts, and the buds stayed nicely in place. I was thrilled!!

However, after using them nearly daily for about three months, I unfortunately experienced what many other reviewers have - the set just stopped working. No rhyme or reason, no slow fade-out in quality, just dead. I took very good care of the pair, never left them on the charger once fully charged, and did not abuse them. However, they died anyway. After two pairs, I unfortunately need to move on to another manufacturer.
Fits and stays in my ear.  The volume is much better than my previous bluetooth earbuds.

The sound is very good, maybe a touch too much base, because they can get boomy. The volume preset is outstanding. If your sound volume is dangerously high when you connect, these headphones automatically turn it down. My two complaints that keep me from giving these headphones a full five stars are the volume control and battery. There is noticeable lag when trying to use the volume control on the headset. You have to hit the button and wait a moment before the volume actually changes. As far as battery life, there is an inevitable trade-off in blue tooth headphones. The smaller the size, the shorter the battery life and shorter the connection distance. For the most part I think the Senso headphones did a nice job of balancing the two, but I would like to have a bit longer battery life.
Good sound quality. Great price.

So far so good! I've had waterproof headphones before that were cheaply made and the sound quality was terrible. I have not had any problems with these, and they sound amazing. Love my purchase so far!

Love these headphones!  Paired really easy with my i-phone.  I had a question about charging my headphones, called and the customer service was awesome!  Turns out I had overcharged them and messed them up, it was my mistake and they sent me a new set.  Super happy with this product and the company!
The sound is great and holds the charge.

So far so good. These arrived in less than 24 hours. Fits the ear well and come with different sizes of ear buds. I usually have a hard time keeping earbuds in my ears but so far they have stayed in. They are lightweight. Great bass and sound. Easy to use with directions and warranty included. Clear sound when making and receiving calls. Controls and microphone are on right headset (photos included). Battery life pops up on iPhone when paired! I’ve already recommended this product to others!

UPDATE 6/6/18: the sound quality for music and talking on the phone is great when the earbud part is secure in the ear. I have issues keeping earbuds (not just these) secure in the ear and this pair slips out when sweaty. The ear hook part doesn’t really hold the earbud in place, which is frustrating. I will likely give these to my husband to use.

For the price, it is hard to imagine there is a better pair out there. Just need to make sure the battery is charged which doesn't take too long. Usually about 30 minutes to fully charge when the battery is completely drained. With a full charge, they can last anywhere from 6 to 10 hours.

Overall, I am quite happy with the Senso headphones and highly recommend them.
They really take care of their customers, I was very impressed with the effectiveness of attention to detail they provide. ..
I lost a pair of these and ordered them again. I love them. I use them when listening to music while roommate watches TV
They work well , they aren’t loud enough on my iPhone .
Stay in my ears when running (ear buds always fall out) and great sound quality. Very easy to use.
Great headphones! Feel very durable and well made. Would highly recommend these. The cable that attaches the headphones together is a bit long. Overall great product!

Useless. The bluetooth will not consistently reach from my ears to the devices (I tested multiple) merely in my cargo pocket. Same setup with other devices (like Beats Solo and Beats Studio) can reach through 50 ft and several walls. Again, utterly useless.
Great sound for the price!! The headphones were easy to setup and use.
When I opened the package everything looked great.  Then when I tested them  out the left speaker didn't even work.

I bought these headphones to use while at the gym and they have been amazing. They connect with a bluetooth device easily and have a long battery life not to mention that they come with charging cables including a car port.

It's not that these are a bad product, just highly misrepresented as waterproof and useful for sports, which is the reason i bought these. If I were using them indoors I would probably be happy with them, but I bought them to use while bicycling. The wind noise with these is absolutely terrible. Riding into a headwind creates a roar that drowns everything else out. I tried taping over the mic hole but it made no difference. Also, I soon as the buds got damp they did not want to stay in...

When I got home from riding I wanted to rinse them off. IPX7 means they should be submergible, so a quick prince under the faucet shouldn't harm them. So I rinsed them, very quickly, and there is water still seeping out of them, and the USB port was full of water even though the cap was secure. If I was only using these indoors, again, they would probably be fine, but definitely are not as advertised.

Finally, I started looking for something else after I got back from my one ride, and it appears there is an identical version of these being sold under another brand for a little more than half what these cost. Spend your money elsewhere....
for the price, these are awesome! no more having to have my phone in my pocket getting tangled in a chord while on the treadmill or cleaning the house, mowing the lawn. loud, clead, awesome!
I’ve had these for about six weeks and they’ve already stopped working. Would have given it one star except that I really liked them. Used then with my Peloton. Too bad they are not better made.

I bought these in March and they will no longer recharge. Evidently the return window closed in 1 month, and the product support window closed in 3 months. So... after 5 months, I have to throw these away and purchase a new pair. I will no longer purchase Senso, however, so please LMK if there's a brand you would recommend.
Great devices, can't even tell their in my ears.

My son works out in gym daily with his and has nothing but the best to say about them. I loved these and they worked great while on the motorcycle or at the gym. But out of no where the left ear got a short in it and I have had them less then a year! So that is very disappointing that's why I am only giving them 3 stars wish they would have lasted for at least a year!

BUT after they sat for a while they wouldn't sinc back to the same phone...or at least without a lot of fiddling around. Great product, great price!

Work well.  Battery lasts a long time.  Comfort is pretty good.  Connection is strong.  Phone operation is so-so.  Overall, a good buy for someone looking for solid and affordable bluetooth headphones.

The best things I can say for these headphones... light, good sound, easy to pair to my phone, decent price.  What I hate...they pop/skip while playing.  I made sure they were fully charged.  I reset them to the factory default setting.  Paired them again. Tried to play my music on them again and they still pop/skip on occasions.  Very annoying.  It may take several minutes but it's going to happen.  They also lose their power rather quickly.  I can appreciate that I may have bought a defective pair but I bought two pairs at the same time and I just can't take a chance on the second pair.  You get one chance to have me as a consumer and that's it.

I got the ears phones to talk while walking and running.  The people on the other side have a difficult time hearing.  I can hear wind noise while I am walking. The battery depletes fast a couple of hour of continuous use.
The title says it all.. Headphones were a great value, paired easily and are very wearable during exercise.

Music is everything when I workout (-if it sounds sh*tty, my workout will be, too). My last one went through 4 years of sweat, fog, being dropped, left in my car, abused by the heat, sand, a teenager and the left bud stopped working- rightfully, so. It was finally time for a new set. It needed to withstand my workout habits- ie, Les Mills/Insanity, so- Wireless; fog/humidity/heat, so- Resilient etc. It needed to be durable, but had to sound good, too (i.e. "if it sounds sh*tty, the workout will be, too"). I circled Beats by Dre, like a shark. I loved how they sounded, but didn't want to drop $200+ bones on headphones I'd sweat in. I started looking at TrebLabs because they were waterproof. I took a chance on Senso, ONLY because it offered 1 day shipping w/Prime. Had it not- I would've gone w/TrebLabs. -I'm so glad I did!

They say 'You get what you pay for" -don't let that scare you because they're relatively inexpensive- considering what you're getting! I love them! They're very durable, they don't tangle, the music is crystal clear, sweatproof (survived 3 rounds of HIIT) and I've only had to recharge it once, in the past 5 days. I have not submerged them (yet), nor used them for talking (I bought them w/the intent of working out). It also came w/a hard-shell pouch. I'm very happy with these! I can't remember the last time I was so excited for a gadget!
So far so good. Got these for work, I work 10 hour shifts and the battery hasn't been a problem as long as I remember to plug them in at lunch
I’ve had these for a few years now and they still work amazingly well. Such a great product!! And for a great price.
Super simple to set up, they stay in place when working out, the sound is fantastic and my husband who hates technology loves his :)

My wife got these for me for Christmas because my old, $16 (like 25 year old) Sony ear hook buds finally fell apart. I've been writing a book and using Speechify for editing, using these earbuds. Initially, I liked that there were different sized silicone pieces to fit different size ear-holes. The sound quality seemed fine, and they were a bit bulky, a bit loose, but seemed not bad for $20. So now (1/10/21, or 17 days later) the charging port broke loose from the solder joints which affixed it to the little printed circuit board inside. Anyone who knows anything about wiring and electronics can tell you that a solder joint on a circuit board is inadequate to secure something that is going to have pressure put on it repeatedly due to plugging and unplugging. Obviously no one at Senso thought of this, or cared enough to put it into practice.

This is all part of a larger problem which is what is known as 'planned obsolescence' or put simply 'making things cheap so they break quickly (usually just after warranty expires) and you have to buy another one'. It's happened to phones (buy a new iPhone every 2 years), audio equipment, cars, televisions, and computers (don't get me started on the crap Dell sells, and forget getting any support from them).

AMAZON, if you're LISTENING, stop selling CRAP from SHADY SELLERS! Stop allowing companies to bribe customers for 5-star reviews. It makes reviews worthless and untrustworthy. Also, your buyers are obviously getting kickbacks, or if not they are terrible at judging quality. Either way, I cannot find good Bluetooth earbuds anywhere on the site. Even the Beats audio ones you sell for $110 are lousy with quality issues.

Disappointed, AMAZON. You own the internet but you can't sell quality electronics to save your lives.
Not comfortable as all, Bluetooth skips signals when connected to iphone or tv. Please stay away from this cheap product.

I will report back in 10 months.

I bought these because of the great reviews on Amazon and because of the great price. So far I'm very happy with them. They paired very easily to my iPhone 7 and sound very good. Definitely a good value.

These have great sound.  They also stay on when I am working out or working around the house.  I appreciate that the charge port is compatible with a universal cord.  I love the hard shell carrying case.
great battery life, fairly comfortable, great bluetooth range. worth every penny

After receiving my headphones & using then only once, my the wiring was exposed. I reached out to them to let them know the problem and was told to contact Amazon and have them send me a return kit and return them. I dont have time for this. I've had them for only 1 day and the wiring was showing. But besides that issue, the ear loops were a little large on me and I have the average ear and the quality was not that great... No bass. I would not recommend this product. Especially with the customer service I received. $30 down the drain. Sucks

Started off great hardly used them. I opened the case, unfold them, and the cord between the earbuds tore apart.
first impression it is a very nice headphones, looks to be of great quality, good packaging and accessories plus excellent sound, time will tell if quality is good over time.

Great headphones! Absolutely would recommend. Decently priced, and the sound quality is phenomenal. Personally I'm not used to this type of headphones - just the regular earbuds - and it took me a couple days to get used to them, but they fit just great. The headphones come with a few different sized earpieces, as well as a car charger and lightning cable for Apple products which is a definite plus. Love these!
I love the headphones. The sound quality it really good. Bluetooth setup was easy. Wish the volume control was on the cord instead of the earpiece.
I think this are absolutely great for the price point. Warranty customer service is also on point.
These headphones worked well for the price. But after only a couple of weeks of light use they stopped connecting to any of my devices and I can no longer use them.
Awesome sound quality, ease of use and comfort too!

4.5 stars?!? manipulation??
i normally work out with LG hbs700's, but those have a collar that is cumbersome, i thought i was upgrading.
nope.
everything is fine with these senso's except for the AUDIO QUALITY......which sucks........LG's sound much better.......the highs and vocals are much more crisp.
the quality is so bad im tossing it in the trash

I charged the buds and they went from red to blue but the next moring, I could not turn them on no matter what.  I plugged them back into the charger but this time no led light showed and I simply could not get them on to pair.  I am sending them back and reordered a new set.  did i do something wrong?

They work but I'm not a big fan of the in-ear headset because after a while it bugs me personally. I can only wear them for a short time before I get irritated by them. Other than that they sound fair but they do not really block outside noise to good.  The low end lacks depth but overall, they are not a bad buy.
Got these for my husband for work and he says they really block out the "work" noise.  Took awhile for him to get used to how they hook on the ear, but he really likes them.

When I bought it, it was great! Loud and crisp! I recently dropped one side in water and it’s completely dead on that side. Kinda disappointed when they said waterproof but it wasn’t. Threw it in the trash.
Very nice.  Connects to two devices simultaneously.

They are terrible. Worst Bluetooth headphones I ever had. Takes to long to connect with phone and it's keep losing connection. Multifunctional button doesn't even work with Android phone. Can't believe that people giving a 5 stars to this trash.
Just when your far away from your phone it shuts off

I have tried other earbuds but they would not stay in no matter what inserts I used. These are amazing with the fit and the soft feel of the ear loop. Would definitely buy again. Sound quality is also great
Love the product, however, I have noticed that once I get to the year mark it stops working.
I liked everything that the senso bluetooth had to offer.and they are working just as good as they said it would. ...that's why I purchased them multiple times. ...I give them an 'A
The headphones worked well and when they failed after six months, the company sent replacements with no problem.
I'm not able to charge the headphones.  I was only able to use it until the original charge ran out.
These Senso Bluetooth headphones are Awesome! Period!

They came so fast ! In a carry case and other extra surprises , I will be buying more I am sure
Great headphones for a decent price

Good sound and battery life, especially for the money. The volume up button quit working after about 6 months of relatively light use, so it is now stuck at a barely audible volume. Tried to contact the company, but they stopped responding after any simple fix didn't work. I would recommend avoiding this company due to their poor customer service.
Very Good
Best running head phones I have ever had
I lost these, and man was I upset. The sound is good and loud. Good connectivity and great for working out in. Easy to charge. Sweat resistant.

Purchased a set of these in Feb. I use them daily and the left side started failing. I notified Senso explained to them the situation. I was asked for my order # 3 days later i received a new set.  Cudos to Senso and amazon for the cutomer service..

These are durable, they don't fall out, and they sound great. I was really impressed by what came in the box, and the obvious quality of them, given the price point. It's rare that something comes with all the accessory cables, chargers, etc. This one came with a car charger and two cables.
No
Not bad for the price. I’m pretty pleased with what I got

Good headphones. They don't work as far away as they said but still a good distance maybe 10-15ft. The are very comfortable and never fall out of my ears. Maybe have to adjust it every once it awhile when I'm really moving around. Very good sound quality.

What do you expect from cheap garbage from Amazon?  Well I go news for you, you get what you pay for.  Yes, this junk will stay on your ear.  Big deal, they have a bendable ear clip which I guarantee will break in 30 days.  So the good point is they stay on your ear, the bad news is that the sound is as horrible as you’d expect from such cheap junk.

Excellent value! I use them for running and they work great. Paired easily. Includes extra ear tips in various sizes. Carry case is perfect size and function. I haven't made any phone calls yet, so I'm sure about hands free calling.
Awesome headphones better customer service

I typically pair these headphones with my LG phone. When the two are too close together, the connection becomes spotty and the music starts to skip. The earclips aren't malleable and fall off occasionally.  Good value for the lightning deal in my opinion.

These headphones were great when they were new but they're starting to fall apart after months of regular use. My only but significant complain about these headphones are that the flexible earpiece is no longer holding its shape. Now these ear buds are too loose so they won't stay on whenever I'm running. I first noticed that I had to keep adjusting them when I was running but now I've given up and they just sit loosely and don't make a secure seat on my ear. I really liked these when I first got them and I want to buy a replacement set but I'm nervous that those will fail as well. Granted for what I paid for them I definitely got my money worth.

The audio itself sounds good with a decent amount of bass. It's not the absolute best audio quality compared to a nice set of studio headphones but music and voice calls definitely sound clear and nice. Very good quality overall.

The included accessories were a very nice touch. The package came packed with extra goodies that manufacturers skimp out on these days. This was a great value.

The earbuds, when newer, fit perfectly on and in my ears but have definitely gotten too loose over time. The sweat resistance is definitely a nice quality of these earbuds as well and they were perfect for outdoor activities.

The range was surprisingly good on these as well. In an open area I could get well over 30 feet of uninterrupted range.

Overall these headphones are a great value for their price but I'm disappointed in their long term durability.

I purchased these headphones because I exercise by doing water aerobics. They are awesome, the stay on my ears while I move through the water, the sound is great, easy instructions on setting them up. this purchase was the best one ever. thanks senso.
Great product Great sound excellent service and Customer service very helpful

Ordered based on great reviews. Don't fall for it. There is no background noise reduction. Microphone is awful, callers can't hear or understand you. Sound is lackluster. And stupidly i didn't test them in a work setting until one week after return period closed. Spare yourself and look elsewhere
Easy to use and pair, great sound, no negatives

These headphones are amazing! I have a pair of Powerbeats 3 that I bought in April and all of a sudden they stopped working. I wasn't really in love with them anyways so I was searching for something different. I stumbled across these headphone at an unbelievable price. I thought they can at least be a backup once my beats get fixed.

I can't get over the performance of these headphones. All other headphones I've bought takes forever to get the right fit. You have to experiment with different size ear tips then finally realize that's about the best it's going to get and then I get buyers remorse but don't want to put forth the effect to return them. But eventually you grow to like them. The volume is not that great especially in a noisy environment and the bass is really non existent. This has always been my experience with wireless bluetooth headphones.

The Senso are totally the opposite. Right out of the box they are finominal! No fit issues, volume is incredible, and the bass was great right out of the box! I'm giving some thought about buying another pair for a backup if the price is still good. Highly
Recommended. Beats have nothing on these!

Maybe I got a lemon, but after only one day of use, the headphones are skipping and cutting in and out. Devices used are iPhone 5S and MacBook Air. The devices are literally a foot away from the headphones. I don't want to make the assumption that the numerous reviews are gimmicks, but I am not seeing the amazingly rated headphones these were meant to be. I hope the seller/company will make this right or I may just stick with a known brand next time.
They didnt fit at all. The sound was incredible though

So here is the good:
1. quality packaging
2. easy to setup
3. in general quality materials and the charging cable supplied is high quality

The bad:
And this is the big one. I don't expect super high quality audio for 35 bucks, but the bass is very muddy and songs sound far worse on these vs other $20 ear buds I have. I bought these knowing they would be a less expensive pair with bluetooth to use at the gym, but the audio quality is really very bad. I would like to return these or trade them up for a better model. Many positives with these SENSO, the packaging,the materials, but just not happy with the audio quality.
I had an issue with my earbuds and received a new pair with no issues. Great customer service and the replacement product has worked great.
Good bluetooth headphones. Easy to use and stay put in your ears.

Used them today for the first time in my Gasparilla Distance classic Race!
Today 15k & 5k and tomorrow 8k & Half Marathon!!
They worked great today!! Battery lasted thru both races!
Love them. Very comfortable. Great fit in my ears.
I use these earbuds when I mountain bike. They sound great and feel comfortable!
Awesome headphones
No they did not work, I've called customer service and they informed  me to send them back in and get a refund. Very dissatisfied!!!!!
I'm not sure they are a Christmas gift.

Sound and battery is amazing!! The fit is good, the adjustable hook thing gets kinda loose so I have to adjust each time which is not a big deal. Main thing is battery is great and sound is also which are most important!! Quality build.

Cyclist review:
PROS: These headphones are loud, they seem highly resistant to sweat, and Bluetooth works great. They come with interchangable ear pieces (for small/med/large ear canals). They hold a charge for me for the entire week (~8hr runtime, est.)

One Major CON: They really catch the wind and are pretty much useless if you don’t have a skull cap or some sort of fabric covering them. I’m not sure I’ll be able to use them at all in the summer. If you aren’t biking with them, don’t worry about this, they’ll be great.

Senso Bluetooth Headphones are great. They are lightweight making them comfortable to wear; but they are powerful in sound. They produce big, clear, crisp sound. I am more than satisfied. I heartily recommend them.

I use mine while working out everyday. They fit well. They don't move or come out or off the ear easily.
I really enjoy them.
these are so easy to get going, it's fantastic!  i bought them for biking and they work perfectly.  good sound quality, easy to operate, awesome!!!
Arrived right on time and easy to sync with my Samsung Galaxy 6.  The battery lasts about a week between charges which I like.

To be honest,  I heard about these and how "to good" for the price they are so I was very eager but wary on the quality... I put them on and all concerns went out the window. These are easily worth $80 or more on the lowest of low ends. Ontop of the Bose qualoty sound they produce they feel sturdy like they will last. They come with a hard shell case along with two forms of charging cables including a car adapter. You CANNOT get anything better for the price and quality! Water resistant, strong, bass, noise cancelling, battery life, even ear fit is perfect. I will be buying another set very soon just to have as a backup.
Loving these headphones so far. Easy to set up, only an hour to charge. Ran six miles and they stayed in my ears nicely. Great sound quality with an impressive bass sound. Wish I found them sooner.
Just great

Don't expect much from these head phones. They are cheap for a reason. For the price, I would say they are ok. I eventually ended up getting a
more expensive Bose headphones which are much better and great bass.

I could not pair the buds with my phone.
Now what do I do next?
These are great.

These headsets, while comfortable, provide just mediocre sound. They have deep bass, but, they have horribly sacrificed the high end just to produce bass. Anyone who cares about the actual sound quality should take this into consideration. Even toying with the EQ on my phone was not enough. But otherwise, they seem well built. The audio quality just isn't there.

I am very pleased with the SENSO  Bluetooth headphones. I use them primarily at the gym while I'm working out and they do stay in your ears very well and the sound is excellent for the price.  I also bought a pair for my 29-year-old son who lives in New York City and uses them to work out and on the subway on the way to work. He is very pleased with them and likes him a lot as well. I am also impressed with the company as they contacted me more than once to see if everything was OK. The only difficulty I had  was plugging in the 3 foot cord into my headphones. I did not realize that there were two connections and how to pull out the part that plugged into the Bluetooth, which now works fine. I highly recommend this company, the product and their follow up support and I will give them five stars.
Great sound and quick delivery

Got them today. Easily the first impression is too much bass. Overall sound is muffled, but I wonder if the problem is with my Nexus 5X phone. A brief glance at most reviews seem to indicate no problem with bass, but a few do report too much bass. Unfortunately, they don't mention the phone they are using,  I've tried adjusting the equalizer settings, but don't get a lot of improvement.  I hope I can find an app that does a better job with the audio adjustments. Otherwise, I might have to return them.

They work really well when I am in a closed room. However, when I get outside in the open connection drops and audio comes chopped. It is even worse when I am walking next to a road, it seems every car that passes by interferes with its connection. I bought this thinking I would use it when I ride my bicycle, but they might not work well.
So I got an email from customer support, I performed a reset on the device as instructed. The device worked fine during a couple of weeks, but then the problem appeared again. It happens even if I hold the phone next to the right earpiece. Is there a way to fix this properly?
UPDATE: I can say that they have a great consumer support service. I got a new pair of headphones shipped and they perform better than the first pair. However, I am still experiencing some chopped audio but not as bad as with the first pair of headphones.
Make sure you carry your phone in the right side of the body, I figured out the bluetooth receiver is on the right side earpiece. Doing so significantly reduced connection drops and chopped audio.
PROS: great battery life, and better than average sound quality. This statement might be subjective, but I feel the fit is comfortable. Great consumer support kudos for that.
CONS: chopped audio and dropped connection (might be an issue with reports of Pixel phone bluetooth issues, I have two friends with the same headphones and they claim they never experienced such issues). Wind noise is high when I ride my bicycle, sometimes I can't listen to the audio coming from the headphones.

Update: so it's been 10 months since I got the earbuds. I can praise the sound quality, battery life, and customer support.
However, build quality is questionable, once they fell from my neck (I'm 5'10) and they broke open. The second pair I got stopped working suddenly, the LED light will indicate they charge but they won't turn on. Both pairs stopped working from the left side, I had to wiggle and bend the wire on the right ear piece to make it work, but if I move my head the sound will cut off to the left earpiece. So I stopped using them, I'm sad because they had great battery life and the sound quality for the price was excellent. I hope they make the wire more durable or just make it a.cord to hold both earpieces together. I appreciate the great customer support.
On my second set. Fail. First won't pair with anything but an Apple product and Apple can inhale my azzzah gas. 2nd has a battery life of about an hour and a half. OK sound but constantly cut out.

Excellent sound and construction of these head phones. I bought them for my son as a gift after my fiancé ordered them for himself. He is a musician and extremely Precise with all sounds and levels of music we listen to.  He uses these daily on his long walks and is very happy with them. Thank you!
Great! Ran with them to day, had a problem with my old ones falling out. Highly recommend these so far.
One of the earpieces stopped working after a month of use
Headphones reliably last for at least eight hours of continuous use and recharge relatively fast (typically two to four hours).

I bought these headphones about 6 months ago and love them! The battery life is pretty good (at least 3-4 hours but probably more). If I could change something I'd prefer it gives you a little more warning before it is about to die - but this is a problem I run into with most headphones/speakers. What I was looking for was high quality, easy to run with, quick pairing, and the ability to change songs while running. These have all of those - and best of all don't hurt my ears after a long wear.

Hi Kenneth,
Thank you for reach your to me about my satisfaction with your product. Everything is great used them for the first time today and they worked great !
