Everything!

I rarely uae headsets only during travel or maybe on rare occasions I pretend to work out.

I'm not beating on these headsets daily...so imagine my surprise ro experience an issue already! One ear just stopped working. Wasnt dropped, didn't get wet at all, no tug of war with my 15 year old or anything.
Yes 45 days into ownership with LESS THAN 200 HOURS of use.

Where do I start these headphones definitely have my vote for five plus stars let me see they do everything and sound amazing just like describe trust me you will not better yet be dissatisfied yours truly a proud owner 😁
Great earphones at amazing price!!
Audio quality is terrible, not very comfortable, no sound isolation, but they do come with a lot of accessories and features for the price.
I like these a lot. Great deal for the money. I'm no audiophile but they sound perfect to me. I'm a runner and for years now I've been wishing they made wireless ear buds. Thank you Senso.
These are the worst earbuds I've ever owned. the sound quality is horrible!! the sound actually cuts out as I move my head left to right if you value music do not buy these !
Great earbuds but too big for my girl ears even with the different attachments. I gave them to my dad and he loves them!
Great, functional bt headset. Get almost 8 hrs per charge
Bought these for my grandson for Christmas. He says he really likes them
These are our “go to” wireless earphones for sports.  They work well, sound good, and are a good buy.
Great price, they work as promised.

I am really enjoying these headphones! I have tried 2 other brands and returned them due to short battery life or they kept falling out if my ears. These SENSO headphones are just Awesome! I have used them at work, on my elliptical, and with my Audible app. So far the sound quality and fit is great. I haven't tried using them on a call yet but it's not the main reason I purchased them. Paired quickly with no issues.

Amazing quality and sound. Bluetooth pairs easily, and the buttons are intuitive. I listen to them daily and have had no problems. Fit is excellent for active users or just sitting on the couch. Much higher quality than expected. I will definitely buy these again, and will be giving these as a gift in the near future to the gym rat in my family.

First set of bluetooth headphones. So far sound quality, battery life, and fit are good. I also like the adjustable earbuds as the original buds kept slipping out my ear when I ran on the treadmill.

The only issue I've encountered so far is interference. I have the headphones paired with both my iPhone and my iPad but I have found that if connected to both at once the sound begins to "stutter." (It would be less of an inconvenience if the bluetooth function on my iPad would stay off once I turn it off, but I digress).

Overall a quality product which I use both at home, work, and while running. Not sure that you can get better quality for the price, but be aware of the interference issue.
I like everything about the earphones
Awesome sound and range with Bluetooth
Best head phones 🤘🏼

Had mine for about 45 days when I went to take them out of the case to find the battery falling out and the side piece nowhere to be found. I bought a cheap piece of junk, hopefully you won't make the same mistake...
I usually buy Senheiser and tried this based on price and reviews.  You get what you pay for.  This is a very cheap product that feels and sounds CHEAP
So far it's great. Good value. Sound is decent for Bluetooth connection and the price.  Anxious to try it out in the car and see if it's truly hands free.
Bought this item as a Christmas present for my husband. He’s used it a total of four times and now the headphones don’t hold a charge. Very disappointed

Great headphones. Bought them in January and for some reason in November the left side started cutting out. They were still under warranty so I contacted Senso expecting the run around or a long drawn out process to try to get replaced. Wrong! Sent in an email and had a response within an hour. They asked me to hard reset which didn’t solve the problem. They next confirmed my address and told me a new pair was ordered for me. That was Monday. It’s wednesday and I’m back rocking to my music on the headphones. Two day turn around on warranty replacement! Unheard of!  Fan for life!

Start by saying I've only been using these for a week, however they have completely exceeded my expectations. I've been using Plantronics Backbeat Fits for several years and have been pleased but a pair recently broke which led me to this purchase. They are 5x louder than my Plantronics and fit much nicer. Bass is booming (I've had to turn down bass a touch for my liking). I have done a week full of very intense HIIT style workouts and they have not fallen out. Highly recommend!
They broke within a couple of weeks of use. The button to turn the headphones on and off got stuck and doesn't function properly. The sound is decent.

Product doesn't last
This is the the 2nd pair I got due to failure, and just failed again. I don't use it very often, but now it doesn't turn on. Followed all instructions to reset it but stays the same. Had a lot of expectations

Great sounds. had issue with recharging after a few months and seller replaced very quickly, no problem.

Very happy with the headphones and even more pleased by their customer service.
Great product for the price. Very happy customer.
I love these headphones. I ran my first marathon with them in and they never once fell out of my ears. They also last FOREVER. I ran the marathon (4+ hours) and barely used any battery.

Needed something more practical to workout with since having an arm band and traditional headphones was more or less annoying. Read some reviews on these and was sold. It’s just too bad that they were just as annoying as my normal headphones. During one of my runs every 10 seconds it would cut out my music and say connected. I trashed them directly afterwards. Don’t waste your money like I did.

I use my SENSO Wireless Bluetooth Headphones all the time when I am working out. I use them for running and in the gym and I think they do a very nice job overall. They are comfortable, have decent sound, good bass, stay in place for the most part, a good battery life, and are easy to operate.

The reason I did not give the 5 stars is because on a fairly frequent basis they do stutter their connection for some unknown reason. The instructions say they can be a fairly good distance from the device they are being streamed from but I can be right next to the device and they will still do it. It happens frequently enough (1 out of 5 times usually) to be annoying. For the price I'm not going to have a hissy fit... But I cannot give them 5 stars. I still feel like they are well worth 4 stars and would still recommend them.

These earbuds are great so far. I only got them yesterday, but I wore them almost all day. The sound is amazing. I didn't have to spend hundreds to get great sound. They were easy to set up with my phone and comfortable on my ears.

I have a earlier version of these headphones and I like them! So when an advanced pair came available i'm thinking all right. With that being said ,maybe I got a bad pair BUT I can't even have my phone in my pocket and it loses the blue tooth signal. Also I can't get more than 5 yards away and the headphones start breaking up. This is with my phone and headphones fully charged. With the previous version I can walk from the front yard to the back without any problem. In addition these aren't truly "noise cancelling". They do eliminate outside noise better than the original but  version but louder noises still can be heard.
Absolutely love these! Great accessories 👌🏼Most important the battery lasted all of my 9 hour day and then some.. still had 60% when I turned them off. Very happy and will be getting my son a pair!

Quit working after a month, red light cont to blink after you take this out of charge, tried multiple times thinking may will need full charge but no luck. You have a one year warranty. Please tell me what should I do
Very good Headphones and customer service is A-1

The ear support is an awful fit. I can't imagine anyone whose head the ear support would actually prove beneficial. If the ear piece doesn't fit inside your ear, know that the ear support will NOT keep this unit in place. I also can't possibly see how you could use this while running.
Great headphones, stays in your ears without needing to adjust and sounds great.

So honestly, for the price these work well as just a generic bluetooth replacement. Though if you are an active person and you run or bike, these amplify wind noise A LOT. I have to crank up the sound to overcome the wind noise generated by the design of the headphone. I probably wouldn't get these again knowing I really can't use them while outdoors.
I gave these as a gift for my boyfriend. He is very pleased with them. He is able to use them at the gym and under his motorcycle helmet. These are a great!
They are very nice at noise canceling however even their lowest volume level is way too loud. I wish I could turn it down more. I have an iPhone. I’m not sure if it is a problem in other devices.

I was looking for a set of headphones that weren't super expensive or bulky and would stay on regardless of what activity I was doing. These are perfect! The sound is fantastic! They fit well and are super lite weight! They were everything I was looking for!
Love the small size and packaging

I saw an ad for Amazon with headphones that were not attached so I opted to try those.
sorry
I lost a more expensive pair and replaced them with these due to all the amazing reviews... I too highly recommend these ear-bits.

love this ones!!!!! great sound!! great color , easy to use ,i have them for a while , durable, battery last really long time , depends how you use them and for how long you work them out to the extreme , so far they still work , they have an extra pair of ear plugs to mach your ear size ,  you can make calls and the sounds is really really good!!! make sure you never drive with the headphone not good safety , safety always first  .

These headphones are perfect... for the price. Before I bought these I had JBL Everest 100s, and the video playback was horrible. These are fine for videos, as there is no lag. The only issue I have with these is that they are very loud. At the third volume setting on my iPhone 7they are almost too loud, and you cannot go any lower, because the headphones will just beep instead of play music. I was able to make it a little bit quieter by going into settings, music, and then changing the EQ setting to loudness. It took it down hardly a notch. Then I turned on 'sound check' and it's a little more tolerable now. There is also a very slight buzzing sound in the background when music is playing, but it is hardly noticeable.

That is the only issue I've had with these. There are a little bassy, but that's expected with $30 headphones. It was definitely worth it, especially because you can buy a pair of similar $100 headphones that have terrible reviews.
These have solid sound quality and noise level at an affordable price!
Bought these for my husband for Christmas 2016 and they went out in April. Very disappointed.
Sounds great, easy to set up, holds a charge well, and stays in your ear
I'm impressed with the quality of the headphones.  Especially for the price!
I'm sure these are great, but I got a pair that are too loud on the lowest volume. Not too loud to stand, but too loud. If I went up a notch more people could hear if they were close enough.
The most important about headsets is sound. Quality is just below the average. The buit is good.
My husband and I both bought these headphones when the wireless pods my husband had fell off into a puddle of water.  These were recommended to us by our son and we are in love.  Great product!

I bought these May 2017 and they were perfect until about January 2018. I am a walking mailman in North Carolina  and I wear these every day for a minimum of eight and sometimes 10 or 11 hours everyday and I sweat profusely. I was worried about most models that will get wet when it rains or I sweat and ruin them; that was not the case for these. I never had a problem with water from sweat or getting too wet when I was being rained on and the battery always lasts the whole day. I listen to music, podcast,YouTube Red, audiobooks or some form of listening entertainment most of the day that's about 9-10 hours of solid use everyday and standby intermittently ( I turn them off when I drive maybe 30 mins all day) these are excellent for the money and the only reason I am replacing them is because they got tangled up and I got rough trying to separate the knot which bent one of the wires the right piece which has all the functionality still works perfect but the left side comes in and out since the price is low and I know the damage is mostly my fault. I will be repurchasing another set as they have been perfect through rain, hail, sleet, snow and almost  a toddler who tied them in a tight knot

Totally not what I was expecting. The sound quality is ok for the money you pay but wow these are the most uncomfortable earbuds I ever tried! After 20 minutes of wearing these I had ear ache . Sorry but I can’t recommend these to anyone
5 star headphones for a 5 star man

I just returned these headphones.  While wearing them, the bluetooth would cut out if my phone was down at waist level.  The only time I got a clear connection was if I held my phone at chest level.  Disappointed.
Pleased with the sound and design, but the ear buds are fragile and one side has broken off already 😩
the sound is good but the connection is very bad.
The beeped and lost connection about 20 times in 30 minutes with the phone only 4 ft away. Waste of time and money, I am returning them.
Accidentally washed them in my washing machine... still work no problem!!

Love these headphones. Unfortunately I lost them. I then ordered another pair and I am suffering through many Bluetooth related problems. To connect it only connects for calls not music (meaning I have to rediscover it to get full connection. The connection strength is bad constantly cuts in and out while walking. Lastly every now and then the volume just goes nuts (really high or low).

Mostly reasonable headphones for a slightly exorbitant price. The noise cancelling feature only exists because of the way the speaker fits your ear. Nothing electronic or effective. Get what you pay for, not what the retail price and discount is. I might have to amend. Garbage. Floppy ear hooks and wicked bad sound. Do not buy.
Works well, but I wouldn't recommend getting two pairs. It gets confusing when trying to sync them up with the speakers.
They're ok, but they cut out a lot. If I turn my head too much - cuts out. If my wife runs with it - cuts out. Sound quality is decent, but that's about it.

I don't usually write reviews. But I absolutely love the sound quality of these headphones. I bought them for walking & jogging in the pool. I listen to smooth jazz & the sound is lush. I hear not only the main instuments but the background nuances too. The range is incredible even. The sound is full-bodied. I was surprised as the cost was so reasonable and they sound as good or better as the more expensive ones.
Cons: -Sometimes I have to keep adjusting to keep them comfortably on my ear.
-I keep hitting the off/on button when I try & adjust them. Due to where its located.
-I don't want to get out of the pool because music is sounding so darn good (that's more my problem)
Bottom line, well worth the price & you'll love the sound quality.

I bought these for working out, so I don't need top of the line sound quality. These are ok... the bass is muddy sometimes, and they seem to be heavier on the higher frequencies, but they're not bad at all for $30 headphones. My biggest issue is that they keep falling out of my ears. The loop that keeps them in your ears is adjustable, but no matter what I try, they start coming loose after a few minutes of running. I've tried practically curling the loop part completely around my ear, and after a few minutes, they're loose again. Very annoying. My old headphones just had a rubber loop that wasn't adjustable, and they stayed in just fine, so even though it seems like the ability to adjust them should make them even better, I just can't get them to stay in.
Bought as a Birthday gift for my son in-law (he's a painter by trade). He absolutely loves them and is satisfied  with the headphones and the accessories included!

I own a pair of the Beats Powerbeats 2's and this pair of SENSO headphones are almost identical! In relation to sound quality, personally I believe that the SENSO's are better! I would recommend anyone looking for a great pair of bluetooth headphones without spending a whole lot of money; to purchase these. Also, if you're thinking about using these at the gym, I highly recommend it!
The headphones worked well and sounded good but fell apart in less than 6 months, and that's being generous.

I'm rating these after only a few days, but so far these are outstanding. The over-the-ear piece is very flexible and not rigid making it very comfortable for extended wearing. The inner ear piece fit comfortably and did a great job of blocking sound without giving me that pressure feeling in my ears. I used the largest buds to keep them from inserting too deep in the ear. My favorite thing, which I wasn't sure I'd like, is having all the controls on the earpiece. My previous set from a different manufacturer had the control dangling from the ear on the cord and the persistent bouncing and assymetrical design of having that on one side always caused problems pulling them out of ear when running. This pairs, that is not an issue. Minimal buttons with maximum control options and they aren't too bulky on the ear. They didn't budge through my hour long run or get uncomfortable or lose power. Sound is plenty loud enough and the sound quality is above average but not audiophile worthy. Excellent for working out. I swear a lot and had no issues. Last manufacturers didn't last more than 4 months. I will update this review if something happens. Also the included accessories were a welcome surprise. Great product(so far) and great price. Nice work.
These have great sound, very happy with them for biking or for using at my desk at work.
Fantastic headphones for running!!!  Great sound!
The band that wraps around ears was odd shaped, different on each one, one was too small and one was too large, would not stay in place on either ear.
I'm using this as an alternative to my iPhone headphones, and the sound is 10 times better on the apple headphones, pretty disappointed 😔

I had bought a pair of these about 4 years ago and I loved them. I recently had to replace them, and the quality of these headphones has gone to trash. Cheap plastic, loose buttons, flimsy wire. Save your money and find another brand.
The sound quality was good. The microphone wasn't great. But after about 1 month the hardware broke out of nowhere. I would say, these are actually pretty cheaply made. Ps. Battery life also sucks
Greats
working great!  connectivity was simple, battery life is good, audio quality is good..
These earbuds stopped working after 3 weeks.  Liked them but build quality is suspect.
I've only used the headphones a few times, but so for they are great!  They fit comfortably and have a very clear sound.  You cannot beat the price!
Nicely built and good sound quality. Paring with my phone was a breeze. Would recommend.
Easy set up. Very nice sound. Just what I wanted.

Love these for my Treadmill. I watch YouTube and other stuff while I walk to a healthier self and use these to spare the household. They’re a bit bulky feeling around my ear but it’s not a big deal. They do cancel our noise which means you hear better. Love them for the price.

Love, love love these earbuds, however when I turn my head the music cuts out , like there's not a good connection. Is this normal? And how do I adjust for this?
Otherwise my review would have been 5 stars!

They work Great with my new Google Pixel 2
I walk thru wood about 5 mi per day to country western music
Thanks
As described.  Wonderful sound. Arrived BEFORE expected delivery date!!!
Exactly what was needed and cost of in the right price range.
with noise in it...
Unfortunately these headphones stopped charging after 6 months. I probably used them an average of once a week and now they're completely dead. Headed to the landfill.

I have not used my new headphones outside yet. I have used them on my iPad to watch a movie. I am very well pleased. No problems whatsoever! Connecting, quality of sound, placement and controls are great. I have already connected to my iPhone when I charged them up. No problem at all. Too excited to use them outside and not have to worry pulling out buds because of blowing wind or wires connected to my phone. When I use them outside I'll be back to give another review! 5-2-17 I am pleased  to say these are excellent for outside jogging, running or walking!
Great customer service. Great product

Comes with a lot of accessories. Sound quality is very good.  I'm using my old Galaxy S3 as an MP3 player and pairing it with these headphones was easy.  My only nitpick is that the cover of the USB port could be designed a little better for more secure closing.  It's just a rubber flap.
Sound quality is amazing, and very comfortable on my husband ear while he work out,  mine will be delivered today, can't wait

Been a senso headphone users for years, old one finally broke down and the new one I just purchased had a worse sound quality and noise cancellation compared to last one, Disappointed with overall quality will continue testing.
I have tried a number of other BT headsets and all have failed me by constantly falling out of ear. Finally, a set that does not fall out that deliver great sound!
Sound was fine and it did provide about 6 hour battery life. Returned because microphone did not work and connection stops suddenly.
Just what I was looking for.  Great sound and easy set up.
The price you pay for what you get can't be beat. They come with different size ear pieces and the sound quality is great.

So I thought these were great and all- worked fine for about a year but now I have this issue with the headphones.
Basically there is a short in the actual headphone wire that connected the two earbuds- audio keeps getting cut out and not working in stereo like it did before.

I usually am not one to rant but Senso customer service has been EXTREMELY RUDE telling me they can't help me since my warranty period has just expired and they offered me a pathetic 5% discount.
Come on do you really think I'm going to buy these headphones again after they lasted only a year?!!

DO NOT BUY THEY BREAK VERY FAST!!

Great sound !
But sadly when I used for phone calls everyone I talked with said they could hear their voice echoing.
Love these ear buds!  Great sound and very comfortable!  I like the ear loop as well, as it keeps them in my ear.
Awesome works great only problem is when I have a  beanie on pushes in my ear more . A little bulkier than I thought
Beyond Happy these headphones work for my workouts! Sound is great, stays snug, and is easily rechargeable. This saved me from buying Bose's version @ $150! Great purchase
Overall quality is great.  Definitely outperforms beats, more balanced sound,  not quite as bass heavy.
One of my headphones stopped working after about three weeks to month. It just went out during one of my runs. Wish I would of tried to return sooner because deadline passed smh
Poor quality, it sied in one day.
Great ear buds, quick and comfortable with great sound. My second pair as recommended by my son. Great sound and easy to use.
These worked great for the time period that they were operational. I used them on one run and now they won't even turn on or pair. Just wasted my money

I've been using these headphones for a week, listening to music via Amazon Prime and I'm extremely happy with the performance. Range is fantastic - I can walk all around the gym and never lose a signal. Setup was a snap and they're probably the most comfortable in-ear headphones I've ever worn.

Sound quality is good for sports earphones that use Bluetooth. I felt that the sound tends to have a slight favor toward treble and is weak in regards to the bass, especially at the higher volumes, but, I have definitely have use far worse earphones.
The ear looks are very comfortable and have a great degree of flexibility toward fitting around various ear shapes, same goes for the three different sized ear heads.
Battery life is good and last me a couples days for my use case, 4-5 hr/day.
The noise cancellation feature, I haven't really noticed it, outside what I would expect from having headphones in.
Have not had to deal with high moisture situation yet, will update once such a situation occurs.
Excellent sound, great features. Everything fine so far. The seller seems to care about customers.

There is a damn good reason these buds are 5 star. These replaced my broken beats. SmIles from ear to ear. Full range sound with plenty of isolation. Block the world out.

6/18. Two other techs I'm working with have them now. I'm on my second pair after I lost the first. I have 2 pairs now.
Has great sound quality even when running.
Worked well with IPhone but kept cutting off when using my Apple Watch so I returned them.
AMAZING customer service! Great product!!
Great, inexpensive bluetooth headphones.  Paired easily and very good audio.  Charge lasts a long time too!  I am thrilled I bought these instead of the more expensive bands.  Thanks SENSO!

Very practical. Love the good quality accessories. Everything including the charging cable fits neatly into the small case.
Helpful in charging at the Gym after workout. Can recommend.

I purchased 2 sets of these headphones for my daughter and I to use with Aqua Exercise. They don’t pick up Pandora very well. Lots of static. Left bud keeps going out all together on BOTH headsets. Acts like there is a “short” because music goes in and out even with phone close to headset  This happens on BOTH. The piece that slips around ears keeps slipping off and bud doesn’t fit ears properly even with switching bud pieces. Would NOT recommend these. Very disappointed.

Shipped fast. And was easy to pair. The sound is awesome. No issues at all. My daughter ordered hers first. She liked them so well she ordered me a set. I have been looking for a good set of wireless earphones. And these are just right!
Comfortable headphones, connects easily with my iPhone 7
The left ear randomly loses audio and it gets worse everyday. I am supposed to have a year warranty, but I have not been able to get a replacement.
Not the same model as I previously ordered. Cheap knock off. I'm pissed.
I bought it at May 10 2017, the sound discontinued on the left earbob in 5 month. Plus the microphone is not good, people cannot hear what I am talking.

The headphones sound good but they were for my daughter and she doesn't like the headphones; she likes beats instead so I have two pairs that I will end up useing. Lucky for me I didn't pay full price for each.

These are great headphones at a great price.  I was looking for headphones to workout with that paired w my Apple Watch.  After reading all the good reviews I landed on these.  They can’t be beat for the quality at the price. They come with a case, multiple ear bud sizes and other extras. After using them one time I went home and ordered a set for my wife. If you want good Bluetooth headphones and not spend an arm and a leg, do yourself a favor and try these.

So far, I have no major complaints with these headphones. Having gone through several pairs of really expensive high-end headphones, and an untold number of low-end wally-world specials, these sit right smack in the middle in terms of quality and price. There is some reception issues when attempting to work-out with them on - namely if your phone is in a back pocket - but overall they work without any issue.

My only complaint on these headphones would be the weight after an extended period of time. When using them for a 3+ hour bike ride, by the end, you can definitely feel them pulling down.
Signal breaks up when more than 1.5 feet away.
Bought these due to the great reviews that we seen. I want to say just from prompt shipment to opening these I am ordering more!
This is a Christmas present has not been used yet
Easy to use and very convenient. My niece, sister, and I All have a pair.
Earbuds are constantly dropping signal. I'm thinking it is specific to this pair because I've had these same kind in the past and that's never happened..
Great sound, nice fit and noise canceling

I needed a way to listen to calls, music, and videos while still being around other people and noises.  The SENSO ActivBuds Bluetooth Headphones work great.  I am able to sync them easily to my ipad and iphone and I can move about easily.  The range is a lot farther than I would have thought...I can walk to other rooms at home or in the office and stay connected.  I can watch TV and still listen to football games or music...at the same time!  I think I will purchase sets for my sons as Christmas gifts!

Arrived today, packed well, connected with my phone, very good sound. I didn't really expect much cause they don't cost much but they exceeded all expectations by far. I think I'll buy a 2nd pair for my wife because these things are sweet.
Good bass loud long long battery  life

Total win here! Comfortable ear buds that stay put even when running and weight training; the gel-type ear hooks are amazingly comfortable - I was worried they would be to flimsy - and help hold the ear buds in place. The set-up and pairing was a breeze. The controls, albeit somewhat small, are easy to use. And the sound is absolutely fantastic!! Make sure you dial back your volume - these things pump it out! The noise cancellation is actually pretty decent and remove most noises from the gym. I highly recommend these ear buds for anything/anyone active!!
Good voice quality but you can't used in bed time
For the price these things are great.

I purchased these for the price point and am NOT disappointed. I like listening to audio books while doing other things and these are great. I’ve also had phone conversations and the person at the other end had no problem hearing me.

Edit 3/9: After Senso support reached out, I tried using a different cable and it started charging - so it was the cable, not the headphones, that was at fault. The charging cable was also heating up, so definitely needs to be replaced.
They seem ok for the price, but did not expect them to stop working so soon! In less than 3 months of intermittent usage they have now stopped charging. When I plug them in to charge, the red/blue light does not come up and even after keeping them plugged in for couple hours it's always saying "battery low"! Completely useless. And of course Amazon will not take it back as it's been over a month, but come on.. less than 3 months is too short of a life for headphones - I'd expect at least a year.

sounds good
comfortable
pairs easy

These are built to last just long enough for the warranty to expire. My battery died in little over one year.

Do yourself a favor and get something with more longevity.
They are great! Base is a bit heavy. Use an equalizer.
silicon ear hook is not flexible but instead its bendable ( not holding good )

decent battery life. lasts me around 5h single charge. I dont think its waterproof but i have taken it to the shower a couple of times and they still work. Sounds is not the best but for the price is really good.

Comes with a case and extra buds.
Stopped working after 3 weeks. The 2nd pair after 2 weeks.

These are a great value for  Bluetooth Headphones. They are light, easy to use. Complete integration with my Android based Samsung phone. I did have a minor issue with sound fidelity at first, but I remembered my phone has funky (and high quality) audio settings. So if you buy these and the sound quality is poor initially dig into your phones audio settings and try the multiple ear buds that come with this product until you find the best match for you. I was on the verge of returning these until I fixed the audio output setting on my phone and switched to the foam ear buds. NOW, You can't get these off my head except to charge.Could not be happier with the comfort level and sound quality for the money.
I use these every day, pretty comfortable.
Good Bluetooth

The headphones sound great, they fit comfortably, they're easy to pair, the controls and microphone work like a charm, and they're definitely water proof. I got caught in a downpour at work that literally killed my phone, yet these headphones took it like a champ. But, with that said, they have a tendency to completely freeze my phone up when using the built in music controls. It happens at least once a day; the only way to fix it is to either remove the battery or hold the phone's power button down for 10+ seconds to reboot. And I'm not just talking about one phone, it's even doing it on my replacement phone, which is a whole different brand. So there's that. Otherwise they're great.
Good product for the price and fit the need I had. Unfortunately they stopped charging after 30 days.

Arrived beautifully packaged in a tiny carrying case complete with accessories. Quality is really good.
Great value. Sound is as good as other Bluetooth ear buds that cost hundreds of dollars.

I've bought several of these over the last year. It seems that each one lasts at least a few months before issues arise, but that's nothing new for earphones, at least in my experience. The sound quality is great, and it fits comfortably in my ear. The package comes with different-sized earbuds, so anyone concerned by that should rest assured; it is possible to change them out for comfort. The battery life is about 10-12  hours on average which is nice. The range is around 8 feet if the right earbud(where the signal is received) is pointing to whatever the Bluetooth is connected to such as your pc, phone, etc. If not, the signal will cut out fairly quickly which can get annoying. Another thing that may not annoy you, but it certainly did me, is the part that loops around your ears. It gets old fast, and the earbuds stay in your ears regardless of the loops being there or not so I always decide to cut them off. As far as I'm aware it does not damage them in any way, and I certainly have never seen a reduction in listening quality because of it.

I have bought about 8 pairs of different t one this brand make all good, but I have baught them for others 3 for myself I work in an industrial  setting and these last about 8 months there, cant get better for the price.

I received them and they are working okay so far.  it's only been a short while and so i'm hopign they don't short out on one side or anything but the fit and everything is great, sound is good as well.  As with other reviews, it's not noise cancelling.  Great for slow walking but they suck when I ride my bike because all I hear is wind in my ears.

Love these headphones! I always have problems with the wireless headphones not making it through my workout - 4 hours on Sun. Finally don't have to worry about changing headphones during a workout. Sound is good, functions super easy 😊
Great value for my first Bluetooth earphones. O
This headphones are great. Was expecting less for the price. They have great sound and are comfortable to wear. I enjoy these headphones.
I enjoy that the headphones last a little more than 8 hours and how there easy to use :)

I am so impressed with my new Senso ear buds!!!!
They make Physical Therapy enjoyable.
Great quality, very loud so it cancels out the background noise! Worth every penny! My beats broke after only a few months so I’m already pleased with the price and quality!
sounds good for the price. comfort is good for the price and have been using on trips and at the gym
Great for music, sound is amazing. but not for calls. When I turn my head sometimes while listening to music it stop playing. There great for their price.

Didn't use them much, maybe once a week for an hour or two and after a couple months they won't turn on. For 30 dollars I expected the build quality to be better than that. I have other Bluetooth headphones that are still going strong after 4 years. Don't recommend these.

The sound is as good as normal earbuds, and they don't hold much of a charge, but overall they worked okay for about a month of intermittent use, with only occasional stuttering when first connecting, at the edge of Bluetooth range, or when the batteries were low.

Now, though, they stutter about every fifteen seconds. Batteries fully charged, phone two feet away with no obstructions, but they're absolutely useless, unless you're nostalgic for the "badly scratched CD" music listening experience.

Wish I could return them.
I love these headphones.  Great for listening to music or podcasts while you are working out, or cleaning the house!!

This review is for the ActivBuds S-250. I like these earbuds very much. They have a long playing time and have a pleasing sound quality. I use them with Comply foam tips which greatly improve the comfort and sound. Comply tips come in a variety of sizes, shapes, and sound isolation and are a positive addition to any buds. One improvement I would  like to see would be cloth braided connecting cable between the two buds. The rubber cable sticks to the back of my neck sometimes and it will dislodge the buds from one or both ears. I usually wear them with the cable in front of my neck and flip it to the back if I am going to take them out. I like these earbuds because the controls are easy to use and are ergonomically designed. The charge plug is easy to put in and the buds hold a charge for a long time. The playing time is quite good and is at least equal to the time claimed by the vendor. All in all a comfortable set of buds with sweet sound. (I also have a set of the S-255 buds and am not happy with the flimsy ear hooks. Fortunately, the Comply foam tips keep them in my ears as the hooks are quite useless.) I have several pair of these buds because I have a number of Bluetooth sources and the buds, like most Bluetooth devices will only pair to two at a time. Bluetooth 5, which will be released any day now, is claimed to allow several devices to pair.

The Bluetooth is very quick at connecting with my iPhone, ipads, and the sound is very good and clear both at listening music and talk on the phone. It's no difference than listening with the apple wired earpods. I can't compare with the apple Bluetooth earphones because I don't have one and no plan to spend big buck for one. I'd rather save the money for the real Bluetooth headphones like Bose or Bowers & Wilkins, etc. if I am really into music.
Also, this earphones does fit in the ears good and stable.

These are just ok. I have a pair of powerbeats3 and the fidelity on the SENSO are sub-par in comparison.  The bass and high treble are muffled.  Bottom line is theybare a cheap option and you only get what you pay for.  Easy to use and set up.  Quality is fair. Recommend for young adults or college grads on a budget and are not looking for high fidelity or quality.

I like the sound quality, the bass can only be improved by proper ear canal fitting.
The over the ear hooks are comfortable and functional. I am not a fan of rubber ear tips,
sweat from exercising can pop them out of place, I prefer the foam. It comes with a set.
Blue tooth seems to work OK, Can't comment on battery life yet. The workmanship is good be careful there is
a weak point between the speaker and the body of the electronics. Handle with care.

These headphones work perfect for the price. I've owned expensive wireless headphones in the past, and all of them broke within 3 months of constant use. I use them strictly for working out and they stay comfortably in my ears throughout the entire duration. I am able to sweat in them without worrying about them giving out.
These are gre great headsets- they paired easily and have high quality sound. The are lightweight and stay in place during even vigorous activity. Great value for a modest price!!
These are wonderful for the price! Highly recommend!

Only 4 stars... Although I am satisfied with these Headphones, I am NOT happy with the battery life!
on a full charge the battery life seems to average 6 hours. I work some long days and it's a little irritating when I get the battery low warning.
On the other hand... they're great for working out, Walking or running. especially if you are a heavy sweater!
One other thing... my old Headphones would read my text messages, these do not have that feature.
I purchased them for my wife who has issues with headphones and she is 100% happy with them.
These earphones are a good buy.

I'm no audiophile, but I think these earbuds sound great!  Great price for the sound quality and all that comes with your order - good stuff!  One thing though (maybe it's me), and that is I can't seem to pair it with my Win10 pc; earbuds are not recognized at all in bluetooth settings for my laptop.  No problem with iPhone.

Sound quality is crystal clear when headphones are near the phone. However as soon as i put my phone in my pocket it becomes staticy and will randomly disconnect, which defeats the main purpose of Bluetooth headsets.
I was very impressed and actually blown away by the sound. These are awesome, far better than Beats!

HOLY SSHHHH

My Bose headphones broke after only a year and 10 days. (10 days out of the warranty...go figure right.) I'm on a budget right now so I decided to get these. They are way louder than the Bose and really are noise canceling, they like suction in my little ear holes hahaha

I HIGHLY recommend these, the bass is awesome. I'm a hip hop head so it's perfect for me. Spring for the warranty, it's only a little extra and gives you some peace of mind.
These headphones are survivors, got in a laundry machine for 30 min by mistake, after a couple of hours they started to work again almost as new.
I just got my Senso  Bluetooth headphones and I love them they stay in your ear great and they sound fantastic and are very comfortable and light .  Already recommended them to three other friends .

I really like these earbuds. Connection with my phone and tablet has been seamless, unlike some other Bluetooth devices I’ve used. They sound good, and have plenty of volume available, and they are relatively comfortable and don’t fall out of my ears.
I had hoped that I could get a little more bass volume, as I play bass and usually listen to music with the objective of learning the bass line. To be fair, I have not heard many in ear type phones less than $100 that are able to produce strong and undistorted bass.
Overall I am very happy with this product.

I enjoy running and needed a pair of headphones that would stay in/on while running around. I really like this set! I can change the ear bud to fit looser or tighter in my ear. It is flexible around the ear so I can make sure if the bud pops out the whole piece stays on my ear. The buttons are easy to use and the quality of the sound is great. No issues since I purchased a month ago.
Great sound, ordered a second pair right away. Amazing Customer Service at Invotek. Quick response to request. Highly recommend.

First, I paid full price for these, and I always expect more than I usually get. With a 4.5 star average after thousands of reviews I expected these to be pretty fantastic. For once a product EXCEEDED my expectations!
Very good price for the quality of these great sounding sport buds. At the gym I had been using wired buds and it was just kind of a hassle, but they sounded great (1 Mores Triple Drivers). Figured with the Bluetooth buds sound would greatly suffer. These Senso buds are pretty darn good. Great bass, more than the triple drivers, and overall surprisingly enjoyable sound. For working out I prefer these. Comfort level is great, controls easy to operate, and they look good!
Very satisfied with this purchase and highly recommend👍

I really love these headphones! They are the 1st pair of wireless headphones I've ever owned and I must say, these are great!! The sound quality is excellent & the bass is present without taking away from the vocals, which says a lot for me because I really prefer a lot of bass when I listen to music! They are a nice comfortable fit and I haven't had any issues with them falling out! I would also like to add that the customer service from this company is AMAZING!  I've received a few emails from the company, one prior to receiving the headphones and one or two after I received the headphones.  They were very much on top of things, nice & efficient. Answering questions without them being asked, they attached a guide for the product, & also covered all info needed about the 1 year warranty that comes with this product, they gave me steps to take if I had any issues with the product, and they were overall very impressive about making me feel appreciated as a customer!! 5 stars all around for this purchase!

The headphones feel great and sit nicely in the ear however the sound will cut out way too much!  If my phone is on my left arm while I run it is unbearable.  It will only work if it is on my right arm and even at that it will still cut out at times.  Never did that when I used my old Motorola sd11-hd headphones.  Not sure why the receiver is that weak but it is.  Would not recommend for anyone that wants to use these for an active lifestyle.
Works great! Came in excellent condition and all the pieces.
They arrived days early. They are easy to pair. Comfortable and very easy to wear.
The connection is intermittent and stopped working after a few months. The battery holds for 4-5hrs on a good day. The sound quality is fair.

very good sound quality, lightweight, easy to sync
they do get a bit uncomfortable on long runs, which is why I cant give them a 5star raiting, but I would purchase again.
I'm giving this as a christmas gift. So, I will have that person give a rating!

Customer service is a 5, product is a 4. Would give 4.5 stars if I could. Had a pair that fit REALLY well (the over ear hooks had wire inside), but the bluetooth went out after a month. Senso sent another pair right  away, and the Bluetooth is MUCH better, although the hooks are more plasticy than the first pair. Having said that, the fit is really solid. It sometimes takes a few extra seconds for the headphones to REALLY connect (despite what the computer voice tells you) and once in a while I have to turn them off then on again to get them to connect to my iPhone. But overall these are a great bargin.
I got these earphone for gym. They have amazing ng sound quality and are indeed noise cancelling. They are light weight and trendy. Excellent value for money.
These headphones last an entire work shift within a noisy factory. With memory foam (or any ear filling) tips make these an investment worth having for outdoors or indoor activities.
First time using them, the sound kept cutting in and out. The phone was strapped on my arm, no more than a foot away.
It was about time I went wireless.  These headphones fit the bill perfectly.  Easy to set up and pair with my device.  Easy to use.

These ear buds came quickly. They came with a nice little carrying case, extra ear tips, wire ties, car charger adapter, short charging cable (micro USB) that fits the ear buds but then an extra USB 3 Foot charging cable but this cable does not fit the ear buds so I questioned why it was included. I can use it for other things so no big deal. The ear buds themselves are comfortable in my ears and they didn't not fall out once even while I ran on elliptical and then did weight training as well. The sound quality is decent and I only have to turn the volume up half way and I don't hear any of the people around me. So far I'm very happy with these buds and would purchase them again.
These headphones have amazing sound quality, very clear, and ok bass. The battery will ussually last me about 2.5- 3 hours on a full charge.
I used these for workouts and I loved them!
Fits in my ears very good and has great sound. Also easy to advance songs and answer phone calls. Used at work today and I was very happy
I believe they work as good as the beats...
My first experience with wireless headphones. Bought headphones with an exercise armband: hate the armband but really like the headphones. Easy to use and the sound is pretty good.

I have had these headphones a couple days but they are GREAT. They charged quickly, paired easily with my phone, and fit well in my tiny ears (with the included small earbuds). I took them for a run and really loved the sound and the ease of use. I had them on the lowest volume and could hear outside noise too for safety. I hope they last a while because these are exactly what I have been looking for at a reasonable price.
Somewhat tinny sound
Not the greatest sound, but okay only. Not a lot of lows or highs. The biggest problem is the people have a hard time hearing me. I can't use this for phone call.

Bought these as a replacement for some Phaiser Bluetooth headphones that I found to hurt my ears due to their hard plastic. So far, I'm VERY pleased. The sound quality is excellent (as far as Bluetooth headphones go) and the soft, bendable rubber earpieces are very comfortable. I have small ears so I gave up on in-ear buds. Had at least three pairs, and all would come out during runs...or just walks for that matter. These survived the run test in terms of staying in. However, I wore them yesterday while bike riding with wind gusts of about 7-9 mph and I could definitely hear the wind. However, I'm not finicky about noise-cancelation. From a safety perspective, I actually WANT to be able to hear a leaf crinkle to know if someone is approaching close behind me. With that being said, I could still hear my music and if needed, I could push the earbud down deeper into my ear and/or raise the volume. The battery lasts as advertised and the neck strap is a good length to fit comfortably behind my head or hanging down in front.

I wish I could give 4.5 stars, but my only wish is that the earpiece hooks (if that's what they're called)--the part that wraps around ear--was adjustable. While they do stay on while running, they actually do come off a bit more easily than I'd like when doing ordinary activities due to my long, thick hair or having a scarf brush up against them (during winter), etc.
Happy with my purchase. They are easy to use, the traveling case is compact and the sound is great.

Selected these as replacement for BEATS. At the start I was apprehensive as they seemed to cut out at short distances but seemed to work it self out within a few days.  Worked perfect for 3 months.  Then they died. So why 5 stars? Service! They emailed me quickly tried to help with factory reset to make sure it wasn't firmware related etc. That didn't work and they shipped a new pair.  They stand behind the product. I do wish the ear wrap was more firm but other than that solid all around.
I love these headphones!! The sound quality is great, and the headphones are incredibly comfortable to wear.
The sound quality is very good
Don't stay in, not comfortable, not at all noise cancelling. Wish we could return.

Pluses: Amazing sound!  Stay put while I run - they don't bounce out. Great customer service - the car charger I received was broken so they sent me another one for free.  Cons: I wish they were a little lower profile - didn't stick out from my head as much.  The extra power cord is cool, but I don't really have a use for it.
I love it but unfortunately I lost it...
The person on the other lines couldn't hear me very well.

The look good and feel good in my ears. The sound quality is pretty good as well. They came fully charged right out of the box. They paired easily to my iPhone, I love the foam ear tips that came with it. Plus it came with a car vent phone holder and a adhesive credit card holder.
Update: I’ve noticed that I didn’t receive the car charger and cord. I’ve emailed the company and within seconds I had a real person email me back about the problem and they are sending it out ASAP. Amazing customer service, 5+ starts !
I chose these based on the price and rating. I have used them often, they are easy to adjust the volume, clarity is great.
Great, stay in place on a run and heavy sweating does not phase them. Only observed drawback is the volume buttons are too close. As a runner in Florida (I know sweat) I highly recommend.

The earbuds work fine. Sound quality is decent for the price. Advertised as noise canceling but haven't used them in a noisy environment yet. They do well as earbuds for working out. I bought these as a temporary solution. For the price Iwould say go for it.

These earphones are wonderful. I bought them for the gym and they stay in my ears and sound great! I really like that I can see what the battery charge is on my phone when I connect them. It comes with a great case to hold them so they don't get damaged in my purse or gym bag. I would highly recommend these to those who need an inexpensive option.
Great head phones for the price
These headphones are a great buy. The sounds is crisp and clear. And I can leave my phone in my locker while I am working out at the gym.

Sound was great and the packaging and accesories were really cool, but the ear hooks were too big for my small ears. Literally hung way over my ears loosely. Uncomfortable fit and didn't trust they would stay on. Returned them.

This is my second pair of Senso Headphones. The purchase was made because my daughter liberated the original ones from me. Really like these earbuds (maybe a  little more than the first par). The earhooks have been modified and they can now be molded around your ear for a much more secure fit when out on those runs. I never once had to readjust them because they were falling out. Hard to pass up for $23.

I own a pair of Bose QuietComfort 20i noise-cancelling earbuds but I was looking for a pair of wireless bluetooth earbuds for working out, doing lawnwork, etc.,  so I took a chance on these based on the reviews. These are simply outstanding for the price (sound quality, eat of use, comfort, etc). Much much better than anticipated. I will be ordering another pair for my wife.

They have worked fantastic over the past couple of months, no random shutdowns or disconnects, battery life is really good for the price.
Worth recommending for the price!
easy to use and sound great.

Received these headphones on my birthday. Not really a headphones type person but the standard ones that came with my phone sucked or ones I have bought have store eventually fail. I mainly use them when working outdoor around the house doing chores mowing etc. I was constantly pulling one earbud out of my ear by moving around while mowing and on riding mower. Now I dont have to pull one out of my ear to talk to someone can just pause them and they are of course wireless so I dont have to pull phone out of pocket constantly. Great noise cancellation. Not looking to use the waterproof feature anytime soon lol. Comes with so many accesories. I was floored. Great gift or awesome purchase.

I wear these in the gym and they are one of the best purchases I have ever made. I am college student and can walk all over campus with these and take my backpack on and off, take jackets off, do simple tasks such as bend over without having to worry about my headphone cord tangling. Especially helpful in the gym as the drown out all sound, are beyond louder than apple pods, and actually stay in my ear. Fit better in my left ear than my right for some reason. The goodie bag included was a pleasant surprise as I received the coolest 2-in-1 charger cable (both lightning [apple] and microusb [android and the headphones].
Bluetooth headphones are a must purchase and well worth the investment.
These just so happen to be the best I have tried and the best price I have seen for the quality.
5 stars
Headphones work great. High quality at a low costs.

After buying several bluetooth headphones I am so glad to have finally found a set that truly have great bass and sound incredible. Especially for the price. Not to mention the bonus accessories (USB charger, dual USB cable, carry case and spare bud ear plugs)

Everytime I have bought these headphones a family member asks to borrow them and end up loving them so I let them keep em & I buy a new pair for myself. These headphones are GREAT!!!!! My entire household has a pair now.

I really wanted to like these headphones but they have a major design flaw. After charging them up in accordance with the instructions, I used them for my daily walks. While in the midst of a walk, I got the "battery low" warning for the first time. FIVE MINUTES later, the headphones turned themselves off and could not be turned on again. I spent the rest of my walk in silence.

I couldn't believe that headphones advertised for working out would have such a short window between the first battery warning and completely shutting down, so when I got home I charged them up and tried again (keeping a spare set of wired headphones with me, just in case). When I got the first "battery low" warning, I started a timer. Sure enough, almost exactly five minutes later, the headphones shut off.

The designers clearly were not thinking when they made these. That would be annoying in any Bluetooth headphones, but especially if you're marketing them to people who will not be near a power source while using them. On top of that, the booklet that came with them is full of warnings about the dangers of charging them too much, so it wouldn't be practical to plug them in after every use just to avoid the stupid things shutting off in the middle of a workout.
These are s gift for my son but I have the same headphones for over a year and they’re great!

I bought these for running and cycling. They worked great and endured 5 months of heavy use (i.e. sweat) without showing any signs of damage. I felt pretty confident in their durability, and since they're rated IPX7 waterproof, meaning they should withstand submersion in up to 1 meter of water for up to 30 minutes, I didn't think there would be any issue with me using them while I swam laps. I was wrong. I swam one lap with these in my ears, and they malfunctioned almost immediately. I couldn't get them to turn on after that, which was disappointing.

Fortunately, the seller stands by the 1 year warranty. I contacted customer support and they were very kind and helpful and agreed to send me a replacement. They also told me that even though the headphones are IPX7 rated, they don't recommend using them while swimming or submerging them in water. Doesn't really make sense to me how these are certified as waterproof but can't be put in water, but I'm glad I learned that lesson before my warranty ran out.
Live these. Listened more than an hour every day for a week before had to recharge.

Meh. They take forever to charge and then the battery doesn't last an hour before it starts beeping loudly in my ear and needs another hour of charging. Impossible for long jogs or listening to podcasts around the home.

The SENSO Bluetooth Headphones are a good value. There is no doubt about that. But there are definitely some pro's and con's that made me rethink this purchase. When I was looking for headphones, my number one concern was if it would stay firmly in my ear without having to readjust. Second, was the quality of sound. Third, was the Bluetooth connection With the SENSO Bluetooth headphones, this is what I found to be the case...
The PROs: Quality sound, good button functionality, and surprisingly comfortable.
The CONS: (the major one) when you start to sweat the silicone ear hook does not keep tight to your ear resulting in slippage and bouncing, Bluetooth disconnects from my iPhone after about a minute (so if you pause your music for any reason expect that you will have to reach for your phone to sync the two devices up again).

I am still not sure I am going to keep them. I have to take off the headphones to wipe the silicone ear hooks off about 4-6 times over an hour workout.
These are great! They fit perfectly and don't come out while I'm running. I've never dropped a connection with my Apple Watch while exercising and the volume is great.

Way cheaper than Beats Wireless Headphones - but with the same quality of sound! It even connects faster to my iphone bluetooth verses other wireless headphones.  I wish it was a tighter fit around the ears, but overall, this is a good value for the quality of sound and ease of use. Totally recommend.

great sounds good base though i wish they could have a lower volume setting, tend to be a little loud for me even at the lowest setting before they cut off.  but these things are fantastic for commuting, trains, buses, ect.  though the mic does not account for background noise, this makes for loud background on phone calls.

I purchased these headphones close to a year ago.  They worked fine but just a few weeks ago one of the headsets lost sound.  I was going to give up on the item and throw them away when I remembered about the 1 year warranty.  I figured it was a long shot and there would be resistance to honoring it but was pleasantly surprised by the Senso response to the claim.  I went to their site and filled out the information on the item.  I shortly got an email on how to do a hard reset to see if it would bring the sound back to the ear piece.  It did not, so I responded back to them the following day, as encouraged if it did not work.  They advised a new pair would be shipped out.  My claim started on Wed and I had a new pair by Saturday.  Best service I seen to date on a warranty issue from any company.  I would not hesitate to purchasing another pair.
The bass is a bit much but still useful if you run
Work as expected.
great headphones comes with lots extras for the money

These are fine headphones, that pair easily, fit comfortably, and sound a lot better than their price point implies. As a headset, I come through loud and clear on the other end of the line. Can't ask for more than that.

Its not that the buds don’t look good, they do. It’s not that they don’t sound good, they do. It’s the fact it takes forever for these things to connect and work ever time I turn them on! I’m done! Going back to beats!
works for general listening.
These earbuds would not turn off at all, and they would interfere with everything else that would bluetooth to my phone, especially my car. Sound was sub par, not worth it.
These are garbage. There is a reason the price is set a discount. I don't do reviews, but this was that disappointing.
Great product. The seller delivered according to the agreed term.

I had these headphones for almost a year and thought they were pretty good. Unfortunately, a couple months ago the right side earbud separated from the control piece where the buttons are located and now it just hangs there by the electrical wires. This somehow happened through normal use. I didn't drop them or mistreat them in any way. Hoping that SENSO will see this update and offer to send me a new pair.
They were easy to set up with bluetooth and the sound is fantastic and they are comfortable to wear. Very happy with this purchase.

Just totally awesome, and exactly what I was looking for in a set of wireless headphones.  Any OMG are they loud, good base response. I have to turn the volume on my phone to halfway for comfortable listening.
Stays in place during workouts and while running.

I've had these for about a week and they do the job great. Good value for the money. There have been a couple random instances where the sound will cut out or digitalize, but it corrected itself after a few seconds. They come with a unique charging cord that has a changeable head do you can charge the headphones and then your iPhone. Unfortunately the lightning charger part doesn't work on mine. Kind of a bummer, but not a huge deal. I do find that they hurt my ears after about 30 minutes, because of the pressure even though I'm using the smallest buds. Overall I think they work great and I'm happy with them.

These headphones are amazing.  They have better sound quality than the beats by Dre. do and are very comfortable.  I have used them mostly on the treadmill and do not fall out.  They do get a bit loose when I am hitting the heavy bag or the cardio bag but are great for the speed bag.  Overall all 5 stars.

With the phone in my back pocket and playing an audiobook the headphones have intermittent bluetooth connections (i.e. words continually missing from the transmission.) I should have returned them immediately, but I tried to work the problem through SENSO. My mistake.
Sound is great. Piece that goes around the ear needs to be smaller

I purchased one set of these in April , 2017, and it no longer accepted a charge within -3- weeks. I did get a refund, and purchased another one, in May, 2017, assuming that the first was a fluke. In 3-4 weeks, the newer headphones literally fell apart. I contacted Invotek and after a dozen emails (they would not supply me with a customer service #) they advised me that they were sending me yet a third set of these headphones. I wrote them numerous times that I did not expect the third pair to work any better than the first two. Different customer service people wrote me back, stating that the new one was on the way. I will return it as soon as I get it. Thank goodness Amazon Prime interceded and gave me a refund. Stay away from this item, You get what you pay for.

Good connectivity to my iPhone and I use it to listen to songs, audiobooks and podcasts while in the gym. The earpieces fit very well and can keep out most of the noise around me. The flexible earbands work very well.
So far so good, wind blowing when I am running is a little annoying but hope to adjust them so that it is not as bad.

Audio volume doesn’t go very low, so you’re going to have medium volume at the lowest setting.  Also, people tell me, when I’m using it as a microphone/headset with phone calls that they can’t hear me very well.  Think I’ll have to buy another Plantronics.
Like them more than my Beats2
Because I'm contractor in carpentry it allows me to listen with cords getting way while working. Also it great for keeping my phone safe while working, can leave 25ft plus away .

Fantastic and at a great price. I'm an audiophile, to the ludacris and extreme point. Very rich and warm sound even from mp3 format or music streaming platforms. Can't wait to try them with vinyl. Not the absolute best out there but at this price they are top notch. And, the battery life is phenomenal.

The sound is great and the battery life is great, but the only thing that is the most annoying thing about these earbuds is when it reaches 30%, every 5 minutes it has a loud voice that says battery low. Not sure if this can be turned off but it is a stupid feature. It also means the earbuds are about to turn off when it reaches 30%. Seems that it miscalculates the battery time.

Ordered these in April 2017 and had been very happy with them.  Sound quality was good, comfortable to wear and held a charge for a long time.  Liked them so much that when a lightning deal popped up for the newer version I grabbed it so I'd have a pair for workouts and one for travel.  This week after boarding a flight put on the pair that I bought in April 2017 and they wouldn't connect to my phone.  I assumed that I must have forgotten to power them down last time I used them, but rather than the red LED that indicates a low charge I saw that it was blinking alternately blue and red.  I tried removing the device and pairing them again but they wouldn't connect.  Like I said, they were great but I'm disappointed they only lasted a bit over one year.

I've had at least 6 pairs of noise cancelling ear buds over the past 7 years --- these have virtually NO noise cancelling.  If you pound them into your ear they may block some noise but they DO NOT cancel.
Perfect headphones for working out!
Great set of buds for a workout. Sound quality is great for the price point.

Sound quality wasn't very good after listening to the Beats Solo 3 Wireless Bluetooth Headphones. I returned these Headphones immediately. If you don't care about crisp clear sound (bass, treble, mids), then I would recommend this phone. The ability to answer phone calls (the phone call is clear) and pair with an iPhone is simple and quite easy.

These headphones are pretty good the battery life is pretty strong and the sound quality is good for its price. I had these since January 3rd of 2018. The only problem as of May 23rd 2018 the Bluetooth stopped working it doesn't connect consistently and also it's randomly turning off on its own and it doesn't even tell you that it's off. It's just after a while you start talking to somebody and out of nowhere it's disconnected because it turned off. But for its price it's not bad.
Didn't even last 4 months until they stopped working.

Headphones work great, even came with both a home and car charger. All for a great price

An update on these. I use these about 4 times a week at the gym and they were working great until one day when I couldn't get them to turn on or charge. I contacted customer service and they were very helpful. They sent me a list of things to try, including how to reset the headphones. Unfortunately none of those things worked and my headphones still wouldn't turn on. Senso apologized and had a new pair in the mail the next day. I was pleased with their customer service.
Sound good but don’t stay on well
I wish I could give 10 stars. I just love them but I wish there was a wireless set

These are really very good for the money.  I wear them in the gym and on the trail. They stay in, sweat and motion doesn't bother them. The instructions say not to charge them over night, but I do almost constantly and they still work. They're easy to turn on and off and they pair instantly with my Apple Watch 4. Its also easy answer phone calls.
Great for the price

I was at first pleased however there is this SUPER annoying static noise on the left ear piece. It won't let me concentrate on what I am listening to. I returned them and got a new pair but the static noise is still there! Its mostly annoying when the volume isnt that high. I'm debating returning. Also the pairing is pretty annoying.

Packaging:

The earbuds came in a very nice box which displays the earbuds in the front and its features on the back

Unboxing:

Upon opening the packaging, you are greeted with:

1.) 1 Pair of Senso Earbuds

2.) 1 Carry Case

3.) 1 Dual Port Charger

4.) 1 Short Charging Cable

5.) 1 3 Foot Charging With Interchangeable ends (Micro USB & Lightning Port)

6.) 3 Replacement Earbud Tips

7.) 1 Wire Tie

The Product:

So, it seems like a lot of these wireless earbuds are manufactured the same and given a different brand name, however out of the three brands I've gotten, this specific brand was my favorite. Unlike the Blayz, these do not have an annoying buzzing noise in between songs, they also come with 2 charging cables and a bigger carrying case than the others, which is really nice since the small charging cable usually keeps me from closing the the other cases.

The sound for all of these headphones is pretty bass heavy, and so until you get used to it (takes like 3-5 minutes to do so) the sound sounds a bit muffled. The noise cancelling on these earbuds are alright, they'll muffle out someone trying to talk to you in a normal voice, but if there's a lot of background noise you'll definitely hear it. I did receive these for free for my review, however my thoughts and opinions on the quality of these earbuds are genuine. They're very comfortable to wear while exercising, I personally wear them everywhere, and they're my go to earbuds when I go biking.
How this little headphone can pack such a powerful sound!!  This one also has the noice-canceling capability!!  Portable, small, powerful sound!!
After reading reviews they are pretty much spot on. They bad boys just stop working after a couple months.

I paid about $23 for the red button ones I've used for about a week now I give them 3 stars which means they are okay these are the first wireless earphones I use so I can't compare them to any other I like they are light have decent sound and stay connected most of the time. What I would don't like is the battery life they only last about two hours fully charged and that they have a blue light that blinks every five seconds when they are connected haven't used for running yet but I'm sure that it would not be a problem since there a hook that wraps around you ear.
Sound is great... my only issue with this item is that it keep on falling when I’m running

This was a very tough choice for me being that so many of the ear bud designs look familiar. I had originally bought the Otium buds and was very pleased although reading through the reviews I discovered that many of them were dying out just shortly after a month. After a few days of contemplation I decided to return them in fear of losing out in a short period of time. I then came across Senso and a couple of other brands, ultimately deciding to try out the Sensos. After only a couple days I am pleased to have a pair. They seem well built (for the price range) and I have no worries about them breaking down anytime soon. I would recommend them to anybody who wants a quality headset at an affordable price. KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK AT SENSO!
Very comfortable and clear music! Love how it was packaged and all the things that come with it!
Great product and easy to use at a great price point

The headphones arrived in good time. It was for my 16year old son and he absolutely loves it. He says it sits well in his ears ( unlike the initial ones I ordered from another site that kept falling off). The sound quality is excellent. I am vey pleased with thia purchase. Thank you.

If you are going to wear these inside only, then they will be ok. But if you ever want to wear these outside, prepare to not be able to hear. The wind noise on the headphones is ridiculous. If it is windy outside and I wear these, I can not even hear what I am trying to listen to.
In regards to connection, they sometimes will say connected, but not actually be connected. This is quite annoying.
Battery life is good. The fit is good too, once you find the right piece to fit your ear.

Sound Quality: Fair. Worse than Apple's earbuds that came with phone.
Comfort: Good, can run with these without falling out of ears. They are light.
Battery Life: Good
Quality: Poor. Failed just after the 1 yr warranty period. Fully charged, but will no longer connect to anything, makes odd beeping sound.
Value: Fair. for $30 I'm ok with not-perfect sound, but should last more than 1-yr.
Great sound and bass, does not fall out of my ears.

I never thought I would be that person using Bluetooth headphones at the gym but these are absolute gems. you can skip tracks right on the volume buttons and take calls. the mic sucks but if you're looking for a decent option to pair up for workouts this is a good bet. they last for a solid 4-5 days when I use them just for my runs.
Overall good product, but its super annoying that it keeps repeatedly  saying “low battery” after 30% and interrupting the music... Also the loud beep when increasing the volume is a little extra too

The price is right, and I liked the headphones so much, I actually ordered a pair for my dad for Father's day, and he loves them too! I'm planning on purchasing a pair for each of my family members this year.
Super easy to connect to iPhone, sound great and fit in a variety of ear sizes!

Absolute garbage. Mediocre sound quality will be the least of your worries, this POS fell apart within 2 weeks.
The side with the power button just fell off! Poof. Gone. Garbage.

This Bluetooth is not a good as described. The sound is horrible that people could not hear me if left phone in livingroom and went to kitchen or any other room without phone. You have to have phone close to you all time for better qualify sound. The port for charging was broken and not able to charge after one use. Returned to seller.
I enjoy the headphones sound is good and easy to sync.  For the money it is a good choice.

So far so good. Only have had the earbuds for less than a week but so far they work great. No issues with pairing. Earphones paired without a hitch. I am having a problem keeping the earbuds in my ears, but this has always been a problem for me as I have very narrow ear canals. I'm using the smallest pods but they still won't stay in my ears. Obviously when the earbuds are not firmly seated in the ear canal there will always be a considerable loss of bass response. In order for me to offer a fair review as to sound quality I would have to give them a listen with a known audio source while holding the buds firmly in my ear canal. In all honesty however I did not purchase these buds for critical listening, but hopefully no one would purchase earbuds for critical listening anyway, I have several pair of modified Fostex T-20 headsets that I use when I want to hear music with a full sound. I basically purchased these earbuds for wearability with reasonably good sound. These buds delivered on both of those counts.
A+

If I had written a review at any point between their arrival and 7/15 I would have given them 4 stars (great battery, great sound, doesnt come out fo the ear, poor mic - based on feedback during calls and if you turn your head sideways and the phone is in the pocket, you lose connection). However on 7/15 they just quit and died for no reason at all, they showed a full charge on the phone, everything was working normally and out of nowhere they switched off (no warning or anything) figured maybe the battery died. Put it on charge, never got the charging light. Left it for a couple of hours and tried to turn it back on, it did not.

Edit: After working with Customer Service, which was really quick and easy, they sent out a new headset. So far things are great again, so I have changed my rating from a 1 star to 4.

Edit: After having these headphones for nearly a year, they quit working i.e. they no longer charge. The pair I currently have 10% remaining and I dont expected to here sound again after they die since I cant charge them :(. Took 1 star off cause this shouldnt have happened?
Had a good charge right out of the box. Used it during one of my heavier workouts with no issues

the sound quality is very good. the fitting is ok. battery life is also good. however, they keep pausing my music every ten seconds, and decided to stop working altogether.

Well, I DID love these but after using them maybe only 5 times, the charging cable isn't working and they won't even turn on. :-(  I've tried a different cable and no luck. Now the return window has expired with Amazon so I just might be out $50. Such a bummer!
