I got these for running. They do not stay in my ear and the black part that goes behind the ear never stays contoured to my ear and therefore it is serving no other purpose other than making it more difficult for the ear bud to stay in my ear. I'm constantly pushing it back in when running.

I shouldn't of messed around with another cheap pair of headphones and just shelled out for a Bose pair. Those are the only headphones I've ever owned that stayed in when running but unfortunately they caught on something in my gym bag and the part that kept them in my way got ripped off.

I bought these several months ago and was going to return but now I lost them. I really didn’t like these at all. Sound was tinny which I could have handled. But they don’t stay in my ears. I think if you’re just walking maybe they would as long as nothing pulls on them. Jogging on treadmill - the heavy side that has the volume thing will pull the other side out of your ear. These are high quality headphones. I researched several and based on reviews and asking someone at my gym wearing them I made the purchase. Very easy setup, different sizes buds for your ears, and great sound. I'm very pleased!

These are GREAT!!  I love these, especially for the price. The sound quality is GREAT, the controls responsive, people hear me very well on my phone and work computer as well as them being so convenient.  I also like the carrying case, the quick charge and long battery life.  Additionally, the curved earpiece fits nicely in ear and stays seated even with vigorous activity.  Can't go wrong with this purchase.

Very comfortable (can easily wear for hours), stays in place when running, battery lasts well, easy to Bluetooth connect to all of my devices, and the case for these headphones is also very convenient for storing and traveling. I absolutely would buy again!

What a awesome pair of headphones! My wife bought Beats by Dre. They stopped working after a year and it cost us another $100 to get them fixed. There is one difference, $270 after repair. They are comfortable and sound great. Don't waste your money on the big name, these are awesome!
sound was mediocre and earbud hurt my ears.

I only gave them one star so I could post a review.  I am not happy with these headphones at all.  The sound is very tinny and they cut out the entire time I wore them.  I would not recommend purchasing these headphones.

I've only used these headphones for a couple days but am really happy with them.  They were really easy to set up via bluetooth with my iPhone 7+.  The battery life has been great.  Used them on and off yesterday at work and didn't get a low battery chirp.  I actually had them on standby quite a bit because I got busy and forgot to turn them off.  It seemed to not use much battery at all on standby.  Nice quick charge.  Great sound.  Also a big fan of the power button doubling as a pause/play button.  I would highly recommend these!
I love these! The best wireless headphones I have ever purchased.
not great problem syncing and the sound is not very good do not recommend
Comfortable and good quality. I didn't think the over the ear piece would be so soft and flexible. Very nice

Connectivity: Poor. I have a Moto XPure and I have been having issues connecting these and getting the audio to play from them recently. Feel: The headset and case actually feel really good (except the part that goes over the ear). Materials are solid, and I am happy with the build quality (at least aesthetically). The hoop that goes over the ear is annoying and doesn't fit my ears at all. I am 5'9" with "normal" sized ears (?) and they're way way too big. Makes going to the gym annoying.

Overall, not worth it IMO, I have owned better bluetooth headphones in my day (Mpow Jaws V4.1 [[ASIN:B015IEW1AY Mpow Jaws V4.1 Bluetooth Headphones Wireless Neckband Headset Stereo Noise Cancelling Earbuds w/ Mic]]) for about the same price $30ish so there are other options out there. If I just got a "dud" then I'm sorry to waste your time with this review, but I thought it would be good to put this out there.

I was looking for a pair of headphones that met very specific criteria:
1) Wireless
2) Comfortable
3) Sweat-proof
4) Good sound quality
5) No "excessive" noise cancellation. (If I'm working out or running outside, for safety reason I DO want to be able to hear things around me when necessary - cars on the road, etc)

These headphones fit the bill PERFECTLY. Their fit and comfort level are fantastic. Some earbuds have that collapsible "foam" that you squeeze, insert into your ears, and then allow to expand inside your ear canals. Those work okay, and they do block out some ambient noise, but after a while they can leave your ear canals feeling a little sore. These earphones do NOT do that! They include three different sizes of earpieces so you can try them all and see what fits your ear best. In my case, it was the largest pair. What a difference that makes! Honestly, they are so lightweight that I didn't think I was wearing them correctly at first, until I turned on some music. Very impressive. Oh, and don't mistake "lightweight" for "cheaply made" because these do not feel cheap at all.

Regarding the "noise cancellation": These headphones are listed as having CVC 6.0 noise cancellation which filters out ambient sound. This helps in two ways: First, it means you hear more of your music and less of the noise around you. Second, if you are using these to make a phone call, the person you are speaking with will hear more of your voice and less noise from your environment. In all honesty, if serious active noise cancellation is one of your top criteria, there are headphones out there that do a better job of that. But again, total noise cancellation is probably not why you are considering this pair.

Some great bonuses:
1) The headphones come with a nice protective case. This is essential because if you were to toss the headphones into your gym bag or something, they would inevitably become damaged or tangled up with other things in the bag.
2) Also included is a small charging cord, about 12 inches long, that fits easily into the case with the headphones. It can be used to charge them from any USB port.
3) ALSO included is a car charger with _2_ USB ports, so you can charge these headphones and your phone (or whatever else!) at the same time. Score!

I figured I would eventually find a good pair of headphones that met the above criteria; I did NOT think I would find them at this price. The sound quality is fantastic as well, especially at this price. After all I'm using them for working out, not studio recordings. I couldn't be happier.

Bottom line: If you are looking for headphones with noise cancellation or reference-quality sound, these may not be for you. But if you want a very comfortable pair of sweat-proof headphones with VERY GOOD sound quality at a killer price, do not pass these up.

Best earbuds I have had thus far. Exactly as they were described and came in a great travel kit. Very happy with the sound as well as the fit. i have small ears and usually earbuds bother me or do not stay put. These fit perfectly and are light weight and comfortable.

I feel bad giving this only 3 stars. But it's literally that...okay. Most of the time it works well. The sound is great. I love that they give you 4 different sizes of earbuds; the memory foam ones are perfect for helping these hold on while I run the treadmill. There isn't a wire-hitting-your-neck noise while you run as long as the volume is up high enough. And the volume does get loud! The bass quality is surprisingly good.
So now lets review what makes it okay:
I was bummed the ear holders weren't adjustable. I am a petite woman with tiny ears. It takes a bit of finagling and the memory foam earbuds to help keep them in place as I run.
The battery has slowly gotten worse as time has went on. Not only that, the little case that comes with them to keep them in sometimes turns them on without you knowing, and the battery is near dead the next time you use them again.
Lord help you if you're more than 20 feet away from your phone. Even weirder, if there's a *person* between you and your phone, it'll start cutting out. Hopefully the person is just walking by and not stopping to stretch.
There's no "low battery" warning. It just stops working.
Delivered on time and I the sound is amazing!!

I'm very impressed by the sound quality of these headphones, especially for the price. The bass response was very surprising. Not sure how long they will play on a charge. I've worn them for a couple hours at a time and then just recharge them so I'm sure they won't run down on me the next time I use them.

Bottom line, they are entry level headphones but they get the job done. I bought them to connect to my new Apple Watch b/c I hate running with my phone but didn't want to spend $150 on headphones. The sound quality is everything you could ever need on a run. The noise cancellation is above average. I also sweat like a pig but still had no issues with them staying in my ear.

About 8 months into owning them and using them several times per week for runs one of the earbuds cut out and wouldn't turn back on. I suspect the sweat finally got to them, but I don't know. Much to my surprise Senso's customer service was actually spectacular. I sent them an email through their website, they responded in minutes, and b/c my earphones were within the 12-month warranty they sent me a new pair free of charge.

Bottom line- if you're worried about durability with a cheap product you should be. But they have the warranty, so you can't lose with these headphones.

Well I went with these because of the amount of reviews everyone gave it.  I have to say after reading the specs these headsets are either the earlier model or a defect.  1)  Sound quality is inconsistent.  There were times where the sound was great then there were times the sound was distant, like below CD quality (same song, same playing device).  2)  I bought these headsets for the main reason to have an all in one device to listen to music and be able to talk on the phone.  There were numerous of phone calls taken on this device and everyone told me they hear an echo of their own voice.  This happened on every call taken.  On my end I can hear the caller just fine but the echoing on the other end caused me to stop using these for calls.  Bummer because the specs on the device states these were made to take phone calls with zero interference or noise from the surrounding area.  3)  You can not tell when powering up the device is low or high on battery, but when the battery is low, my god, the device will not stop letting you know the battery is low.  That part is very annoying.  Good things about the device.  Function buttons are in good spots.  They are light weight.  When the sound is performing at it's best, they have a very nice sound to it.  Good highs and good bass.  Again, if you are looking for an all-in-one device where you can listen to music and take phone calls, this device will not be the one!

Comfortable and good sound. I an satisfied with the S-250 Active Buds. Great service from Invotek and Amazon
Quality headphones from the wearing comfort to the sound. I bought one set for me and one for a friend and we are both very pleased with the purchase.

I was dubious about ordering these however they are great earbuds. Great sound, great and comfortable fit, and connect up to my phone better then any other blue tooth ear buds I've owned. This is about my 3rd or 4th set. I especially like the flexible ear wraps and can wear these for hours without discomfort. A big issue with my many other pairs. The case, charger, auto charger, and USB cords are great too.

Comparable to the Beats by Dr Dre. Amazing sound and quality. Customer service is outstanding. The one year warranty is awesome because I sweat more than most I think (ha!), and it seems to always mess with any headphones I buy. I had an issue and they replaced them pronto no questions asked.
These shipped very quickly and work fantastic!!! Great buy!

They last 10 to 11 months. The right bud quit working and/or fall apart both times.
1st time I thought I might’ve been unlucky or accidentally roughed the right bud. I liked the sound quality so bought it again.
2nd time, same failure mode around same point in the life time.

worked as advertised. stay on really well. comfortable and easy to pair.

They work well and are comfortable but the volume control could be better. There seems to be a big jump between no volume and low volume, I can't get it as low as I would like, it's a bit louder than I want, one push on the volume rocker and no sound at all. Otherwise, nice product.

The product works great until it stopped working less than a year later. I am not sure what happened and suspect the inside mechanical structures broke. Overall, it works well and stays on your ears when you run and gym!

I got these as a gift for christmas and they worked alright for a month. I use them at the gym and sweat quite a bit but they say sweat proof so that shouldn't matter. Whether it was the sweat or not they have stopped working completely a little over a month in and won't charge at all. Also to activate the warranty you have to have the amazon ordering info, which I don't have because they were a christmas gift so now I'm just out a pair of headphones. They're great in theory but I will be sticking with wired headphones from now on. Hard pass on these.
Good product

The connectivity of these is terrible. I bought these with high hopes but they are a waste of money. I returned the first pair hoping that I just got a bad set but the second pair I got had the same problem. I went through all of their troubleshooting ideas but nothing worked. These are basically wireless headphones that cut out as soon as you start moving.
Going on 7 months I use them 2-4 times a week at the gym, better than more expensive brands IMO
The headphones will not charge and have stopped working after 2 months.

I had these before and they were great. they got crushed accidentally. I bought again to find that the part that goes over your ear is now rubber with a metal wire in it. I constantly have to reshape it and 30 days into me using them this rubber and wire combo is failing. The last set had a very nice flexible plastic piece that retained its shape well.  The sound is great but the over the ear part IMO is terrible.

These are pretty good headphones but only if you are 3 feet away from your source or phone. Seriously you can’t set your phone down at a park and workout 10 feet away, it fully cuts out.  They do stay in your ears which is nice, and the battery life is acceptable I’m just super disappointed with the range.
I have small ears. When I run, my music becomes distorted because the buds do not stay in my ears.

Holy Guacomole!! Let me find out I paid $30 for some Beats. I set the bar really low because of the price. Not only were these easy to pair, but the sound quality is fantastic; and not from a lower price perspective. They truly sound like the several pairs of wireless Beats I owned. The range is also great. I was able to listen to my music with my phone in my living room and me in my bedroom about 10 - 12 ft away. So far the battery life is true to description as I have yet to recharge them and I've been using them at least an hour a day for the past week.

I plan on getting several more pairs just in case the shelf life on these things are short. Either way, it was well worth the money spent.
perfect gift for Dad
It's too early to rate this product, but so far, I like it. Give it 3 to 6 months and I'll give you a realistic assessment.
Good Product
Love the product. Thank you.
Work great!
I love these they work well and stay in your ears well even when sweaty. The buds are made of material similar to earplugs that you roll up and they expand after you put them in your ear
Sound as good and operate more easily than another brand (that I bought first) that cost twice the price.
The customer service is great if you run into any problems later. The product comes with a 1 year warranty

This is the third pair headphones I have ordered. A pair for me and two as a gift. For the price the quality is very good. They fit and stay on my ears. I highly recommend them if you are looking for wireless headphones.

"This is the second time I purchased these headphones. I paid $19.00 and would certainly buy them again ( I have) they are a Very good value. very great product...only thing to improve on is sound quality.
work great! stay in ears, very clear, have used 3x for about 40 minutes each time and haven't had to charge again. Nice!

This is the third time I have purchased this headphone. I loved them, however the first and second pairs stopped working out of nowhere after about only a year of use. I only use them at the gym and they say that they are waterproof (i.e. sweat resistant), so I don't understand why they have repeatedly stopped working. This is the third time I have ordered them and the connection is very poor with my phone (the music goes in and out constantly). None of the other ones did this. I am unfortunately going to have to send the pair back.

Liked them

Great product at a reasonable price!
Works great, connects fast, no problems other than keeping them in my ears, but I have pretty small ears so that's always an issue with earbuds for me.

So nice not to have a friggin cord tangelin on stuff

I have been very satisfied with the earbuds. The only issue I have had is peeling back the plastic strip covering the charging port. I needed a knife to pry it open. I understand it has to be water tight. Nevertheless, I am very satisfied. When walking on windy days there is a lot of ambient noise from the wind. Perhaps this in unavoidable.
Great for running, stayed in place and great sound quality.

I purchased these as I lost my Beats wireless headphones.  I was concerned initially due to the price difference, but was pleasantly surprised when I wore them during my recent half marathon.  Great product, great sound, I did not have to fuss and fight with them to stay in my ears at all, which is a BIG PLUS.  I would definitely recommend these to others in my fitness group.
The sound on the head phone's are great but I had a short on mine

Sound quality is pretty good. I think i saw a few people mention about it having really good bass but I didn't notice that, although I just tested them out with a few songs before i re-packaged it (got this as an Xmas present for my wife). Build quality seems nice too. I wouldn't say its top notch but it doesn't have a super cheap feel either. Only thing that i wasn't a big fan of was the packaging. It all comes in one box...the headphones are in its own container inside the box, but everything else (charging cords/adapters and car adapter) was just kind of 'thrown in', which you can hear rattle around when you move it around. This isn't a huge deal since the headphones themselves are in their own container, just thought I'd put it out there!
I read all the reviews to find some cheap headphones for my brother who is a marathon runner. He has used these for short runs so far but said he is very pleased with them!

First the mic stopped working.  Then it stopped holding a charge.  Now completely dead.  Of course my return window JUST closed, so I am stuck with inoperable JUNK.  You get what you pay for, I guess.  But I would have expected more than two months out of this.  JUNK.
" This item was a gift to my husband. It looks great and has a nice case. He's loving it. Uses it often when we go for walks.

Sleek and look like they’re built well, but I’ve had them out of the box for 10 min or so now and they won’t stop giving static instead of base and have a lot of sound distortion. Hoping a good charge will help, but doesn’t seem very plausible. Will be returning if I can’t get them in order
Nice case for buds and charger
Hi , I bought the earbuds last month. Yesterday it seemed to disconnect and reconnects within a few seconds, I don't know what is the problem?

I don’t know where all the 5-Star reviews for these headphones are coming from because these are garbage. The Bluetooth receiver is too weak to pick up a signal from my phone in my back pocket! Even after a full charge and resetting the Bluetooth connection they still cut out if the phone gets more than 12” away from the right ear bud (where the receiver is). These are garbage and I returned them immediately.
First sport Bluetooth headset and I'm diggin it! Sound is righteous and so is the fit, and for the price, score!

They work great, fit great, sound great and look really cool. They came exactly as mentioned and have a cool case as well. No issues at all. I would easily recommend to anyone, as I use them for the gym and walking to class.

I purchased these as a replacement to Jaybird JF3 Freedom BT headphones that recently died. I used these for a few hours yesterday and around the house they would be an awesome alternative to wired headphones... however, once things get active they suffer from a few cons that I feel are design flaws...

Pros:
Cost - These are fairly inexpensive and an easy way to get a quality set of BT headphones for under 50 bucks.
Audio - These destroyed my JF3's in the audio quality department. Decent bass, crisp highs. These are a delight to listen to.

Cons:
Over ear arms - These are floppy (soft rubber) and, in my opinion, worthless. Sure they will keep your buds from falling off your ear but do nothing to assist in their placement.
Fitting - I'm going to try a few combinations of the soft in-ear tips to see if this makes a difference but as soon as I started to run they fell out of my ears. Unlike the JF3 that had the rigid arms and also a small rubber piece that would clip into your ear...these have nothing supporting the weight of the headphone as it bounces in your ear. Once I started to sweat, they were worthless.
Hate these headphones!  Meant for the gym but always, always shut off and can’t reconnect while working out????!!!’
loved the audio quality. charging took longer than expected and never did see the "blue" light which denoted fully charged.
great sound. easy sync. comfortable. good mic. good control of apps with on off switch.
Sounds wonderful! very clear and very easy to operate! Works well with my Ipod now I can exercise and move around with ease. Great customer service too!

I really like the ease of use of these earbuds. Pairs nicely with my phone.  Makes phone calls a breeze, workouts with favorite music easy. Sound quality is good considering the price.  I would recommend.
Pretty good sound quality for the price and they have stayed charged for a good amount of time.

Great sound. The ear hook was too big for my girl ears. I just cut it off and put some inner ear hooks on them.  I used a little binder clip to attach the excess wire to the back of my shirt so it won't get in the way.

Great sound quality, battery life seems good. After 2 weeks I'm really happy with these headphones. Dare I say these might be the best headphones Ive ever purchased. At this price point I think you would be hard pressed to find Bluetooth headphones that produce sound this well and be this versatile. So far they have been camping, hiking, mountain biking, used while Im in a boxing work out and around the house. the phone mic seems to work although occasionally I'll get a complaint about sounding like I am far away however it could be based on the bridge cord being in front (good quality) vs the cord going behind my neck and mc placement in those positions. Cool little case to keep everything together and a mutli adapter for mini USB and Apple products.  If you have big ear holes use the red foam bud inserts, They drown out ambient noise and provide a good sound seal.

The sound quality is fantastic.
The headphones do NOT stay on during jogging or heavy exercising activities, at least not on my ears. I bought these specifically so I could listen to music at the gym, and found I can only really wear them when walking calmly or sitting still.
Updating my review...2 weeks and the ear bud connected to the ear holder snapped off and broke wont work in 1 ear....sad :(  not like old versions

Personally I was not a fan of these, I prefer the bluetooth head phones that stay weighted around your neck but my boyfriend loves these! He takes them jogging, going to the gym, and during school/ work when he's working on a project. Definitely based on preference. They always fell off my neck and annoying if I needed to continually take them out so people could talk to me. Good quality and battery life otherwise. Would recommend to the right people
A very good set of ear pieces that sound great. Great value!!
Just got the senso ear buds. Highly impressed.  Better than my jbl Bluetooth buds... and half the price

Great product! I'm a hard runner and was shopping around for new wireless headphones. These stay in my ears, sound great, and were much more affordable than some of the other brands. Also came with a case and multiple charging accessories. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a new pair of wireless headphones.

The buds are comfy, and don't pop out of my ears (like the Apple buds that came with my iPhone) HOWEVER, I'm returning these, because the connectivity is terrible. I bought these for the gym, and walking the dogs, and the wireless goes in and out, sometimes for minutes at a time.
Get whatcha pay for, I guess.
These are very nice i am happy with them
Great sound, very comfortable!
These were so terrific at first but I had increasing difficulty getting them to pair and stay on.  Finally gave up.  Just too fussy and delicate or something.  Really disappointed.
By far the best headphones I've owned!!
Love senso. Good sound. Blocks extraneous noise.  Affordable to anyone at the sale price.

I bought these earphones because my ears are really small and the normal shape earphones do not fit. At first I bought just to try them out, but I've had them for almost 3 years now and they are really, really good. The sound is clear, they are light and easily adjustable. I wear it at the gym, to run outdoors, for my meetings... I fully recommend it.
Better than I thought they would be
Gave my eardrums and Orgasm!
The sound is amazing!
Awsome wireless earbuds! Amazing sound quality! love it!
Headphones are great!  has a long lasting charge and good sound.

I love these ear buds. Very comfortable and the sound is great. I bought one for my daughter too.
Sounds ok but can't hardly talk to anyone
I can cup my hand over my ear and interrupt the Bluetooth connection. I can't return these fast enough.

Just received these earbuds and have used a couple of times at gym...sound is good and the set up to use was simple. I like the case they have to store the earbuds in. Time will tell if they will last. I had a Phaiser brand that wore out 2x after about a year of use. Battery wouldn't charge. Like these as they are smaller and simple to use.
I purchased 2 sets as Christmas gifts for my daughter for her long walks and my grandson for the gym!  They love them!

I bought these for the gym... I get 5 or 6 hour-plus work outs out of them before I need a recharge which isn't bad.  Good quality sound and function.  The only thing that annoys me is that when the battery is low, you get a woman's voice uttering "battery low" every minute until your battery dies, which is around 10 minutes later.  It interrupts your music and is very annoying.  One warning is enough... that and the battery life is why I give 4 stars instead of 5.
Is the head plactic is to hard, sometimes my ears heart

good sound, good battery life, great for hearing those hard to interpret callers. Worked great for 8 months then died.
Very happy. Good value for the money.  I'm a runner and these head phones stay in my ears.
Headphones work without any problems. The sound is good. The connection via bluetooth works smoothly. The price of headphones is not excessive

I bought these headphones because of the great reviews. I was excited to get them and they seemed to be everything I wanted in a pair of Bluetooth headphones. The sound is pretty great, they stay in my ears well during exercise, and they are comfortable.

The biggest issue they have is the connection is unreal spotty. I put my phone inside my basketball shorts during my workout at the gym and the music breaks up constantly. I had to pull my phone out of my pocket and hold it close to my chest in order for the connection to be solid. It's possible that I received a bad pair of headphones, but I am truly surprised that they can't keep a solid connection from 3 feet away. I do wear a Garmin watch during my workouts and if these headphones can't handle a workout watch while being connected, then I am very disappointed. (Everything was charged, I don't have issues with my iphone 7 and any other Bluetooth device)
It was a good deal! Good battery life. High quality sound. Also, it comes in a full package with two other accessories and more! It is really a complete package. I loved it!

So, never used bluetooth earbuds before.  The sound, especially the bass, is amazing.  They are very comfortable as they are held in place by the ear clip (?) so they you don't need to push the actual earbud into your ear canal.  I am very pleased and would highly recommend them.
These are great! Perfect for running. Volume is loud and clear.

Just got these today. I ordered these after reading the reviews and returning a less expensive set that skipped terribly while running. I am very pleased with my purchase, they are simple to use with good sound quality and they did great while I ran today.  I like the rubber piece that goes over the ear. I would highly recommend these.

I recently bought a pair of these ear phones and have had nothing but problems connecting with my devices. It will not recognize a device unless I manually input the connection. It was previously connecting to my laptop but now it will not even recognize the laptop. I like the quality of the sound but the overall performance of the headset is very poor. I spent $15 on another set of Bluetooth earbuds that has never experienced these issues.
Love these the reduce so much background noise and the call are crystal clear...will be ordering some more because I've lost mines......(sad face)....

Produced received as expected, worked well for two months but will now not power on.  I have tried multiple reset combinations with no success.  When i connect them to a power source, the light turns red and then turns blue after a second or two.  The light stays solid blue.  I disconnect the power source and attempt to power on but nothing happens.  Need to return
I bought these for my hubby, and he really likes them. He uses them to work out and improve himself.

I give this a 4.5. The bass is solid. Probably the best bass I have heard on bluetooth earbuds. The treble is fairly decent but I could tell the mid is lacking which is where I dock half a star. For the price, these buds are tremendous and I recommend them.
Nice
Got it as an early Father's day gift and he loved it!

I love these earphones! Supper light, and comfortable. I run with these, and they do not move or slip. The sound quality is great and very clear. It is very easy to use, and you can even pick up phone calls without pulling your phone out.

I've had these headphones for just a month and they are already terrible. They constantly cut out, especially when at a busy gym, and completely distract you from any focus you had. Extremely unhappy with this product.

This is our second set of these headphones - My husband got a pair and my son will be getting a pair for Christmas (so my husband will get his back) Very reliable - We usually go through headphones.  These have stood the test.
Great for the price
Excellent quality! The same as much higher priced items. We bought two and will probably buy another.
good product for the price. One complaint would be the wind noise when riding my bike. Tried the different sizes of earpieces, but all of them did not solve the wind noise.

I really love these. I am not tech savvy and these are very easy to use. They stay put, sound is perfect for my needs. I put in about 35 miles on the treadmill and spinning bike weekly. They are great outdoors too. The battery power is amazing

I rarely write reviews and I really should since I rely on them. These earbuds are great. The sound quality is really clear. The fit is good. I have small ears and have a hard time with earbuds but these work well. Granted the over the ear hook doesn't offer *that* much assistance. Meaning if I had to rely solely on that, it would not fit. However the buds stay in well. I use them to work out and I do a lot of HIIT, Plyo, running, and weight lifting.  These have been very good. I've used them for 3 training sessions (roughly 1 1/2 hours each) and the battery is still on "very high."  They pair well with my galaxy s9.  I own 4 pair of earbuds trying to find the right ones. These are it.

Have to turn the volume way up to hear the highs. Cutting out after 2 days of use. After speaking with tech support and resetting headphones the sound issue has stopped. But the volume has to be turned up way too loud to get fool range of highs and lows.

[UPDATE] 4-6-2018. The quality on these are terrible. I have now had (2) pairs in 24 months and both have failed over time. They lose their ability to hold a charge and cut out (beep) when connected. BOO!

These headphones are excellent! I've used them in the rain, I sweat quite a bit and was running and they were excellent. Very comfortable, audio quality was way better than the default iPhone ear buds. They were very easy to use and seem to hold a charge very well. Considering the price they are an AMAZING VALUE! They include a very nice case, two chargers including one that can double as a lightning charger as well. Nice device
Great product at a very affordable price
Sounds good but charge lasts maybe 45 minutes

Love these. The sound quality is as good or better than others ive had that costs me waaaaay more. The bluetooth connection, while of course not as perfect as a wired set, is just as good as my old JVC's & Yurbuds. Great set, especially for the low price.

Mine broke after about six months, so I emailed Senso directly and at 10:30pm on a Friday night, they spent no more than 15 minutes responding to every email I sent and their customer service was the best I’ve ever seen. They’re sending me new ones because I have a one year warranty, but I was expecting this to take at least a week to get a response. It was incredible and I would recommend these earbuds and this service to everyone.

Received these two days ago, so i don't have a lot to report other than they are a) comfortable, b) very secure and good for working out, c) sound great, and d) holding their charge well.

The box includes a dual car charger and a lightning cable. Very nice. The phones charge with a mini-USB, included. The controls take a few minutes to figure out, but they work as designed and are logical.

In short, these are exactly what I was looking for and I'm happy with them.

These are excellent wireless ear buds. They are so comfortable and the sound quality is amazing. The over the ear silicon holders are not even noticeable while exercising and they don't fall off! I was thinking of the "Apple ear buds" ,(but they kept falling off !!) ,but these are so much better with the band over your ear.Very good product,now we will see how long they last.  Thanks SENSO.

The headphones are very good quality for the price and their customer service is excellent. Since my headphones were still under warranty they'd already begun processing a new shipment the moment I told them I had a problem, even before I tried the possible solutions they sent me via email. Unfortunately the audio does get choppy sometimes, particularly when the battery gets low, but it doesn't seem to last that long usually. I'll update if my new ones don't do the same.
The sound quality is not very good and the controls are awkward. Ok as a back up to the name brand ones.

So far so good. Easy set up a comfortable fit. Was able to change out bud sizes for more comfortable fit. Sound quality is stellar. I have yet to take him for a run but just a quick head bang in the kitchen they didn't go flying. Would definitely recommend these .
trying these for the first time. Other Bluetooth headphones only manage to last 6 to 12 months so I am optimistic these will do a little better.
Tried a hard reset....does not work.  Great sound, OK moisture wicking.  Great while they lasted, but not long enough.

Arrived timely and has nice accessories, carrying case, car charger, etc.. It synced with my Kindle Fire very easily, but I haven't had time to wear it while exercising yet.

I have been using earphones for about two weeks now. The sound and ease of use are good. They are a little bulky and the cord is too short. Other than that they seem pretty good.
Sound quality is good.  Comfortable and portable.  Good value for money..

I like the sound when playing music.
However when I'm on a phone call using the Bluetooth the caller says they can't hear me. But I hear them usually.
My son loves them and they work great. Only time will tell if thy standup to a 12 y/o active boy but for now they are great.

While the sound quality is pretty good, the range on these head phones is VERY limited, (like 6 feet from source).
Also, it is very touchy about where the connected wire is: if I hung the wire in front of my chin; good reception. If I hung the wire behind my head, I seemed to lose reception...
I love these headphones, this is the second pair I bought. I lost the first pair and I would buy them again in a heart beat. Great sound and great price. Amazing product!!!! A+++
Love these headphones! Great battery life and does cancel most noise while working out. The volume is excellent and the quality of the music is great.
I love these! Walking my dogs with these in my ears is perfect. Comfortable and easy to put in, with a little practice. I’m impressed.

so far so good, i used only 2 days, the sound it is great a LOT BETTER THAN THE ONE
that i had before.

I do not like that

I received these one day after ordering with prime with 2 day shipping. My powerbeats 3 just broke so I took a chance on these. The build quality of these are nice and sound quality is good too. My powerbeats 3 had slightly better sounding bass in my opinion but these are still good. These are amazing for the price. I will update my review later to see how well these hold up when used for running since I sweat a lot.

The SENSO bluetooth headphones have made exercising a lot more comfortable. I used to get annoyed by having wired headphones bounce around and snag on things when I was running, but the bluetooth earbuds work great and I rarely have to fiddle with them in the middle of a workout. Unfortunately my first pair suddenly stopped working after about 4 months so I contacted SENSO's customer service reps and they were very helpful. They responded to my email in under 2 hours and gave me a few things to try to get the earbuds working again. It turns out they were a defective pair and SENSO let me know they'd send me a new pair right away as the earbuds come with a one-year warranty. I'm excited to get my new pair of earbuds and hope the replacements work well.
These are great! They don't fall out of my ears while I'm jogging so that's what I was looking for. They were easy to pair. I'm glad I purchased these!

Sound quality is better than I expected. Compared to Beats, these fall short, but only by a little bit. The carrying case and charging cables are great too. I love the combo Apple and Android charger. Wish it included the new type-c charger, so this could be my go-to cable, but that is minor. Maybe one day. LOL.
perfect

Excellent buy. I highly recommend these for anyone want to buy a Bluetooth headphone. Great sound, voice responses on power up and power down and even calls out the number on incoming calls. Great value for the money. I am going to order some for my sons!

I love my new headphones. I can move around, walk or run ease. Not as bulky as my previous headphones. Dont feel like I have a weight around my neck.  No problems connecting the Bluetooth.  I am pleased

Best Customer Service EVER ....
I have two of these headphones that I bought in April 2017 - and I LOVE them.
Recently one of them had a minor problem in one of the buds and I reached out to Tekatron.
Even though it was a weekend they replied withing a few hours; suggested a few things that might fix it and when those suggestions did not solve the problem, on their own said they would ship a replacement pair - I did not even have to ask them to do it.
I would buy this product without any hesitation because it is a great product (very good sound and very hardy) and because it is supported by a great company.
I wish them great success.

The headphones sound great. I did end up having some issues with them but the product support was awesome! They responded right away with instructions to try and reset the headphones, and when that didn't work, they promptly sent me new ones.
Nice headphone for my gym workout. Battery lasts for a long time and the sound quality is really good.

Love my new Senso earbuds. The sound is crisp, stay on during my workouts & have surprising great sound.
The order arrived quickly & without any problems.
I’m very satisfied with my product.
I got these for my fiancé and he LOVES them. He said they're just as good as beats but a fraction of the cost. Bluetooth works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase !

very disappointed at these headphones. I gave it a chance, but I could not stand the fact that the Bluetooth connection keeps cutting in and out at the gym. I tried to do a process of trial and error to see what exactly is causing the interruptions.. it has to be the fact that there are too many other Bluetooth connections around. even at some points where I took my phone out and had it directly in front of my face it would cut in and out when there are others nearby and congested. returned for another pair hoping it was just a defect. nope. I would not recommend these headphones if  you're planning to work out with them in a crowded gym. the sound and bass is great and it's just a shame that the Bluetooth connectivity is horrendous.

I got these earbuds, they sounded great for the first day after a full charge then they just stopped working. I’ve always loved this brand and bought earbuds from this but after this experience im throwing these earbuds away and never buying another pair !!
I like these headphones. Good quality and easy to use and connect to Bluetooth. The right ear bud tends to not suction to my ear but that could be just the way my ear is not sure
did not fit on ear properly , I returned the headphones

Well, unfortunately, these didn't work out as great. The earbuds keep dropping from my sync with my phone. Did a reset & still nothing. The worst part is that even still under warranty, the company did not respond to my concerns. Kept being told over & over to do a reset and got ZERO help.
So far these ear buds are awesome!

Bluetooth connectivity generally works very well, fits well enough, seems well-made, long battery life, intuitive and accessible controls, says in my ears even when mountain biking.  The big problem is the sound quality.  Like so many of these types of products, the bass is boosted artificially high, and not in a good way.  A bit of extra bass is fine IF it's tight, but this is muddy bass.  If you are listening to pop or basic rock I can see how these would sound fine.  If you listen to any kind of hard rock, metal, jazz, or other technical music, you end up with a ball of mud. Double-bass drum hits, muted riffs, or anything remotely fast that has some bass content will just flub out.  For me, wearing these while I bike or otherwise workout where there is extraneous noise anyway, I can deal with it just enough to tolerate it.  In isolation they sound like a big fat mess with a lot of music.  If you are an audiophile and like technical music, I'd recommend looking elsewhere.

GREAT for the gym. Excellent ear buds. They sound great, and fit well. Very comfortable and very easy to set up. Shipped with various sizes of ear cushions, including an extra spongy earplug like type that blocks even a little more noise than the silicon ones, which are adequate. The noise reduction is decent, although from what I can tell it is not an electronics system like my full size headphones. I don't hear any difference in the background noise bleed when I turn them on and off. But their design does block out a significant amount of background noise. I purchased these pretty much for the gym, as I kept knocking the wire out of my traditional headphones and pulling my phone into the floor when I ran. My full-size wireless noise cancelling headphone sound great, but I sweat too much and they become uncomfortable as well as being large and heavy. I'm going to keep the full size ones for ones for when greater noise suppression is needed, such as on an airplane. I am curious to find out if these have electronic technology or if the physical design itself is the only noise suppression they use. As I said, it blocks out more than enough noise at the gym.

4 Brief Impressions of the Senso Bluetooth Earbuds

1) Sound Quality: Much better in my opinion that Taotronics that I also tried. Bass and mid-range are excellent for earbuds, although the high-end, treble clarity cannot compare to good quality wired headphones or even my cheap $10, wired JVC HA-EB75 earbuds. Very efficient sound (loud at low play volume levels).

2) Bluetooth Connectivity & Range: Excellent! Easy to connect and great range (at least 30 feet without walls).

3) Comfort & Fit: Great if you are just sitting or walking slowly. I can wear them for long hours without discomfort. However, apparently my ears may be on the small side and they don't hold well when I'm running or exercising. The ear wraps are soft & pliable, which is great for comfort but not so great when you are in high motion.

4) Build Quality: Not good at all. Initially I thought the controls were solid. Compared to the Taotronics, they turned on quite easily (one large button on the side of the right piece to turn on/off, two small buttons on top for volume and forward/reverse). Unfortunately after a few short weeks of constant use, the controls completely failed, rendering the device unusable. The top tiny controls actually collapsed into the earpiece and the side on/off controls froze. Too bad because overall, I liked these earbuds.

Although all the other qualities of these earbuds are above average, based upon the extremely poor build quality of it's controls, I have to give it only one star and I'll be returning it.

I bought these at the end of February 2019 and they worked great until now, 11 months later. I’ve noticed the Bluetooth range has become much shorter and it will start to cut out at about 15 ft away. The battery used to last a weeks worth of workouts or so and now it’s one workout. Twice this week I’ve gotten to the gym and they’ve been dead when usually I could charge them on Sunday and make it through at least four 1-1.5 hour workouts before it started saying battery low.  Now they just don’t turn on.

Bought these headphones a while ago, waited to see how they hold up before submitting a review.

The sound quality is pretty great for the price, maybe a little tinny for mids but otherwise no complaints (although I'm no audiophile so don't quote me on that). They have yet to fall out of my ears even once, the Bluetooth works with minimal setup (but if you have multiple devices you will have to manually connect from settings every time you switch as far as I'm aware), the accessories are thoughtfully picked to enhance the headphones - I would have liked to see a wall adapter but you probably have a thousand already so it's not a big deal.

The main reason I waited before posting this review was to test the durability and see if any issues would arise from casual use. I'm happy to say that I've had the earbuds paired to an LG g3, iPhone 6s and iPad mini with no issues, the sound quality has remained consistent, and I can find no evidence of wear and tear from carrying them around in the case provided.

In conclusion, these headphones are in my opinion a great option for someone on a tight budget who wants a cheaper option that will last a while. When playing music I can't hear someone calling my name from across the table, which is good enough noise isolation for me.

Before posting a review I wanted to put the headphones to a good use.
After a week of using them at the gym, I can comfortably say that these headphones are amazing. Good battery life, quick bluetooth connectivity and range. Also fast changing and comfortable to wear around ear. ( great for runing). highly recommend these!!

I work outside and was looking for a headphone that would allow me to be handsfree when recieving phone calls, this is not the headphone you want to purchase if you are looking to use it primarily as a handsfree Bluetooth headphone for phone calls. The microphone picks up too much background noise and the other caller will not be able to head you if there is any noises around you, this includes wind noise on trip in your vehicle. I took the risk when purchasing because there weren’t many reviews on people who used it for phone calls but after having them for a month I could firmly say they are not beneficial to have for using to talk on the phone via Bluetooth. As for listening to music, they work pretty well, nothing spectacular but they work well. I will say however, the company provides some pretty great extras which is keeping me from returning the item because it’s too good of a value for decent music listening headphones. I would recommend these headphone if you are looking to Only use them for listening to music..

Received the headphones and used them for first time.  Easy to link via Bluetooth to my IPhone.  I use them to workout and didn’t want to deal with dangling wire from wired headphones.  These worked very well and the sound is solid for such reasonably priced headphones.  So far so good!
Son una maravilla!!! Los mejores que he tenido y hasta mejores que los de marca que son súper caros... Ninguna batería aguanta como la de estos audífonos!! No los cambio por nada!!

My husband and I just received the buds, and we both love them. Noise cancelling works very well, sound quality is excellent, and we couldn't be more pleased. My husband is hard of hearing these days, and using ear buds for calls is necessary. He can hear his phone now and callers don't have to talk as loud, as the volume level on the buds is very convenient. And the wireless feature is awesome! What is there NOT to love about these? Thank you Senso!

These could be powerbeats3 knock offs but for 1/4 the price they fit the bill perfectly.  They come with the middle size earbuds attached and include an extra smaller, larger, and a squishy foam pair.  Comfort is very good, but they still are "in ear" earbuds so can take some getting used to.  There are two wire ties included that are essential to minimize the "microphonics" issue that plagues all bluetooth headphones connected by a cable.  The default sound on my ZTE Axon 7 phone was kind of muffled and boomy, but this appears to be another common issue with many earbuds.  However, using the built in android Dolby Atmos app (short press the Dolby icon in the quick settings pull down menu) I picked the Custom 1 profile and dragged the mid and high up and low down a bit and the sound is perfect now.  Bluetooth range for me is 20 feet at best before skips start happening.  The car charger, case, and charging cables are nice extras.  Time will tell how these hold up quality wise, but even buying two of these are still half the price of the more expensive headphones, and I have a hard time seeing the value in paying 2-4 x more.  I'd rather spend my savings on two MOOV Now bands for my HIIT boxing workouts.

I have had these for years now, and they are just as good as when I first got them!! I use these daily at the gym, and have had zero issues with them. They are able to get sweaty and get thrown in a gym bag, and are still great!

The product is very ok, for what you can get in $20 budget. The ear pieces keep falling off from the ear, I tried all the three ear buds.
One major complaint I have is regarding putting on the ear buds on the ear piece. The openings of the ear buds are too tight/ small to mount on the ear piece, even after a lot of struggle I could not put on the memory foam ear buds on the ear piece and eventually ended up tearing them apart.
Easy to wear...wonderful sound, comfortable!

The headphones are very comfortable and provide for a good fit around and inside the ear (has different-sized detachable earbuds). Also comes with accessories that make you feel good about where that extra money went.

So impressed with the quality of these headphones is a 4 1/2 Star. Sound is very clear, easy to set with the Bluetooth. When I first charged it went fairly quickly. Just keep in mind not to over charge to keep the battery life span. Walked around the house and was still able to hear clearly. Comes with extra accessories, nice small portable case. Charger is smaller than expected but that makes it easier to place inside your case along with your headphones. Headphones are pretty comfy to place in your ear and came with several extra rubber buds to fit your size. I would definitely recommend this product.

The mic is also really good for when you are talking on the phone to someone.  I would definitely rate this a 10 star if it were possible!
Definitely worth buying. The packaging is classy, comes with a carrying case.

So far, these are absolutely amazing. Very comfortable with 3-4 extra buds for different size ears. It even includes a set of foam buds. The sound is incredibly good for the price. Add on top of all of this that it came with a hard shell carry case, a sleeve to stick to the back of your phone case for a credit card or even business cards, AND a magnetic car vent mount for my phone is just ridiculous for the price.

I had the power beat wireless for 1.5 years.  In 8 months of not heavy use, an earpiece broke off so they sent me a replacement with a 3 month warranty.  Just over 3 months of use everyday, the volume piece started coming apart and 4 months later the battery wouldn't take a charge (neither covered in warranty). So I decided to try other wireless headphones that weren't as expensive.  I tried several from best buy that were $50 to $70 dollar range and their battery charge was much less than advertised (I couldn't finish an hour workout!)  So I returned them and tried these.  So far so good!  3 workouts in and still on same charge.  They are about the size of the beats and the buttons work well and seem logical.  Sound to me is similar to my beats.  I'll update if I have any future issues.

Very satisfied. Sound quality is great so far, no problem with figuring out the buttons (as long as you read the instructions.) I will say the flap cover for the micro-USB charging port on the headphones is rather flimsy and may eventually break off, but personally that doesn't bother me.

The fit is great though, I have no problem with the buds staying in my ears, and the hooks add extra support--I've had issues with buds before.

Of course, I've only owned them for about a week as of now, so time will tell if they hold up to my satisfaction.
it works for me... hopefully it don't bonk out on me like the last one I ordered after a month of running...

If you're like me you are looking for a good set of Bluetooth, wireless earbuds. I previously went through 3 pairs of Motorola S11's. Each one would last about 2-3 months and then one earbud would lose sound. I really liked the Motorola because the earbuds were connected by a headband. So I wasn't so sure about these, at first.

After about 4 months of using these I can honestly say I am very impressed and glad I bought them!

Sound: Excellent! It the bass and tremble on these are appropriate and you can really hear the music clearly, but at the same time have the heavy bass.

Range: I often use these working out or lawn work. I have my iPhone 7 in my pocket or to my side. I have yet to have any issue with connectivity or range.

Battery: Awesome. I did not charge these for the first time until about a month after I bought them, which was about 8-10 hours of use. One issue, when connected to my iPhone 7, the batter never displays lower than 70% battery life. I found out the hard way this isn't accurate as the headphones dies while running a 5K. So far, this is the only issue I have had with these.

Fit: These things fit wonderfully in my ears. They have a wrap your ears. I have yet to have any issue with the falling out or feeling uncomfortable.

Durability: I have sweated and sweated while using these and have not had one issue.

Overall, I would recommend these. As a bonus, they are the same headphones Luke Cage wears on his Netflix show, so there's that.

Not the best sound quality. too much treble not enough bass.  Ear loops have a wire inside the rubber that is annoying.  They lose their shape often and need  frequent adjustments. So far the SENSO Head phones I purchased are working out great. I'm actually using them more than I thought I would.

My intention was to use them for music while I was at the gym, which I do 4 days a week, but I also use them as my ear piece for my cell phone while I'm driving. People tell me they can clearly hear me and I can hear them so it works for me. The clarity in the audio and and the volume is not as issue. You can have them hi or very low. The buttons are easily accessible and not hard to figure out.

The different sized ear buds are also great because we all have different sized ears of course. My only recommendation would be to include even a smaller ear bud. I'm using the smallest one and I could go for a smaller one ONLY because I personally don't like my ear completely plugged. I wear ear pieces for work everyday so it's a personal preference for me.

Comes with a zippered hardcase, a couple of charger cables (one of which is a brilliant USB/mini-USB/Apple Lighting combo), a car adapter, and a nice selection of different sized ear-cushions, so if they're not quite comfortable for you right out the box, don't worry, they will be.

True HD Fidelity Sound?

No way. These remind me of the time I received a counterfeit pair of Motorola SD-9HD. The sound quality is substandard.

I'm guessing anyone who rated these above a two hasn't listened to music through true high fidelity headphones/earbuds. I'll admit that I may be biased given that my home and car audio systems are top of the line.

Either way, I've listened to MANY better sounding earbuds than these. The attempt to extract more bass from a tiny speaker makes the sound muddy and diminishes the highs. I realize they aren't expensive and perhaps my sights were set too high.
"I had an earlier pair which I misplaced, so I bought a new one. The old pair had pauses at the beginning of playback. The new set has no pauses. Comfortable, work well. Come with a convenient case."

Purchased these headphones a month ago and was pretty happy with them.  I purchased them to use with my peloton, they connected easily and the sound was pretty good.  They weren't very comfortable but I was getting used to them.  Last week I plugged them in to charge and when I came back to use them there was no power indicator light and they would not turn back on.  Seems as if they just died while charging.  I called Senso support and they just told me to return them.  Pretty disappointing, probably won't be buying another pair.
They sound great and stay on when I run!
My ears are small and this was a bit uncomfortable at first but it’s ok now

Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for. Had them for about 2 weeks and so far no problems whatsoever. Really good sound, especially for the price. I was nervous they would be tinny since they are inexpensive, but they sound pretty dang good. They’re obviously GREAT for the gym!!! The extras it came with are also wonderful!! Thank you!

Update: 6 months later and still in love! The battery life is incredible.

Came damaged and never fit my ear properly and it was an uncomfortable fit and the sound was not all to great, and the charging that came along with it was cheap and only worked for a week, don’t recommend.

sound is terrific . I had some trouble with pairing  I had to call the customer support line. The person on the line was very helpful. All around great product and experience. highly recommend
I use them while I mow my yard. They cancel the sound of the mower. As much as you can cancel the sound of a big Zero Turn mower. Now you can destroy your hearing with a little good music.
These headphones are well made and have great sound quality. I'm enjoying no longer getting entangled in wires!

I haven't had theses long enough to speak to durability, but so far very pleased with quick battery charge, ease of BT synch, functionality, quality of audio, and comfort.  Very stable for working out.  Hopefully there will be a way to get replacement buds when the time comes that I need them.
I can not believe these are as good as they are for the price. Can't be beat.
Bluetooth headset sounds amazing. Everyone can hear me with clarity and the music quality is out of this world!
Great Bluetooth Headphones. Will buy again for my family.

Very satisfied with this purchase. Sound quality very good for this price range. Very surprised with the range between my phone and the headset before the signal
Cuts out (almost forgot my phone a few times). Would like it if when the headphones were powered on, a voice alert of remaining battery power was added to the power on/off alert
Really great sound. I am surprised that these are so good for being such an inexpensive product
The senso earbuds have a great quality sound and easy to use on the treadmill. I don’t have to worry about my cords getting caught on the machine anymore!
Bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them!  Great price.

Very good product! Functions as described! Overall functionality of this product performs well. I am greatly appreciative for this product to arrive on-time and without delay. Packaging & overall product presentation is clean and concise. Product arrived new and without any defects. Highly recommend seller!

I ordered this as a gift for a friend who goes to the gym almost daily. At the time he received it, he was still using a standard wired pair of earbuds, and I noticed how tangled they would get during his workouts. Ever since he received this product, he hasn’t used anything else. It stays out of sight and out of mind while he’s lifting, and is a great value for the price.
Great headphones!

The fit is not too comfortable pressing on my tragus and on my last walk, there was some interference or loss of connection to my ipod where the music was cutting out and clipping. I wanted to give a better review because they are lightweight, battery life is as advertised and would hold on well for more intense workouts.

I was very happy with my purchase. They are very lightweight and have excellent audio quality. The case is a big plus in helping keep my earbuds in good condition. They are a bit bulky but everything else overall is great.
These headphones are amazing!
They work fine but only last for about 6 hours.
Great! Good quality materials and the audio sound is very good. Very light and comfortable on the ears as well. Great value!
Inexpensive with great sound. For the price is pretty nice. The product fits in my ear perfectly.

Arrived on time . So far so good. Really nice sound quality and a sharp bass. Earpieces are very comfortable. High quality especially for the price Would recommend to anyone in the market for a nice quality set without the sticker shock of other products out there.

The headphones sound ok but I noticed they were tinny with no bass. I had to play around with the equalizer on my Android music app to get a better sound. I'm using a Pixel XL with PowerAmp.

The case is nice and solid but it's bulky. No way is the average person going to carry that in their pocket. It a circular case with a 3 1/2" diameter and is 1 1/2" thick.

I really like when you turn these off it makes a voice announcement in the buds. My prior headset it was always hard to tell if I shut them down or not because there was no verbal indicator.

I was disappointed that they don't use a USB-C port for charging. When are these manufactures going to realize USB-C is the new standard. There is a red LED on the headset to indicate when it's charging.
Great for work out. Doesn’t hurt the ear.
No rewind or fast forward option. Other than that good headphones.

Had a problem with my original Senso headphones.  I contacted them and they were great to work with.  After trying a few things to fix my first pair of Senso's that didn't work, they were quick to replace the pair with a new set and they work great.  I know of three other people that have these and they work flawlessly.  Now that I got a replacement pair, I'm in that group as well.  They were great and sound great.  Thank you customer support.

4 star for quality, battery life, price. I can't give it 5 stars as a runner and cyclist because there's no good way to run only one ear. I like to keep one ear open for situational awareness. Also the wire clasp is needed to keep the cord from catching when you turn your head. Set it tight before you start and it works pretty good. Good variety of ear inserts. Fits securely and comfortably. Passive noise canceling is good, but not good enough to use as selling feature. EQ is favorable to low and low mid frequencies. Lacks a little of the crisp high frequencies but no one really appreciates that these days 😑 My opinion, I've spent $60 on plenty worse headsets. It slams for the price. Buy it
For the price they work pretty good except for the battery life.......doesn't last as long as advertised
I had these 3 months and they quit working.  Very disappointing....
I was truly amazed with the sound quality.  Great product

I received these yesterday, and after charging them went for a run. I was using them paired to a Sandisk Clip Sport Plus. As with other headphones I've tried, if I have the Sandisk player attached to my waistband I have constant cut-outs and skips. If I put the Sandisk player in an armband, it seems to eliminate most of the skips and cut-outs. The biggest problem I have with these is the large round piece just outside the soft rubber tip. It just does not fit into my ear well at all, and causes almost instant pain. I had red spots in both ears after just a few minutes of wearing them. This discomfort will keep me from being able to use these headphones. Sound-wise, they were fine, although they seemed pretty bassy at the cost of having almost no high end. I had to put my Sandisk player's equalizer on "Full Treble" in order to make it sound decent, and then of course I had no bass!
Added Feb 27, 2018 - I have continued to try to use these while running, and it just hasn't worked out. In addition to the discomfort, when running into wind, the wind noise completely drowns out the music. Running into the wind is a constant in Oklahoma, I could literally put my hands in front of the headphones to block the wind, and the wind sound would disappear. Definitely these are not a good option if you run in windy conditions!
muy poco volumen

These are great! Comes in a great licase and works well!

Great sounding and fairly comfortable, though I had to spend some time fiddling with the different bud tips to find the right fit. Battery lasted for 3 days of my daily commute (about an hour each way). I do get a lot of wind noise when it is breezy. Overall a solid choice at a good price.

They are made of high quality materials. However any amount of interference between the device and the Bluetooth source usually cuts off the music, audio stutters and information is lost. Even just the act of bending down at the waist was enough to consistently disconnect my pairing and the sound would go to shit. More disappointing is that any objects between you and the device will cut audio. A work desk. Sitting forward. Kneeling down. The range is terrible, can't hold signal from my head to my pants pocket... garbage..
but when it is connected how ever briefly it sounds pretty good. Written from phone. Typos

UPDATE: Switching from 3 stars to 5. See comment from SENSO customer support.

I really like these earbuds. I've always had trouble getting buds that fit and these fit the bill perfectly. The sound is great (I'm not an audiophile). It performs pretty much exactly as the product description says, although 8 hours of play time might be a stretch. I haven't timed it, but I don't think I get 8 hours of playback.

So, why only 3 starts you ask? Well, 8 months later, I'm hearing some very mild "skipping" during playback. The bluetooth connection seems to be a little off, so every 10 to 20 seconds I get a pause and restart as the connection to my iPhone 7. The pause is extremely quick. If I was just listening to music, I might not even notice it. But, I use these earbuds when I'm working (software development) for background noise to help me concentrate on my work. But, with these bluetooth hiccups, I end up focusing more on the quick pauses than my work. I know the problem is with the earbuds because if I switch to my bluetooth speaker and play my music out loud, there are no such pauses.

Now, don't let this review scare you off. It's very possible that this issue is limited to my pair. These are still the best earbuds I've ever owned. They're not super expensive, so 8 months of problem free use is fair. I just can't give 4 or more stars to a product that didn't maintain its initial quality for at least a year.

I'm a very active 73 year old man who loves to workout, ride motorcycles, ski ect. I lost my LG infinim bluetooth head phones. I wanted something that I could use to workout, ski and ride my dirt motorcycle. I read the reviews and bought the Senso active buds. I really like the sound quality and volume that I can get with these Sensos.

I have no connection to the company. I just wanted to let people my impressions.

These headphones are great !!! Excellent product for the price. They fit nicely in the ear. The sound is very good. The range is excellent.
They come with a car charger. Very happy with them.

It works good. Easy to pair, sound quality is decent. battery life is kinda crap. Also, it doesn't properly show the percentage of the device. It goes from 100%, then to 90%, then to 50%, and then 30% and then it dies. Battery life and now showing proper percentage and my biggest issue with this sometimes, overall nice inexpensive headphones with some flaws.
Awesome! They stay in the ear! I put a 31 mile test of 6 different runs with them. I sweat a lot and not a problem happened once with them. Week 1 went great!

I have had my Senso Wireless for about a month and I use them every day.  I am thoroughly impressed with their performance.  They hold a charge for several days, are easy to operate, and all the accessories/case were a great bonus.  I had a small issue with connecting mine today and contacted customer service. I figured that since it was a Saturday, my email would get answered in a few days.  Within an hour, I had an answer and was given easy to follow instructions to reset my buds.  Excellent product and even better customer service.  I am very happy with my purchase and will not hesitate to order more as gifts.

great quality, durable, and looks awesome.

Very soft and comfortable materials. Can control volume on the right earbud. After a bit of fidgeting with bluetooth settings, the dual pairing (e.g. on a phone and a laptop) works seamlessly. An awesome feature.

I work out maybe 3-4 times a week and for up to an hour and a half and only have to charge these maybe once in a week, sometimes in two weeks. they are definitely worth the money would never spend the amount of money it cost for beats. the other thing is that in the title it says 'noise cancelling' but i can still hear background noise while at the gym

Third try with Bluetooth head phones and these are the best ever, great sound, cancels out everything, I love them!
My first pair of wireless headphones. I love the fact that it comes with different size ear plugs. Highly recommend this product.

I'm very sorry for this rating. Truly I am. I loved these headphones when I first received them. They worked perfectly (unlike any Bluetooth headphones I used before); however, about three weeks ago, they started to randomly turn off or lose connection. I thought it might be my phone, but it happened with my laptop as well. In the middle of the video/music, it turns off. Or sometimes when I tap the multifunction button to pause music, it will shut the headphones off altogether. (I'm not holding in the button. I'm only tapping it.) What's wrong with these headphones?

Love these new headphones. Took about 2 hrs to charge out of the box last night.  That matched what the instructions stated.  I bought them  because I did not want to  use my expensive BOSE headphones on the beach on vacation.  Paired first phone but had problem with second phone until I realized the headphones were still connected to first phone.  Once I turned off first connection, they easily pared to second phone.  Lots of "goodies" come with product: . +12v car charger, extra ear pieces, duel charger cable for lightening and micro usb connector, standard micro usb to usb charger cable.  They fit great compared to Apple ear buds which constantly fall out of my ears.  These Senso headphones fit over the ear, are very light wt.  and are very comfortable.  Sound was fine.  On/Off and Volume buttons very functional.  Not sure how long the play time will be but so far they are great

I have had these headphones for about three months. The sound is great for the price and I was really happy until yesterday. I was mid conversation using my headphones and the microphone went out. I have tried multiple times but the microphone just stopped working. I can still use them as headphones but have to take them out and grab the phone anytime I have a phone call which is annoying. I hope this is not a common thing but at least the earbuds still work I guess.
Not good for serious runners. Constant readjusting required once you start sweating. For walking and weights they are fine. Sound is fine, bass kinda lame so I would change the EQ on iPhone settings.

Product performs as expected given the price. Does connect multiple devices, however there are minor issues with making this seamless unlike some higher quality tech products. Sizing of the loop around ear doesn't fit snugly but what can you expect with one-size-fits-all $20 headphones. Holds a charge well for now but will able to see any obsolescence over time.
Nice headphones that sound good and you cannot beat the price! I do get a bit of wind noise when outside. They stay in my ears way better than the Apple ear buds. Shipping was fast.
Finally. Bluetooth headphones that are comfortable AND stay in place when I run.

Bought 2 the s250's in Feb of 2018. Here we are in August of 2019 and both pair still perform flawlessly! My husband listens to audio books all day at work, 5 days a week. About 4 months ago, his battery began only holding 6 hours of charge instead of 8... but hell, they were over a year old at that point. My pair are used for a couple hours at a time for Pandora mostly, while I tend to my yard. I drip sweat like crazy while mowing, weed eating, washing the cars, pulling weeds, etc. They never slip and never fail me. Can't hear anything but the music, either. I prefer the foam ear covers because I have really small ear canals, and even the smallest set of silicone ones would make my ear ache after an hour. My husband prefers the medium silicone ones. I also us the buds as my hamds-free for the car a couple times a week. Sound is crisp, clear, and loud. I recommend only putting in 1 while in the car so you can still listen for emergency vehicles. All in all, these ear buds are still in excellent condition after a year and a half. However, I will be upgrading because they didn't have blue yet when we bought ours. If you need a great, durable set(I have 4 kids) for a great price, definitely get these.

My only con is that the metal plate for your phone to magnetized to the dashboard has some real weak and crappy adhesive. Get you some gorilla glue!

perfect in the beginning but after a while, maybe if the battery is low they tend to cut in and out even if my phone is in my hand. I still use them daily and like them a lot but sometime it does that.
very powerful and well built.

I was so skeptical of this headphone. Upon using this senso headphone, I am totally impressed

They are awesome!! I will never buy anything else.

The Bluetooth range isnt the greatest but once connected the sound quality is great. They stay in my ears and they are comfortable to wear for a long periods of time.  It's a good option for the price.

Half the price of my Wireless skullcandies and just as good I am stoked only 20 bucks sounds great comes with lots of extras worth the buy!
This headset is AWESOME!!!! could not believe my ears; crystal clear sound and the bass....JUST WOW!!!!

Great headphones great price! They are very comfortable and I really like the design of the headphones and the way they fit snuggly into my ear. I have owned headphones that cost 5X the price of these and would hands down pick the Senso’s over them without hesitation!
Very handy, easy to use, great battery life.  Very happy, especially considering the price.
Great headphones for the price compared to the $200 ones

Sounds great, last quite a long time, stay in your ear well but could have a more universal ear rap as a posed to OSFA, maybe a flexible rubberized wire. Only real down fall is when you get a call the caller has a hard time hearing you speak and if your outside and the wind blows, It amplifies the noise right on your ear. But overall awesome for the gym
