the only thing I want to know is how to connect to Alexa Dot and how do you call out. States it can do so.
These headphone has amazing sound quality to be so light.  They are perfect for jogging or when you just what to listen the music you love.

I really wanted these to be the answer to all my previous earphones that failed in one way or another—but nope, I guess nothing’s perfect.

I sweat profusely when I run and I bought these not only bc I wanted sweatproof earphones, but earphones that stayed in my ears while running. They stayed put for the most part (the space between the hook that goes over the ear and the actual earbud is too large so the hook really serves no purpose).

As far as the waterproof part goes, its not. I mean unless sweatproof and waterproof are completely different things in this context. The first time I used these (2 days ago), they stopped working after about 50 minutes of running and I wasn’t even done running. The earphones were fully charged right before I ran too. They didn’t respond to any of my button pushing. So my assumption was that it stopped working bc of all the sweat that dripped all over them. Once they were dry, they worked again.

So either I got bad earphones or they just don’t perform for those who sweat hella. I think I’m just gonna go back to the basic earbuds. Those work with sweat.
Speedy delivery! Great product

I've only used these a few times but I already like some of the features better than my Powerbeats (5 times the price) which fell apart shortly after my one year warranty expired.  If these last as long, I'll be thrilled with the value.

I had previously purchased an older model and I feel that the older models ear loops are more comfortable: flatter, softer, and more flexible. Granted the older version's loop is thicker, just has a better feel. Other than that, such a quality buy. I've had two co-workers that purchased these and love them.
I can also attest to their water proof-ness. I was paddleboarding and had my Sensos in my pocket and they did get dunked a few times. Put them on and they worked fine.

Update: While comfortable, and waterproof, these aren't rolling chair wheel proof, as just now the swivel wheels on my chair just demolished on earbud.
They were so easy to set up and they work really well!  They were here in two days!  Thank you

Do not buy! Does not work!
The headphones will not stay connected to any Bluetooth device—phone, tablet, computer—for longer than 10 seconds, and then it keeps trying to reconnect and then disconnect every 5 - 10 seconds.
I reached out to the company by responding to both of their automated post-delivery customer service emails, explaining that the product did not work and they just ignored my emails. So, apparently, they do not actually offer any customer service.
Do not buy this product if you ever hope to have a pair of headphones that works, or if you want to actually talk to someone about replacing a dysfunctional product.
This pair only survived 4 months before one side of the earphones shorted out. Now it's just all static. Up until then they sounded good.

I totally love these. They stay in my ears, the sound quality is good (I am not an audiophile, but I've been pleased), and they come with a lot of accessories. Drawbacks: the "low battery" voice repeats forever until you plug them in (though the charge is generally good enough to get me through a day); they are hard to find if you put them down somewhere (user error!); sometimes the connection is a little wonky if my phone is too far away or there is some large metal object around. If I keep my phone in my pocket or purse, no problem. I listen to a lot of podcasts while cooking/cleaning/exercising, and the wirelessness (and fit) is just fantastic. Another plus/minus: they really block out outside sounds (for me) while playing something -- so I make sure to tell my family I won't be able to hear them.
Fantastic sound, sturdy design, and they went above and beyond with accessories (including a set of earplug-material earbud tips which are absolutely fantastic)

Great stereo seperation!  I have been using earbuds that didn't have any support keeping them in place, so I especially like having the earbud held in place.  So far, the headphones have performed great!

Unbelievable!  Easy pairing, great sound and perfect fit. I've always had trouble with earbuds but these sit right into the ear and I haven't had to move them once!  Normally, I am fiddling with earbuds constantly to achieve a good fit and sound.  These rival Bose at 1/5 the price!

This is the (last thank God) out of 4 attempts at buying good sounding, comfortable, durable, bluetooth buds! These have Great sound, they are comfy and stay in!! Yay Senso, yall knocked it out of the park!!

Now 4 weeks later---- the only downsides are: the range. seems to only be about 10', the 2nd thing is where the "controls are "plug-ins" are.
For those reasons, i gave 4 stars instead of my previous 5

Great price but these just don't last. this worked great for 5 months but now, they're useless. It shows that it's fully charged but when you try to connect NOTHING happens. It's as if the batteries have died because it makes no sound and no lights come on. However, when you plug it into the charger it says it's fully charged :-(

FOR THE PRICE...these have been amazing! Fit is great....stay in during running or working out activities, pairs easily with multiple devices and auto-switches with ease. My only knock is that for some weird reason i have not solved They go out on me when I use them outside mowing the lawn....yes, that's right only when I am doing this activity do i see issues.

I'm really surprised how many positive reviews these headphones have gotten.  Maybe I got a lemon?  I find the audio quality to be WAY too bass-heavy and muddy, and the noise-cancelling feature completely lacking.  I primarily listen to headphones when I work (in a loud environment), and my old $40 LG headphones worked much better to drown out surrounding noise, not to mention sit comfortably in my ears without falling out with the slightest jostle. These Senso's seemed ok for music, but listening to any audio books, or podcasts (especially if the audio volume fluctuates), or any spoken word sounded like Charlie Brown's parents.  Another annoying feature is that you can't use the headphones while they charge.  This may not be important to most people, but I will occasionally have one headphone in at night so I can listen to music or podcasts without disturbing my partner.  It would be useful to be able to use them while charging, so that the next day I can start with a full battery.  Anyway, like I said maybe I got a lemon, but I will for sure be returning these.

I LOVED these earbuds when they first arrived. Great sound for my nightly runs, comfortable when I switched out the earpiece, nothing but good things to say.

ONE MONTH in, the left earbud doesn't work. And it isn't merely silent. The sound will suddenly flash into my ear like a jolt to my system, with no warning or pattern. Alternately, at other random intervals, I will get bursts of static. LOVELY.

While they are cheap, I expected them to last longer than 1 month.
Quality sound and materials. Bonus for the ear customization!
I have only had these for a couple of days.  So far so good.  Comfortable fit.  Blue light that blinks every few seconds is a little annoying.  I would buy this product again
Great price! Box comes with car charger, and the charging cable for iPhone. Such a great deal and they sound great and charge lasts through over a week of daily workouts.

Just got the headphones for ipone 7. I purchased based on the price and advertised 8 hour battery. For the price I am very happy, comfortable to wear at the Jersey Shore ran for about 4 or 5 hours of play. all functions worked great, sound is also very good. After each use washed the salt air off charged them
ready to use again. Very happy with the purchase.
So far so good. Inexpensive, they sound great and they stay in my ears pretty well while I'm jogging or cycling.
Awesome headphones! Great quality and battery life!
Excellent product.  Perfect for gym use.  Impervious to sweat and moisture.  Very good sound but you can still hear what is going on around you which is my preference in the gym.

The Senso Bluetooth Headphones are great headphones. They sound great, are nice and loud, have good bass, and fit relatively well.
Pros: 8 Hours battery life. Wireless. Loud. Nice bass. Not flimsy. Quality plastic. Includes 2 chargers- 2 micro usb, car charger, 1 lightning apple charger, carrying case, multiple earbuds, and a warranty.
Cons: Not well balanced. Needs an anchor in the middle to keep from flying all over. The over the ear hooks fit on one side and are loose on the other* (really depends on how big your ears are). Takes around 15+ seconds to connect to phone (could be my phone but previous headphones never took that long to connect and were always instant).

SHOULD YOU BUY IT??!?!?!? Yes. You can not find a better deal than this for what it comes with and how well it product is. If they break, make sure you registered them online because then you are covered by a 1 year warranty. Hope this review helps. Would rate 4.5 stars out of 5 but thats not an option.

Update: dropped these in a mop bucket filled with soapy water. They were completely submerged. After pulling them out i turned them off to let them dry. These things are 100% water proof. They work perfectly. I was worried that I'd have to use my warranty but i didnt. 5/5 stars no doubt
Great product, easy registration

sound quality is good, comfortable to wear. lost 1 star because when i had it around my neck the other night (was not in my ears), it came off my neck twice in one night. Getting out of the car it just came off my neck. Might have got caught on my seatbelt, but twice in one night to almost lose them was a bit much.
Good quality buds for the price

Sound quality is great and they are super easy to hang on the ear!!  The carry case is a good feature as well.  I love the car charger too!! That helps a ton if you are in a hurry and forgot the charge them.  Keep up the good work guys!

The sound quality is decent. Much better than the Phaiser BHS-730 I got as well. However, the person on the other line has a hard time hearing me sometimes and I have to constantly adjust the earphones and wire. A bit of a shame because they look nice.
good sound quality, and comfortable to wear.  The hooks that go around your ear and flexible, so that makes them a lot easier to wear.

I’m so happy to finally find a pair of headphones that don’t fall out of my ears when I’m working out and start to get sweaty (sorry tmi). It did take a while and a lot of trial and error to figure out how to properly “install” them in my ears for the first few times but once you get the hang out it they are awesome! My one complaint is that after wearing them for a few hours (which doesn’t happen too often) my ears have started to get a little sore holding them in. I was worried they would be too bulky but it hasn’t seemed to be an issue! Love the easy commands and phone control through the earbuds.

So I finally got these and OMG the sound quality is amazing!  Lightweight, easy setup, and clear sound.  Strong bass.  I haven't used it for talking on the phone yet, but I didn't but them for that either.  I'm SUPER excited about these.

I was excited to get these headphones but upon wearing them they are entirely too large for my ears and I don't have small ears. The loop part that goes around your ear doesn't even touch my ear and the smallest bud doesn't fit in my ear canal. I'm very disappointed as they seemed so promising. I searched on Amazon for a 'contact seller' link but couldn't find one. I'm writing this in hopes that the seller will reach out to me and allow me to return them for a refund.

I am really disappointed with how fragile these headphones really are. I have used these TWICE, and the volume is already distorted. Be careful not to pickup by the chord, as they are loosely seated into each earbud. The chords loosening will make the (already mediocre) volume worse. I am VERY particular about how I handle my equipment, and by no means used this piece past normal "wear and tear".. I would save yourself the time and money and just invest in an established brand of headphones. Goodluck!

I had them just over a year. Use them primarily for the gym. I always put them back in their case after use, but recently a wire has started poking through the wire sleeve. Going to pick a different brand as a replacement.

Pros
-connects easily via bluetooth
-sound quality is good enough (primarily listen to edm and rap)
-no issues with battery life

Con
-for some reason the ear ring is extremely large and won’t fit
-broke after a year
-the sound can be too loud and unable to turn it down any lower

Awesome! These headphones work great. Just received them and I was surprised by the quality and performance.
I love them. I told my friends about them.

These were great....while they worked. I bought a pair and about 6 months later they just stopped working. I tried all the tricks they gave me but nothing. I figured it was a defective pair and the warranty covered getting a new pair. So the company sent me a new pair, super easy and quick. The second pair stopped working a lift over a year after I got them. Same problem- just stopped. I emailed the company, this time I was over a year so the warranty didn’t cover it. They were quick to respond, but only offered a 5% discount as consolation. I am choosing not to use the coupon code. I guess I shouldn’t expect products to last very long, then the company wouldn’t make any money.
Really bad  sound quality

I bought these for my husband and they are awesome!! They cancel out all noise and fit well inside your ear without falling out. I loved them as well so I had to buy me a pair for running. I fight my Beats the entire time I run and these are surprisingly light weight and I never have to worry about these falling out during my run.

These are very comfortable to wear and sound just fine.  Hey - they are ear buds - so I was surprised at how good they sound.  I am not an audiophile, but I know what sounds good, and these do.  I use them to listen to music on my iPhone while I am mowing - they seem to block outside noise pretty well.  They are very comfortable and lightweight.  I would buy another set should something go wrong with these after the warranty period.

I like that they're noise canceling. Sometimes I forget to turn them back on and find that I'm using them as ear plugs! However for some reason when my phone is in my pocket and I bend over the music some how cuts out and returns once I stand up?! Other than that they're great and well worth it!
Loving it! Sound quality is excellent. Easy to use.
worked for about 45 days then quit.  Very poor product durability.  I wish i could get a refund.  Not worth it at all.

These wireless earbuds are comfortable, and they paired easily with my Kindle. I like to listen to audio books when turning in for the night, and was tired of my uncomfortable wired headset getting tangled in the bedsheets. I can't vouch for the microphone quality, since I have no intention of using this headset to take calls. This headset works great for my intended use and the price is great.
I can assume I got defective item but audio quality of this headphones is pretty low - a lot of bass but almost no mids and treble.
Great product.

Loved these....when they worked. Had them for less than a month before they never turned back on. Little bulky, but for the price I was okay with it. If they lasted longer they would've been better but disappointed in how fast they broke.
Not bad. Not good. Bass is muddy but they do get loud. I liked the fit but it was just not the quality i was looking for but for 20$ i wouldn't pay more then that for them.

Ordered my first pair of bluetooth earbuds on the recommendation of my son. I am totally happy with the purchase. These have great sound, multifunction buttons to control volume, phone calls, tracks, etc., and they are very comfortable.
I use them in the gym mainly and highly recommend them.
I sweat quite profusely and they still work great for me. Comfortable and very loud, which I like my music blaring. Great product for he price
The sound is amazing
I received these promptly. The instructions were easy and they work great! I appreciated the seller contacting me after the sale to make sure I was happy.

Got my buds a few days back - been on two runs with them so here is the data so far.

I had 2 Jabra sports ( the old model from way back ) for the last 4 years ( the first pair died after 2 years not being able to take a charge, the second got lost ...somewhere...) which I just loved and thought I would never get anything else; except they stopped making them. Found these after looking at the latest Jabra product and seeing all the good reviews the Senso product had. I was looking for buds that had the ear hook feature as I prefer it for long runs,.

Onto the product.

Came in good packaging - sturdy box, good instructions etc ( although maybe you could up the font? - a little small for older eyes). In the box were the buds, some different sized ear gels, a short USB cable, a nice travel case for the buds, a car charger - and an Apple charging cable! The last one threw me as I tried to plug into the charging port on the buds and it wouldn't fit ( lucky didn't push to hard! ) , found the short USB in the pack with the gels eventually - doh!

The ear hooks felt a little, floppy(?) at first - I was used to the hard plastic Jabra's; once on they felt fine but have a little concern on their long term durability - will update in a few months.

Pairing was very easy with my Samsung S7 - no challenges compared to some of the other reviews - worked first time. First time I played them I must have had my volume on my phone on full, and the buds volume on full, and I think I nearly blew my eardrums out - my head was literally ringing for an hour. So, no problem with the volume.
Volume controls easy to use - also skip track works ( hold volume down for 2 secs to switch backwards on forwards ) - no one has called me while on my run ( good! ) so don't know how they sound for a call.

Price vs. Quality - these appeared to be the cheapest bluetooth buds on Amazon, so I assumed there would be product compromises - HOWEVER, so far I have found any. 2 days in am VERY pleased with them and would recommend them strongly. I will update review once I have a sense of how long they go without charging and durability over time.
They stopped connecting after three uses!
VERY poor sound quality so bad that I think the ones I received may be damaged? Abnormally large, they look ridiculous. Also they do not stay in your ears.

Honestly, for the price and what's currently on the market- other products being way over priced; this product is worth the money. Plus, it comes with other universal products. I wish more companies just understood common sense. People work hard for their money and they want to purchase a good quality product at a good price, and having a good warranty is a plus. This product, and the components it comes with, is well worth the purchase.
This is good for normal use, not for sports, they fall out easily and the rubber hooks are flimsy and don't add too much stability. Great sound, just terrible fit.
Love this product. Will buy more from this manufacturer.
Great earbuds, very comfortable

For the price, these wireless headphones can't be beat.  They are a bit bulky but fit well with the interchangeable earbuds.  The sound was surprisingly crisp and clear with good bass.  They did tend to distort when turned way up as I like my workout music loud.  The range was a bit disappointing as I had paired the headphones with a stationary iPad.  If you have your phone close by, it should not be a problem.  Overall, I think these are pretty good wireless headphones for the price.

Initually I didn't like these for running. It makes a perfect seal and I could hear myself hitting the pavement and breathing. But full insertion to make a "cork" seal should be performed only when you're sitting or resting. It's fine to let the hooks do the work and merely let the buds rest against your ears! I ran last night with them not making a perfect seal and the sound was fine, still had highs and lows.

Original Review - Most reviews say "these beat the beats"; I wouldn't go that far. They are comparable in many ways, but I do not think one is better than the other. Each has pros and each has cons. Personally beats are over-rated and expensive, but they have many good features. These do not have the level of bass as beats, and the ear hooks do not have metal in them allowing you to "Mold" them to your ears. These sound good, but do not sound any better than beats, they sound about the same. The price is worth it, but these do not work with "high impact cardio" (aka running or jogging or crossfit) these do not stay in as good as beats, but for the price, they are decent. The "low battery" warning is ANNOYING, every minute or two for 5 or 10 minutes....YES I KNOW THE BATTERY IS LOW, let me enjoy my last 5 minutes of music please!!!!
Decent for the price, works for lifting and light cardio (walking), but not great for high impact cardio, falls out of ears easily.

Update 2019-01-16
Bought a "new model" of these recently. The sound is still as good as before (great sound for the price), but the design changed. In my previous review, I commented that they could match Beats by making mold-able (malleable) ear hooks. Well they implemented that aspect in this model, and definitely get an A for effort. The only problem is that they don't use a good enough grade (thickness) of metal, its too thin, flexible, and mold-able. I take them off at the gym mid set, and I have to re-mold the hook. It gets a little annoying, imagine the difference between the metal of a standard staple, vs the metal of a heavy duty paperclip. The staple will bend easier, but not stay in that position if even the slightest pressure is applied.
Great idea, good progress from the last model, but they definitely need to make improvements. They do stay on during workouts and running at the gym, but the wrong twist or pressure and it will need to be remolded to fit your ear comfortably or the same sound as 5 seconds before it.
I still recommend these, and the last pair became my preferred gym set (over my $200 beats). Good product, but def needs some tweaks.

Before purchasing Senso I had LG behind the neck earbuds and after three years the neck piece just broke from normal use.  I was looking for quality of sound, ease in using and hoping for one with a long battery life.  With the Senso it seems I have found all three and the price was great.

I love these headphones. The price for them although more then some cheaper hearphones are well worth the price. I used about 5 different brands of headphones all bluetooth ranging price from $20-$40. Compared to the otherbrands these headphones sound great, a perfect if you run or workout a lot like I do, or are just wanting headphones that offer great range and distance to allow house work without having your phone in your pocket. The company overall has been great. They respond fast to emails and to help you out with any issues you may have like they did for me and will help you to the best of their ability which in working with sellers on Amazon or any company or place is great when you get customer service like they gave me.

Overall I would get these headphones they're great and I even bought two pairs just to have one that is fully charges for work and working put.
Great sound, background noise is a minimum.  They pair very quickly.  Great for the gym

I've had these since Christmas and have been very impressed by the sound quality. THEN I accidentally put them in with the laundry. After a long cycle through the washing machine, they STILL work!!! Not quite as well, but they work well enough to use. 10/10, would definitely recommend to a friend.
Paired quickly. Sound quality is pretty good and they stay on my head while running.

It took a while to get used to these headphones but I really do like them now. When I first started wearing them, they didn't seem to fit tight enough into my ear. They seemed to flop around and always came out despite the ear hook. I played around with them and finally found a way to get them in and have them stay. (Kind of "screwed them in" helped) Now I put them on and wear them while working on the pool and haven't drop them in ONCE!!!  I can put them on and  they pretty much cut out all sound around me.  I put a pair of ear protectors over them for mowing and they work great. The battery lasts at least  4-5 hours of continual use out of a charge and they recharge up pretty quickly. They may last longer but I don't let them totally discharge. You do get a verbal warning when the battery strength is too low-scared the hell out of me when it first happened.  I'm satisfied with this purchase and would buy these again

They are very handy, work all over my 1200 sq ft house. Battery seems to last a long time. Comfortable on my ears. Sound is about as good as ear buds I get at the 99 cent store. Not nearly as good as  iPhone 's which will not stay in my ears. Keep working on the sound dynamics and sales will soar!

I have nothing but good things to say about these. I am a contractor that uses them all day Monday thru Friday. They have held up flawlessly. They got put through the washer and dryer the other day and have worked fine. I have tried bluebuds and Beats and they aren't even close in quality and usability.
Thanks! They work great on land as promised. Next I will try them when I do water exercise by myself. I can listen to the music and not bother others.
I love these earphones. My puppy ate my last pair and I had to order another pair. They're great and an awesome price.
Great noise cancellation

I had the same pair, but we're branded differently.

The wind noise when using them for cycling was unbearable, and I returned them.

Even without audio playing they were unsafe to have in your ears while cycling.

I'm only writing this review after seeing them reviewed/advertised by Bicycling magazine... and I felt their encouragement for people to buy these headphones was downright irresponsible.
LIght weight and sweat proof. Yet, they do take a little time to connect.
Very uncomfortable after 30 mins of use. Other then that they sound better then my air pods.

I've had the Powerbeats Wireless 2 for about a year and my battery quit charging. Apple wouldn't repair them for a reasonable price so I bought these headphones. They are basically the same as the Beats. The quality of the bass is not as good, but if you're using these for the gym like I am, you'll be slamming enough weight that it won't be noticeable.

Usually I would be very skeptical about a product with nearly identical specs as beats but for a fifth of the price. However, the 1 year warranty acts as an insurance policy.
Excellent for the price.
Very nice headphones and great after sales service, very professional.
I love these headphones,  so much so that I have told all of my work colleagues as well as my wife and now they all have a pair.

I workout in a loud machinery space. It’s loud and hot. Noise and sweat are no issue for these headphones. This is my second pair (first lasted over two years) and I can’t beat their durability for the price.
Excellent product, light as a feather, top-notch sound.
I absolutely love these headphones! They are easy to use and without a doubt, the very best that I have ever owned. The sound is also fantastic!!!
Charger does not match the earbuds. Earbuds were unusable as a result.

OK first the positives:
-connect easily and reliably reconnect
-decent range (not spectacular, but not bad)
-decent sound quality
-controls are easy to access

Now the negatives:
-from the get-go I have been annoyed by wind noise... these headphones stick so far out of your ear that if you run or cycle you will get noticeable and annoying noise. In fact even when I walk briskly or if I'm out on a windy day this is a problem. Very annoying!

-after using them for less than 5 months they gave out on my during my bicycle commute. I was sweating heavily so this wasn't the first pair of BT headphones that have suffered from my sweating... but this was the first pair I bought that made the bold claim to be "sweat proof"

Bottom line- DO NOT be fooled by this claim. If you are buying these BT headphones only for use in the office or at home you will probably be fine. But if you want to exercise outside be ready for wind noise and... if you sweat don't expect them to last more than a few months.
Awesome for workouts

They arrived early & worked perfectly. When I wrote in to say the headphones had suddenly stopped working, within less than 24 hours my warranty was confirmed & a new set is now en route. Great product; excellent service!
i liked the price and the product

Great Bluetooth headphones, hands down! But can can you please consider this suggestion that many others may agree with? Please make it so that I can connect another device and automatically bump the previously connected device! I have gotten so frustrated looking of the last device that I connected to disconnect so that I can connect to another device. For example, I have a MacBook, an iPhone and an iPad. If I was connected to my MacBook last night while working and taking calls, and then I wanted to connect the headphones to my iPhone while in range with my MacBook, I have to disconnect from the MacBook because the headphones automatically connect to the last connected device. Big headache!!!!!!

Great headphones. They feel light when you run and stay in your ears. They have great sound and a good battery life. I'm happy I bought these instead of dropping $200 + on more expensive wireless headphones.

This is my first pair of wireless (Bluetooth) headphones and man I will never go back. I've only had these a few days but I love them so much, this is definitely one of my favorite purchases I've made in a long time. The sound quality is awesome, they are super comfortable, easy to control the music, volume and pause/play from the earpiece and really convenient while running, boxing and lifting weights. All my many previous pairs of headphones would inevitably mess up in some way over time from the internal wires coming loose and result in one earbud going out, or needing to bend the cable in a certain way for it to work- I'm hoping since these aren't attached to my phone they won't have the occasional pulling that sometimes happens which over time loosens the internal connections. I got these for daily use while exercising and will update if any problems arise in the future after more wear, however these seem high quality so I have high hopes.
I love them but there seems to be a lot of jitter..........the fit is FANTASTIC!
Very nice for the price. Good fit and comfortable. Quick charge and nice battery life
For the price they are fantastic
Perfect!! Thank you..

I was pleasantly surprised with this purchase. I was looking for an inexpensive pair of wireless headphones for use at gym and during yard work. These fit the bill. The depth of sound lacks a little compared to higher end brands but overall the sound quality is satisfactory. Nice fit and design. Purchase came with case , car charge adapter two cables long and short.  I will mention at the gym with phone in pocket I have on occasion heard static when I remove phone from pocket it goes away.  I will have to see how this goes. Loving forward as I have only used them a few times. Over all satisfied.

I am giving this product 2 starts just because the sound quality is not bad; however over the ear pice is so flimsy. It is not made from some flexible plastic but from a flimsy rubber that barely holds the earbuds behind the ears. Also the incoming call announcements is very slow just tells u a number one a time very slow, instead of the called id. Bu the time i heard the number I missed the call.
I'm still getting used to how the ear pieces work, and the need to charge them after every gym session, but otherwise they are comfortable, have great sound, and are easy to use.

Bought these for my teen daughter- she was able to set them up herself and has been enjoying them each day since receiving them. If you wear glasses then the blinking blue light is reflected in your glasses which makes it very irritating.
Haven't found a thing I don't like. Love Love Love!!!!

I'm very impressed by this product. They sound great, include some unexpected extra bits that are actually useful, pair easily with my iPhone 6, and the carry case is very nice too. All that *and* they come with a warranty!

For such an affordable price, you can't go wrong.
I was surprised by how great the sound quality was. These are simply awesome!

I LOVE these headphones ! I use them to watch TV late at night when the rest of the household is sleeping. They pair quickly to our
Connect brand universal wireless audio transmitter. The battery life is AT LEAST 8 hours and they charge quickly ! The customer support for this product is excellent. I haven't experienced any lag time what so ever with these and the quality of the sound is GREAT for such an inexpensive product. I agree with the other reviewers who've noted..... no need to JAM these into your ears. Just insert them, without screwing them into into your ears and they are so comfortable, you'll forget all about them. They are perfect for us night owls who are sick of trying to watch TV on a low volume in order not to keep everyone else awake at night !
I like how comfortable they are. and the sound is great too.

The right side stopped working after only 1 month of use. The headphone were lighter than another pair I had which made them less prone to falling out/off the ear, but once I started moderate sweating I would have to keep pushing them in. The "hooks" are very flimsy (not stiff) and did not do a good job of keeping the bud in place. No way they would have survived summer runs.
Good
Love them!
Great sound, amazing battery life, great for calls, I use this at work around high noise levels and it blocks out quite alot of noise.
I lost my first pair but loved it so much I had to get another. My second pair did not work, but I was able to replace it using their warranty.

I have been using these for the past two weeks and so far I feel they're great. Sometimes I lose one of them because my piercings keep pushing them out of my ear, but I don't feel like it's the headphones' fault.

Awesome, best headphones I have ever used.
Awesome sound...great product with fast delivery
Still going strong after a year of almost daily use. Stood next to a beach bongo player and only heard my music. Battery life has faded only a bit, so very good for basic headphones.
Perfect!  Exactly as advertised.  Light weight, great sound, easy to operate, great for long walks or runs. These are exactly the headphones I've been looking for!
Sound great. Hold up great to the gym sweat sessions.

Works Amazing, don't have to worry about my cord getting tangled into my work. Amazing crisp sound.

Using them right now!  So far so good.  Easy to use and very affordable.  Comfortable in the ears and them stay in my ears well.  Just get them!!!

These were a gift, so my input is second-hand.  However, she was very excited about receiving them!
Recommend it

It seems like everyone likes these headphones - they are waterproof, have good bass, etc. That wasn't my experience, mine only lasted 3 weeks unfortunately. But I go through headphones every three months, so take what I say with a grain of salt.

Just as good, if not better, then Dr. Dre's cordless Beats which you pay 4 - 5 x more for.  My kids have the Beats so I've used them on several occasions.  The Senso headphones are just as good!! Highly recommend.  My only issue is that I'd like the volume to go a little lower than it's current lowest setting.  If you listen to anything in a quiet room the lowest volume level seems loud.

I really like them. Easy to pair with android, ipod and kindle fire. Great sound for music and podcast listening and so far no echo with phone conversations. Comfortable in my ears and charge lasts many hours. Inexpensive. No negatives.
easy to setup, comfortable to wear and volume adjustment convenient

Bass way too loud on these things can't even hear anything else. I have no way to turn down the over powering bass on these things. I don't know If I got a bad batch but I was very disappointed with them.

I decided on these for a few reasons. The different sized ear adapters, the carrying case, and the price compared to other blue tooth headphones. I've owned and tried several pair of headphones but never a blue tooth set like this.

Pros-
The sound has been great for the 3 weeks or so that I've had them. Really crisp and clear sound and you even get the bass.
Battery lasts quite a long time
Easy to turn on and off and connect to my phone
Comfortable to wear

Cons-
The piece that goes around the ear is way too flexible so they aren't all that secure when I'm trying to workout. They don't fall out a lot, just when I'm not careful. However, I will disclose that I have small ears and have yet to find a good set that will stay on. So, it MAY just be my ears. But I really don't like how flexible they are. It almost seems like a pointless feature in my opinion.

Over all though, I'm happy with them. The smallest adapter it comes with has the best fit I've found so far. With the previous sets I've had (cheapies from Target, nothing too fancy online) the smallest are still too big so I can never seem to get them into my ear enough to stay and often will hurt after not that long of wearing. These are pretty comfortable and the fact that it actually fits in my ear canal helps them stay put.
They worked fine for a little over 3 months, then just died. No sound comes out of them anymore. The return and support windows have closed, so they are just junk now. Definitely not worth buying.

I've used these a few times a week since early January. I bought them because it's nice to be able to do strength training workouts while listening to music and not having to deal with wires. They worked great, sound quality was excellent. I had to charge them after every 2-3 workouts, but that's more or less what I expected. Now, they won't turn on, won't charge, won't reset. They're completely dead. These are obviously inexpensive but I did expect to get more than 6-7 weeks with them. Really disappointing.
The headphone is very nice! I like it!
The headphones work just fine,  but the Bluetooth cuts out when my apple watch goes underwater.  That said, not sure I'll be able to use these why swimming.

I have bought a few Bluetooth headphones the first costing 160$ That lasted five months and these are by far the best. I didn't expect much at this price but I am very happy with my purchase. After 7 months they are still going strong.

Good sound quality; stays in ears
Great headphones!!!

I am using the headphones while I am walking on my treadclimber. I watch my ipad to help keep me motivated while I am working out. I like the fact that  there is no loose wire to get caught up. The sound quality is  good too.  I would recommend them to others for the quality and price.

I just received these two days ago so I haven't used them too much. But, I did pair them up right away and had no problem. Also, in the short time I've used them I really like them. Here's why:
1. They fit well. Sometimes earbuds don't fit well or feel right. When I put these in and wrap the things around my ear they feel secure. They come with small, medium and large ear fittings to fit your ear.
2. I like the controls on the earbuds. They have a button to turn them on and off - which also is used to pair up the earbuds and to answer the phone if it rings. Also has two buttons to adjust volume if you need to.
3. They sound really good. I've had earbuds before that just sound awful - but these have good highs and lows and sound great with my music.

I've only had them two days so not a lot of use yet but from what I've seen so far I'm impressed.

Loved them at first but three months in they crapped out. A for comfort but reliability is an F. Volume button fell off within 2 months and completely stopped working within three and of course it was just outside of the warranty window.
Better than what I expected. Love it

Sounds quality is great, comfortable, nice, solid case. Microphone is crap though. Tried using for phone calls but the other person only heard my garbled voice. Does NOT pair with a PS4, not compatible, which is why it was purchased :(
not user friendly with the buttons

WORTHLESS! After two months of minimal use stopped turning on. In addition, doesn't hold a charge for any length of time. Has a blue light to indicate charged. Red for needs charge but no color to tell you if the damn thing is actually on.

I charged it. The red light came on then after about 20 minutes the blue light came on. I place to unit in pairing mode but no lights came on. I tried to turn it on no lights came on. We charged it again with the same results. I returned it to Amazon and bought one from a different headset.

I, too had problems with ill-fitting earbuds, none of which stayed in my ears regardless of the various sizes provided, I purchased the Senso Bluetooth ones since they had hooks for ears and very comfortable earbuds. Syncing was a breeze, and I am very happy with fit and sound. Perfect solution!

I have only had these for about a week, but I work out very hard and sweat a lot with many fast movements. They stay on my head, haven't had any sweat issues ane the sound is great. I'm very pleased as long as they hold up.

Looks great, feels good, fits well, but the audio/Bluetooth connection skips regularly. I have charged them fully, tried other devices but the connection skips on everything, every time. It is unfortunate.

It's not heavy or super big like a lot of other expensive headphones. Perfect for ignoring the world and zoning out, when you have it loud enough. Practical for plyometric workouts, and other type of workout you can think of. It has simple commands. It's very subtle, which is what I like.

This is a good product.
I recommend the salesman.

I purchased these as a less expensive version of the Beats BT headphones that I use and love. I really like these so far. There use softer rubber for the ear wraparound which at first I didn't like, but now prefer. The sound is really good and the functionality is the same, at least as far as I use them.

My first pair of bluetooth headphones and I couldn't be happier.  Super easy to set up and operate.  Connects to both my wife's iphone and my android without fail.  These look, feel, and perform like they are way more expensive than they are.  Going to get a second pair just for me.

These are great for me. I use them in gym constantly. I use when mowing the lawn. I use when washing cars. I use at work when phone signal is too weak and I can leave the phone 50yds away and make business call. Ears seal pretty well except when I'm jumping around or up side down at gym they may unseal causing the bass response to weaken. I would buy these again. I bought a 2nd pair for my honey.

Worked fine for few days and then the real issues arised. Sometimes it keeps disconnecting for no reason and when i open other apps, for example : If i use headphones for whatsapp voice call and open skype for chatting, bluetooth disconnects . Seems like a bug it needs some major tweaks and also there is always a sluttering noise while using.
awesome little headphones

Way too big to fit on my ears. I couldn't get them to fit right, so I didn't even try out the sound. Not adjustable in any way and one of the earpieces was deformed anyway so I sent them back. On the bright side, the return process was easy.
Works well, easy to link with our TV-Bluetooth transmitter.

Problem with first pair, immediately replaced.
Very nice quality and excellent sound, extra cable a great value.
The ear loops did not stay on the my ears. They kept falling off and the heavy ear buds was no picnic. Was able to return.
I purchased these as a gift so I can't review how the earphones work but I was impressed that they came with a very nice looking clamshell and a car charger besides the regular wall charger.
Sound is great

This is my second pair of this style (I'm a heavy user).  I was having some trouble getting the earbuds to charge, but I contacted Customer Service and got a quick response that walked me through the reset process.  They also followed up promptly.  I highly recommend this product.

seems to loose connection to my phone when cutting the grass... phone in pocket headphones on head... fidelity is ok when listening in quiet room, not very good at  ambient sound isolation.. for the price a good buty

These are awesome! Bought them to use while walking my dogs, found that headphones with any sort of cord were a pain. Not only are these comfortable, but they also came with an adapter for Android and iPhones, 3 different sizes of ear buds, a charger AND a car adapter. All in a cute and study little round carrying case. Really more than I was expecting. Super easy to pair with my phone and other devices. One of the earphones also has buttons for volume, ffwarding songs,  picking up phone calls, all while never having to even think about pulling out your phone. Love them, thinking ood buying some as gifts. Oh,  and they are comfortable and don't fall out so the sound is great. Thumbs up!
Excellent earbuds..I have tried many other types but the Senso earbuds exceed my expectations. They fit comfortably and the sound is awesome.
Pretty happy so far. Sound is good, fit is comfortable..

The Headphones are okay, but I did purchase them so I could use them for bicycle rides based on the following product description: "SENSO Bluetooth Headphones, Best Wireless Sports Earphones w/ Mic IPX7 Waterproof HD Stereo Sweatproof Earbuds for Gym Running Workout 8 Hour Battery Noise Cancelling Headsets" Now when you're on a bicycle, even if you're riding as slow as someone would be at an average jogging pace, the noise is too distracting. So if you intend to do anything that's not stationary EXCEPT walking, these aren't for you. Otherwise, they're priced really nicely, and work very well at my desk.

These are great headphones. The sound quality is very nice. These headphones get heavy daily use in the gym or out running. After 3 months of use, they wouldn't power on one day before a run. I contacted customer service and they agreed that they should not have failed. They verified my address and in two days, I had a new pair. Responded to my email at 7pm and shipped the product out quickly. Now that's great customer service.
Good item comfortable and the sound is good!

So far, I love them. They are comfortable and loud enough to play my drums. I was tired of a cord head set, so these are working great so far.

Regards,

Will Dillard
A real nice set of ear buds. You know they are very good to second you take them out of the box!! You did not buy here? Well you may have paid to much!!!
Love the earbuds. They're easy to use and comfortable. Great sound and an excellent price. The company shipped quickly and had great follow up to make sure I was a satisfied customer.
Hands down the best headphones I ever bought. The customer service was exceptional and honor their warranty claim. I highly recommend them.

Headphones are little bigger than I expected but with that price, I have no complains. The battery life is a very strong point especially if you workout for a long time or on a plane without a portable batter to charge.
These earbuds are great! I’ve tried a few and they have amazing sound quality, long battery life, and they fit and STAY put! If I ever lost them I would buy these again immediately!
Love the headphones! So much so that I bought them for my husband and my grandson. Clear sound, easy to use, comfortable, compact.
Much more than I expected.  I purchased another brand and I would rate them a 2 and the SENSO bluetooth headphones a 10.

They would completely shut off audio 30 minutes into a run. I would do everything possible to reset the buds in hopes of reconnecting and continuing the run w tunes but no luck. Only when I was at home  and plugged back into a power source would they revive, but still same result on next run. Not reliable, I threw mine away bc this all happened after the 30 day return window.

Had high hopes this would be a great bluetooth headset but it failed.
It's supposed to reach 30 feet, but all I could get out of it was 3 feet and then it would get choppy and sometimes even lose connection. I made sure everything was fully charged. Reset to factory settings, re-paired with device, still the exact same problem. Tried multiple times (with multiple devices) following the reset re-pair instructions but it did not help. Clearly defective.

I tried jogging with them and the sound of wind was not cancelled out at all, so not that impressed with the sound canceling claim either.

2-star for decent sound and a good price - it would be great if it actually worked as they claimed.
Sound great even in noisy environments
Great sound, paired easily. Added bonuses- the car charger and the charging cable has a micro USB and lightning adapter in one cable.
They hold their charge, sound clear and are comfortable. I just bought a second pair for my kiddo.

Senso Bluetooth Headphones (two pair) I just purchased for Christmas gifts are awesome.  I charged them up so they are ready to work when gifts are opened.  I tried them out cross country skiing and the sound excellent!  Thanks Senso.
Well better than Beats.
Love these!!! They work great.

I like my new bluetooth headphones very much.  I use them when I go walking and they are very light and comfortable.  They recharge quickly and seriously sound amazing.  The case is nice and small and has a pouch for the charging cord.  I'm very happy with my purchase.
I have had much more expensive head phones, and these preform just as good. Now I must admit that I am only listing to spoken word info (audio books and pod casts) so music lovers I Cannot comment.

I loved everything about my senso headphones,  i used to have them a couple years ago,now June 2019 decided to buy them again (Old ones i sold them) love the price and quality of them. Honestly they are better then a famous brand named beats by (***) don't go off just the brand.  I give it a 10/10 .
Love these headphones! Great for working out! Great price! Highly recommend!

They work just like I hoped they would.  The only drawback is the sound of air rushing over the one side when riding a bike.  I plan to try a smaller ear cup which may help that. They keep connection from close to far away with the iPhone SE. I would surely recommend this project. It is so much better than dealing with cables.
Great headphones. Easy to Bluetooth to all my devices. Sound is fantastic. My daughter bought these and recommended them to me. She was right!

These worked for 2-3 weeks then wouldn’t connect/ please contact me Re / options for return

stays secure in the ear and sound quality is fairly good too.
So after a month and half this thing has stopped working. It just won't turn on no matter how long I charge it. Is there a number to call and report the shoddy quality of the product.

I bought these because I really wanted something that would stay firmly in my ears while working out. They don't. It's nice that they come with three sizes of bud covers, but they aren't grippy. The loop over the ear is *huge* and doesn't actually even rest on my ear. I might cut them off. They just add more weight that pulls the buds out of my ears. Last, the sound quality would be pretty good if they stayed in, but when they hang halfway out you don't get very good sound. Disappointed.
These headphones are my new favorite for workouts and on campus. The sound quality is awesome along with the exceptional battery life. The value far surpasses the price.
Better than expected. Sound great, feel great on ears, stay in place during hard running, and great battery life. Easy set up. Will recommend to family and friends...

If I put the earloop over my ear, the earbud part doesn't fit into my ear canal and rests outside of it.  I'm using the smallest tips, but it seems the angle of the hook relative to the angle of the earbud portion are not correct for my ear.  If the hook could be positioned in different positions I could probably make them work, but since the point of these is the earhook I'm only giving these 3 stars.  The earhook holds them in place, but the sound isolation is poor due to them not going into my ear.
These headphones are light and comfortable. They connected without a problem, and the sound is great!

Received these as a gift from my husband in April 2017 - in the last month, they crackle after turning on. As in sound is distorted for up to a minute at times after turning them on and starting a podcast, music, whatever. In the last week, the left earbud wiring is coming disconnected, so I can't hear anything out of it. My hearing is already shady, and I use these in my office to tune out other people. I usually only have one in (usually my left ear) so one of them not working renders them useless to me.

Okay product if you don't mind pitching them after a year-ish.

My only gripe with this is the sound. While a lot of people would agree that this sounds nice, I think the bass is obnoxiously at the front of things with these earbuds.

I get that a lot of people enjoy that but I think many elements of the sound spectrum are clouded due to the very exaggerated bass sound of these earbuds.

Otherwise, I wouldn't have any complaints. I like a balanced sounding headphone that slightly favors the bass rather than exaggerates it to the front of the music. Definitely some of the most bass heavy earbuds I have tried and for that, I am not a fan.

Lasted about 4 months while being used 3-4 days a week for about an hour each day. They're solid headphones for the gym but I'm really disappointed on how long they lasted before the battery refused to charge anymore. Not sure what the common lifespan is for this product but I was really expecting it to be more than 4 months.
The sound quality isn't the best due to too much base coming through. Fits pretty well, but would think they would be better off with a stiffer ear support piece.
Break to easy
They are a Christmas gift so it will be awhile before I know how they perform. Once my grandson tells me how much he likes them or doesn't like them I will respond

I really wanted to love these headphones, but I can not. I have ordered two pair's of these headphones . The first pair, the sound quality was so poor that I had to send them back, and the second pair had the same issue. In the beginning, these headphones seemed like a good idea because they are wireless, but I traded these in for Apple airpods which are expensive, but definitely worth the money.

So, if sound quality is important to you, do not buy these.
Good sound for inexpensive bluetooth headphones
I love these head phone... had an issue after a few months of use and the company promptly sent me another pair! great service to stand behind a great product
The bluethoot disconnects from my iPhone when I’m cutting my lawn.  During night time there’s a blue blinking light that lights up the room
Music is super clear, and not at all distorted. Telephone calls come inn nice and clear. I'm a truck driver so the noise cancellation is important. So far these are the best I've used. Thank you
I love them easy to use great sound great quality and battery lasts way longer than power beats! Excellent price!

I just recieved  my new headphones, have not had a chance to use them yet, however, the set up was super easy and changing the ear piece to fit my small ears was a breeze.  I will comment more once I get to the gym tonight and actually have a real opportuntiy to use them for what I bought them for.
The ear loops are too big and the pads for the earbuds are hard and very uncomfortable to wear. The sound quality is decent though, especially for budget headphones.
I love the sound,the comfort, and the style. The headphones do a weird thing where the music becomes choppy. The headphones are full charged so I don't know why they do that.  Please help!

The sound is okay with these. A few times I would get static, my main complaint is that they dont fit on the ears that great. I run and one or the other would pop off and I would have to keep adjusting.

Good quality headphones for the price. Only problem I have with them is the cover snapped off while I was working in a crawl space. I managed to find the cover piece with the power button but lost the two pieces that snap into the cover piece that control the volume and skip function :( those could be attatched to the ear buds a little better, but other than that the sound is good and I’m happy with my purchase!
Not very excited about this order.
Just used them for the first time yeaterday. So far so good.

I took a chance and ordered these blind having never heard of the brand. I can honestly say I'm not impressed with them at all. I'm about ready to return them for a refund and buy something else. If I would have paid MSRP I would be pissed not that I'm all that happy at 40. So what's the problems?

The ear buds have a rubber band that wraps around your ear. The things are floppy and serve no real purpose. They don't hold the ear buds is place. They tend to slide off while walking, working, etc. Even a thin bendable wire would have helped.

The wire has two ties so you can adjust the wire to not dangle. With or without them rubber coated wire catches your skin or clothes and rips the ear buds loose or out.

The sound is not THAT great or loud. Bass comes through distorted and highs, mids come through kinda tinny at times. Noise cancelling? Ok sure I didn't notice at all. Blocked outside noise like standard earbuds.. not at all. I've honestly had pairs of skullcandy's that blew these away sound wise. And I only paid 10 for those.

Bluetooth is shotty at best. I have paired them to 3 Samsung phones, 2 laptops, a home stereo and a tablet. Only paired to so many devices to test & everytime the Bluetooth would drop in and out constantly. I could put the phone right on the earbud next to my head and it would still drop out. I thought maybe the battery was not fully charged. So I let them charge overnight. Had a full blue light & tried again with the same results.

The only good things about them is they look nice, come with a compact carry case, wires and a charger. Cant comment on battery life. Couldn't listen to music cutting in & out for 10 hours straight to find out.

In the end not impressed & dissapointed. I will return them and more than likely avoid senso in the future.
horrible reception, I loose reception if I turn my head while wearing my phone on my belt.

Apparently works for a lot of people but lasted a mere two weeks for me. Faced a some glitches getting it to pair w/ my iphone but got it working and loved it for walking or jogging. No wires! But eventually pairing failed once and was a hassle to get going again. And, then, finally, it wouldn't pair at all; replacing app, returning to factory settings, charging, rebooting, etc. Nothing worked. There is a note in the instructions that the device is sensitive to moisture. I'm going to assume this is what happened. It was damaged by exposure to sweat. I used to have a similar problem with the iPod mini. Anyway, beware. Not a good consumer product.

I got these for my boyfriend so he could use them when he went running. He has tried several other that we had kicking around the house, but he wanted ones that stayed on his ears while he ran. We found these and they have worked great so far. he said they stayed better and were comfortable, and sounded great too.
Work great!! Only thing i wish it had a led to let u know when its fully charged other then that no complaints

Sounds Quality is just acceptable - certainly doesnt sound as good as the standard apple ear bud. I accept that this might have to do with the water proofing. given price hrs features/ quality - Im still pretty happy.

Best thing if these get broken or lost I won't be crying as much as if they were $200... and would replace them again with this great price point.

I have tried many headphones of every conceivable type searching for the one that would meet my expectations and Senso has accomplished this task completely. They are comfortable for long term wear and the sound quality is great. They fit snugly and comfortly if you are just sitting or jogging and the noise canceling is the best I have experience. A great Bluetooth headphone and a great headphone in general.

Not much bass.  Good sound otherwise for the price.  The over the ear part is not rigid, but floppy instead.  I have a bit of trouble keeping them secure when moving around a lot...like skiing with a winter hat and goggles on while my 3 other family members have a different brand with rigid over ear pieces...and didn't have that trouble.  I love the case and accessories.
Complete piece of junk that never worked properly. Just could not stay connected to any device. Don’t waste your time with this trash, buy a quality product.
I bought these for my daughter but had to try them out. They sound really great.
Broke after 2 charges
It's the best I used

When I did an online search for "best blue tooth headphones" these came up first. For good reasons! 1.) SUPER price. 2.) Great sound! 3.) Great product. I'll elaborate on the latter: They're easy to use, they have just 3 buttons and a brief manual that explains the volume control/advance play buttons, and the main button's use for on/off/pause, incoming calls, etc. They are comfortable with 3 earbud size options. My ears are too small for the flexible over-the-ear clips, but they aren't in the way or bothersome. I live in the snowy north, so for outside activity the clips actually fit snugly beneath my hat. Nice storage carrier to throw in a gym bag, pocket, or carry-on.
I haven't taken a call with these so I can't comment on how that goes.
Bought these for my daughter too - she also loves them.
Ordered these for my wife after I got my pair.  They are great, simply put.  Super product.  I am glad I purchased.
Crackly and volume controls didn't work.  Followed instructions to reset them.  Worked for a day then crackly and volume controls didn't work again.
Great value, my beats broke and these are great

I have used these on 6 marathons and for someone who sweats a ton these are a great value for the buck. They are pretty sturdy and you need to recharge them after about 6 hours of running.

The only major issue with the headphones is when you get a low battery notification it notifies you every 30 seconds. The frequency is pretty annoying and makes you want to rip out the head phones

The sound is amazing. Base is deep... Vocals are clear. These headphones are more than worth the money. For the price they where a steal! Recommend these to anyone. Got them for work. I'm a glazier. In the construction industry and the noise cancellation on these is top notch!

My main reason for this purchase was for running. Unfortunately, these particular headphones simply are not designed properly for running. When running (or just outside with a slight breeze there is a rather loud wind sound. It seems that the design of these catches the wind (either blowing or generated while running) in such a way as to generate a lot of noise that is delivered right into your ear. I tried moving these around and there just does not seem to be a way that they can be worn during a run that reduces the noise.
Other than that issue they are actually quite good. The sound is crisp and clear (I listen to audio books/podcasts not music). They pair easily and connect quickly. The case is nice to keep them from getting crushed when tossed into a bag. They come with a couple different in-ear pieces. The typical rubber version as well as some that are foam. The foam ones are very nice and seem more comfortable for extended wear than the typical in-ear pieces from other headphones I have worn
Hands down much better headphones that my previous Beats.  Well designed, comfortable, and easy to use.  No issues whatsoever.
Love these earbuds. Great in the gym and on the mower. Excellent deal for what I paid.
These are great. Very comfortable. I can wander around cleaning and cooking, and they never miss a beat.
Bought two sets. Both stopped working within 3 months of moderate use.
Amazeballs!!! An ear bud for all ear types,  sound is better than my beats solo.  Very pleased, going to buy my son a pair too.

I have had the beats wireless workout headphones for over three years now. They started to not work properly, so I gave these a try. I am very surprised at the quality of these headphones. The sound quality is just as good, if not better than the beats. I recommend 100%
Great sound...easy to connect with iPhone 6
Very good performance at a very reasonable price. Well worth every penny.
working perfectly after years of extended use. Hands down best bang for the buck!

Perfect gift for Christmas and excellent for people liking to listen to music during exercising, Fits comfortable in the ears and is light weight.
Great product with a nice box to keep it stored.

These were good the first couple months. I love the way they fit, they aren’t uncomfortable or fall off like other headphones I’ve tried. But now they die almost instantly. I will have them fully charged and less than 30 minutes later they show that the battery is half way or more gone. Due to this they’ve become pretty much useless as I can barely go anywhere without having to be strategic about when I use them.

Worked for about a month before left ear stopped giving audio. Super disappointed. The device can't handle exercise. Keep your box, keep everything, this piece of trash WILL break on you and you WILL need to return it. Better to spend 75$ on a lasting device than spend the 25ish a month for replacements.

I have only used these headphones a few times and the piece inside the earpiece that connected to the charger is broken. The cord itself had a hard time fitting in and that's probably what did it. So they are useless now since they can't be charged.

They were decent to use, but all the adjustable ear pieces it comes with, hurt quite a bit.

Hate to say it but they were actually a waste of money. Did not last long at all and they weren't that comfortable.

The work just fine and sound very good. I do not know what people really expect from ear buds because the quality is somewhat limited due to the design. These headphones sound just as good as my $80+ LG Bluetooth earbuds. The case and extra plugs are a nice touch.

Sometimes I do have pairing issues. After a quick phone/headphone reboot everything seems to work perfectly fine.
" they sound great "
Husband has been using them for awhile and seems to really enjoy them and says the quality is really good. Easy to work out with.

These headphones are the real deal and I’m glad I bought them. Purchased the red pair in Jan 2018 and fast forward to now, Nov 2018, they still work great. My ears are weird and headphones never sit in my ears right, especially when working out. I never have issues with these coming out of my ears when exercising, they stay in place. Battery life for me is about a week which is pretty good for the price. Sound quality is great too. No connectivity issues, and they work fine at long ranges away from my phone too. My favorite part is that they drown out outside noise. With Apple headphones you can still hear all the noise around you, but these headphones are so solid I only hear my music and it’s great. Totally worth the buy.
Stop working in less than a month. First one ear stop working then I couldn't even get the Bluetooth to work at all.
good product, fast responses when I had a question
Price, sound

This is a good pair of headphone for sure, but to remind anyone who is going to make their purchase, this is a "Sports headphone". The headset itself is perfect to make calls and such with others, the voice comes out clear and loud, the communication between the headset and the phone is pretty strong, I'm able to get a stable connection standing about 12-14 feet away from my phone. But when it comes to music playback quality, it will be much lower than your expectation. As much as they say it's "HD Stereo", it's not, a pair of sony in-ear headphones that range from the price of 8-15 dollars beats this pair in terms of sound feedback. So if you are a person who has a pair of "picky" ears like me, and looking forward to playing mainly music with this device, I suggest you look elsewhere.
Works great nice sound.
Awesome sound, comfortable fit!  Would recommend to friends!

I got these on November of 2018 but within 6 months, my left earphone stopped working. No more sound comes out of that ear. It also is starting to have bad bluetooth connectivity. It takes about a minute for the earphones to connect to my device. While the connection is being made, it will give very scratchy, disconnected sound while my music is trying to play.

The first six months were awesome, but for the low price point, i guess i cant expect a long-use quality product..

Easy to set up. Comes with two replacement ear tips, car charger, charging cable, and a three foot charging cable. No plug for wall outlets.  My order came with a one year warranty and a 10% coupon for next purchase.

These headphones worked great while I had them. The audio was fine for the price and the battery life was great. Unfortunately a year and half after having them, and only a little after the warranty expired, a connection came loose and the headphones stopped working.

They sound good enough, battery is decent. But I can't get them to sit just right in a fast easily repeatable manner! The little ear loops don't have any tension or shape retention they are just limp, one sudden move and I have to adjust I'll be getting earbuds without loop next time.

Bought mainly to run and for work.. during phone calls would keep breaking up the call and make eco sounds to the other person. For running was pretty good couldnt really hear any noises but my music. Quality of the product is very bad . Dropped once from my desk and entire earbud came apart and never worked again.

Back in February, I purchased a pair of these earbuds having only tried Apple earbuds or really high-quality earbud brands like Bose. This pair is the only pair I have found that I can say is on the same level as Bose and I can't recommend these enough. The sound quality is exceptional, especially for the price, the battery life is insane, and the only grievances I have with these earbuds is that they don't work that well over calls, which is a common problem among all Bluetooth earbuds, and that after 6 months of using them, the power/play&pause button got pushed in a little too far and wasn't working. I contacted SENSO and they were very understanding, and exchanged my broken pair for a new one after verifying that the warranty was still in place and that there was a clear problem with mine. If you are on the fence about these earbuds, please buy them. They are easily my favorite pair of earbuds and I always leave the house with my pair. Highly recommend!

Got these for my husband...he is thrilled with the snug fit on his fairly large ears. He bikes a lot and now can listen to music, etc., without the worry of losing his earbuds. Great quality, affordable price!
These headphones are so awesome.
Good headphones.
I've quickly sweated through and thus ruined many "water resistant" headsets.  These have lasted three months now, so better than anything that I've had.  Worth it, especially for the price
i have small ears and the small buds won't stay in,and the over-ear piece is too floopy to help.
Better than expected!

FANTASTIC!! After sincing them to my iphone, I could not believe the quality these have.
I am very picky on quality and these have a good bottom sound. Full sound.
These have really surprised me. LOVE THEM!!!!
I have paid many times over for a pair of expensive earbuds and then sending them back. I won't send these back.
Get these and listen on Pandora to music station: Audiomachine Radio. You won't believe the sound!!
For the price, you are getting a really good deal.
If you don't like them, by all means throw your money into a more expensive pair just to say how much you spent....
Very very muddy sound, might be fine for certain music, but a lot of music sounds like you're listening underwater. Even the basic Apple or Samsung headphones sound better than this.
The headphones has good sound quality and has a nice bass to it. The behind ear part is flexible not sure if I like that but we will. No complaints so far. Will update my review if any thing changes.

Amazing product at a great price. My first pair of Bluetooth headphones. Easy to set up, and sound great!

The sound is amazing!!! so much bass and comfy there like you are not wearing them, really good Headphones, they could however improve on the reception, some times I feel like it looses reception even standing next to the connected device, not a deal breaker tough

Can not complain about the price or quality they definitely give solid sound and bass.
Great headphones. I did have the pair stop working and was provided with a quick warranty replacement. Great customer service overall.

Easy to set up and use, very comfortable and the sound is great. First earbuds I've owned that don't fall out all the time.

Good sound and microphone. Easy to forget they are on.

this is my first pair of senso headphones...and I must say that I am impressed with the quality of sound, and the ease of operation

keep up the good work (quality)

This is my second pair of these earbuds. I used my first set five days a week, for work shifts lasting 8-9 hours, and they lasted about three years.  Three years!  And they never fell apart and only ever ran out of battery life when going on ten hours.  Charge them up for an hour or two and they'll last you all day.  I've tried other wireless earbuds and keep going back to these because for the price these are unbeatable.  Highly recommend!!!
Why does pressing the "multi-function" button twice redial your last number? It's seems pretty damn counter intuitive.. why would that not be skip track like every other headphone set.
Good headphones
Nice headphones, comfortable.  I use them at the gym and they are very nice.  They are bass heavy so I used the equalizer to mellow the bass.  Would recommend to friends.
Great headphones, worth every penny. Two days after I bought them the price went down, the seller was great and refunded me the difference, when Amazon wouldn't! I highly recommend these!

I have been using this earplugs for a month and so far I had no issues. It is comfortable to carry around and connects to devices effectively. Cons is that it is not 200 dollars earplugs with pricey emblem so that sound quality drops when I listen to music with high volume on.

These are complete garbage - these sound like crap. I could do without the car charger and the cables and fancy case for a decent pair of buds. Returning.

I've bought these before, and after stepping on my last set (I'm a little on the heavy side...they didn't have a chance) I was glad to see that Amazon still carried them.  Solid connection, good sound, and work great in the gym, working in the yard outside, or even for a walk.  I'll try and be more careful where I leave them...but I'd buy again in a heart-beat.
Lightning fast service. Surprised at how well these sound for the price. So comfortable I forget I'm wearing them sometimes.
These are the perfect Bluetooth headphones for working out, need more so I can leave a pair in gym back and when at home gardening or what have you. Highly recommended.
Great headphones and super customer service when we had warranty issue.  This is my sons second pair and he loves them.

These are nothing short of amazing. The deep rich sound is really great!  My computer actually has 2 settings for them you can choose either Hands Free or Stereo.  The Stereo setting is the way to go.  Really great when watching Netflix on the computer. You pick up every sound in the show you are watching.  I haven't had a phone call yet  so I cannot comment on the quality of that. I will write back when I have some experience in that area. But from a music stand point....BRAVO!!  Best value around!!
Connected easy, track controls, great deal

Was ok for a month or so but does not connect anymore.
