These are great. I don't know why anyone would pay $150 for a more expensive pair. Battery life is good. Sound quality seems good. They stay in your ears and the price is right.

Headphones are nice but the first time my ears touched pool water they died. After drying out they were not operating. I don't understand how people say they are waterproof. They are if you do not let your ears touch the water!
Very happy with these great sound and price.
Worked great for the first few months but now it wont stay connected to my phone even when fully charged.

I like them. First set of Bluetooth headphones I've used. Though the instructions about getting them fully charged first was important. My phone couldn't find them on Bluetooth before they were fully charged. There is a slight moment after connecting that they have a hard time playing my music. Feels like the total connection is either slow or takes a moment for them to fully setup. Shrug no issue though.
Bass very loud in one ear more than the other.

Nice phones.  I use them in the gym.  Sound quality is good.  For the most part they stay on well during workout.  I ended up using the largest ear pieces.  No issues with bluetooth connection, paired right up to my phone.  Would recommend.
Comfortable and clear sound.
Good headphones. Useful for running.
Working outside in 100+ temps, these ear buds stayed in place and never caused a single problem.
I must admitt these work better than i thought.Especially for the price..I'm thinking on buying another pair

Fantastic sound, easy to pair, inexpensive....and to use a bad pun...they beat...Beats on all counts.  Why pay $150 for a headset when Senso outperforms the competition for about 1/4 the cost?  After utilizing their great customer service I’m completely sold.
It’s great
Great sound quality. Noise cancelling. Comfortable to wear.
Great for working out. Excellent quality sound. So far no problems, working great!
The design is a little bit too big. But it's very good, good sound, ...

I was super impressed with:

1) Ease of use...just a push of the multi-function button and my iphone7 paired in seconds.

2) Sound is better that anything I've tried costing 3-4 times as much

3) Packed with great accessories

4) Price...I bought 3 because I'll give 1 as a gift and also have a spare.

5) They fit better than anything I've ever tried

The best deal I've had on anything I've purchased online. I hope they hold up well, but they do have a 1 year warranty which is nice.

I just received my SENSO bluetooth wireless earbuds and my first impression is it came with a bunch of stuff: chargers, extra earbud tips(different sizes), carry case, setup instructions, ect. So, I turned them on, easily paired them and started listening to different types of music to see how they sounded compared to my beats3, and my wireless yurbuds. One set is for home workouts, one set for strickly running and this set was for work. These were on 35 bucks so i can afford to buy another pair if these break at work. For the price, i don't think you can beat them. Rap sounded awesome, hard rock sounded great as well. just as good as my other 2 sets in my opinion. Bass and treble was very nice without distortion. Noise cancelling was good too. The only reason i didn't give them 5 stars was because the earhooks are pretty flimsy. they are not like the beats. the beats can be formed for you ear size where as these have no forming ability. they are strictly for keeping them from falling off your ears. Its not that big of a deal but i prefer the beats in that sense. Once you get the right earbud tip on based on your ear, they shouldn't try to come off anyways. Overall, for the money you cant beat them, they sound great and they're easy to use. i havent had a chance to test the 8hr battery life yet but other reviewers said they were just about 8hrs of life so im not too worried about that.
Headphones were received in a timely manner and they worked just as advertised.  Very nice set of headphones for the money!

These earbuds are terrific! Comfortable and the sound quality is amazing. My ears are too small to accommodate regular hard earbuds and would not stay in short of using glue or tape- neither which would be recommended by any physician. I love them, thank you!

I purchased 2 pair for my husband and I. I have beats earbuds,  but they are wired, and i wanted wireless for exercise. When I received them, i immediately paired with my galaxy S7 and turned on google play. The packaging is great, the accessories are great, and the sound is unbelievable. I am so disappointed that I ever wasted money on the beats earbuds. These earbuds are all that I could want and more, and super affordable. Both my husband and I love them. They have loud, quality sound, they are comfortable, they stay in place, and they are cheap, who could ask for more.

Just came in and I worked out with them for two hours straight. I'm a cross trainer and body builder, these head phones have so much base, they stay on your ear even when walking on your hands, they feel flimsy, but that's why the are comfortable!! Great buy !!
Very high quality!  Sound is excellent!  Great value for the money!
They work very well the sound is very good they hold the charge all day
Be careful, use the case. My son put it in the bag, and it broke into pieces. I have to put them back together.

I bought this item twice. The first time it only lasted a week. I purchased another one as I like the sound quality but sadly it only lasted a little over a month.
This is the second pair that I've had.  These things are workhorses.  The pair I'm listening to right know are 4 years old!  Insane!

These do not sound ANYTHING like described. The mids are muddy and the so called treble? It's nearly non existent. I contacted the company by email but had no reply. I have had many bluetooth headphones. This is the first that I have sent back.

The perfect headphones in my eyes and my daughters.
Well here it is just a few months after I purchased these headphones and they wont turn on now. My daughter is a little disappointed to say the least so make sure you buy a warranty if you do purchase these. They stepped right up and replaced them as soon as I contacted them. I'll keep updating as I go.
Well just a short time later this pair of headphones also crackled out on the left side. In reading more reviews it seems to be a common problem. Now I have to return this defunct pair of headphones and be without for what is an obvious ongoing manufacturing problem. I know I am getting turned off more and more buying "Amazons Choice's" and not liking that I am paying to get taking advantage of.
Here it is just a six months after the second replacement pair and they died. I spent 23 bucks for a pair off ebay 5 years ago that still work no problem....
The sound is great and the instructions to use the headphones are simple....I am enjoying my workouts now....no strings (wires attached). Thank you

Very happily surprised great sound great bass good battery life and most importantly 50-100$ less than what I was told I would have to spend for the quality only drawback I would say is if you're working out I can't imagine they'd stay in ur ear the whole time
So these don't always stay as tight in my ears as I would like, but they hold better than most earbuds and the sound is fantastic.
Worked great for a year, then nothing. Invest in a good pair of earphones instead of spending $30 or so every year to replace a crappy pair.

Big disappointment... I bought these headphones b/c the apple buds are really uncomfortable and I needed something that would tend to stay in my ears while being active. While bulky the earbuds were comfortable and for the most part stayed put while riding my bike which was a nice surprise. Things went downhill from there really quick as I noticed the sound quality was far from great.. the bass is absolutely dreadful. The speakers crack and distort with the slightest bit of bass and that's a real disappointment. These headphones are just about useless if it can't play music with reasonable sound quality. Will be requesting refund.

I'm surprised by the 5 star reviews honestly... I read through a lot of them before buying but I'm starting to think that maybe these were fake reviews now.

Don't buy this product if sound quality means anything to you.
Durable good quality

works great would buy again

They are comfortable and sound great!
Comfortable. Great sound. Excellent battery life. A good buy.

This product could of easily be a 5 star product. My main problem with Senso is that their products don't stand the test of time. Once one of their headphones hits near the 1 year warranty mark or right after, the product is at risk of malfunctioning or having it's life being cut short and no amount of charging can resurrect it back to life. I'm being a bit generous by giving this product 3 stars. This is my 3rd headset and 2 months in, the left headphone bud has a slight decrease in sound. This impacts the quality tremendously for this model in particular because of it's emphasis on it's bass quality. I really wish Senso can enhance their products to be more durable and sturdy against time. I'm not asking for decades long Toyota like quality, but at least until I can get around the proper expenses of having the budget for a new headphone. The quality is amazing in these headphones and are a great investment as oppose to burning your wallet in an open flame for the sake of some beats headphones. I just wish for better longevity.

Sound quality is great. It initially appeared to be of high quality. However, I was forced to believe the opposite after the power button got sunk in and is stuck in that "pressed" position, making it unusable.  I live outside the USA, so it's very inconvenient to me to return the product. I am, hence, stuck with another poor quality pair of bluetooth headphones. Not recommended at all!

I purchased this item for my son-in-law who is very discriminating about electronic gear. I had to wait a few days to get some feedback from him and I think he said it all with one sentence: "These earphones have a much better sound than others I have tried that were much more expensive." The message is clear: Your company sells great quality merchandise at competitive prices. Who would not want to recommend your business and great service to anyone looking for this type of merchandise?  I heartily recommend you as a source for well-made gear and courteous service.

I lost my airpods and needed a replacement, didn't want anything too expensive (I can't trust myself). These are pretty good. They mostly stay on nice and tight while running, need one or two occasional adjustments, but nothing terrible. I think the sound quality is great for a running headphone. You can't go wrong with these!
I'm surprised at the quality of the product
Awesome sounding earbuds! Great for working out! Sweat resistant as promised and great fit. I would definitely recommend these bluetooth earbuds!
I just tested them and they sound good. Good quality for price

A gift and he enjoys using it with TV or droid.

I think if they were not so much overselling in the title (waterproof, noise cancellation etc.) I would have rated in 5 stars.
Cons...
First of all, it is not waterproof as I was lucky enough to go through reviews before taking them to the pool with me. They are only advised to be used under rain and not while swimming.

Second, they are not noise cancelling, they merely come with earbuds that are very similar to night time ear buds that foams in your ear and blocks some of the noise, but of course this is not the definition of noise cancellation. On the other hand it is a great fit.

Third; they seem like a bit heavy on the bass but you can correct that with the equalizer of the source (for ex. when listening spotify)

Fourt; the mic sucks, especially if you have paired it with 2 devices. So think twice if you are planning to buy this for talking on the phone much.
the mic. seems to have a problem when it is connected to 2 devices. when I am only on my mobile I can talk without needing to remove the ear with the mic and holding it to my mouth.
Pros..

1- Very light and good fit with the foam like ear buds. however if you need to put on the regular type earbuds because these are somehow small or else than it looses all the touch.

2- eventough it is not advertised, they match with 2 devices which is great. so I can listen the music from my computer but talk through them when I receive a call on my mobile. However, as I wrote before the mic. seems to have a problem when it is connected to 2 devices. when I am only on my mobile I can talk without needing to remove the ear with the mic and holding it to my mouth.
Have had these for 6 months and now they won’t charge anymore. Every time I plug it in it flashes blue and red
These headphones are far better than I could have imagined. They linked easily with my phone, they sound great, they fit well, they're comfortable, and they are easy to use. Great product!

Just okay to me; sound is decent for the price. Good battery, quick connectivity, and overall meets expectations for the price point. I do find them terribly uncomfortable and can’t wear them for an extended period of time.
So far so good. Great for the price. I’m so happy I didn’t pay for the really expensive name brand headphones
Sound great and light weight and last a while.
Very good sound quality they did stop working 7 months old but they did not hesitate to replace .
nice case and earbud variety.  sound is excellent!
I liked everything about the earphones!
Great headphones. This is my first time purchasing wireless headphones and I really like them. They are good quality ar an excellent price.

I just don't think these sound very good. Also, the Bluetooth connection gets kind of choppy and will go through stretches where it cuts out about 4 or 5 times in a few seconds. That happens every few minutes when I use these. I use three different Bluetooth speakers and have used four different wired earbuds on my phone, and these are the only ones that sound bad enough for me to have to go into the phone's equilizer and try to tweak it to make it sound decent. Even after tweaking they still don't sound as good as stock earbuds.

Got these for my wife and she used them one time and really loved the convenience of being wireless while jogging. She also loved the sound quality. Love them a lot! Good quality for the price

work well but, not really comfortable, maybe good if you are dumbo with big ear.
all accessory show , not exist , replace by BS accessory .
i m kind of desapointed .

Second time ordering this product. Destroyed first pair... Toddler consistently yanking them, falling asleep in them. Used them everyday, all day. Stepped on them. Never had a problem.. Until now and re-ordered same pair. Never had a pair lasting this long until these senso.

I bought the head phones in February 2017 - absolutely loved them up until they stopped charging last week. I was just about to buy a second pair to keep at work until this set took a dive after four months.
AS these are for the gym and are subject to abuse this is my 2nd pair, which says volumes. The sound is great and battery length is excellent!
Nice Headphones, sound is real Hd  Im really Happy with this product..

Ordered a pair in February. After a month, they went haywire; skipping and turning off for no reason. Got a replacement pair. They worked fine for a month, but then started skipping, turning themselves off for no reason, and randomly voice dialing.

I was expecting more from the headphones since they were listed as sport headphones.  They do not grip my ear like i was expecting and do not feel as secure as less expensive models.  I do like the wrap around feature but again, they do not feel as secure as i would like when running.  Good quality sound, extra ear buds nice and the carrying case also nice.  Great for walking!

Excellent investment. Well made, great sound, quality case and extra earpieces. Free one year warranty shows that these are built to last.  Over ear soft hooks work well, holding on my headphones when I am working out. Nice bonus products included in box with earphones... The magnetic mobile phone car mount really works,  The stick on credit card holder is going to my wife.
These earbuds worked really well for 2 years.  Recently went to use and heard a zap and now they no longer charge.  We tried different chargers but seems like they are toast.
Can't go wrong for the price . after a while the wire that wraps around the ears got loose from headphone and doesn't really hold well to ear anymore.

I just sent these earbuds through the clothes washer and dryer by accident... and they still work! Are these perfect earbuds? No. Are they worth $20? Absolutely.

These are definitely not meant for outdoor use. As others have noted with the slightest breeze (eg if you run with any speed at all) you get a distracting whooshing noise from air going past the earbuds. Other than that I'm pretty happy. They are tolerably comfortable, my music sounds good, the batteries haven't run out on me yet, and they don't seem to mind my sweat or the rain I run in. Once in a while they get confused when in the presence of multiple bluetooth sources and get in an annoying state where the sound is garbled, but I've learned how to get them to settle out with resetting and pausing.

This was the fourth pair of budget bluetooth earbuds I have owned. All the others were not as good as this pair that I have. I use these earbuds daily and feel like they are greatly designed earbuds and that fit on my ears well and do not create any pain. . A few of my friends own powerbeats and I think these can definitely compare if not better. The sound quality is good for the price and has a good amount of bass. However if you listen to heavy, bass EDM songs it won't be that great. I love the fact that the ear hooks are silicon so they wrap along your ear comfortably. Great battery life as well (8hrs+). These are a must buy if you want a good pair of working out bluetooth earbuds!
Great headphones.  Perfect for working out.
The only problem I find the lowest volume is still too loud. I like the comfort of the earphones themselves.
Love them, they've lasted me a whole lot longer than Beats have and these have a really long lasting battery they're perfect
Just started using them, and so far, I'm very happy. Easy to set up, great sound quality!
Comfortable and easy to use.  Sounds good and comes with plenty of accessories. Headphones stopped working after 6 months but senso sent out a replacement.

Originally purchased these headphones in January 2017 - I really started using them when the weather got warmer and they are my go-to headphones when I'm working in the yard, particularly mowing on my zero turn.
A couple weeks ago, after about 6 months of light use, I took them off my head and they wouldn't turn off (or on) - the button just quit working.
I contacted Invotek and let them know my situation. I was very impressed to hear back from them within HOURS, not days. Since I was well within my 1 year warranty, they just shipped me a new set, which I received quickly - so quickly that I never even had to mow without them because the mailman showed up in my driveway as I was getting my mower out of my garage. There was charge on the battery and I was off and mowing with my ballgames and tunes!
I was thoroughly impressed with the customer service, and for this reason alone, I give them 5 stars. It's a good product (I hope this pair lasts longer than 6 months) and Invotek's service was as good as it gets.
They stopped working after one week of wear. They won't even turn on now. Sound quality was good, but only for the time that they worked.
very pleased with these, amazed at how good the microphone is.  So pleased, I bought another set for spouse.
Just bought second set.. first one was destroyed in a motorcycle mishap. Work VERY well! Use everyday.

These are really nice, especially for the price.  Very omfortable, pretty decent noise reduction.  I don't know how long they go until needing a recharge (I only used them for about 2 hours at a time), but so far, so good.
They fall out of my ears when I’m at the gym. Might be bc I sweat a lot but idk. They have good sound though.

Had to return these. They didn’t fit nicely and really just weren’t worth the money. I’m very picky when it comes to my head phones. They did what they adviertised, music quality was ok. I prefer my Bose instead. Great for the price.
So far, love them. Great sound!

No longer a skeptic, these sound awesome! The range is incredible , from acoustic to metal. Easy setup, user friendly, and amazing price. These will be my new go-to headphones!!!

Bose ear buds were the best but they were too small, fell out of my ears, and I lost 2 sets. Jaybird was expensive as heck and I flat couldn't get them to fit in my ears.
The SENSO, so far, both fits, doesn't fall out on to the pavement, and sounds fantastic. I previously paid approximately 10 times the cost of the SENSO and got nothing for my money.

These are great

So far so good.  Super quick delivery. Fits well.  Sounds great. Stays in place.  Easy to navigate.  Would recommend highly.  Couldn't get it to connect to BlueTooth at first but rebooted my phone and it worked.

I've had these for a few weeks now and they fall out.  The first week they were good but the sides become flimsy and when I run they don't stay in my ears.  They work good they just don't stay put for me.
Great earbuds

Bought these april 2017.  February 2018 they have disintegrated- ear bud dangling from the frame by a wire. Took good care of them, use at gym 4-5 days / week. Very unhappy with these.  Would give zero stars if i could.

I bought these to replace my $100 plus set. I figured lets give these a shot instead of spending over $100 on another Famous brand. Best $25 spent! and sound just as good as wife's $150 brand name set. My previous $100 brand name set charging connection broke off in headset after about a year of use. I need the wrap around ear feature as I have yet to find a set without this feature that stay in place during workouts. These did not disappoint.
Hard to keep these in ears.

I purchased this product in the beginning of January 2018. The sound quality was good and the fit was nice? I sweat A LOT when I exercise, but the buds stayed in place. The cord would stick to my neck at times, while running, and eventually would tug off one of the buds - oh well.
The reason that I'm giving this product two stars is because recently the headphones would die after only 2 to 3 hours of use. Today they completely died on me while at the gym 5/8/2018. I only got 4 months use out of these headphones. SMH.
I mean I guess it is on the side of your head what can you expect.
Working very well I love it.
love them
I did brought the senso Bluetooth Headphones for a gift BUT I did not give the gift yet

I give these 4 stars because they don't have a button on the headphones to change the song, whereas my past headsets have, and no vocal battery life status.
I like them a lot though, GREAT noise cancelling, more comfortable without my glasses, and sits well around my neck when I don't have them in at the moment. I have a Galaxy S6 for now and it pairs with no problems The bass is pretty decent to me as well and I listen to a lot of DJs (Bonobo, Gramatik, Emancipator, etc). If anything, you could always adjust the sounds settings on your phone.

Hopefully mine wont go out after a few months or so like the other reviews have stated.

I've been wearing these to the gym for abut 6 weeks now. I love the little carrying case and it feels great to not be attached to a wire. Good sound quality and the battery seems to hold up for awhile before I plug it back in. Glad I picked them.
Update: I have had these for 6 months. I plugged them in to charge, and just in that act, the button that increases/decreases volume along with other functions just fell off. I tried to put it back on, but it would not stay. I have not used these roughly, and always kept them in a bag to take and use at the gym 2 or 3 times a week. I was the only user. They still work, but I will definitely choose another brand the next time.

All I can say is Wow! Since purchasing these headphones in May, they have been my Go To headphones. I wear them every day, all day, until they need recharging and I sadly have to switch to a different pair while the Senso recharge. Recently, the Sensos developed a pairing problem.  Would not pair with phone or laptop. I was bummed. After a couple of emails with Senso support, who were incredibly responsive, it was determined there was a problem with the headphones. I offered to return them. Instead, they sent me a brand new pair in less than four days and just in time for a 8 hour plane ride! Great product. Phenomenal support! Senso, you have a customer for life! Thank you!
Item arrived as described and works as proposed and intended. Relatively light weight with a secure fit while running and lifting. I have no complaints so far.
Ordered them Sunday morning, had them Sunday night. Used them all evening. Great sound. Very impressed given their price. Added goodies too. Magnetic cellphone holder. Nice! Highly recommend.
I just started using them. Great sound at such an affordable price.
Perfect
These headphones sound amazing! My husband loved them but his dad talked him into giving them to him so we need to buy another pair lol.

These headphones were fine when I first got them. Decent (but not great) battery life, and good quality sound. However, I bought them only 2 months ago and they have already stopped working and won't charge.

I thought these sucked. The over-the-ear hook is way too large, and the only tips that will hold them somewhat in place are the foam tips - even then, if you sweat a little, they will work themselves out of your ears without much motion to help them. The sound quality is okay, but those two issues were dealbreakers for me. Look for something in the $40 range, and forget the over-the-ear hooks.
Great sound. Great purchase.
Great pair of head phones. They have held up incredibly well, and I'll definitely buy another pair if these ones fail.

Great sound and battery life in an inexpensive product. I'm only at the end of week-one with Senos Active but I'm happy with my choice. The earbuds fit comfortable and do not cause discomfort after extended periods of use. Claimed battery life seems accurate at ~8 hours. Only thing I could want is track control buttons (Figured out after a couple weeks that a long press on the up and down volume is track control).

10-month follow-up.
Headset was working great for 1-2 hours of use per day until the left earpiece started shorting out. I contacted the Amazon vendor, Tekatron, and they helped troubleshoot and then replace the headset. Despite the malfunction, the overall experience has been great. This headset is perfect for running, has good audio quality, and great support from the vendor and manufacturer.
used everyday.
Not made for smaller ears.
Great value, good sound, solid and fast connection with my Samsung Note 5. Love them!
Work great! I am a big guy and sweat a ton and they hold up great.

I bought these as a gift for someone and tested them out when they arrived without any issue on my phone. The sound quality was decent, the depth of the bass was above average I’d say, the treble and middle tons were kind of hollow sounding, not as rich as nicer options but still I was happy with them. The construction seemed okay, the ear loop seemed somewhat flimsy.

The biggest issue is THEY NEVER CONNECTED TO ANY PHONE AGAIN. Never detectable on Bluetooth. Read the manual online at least 10 times, followed every step repeatedly. Did the factory reset, turned phones on and off and not one time was the headset detectable. Completely frustrating and embarrassing as a gift.

I’ve had these for almost a year and don’t use them everyday. At first they were great for the gym. Then I started noticing them cutting out when they were in the pockets of my workout pants or coat. Then when they were not in a pocket they simply stopped working.
Very poor sound quality

I absolutely loved this product. I've been using it at the gym and have even increased my exercise performance. Having a great quality wireless headphones made a huge difference on my concentration & focus.Thank you!"

I have only used then a couple of times.
But so far do good.

I wore these to the gym for the first time today. As someone who wears EarPods regularly, I was immediately and pleasantly surprised to find them nearly as comfortable in my ear. Beside being wireless, the other advantage that became apparent was the rubberized over-ear piece, which too was remarkably comfortable and kept them in place during my entire workout.

Sound quality is much, much better than I expected for wireless headphones at this price point. Highs are clear and the bass is crisp when Hendrix is cranked to the volume I need to drown out the piped-in pop that plays at the gym.

I *love* that these come with a case, a car charger and two charging cables, since that means I can leave them in the car and I won't have to hunt them down when it is time to go to the gym.

I don't see myself giving up my EarPods for everyday use, since--in my opinion--these fall short of them for comfort and sound. But when I want to be untethered from my iDevices, these will do the trick quite well.
These recently went through a full load cycle wash and about an hour of dryer time, they still work perfectly. Most credit cards can't handle that sort of treatment. 10/10 would use Gain again

These headphones were awesome, great quality. I sweat a lot and they stayed put during my long runs and workouts. However they stopped working after 6 months of use, but I called customer service and they were AWESOME at replacing them and sending me new ones. I'm very grateful and satisfied with this product and the customer service team.

The price on these threw me off at first, didn't expect to get great quality for so cheap. But oh gosh these headphones are AWESOME! Such incredible quality for the price, great sound, great fit and they last for a good while before needing a charge. Would highly recommend these to anyone in the market for affordable wireless headphones.
These are great for an inexpensive pair of Bluetooth buds. They fit comfortably and stay on and in your ear. The sound is great...especially for $35. Highly recommend
Earbuds don't always fit in my ears, but these work well for me.
Bought as a birthday present for my husband and he loves them. Great sound, stay in ears and easy to use.
Easily paired, comfortable and good sound
I bought these when another pair from a different company fell apart. I'm very happy with the quality of the sound and the build. They feel substantial and sturdy. I'm very happy with them.

Really nice sound quality. Seem to be well designed,time will tell. I'm really blown away about this Custmer Service. Just got mine yesterday,and a really nice E-Mail about my satisfaction with product. Yes,yes,I'd recommend to get these, and this Company as well.
Bought this for my wife.  She likes it so far, audio quality not the most amazing but overall comfortable and great price!
Excellent sound, very light it feels like you have nothing on your ears, great connection, happy with my purchase.

These headphones got great reviews, but...even I can tell that the sound quality on these is not very good (and I’m not usually bothered by cheap headphones). They also look kind of weird, especially when the light is blinking on the front of your ear. I think if you’re going to go Bluetooth/wireless, you’ve got to spend a lot more money to get a decent pair. For me, it wasn’t worth it. Returned these and I’m sticking with the Apple wired headphones that came free with my iPod.
It’s pretty comfortable wearing it while running on the trail.

I love these headphones. They sound nice, the battery lasts long, the buttons work well! The only complaint I have is that it will connect to two devices sometimes and makes a weird beep if it does. It also gets mad(and beeps at me) when you turn down the volume too much, sometimes to me it's still too loud but it won't let me turn it down anymore.
Great response, immediate delivery would definitely recommend!

Have owned these for a few weeks and very easy to operate.  Was worried that others may not hear me well when using the microphone for cell calls, but people say they can hear me fine.  Great purchase so far...
Great for running, stays in ears and also great for voice calls when working from home all day.

so far everything has been perfect... and the sound quality is outstanding!!  I can wear them under or over my sun glasses and comfortable either way. Impressed with everything to this point and SENSO has given me a good feeling about their support should I ever need it..

The product is great...when working. After a week of use, the buds would not hold a charge...called customer service and they immediately replaced the unit. The second unit worked fine for about a month, then stopped holding a charge. Called CS again, and again they replaced the unit.  Excellent product...when it isn't all buss' up. Just received replacement today...stand by...(third time charm???)
This is a quality product, and I got exactly what I was expecting. The product is the same as described.

I've used these for a few months now; running 3,4 times a week.  Absolutely no problems at all.  They are easy to set up and use while running.  Sound is great.  I love how low the volume goes!  I charge once a week.  Sometimes twice if I use them while walking to work also.
The first 3 times I used them they worked. I enjoyed having them.  Yesterday, I could not sync them to my iPod.  I tried 5 different times.  Frustrating.

Just received the Buds. Easy pairing and the sound is great!
Looking forward to working out
Without wires all over the place.

I really liked these and used them every time I exercised. The only issue was the battery life could be longer and they no longer work after a year... but for the price they are great! Just don’t expect them to last too long.
These work great
Great sound comfortable priced fair
works great
Can't really say much as I got them only two days ago, but they are working just fine so far. The sound quality is good and the controls are easy to work.
Love these headphones. Great sound, Great Bass, Quick charging, and best of all very very comfortable highly recommend. Thank you!!!
Arrived on time! Great headphones to workout with, noise cancellation is awesome and no more fussing with cords while I run.
The earbuds are not at all soft and really hurt my ears. Wouldn’t recommend these to anyone.
Sometimes takes a couple of tries to connect. Once connected I have had no other issues. Overall a very good product.
These headphones are awesome.  They were easy to connect and sound great for the price.  No they are not beats, but they do beat the beats cost.  I would recommend this product.
Great so far only been 2 days
works well!! long battery life, no problem connecting,
Great sound.  Connects easily.  Really like that it has the microphone also.  Good bass.  Can't beat the value.
Xmas present.  Broke within 3 weeks.  The connection kept cutting out and then coming back on intermittently.  Had to return.  Disappointed based upon the ratings.
Great product. Paired easily and I listened to an audiobook on my walk an hour later. Good purchase from a good supplier. I couldn't be happier.

The best earbuds... EVER.  I have the apple airpods.  I have several other brands as well.  The issue is when I get hot I sweat and the other products quit working, volume decreases, or worse, fall out of my ear.  The SENSO buds don't have this problem.  And they are loud!  Fifty percent on my phone is all I need.  And while they don't sound like my expensive BOSE over the ear headphones, its NEARLY that good which is great for cardio. The price is amazing and the warranty is easy to register for.  Wish I had seen these before I bought the apple airpods.  I could have bought 2 for me and 3 for my wife for the same price!

I usually favor Skullcandy headphones for their supreme bass feature, but these easily compares to those. The sound quality is great and for the price, such an great purchase. I use it with my phone and laptop, i haven't tried with my PS4 yet though. I highly recommend it.
I bought these to use at work, they sound awesome.

Nice Headphones for price sound great sturdy and comfortable what more do you want. Oh yeah PRICE. Only issues some connectivity issues and the flap for charging is tricky but you want headphones BUY THEM.
Was very satisfied with the purchase would recommend. Sound real good for the price.

I wasn't really expecting much for such a low price, but I was completely BLOWN AWAY! I use these headphones to listen to music while I'm working and they last through a full 8 hour shift and even into overtime! The only time they've ever actually died, it took 9 and a half hours of solid use!!! Sound quality is actually very good as well. I absolutely cannot believe what a great deal I got on these headphones! 10/10 would absolutely recommend to anyone looking for reliable battery life in Bluetooth headphones.
Great product!!!! Great sound!!!!  Long lasting charge!!!  Very comfortable!!!!
Work as advertised, stay affixed in the ears well, as least for walking and gym workout. I do not run with them.
I weight lift and do HIIT with a lot of jumping, burpees, sprinting, ex and they never fall off or bother me. Love them!

amazing sound quality - very comfortable - pleasantly surprised for only $35. A great value and I'd buy them again at this or any price.

UPDATE - these were great for a while but now they won’t connect and are useless.

Good sound, seems to drown outside noise. Still working with ear tips to find a size that doesn’t fall out of my ear. This is a good value for what I’m getting, but I do not have a lot of control of the phone from your pieces, and they are a little bit prominent when they stick out of my ear. But for this price I can live with that.

I base my award of 5 stars on the issue of value.  For the price, these are an excellent choice.  The sound quality is better than average, which is, to my mind, more than what I paid for.  So no, these are not studio quality headphones, but they are far above adequate to my amateurish ear.  They also come with quite a lot of extras, such as a car charger and multiple sets of earbuds.  My only question is durability, which will only be answered with time.  So far, after only a few days of use, I'm impressed.
Won’t hold a charge about 6 months after purchase. Constantly disconnects.
I will never go without wireless again! Life changer
Great Buy
Great value for the price, works perfect at the gym

I love these headphones for running. They are lightweight, easy to turn on and off while running and mildly good at adapting to my sweat. I had a battery issue (they no longer took a charger after 5 - 6 months. But, after writing Senso directly for my registered product, they were quick to send out a replacement pair and offered suggestions to how I could fix issues with mine. Loved these headphones but the left ear stopped working after 4 months . So I used my warranty and they hooked me up with another pair

But these headphones
I think these will work well. I got these for an upcoming trip but they paired well with my phone and have good sound quality. Pleased so far.
This headset checks every box - good sound, comfortable and stays in place on my ear. Bought a second one for my wife and was not disappointed. Good value at the price.

Excelent service! The bluetooth headphones are easy to use, anatomical and provide excelent service.

I'm very pleased with the headphones.  The earhooks are so flexible that it takes a little more effort to get them on, but once on they are very comfortable. Sound is good both with music and phone calls.
I have a hearing problem in my left ear therefore these really help.

I looked at a variety of headphones,both more and less expensive, before choosing the SENSO. The S-250 seemed to have all the features I needed. They are very comfortable and easy to use. Excellent value for the price.

Just purchase second set of these for my husband. I've used for over a year and have been very pleased. Great sound quality!
I work out 5 days a week and these things are awesome!

I like the headphones. I will give them 4 stars. It also comes with a very nifty cord that doubles as headphones charger and an iPhone charger. I love the idea, but the cord became faulty within a couple of weeks. I have been traveling for the last two months and this was my opportunity to write about it. Shame about the cord. The cord gets 1 star.
After contacting Sensi several times, I have given up on them. They promised a replacement cord 3 times and I have never received it. Their comments below did not follow through with the mailing of the cord as promised. The headphones are worthless without a charging cord. Another product goes to the trash!!!
August 12: Update: The replacement cord finally arrived after several months. Buyer beware!

Got the headphones awhile back and they work great and never had a problem with it for a good amount of time

Great product.  Love the sound.  Comfortable.

not great , POOR sound quality, you can find better elsewhere

I've bought these ear buds before and I got new ones because I lost them and with this pair I am having alot of issues! I tried countless ways to fix  the ear buds from automatically disconnecting and connecting every frickin 20 seconds non stop and the ear buds still  do not work! I would please like a replacement asap !
I think these are great!  I chose from the great reviews I read and I can’t find a flaw.  Thanks for creating a great product at a reasonable price.

Not too many years ago, I purchased a set of highly rated, "state of the art" and expensive wire connected in-ear head phones. They were quite good.
When I purchased these Ivotek wireless SENSO Bluetooth Headphones for my wife who listens to music with her iphone while at the gym or at home, I didn't expect they would be as good as my older "state of the art" wire connected earphones.
I was wrong. These Senso Bluetooth wireless headphones sound just as good and are better in terms of comfort and convenience....and they are less than 1/5 the cost of the highly rated, "state of the art " headphones I purchased a few years ago.
Of note too, is that the owners of this product have followed up this purchase with an email to be sure I am completely satisfied. If I am not satisfied or am having problems, I can respond directly to the email or call the provided telephone number. A very good product at a very good price and dedicated customer service rates 5 stars.

This is my first pair of blue tooth ear buds and I love them.  They come with a nice variety of accessories and a great case to carry them in.  They last a few long time in between charges.  I highly recommend them.
Over all it's a good average workout headset, but I didn't keep this product because it didn't fit well.

These headphones were quite a surprise when they arrived. They came with several charging cables, a car adapter, a zip up case, various rubber buds, far more than I expected! So far I have used them extensively while running and working out and they don't cut out at all. The sound quality is a little less than my EarPods but that's nothing I have a problem with. I have yet to test the water resistant feature since it's IPX7 but time will tell of these were a great deal or temporary pleasure.
Love everything except for over the ear part would be better if adjustable.
They would kinda cut in and out as if they were wired or like poor connection but other then that happening a few times it pretty good for the price

Very comfortable and easy to link to phone.
Excellent sound and volume.
Had to get my original set replaced they quit working. The customer service was awesome. E-mailed with my problem and within 2 hours my new headphones were being processed for replacement. Staff was very helpful and prompt in their response to my issue. I highly recommend this product. The customer service is heads and shoulders above the rest.

Sound quality is great, but the biggest con to these ear buds are that they do not stay put. I have tried the different sizes (which I do not think they included the small size in my packaging) and they immediately fall out while running. The plastic piece that is supposed to fit around the ear is way to big. I have to try and tuck the plastic in my hair to stay in place.  I read other reviews that say the plastic is bendable which is not true. If you are planning on running, jumping, or a vigorous workout I would not suggest these headphones. The price point is okay but when these go I would not purchase again.
I am truly amazed by this awesome product

Why pay $110.00 for wireless earphones when these little guys do the trick? I charged these up and hit the treadmill with no slipping or falling out of place. The instructions were great and easy to follow so pairing with my iPod was a breeze. They come with all the extras the triple figures buds come with at a fraction of the price but all the sound and quality.
We bought one pair for one family member, and another saw them and we needed to order a second pair. They are comfortable, easy to use.

This is my first purchase of Bluetooth headphones. I have always been unwilling to give up sound quality for the convenience of Bluetooth. Regardless of the number of pairs of wired headphones / airbuds I would destroy, I kept going back to them. When I decided to take the Bluetooth plunge I spent hours of research, looking to find the best bang for the buck. I will say without a doubt that Invotek's SENSO Bluetooth headphones are absolutely amazing. I find that I am now listening to music, podcasts, etc. at times that I never used to because the wire would get in the way. And the sound quality from SENSO is incredible. I have lost almost nothing in sound but gained a boat load of freedom. I LOVE THIS PURCHASE!
So far so good, Bluetooth is great.  Sound is good... Battery life good...

They were loud and hood quality but a lot more bass than I expected and not even clear bass all the time. Needs more crisp notes and treble range. I like that it can be in shallow water for up to 30 minutes though. Makes showering and swimming more fun.
Very cool earbuds with great people standing behind their product!!

Great product! The battery will last forever.  I use it for times a week and  I only have to charge it every three months. After a couple miles the earbuds do tend to get sweaty as with most products. But they rarely fall out. Good purchase!

Connectivity is the worst feature about the product. Someone I starts to go out when my phone is in my pocket or when its in my hand.

Sound is good for the price. I primarily wanted something that was wireless for the gym or when im working around the house. The only problem is when I have my phone in my pockets. Other than that the product is fine.

Since there are a lot of brands that are priced much higher, I didn't want to write before I give myself enough time to experience the quality of the sound. To my good surprise I found that the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones provide a high quality stereo sound that is both deep and without any static. The battery life is as long as 8 hours or a little more. The material is good and the box contains various sizes of ear buds. I think it competes very well with other higher-priced Bluetooth Headphones.
No complaints. Great sound, they don't fall out when running and it pairs easily with a phone without dropping connection. Plus having a warranty is nice.
THEY ARE GREAT!!!!!!!!

I've had these for about ten months. I use them at the gym and when reading as the loud coffee shop on campus. At the gym, they work great, though there are moments when they randomly cut out even though I'm only a few feet away. This happens very rarely though. At the coffee shop, they do a relatively good job of cutting out outside noise and the music of the shop. Though I've been impressed with them, I never felt compelled to write a review for them... until today.

A few days ago the left earphone stopped working (this is probably partially due to how I throw them around and in my gym bag, as well the normal beating they take at the gym). I emailed Senso customer care and they provided a troubleshooting method that did not work. Since the headphones come with a year-long warranty though, they sent me a new pair. They did not even ask for the old pair back! I was so impressed with the quickness of customer care's response, and the ease of solving the issues, that I had to write a review.

Top notch company and product! I would recommend these headphones to anyone!
Im not sure about how I feel since I cannot pair it to my Samsung Note 4.
Love the headphones, I already have co-workers ordering some for themselves.

Very comfortable. Pairing was easy and immediate. Sound quality is good for my purposes (mainly voice, podcasts, etc). I am a bicycle commuter and they fit comfortably under my helmet. I would recommend these. I was not paid and did not receive an incentive for this review.

The sound quality on these headphones is amazing! Great for working out with high intensity. At times, I find that the wrap around portion of the ear buds (while comfortable) is a bit loose. Otherwise, this was a great buy for the fit life I lead.

So I wanted Bluetooth earbuds for working out and corded earbuds were a hassle.  These were the tight price and get the job done.  Plus they come in a nice case.  Very happy with my purchase. Recommend these for anyone who can't see paying for overpriced ones.
Best Bluetooth earbuds I have ever had!!! Works without causing pain to ear and definitely sounds excellent!!
Even better than expected!  Great sound!
This is my third pair. They don’t last more than three months.  Will not buy again.

Looks great and feels great but it does not work well as advertised
Great for going on a run. The audio quality isn't perfect, but is great for the price.

Not sure how they could sell these for $170.00 but at the current($37) price point they're a great deal! First, the audio is pretty good, the sound is nice and clear also they can get quite loud if you need them to, the bass is fairly decent. The range is also a plus from my old ones I can leave my phone on one side of the gym and they still come in. (decent size gym) the case that they come in is a wonderful added bonus and the looks of the headset and the function are nice. So now the flaws first which I am most disappointed in and I took a star from it is the rubber things that go around your ears they hardly help, I wish they were a little stiffer they're soft and doesn't feel like they help all that much keeping them there. I mean on the other side they aren't hurting your ears if you have em in your ears for long periods of time which I don't really. But they don't slip out that easily they do feel slightly lose tho maybe just cause of my ears and other people might not have this problem but I seem to. I can't question the durability of these since I just got them but they do seem like they'll last unless the have some hardware problems down the road which I'll update if so. So yeah overall no regrets getting these and what everyone has been saying is pretty much on par.
Great quality
great sound and very comfortable.
Product is great.  Easy to use.  Customer service is fantastic, bought a 2nd pair as a gift.
Works well. Good sounds, easy to use.

I purchased these and have used them for a while. They work really well. I have lost them a few times to find that my daughter has been using them! She likes them too. I think I will have to purchase another pair....

Only had them since Xmas 2017 but they seem to offer high quality sound at very reasonable price. I prefer the foam ear tips but only one pair was supplied and Senso do not sell them. This is a problem as I subsequently bought two sets - Kinden and Veritas. Kinden foam tips are too big, and these were recommended by Senso. (I made the Kinden's fit but wrapping some duct tape around the nozzle posts, but feel that I should not have to go to these measures). The ones from Veritas (2.5mm to 3.5 mm) do not fit the nozzle. Perhaps the larger Veritas would fit but I am not spending more money and time on this. I have contacted Senso but yet to receive a reply on the inner core diameter of the foam tips, and the diameter of the nozzle. My estimates are that the former is 3.97mm and the latter is 4.5mm. Comply says the 200 would fit, but I am dubious as the inner core of 5mm would exceed the nozzle. Also spending approximately $20 on Comply's eartips (including shipping) seems ridiculous as this would be two/thirds of the price of Senso's headphones.

Update
On Monday 27 May 2019 the headsets were failing to connect to my iphone 6s having worked with no problem up until this time. The connection would last perhaps a couple of mins and then cut out. Reconnecting was difficult if not impossible and numerous factory resets and unpairing/forgetting the device did not solve the problem. Therefore the life of the product was about 17-18 months. I had used the product approximately 400 days over this period at the gym with each session about 1.5 to 2 hours. I suppose I got pretty good use from the product and perhaps given the purchase price of $30 should not complain too much but I feel let down. My daughter has a pair that she does not use because the earbuds do not fit her small ear canals. I will try those and see how they perform before the next purchase whatever that might be.
I like the adjustable fitting and it actually has pretty good quality for its price
I’ve had these for over a year now and it still works amazing .
Honestly  i love the headphones especially for the price i paid for them.. They are great quality!. And they came so quickly by mail.. Awesome, i am a very happy customer!!!
Nice
Really enjoy my Senso earphones. Great sound for my music and my phone calls. Would recommend to a friend. Very comfortable too.

I love the fact that I am not hooked up to my cell phone when listening to my music.  It's great for the gym but also I love it for the beach. I also used it talking on the phone and the sound quality wasn't the best but for my purpose (music) I am very happy with it.

These are fantastic, I have ordered 4, gave 3 to my family so they could enjoy the great sound. The ear clips hold them securly on, even bouncing around at the gym.  My daughter wore them on her 1/2 marathon and swore the headphones made all the difference to keep running, and running!.

I was pleasantly surprised by how well these headphones worked given the price.  The sound is not bad, certainly good enough for my daily podcast fix. The range is pretty good, at least 30 ft without any noticeable signal loss. The microphone feature works pretty well with my phone, and the battery lasts for hours. My one quibble is that the design is not well suited to women with smaller ears.  It takes some serious wiggling (not always comfortable) to get them to stay my ears, and the over the ear loops are a bit too large to help out.

SENSO Bluetooth Headphones are comfortable and the sound quality is wonderful. No static, no sounds from cords (the only cord is the connecting cord that you place behind your neck). I leave my smartphone in my bedroom to recharge and listen to my audible books while cleaning house! Great reception! I'm very satisfied!
Easy to connect to Bluetooth and sound great!
Finally, Bluetooth headphones that are easy to use and stay in my ears!  I actually use these earphones!

I just got these and have only used them a few times but so far they seem to be a great set of ear buds. I have a terrible time with ear buds staying in my ear and these seem like they would stay even without the over the ear piece. The sound is good and they were very easy to pair and start using. I purchased a similar type of ear bud in the past that I returned because I had so much trouble trying to get them set up initially but these seem like keepers! I had tried several cheaper products over the years, and nothing will either fit into, or stay in my ears.  These are no different. I'm really happy with by Senso earphones ( I've only used them for about a week) but they sound great! They are so light that I actually forget that I have them in my ears.

Also it is waterproof as I happily found out when I ran in a rainstorm while training for a marathon. They are my go to headphones for my long runs. The only thing that don't like so much is that it's hard to rewind songs but that could just be the fact that I haven't read the instruction manual. Overall this is a good product for the money that I paid. So when they suddenly stopped working about a week ago I was concerned but then I remembered that they were covered under a one year warranty. They have wonderful customer service as they responded quickly to my email and I had a free replacement with a few days! I definitely recommend this product because it works well in the rain and the company stands behind their product.
They are great and work as described on the product webpage. I bought this one for my wife and she seems to enjoying them while working out.

very good

These are amazing. It was super easy to sync the bluetooth. They feel and fit perfectly. The sound is fantastic. I am VERY happy with this purchase. I would recommend this company and this product. Great find.

Once these earphones finally arrived (Amazon lost them somehow but did refund the order and express shipped another) I quickly paired them with my Motorola Droid Turbo 64, a phone notorious for it's low volume on audio/video playback, I played some classic Pink Floyd to really test them out. They passed with flying colors. Light weight, comfortable to wear, controls easy to use, as was pairing, voice confirmation of commands. All in all, I found them to be better than I expected. Note: I've not tried a phone call through them yet, but I'll update this review if it's not as good as the basic audio/video delivery.

They also come with a nice little hardshell case to store them in and various wire connections along with 3 sets of ear pieces, small, medium and large. Mine came with the large installed and those were quite comfortable. They appear to be made out of that spongy material that disposable earplugs are made out of so they conform to the unique shape of your ear.

Issue resolved, hassle free even though I had them beyond Amazon primes return guarantee.

The red LED light no longer lit up and they would no longer accept the charge the headphones would become warm as if they were charging but when I tried to use them it would always tell me low battery. I contacted Amazon Prime support and they were very helpful and getting me in cobtact with someone who could assist me with a repair or replacement because I had already passed beyond the window of return through Amazon. I'm really hoping that the seller or the manufacturer can make this right because I enjoyed these headphones a lot and it was an Amazon Choice product which led me to make the purchase and I want to continue to trust items that I see marked as Amazon Choice items. Up until they stopped working I was fully prepared to give them a 5-star rating based on price vs quality. I will keep you updated on my progress with the replacement or repair process and based on my experience with that I will update my review.
Awesome

these are the same quality as beats for 1/4 the cost.

For a long while I scorned Bluetooth earbuds because they were bulky and sort of ugly. A lot has changed in a few years and these are proof that the technology is getting much better.

The sound quality is great for earbuds of this price range. I was especially impressed by the crisp mid range tones. Low range isn't spectacular but you'd have to pay a lot more for that.

They're very light and hold a charge for about the advertised 8 hours of continuous use. Plenty of accessories to customize the fit, and a nice charger with a carrying case. My only real complaint is that the charging port cover is a soft rubber material that sits flush with hard plastic, making it difficult to remove with my fingernails.

***Update April 25, 2018:

My earbuds seem to have kicked the bucket. They suddenly stopped pairing with any of my music devices, even after a reset across multiple devices and the earbuds themselves. This is within the advertised one year warranty, but I have no idea how to redeem it or who to contact. They have a scant website with a product registration email, so I will see if it actually works or not.

I’ve heard good things about these but I guess they aren’t as good as people say they are. I’ve had mine for 3 weeks and now they just don’t even turn anymore. No light come on when you old the power button, and no light turns on when I connect the charger to it...

When I found that my son-n-law, who is beyond techy, purchased these, I purchased them as a gift.  My friend (also a geek) loves them.  He says the sound is great and they ae very comfortable.  Great purchase....  thanks!
Absolutely love it

For a pair of sub $40 bluetooth headphones I was really impressed. The box contained a ton of accessories from a car charger, two charging cables (longer one with an apple and micro USB cord) and a short usb --> micro usb cable, and various ear buds.

The sound on the bluetooth headset is clear and louder than a bose pair of $150 soundsports I have. They stay on and in my ear during my morning run, as long as the waterproof technology is good and it doesn't short out my headset (like the Bose product I was replacing) they'll be all good. The over the ear clips are soft and flexible, which I couldn't tell from the product description, very happy they aren't firmer plastic, they are very comfortable on the ear during a run.

I use them to listen to music at work. We also have a loud night bell going off anytime someone is in the call queue. The outside noise cancelling isn't the best i've used before, but's it's definitely solid performance. A full charge from dead takes maybe 90 minutes. A full charge on average for me last about 8-10 hours, assuming the range is just based on difference in volume and stuff. The sound quality is pretty good as well, definitely starts getting kind of muddy at really loud levels, but at the level it loses sound quality it's too loud for comfort so it's a non-issue. I'd say they are good not great, but for the price they are well worth the money. This is the first pair of wireless headphones i have used with my phone, so i don't have a good comparison for the range from the phone while staying connected. These did pass my expectations though.
I've only had them a week, but the sound is better than my Beats.  I bought them mainly for the waterproof feature.
Great product. Use it when I’m exercising.

I've owned some more expensive wireless earbuds, a lot more expensive and I find these Senso earbuds to be competitive.

Sound: Very solid and balanced. Pretty much as good as any earbuds (wired and wireless) that I've owned. I use an equalizer app on my Android phone to balance frequencies, and I didn't feel like I needed to do much correction for these ones. I dropped a little of the low/mids out and added just a touch of the highest treble for crispness, but I did the least amount of adjustment compaired any of my headphones, speakers or car. Really pretty smooth. These earbuds provide a thick low end that's really nice. A little "thumpy" but By dropping the low-mids a bit I was able to correct it.

Comfort: The fit is amazing for me. I know that we all have different sized heads and ears so there's no telling what you will experience. I'm a very tall guy with a big head and large ears. I've had problems with retention with many of my other earbuds. They slide out and wiggle around. When the become loose, I find that the bass ranges become lost and I'm always shoving the buds back in. I use mine at the gym and for running frequently, and the movement has jarred all of my other earbuds out of position. Not with these. They stay put. The "over the ear" hooks are super flexible and soft, so they don't become irritating over time. It seems they provide just enough firmness to keep the buds in place without discomfort in long term wear.

Usability: I've only used the microphone a few times, but it seems to work well. I had a conversation in a crowed gym with somebody and they told me it wasn't too bad. In quite situations they work great. They appear to hold a long charge - I've never timed it, but I've used them on and off for many hours without needed a recharge. One big suggestion. Put out an app for both phone types that displays power levels.

Durability: I'll update in the future. Too new to say. Haven't put them to the waterproof test yet.

Value: Amazing. With Prime and a special offer these were super affordable. My daughter has some very expensive Beats with a similar look. They've been great earbuds and have been super durable. Maybe they sound just a bit better. But, they were almost 5X the cost. I feel like I got a really great deal, and I won't go into some state of anxiety if I loose them. I'll just order a new set.

I bought two pair of these in September of 2017, one for me and one for my wife.  We both loved the sound quality but both of us had issues with the fit, for me, the left ear bud would always slip, the right was great.  Recently, however, the volume/skip buttons on my wife's set fell out.  They still work, she just can't change volume or song from the earbud.  Mine won't charge.  I have tried several different cords but nothing works.  The battery died and there is nothing I can do.  They were pretty reasonable but for $30ish I would like them to last a few years more.

Very good sound. Full range of charging options and a nice little carrying case. My only concern is the fit. The ear buds feel like they would fall out of the ear with a lot of movement, as the over ear piece is loose, a little large and very flexible. Good for walking but probably not vigorous exercise at the gym.

Great quality product. Love the soft silicone they used for the part that goes around your ear and the different sized ear buds are awesome giving you options. The case is sturdy and fits the item perfectly. Very pleased with the simplicity of its use as well.

I really should have made this review a long time ago. I've owned to two pairs of these, love them, and the design even got a little better from my first to second pair - the second pair has stiffer but malleable ear hooks so that they sit firmly, the first ones were more "floppy" which weren't a problem but required adjusting from time to time. I tried another kind of blue tooth headphones after my first pair broke, and they did not sound nearly as good or were as comfortable to wear, so I went back to these. I would absolutely recommend them.
This was an outstanding purchase. The company/vendor stands for high quality products and service.

They are uncomfortable, have TERRIBLE wind noise when outside, terrible muffled sound quality with very little volume control. Yes, you can change volume. However, the increments go from very quiet-quiet-right up to very loud with no good in between.
i wanted a 2-1, mp3 player as well.  ordered another
These are the best headphones!  Excellent sound quality and great battery life.  Wish I would have found this product a long time ago!
Very good quality

LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!!!!  I have purchased a total of 4 pairs of wireless ear buds both from Amazon and stores.  This was the only one that worked well enough to keep.  The ear hooks are soft and flexible but stay on perfectly without discomfort.  The car charger and usb was something I definitely find useful even having so many others around the house.  The sound is good and I only experienced interference when going into an area that I have smart devices. I won't use them very often so the higher priced ones was not a consideration so if you feel as I do these are worth it. They just work GREAT for my needs.  Highly recommend them these ear buds. I wish I had just spent the extra money from the start it would have saved a lot of time. Only thing a tad on the negative side is the size of the well made case.  It is a bit big for my purse but I don't think the earbuds would fit very well in a smaller case.  Very satisfied with my purchase.
These are superb headphones. The sound quality is awesome and so is the battery life! I liked them so much my husband bought some too. For the quality of these I would have paid double the price

Highly recommended!! I have a pair of Beats headphones and bought these as a second pair. They are pretty damn good. Sound and battery life are great. The quality of the product is about the same as Beats. They are little bigger on your ear though. Good thing about these headphones, they don’t have a controller on the wire so the wire doesn’t slide to the heavier/controller side like Beats -stretching your headphone in the ear.

These fit well and the sound is good.  I use them mostly for work.  Only thing that is different from my last $200 Bluetooth headset to this one is you have to have the remote side of the headset on the right hand side where on the $200 set you could chose.  Not that big of a deal but something to know.  also - The $200 headphone set broke twice in less than a year so I am hoping that these will last longer.

They work great..... looks like the line of sight range is around 150 feet..... gets iffy after that or if have barriers in the way... great for when you have the pad/phone in your pocket, or nearby. Are very comfortable and I have had no problems with sweat affecting them. Using them for exercise time and while driving a loud truck at work....work well in both settings.

******UPDATE****** 3 months down the road and heavy sweaty pig use and the earphones worked great, but as sometimes happens with all electronics, they ate themselves... just stopped working. Then you get to test out the customer support. Im happpy to say that I have never dealt with better support. I emailed them about the earphones and they responded quickly with the canned "reset item method" which makes us all go grr... went thru the steps to reset and still broken and I let them know via email and voila poof they responded quickly apologizing for the trouble and sent out a replacement set of earphones which I had in hand 2 days later. I will definitely be buying from this company in the future due to the good product and them backing it up.
Awesome price and awesome product. I was skeptical at first cause I usually hate ear buds like this but they're very comfortable and don't slip while exercising.

Battery Life: Very good. Lasts up to 6 - 7 hours on continuously play. I can connect it to my TV and watch movie all day.

Overall ok but I won't purchase it again.

Great headphones when they work. My original ones lasted me over a year, new ones stopped turning on or taking a charge after a couple weeks. This is after trying the newer version first which failed even sooner. Don't waste your time with these. Customer service is non existent.

So these headphones have great sound. The problem lies with the silicon earbuds and the consistency of sound being sent out. While wearing these, the first thing you will notice is that your music is extremely choppy at first, I gave it the benefit of the doubt seeing as I just booted it up, but it was persistently cutting out large portions of my music during my 40 minute walk. Another problem is that the silicon earbuds just keep loosening up so you have to keep pushing them back in, could be the weight of the earphones but the piece on top that holds onto your ear should fix that no? The piece on top of the earphones is very comfortable by the way, haven't had one as comfortable as those. Also, they are not noise isolating, while walking there was a breeze out and the air kept finding its way into the cracks the earbuds didn't seal in the ear and make constant radio static like noises. The pause button works sure, but when you resume your music, it starts at 100% volume for a second or two totally giving you a headache and destroying your eardrums, not cool. The volume up button also makes an obnoxious beep if you reach the max volume and try to raise it again, like very obnoxious beep and very loud. So at first I gave this product a 5 star rating. However through use the quality is apparent. This thing doesn't hold a charge worth a nickle.. it takes a little over an hour to charge then gets worn out after approximately 6 hours of use. I was expecting these to be just okay, but I can't get enough of them - I opt to use them whenever possible instead of using my traditional headphones! Sound is GREAT (some reviewers noted a little boost in bass but I didn't experience that - I listen to Pandora and the Music app on my iPhone 6S and I've never had an issue, If you have an issue with bass it's incredibly easy to adjust, as another reviewer pointed out.

DEFINITELY make sure you try different sizes of the earbud covers that come with the headphones - they have memory foam ones on already, but one of my ears didn't hold that in well, so I switch to the mushroom-cap-shaped ones and they're perfect and very comfortable. Pairing and button use are straightforward and easy.

Only downside is that the cord clips come off a little too easily so my cord doesn't stay clamped together to shorten it very well but that's a non-issue for me.

I have only used these twice, since I've only had them two days. I like them very much. They are easy to wear and should fit every ear size. They came fitted with the medium size ear bud cover but I had to put the small ones on to make them stay in my ear. It was easy enough to do. I spoke with my husband over the phone using them and he heard me fine without complaints, and he is very hard of hearing. I have not listened to music with them so cannot speak to sound quality in that regard. I do listen to audiobooks with them and the sound quality is fine for that. The controls are on the right ear piece. They consist of the power button, which also acts as Pause/Play button when pressed and released quickly, and the volume up and down buttons which work by holding them down until desired level is reached. The volume buttons also move forward a track or backward a track when pressed and quickly released. Syncing with my iPhone was easy as could be - done through the phone's bluetooth device search in Settings. Haven't had them long enough to be able to say any more about them but so far I am very pleased.

UPDATE: I reset the earphones to their factory settings, and since then they've worked with my phone again. I haven't tried pairing the earphones with my computer or a different device again, but at least I know how to fix the problem of spotty sound if it happens again. Original review below.

These worked great when I only had them paired with my phone. No problems with sound; range was good.

Then one day I paired them with my laptop. (The headphones specifically say they can be paired with more than one device.) All seemed to be well—until I tried to use them with my phone again. Then the sound started going in and out quickly, a couple of times per second. On my phone I deleted the pairing and re-paired the headphones, and the headphones worked again. Huzzah.

However, the next time I tried to use the headphones with my phone, the same thing happened: spotty sound until I deleted/re-paired the headphones. Now I have to re-pair the headphones with my phone *almost every time I use them*. Occasionally the spottiness will go away after about 15 seconds, but that's maybe 10% of the time. It's a huge annoyance and I wish the return window hadn't expired, because I would definitely send these back.
These are awesome

I was trying to get back into shape and wanted some decent wireless earbuds. I was looking at some different kinds and talked to my buddy about it and he said hold on, don't buy anything yet. He then told me he has bought the expensive ones and the cheap ones and they just didn't make the cut. He said they all broke from sweat. He mentioned to me these Senso ones and said he has had them over a year and they still work perfectly. This guy does intense workouts sweating up a storm so I knew they must be good. Mine just came in today and OMG. These things sound like they are BEATS headphones. Heck, they might be even better. I haven't worked out in them yet I just set them up to get ready to work out. They sound so amazing. They are so loud too. You can have the volume low and they are perfect. I can't believe how nice they are. Definitely worth the money. Instructions are super simple. They tell you exactly what to do and there's even a diagram of the layout where the power button, volume keys, charging area & light indicator are so there's no wondering where and what. There's even a troubleshoot FAQ as well and it's all in good English, not like those cheap products that have directions with sentences with words missing or misspelled. This is definitely a perfect birthday or Christmas gift. I'm tempted to buy another pair just to have a chill pair. Great job Senso! Amazing!!!!!!!! P.S. I use Spotify every day and a really cool feature once you pair this with your phone is if you want to change tracks of music or go back, you just hold down the volume up key for next track & volume down key to go back a track. I thought that was super awesome. You don't have to grab your phone to change a song. That's super nice. P.S.S. It tells you when it powers on and off. Also when the battery is low, it will start beeping. Like I said, AMAZING!!!!! FOR THE PRICE!!!!!!
