These headphones are awesome! They sound amazing and stay put when I'm running/working out. I received them as a birthday gift and I'm very happy with them!
Too big! I didn't know it was going to be this big. I wanted something a little more comfortable.

Works as advertised. I like the old ear hook design better though because these fall out of place a lot. I also wish that there was a way to see the battery on your phone instead of just waiting until that it's less than 10% and tells you it's about to die.

My bro had originally bought me a blue pair last year and I loved them. After a year and four months the left side went out so I bought these. A couple of days over a month they started having problems. Wouldn’t stay connected and the sound quality got bad. Contacted customer support and they sent me a new pair around late August. Now these are having problems holding a charge. They die around two hours after being fully charged. Maybe I just have bad luck with the red ones but I still gotta give them four stars because they so sound great, are comfortable in my ears and their support team does try to help.
These are great. I have had several pair and for some reason the the right ear bud would ALWAYS fall out. These are easy to operate and have good sound.

I got these over a year ago and they're still going strong. I've purchased more expensive versions that developed shorts or just stopped working within a few months.
They're not the most comfortable but the sound quality is equivalent to ~$100 and the battery lasts all day.

Love these headphones! Recently switched after 3 straight pairs of the q800 neckband brand and wow! What a difference. Hated the clunky neckband and tight wires. I forget these are on and i use during high intensity running and lifting. Love the pouch, i hate having to buy extra pieces to ensure product safety. Will buy again and recommend.
Horrible sound and doesn’t fit snug as it should be falls out of here very easily I would’ve asked for a refund but I forgot to do so
My husband uses these for working out and he’s loves them. They are his second pair!
Works really well, no lag or buffering. Cannot comment on battery life yet.

I loved the price point. I was so pleasantly surprised buy the very good sound quality. I’m a vocalist and an avid listener of music, Jazz, Country, Classical and Pop. So full sound is important to me. I have already recommended them to others in the market. I use them as my hands free device and I’ve not heard any complaints from anyone on the other side of the call. They are also comfortable in my ear. The iPhone ear buds are not. I Have tried other name brands and have returned them all because of poor sound and material quality. Thanks for this product. I would like just a little more bass. I will definitely make you my go to company for ear sound devices.

These are my first Bluetooth earbuds so I really can't compare to other brands, but what I can say is A) They don't fall out like wired earbuds. B) They sound terrific, with some rich bass. C) Battery life is pretty impressive. D) They're reasonably priced. If those are the only factors that really matter to you, then I say go for this product. Someone mentioned excessive wind noise while running. While this initially bothered me, I stopped noticing it after a while. These pair nicely with an Apple Watch. Enjoy!

I've struggled to find the ideal Bluetooth earphones/buds for exercise. After reading a range of reviews on the Senso I purchased these figuring that they were worth the risk for the price. The good: they fit, are comfortable, and they stay in place. That has not always been a given for me. Their construction and quality of materials is reasonable. Bluetooth connection is solid as long as the paired device is very close. Not surprisingly with distance (> 5 ft) things get a little flaky.  The sound quality is mediocre and this is probably the only drawback, and again, given the price, not surprising.  Compared to cheepo buds, it's quite good but it's too much to hope that it will compare to Bose or Klipsch or any really high quality headphones/buds.
The sound is good, the blue tooth works great, I haven’t worn them enough to commit on the long term use but. For the money there great.
These are great for around the house and casual uses but when I wear them running there's a lot of wind noise. Not good for running, for me. Wind noise is annoying & distracting.
Amazing product for the price!  Easy to use and easy to re-charge!
Noise canceling quality is excellent.
The battery life on these things is terrible! It states "4 hours" of use but nowhere near that! Great design that stays on ears but they battery life makes this a product I wouldn't buy.

TL;DR Just OK, stopped working after a month or so.

So when I got these, I was very excited because product reviews were great, it was Amazon’s Choice and all. It came in a nice package with many different things that really made it seemed worth the price. HOWEVER.

I bought these Feb. 25, 2018 and it is now April. 17, 2018 and they have stopped working.

I only used them for the Gym which was every other day. Within the time it was working, it would occasionally get static and disconnect itself. The volume buttons took a lot more pressure to work than when it first came in. And in the middle of a workout, it just shut itself off and stopped working. No indication of low battery. The red light didn’t turn on while charging so I charged for 30 minutes like the manual said, but it is still broken.

Side note, the charger that came with it. One side of the Lightning Cable stopped working shortly after purchasing it.

I essentially paid $20+ for a micro usb and half a lightning cable. Very disappointed.

Just as good as my beats that broke (ear loop) that can't be replaced - on a $200 pair of earbuds. Highly recommend!
Update: case cracked open & lost volume control pad. With a couple quick emails had a new pair in 2 days! Excellent customer service!! After using them for a couple months now - very happy with them --- 6 STARS!!!

[[ASIN:B01FVIS4TE Bluetooth 4.1 Transmitter and Receiver, Inateck 2-In-1 Wireless Bluetooth Adapter with 3.5mm Stereo Output, for Headphone, Speakers, TV, MP3 / MP4, iPod, iPhone, Tablets and More]]
Use these two items together to make any entertainment source with a 3.5 mm earphone jack totally convenient. Work, chores, and exercise are now a pleasure. I changed the ear pieces to a memory-foam type for more comfort and less extraneous noise.

sound quality is good,  but they constantly fall our of the ears if you're running.  I've adjusted the  wires, traded out earpieces,  etc.  They're just awkwardly made for running  - heavy centerpiece and flimsy rubber ear support.  They're better in the gym, without jarring movement.
Use these for work all the time. They're perfect for jamming out to heavy metal. I'd recommend these to anyone!
These headphones rival beats sound quality is great and yes they are water proof at least shower proof!!! Battery life is unbelievable.

They are sweat resistant and stay on my ears through any activity. Come with 3 different sizes of inner ear pieces. The part around your ear is like silicone and super flexible, which I think makes them fit better than being a hard plastic. Connect perfectly every time, long range, never an issue there. I wouldn't call these noise cancelling, but the sound quality is seriously amazing! They can also get super loud, too. I would highly recommend these to anyone with an active lifestyle. Whether you're deadlifting, running, hiking, or anything in between, I would highly recommend!

These headphones were easy to set up with my laptop and my iPhone. I've used them in the house and on walks (with my phone in a jacket pocket) and they are working fine. The tone sounds great and they are lightweight and comfortable.
Exceptionally Happy!

I go through wireless earbuds about twice a year.  These were good when they worked.  About 9 months of use and I had to get a replacement under warranty.  Second d set lated a little longer.  A little better longevity then other brands.  However, I still think these should things should last longer.

Absolutely love them and I only had them for a day. They sound great, the instructions were easy to understand and use, plus they fit great. The little extras included just made my day, The cable that converts from a lighting cable to a USB just made my day. They didn't have to do that but they did and I think that's just nifty. I sweat profusely, even in winter and knowing that if somehow this may cause damage, I have the piece of mind of a warranty. For the price and extra effort the company puts in to make their customers happy, I don't know how you could go wrong in trying them.
Superbe, very good sound, stays perfectly in your ears when running or when on my mountain bike. Very well pack with a lot of accessories. A real bargain for that price.
sound great for the price

So far so good! Ordered these about a month ago and decided to give them a try given that I was tired of paying upwards of $150 for bluetooth wireless headphones to use during workouts that continued to fail (yes you JLAB and BEATS) and have the worst customer service and figured why not try SENSO.

Only 4 stars at this point, as I am waiting a few more months to see how they hold up as I have read several reviews that indicate the durability isn't there and they have had them fail.....as of 1 month in with daily usage consisting of weight-lifting, running and competitive basketball training...these headphones ROCK!!!!

Good sound, they stay very secure in my ears through all aspects of training and the battery life is very impressive.

Some have complained about the soft year supports that wrap the ear - I love them...they are comfortable and do block ambient noise well...although not fully which is fine for a set of headphones being used outside.

Will check back in within a few months and update the review!

The ear wires don't have any spring -- you wrap the wire behind your ear every time, and the shape pulls out with every little tug on the wire. The housing on the side with the controls falls open continually, and after a couple of weeks, the connection failed completely so one side still sounds great but the other is dead. I've had these about a month.

Great product & Excellent customer service! Love my ActivBud S-250s and use them all the time. After an IOS update on my phone, my Activbuds wouldn't sync. I emailed customer service and they responded in LESS THAN 2 HOURS with a solution!!  That's really unheard of these days!  Honestly, I wasn't expecting a response for at least 24-hours.

*********Legitimate Purchase...paid full price and non-promotional review********

I have a friend who loves his Plantronics bluetooth earbuds which sell on Amazon for $82.00. We go to the gym together and work out together and I was asking him about how he likes them as I was struggling with my own bluetooth earbuds that kept falling out of my ears or getting caught on my shirt collar. As soon as I got home I started looking on Amazon for those and was about to purchase when I say these advertised as similar items. Being less then half the price it was worth taking the few minutes to give them a look. The style is similar but I pay a lot of attention to quality reviews and these were off the charts with 5 star ratings. Shopping with Amazon Prime means if I buy something and think it sucks I can easily return for a no hassle money back, so I decided to give it a go. And I'm very glad I did! Simply WOW!!! This is a no brainer purchase. I HIGHLY recommend giving these a shot before you shell out $80 - $200 for bluetooth buds. I can promise you won't be disappointed. Sounds is about as good as you could expect from earbuds. I've tried no less then 30 sets of earbuds over the past 5+ years and these are undeniably the best sounding for tone, range, and volume I've experienced. The fit is also extremely comfortable. The earloops are flexible silicon, not stiff like the rubber wrapped plastic hooks you'd expect, comes with 3 sizes of earbuds to fit your earhole, and a flexible, tangle free flat cable connecting left to right. The right side unit houses the multi-function button, volume +/- buttons, charging port and LED indicator. These are are waterproof with soft rubber/silicon closing over charging port.

The package comes with the earbuds, a short 12" mini USB cable, a 3' long flat lighting cable that has a dual mini USB and iPhone charging tip, car charger adapter with two ports and LED backlit, and rigid zippered carry case. You'll also find a card to register for your free 1 year warranty (takes about 15 seconds to register and ask for email, password, and Amazon Order # and 10% off coupon for a future purchase, which actually came to be a 15% coupon.

Everything about this purchase points to quality, from the packaging to the presentation to the delivery (ended up being next day even though I didn't pay for expedited shipping). I paid $35.97 with Amazon Prime

I use these headphones to run, mow the yard, and other regular activities. They give a high quality sound and are comfortable in the ear. The headphones stay in my ears during a run so that I am not having to slow down to adjust them! They have a microphone in them to make it super convenient for phone calls while I'm out walking the dog.

These were just ok. The sound is phenomenal but I had trouble getting them to stay connected to my Apple Watch Series 1. They would disconnect every 3-4 seconds so I returned them for a different style.

I have used the beats2 wireless in the past and broke both of them due to sweat damage. These have far superior sound to the beats wireless and at such a better price. I have zero complaints with these and they are better than I had hoped for

I love these headphones. I've had them since April of last year and have had pretty much no issues with them.

Recently, the left side of my headphones has become faulty and when i move the wire in a certain direction the sound cuts out. Thats likely a problem just caused by wear as with most headphones. I contacted Tekatron about the issue and since I still have a week under warranty they graciously sent me a pair of replacement headphones.

Honestly I've owned Studio Beats and other headphones here and there but these are the best headphones I've ever owned. Comfortable, good sound. I like bass in my headphones and honestly with these headphones I never really noticed a bass issue. I just recognize that its just right for what I like. Battery life is great. I've been caught in the rain and actually tested out showering with them and had no issue. I didn't just let water fall on them though. Water splashed off in small amounts onto the headphones but they were fine. I'm sure drenching them in water would be a different story.

Would definitely recommend these headphones for anyone. Affordable, great quality and a very responsive company. Replied within minutes on a Sunday. That deserves 5 stars on its own, haha.
I've bought a lot of Bluetooth headphones and these have been the best, they are awesome, great sound easy to use the accessory charging cord is a cool idea and works great for me, thanks-tim
Just received the headphones and they work great. Easy to use, easy and comfortable to wear. Definitely a keeper.
Need i even write this?? Just read one of the other 12k reviews.
The headphones are good, I enjoyed it and they are also cheap in quality
Excellent wireless headphone.
First wireless headphones and the sound quality is excellent! Highly recommend!

Amazing! I read the positive reviews and ordered. They are just as advertised. They look good and feel very comfortable. The first evening I had them I wore them for several hours without any discomfort. The sound quality is very good as well. For the price of $35.00 or so, I would have to say they are very much worth it.

Thank you Senso for making a great well made product that is very affordable.
No complaints

work well with my devices and sounds great
Love them, they work great!

Great Fit and Great Sound! Love using these while working out!

i was looking to purchase the expensive beats headphones..but i came across the Senso headphones which lool very similar.but the price was ALOT cheaper! the quality of these headphones are excellent! wish the wire was a bit longer..but i love these and im glad i saved SO MUCH money! get them .they are MORE than WORTH IT!

These are okay.  Takes forever to fit them properly over my ears.  I thought I had normal ears...maybe I don't and that's the problem!  I have to fiddle for ten minutes to get a proper fit.  "Ain't nobody got time for dat"!

I have been using these headphones for a couple of week and I am 100% satisfied. I love that they are very gentle to the ears, they don't fall off like others. The sound is clear and they can block out the noise. I am super satisfied  with this product. I will definitely order again. I am glad I didn't order the expensive ones . These headphones fit well and stay on while being active.  However, they have terrible sound quality.  It is muddy, muffled, and awful.  Have to turn the high frequencies way up on the equilizer to compensate.  But then had to fiddle with the equilizer when other output devices are used that actually work right. Cost effective, nice set of headphones. Would order again for certain.
Update, my first set was stolen, so I purchased another set, as I continue to enjoy them.
I love it. I use it everywhere.

I got these to use for both swimming and water aerobics. Whenever my ears are in the water, the earphones stop working, so they don't really work for swimming. Fine for water aerobics. I'm not brave enough to have my phone on me in a waterproof case, so my phone is on a bench next to the lane I use in the pool. They might work just fine if you have your phone in the water with you. Also the battery life is not great. However, otherwise these function very well and the sound quality is good.
Decent for the price. When I talk on the phone, the other person can hear a lot of background noise.

Great headphones.. Work as great as the really expensive ones.. Music sound is clear and works great for receiving calls in the car.
This is my second pair.. i have my first pairs for a few years and they still work. just wanted a back up pair .. They are fabulous, Sound is great. Use them everyday .

Love these Headphones. Second pair I bought. Had my first pair for almost two years until I left them in a hotel.
Sound quality is good. Battery lasts a long time, even after two years (at least on my last pair). No issues when sweating all over them during a workout. And they stay on my ears without issues.
Would order again and again. Love them.
很好用，音質不錯，性價比很高！it's easy to using, sounds good, I bought 2sets, one for me and other for my son, we both like

UPDATE: Buds fit nicely into my ears and stay in place after taking the SENSO customer support advice.

As some others have mentioned, the buds simply wouldn't stay in my ear and would just rest outside the ear canal (I tried all 3 different sizes of buds that are included). This basically deprives the sound of all bass and allows for outside sound to get in. I'd never be able to run in these as they would just fall out. The sound is great if I push them into my ear but then they just slide out. Maybe I have strange shaped ears, who knows. They seem to be working out fine for other people. UPS is picking them up tomorrow to be returned.

I was able to easily pair these with my iPhone, use the controls, and listen to a boook or music while walking and biking right away. It's easy to take a call while using them, too These are the first earbuds that have fit my ears and comfortably worked for me.
Easy to charge..love the case..LOVE THE CLARITY OF AUDIO.. I LOVE THE COLOR RED... The length of the wire was just the right length so was not to be cumbersome.
Received and synched 30 seconds out of the box. Amazed at what the headphones come with. Great value!  Registered for warranty in minutes.

Unhappy with this product I bought. Headphones worked great when I first received them. Then stopped working after 2 months. Unhappy with amazon allowing this seller to sell products that don’t work. Would not recommend.

I was, at first, very skeptical about purchasing these headphones.
When they arrived and I opened the box up I was pleasantly surprised by a few extras as well! A nifty little charge cable both for Android and iPhone, a cig lighter USB charger for the car and an awesome hard case to store things. The headphones themselves were of great quality! Not the best sound quality but not bad either. Just wouldn't recommend to an audiophile. I really love how the product has a slightly velvet like rubber around the earpiece.

These have been great. Super easy to pair, they last a long time between charges (even though i frequently forget to turn them off). Ive had some trouble with 'skipping' while im walking, so i dont know that they would work for exercising, but for my commute and at my desk, they've been great. Good range too, 30ft at least.
Great product, great price, great service!
loved these. They work, sound incredible and ccx easy to connect
I feel comfortable hearing to music while I travel. I have to test on life of this. But  yes good for the price.

I lost my Bluetooth wireless headphones last week. The pair I lost were considerably more than the Senso Bluetooth headphones so I was not expecting much.  Boy was I surprised, these things sound great.  I received the package in 2 days with no issue and had the headphones connected within minutes.  My only regret is buying the really expensive ones prior to this. These are awesome sounding and fit well. Thanks.
Pleasantly surprised! It works great!..Better than my Motorola.

Only issue I have is the ear hook is too flexible. Will not stay in place if for some reason the cord gets caught on something and pulls on it. I wear glasses and the ear hooks  have a hard time staying in place because of my glasses. I occasionally have to keep adjusting the hooks to keep it in place because of its flexibility. Finally!  Through trial and error I finally found these headphones.  Very comfortable, they stay in my ear, good seal and great sound.  That little over the ear piece is very soft and is not noticeable in use.  Used for running, elliptical, weights, floor exercise, .....  I use a small gym and leave my phone in the cubbies in the middle of the room so blue tooth distance is at least 30'.  Battery life seems excellent -- I have 8 - 10 hours on the first charge so far.  Bonus in that they come with a case, car charger, two charging cables....  These are the headphones I have been searching for.

My second pair. The first ones had speaker problems after about 9 months. They are reasonably priced and so that's not too bad. Reloaded.
Love it! Thank you!

LOVED these headphones. The sound quality is excellent, with great sounding base. The only reason I rate them as 4/5 is because the product had the wrong charging cord. The cord that was included with the product was a lightening cord, it should have been a micro USB.

I bought a second pair, anxious to see if I get the correct charging cord this time.
Awesome headset, easy to set up and use. Sounds great with great range.GOOD JOB SENSO.

I wanted to like these so bad. They seemed like such a great deal and I thought they'd be great to wear when I go for a walk.

My #1 problem with these headphones is their poor connection with my phone. When connected, I cannot place my phone in my left pocket without the audio starting to cut out. Same if I hold the phone in my left hand. The connection is only stable in my right hand or right pocket. Don't know what that's about--I'm guessing the bluetooth antenna is in the right ear?--but it's incredibly annoying, and I'm seriously thinking about returning them for this reason alone. We're not talking about the phone being 30 feet away--it's literally three feet away, in my other pocket. Very frustrating. The earbuds are fully charged and it's not my phone, which connects to a bluetooth speaker in the kitchen just fine.

Also the bass is tuned way, way too high on these out of the box. I *still* haven't gotten it turned back to normal. I hope you like 90% bass, because that's what you're getting.

The earbuds do fit comfortably in my ears and get plenty loud enough. The accessories are nice. Pairing setup was easy and they pair instantly when powered on.
I actually bought the headphones for myself. I like the style and comfort of them. It was easy to pair with my phone . I also like the sound. I would recommend.
would recommend this product
Good headphones, they fit my ears, they sound nice and they work on the shower.

Excellent sound quality, very comfortable, and when one of the earbuds started malfunctioning, customer support was very helpful (and prompt) and when it was found to be a hardware issue (wires breaking internally), shipment of a replacement pair was also prompt at arrival.
One of the best products I’ve ever purchased! I’ve had these for years now and they still work like new. Fantastic sound quality and block out all noise

Worked great for 5 weeks and it started cutting out and then it started turning off on it's own.  Would not turn back on unless I placed it to charge.  I knew the battery was charged, but it it did not seem to matter.  I emailed Invotek and they never replied.
Great product!
Does the job well, battery keeps for 3-4 30-45 minute workouts. Stays on ears pretty well. Good purchase for the price.

I wanted to write a review and say how happy I am with the headphones especially after I sent through the washer and dryer in my pants pocket and they worked perfect afterward. They drop out from time to time; however, have been consistent on quality and battery life.

Thanks
for the price I wasn't sure how this product would be but they have the best sound pound for pound I would recommend this product to everyone I know

Came fully charged and the sound is great. Just a little bit of wind comes through when you are running.  Spectacular deal though for roughly $30......headphones, short charging cable, long charging cable either a lightning jack and a car adapter, along with a carrying pouch and multiple sized earbud accessories.  I have no idea how they can sell so cheap!
Works well with my iPhone exactly as described. Sound quality is good.
Fantastic buds. Great sounds, super easy to use, stay in ears while exercising. Glad I purchased these buds!!!!!

Easy to pair.  Great sound.  I use it to connect to my smart TV.  Listening to movies is life like sound as it should be.  Amazing how it simulates my sound bar on the TV.  The price you pay is great compared to the higher priced and not very good earbuds.  This is as good or better than my Sony over the ear head phones and it was one seventh the cost.  Noise canceling feature could be better, but it also works as well as my expensive head phones do.  So far, I am very happy.  Oh yea, very comfortable fit on the ear.  Just make sure you try all the earplugs furnished so it fills right for your own ear.  Will try to update later after a couple months of use.

I'll update this if my opinion changes but so far these are great.  I purchased them to replace my damaged Powerbeats2.  I was skeptical at first  but so far I like these far better than the Powerbeats2.  The sound is louder and the ear fit is much better.

Your earbuds are fabulous!!!  I have many many headphones and headsets and these are the best I have ever bought. After trying the first set, I purchased two additional sets for my wife and son.  Everyone should buy them
Very satisfied with the sound, but my callers say there's a lot of background noise.  So I have to make sure I'm somewhere quiet to be heard well.

It's obvious why there's almost 20,000 reviews for this great product. It works as advertised, great sound, easy to pair and for a price that you can't beat. I've compared the sound quality with my $100 Bose wired earbuds with all different types of music and can't say I noticed that there's a dramatic difference between the two. If this $30 item turns out to be anywhere near as reliable as the $100 Bose then it's a no-brainer decision to purchase this item.

Beautiful headphones, easily set up. They arrived immediately. I'm delighted! The sound is just beautiful, and they stay in my ears effortlessly when I run. I can't say that about many earphones. I was looking online for a company video showing set up, but short of finding that, only reviews, I relied on the instructions. Extremely small print makes it hard to read (for all us baby boomers!), but the directions aren't complicated. The rubberized features and the angle of the earbud that fits into my ear are exactly right. Initially a friend showed me his, and so I looked for Senso on Amazon. The price, as you can see, was what sold me right away. It's the quality that hooked me.

I really enjoy these headphones because they sound and fit great. They work well while running and seem to be durable. I would definitely like to see the charge light be a little larger but besides that there is no real complaint. Plus, the extra charger/ear buds in the package were a nice added bonus.

I just got this thing, and I love it. It also includes many things that aren't even really useful for the earbuds. Im giving this a four star because as how much I love it, it was difficult to open and was confusing upon setting up. Would recommend.
These are awesome! Comfortable to wear & stay put. And the sound is excellent! Just ordered a second pair!
Product did not work, I missed the returned date.
These have great Sounds! These are so much better than the wire ones that kept splitting. I bought another set for my son and he loves them.
Easy connect, sound is great and the noise cancelling seems to be very good. Nice case to keep them protected as well.

I didn't want to break the bank for a pair of workout earbuds. I didn't want to sacrifice quality either. These did not disappoint. I just received these last week and I've had these with me at all times. Great sound and great fit for running and gym time. Music is loud and clear, and forget complaining about no bass-- these will give you more than you'll want. It can sometimes be overwhelming when listening to deep bass music. Bluetooth headset feature is great as well as I've had no complaints from all my calls and I can hear them very clearly as well. Distance from phone is pretty good as well-- I've tested about 15feet with no issues. I'm not going into too much detail anymore since there are already 20k+, 5-star ratings for these headphones. Buy these- you will be very happy you did!
Defective. One ear didn’t work.

Primarily used for workouts.  Workout 3 hours a day.  They sound great and only have to charge after every other workout.  Depending on ear canal size you may have trouble getting them to stay put.  However thet included some foam tips that work great for me.
I've bought two pair of these headphones and have recommended them to others. When I had a problem the service was excellent!
Great sound. Don't fall out when working out.

After my latest pair of Powerbeats 3 wireless earphones broke, I decided to shop around rather then spend another 150$ for beats. After shopping around, these Senso brand earphones seemed like the perfect replacement. Overall, I am happy with this pair that is 100$ cheaper but some things are lacking.
1) I really like earbuds that have the around the ear plastic piece to help secure the earbud into place all day long. Unfortunately, this Senso brand ear piece is very flimsy and cheap, they hardly make a difference. Very disappointed in that feature.
2) The actual base is almost identical to the beats, I'v very satisfied with the base and it has more options than the beats - Senso wins hands down here, Im very happy these are better with the pause/forward/rewind features on teh base itself compared to beats only having volume control.
3) Overall sound - beats do sound a bit better and bass but not 100$ better. I mainly use these for listening to music in the office and to take calls. They sound really good and I am happy with the quality of the sound and bass.
4) Call quality - All calls Ive received and made, everyone says it sounds great, no issues there and is another big deal for me. I'm very happy they sound great.

Overall, definitely worth saving the 100$ and using these. If you are worried about these things coming from a higher brand similar to the ones I was using, the cheaper price is worth it, don't let it discourage you or think these are junk because they are quite good for the value.
I waited before reviewing these! I have to say for the price they are really good..I had a really expensive pair that died on me after minimal use, these are comparable.
I love it! good quality and the sound good.
The sound quality is top notch and the comfort is unreal you don't even know your wearing a loop to secure it in place. Way better than the hard style other brands offer.

One of the best headphones I've had. Excellent sound, super comfortable and the battery lasts much longer than you expect. 100% recommended.
Excellent product!!!!

This is my 5th BT headset and the first one to actually stay connected to the phone (HTC 10) almost regardless of how I move. Every other set stutters often enough if I look around while walking that they all sit unused because that's what I bought them for. Also the included memory foam cushions are awesome.
I was sceptical but glad I bought them cause  i paid 50 dollars for a pair that last bout 3 hrs and these will and have been running 8+ hrs a day
Sound, clarity and fit are great in general but with the price paid, they are a grand slam. I'd highly recommend them!
Didn't have these long before the inner ear bud completely came off and was hanging on by the wires. Actually would get stuck in my ear. Save your money and buy something else.

Left ear stopped playing after one year of use. To be honest I'm glad to have the excuse to by a new pair. These headphones can't play at low volumes and catch the wind to easily, making an awful air blowing sound in your ears. As for the sound, the bass is way too heavy. Definitely recommend a different pair.
Me encantaron

Great wireless headphones. Excellent sound for a reasonable price. The headphones come with an attractive case with several accessories. As a number of other reviews have pointed out, a stiffer earpiece would be an improvement. Would buy again.

I delayed upgrading to my iPhone 7 - partially because I thought I'd also have to buy a pair of $200 Apple Beats wireless headphones and I just didn't think I wanted to own a pair of $200 headphones - it seams excessive (owning a $750 smartphone is hard enough - but that's another story). But I upgraded anyway hoping something would work out.

As a long trail runner I need headphones that clip on my ear, are comfortable, and won't easily snag on trees. When I saw these SENSO headphone on Amazon - along with the high Amazon review rankings - the design (and the price) looked great so I thought I give it them a try. These. Are. Amazing. Great sound. Great battery life. Great connection with my iphone. And great call / mic quality. Why would anyone buy the Apple version at 4 times the price when they could own these?

Just ordered my second set - after 1 year of hard use I damaged something and now hear alot of static. But it was my fault.
Very easy to use with a very nice sound.
The sound quality is fine, but they just don’t stay in my ears well.
Love these!  So nice to not have wires hanging all over the place.
Amazing Headphones

I have a love hate relationship with headphones. I’m a long distance runner and love listening to Audible while running. Headphones don’t fit in my ears, and despite minimal wear and tear, fall apart too fast. I have had these for over half a year. They have been great. I’ve also had business calls while on my runs, and the clarity and ease of use is perfect. THEN, my button got jammed. I don’t know why. It was fine one day and not fine the next. I contacted Senso through their website figuring I’d get some lame response a week later. Instead, they got back to me within the hour with a really well written email asking for my Amazon order number. They confirmed my address and have a new pair on the way to me since it’s under warranty. This has to be one of the best customer service I have ever received. I will be a Senso headphone wearer for life.

Love these buds. Bought a second pair for my wife and she loves them too.
Comfortable with good sound and the best of all is the price.
If they had been magnetic and announced battery life they would be perfect

These Bluetooth headphones were great when I got them in Feb. But two months later (today) and using them the same way I always use them (for running) they just died. I thought first they were just out of charge, but I had just taken them off the charger this morning. I put them on the charger when I got home and no light came on and I tried switching the outlet and nothing worked. I'm outside the return window, but I'm not recommending these headphones because two months lifespan isn't worth the purchase price!

The ear pieces are not able to mold to the back of your ears; the buds simply stay in place by putting them directly into your ear hole. Sound is good, connection is good, no issues except I wish you could mold them to hold in place behind the ear.

If you stay absolutely still the sound quality could be okay. I specifically bought these headphones for the gym. I can be doing deadlifts, barely moving and there will be annoyingly poor lapses in sound quality. That is when my phone is 5 feet away. If you are 10+ feet away from the device you are connecting to, the sound quality will be absolute trash. AVOID.
I love them!! Very satisfied!

So far so good. I haven't had any of the problems with these headphones like I have with ones before- the battery is lasting, it does not cut in and out of connection with my phone, and I haven't had complaints about it not picking up my voice during calls. It fits securely in my ear though the wrap-around rubbery part is a little awkward to get adjusted at first. So far these have met the criteria I was hoping for!

Purchased these for active wear and they work pretty well.  They come with a pair of foam ear tips which you can compress a little when putting them on--kind of like foam earplugs.  These are nice, but they also have the standard s/m/l rubber ear tips like just about all other earbuds come with if you like those.  The ear clip/loops are OK, they are not at all stiff so you cant really adjust them to hold the earbuds in place; however, they do keep the earbuds from falling all the way out.
Great Product!

I JUST bought these and am not very happy with them at all...first, the fit is just terrible..I have small ears and am using the smallest ear pieces they offer and they still just fall out constantly..but the most irritating thing? They do NOT connect well to my iMac! I have to repeatedly go through the connection process every day to make them actually work..once the sound actually flips over to them, they're fine and they'll stay connected all day, but I shouldn't have to make the attempt at connection over and over again!

Update: I have discovered a workaround for the connection process..I think there's a glitch in the process of powering on and the auto connect? So I have to let it go through that, and then manually, via my computer, disconnect it and connect.. Then it's fine.. Still overall not satisfied with that, or the ear fit..
Stopped working after about 2 months of use

I bought these to replace some uncomfortable sports earbuds.  I wasn't disappointed.  The price was good.  The features are great and they're plenty comfortable.  The cables and car adapter are a great bonus.  I've only had them a week, but so far I'm impressed.
Love them for the money
Excelent trust 100%

Awesome! Very happy. My old Motorola headphones quit charging after about 8 years. I bought new Motorola headphones and they sucked. The senso headphones sound great out of the box. The bass is there, treble is there. I can't wait to get to the gym and zone out.

Just loved these headphones...for a while. I clean pools all day so I love to have my music with me and hear when someone calls. I just received them and only had the opportunity to wear them once. So far so good!
Awesome earbuds- stays on your ears and the sound is wonderful. Easy to charge. Great product for a great price. And waterproof too!
Incredible product for its price point.  I was impresssed to the point that I went back on amazon to verify what I paid for them. I was expecting that I clicked the wrong ones and got $80-$100 ones
They sound fine and they sync with my Samsung galaxy without any problems, but I have normal adult human ears and they won't stay on my head.
Very impressed with sound.  I bought a second pair for my daughter.

I am pleased with these headphones. I will tell you the first set I received I sent back since they would not charge. HOWEVER, the tech support was great, handled the issue right away and I received the second set the next day. I used these with my computer and with my phone.The charge lasted longer than a previous set of headphones I had (from a different manufacturer). and the pairing was simple. Glad I took the chance on a second set.
I use these when I workout or mowing the yard. Work perfect for me!

I use the headphones primarily for running and they have served me very well (over 10 months).  A great product.  Also, they stand behind this product.  I had an issue and after I wrote them an email.  It was fully resolved within 48 hours!
The base... just wow. It has a really strong and clear base sound. All other frequencies are good as well but the base is astonishing.
Great product.,,

I've only used these a couple times so far, but I know I'll like them more and more each day! They're comfortable, sound GREAT, and way worth the price. I read reviews on here for a month trying to decide whether or not to purchase them, but I vote YES because I finally found a pair of quality bluetooth headphones that connect automatically, don't move around when I run, and simply sound great. Buy these like the thousands of others say!
So far, good. Phone calls are clear on both sides. I purchased a similar pair (hippox) that failed after one charge. If I have any problems, I will contact you. Thanks

I got these for exercise, but use them around the house as well because they're comfortable and work very well. The wire actually works to keep the ends together whereas the separate headphones they replaced had two tiny parts that fit in your ears and a much larger case to keep them in. Battery life is great. I've run them dry a couple times (it gives you one warning a few minutes before they die) and I can't say it happens easily. They do make a fair amount of wind noise as they stick a fair amount out the sides of your head at the front, see picture. I needed the smallest set of rubber ear inserts for them to work properly, if you aren't getting any bass response try changing those inserts out with the others supplied.
Works great but a little too bulky under a helmet.

These are just awesome! Now if I can just keep crazy Bob the cat from dragging them out of my purse and eating them . . .
But seriously, they stay in your ears, great sound, easy to use, can answer calls and hear caller and they can hear you just fine! I love them! Buying a second pair just in case!

Work well.  Very secure.  Unsure of noise cancellation- can't really tell.  Others are right that there is little to no warning that the battery is low, so its on you to keep them charged!  These are my first wireless set, so difficult to compare.
Worked good for 13 months, now they won't hold a charge at all.

Wouldn't recommend these if they were free!! Don't waste your money. I use them while mowing the lawn and it like I'm back in high school with a CD player in my pocket cuz it skips so much and beeps then skips again terrible!!!
Better product for gym people...its water proof and very good sound quality

I purchased these headphones in April after my other headphones quit working.  They worked great for about 2 months until they simple stopped working.  They were not damaged or anything.  I used them for workouts in the gym and for runs.  I cant get them to charge or turn on.  I have tried everything.  Would have given this product a must higher rating if they had lasted longer then a few months.
Great Seller! Love these Blue-tooth enabled headphones for my home office (answering calls hands free from my cell) and listening to music while I work out. Lightweight. Great sound quality!
Best fit!  Incredible sound!  Easy to use!  No complaints!  Would order more or recommend to anyone!!!

+ Easy to turn on. Easy to pair to IPhone.

- For some reason, I do not seem to get them to stay all the way inside the ear. As the headphone moves out the quality of the base suffers. You end up with a lot of treble, little base. I'll give them more time to get use to them.

I bought them for jogging, but now use them for everything. They stay in my ear perfectly, and are very easy to use. Sound quality is very decent, but when the wind is blowing, it seems like they magnify the sound of the wind, forcing me to increase the volume quite a bit.
Work great, fast shipping, and at a great price.
They work well and sound great and are very comfortable to wear

I love these! Great sound, easy to use, and they stay put! I can leave my phone in my gym bag and be on the others side of the gym and still get crystal clear sound. Great find and great buy! Money well spent!
These are Awesome! Great deal. I would have paid double if I know all they do and how well they work.
These headphones are amazing, I have some boses noise cancelation , these sound every bit as good, I bought a pair for me and my two children, for the price , you can't beat it.
I love it when a person answers the phone and give me an clear and simple answer to correct the issues.

Been using these on my runs for a couple of years now. I have odd-shaped ears that won’t hold in-ear buds, like Apple’s, so I really appreciate the over-the-ear hooks. Never had a problem with them connecting to or maintaining the connection to my phone. The button controls are conveniently located above the right ear. Battery life is good for about three runs before needing to recharge. My only complaint would be, when there is a headwind, there is so much wind noise that gets into my ears. I guess it’s just my weird ears, but the silicone tips don’t seat well enough to block out the wind.
I absolutely love my headphones.
These headphones were great, but stopped working. I bought them only about 6 months ago, which is why I give this product two stars.

UPDATE: These do have a really stupid feature where if you double tap the "multipurpose button" then it calls the most recent person you called. This just happened to me today and my headphones butt dialed my best friend 41 times... (if you don't typically put them in your pocket then it shouldn't be a problem) also those 41 calls drained my phone's battery pretty good.
OTHER THAN THIS SILLY FEATURE, If you're looking to buy bluetooth earbuds, these are what you want. Perfect low end, perfect mids, perfect highs. It's got a microphone, it's water resistant, they don't fall out of your ears. Amazing, i'm super impressed. However, the buds themselves fit just fine into my ears, and the rubber bits that go around your ears don't come off. That's the only downside for me, but otherwise, 10/10, would buy again.

I couldn't be happier with this purchase. The product works exactly as advertised. The minimalist look and feel is augmented by a powerful set of speakers that features a sterling sound. Set up is quick and easy, and the accessories alone are worth the price of admission.
If you're looking for a GREAT set of wireless Bluetooth headphones, buy SENSO.

Horrible for running -- the wind (even on a windless day) noise created while running (don't bother trying these on a bike) is unbearable.  Totally drowns out the music.  I've tried different size ear pieces - no affect.  Fine for walking or working out in gym or alike.
Cheap, you get what you pay for unfortunately, they broke after a year.
Love these. Fit great and have all around great sound. Wireless is so nics

I was surprised to find that the silicon ear hooks are ONLY made of silicon, very floppy and loose.  I expected them to be useless compared to the older earbuds I had with a wire-like, form-able ear hook, because on those I could pinch the hook to fit my ear and they held nicely.  But, I was also surprised to find that once I put the correct size ear piece on these, they stayed in place very well.  The floppy silicon hook offers just enough stability, I guess, to make it work, and no more pinched ears!  The true test will be after a few miles of running, which I've not done, yet, but initial trials seem to say these will work just fine.  Oh, and sound?  They sound great for the price!
Very clear! Charges fast!
I am madly in love with these headphones. I have probably owned more than 20 sets of headphones and these take the cake. Incredible rich intoxicating sound quality and comfort like weightless velvet.
This is my second set of Bluetooth earbuds, and they perform perfectly.  The package (headphones, 2 charger cables, case, adaptor, etc) is top notch.  Great sound quality, and comfortable.
Good product but don't fit my ear well. Returning.
Love the sound and time on . Great while mowing the lawn.

I really like the them they work great!

too bad they break so easily. 2 pairs and one is dead. The other? Well, it's been over a month and they are still working. We'll see!

Got these headphones a couple of weeks ago. I was dissappointed because they are not as good as my previous pair. I tried these ones thinking they would fit my ears better. They fit my ears better, but they are not as great. They start to halt everytime I go into another room (very near and sometimes only separated by a door). And the range is not as far as what they stated. My previous ones won't have any such problem. It is a bother to return them but I wish I just ordered my old headphones.
Bought this for my wife.  She loves it.  She can do so many things now and can listen to her music or anything.

Even for its low price, this product is not worth the purchase. The sound quality is horrible and the buds will not stay in your ear if you plan on walking, running, or jumping. Please do not waste your time with purchasing and immediately returning this product like I did.

Awesome headphones! Didn't expect such good quality for the price. I hope it lasts a long time.

Recommend it!
I was skeptical at first because I have very small ears and most of these headphones don't fit. Not only do they fit but they stay secure in place with amazing sound quality. I highly recommend
I just got them 2 days ago and so far so good! They are easy to connect and use, they do cancel the outside noise!
This device is Great and the price was a good one to boot, thanks.  (sure wished it had a longer range though)

Simply the BEST bluetooth headphones I've ever worn!  Had previously owned a Jabra bluetooth headset, but had a few issues with them and they were NOT very loud. Then bought a set of Dre PowerBeats 3 to replace them, but those damn things would not pair to my Sandisk MP3 player, and neither the Apple geeks or PowerBeats Technical Support could wrap their heads around the issues, so I returned them and bought these. These are incredible! The feel great, they stay in place when I'm moving around, and they rock the sound! Why spend $150 for Dre's when these are less than a third of the price, pairs with everything bluetooth, and has the same or better sound quality as the Dre's? DON'T!

Loses connection too often, even when the phone is in my pocket or on the seat/table right in front of me.
Good battery life though.

When i found out these were the same as the beats (which is over rated crap as far as im concerned), Literally a different molded switch cover, over the identical electronics, same earpieces, cord and everything else for way less than the cost of "look, ive got money cause i wear beats" I had to try them, so i did. And im glad i did too! They do everything that i ask of them. They can (for me) be worn for hours and hours with no discomfort whatsoever. Loud enough, and crystal clear, no matter my activity. I can heartily recommend these to anyone.
Good

Fit  is very comfortable for extended links of time. Sound has good clarity in both upper and lower frequencies. These just do the intentended job very well. What I like most about them as it's almost like you are not wearing them at all, you get so used to them !

I purchased these earbuds a few months ago because I need a new pair of running earbuds. These were the first Bluetooth earbuds I have ever bought and I spent a great deal of time evaluating other products before choosing these ones. However, I must say that I was extremely disappointed with them. The sound quality is good, but there is way too much base in my opinion. In addition to this, the claim that these earbuds have "noise cancellation" abilities is completely false. I can have these earbuds in and still hear others around me. This may be attributed to the fact that they are way too big. The only support for these earbuds is a thing that hooks onto your ear, but the hook only comes in one size and is way too big. Because of this, there have been times when I've been running, and they just fall off. One of the only redeeming qualities is that the battery life is excellent. I can use these earbuds for hours without charging them. All in all, you can probably get a better pair of wireless earbuds for the price.
best headphones I've ever had, sound quality is awesome, very comfortable in the ear and love the feature when a call comes in tells u the number, highly recommend this product!

these seem like nice headphones except they stink for I needed them for. These are easy to use synk to Blue Tooth, sound good, comfortable, look nice and come with nice accessories. BUT - I purchased these to wear while I'm out bike riding and all I can hear is the wind slamming up against the flat leading edge. It's seriously loud and makes listening to them just awful. I'll be returning to my old cheap wired earbuds while biking and maybe use these for listening while indoors with no chance of wind.

First time using them at the gym. (Received on 6/13/19). I got these because like many of other reviewers , my Powerbeats 3 stopped working only after only 8 months. I sweat a lot When I am at the gym so I needed something that would actually be sweatproof and not just claim to be. I must say I like these a lot so far. Pretty similar to the beats but ofc not identical. I did however experience some static interference at the gym ( the kind you encounter when you are too far from your phone and connected to the earphones ) even though my phone was right next to me. I’m hoping it was just a glitch and won’t happen again but we will see. So far for the price point I can’t complain.

The Senso's provide an interesting set of accessories, and are clearly liked by a wide array of people. But ... are they the best option out there? In my video reviews and written reviews I compare the Senso's to several other pairs of budget Bluetooth headphones including the Zeus Outdoor.

Overall I have found them to be suitable pair of headphones of headphones for the average user. Bass is heavy, while clarity (particularly in relation to spoken word), is lacking. Features, including Bluetooth range, isolation, and build are very typical for headphones found in this category. They don't offer the customization and premium feel of the Jaybird X3's (which I have also reviewed), but they do provide a viable option for someone seeking a Powerbeats like option without the associated cost.

I have to admit I was very surprised by these. The goal was to find a cheap, workable set of wireless earbuds for when I'm working in the garage. I was not looking for the best sound, the best features, just cheap and plays from my phone (Note 5). I searched through reviews and landed on these and they had a lot of reviews and weren't expensive, so they went into the cart on the "whatever go for it" idea. They came in a very nice box with a case, different ear-bud fittings, a charging cable, a car adapter, and decent instructions (not great, but good enough to get going). So far, they've been awesome. They run for hours (at least 5-6, I'm not usually wearing them for longer and I put them on the charger each time I'm done so I don't know if they last for longer). The sound is good. They aren't top-notch headphones so don't go in expecting mind-blowing sound, but they work for workouts and labor and such. Durable? Well, I've certainly put the pair I have through hell, and they still work, still function fully, every time. I've dropped them repeatedly, stepped on them, hit them with things, sprayed all kinds of chemicals on them, sweat sweat sweat, had the cable get caught on tools for (short) hits, etc, and they're still on my workbench. I've only used them for calls a half-dozen times or so, but I didn't get any complaints from the people I was talking to and they sounded fine.

Cons? Well, when they DO run out of juice, they let you know with repeated voice-warnings like every 60 seconds, which can suck when you're in a tight spot and can't get them off or pause them right away. They're not always intuitive to orient correctly (left from right) even though the buttons are only on the right. Also, because the cable is flat, if you put the cable behind your neck and you sweat, it can grab and yank on them when you move your head around. Depending on what I'm doing I usually have the cable in front so that doesn't happen.

Only con I really don't like (and the main reason for 4 stars) is whenever you do something like use one of the buttons to adjust the volume or change the track, it acknowledges with a loud tonal beep. It's not like too-loud but it can get annoying, especially if you're jumping through song a lot.

So all in all I'm very happy with my purchase and may even grab a second pair just to have.

Paired these up with my iPhone 6s and iPad Air 2, with no trouble. The fit was perfect and they feel secure. I am traveling to a very wet region and the IPX7 will come in handy. The volume can go considerably higher than my Plantronics headset which I like because I'll be able to hear my media on the plane where noise is always an issue with me. I tried a couple of phone calls and the clarity was good in both directions. Another clear advantage for me is that I won't have to lug my large headset with me. The buds come with a really nice compact zipper eggshell case so I can slip them in my pants, or jacket pockets. It came with 3 different sized ear cups (S,M, and L). These "eartips" are soft and comfortable. They come with a dual USB cigarette lighter adapter and cables. I saw where somebody had complained that no wall charger was included. Really? If I knew who to send them to, I've got a drawer full of micro-USB chargers that I'd be glad to turn loose of. Whether, or not, these are super HiFi is not a question I could not answer, being in my 60s and an old Rock & Roller. The cable is tangle free, as advertised. I don't jog, or play running sports so I can't attest to how they ride (and I don't intend to wear them when I swim...).
I highly recommend these and certainly would to a friend.
what a great product, I bought my second pair as a gift. I use mine at the gem and jogging, they work great and comfortable too.

UPDATE:
9 Months after I purchased these headphones, they broke. The section connecting the earpiece to the rest of the ear set broke. Now I have to push them back together before using. After a few uses it comes out again and I have to push it back in again.

OLD REVIEW:

Overall this brand has lost quality over time.

SHORT REVIEW:
-Bluetooth connection spotty
-Adjustable over earpiece is a mess
-Microphone overall terrible, and unusable if any noise is present
-Sound quality and battery life is decent

MORE DETAILED REVIEW:
I had a pair that lasted 3 years, set in place over the earpiece, and good Bluetooth connection (sometimes I would leave the room and return with the connection still intact). The microphone was not great so I would use it mainly inside, but the overall sound quality was decent enough that it made the headphones decent to use. One day one ear stopped working, so I decided to get a new pair.

Bought this pair and have had them for 8 months now. When I got them I immediately noticed 'adjustable' over earpiece was a mess, I have to adjust it pretty much every time it goes over my ear. The Bluetooth connection also isn't very great. Sometimes I turn my head with my phone in my pocket and the sound cuts in and out. This happens often, especially when I'm walking on the street. I have to press down more than once sometimes to get it to turn on as well.

I still use the headphones but am seriously looking for a better quality option. If you need quick cheaper headphones this might be good but, but definitely not a long term solution.

Very happy with this purchase.

The problem was it failed within a year - it appeared be the power switch is defective since it wouldn't power on even though  led light indicated fully charged.  Senso support did send a replacement as it was under warranty, however, that unit failed in even shorter period of time - 6 months.  I guess I shouldn't expect them to last for the price.
