These are excellent for use in the gym, cycling, on the track, etc. For the price point (~$30) I don't know why anyone purchases anything else for 5-7 times more. I've paired with my iPhone 6 and iWatch series 3 to listen to iTunes workout playlists. Once I figured out pairing and how it can get corrupted (with any bluetooth product), any frustration I had with them has gone away. They come in Apple-style packaging with multiple size earbuds, carrying case and charger, plus dual car charge adapter - great standard accessories! Not only that, the company is quick to respond with tips/helps if you have any issues with connection, etc. The only other thing I've wanted changed is the ability to set EQ from the watch since it is a bit heavy on the bass side - no fault of the ear-buds as I was able to adjust EQ on the iPhone and they responded just fine. Again, great product!!

First, BUYER BEWARE -- these puppies aren't $170 bluetooth earphones. Direct from Senso's website, sensoshop.com, they're listed as $49.97. Clicking the 'Purchase On Amazon' button takes you this listing. I think a $120 discrepancy in it's product listing is almost criminal. It's makes you think 'WOW, SUCH A GOOD DEAL! 80% OFF!!' -- not so much.

Now, for what you DO get, $37 ain't too shabby -- carrying case, 3 sets of different sized eartips, two different length charging cables (micro USB and Lightning!) and a car charing lighter plugin unit thingy which has a 2.1A and 1.0A USB slots. The headphones themselves we're SUPER easy to pair up to my iPhone and in less than 5 minutes I had music playing and the controls figured out.

My only other complaint beyond pretending they're regularly $170, is that they don't fit quite right in my ears. When playing I can tell they should sound GREAT, but I have to shove them deep into my ear and rotate them around a bit to hear it completely. I tried all three size eartips with the small being the best fit, but, still wasn't perfect. Not the manufacturer's fault, but I've had a ton of 'in-ear' earbuds and these, so far, have been the worst fitting. Maybe it's my ears. Aside from the ear canal fit, they absolute will stay on your head. I gave them an intense shake/headbang/thrash around test and they stayed on perfectly; no slippage.

I think they're claim of 'up to' 30 feet of bluetooth connectivity range is a wee bit inflated, however. I left my iPhone in a room and went into the next room at a distance of 20 ft and the signal started to cut out. However, I can't see where I would be listening to these and not carrying my phone with me, so it's not really an issue. Might be for some if you intend to leave your phone on a charger or something and working around the house. Not gonna happen.

I bought them specifically for the gym, so I'll update my review after a few workouts and see how it handles the sweat and wear. Overall, PROS: they sound pretty good, every easy to use, quick to connect to my device. CONS: These aren't $170 worth of tech, eartips don't quite fit right (for me).

The ear loop is a little big and not adjustable  (I consider myself to have a fairly standard head-size!).  Can't really recommend.

I purchased these headphones a few months back because I was looking for something that was great quality but not at an astronomically high price point. These headphones are just that. I was, however, upset when I discovered one of the earbuds going in and out, as if there was a small short in the wiring. You may ask why I give this five stars - I contacted the seller and mentioned my issue. They walked me through a reset of the headphones and then, when that did not work, shipped me a new pair free of charge. Truly wonderful customer service in my honest opinion. Great quality, great price, and even better customer service!
Great product.  Goods are as advertised. I would buy again.

These earbuds work well for me. The shape of the earbud seems a little weird and isn't the shape of my ear but the hook helps it stay in place. I get at least 8 hours of operation on a full charge which is almost double the time of my previous set.
Excellent headphones work great with my phone for calls
Great value!
Working like a charm for now, thank you.!

I wanted to be able to listen to audiobooks in the shower, so I got an IPX7 headset. Works well for what I got it for.
EDIT: I have been informed that IPX7 does NOT cover extended submersion or continuous water discharged under pressure. I have no problems with voiding my warranty, so I'll keep using them, and see how they hold up.

I was sceptical at first because other wireless headphones I looked at were at least $60 and above. I read the reviews on amazon and I can honestly say that these are well worth the money. They sound awesome. Good bass and treble. They do not hurt my ears as others have in the past. I use them while lifting weights and running they stay put the whole time. Would definitely buy again.
Be sure to read the instructions because it clearly says not to leave the headphones charging for too long or else the batter life will be damaged.  Ask me how I know this!  Otherwise they work fine.

These headphones work great. They sync perfectly with my iPod and I haven't had any issue. I love to run and these made my run a lot better because I don't have to worry about that cord getting tangled while I'm working out.

They are as advertised. Very loud and clear, waterproof (I sweat a LOT), and it comes with lots of accessories.

Just as important is the customer service. The volume toggle button on mine broke a couple weeks after arriving and they are replacing them free of charge! Thanks!
Product works well and does not hurt ears.  Connection was simple.
I may have gotten a bad pair but they would constantly disconnect as I rode my bike, I returned the product after two days of trying to get it to function without cutting off.
Great purchase!
Loved all the bonuses that came with the earbuds. Nice packaging. Really good for the price.
Product was received on time.  The headphones fit great and the sound is excellent.  They make my runs much more enjoyable.

These wireless headphones are absolutely phenomenal.  You can't beat the sound for the price and they last through any activity I need them to, even when I'm dripping in sweat. This is the second pair I've gotten and make sure to tell all of my friends that the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones are where it's at.
Very happy with this product. They work great.
These are great! I have been very please with quality and sound! Delivered promptly  I would order again as a gift!
Love these things! Super comfy and no sound glitching. Used them for a mtb race and definitely worth it.
Love em. Quite comfortable and make my workouts and walks more enjoyable without being tethered to my phone.
Most ear buds don't fit in my small ear but these came with a few different sizes and the tiny ones are just the right size! So excited to go running with some tunes
I was looking for Bluetooth headphones solely for the gym and didn't want to spend a ton of $$$. These work perfectly and the price is perfect.
best bang for your buck out there
These are remarkable ear buds. The sound quality is superb and they are the most comfortable ear buds imaginable. And, the current price is incredibly low for the quality.

I purchased these as a gift and am completely impressed with not only the product quality but the packaging as well. It came with a fantastic semi-hard case that stores all accessories and headphones as well. I bought these while on a "Deal of the Day" and got a great price. When my beau opened his gift and tried them on, he said they were very comfortable and was excited to use them. I would totally purchase these again and hope this purchase lasts for a few years.

Love these headphones, they stay charged for about 7-8 hours and fit great since they provide 3 different sized ear bud attachments. I like to watch my tablet while cleaning my house and I am able to walk away from it to mop the entire house without loosing any sound quality.
This is exactly what I want when I am in GYM.
Amazing sound quality, good battery life, and they truly honor your 1 year warranty for any defects. Best part is that they actually stay in my ear!

I've had these headphones for about a month now and I absolutely love them. The sound quality is good for what it is, but the volume is impressive. I usually have headphones on max volume and I dont have to with these. I go to the gym and workout so they stay on great. The carrying case is an awesome addition so I can throw them in my bag on the go. There are multiple ear bud selections that are the regular plastic and foam. Battery life is pretty typical depending on how you use them.
Wouldn’t stay in my ears.
Love these headphones!! Work so good!
Headphones were for my daughter.  They did not fit & she sent them back.
Received Bluetooth earbuds with missing parts including spare eartips and wire tie clip, clearly a returned/re-packaged item.

I ordered a pair of these because my wife has a set and they’re great. However, the ones I got did NOT come with flexible silicone backings, by hard plastic. Ordered not just because of good sound but a comfortable fit, which is not the case with these.

If you have sensitive ears, not worth your money.
They are everything I hoped they would be. Only had them a short time but I've really enjoying them!!!
Very good quality and sound, only last for 6 months
This product stopped working after 5 months!!!!!!!

I was very unsure about these do to the price.  If you are in sure or debating to get these do wait.  These are great headphones.  You don't have a wire running to your device to get caught up.  These sound great with all kinds of music and stay in my ear while I'm running and working out.  They come with a few different size ear pieces so you can get the best fit for your ears.  The case that comes with these carbon fiber style crush proof case to protect your investment.  I highly recommend these to anyone that is serious about good quality headphones.  These come from a small company that takes there customer satisfaction very seriously and put their customers first, which is getting harder and harder to find companies that are like this any more.  I will be buying a spare set as well as sets for my wife and daughter.  Great product.

I work as a stock clerk at a large grocery store. Before the customers arrive we can wear headphones, but working with your hands a lot and moving was a real problem for wired headphones. I had a pair of Beats, but didn't care much for the sound quality. They seem kinda designed to deliver very bassey music. I thought I would try this brand. They are much crisper and more clear. The sound is awesome and the battery life last through my eight hour shift. The price is great and the quality even better.
I use it to shower and run and works fine. Ocasionally it disconnects and reconnects, but it works after a restart or two which can be annoying
Very happy with these! Great sound!

I don't normally use ear buds I prefer headphones, but I am very pleased with the quality and hearing it's from a smaller business and they very much care for it's customers is amazing to hear I do recommend these. The battery is very long lived the charging takes almost no time and it's compatible with almost all my devices sound is decent volume.

The sound quality of these headphones is excellent given the price. Included with the headphones is a neat little pouch that holds the headphones, multiple ear plug replacements in different sizes, and a charging cord. Additionally there is an AC adapter with a 3' cable with multiple ends to charge different devices. The headphones stay in place even with vigorous activity. I have not tried them out with a lot of sweating, so we'll see how they hold up. So far, I think it was an excellent purchase!
Left Channel had half of the volume the right channel did. I thought I was losing my hearing until I downloaded an app and tested them on my brother without him knowing what was wrong.
Sound very good, delivered on time, they tel you the number calling. Battery life is very good. Worth every penny.
In less than 6 months one of the headphone stop working. that very disappointing for a product that is so expensive.
Great while it lasted; died after 8 months.
great sound
My wife did not like the kind that wrap around the ear but sound is nice and comfortable only returning the one

When I first got the item it worked efficiently. But, over use and just 3-weeks the product then stopped connecting to my iPhone and ultimately stopped turning on all together. I took adequate care of these headphones, however, in little time, the item completely stopped working. For the time I had it working, I would give these headphones 4-stars. In terms of how long it worked for, and the other problems I had, it warranted a 2-star review.

WOULD NEVER BUY THESE AGAIN.

I bought these headphones maybe 2 weeks ago and already one of the earbuds does not sound properly anymore. I don’t even use these headphones that often, just for the gym. I bought these because the reviews said these headphones were good but only after TWO WEEKS and already it’s broken.
These are even better than I expected. The quality and sound  is really good.
Can not believe how good the sound is. Easy to use too. Can't be beat for the money that is for sure.
Great product and price was outstanding. Very fast delivery
The item looks good, sounds good, but it only lasted a month and 21 days then it died. It is not charging anymore.
They broke apart. Very dissapointed. Would like a replacement.
Pretty good, got them on a flash sale so they were cheap and they are perfect for when you are charging your iPhone and don’t have that earphone jack
Stopped working after a few weeks, don’t buy these.

I’m sad to report that I’m extremely disappointed in this purchase. It didn’t start out that way, i was actually very pleased in the beginning. So pleased, in fact i purchased a second pair for my boyfriend. Not long after my headphones completely died on me, even when i followed instructions and did a factory reset. Luckily it was covered under a one time replacement warranty, but then this pair crapped out on me, and to top it off so did my boyfriends pair AND his replacement pair. It’s on sale now, but originally i purchased these for $36 a pair. I’m extremely disappointed and feel like i got screwed. Like how could 4 pair of headphones just stop working out of no where? And right in the middle of a workout no less. Don’t chance it. Buy another brand.

Pros: Great sound, comfortable over the ear, easy connecting to my devices, the buttons for volume and such were easy to work with.
Cons: I put the smallest earbud on but it never fit in my right ear well. Left ear was great. (apparently my ears don't match! Who knew??) , when making phone calls, the person on the other end heard an echo.

I really liked the earbuds and contacted them when I was having issues with an echo. They responded with a possible solution right away. The solution didn't work. I did try to contact them again, but no response so I have decided to return them. The sound on my end was great! Just wish it wasn't so annoying for the friend I was talking to.
sound is loud and clear and they're quite comfortable.
Very good sound quality and price.

Bought these on Prime Day for $20 and was almost sorry when the Ankers went up just after, Don't think they could be much better. Excellent sound/clarity/separation. Bass could be louder but is more than adequate. I found the earplug that came installed was very comfortable. Hardly noticed I'm wearing them. It's like the songs I hear in my head but louder!  Nice case too! Highly recommend

No idea where they came from. I own several BT headphones. Senso runs circles around them. The only downside is the sometimes shaky BT connection while walking or running. But the sound is outstanding for a slim footprint very comfortable set of headphones. Only once better I own r my bose noise cancelling wired. I was wearing the senso yesterday for about 5 hrs with no pain on my ears. The battery did not drain more than 50% with music playing. Impressive job.
Great for listneing to podcasts. Mic picks up all surrounding sound and limits calls to quieter areas. Works fine for me at this price.
Gets connected disconnected several times if I m walking and phone is on hand, range not more than 15 ft.
These are awesome!!!! I love how easy they are to use. It doesn't slide off your ear when your working out. And they can get pretty loud. Great to use while driving.
Sounds amazing
Good sound
Nice product/value.
Good buy for a pair of headset. Decent sound quality. These only lastest a year to me and then the cable broke internally, so I only could hear one speaker

When I bought these, I thought it only came with the headset. Not only do I have a headset that has clear, loud sound, but I get a case, car charger, two wires, and extra ear pads. So far these headphones are working great and I am very happy with my purchase. Spreading the word about these headphones.
I've owned several pair of these headphones, but they simply do not last.  After a short period they either will not charge or will not stay charged more than 10-15 minutes.
Too much bass

I bought these to use with my new iPhone 7 Plus. The lack of a headphone jack really made going wireless a requirement for my wife and I as we use our phones for both music and Audible, quite a bit. One of the deciding factors in this headset was the battery life and price. While I can listen to Audible through my car on my way to and from work, while I am at work I need headphones and these last me all day. Having two cords means I have one at home next to my bed to charge the ear buds overnight and one at work to charge them should I know I'm going to not be using them for awhile, such as when I have meetings.

The fidelity has been surprisingly good, given the price and I am glad I got these.
Not happy with these after using for a few months. Sound quality is average. Horrible wind noise when running. Problems with random disconnects with my phone.
Battery life SUCKS !!!! and the fit is non adjustable most of these styles you can adjust the fit a lil. Not these,
these are great for listening to music or books on tape from your phone but to hold converstions it isn't so good. to much background noise for the receiver.
used them for a year in a half 5-6 days a week for 6-9 hours a day at work outside, then i put them though the wash for a hour and then the dryer for hour and half, still work.

These were fine especially for the price.  The right earphone slipped out of place constantly no matter which size earpiece I used.  They stopped working on June 19, less that a year after I bought them.  Used them on the 17th and then they wouldn't charge or turn on.
SO far, it has been good.  Not sure how long the battery life is, but will the group know when it dries up.
Head phones broke the first time I used them. They advertise that they are waterproof but as soon as I got water on them they broke and won't work anymore.
This item was malfunctioning just like the first one did
These headphones work great.

I bought two sets of these useless earbuds. These cutout constantly when used with my iPhone (8+); it's as if I'm listening to some radio broadcast across the ocean in 1946. What a genuine waste of my money.
It's just hooked me up lol. 100% recommended for this product.

It worked fine over a year and now it won't charge or power on. This is the 2nd replacement after the first one had the issue with bluetooth connection. Contacted the Senso support but they couldn't do anything so they offered me 5% discount coupon to purchase a new one.

First and foremost, impressive product. Have never had any type of earbuds like these. The sound is impeccable. Honestly shockingly good. For the price, this product is a 5 star. Very impressed. Love them, i don't only use them for running, i also use them at work to cancel out noise. Amazing quality. Great job guys. Outstanding.

These are surprisingly good and well-equipped.  Can't think of any negatives and I've been using them pretty constantly since i got them a week ago.  Great sound, charging and fitting options are great, I love that it talks to me and tells me when its on, connected, call coming in, etc. Way more quality than I expected, really really happy with this purchase.  Thank you!

I had problem with the headphone shipped initially but after a mail contact with Invoke, they promptly replied and shipped a replacement unit. The quality of the sound is very good as well as the surrounding noise isolation.
I purchased these 🎧 As a replacement for a more expensive brand that I lost. I am happy to report that they provide exquisite sound quality and are not a drop in the bucket.
very comfortable!
Works but sound is extremely muffled
Do not waste your time looking at other Bluetooth earbuds at 2, 3 or 4 times the cost...THESE are the real deal! GREAT product, GREAT value!!!
They work excellently. Nice sound and feel.

I bought these to listen to music & podcasts privately and occasionally for making phone calls. Listening to music (my primary reason for buying) is great. Using to replace my iPhone's ear pods...meh. The sound of my voice outgoing is hollow to both me and the person I'm talking to. It's easy to setup and use.
Had these for over a year and can't be more pleased. Went thru a few pairs of beats and I was always disappointed. Can't beat the price either!!

I purchased these back in February, but I use them so often I felt that I should post a review for others looking for some bluetooth headphones!

Pros-
-Great battery life
-Great at canceling most noise out
-Can use it as a bluetooth
-For the most part, stays in place, even when I go for a run
-Great price for what you get
-Comes with a case to carry the headphones

Cons-
-The hooks for your ears are too big (then again I have small ears)

Aside from the hook things, these are great and worth it!

Great product, but I am not a fan of wires dangling or swinging around behind my neck during exercise. I purchased another Bluetooth headphones product from Amazon, but with "hard" "loop" between headphones. This another product does not have swinging / dangling wires.

Pros:
Bluetooth connection to iPhone.

Cons:
Wires dangling behind my neck during exercise.

Removed one star, because there is a better alternative with "hard loop" that does not dangle behind my neck during exercise. Search Amazon and you will find the alternative product with "hard" "loop".

Great headphones for their price. Sound quality was more than I bargained for and they fit on my ears while I lifted and played basketball. Better than any of the $10-15 headphones I've purchased at marshalls. If you're looking to save and have a quality pair of headphones, these are your guys
I like the product and after 2 months of use the right ear bud has stopped working. Besides that part, I love it. Noise canceling and sound is great.

I ordered this in January 2018. It's August 2018 and they're completely dead. I've plugged them in to charge, but now it doesn't even connect to my iPhone!!! I paid $30 for this pair so I paid about $4 a month for these earphones, and they died. It's not worth it! I noticed yesterday at the gym that the left side was starting to fade in and out, but it's completely dead now.
Perfect sound, easy to use, totally worth the money!!!

the SENSO bluetooth headphones are of good quality, great price and sound fantastic. I've owned more expensive bluetooth headphones and these sound as good or better for much less $$. They fit comfortably over my ears and are secure while working out. Highly recommended.

These headphones were great for the first month. However, wearing them to the gym on a daily basis proved they could not hold up and were most definitely not waterproof/resistant. The speakers started making a fizzling sound that clearly was not a good sign and within a day of hearing that strange sound, they wouldn't even turn on. I tried charging them, but nothing worked. For the month that they did work, they were great, had good sound quality, and were comfortable - just wish they would have lasted longer than a month. Waste of money.
Awesome sound for a great price 👍🏼They feel so comfortable on my ear
These are awesome, very comfortable, sound good.

Overall product was fine. sound quality, comfort were all decent.  I tried these hoping they would be more durable.  However the left speaker went out after approximately 3 months.  similar to the length of time a pair of corded headphones seem to last. :(

Decent sound and easy to use.  Reboot of devise, holding the power button while plugged in, resolved sound cutting in and out.  These are not great for talking on the phone due to picking up background noise.  For me, wearing for a long time will cause irritation under the ear loop.
Good sound and great battery life
Favorite headphones. Great quality. great sound.
Use at the gym does not fall off. Sometimes it can take an extra step to connect to my phone, but for the price no complaints.13 months layer wire separate. Ok if want to buy new one every 13 months

I got these as a late Christmas gift and started using them a little over a month ago.  The sound was excellent, especially using it with a SanDisk SportsClip (not the best quality sounding MP3 Player).  However, last week the headphones started dying on me less than an hour into my workout.  This was after a full charge on the headphones.  They should be under warranty and I'm waiting to hear back from Senso.  I'll update once I hear more.
I bought this as a gift 🎁 for my husband Birthday which is Aug 3rd.....so I'm sure he'll love it!

the hook is very flimsy and do not hold the headset in place for any activity.
This headset can be used for in place or gentle walking. Any quick movement the headset falls of from the ear.

Other than that sound quality, ease of use was good.
I am returning because of the earhook
Very lite great sound you forget you have them on.

These are really a great deal.  The sound is so good that even my very particular wife liked it, so I bought another set for her insuring that she would not "Inherit" mine... Pairing was a snap, easy to use controls, comfortable ear pieces, solid carrying case, extra cable, car jack, etc etc etc. AND no more getting tangled in the dangle! Very nice in the gym.

I really like these. First set of wireless buds for me. Highly recommend wireless. The multitude of uses without having the wire is huge.

Good. Comfortable. Multiple buds to fit your ear. Unless I'm exercising they remain where put even without the loop over the ear.

Length of battery. About 8 hrs.
Recharging. Quick. Not sure of time bit 30 minutes gets you plenty.
Sound is as good or better than other buds.
Water resistance has been solid. Through rain. And lots of sweat.
Look - I like the fact I don't have a battery sitting on my neck.

The less than good
Size is not huge bit is noticeable
Wind gives a ton of noise. Would be unusable on a windy day or on a bike. I use on a unicycle and still get noise.
Range . 10 ft at best. Even at 6 I tend to get disruption

Overall solid pair of phones for this price.
Stopped working after using them twice. Poor poor quality.
Great product!!! Cheap and affordable too!! Awesome sound quality and power usage!

I absolutely love these wireless headphones.  The sound is excellent, the design and comfort is so nice.  When I opened the package, I immediately connected my music.  I danced and sang for the rest of the night!  Well worth the price, such a good buy and completely fills my need of being able to workout and get in the zone with music.  I like the carrying case and the unique technology of having two charging options connected on one cord... unique!  The ear buds fit nice and comfortable and I could not hear any outside noise.  Thank you!!!!!!  You will be my go to from now on!
Evrything good so far.I am happy with this purchase.
Good sound just a bit bulkier than I thought.
These head phones worked very well; however, they onky had a life span of about 5 months. I will not be purchasing this brand anymore.
everything is good, except sometimes sound is on and off
Very comfortable and secure when working out. Sound quality very good. Charge lasts a long time too.

These are the best Bluetooth  headphones I've purchased. The sound is great and they keep out the outside noise. I have yet to run the battery down, so that's a major plus.  I mainly use them mowing & working in the yard & I absolutely love them.  Awesome value.

This was a gift for my husband and he's very happy with it! The ear pieces are nice, it comes with foam on them, and then alternate sizes of plastic earpieces. The sound buttons are easy to find. He likes it because he can wear them at work with one side in, and he works in a clean environment, so the ear hook helps ensure they don't fall out, or dangle, and cause contamination. He also noticed that the bass is really good. Thanks for making me look like a good wife.
awesome earbuds don't waste your money on the more expensive brands they don't give you more
My BF loves them :)

So far, so good! Only used them a couple of times so far. They paired easily, stayed in my ears during a workout (treadmill running, weight machines, bench press, etc.), and the sound quality is good. The ear loops are pretty floppy, so they feel like they might fall out, but that haven't yet. Sound is as good as expected. Obviously gonna be a little weak in the Bass, but no static or hissing due to the wireless.

Will update this as I get more use out of these.

I love music. I love Bose products ( except the price) but these sends Bluetooth headphones are amazing.
The sound is wonderful and smooth without over doing it.
The base is solid but not overwhelming
They are extremely comfortable and stay on.
All that for $36.
I don't know how long the charge lasts or how durable but I am starting out with 5 stars - if they don't hold up I will update
Try these before you spend $150
Great value. Deep bass response. Ok for music. Not so good for voice eg. Podcasts, audio books. Sounds clipped on the top end. To be fair, the manufacturer does warn about this.
Excellent value.  Was able to get a comfortable fit with the multiple sizes of earbuds provided.  No issue connecting to bluetooth The sound quality to my hearing was great.
I like the headphones. But the charger seems a little weak.

Loses signal from the phone anytime it is more than 5 feet away so cannot
be on the phone moving around the house without the phone very near.
Extremely disappointed as has good reviews from many people which
influenced my decision. Could easily have purchased another product.
Flexible over the ear not as convenient as firm hoop over the ear.

So far so good. I've only hard the earbuds a few days and I'm satisfied. I'm not a person that needs high end brand names. Sensor is doing what I need and the cost is perfect
Thanks
The parts that go over your ear are extremely floppy and serve no purpose what so ever.

This is my 2nd pair - gave the first pair to my son.  They work great, sound great and what a great price.  The only thing holding me back from 5 stars is they occasionally have a hard time connecting to my iphone.  Not always, just sometimes takes a few times to connect.

These headphones didn’t have a long range. The ear piece “hook” came disconnected from the larger part that says Senso. I cannot see it because of the rubber, but it moves a lot more than the other side. It also doesn’t have the same sound quality.

I've been using these for about a month now, and they are perfect for my needs. They stay charged all day, I charge them about every couple of days, although I don't use them a full 8 hours typically. They stay in place well, and are comfortable to wear. I have a hard time with plain earbuds that don't have different sizes to choose from. These came with several options. They also come with a nice carry case, which fits the charger as well. I use these with my asus zenwatch 2, and they pair well. I'm  very pleased with the sound, although the noise cancelling of buds is hard to get used to in my work environment. There are light indications for when they are on/connected/battery low/ etc. As well as sound indications when booting up/battery low/turning off. You can pause/play and adjust the volume on the earpiece itself. All in all, highly recommend, good value for the money.
Great sound. I recommend this headphones wholeheartedly
Great product for cheap money."

If your phone is as low as your pants pocket the signal does not even reach, making these headphones useless. If you plan to hold your phone above waist level the whole time, they work fine, but who on earth would do that? Gave 2 starts because they do sound alright when the signal doesn't cut in and out.

The good: They sound really good and the battery life and charging speed is awesome, you can literally charge em 20 minutes before heading out to the gym and youll be good for the gym session. The ear loop holders are super flexible and mold to your ear really good. I was working the heavy bag for 8 rnds after running 3 miles on the treadmill and they would stay in place!

The bad: After using them for about 4 months the left ear bud stopped working all of a sudden, I contacted the manufacturer and they told me that this shoudn't happen because their quality control is second to non. They offered me a refund or a replacement since I am currently stationed in Afghanistan I opted for the refund. I will buy this headphones again with the refund.
Awesome! I've been using these for am n pm cardio for most of my bodybuilding contest prep and they work great!

I was skeptic of these earbuds but they are amazing! The sound quality is great and I listen to everything from Latin jazz to hip hop during my workouts. The quality is just as good and arguably better than my apple wires ear buds. My 75 year old mother says she can hear me better than any other way I have used to talk to her on my cell phone also. As everyone says all the bonus bells and whistles are just a huge added bonus to the already amazing headphones. The company also sent a great welcome email after I purchased them that made me feel even better about my purchase. I will be purchasing another pair for my husband for Fathers Day and mowing the lawn. These earbuds and a waist belt have made my workouts so much better. Cordless is the way to go if you are weight lifting or running anywhere other than on a treadmill!

These headphones are CRAP!!! 😡 They only have one button for all functions. When you try to turn them off they pause, then you have to try to turn them off again. When you do this you get a message in your ear saying "dialing last phone number called," and And you have to scramble to get your phone and cancel the phone call. Then you have to try to turn the headphones off again...and it STILL will not work. It takes on average three tries to turn the headphones off when you’re done with them and on average at least two tries or more to turn them on when you want to use them. Sometimes when the headphones say they’re connected to your phone they’re actually not and music will still play out of your phone.
Short-term user. So far so good. Good quality sound.
For the price it was a good buy. When the headphones arrived, it came with additional items such as a carrying case, a mount for the car.. The sound is good. Definitely recommend  product
Audio quality is pretty good, comfort is ok, it does not cancel much noise out at all. And battery is about 7-8 hours

I had a pair Of these for a couple of years that were great! But they wore out so ordered another. These don’t seem to have the same sound quality as the others I had. I’m hoping that after I change out the ear pieces and have a better fit in the ear that they’ll sound better. Crossing fingers..
What a great product, great sound, awesome bass. The price for it is perfect, it fits great. Will buy two more for my brother and my son.
These were really decent for the price, however the quality isn't as good as some other brands that are equally priced. Do your research before purchasing

These are AMAZING headphones for the price.  My first pair crackled a bit during low bass sounds and I decided to give a 2nd pair a try after reading some of the comments.  Glad I did.  Sound WAY better than Powerbeats 3!

If there was a 4.5 star option I would give it that. I love these headphones but the cord is too long for me and it always gets caught in my hair. However, I love the power on and off, pause, and volume buttons. I like that when you turn it off using the button on the earbud, it also disconnects from your phone at the same time. The quality is great!

The sound quality of these headphones is great. Using with the Fire phone @ gym. Comfortable, secure fit. Also a great experience with the seller, Senso.

I bought these headphones in April, 2017. They worked fine. I'm not picky when it comes to sound quality. But I noticed recently that the thin wire that goes into the right ear plug is fraying; the black plastic covering is ripped and you can see the small metallic wires. After 4+ years of minimal use, I guess I can't complain. I'll duct tape the wire and hope that will solve the problem.

Sept. 2022: Since my 2021 purchase update, I've rarely used these headphones. In the last week or so, I've tried to use them and they're basically dead. I've charged them all day via the USB port and they barely hold a charge. Got what I paid for, I guess. Can't recommend these for the long term.

For the money these are great for music HOWEVER I've had comments that when I'm using them for calls that because the mic is so sensitive the background noise is too distracting. So if you're using them to do both music and calls I would look for something else.
This is my second pair I've purchased for my fiancé.  We moved and I lost his. He loves them. They are comfortable and keep a good charge.
Love it
They are working great. I wear them everyday during my workouts.

They are cheap wireless headphones, but I frequently find myself reaching for them instead of by Jaybirds. They aren't perfect, but they stay in, there's a bit of wind noise when I run and the mic is not great. However, if all you want to do is listen to music while working out, they are solid.

The main things I like about them are how well they stay on, and how comfortable they are. In both cases, superior to my Jaybird X3s. Sound quality, mic, charge, is another story. But they are a decent headphone for a great price!

Great headphones! I had purchased another pair of headphones and the sound quality was average. They also started to bother my ear. The Sensos had a great sound, even when I listen to podcasts. Definitely would recommend these and will probably get another pair.

Purchased a pair of these head phones last August.  The headphones completely stopped charging/ turning on after several months.  The company replaced the headphones which was great except the replacement pair ALSO stopped working.  I have literally owned two pairs of these headphones, both with light use and no excessive wear and tear and both times have failed under 6 months.  The company did not agree to replace the second pair which shows that they do not stand by their product.  It is safe to say this product is a piece of junk that will most likely fail after several months as I have experienced.  If you like the price, remember this is more of a rental price than a purchase because you WILL be buying a new pair.  I highly recommend shelling out a few more bucks for a more reputable product.  I'm skeptical of the highly regarded views on here.  Seems like a case of paid reviews to bump a product up the Amazon list...

They had 5 stars from me, but now 1 because I reported an issue with one of the headphones I purchased and they said they'd handle it. The headphones were under warranty, but it's been like 2 months and they haven't honored my warranty. In fact they haven't done anything!

These headphones are the best. I can walk around my entire house except for one bathroom in the corner and still listen with these. They have great clarity and very long battery life, I listen to YouTube on and of all day, take phone calls and only charge them each night. This is the second pair I have purchased from this company. Sadly I lost the first pair working in the yard (I had taken them off and they were mowed over) I bought another pair because they work so well. I have tried several others and haven't had such good results.

The state of the battery charge seems to have a big effect on how well they receive the bluetooth signal. The bluetooth signal is prone to interference from other radio signals, and that's VERY annoying at best. I'm an old(er) guy and have hairy ears. They don't stay in well, as I expected . They do sound fine when they're working well and fitting well. I don't expect good bass response from earbuds under any circumstances. These don't exceed that expectation, and when they fail to stick in my hairy ears it's even worse.

The connection is horrible I am unsure if it is because of my cellular service, but the music doesn't play consistently without interruptions.  They are not comfortable at all, just my personal opinion.  The round ear part is just too big.

I have been told that when on a phone call I sound like I am in an echo chamber, and nearly impossible to hear.  I have small ears and it makes them sore after about a half an hour.  The sound quality is fine, but again, not call quality.  They also look pretty giant on your head.

I purchased these so I could listen to classical music at the gym. So far I've just used them at home; the gym test comes tomorrow AM. So far they pair well with my iPhone and the audio quality is the same as or better than the hardwire headphones. I have one suggestion. The R and L indications are so small that many may miss them. I would suggest taking a clue from the hearing aid manufacturers and coloring the right earpiece red and the left one blue (like the political parties).
(added). After a week, I really like the headphones. There is a problem at the gym in that their wi-fi cuts in and out so I don't get the music streaming that I want. I now use them at home to watch TV.

After asking me to perform a quick test (which failed) they sent me a new pair of headphones. The customer service is terrific

I got these because my last Bluetooth earbuds weren't terribly loud, and, well, these definitely solved the problem! Also, my last set would fall out of my ears toward the end of my runs when I'm all sweaty, and these haven't yet. They're very comfy and they stay on. If you have longish hair, they're a fun combination between too discrete to actually use as a headset (I mean, you could if you don't mind strangers assuming you're talking to them), and too bulky to discretely listen to music at work. Not a problem for me, but I've definitely scared a couple strangers! They're significantly bigger than what I'm used to (I'm also used to much lower volume and shorter battery life), but they're not too heavy at all, and there is a blue light that flashes at some long interval that makes it less than discrete. Definitely the best experience I've had with bluetooth headphones.

In terms of general use, these get the job done. The battery lasts long, they don't take long to charge, they're comfortable to wear, pair with my phone easily, and have a good sound quality.

However, After owning them for only a few months, it has some severe issues with connectivity. Sometimes if I move my head too fast or sometimes when I'm walking, the sound starts cutting out like crazy. This used to be infrequent, but now it's almost a daily occurrence that has me back in the market for more reliable headphones. The sound has been cutting out even when I'm just standing at my desk, and it drives me crazy.

I suppose you could do worse for what you pay for, but I was hoping for more longevity.

I loved these headphones but after 5 months they broke.  The right ear thats turns them off/on broke and no longer works. I was on stair stepper and loss connection - took them out of my nears and the right earbud  was disconnected and could not be fixed - very disappointed.

I just got these a couple days ago.  They sync up very fast to my iPhone 7.  Sound is great, especially for the price point.  I got them so I could charge my phone and also listen to music via Bluetooth.  I haven't tried using them for working out yet, so I can't say how secure they would be while running.  They do a good job cancelling outside noise as well and will run all day at work on one charge.

I bought these along with the similarly priced #1 bestseller TaoTronics headphones (link below) that are the simple earbud design (not over-the-ear like these ones) to compare and choose which one I liked best for the gym (without realizing I would have to pay return shipping...). I was fed up with wired headphones always getting tangled and now I don't need to keep my phone in my pocket when I'm doing squats and such, which is GREAT!

After brief comparison the Senso was the clear choice for me. I chose these because they came with a nice case I can throw in my backpack, a car charger and have a couple hours of extra battery life in comparison (which I have yet to test). They also have A LOT of bass...so much that I have to turn it down in my sound EQ on my phone even though most of my music is hip-hop and EDM. The TaoTronics seemed lacking in that area, so I preferred more over less. Also I like how the buttons are placed on the actual headphones. The TaoTronics have a bulky and long remote attached to the cord (pics don't do it justice) dangling from your ear that looks like a long ear ring (think Prince). Another thing is the pairing to my phone and other phones is QUICK AF! (To be fair, they both were quick)

Minor Dislikes:
1. A bit bulky...but that's what you get for less than $40. For sizing reference go back to 2008 when everyone was wearing the single bluetooth headphone for phone calls (cheers to you if you still are) and imagine one of those in each ear connected by a wire. In my opinion they are still better than the TaoTronics because those look like extended earbuds coming out of your ear and reminds me of those metal bolts on Frankenstein.

2. I also find myself adjusting these in my ear more often then I'd like because they bow out and look even bulkier and the sound is affected.

In summary, I think these are great with respect to the price and my use of them. If I were to use these more frequently than just my hour or so in the gym every other day I would definitely consider testing out the Beats ones or Bose for sound quality and comfort/fitment.

PS You CANNOT wear these under a full-faced motorcycle helmet. I look forward to when these things are cheap and tiny so that I can do that.

They are ok. Bluetooth is a little weak. One ear hook is larger than the other.
Major issue is that they don’t charge well. Not sure if it is a headphones issue or a charging cord issue. I asked the seller for a new cord - will have to see what they say.

There a few nice features to these headphone, and a few compromises I've had to make to use them. The sound is really good, bold and loud! They charge really fast compared to the other three bluetooth headphones I've owned, and that has made them super convenient to use often. There are no doubts when they are charged, when they are connected to a device, and when they're powered off. However, they struggle to connect with devices, meaning the sound is really choppy at the beginning when they are supposed to be connected, and then it kicks in after about a minute, even when fully charged. Also, it has been difficult keeping a steady connection when my iPhone is in my pocket, and haven't had this problem before with other headphones. The biggest issue for me is the headphones pop out of my ears constantly when I am doing something active, although I've tried two different sized ear buds that came with the headphones. I haven't experienced that before with similar earbuds. Could be the weight of the earbuds is causing them to pop out. The ear supports really do not do much because they are flimsy if you are doing something active while wearing the headphones.
Works great.

Don’t buy those if you care about the water resistant IPX rating.  Mine got wet and failed. Looking at them more closely it’s easy to see why, as a gap in the plastic headphone housing lets light and water through.  It easily pops off and you can see how all the electronics are right there exposed to water.  If you just want Bluetooth headphones under $20 that stay on snugly, with thin sound and no water proof expectations, these will be good for you.

ugh... have to change my review... they were great for about 9 months, then right just stopped working. It was never dropped, no water got in it, nothing - no damage except for the right earbud just stopped working after going in and out for a week...

Re-ordered a second one... for the discounted price of $29.99 and boy are these not the same... why say they are discounted when the product is just a cheaper version, and I'm praying they last longer, but not feeling great about being duped. I don't feel like returning because they still work, hopefully longer than 9 months... say a few years?? The new ones do not have smooth, flexible silicone hooks like the original (they are just plastic), battery life is not 8 hours like the previous ones (more like 4 to 5 hours) and they do not charge as fast as the previous ones. the wireless cord is also stiffer... sound quality noticeably different - first ones had amazing sound quality.

I don't hate them, but for $29 bucks... they feel cheap, especially compared to the short-lived first ones.

I also like that it includes the latest version of bluetooth 4.1. Also, it includes lots of nice extras like a car charger and carrying case which are unbelievable at this price point. Not the best on the market but for a sub-$40 price it cannot be beat. Good job Senso!
Great for the price. The base was a little overbearing at first. But after a few uses they settle down.
Product has started to cut out when connected. Did the factory reset and this hasn’t solved the problem.
Never leave reviews but don't waste money on major brands. Support the small guys and get a superior product. Great sound, loud base and noise cancelling...

Finally got to use these and was super excited when I opened it only to be 100% disappointed in the sound quality. I have $10 headphones that sound better. Of course I missed the return window by 5 days...sigh.

They wouldn't stay on my ears. The overall design is not great. There is a part that bends behind your ear that is adjustable but I would have to keep adjusting it every song or so because they just wouldn't stay put. They turned out to be a big hassle which defeated the purpose of having wireless ear buds. I do not recommend this product personally.

The headphones themselves are great, great sound, great accessories for the cost.  Also fantastic customer service, my earbuds had broke due to my own doing and they had replaced them no problem.  They fell within the warranty time but still by the time I reached out less then 24hrs they were already shipped.
Great & affordable headphone.  Excellent qualilty without having to deal with a cable.  Love handsfree!!  Had to order a 2nd one because lost my last one on a trip.
thank you
Great headphones, nice and compact. Good sound quality. The phonecall/mic quality is not as good, but who cares I primarily bought these for listening to music
Couldn't get them to connect.

Great sound. Easy to pair. However, I did not get the car mount or the wallet. I did get the storage case and a nifty white iPhone cord plus a black micro USB and a car charger. I didn't need the car mount or the wallet but the product description includes them so...where are they?

They arrived on time, came in a nice package with extras (dual usb car charger, usb charging cord, adaptable charging cord for android and iphones, extra ear tips). Great price for the value and all that you get!

Didn't last two months. Easy to use, acceptable battery life. When they worked, the sound was decent, but not great. Not terrible headphones for the price if they lasted longer, but they stopped working completely on their own. The right speaker stopped working and I thought they just needed a charge, so I charged them, not even a light. They came with a nice case, charging cable, and 3 different size ear bud sets, but none of them would actually stay in my ear while doing simple exercises, which drove me nuts. The behind-the-ear piece is so floppy it serves no purpose. Looks like I'll be trying a different pair.
the best

Great earphones for the price but not what expected when riding on my bike past 10mph. The headwind made it seem like the earphones were really cheap with the wind cutting off the signal from my phone that was in my pocket, phone conversations were difficult to understand. Only reason why I gave 2 stars was the extras that it came with and comfort. Other than that, unless they come up with a solid casing I will choose other brand
Love them!
Decent headphones with good sound quality. But, if you wear them in a windy situation or in an open field, all you will hear is wind. Super annoying

Excellent headphones.  They fit well, they're comfortable, sound great, synch well with my pixel and the battery life is good enough that I can use if for a couple hours at a time over a couple of days without recharging them.  Highly recommended.

I like these headphones from what they are. The only thing I really don't care for is the sound of the bass in them. I listen to a lot of dubstep at the gym and I don't expect good bass out of little headphones, but the bass sounds inflated and artificial. Other than that, for the price, they are great bluetooth headphones. They come with two charging cables, a carrying case, and a 12v car adapter for charging which was surprising for as inexpensive as they are. I've tried other Bluetooth headphones for cheaper that ended up being garbage, but I really like these ones.
Very great sound, last 8 hours +. I have owned alot of head phone and this one is my favorite.

I bought these during a deal day and really really like them a lot. Had them on when visiting my parents and my mom borrowed them. Then she wanted her own and asked me to get them. Then my dad borrowed hers and insisted he get his own pair too! Also purchased them for a friend as a gift for a friend who and he wears them every day at his new job. Really good battery life, great sound, fit comfortably.

I started using it many months after buying them....Ok, silly me, but it shouldn't matter. Just couple months into using them , left one is not working most of the time... I was expecting way longer life from something that supposed to be used for running
Love these!  I was looking for something I can use at the gym.  They stay in your ears, sound great and super easy to use with my Samsung.
Sound quality is good. The ear piece is a little too big so after prolonged use they start getting uncomfortable.

I love these they are very comfortable and swear proof. I love the sound it is just right for my needs. Overall I use them to play music while I do my basketball workout drills. They are awesome cuz they stay on when I run or jump.
Packaging was great but my ears do not mold well to ear buds period. I prefer the head set even if u have to clean them, the quality sound and bass is not enough for my music.
Love them but they stopped working just past the 1 yr warranty
Amazing sound, very user friendly and comfortable. I would highly recommend them to my friends and family.
These headphones are great and the sound quality is impressive for a relatively inexpensive pair. The fact that they're cordless is a plus.

For the first few months these headphones worked flawlessly, truly waterproof, great sound quality, and comfort. I have used these headphones everyday since I purchased them. That has caused some technical issues. Every now and then they would start not working right, first they would not sound right. Since these headphones didn't work properly, I contacted their customer service and they would tell me to do a factory reset.(hold down multi function button for 7 secs while they were being charged) That worked for a while, but my recent issue (which happened months later). Just the headphones not sounding how they used too. They weren't as loud as they used to be and one side played next to no sound. This is an issue for me so when I contacted their customer service, they are apparently sending me a new pair to replace the old one. (Since their go to problem solver factory reset didn't work) For those of you who are on the fence to buy these, buy them. They have a 1 year factory warranty and great customer service. I highly recommend them.

These are excellent headphones. I consistently have trouble with headphones falling out of my ears, especially during exercise. These stay put and are very comfortable. The sound quality has been great as well.
They come with a nice carrying and case and multiple chargers, including a car charger. I like that they also come with cord management so you can tighten up an extra slack. I wish I had gotten these sooner!

I am blown away by the quality and performance of these headphones. They have great sound and battery life. I had a charging issue probably due to the socket and they shipped out a replacement within 1 day! Definitely recommend!
These headphones have great sound quality and hold up well when I work out.
Didn't like that the play and pause button was in your ear basically

only used them two days but so far i love them, they connect very easy and sound great, the reason i only gave 4 stars is i dont know how they will hold up . i use them all my work shift and so far they have been great
.

I got these for my boyfriend. He loved them but had a bit of difficulty connecting them to bluetooth. However, a few days later, our dog got to them ..quick little bugger chewed them up and destroyed them. SO here I am , getting new ones. Pretty good sound quality for the price though, if I have to get some for myself I will definitely come back. Thank you!

Good sound, not great but good. Battery lasts a long time. Reasonably comfy, comes with different size tips along with some soft, isolation type tips. These may not be studio monitors, but if you're bee boppin' with your phone running Pandora or similar, they're perfect for the price.
You can talk through them to answer phone calls too. Not stealthy, by any means, but I really like 'em.
If they last a reasonable amount of time and then die, I would not hesitate to buy them again.

Worked fairly well until about 14 months after purchase (2 months after 1 year warranty expired) - decent sound, fairly easy/consistent pairing, fairly comfortable.  No real complaints until the left ear bud stopped working.  Decent for the price but not good for the long haul.
Great bluetooth headphones!!! Very loud with amazing sound for the price. Buy these.

I bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift as she wanted a wireless ear bug for a long time for running.  We are both very disappointed as the left hanging loop is made bigger than the right loop, they are not symmetrically made and we just don't understand the reason.  One side fits fine but the other side is too large and just can hang on the ear.  I am returning it and need to find a different brand.
These headphones are perfect and not as annoying to charge as I anticipated.
Great product while at the gym or at home on the couch. Great sound and holds up to a sweaty gym sesh. Look like beats but without the cost.
Got it to pair on one device. Could not get it to pair on a second device as there were no longer any pair recordings on headphones. Good Luck!
Excellent product and excellent service. One of the best products and services I used.

I have had these headphones for about a week and worn them several times. They are super comfortable and have really great sound. For the price, they are a steal. I bought a pair made by TaoTronics a few weeks earlier thinking they would fit me well, but they didn't work out like I thought they would and the battery life was only about 4 hours. The Senso has a much longer battery life, they fit comfortably while I am working out or running on the treadmill, and they come with a nice case, extra charging cord and one for the car. Cool extras! Also, I like where the controls are. On the other brand they were on the cord and with the extra weight the cord kept moving to that side while I was running and I kept trying to straighten it out. With the Senso, it is on the right ear piece and they have a little thing to slide on the cord so you can tighten it up in the back and it doesn't move around while running. Bottom line... these are a terrific price, they have awesome sound and base, they fit and I don't think you can go wrong with them.
I am so very happy with my purchase, other ear buds fall out of my ears, the audio is so very clear, must buy if your shopping around!

So just received my headphone would like to say from the start handsdown the best ines I have ever had, I like the fact that you get a power cord and car charger include and the nice carrying case in it self is so nice, so sound quality perfect I only have to use level 3 to stop all the outside chatter. The tips that it came with fit bit only down fall that I already knew was the ear pience that loop around your ear they are not able to be fitted to your ear no deal breaker since they stay in place pretty well, but like I said just got them out the box oh yeah the outside box preset cool also.
These DO NOT fall out of your ears, I've gone through 4 pairs of earbuds trying to find a pair that stayed in my ears. Sound quality is superb for only $30

I tried two additional headphones that were more expensive before purchasing these. The sound quality is amazing. The fit is very good. Excellent for running and lifting weights. Easy access of controls. Overall performance is awesome!

These work great.  I have a hard time wearing anything on or in my ears for a long period of time. After a bit my ears hurt.  I am able to wear these longer than most. These ActiveBuds Bluetooth headset are wonderful.  The description of the product is all correct.  They are easy to pair up. They are very comfortable long lasting. Great price for these. Just received them so I can't commit on long term physical sturdiness. First impression, was impressed with the quality of the packaging and the extra items (charger and cords) that came with the headphones. I don't consider myself an audiophile so I was confused when I saw some reviews complaining about the sound quality, was surprised after pairing with my iphone SE and placing them in my ears, the sound quality to me was much better that expected and I didn't have to turned them up loud at all. I found that during my walk the headphones had no issues with staying put and were very comfortable. I'm glad I bought two pair grey/black for me and red/black for my wife which she loves. For less than $37.00 a piece, the ability to skip/repeat recorded music and take/make phone calls, I'd say these are a slam dunk.

Sound is worth the price! I like how the over ear piece is flexible and goes to your ear type and every accessory it comes with is awesome definitely worth what I paid can’t believe it was worth more!

Had them a couple weeks now, I use them a handful of times a week for an hour or two at a time and they haven't died yet. Seems to stay put but I haven't done anything super vigorous. Comfy. Feel like I'm part of a cool club now with the wireless headphones.
Incredible service. 2 day shipping ended up being 1 day. Headphones are perfect. Even come with a case and are comfortable.

I ordered these for my husband.  He likes to take his music with him when he goes hiking and the headphones he was using just didn't have any staying power. Cubichi mentioned that the headphones were sweat proof which was an important consideration as my husband runs much of his hike.  My husband says these work very well and the sound is great. The price is reasonable and I signed up for the 30 day free trial of Prime so that the headphones would arrive in time for my husband's birthday.
These headphones are so good and durable that they have been in my Washer and Dryer and still worked surprisingly fine after.
Awesome, thank you! My first pair of wireless ear buds and they are awesome!
Very happy with the headphones. My wife has also ordered some.

This is a tough review to write, because the headphones may well be everything they were designed to be, but my wife nevertheless asked me to return them. We bought them to supplement, and hopefully upgrade, a less expensive pair of SoundBEATS headphones that she uses to watch shows on her iPad around the house and in bed. The battery wasn't lasting very long, so these should have provided a longer battery life - with the others as backup - and probably better sound. Unfortunately, she didn't find them comfortable. The over-the-ear loops didn't fit quite right and the bulkier earpiece (which probably supported a larger battery and better acoustics) was also uncomfortable, especially lying on her side in bed. So, without even having a chance to verify whether these offered far superior battery life or sound, these went back to Amazon.

I'm incredibly impressed by these, I was wary because I don't normally spend $30 on items like this. However, the call quality was great and the bass is amazing! I had zero issues connecting my bluetooth, and the battery life is really good as well. It came with 2 usb cables (3ft and a few inches) and a usb connector for the car, and a cool little zip up case to keep it all together. Well worth the purchase!

Overall it works, not stable, reconnect is very slow after power on and with noise during the switch to the headset. Repair has trouble after lost pair not sure how it lost the pair, and have to switch off and on the Bluetooth on the phone to repair. For $39.99, it may worth the value, definitely not $199.
These are the best headphones you can get for a good price. The battery lasts for longer than I need it, they are very durable and I've recommended them many times.
Didn’t like them at all
don’t waste money on the BOSE or other expensive headplugs. these work just as GREAT. love them..
