Sound quality was excellent, and pairing was hassle free. These headphones worked great with Apple devices like my iPhone. They did fall out and off of my ears a lot when I jogged. I am African descent, so I have smaller ear canals. Sadly the plugs were just a bit big for me. I can't remember if there were smaller pieces because I overzealously threw away the packaging. I am not sure if I am wearing these right either since they just pop off over the top of my ear and need to be readjusted.
I am  really satisfies with my senso  I really love it and I will recommend it to all my family and friends
Fantastic headphones at an unbeatable price!  Great job. I will spread the word.
Great product.  Excellent tone and comfortable fit.

Have these for a year and half and still works and I use it a lot for running. Used to have a Dre beat and I had to call apple to replace it for me almost 5 times. This one blow dre beats out of the water. The price is already a must buy you can't really lose. Tried airpods as well they keep falling off when I run. These ear clip headphones are best for running.

Great product at an even better price. I was looking at much more expensive sets when I came across these. Decided to try them based on the high rating and I'm very happy I did.  I can't think of anything the expensive ones could offer that these earbuds don't.
They worked well with my phone and ipod. Unfortunately, barely made it a year before it stopped charging or working completely.
Wife says they work great so I have ordered another set.

So i had some issues with my first pair so i emailed Senso and let them know it wasnt holding up a charge. They emailed me back within hrs.  And instruced me step by step on how to refresh it.  It worked for a week.  Then still wouldn't hold a charge.  So i emailed them again.  And in two days had a new pair.  Soon ill buy another for my wife.  Thank you Senso!!!!

Headphones are easy to use and of the exact quality expected. Great value and sure to be an up trending brand. A value brand making quality headphones could hold a substantial market share if they maintain this in the future.
my son loves these! he claims the base and sound are awesome and the best ones I have purchased for his so far

The plastic that goes behind the ear bends way too easily and won't stay curled up for even 1 minute. Very cheap material, not even worth $1. I don't know how this would stay in your ear while working out if it doesn't even stay on while sitting. Really heavy too. If the plastic would stay on, it would be too heavy to wear for even 5 minutes. Worst design and material I have ever seen on earbuds.

I've only had these for a few days, but they are perfect for my uses.  I use them in the gym or on my bicycle and the sound is clean and clear.  There is a bit of wind noise on the bicycle, but that is the same with other headsets that I have used.  I haven't had the opportunity to take many calls so I will update when I've had these a bit longer and used them more fully.  No complaints at this point.

My husband bought these for me for Mother's Day because the ones I had were falling apart. These are convenient, especially when I'm going to the gym or for a run and they're super easy to use. I'd recommend them to anyone. I love them and I'm so glad I got them!

I don't write a lot of reviews. I really expected a lot more from these earphones because of high ratings on Amazon. It's obvious that $29 earphones can't deliver audio quality as good as a set of $300 from Sony. Unfortunately I can only compare SENSO's audio quality to earphones sold at a Dollar Store or the earphones given away for free to airline passengers. Senso's mid-range is muffled, high range is almost non-existent and bass is very muddy. I've had much cheaper, Bluetooth earphones with a MUCH better sound quality.
Audio quality gets ONE STAR! Overall rating deserves 2 stars because they included a free cellphone mount with the earphones (wonder why?).
I wouldn't recommend this product if you expect a half-decent audio quality.

I have never found headphones I like so much! All other ones fall out when I am jogging or the sound isn't good- these are just right! They stay in my ears and I love the clear sound! Makes jogging a lot nicer when I am not struggling with wires and headphones falling out! Plus it comes with so many great accessories I am very impressed with this product
Well worth it !
Ear piece seemed floppy at first but fits VERY comfortable and sound quality is fantastic.

You get what you pay for. Button functionality is terrible. Loud when used, double tapping the main button calls last person. Terrible idea. Sound is a little muffled, other than that decent product. Feels solid in your hands. Battery is great
Headsets work great and stayed put during my run.

Had them about 4 months, had an issue with them. Up until then the headphones are amazing, can handle getting wet from sweat, and give a crisp sound. I work out 7 days a week in them for about an hour to 1.5 hours daily. I only charge about 1-2 times per week. They hold their charge. The issue of them not powering on was resolved by customer service on 12 hours, and I was emailed and kept in the loop about the replacement. They honored the 1 year warranty and within 12 hours of my complaint and provided prompt and courteous service. The replacement was in the mailbox within a day. The best customer service I have received in a long while compared to my other experiences. Their customer service and quality product, I would buy another pair.  They are awesome at Senso,and put the customer first.

Love these! They are very lightweight and have GREAT sound!
I was given a pair of another brand for bike riding with and they were so heavy & bulky my ears couldn't hold them. I had to try to hold them on with my helmet straps...very frustrating to say the least.
I haven't tried these bike riding yet, but I have used them at the gym...so far so good! Looking forward to taking them for a spin on my first bike ride of the season!
Good while they lasted...

Noise cancelling, great bass, and easy to set up and use, is there anything else required for Bluetooth headphone? A resounding NO!!! Awesome sound, comfortable to wear the whole day, and I can shut the world out if I want so I can focus on my work. I love SENSO's Bluetooth headphones. I will be getting an additional pair to leave at work while I groove on the original pair at home. LOVE 'EM!!!

I first purchased the black headphones and they worked perfectly till my dog chewed them to pieces. I then purchased the red one's but they're not of the same quality. Firstly, it takes FOREVER to turn them on/off. Even the voice that says "power on/off" is different. I have to press down for over 10 seconds before they turn on/off (with my already paired devices) which was not the case with the blk headphones. The sound is more static than the black ones, and this is using the same devices and same music tracks. They do take over an hour to fully charge but do Not last 8 hours. I fully charge headphones and use them for about  3-4 hours but have a low battery at around 5 hours, and I Always turn them Off when not in use! They are comfortable and had no problems pairing with multiple devices, but I wish I bought the black ones again. For now, these will do until my dog chews them up again, lol!
Great

Perfectly adequate BT headphones.  Paired to my iPhone 7 with no issues.  Works well.  The only complaint is that they are too loud.  I can't turn the volume down low enough to listen at my desk.  I work in a fairly noisy open environment and I wanted these to block out the background.  At the lowest volume setting they are still uncomfortably loud.

Easily the worst headphones I’ve had.  They will say connected but won’t connect fully that I can play music on my iPhone. I have to turn them off and on again. And worst part is the constant skipping like it’s buffering or like old CD players used to be.

I've used these a few times since I got them and so far, so good. I guess I have abnormally small ears as normal earbuds will not stay in which is why I need the arms that wrap over the top. These could fit more snuggly but so far I haven't had any issue with them falling off when I walk or jog.
The sound is great and they were super easy to pair.
They shipped and arrived in 2 days from the time I placed my order.
These are great.  I listen to audio books while cleaning the house, working in the yard, and driving long distances.  The sound is perfect and they are comfortable to wear.
Great quality.
I have had these for three months and have never had a problem. Great sound long lasting battery power.
These aren't noise cancelling. They have great sound quality for the money though.
Works great!
Clear listening, good product
Good sound quality, long battery life and they stay in my ear. Works well for me so far.
Excellent sound, quality and value. Very pleased to have found these headphones.
Headphones worked one time for 30 mins. Will charge and light shows that it charges and receives full charge. However they will not turn on. Disappointing waste of money.
Great item! Fast shipping!!

This are high quality, not the internet junk I often accidentally order.  Quality packaging, comes with a case, a car mount, a cell phone mount, extra earpieces of different sizes.  They have a nice, high-quality feel, and most importantly, they work well.

Noise cancelation is great, quality, is great. The battery lasts ALL DAY. The only complaint is that the sound cuts out and I have to turn them off and on to reconnect. This is is a hassle especially when I am on important calls.

A lot of the five star reviews here have got to be fake....

These bluetooth connection on the SENSO headphones are terrible. Throughout last summer I used them while mowing my grass and they constantly cut in and out. I thought it might have been because the lawnmower might be causing interference so I stopped using them and forgot about the headphones since that was the reason why I purchased them. I never tried them since until now...

I am sitting at my desk at work with the headphones fully charged and right next to the laptop they are connected to and they are doing the same thing that happened while mowing my grass.

Does SENSO even have a QC department? How could something like this get past quality control?
Good product for the price! I would buy again.

This earphone is bad. When I put my iphone into pocket I can't hear the voice. I can't believe there are so many high rate review. Don't buy it. The only reason why I didn't return it is there are too much work to do.
My son uses while golfing and says the sound quality is great.

It's OK by the price, when compared with similar products.
But the product is not comfortable on ear.
I would not recommend it.
Good sound for the price.  Battery is decent, as is the range.

Every now & then, we purchase something that, for one reason or another, doesn't work right. But when Customer Service steps up and responds- it makes ALL THE DIFFERENCE in the WORLD! My wonderful wife bought me a pair of ActivBuds as she was super happy with the pair that she bought for herself. She's in the water all summer and hers have worked flawlessly! Unfortunately, I had trouble with mine.

Senso customer service folk were extremely responsive, quick with assistance and clear guidance. When we couldn't fix it- they asked for our order information and a replacement is on the way!

THAT is HOW ALL COMPANIES should be! mahalo ladies for your super fast help!

By far the best set of headphones I have ever owed. Use them at the gym Mowning the lawn around the house not a problem at all. Really good sound got enough bass to get you into the songs. Love them would buy another pair of these for sure

The headset is clear, comfortable and easy to connect to phone. Battery talk time is good. Mainly impressed with their customer services, I had an issue with charging port, and company sent me a replace within days.

I love these headphones. They sound great. The different ear cones ensure they will fit. The included case ensures they don't break in my gym bag.
I know some suggested the volume is too high but I use these for running so the volume level doesn't bother me. Additionally it appears to automatically turn down the volume when connected, so there's no issue with the volume being too high when first turned on.
Great buy for the price.

Love these headphones. Good sound. Great battery life. Lots of extras in the box to charge your devices including a nice little carrying case to keep everything together. Have ordered these 4 times as I’ve accidently broken two pairs.

Solid sound quality and features for the money. Useful accessories and nice carry case. Battery life suspect.  About  3 to 4 weeks ago, the SENSO unit would no longer take a charge.  Very disappointed.  Manufacture support is expired, so these will be discarded.  Will not buy again. Hope your experience is better. Really wish the SENSO earbuds still worked.
Best headphones I have owned for running! Great fit and battery life!

I purchased the headphones based on the ratings and unfortunately it was a bad idea! The headphones are definitely not Waterproof! I purchased them for this reason!  My first pair stopped working when I went through the airport TSA. The company finally send me a new pair which has only worked for a few months. I am beginning to think they may last longer if you don't workout in them . Then again... Nope!  It's junk!

Just received these.  They are really comfortable and were easy to pair with my phone and ipad.  The sound was also much better than I was expecting for a $34 pair of headphones.  Hopefully they last for a long time.
Oregionally bought for my teenager. Husband liked it so much he kept these and bought our teenager a different pair. Great sound
Great sound quality at an affordable price, it even beats my I-monster wireless headset in all categories. Love this thing!

These headphones work great. The speakers are easy to hear, the microphone picks up clearly.  The range is about 25 feet with no obstructions. My only complaint is that the battery runs out rather quickly.  I've found they have about 45 minutes to an hour of talk time and a day or two of stand by time. If I forget to charge them overnight, I'm back to using the wired ear buds.

I have been using my set for about 2-3 weeks and they were fine at first, but they suddenly stopped working. It keeps ringing really loudly when I try to turn it on and neither my iPhone nor laptop will connect to it...

I did have an issue with these hadphones, the right cover came off exposing the inter works of the right headphone. This was seven months into use. I was still covered under my one year warranty, all I had to do was provide my Amazon order number and a picture of the broken headphone. The email response time was incredible within two emails hassle free I have a new pair being shipped to the house!
I ordered these this summer to give as a Christmas gift. Only one earphone works 😯I'm not sure if I just got a dud because they had such good reviews.
So far so good!!
These bluetooth headphones are a comfortable fit and stay put when I go out jogging. The have good sound quality and were easy to pair with my cell phone.
Great Headphones, great price.  Work Perfectly, easy to use.
The headphones have a great sound. Even on low volume settings it’s blocking out most of the surrounding sound. They feel comfortable and look good too. Definitely happy with these.
Love them best headphones I've had in a long time. Nice bass very clear and price was great
2 years on and the headphones are still going strong.  Last upto 4 days; my gym sessions can be long and the sound quality is still good.  Love love them.....

I'm obsessed with these headphones! Literally a perfect product. Exactly as described - batteries last for 8 - 9 hours, which for me is like 4.8 week days of gym sessions. Sound is excellent. Fits snugly and comfortably when you choose your correct bud size (comes with two additional options).  I lost my first pair and almost immediately purchased two more - one for a jealous family member and one to replace these. Buy them! Its worth it.
Quit working after about 1 week. Seemed decent until they quit working.
Earphones are very good but their customer service is excellent. Thank you
The charge is terrible and the headphones are uncomfortable to wear but block noise effectively
No problems. I think they were designed well. They work well with my Samsung Galaxy S8+
for 30 bucks, you cant really give it a yay or nay. i bought them for work. I work on a boat so i like the water resistant aspect.The sound is kinda muffled due to it though.

I can't say enough about this product. The quality is great at a fraction of the price of the competitors. It's clear for both music and phone calls and is extremely comfortable when working out. In addition, their customer service is amazing! I had a problem with a set and at first they gave me a solution (and responded immediately), which worked for a while, but then the issue came back. They immediately sent me out a completely new one, no questions asked, no shipping charge, no requirement to send the old one back. Can't ask for more than that!
The loops are too big and squeeze oddly. My ears are sore after use. Great sound though! Just wish they were more comfortable.

I bought these as a replacement for a previous pair of wireless earbuds I purchased over a year ago.  I use them primarily when I go running or to the gym.  The sound quality is pretty good.  I am having a slight problem with occasional 1/4 second sound cut out.  I am not sure if this is a problem with the earbuds or the Bluetooth connection with my phone.  My phone is a three year old iPhone 6s and maybe it is just old.
Sound quality. Perfect. Fit. Perfect. Buttons. Perfect. For working out. Perfect. Design. Perfect. Its just worth the mons.
It does good job, I use it in gym and like it a lot.

total crap dont buy if your not in the US to return. after first recharge stop working , though good feedback and support from seller however cant return item as shipping cost will require buying a new item and certainly another brand

Bought this device 2 years ago. Used it for a couple of months. Then I forgot about it. I was just going to use it again. Fully charged it, buy the power button no longer works and it doesnt turn it on

These headphones are wonderful! They sound great and stay well on my head as I jog. Two pretty neat features: 1) The headphones tell you if their power is going low; 2) If you get a phone call, the headphones read the phone number to you.
Pleased with the fit, weight and comfort of these headphones.
People cannot hear me well
DO NOT PURCHASE Item does not last long
These are great headphones. A little bass heavy for certain types of music, but thats an easy fix for most devices in the eq. Great value

So, I bought these earbuds about a week ago and they are amazing. I put them through the wringer to see if they were what I was looking for and I have been extremely impressed. They stay in no matter how much you move your head around and you can crank the volume without worry. For a set like this I would think I'd be paying a lot more.
Gettin returned because the port that accepts the USB cord was broken on arrival.
Good quality and very comfortable for the money.  I've been enjoying them at the gym.  No more wires!

So, my brain just exploded. How could anybody pull this off for 30 bucks?  Come on.  Insane.  Really, very solid sound, thick bass, lovely quality design, intuitive controls, phone calls sound great, mic is clear, in-box accessories are very nicely done.  Senso, kudos.  Are you my mommy?

The design on these are pretty good. They stay in my ears because the ear hooks are easy to bend and manipulate so they stay in place.
The sound is OK. A little bass heavy, which I like. Kind of average over all.
The biggest flaw is connectivity. I have a Samsung Note 8 and unless I'm sitting still not moving, they cut out constantly. If I put them in my pocket they cut out every time I move. I can't jog or work out with them at all. Best case scenario if I hold my phone in my hand and don't move much they don't cut out. It's a shame because otherwise they aren't bad headphones.
Excellent bang for your buck. Great for exercising or working in or around the house or in your yard. great battery life and comfortable. Highly recommend these.

Great product. Love the headphones. Super easy to install and connect. I use them everyday on my bike commute to work and home about a 8 mile ride (on bumpy roads and smooth roads) and they still sound great and remain secure. Definitely a great product for a great price. I've gotten tired of wired headphones and cordless is amazing. Super leightwieght also and came fully charged when arrived. Looking forward on using these bad boys for a long time!

UPDATE**** 5/31/17
Accidentally left my headphones at an outdoor restaurant and it poured down raining that same night. Luckily the owners friend found them and told me they were soaked and hopefully they still worked. Fast forward, I picked them back up the next day, and they turned back on with no problem. Sound quality is still great as well. Super great investment! Would pick these over any other option on the market.
The sound quality is good, but the ear piece is a little flimsy. They just don't fit to your ear very well.

Truly the best quality for the price you can get. These headphones have a great battery life, fantastic sound and bass, block outside noise extremely well and are sufficiently sweat resistant. I probably wouldn't expose them to actual water but for my work outs they perform admirably. I know 4 other people just at my small town gym that have the same pair. I would prefer these over any high priced pair. I highly recommend to anyone needing wire free head phones on a budget!
Love these. They have great battery life and make life so much easier when I'm running!

Had them since April 2017 it’s April 2018 and here are the issues. In the last month they have had issues with connection via Bluetooth and while this is my fault because I use them daily, I have to buy a new set because there is a short in the left ear from them getting stuck in my clothes or in my bag when I pull them out. I also somehow lost an earbud.
These did not stay in or on my ear. The rubber ear wrap parts are flimsy and stretched out, did not keep the headphones on my ear
My son seemed to like these. The sound quality was decent for the price paid.
Fast shipping. Great set of headphones

These have louder sound and better reception than my sons over $100. pair. I can walk all over the house and vacuum and still listen the Ipod or tv or mac. I love them and would buy them again. (I live in small condo) Probably lose reception in larger house If I wonder to far.

I rarely write reviews, so it says something that I'm taking the time to tell you how fantastic these earbuds are!  I purchased 2 pair, for my husband and I.  They are truly noise cancelling, comfortable to wear and lightweight.  We both love them!

I have been looking for a really good Bluetooth, but one that would not cost me an arm and a leg. Senso has delivered. They arrived quickly. Pairing with my Edge 7 was both fast and easy. I was surprised that they paired so easily with my laptop as well. Battery life has been great. They are lightweight. And as they are in ear as well as with the ear hook they do not fall off. I have been singing the praises of these to my friends, family and co-workers.

Have had them for a few days now. They have good sound, and the buttons are easy to use. I like I can skip songs without opening up my phone during a workout. They fall out when I run on the treadmill, but I may just have to change the ear bud size. Either way, pretty happy with this product for not being a "well known" brand. The price is unbeatable too (I bought $50 wireless JVC headphones from target and they had terrible sound, and were lightweight and cheaply made). For under $50, these are a great buy in my opinion.
Holds a charge and has a wide range. It's great for having while exercising.

My husband and I were looking for a pair of comfortable earbuds for our workouts. We had bought several cheap pairs only to be very disappointed with their level of comfort. Our ears would hurt after just a few minutes of exercise. SENSO eatbuds are extremely comfortable! We have both worn them for a long jogs and have had no discomfort! I would highly recommend these earbuds for comfort and excellent sound! We will be purchasing another pair soon!
These are the second ones we have purchased to use kayaking or paddle boarding mostly.  The sound quality is (surprisingly)  good for what you pay for the budd.
Easy to connect.  Although the speakers crackle when up at a certain volume. But non the less great pair.
These are the best hands free headphones with amazing sound and battery life. It’s like they aren’t there as far as feel goes they aren’t in the way.

Omg I love them, so I have bad hearing and a lot of headphones don't work for me unless I have my cell volume max,... this pair let's me listen to it on a low setting on the cell and it's comfortable 2 hrs so far and it's not hurting or bothering, got to get use to how it feels since it's still new but he'll yeah I would buy another pair or get one for a family member
easy to pair with devices, slight background noise in the left bud.  Haven't tried it during workouts yet.
Good product !!!

I've never had to work so hard to make sure my headphones were charged in addition to making sure my phone/iPod was also charged. It always seems like when I'm ready to use them, they need to be charged

Reviewing on the feedback from my girlfriend. I bought two pairs. One for my GF and one for me. Awaiting shipment of my "Care" package to Afghanistan, then I can review them for myself. Based on my GF's comments, these sound much better than the LG neck phones she owns. Comfortable and much less cumbersome.
These wireless headphones are definitely the bang for the buck! Extremely user friendly and sound is great!
Great earphones for the money
Great for the price. Good sound quality.
I bought some and they skip really bad when playing music. The sound is interrupted every couple of seconds. None of my other bluetooth devices do it.
I spent 36 dollars on this headphone. I used it occasionally each week. In 6 months, it is dead now. It is NOT worth it.

Packaging was excellent. The little extras are nice with the usb cables and the cigarette charger. Sound is great. Battery lasts a good while. Only had a few days. The microphone was not great when tested, will need to it out under different environments.
Comfortable and large range for volume.  One of the loudest in ear headphones I have owned and audio quality is very good.  Stays in ears when exercising is also a big plus

Upon opening the package, I was pleased with the design and the extra charging cable, car charger, and a "wire tie," which is a small plastic "clamp: that allows you to adjust the length of the cord that is up against your neck. Pairing the headset to two bluetooth devices was simple and worked just as described in the User Guide. I like that are volume controls on one of the earpieces, as well as a multi-function button that allows you to answer incoming calls, redial the latest number called, etc. I've had the headset for only a few days, but, so far, I am very pleased with the product.

Good stuff, carries sound about 35' from my laptop. Love the dual charger (mini USB and Lightning) concept.

-1 star because the "low battery" warning gives you about 5 minutes notice. Not sure how long a full charge lasts... if I had to guess it's about 5-6 hours.

I LOVE these headphones. I was wearing them when my granddaughter saw them. Boom, gave them to her and ordered again. I wear them all the time and lost order #2, hopefully they’ll turn up somewhere in the house!  I am now on order #3 and truly can’t say enough about them. You don’t order 3 times unless you LOVE them. Great sound, long lasting, perfect fit.
Sounds is very good but buds are staying in my ears. The looks seems to be way too big and don't help.
Bought these so I can follow Google Maps direction when riding my Harley. Will let youknow how they work when the weather warms up...
great value / works and sounds great.
Pretty good sound. Wish had more bass.
Excellent headphones- worked as expected!!

Sound quality is little deep for my taste. But good for the price. Has a little fuzziness but they work for working out and casual listening. Would not recommend if you're a headphone snob, music junkie or DJ. But it works for me and my boyfriend.

I have bought these headphones three times because they are amazing.  I frequently break earbuds like every other month I needed a new pair and these were the first headphones that lasted me for almost a year. They also work very well the sound quality is probably the best i've had from earbuds. On top of that they are pretty decent at noise canceling .To sum it up id recommend these earbuds to anyone.
Had to cut the rubber ear piece hooks off as they were too small.  Howerver they stay in pretty well without them. Excellent sound. You won't be disappointed.

These things are awesome. I sweat like crazy when i working out... i'm always used to having to deal with cheapy headphones going out after a few uses with them.

When i first ordered these, I thought they did not come with a wire tie. I let the company know and they let me know it was inside the same back with ear buds (they're tiny) my fault for being in ID10T. great product and great service i would recommend these to anyone needing a good set of workout Earbuds
This has been a good experience

The sound quality of these headphones is pretty good for the price, but from the very beginning it seemed that the connection in the headset had a short. This would happen when I turned my head from side to side. I only use the headphones about twice a month so they haven't been abused. With each use the disconnect got worse. Now its to the point that the headphones disconnect 5-6 times per song. Not good. Hopefully this is just a bad set. If it weren't for the shorting/disconnecting I would recommend these headphones and give it four plus stars, but the quality of this particular pair is disappointing.

if you are looking for headphones for the gym and you don't want to spend crazy money on Bose, this is a perfect choice for you. Sound quality is decently good. it stays in your ears while running. Bluetooth range is okay.

These headphones have everything I want:  stereo for music, mic for phone calls, wireless for the gym, etc., and hooks over the ears so they don't fall off.  Now that I have them, add that they have great sound and were very reasonably priced.  Winning!

They are a lot more "boomy" (not in a good way) than I expected. The highs seem to not be present. They fit great and using them is easy. I just crave a lot more definition from the top end of the spectrum and less mid-range distortion and bass boom.

Up to 5 stars: See updated comment... the trick for me was to not press the headphones in too tightly into the ear. I still have to experiment with other size plugs that it came with.

If you have smaller ears like me, I would consider making sure to try out the different sizes of ear-buds to make sure they fit. I am very active when I workout and the size of the rectangular piece that sticks out of the ear can be a little heavy, mainly because I think the size of the buds in my ears are too small. But the volume and bass of my music is very nice! Highly recommend.
My earbuds stopped working after 3 months for no known reason and the company replaced them as per one year warranty. Very happy with the customer service I received.

Update:
Had these for a year, took really good care of them, and they busted just like any cheap headphones I've bought. The sound goes in and out on the left side and makes them unwearable.
Pretty good when they lasted, but they didn't last long. And the bass was always weak.

threw these in the garbage can i passed while running. Battery life was literally 20 minutes.....One ear would consistently fall out and to add to the frustration, after about a month, they wouldn't stay paired. I guess you get what you pay for.
These are rven better than the ones i paid 199.00 for.  So even though you pay more money it does not necessarily mean they are better.

This product was great 3 years ago when I purchased it last. The first pair died so I purchased another. Sadly the quality went really down hill. It has trouble connecting and randomly shuts off. Extremely frustrating.
sound quality is pretty good.
Lasted me over a year, but the left side gave out with ut any sign of damage to the cord.
My husband absolutely loves these. He runs about 5 miles a day and they stay put comfortably. Sound is excellent! Also impressed with how long they hold a charge. Great item!
Cuts out after only using a few times, especially when holding my iPhone X and walking. They are comfortable but connected cable between ear pieces is annoying sometimes.

Comfortable, easy to pair, horrible sound quality. If you like a good balance of deep base, mid rang, and crisp highs these are not for you. The sound quality is very muffled and very base forward. I will be returning and searching for something else.

I really like these! Had a pair of beats wireless that broke within a year, so decided to get these and spend less money on a pair. These are pretty comparable to the beats ones. The sound is loud and the bass is heavy, which I love. It fits snuggly in my ears too. Really good purchase! Thanks!
MAN ARE THESE UNCOMFORTABLE AND ANNOYING TO WEAR
These head phones do Not work when stepping away from the playing music off my phone. I would not recommend this product.

Headphones are pretty good quality, connect easily, and work as intended. Only minus is that the rubber behind ear piece is not rigid enough to help much. Luckily they fit well enough and are not too heavy that they fall out easily. But I do have to adjust them occasionally during a workout. Great deal for the price overall.
Such a great product at <$40. My housemate asked me to order one for him as well.

Excellent quality earbuds, great sound.
The company actually sent me an email to make sure I was happy with my purchase, how awesome is that?!

I bought these to use while gardening because my wires use to get caught on the plants. These cut out ever time I bent down even though the phone was in my pocket. I tried them for about 1/2 hr and ever time I stood up, they worked and ever time I bent over, they stopped working. I returned them the same day.
Work great!
My husband asked for these. He said they work just okay.

Bluetooth has nice range. Bass is incredible if I firmly hold pressure on them into my ears. Bass is okay once I let go. I can't tell any difference as far as noise cancelling. Of course I hear less noise because something is pressed into my ears, but I can't tell that they are actually suppressing additional noise. I have not used them for any phone conversations yet, but all other features seem to work good. Battery life is good. So far I am on approx 5 hours since charging. (approx 45 mins a day at gym). For the money they are awesome
Good bass, overall sound quality good. Dealbreaker is the over the ear wet noodle. You might as well buy in the ear than these.

The good: Sound quality is fine (not great) when used as headphones. It's comes with a dual USB Car charger and many accessories. The battery seems to work as they describe.

The bad: Very uncomfortable with how they fit in the ear and the over the ear part doesn't have any functionality at all. Also they look and feel very cheap.

The ugly: When I use these as a headset for my phone (my primary intended use) everyone I speak with say that they can hear an echo, especially when they are also on a headset.

They work well but, the volume buttons fell off (I am not sure where) the second week I had them. I didn't have time to send them back for an exchange and now I am not sure what will happen since yesterday was day 30. Will update soon
It's January 20, 2018 and the pannel that I need to connect to Wi-Fi is nowhere to be found. I am ordering another pair.
Works great!
Too big to fit ears so had to return them

I purchased these headphones almost two years ago and they still work just fine. Sometimes they'll disconnect for no reason but it's very infrequent for me. I've used these nearly everyday for work (I work in a loud shop). These headphones have been washed at least twice and chewed on by my 1 year old and have stood up to rigorous use.
They are the nicest earbuds ever great sound and can hear perfectly fine on my scooter too!
Great for morning workouts
Clear loud and don't have to charge often perfect set of headphones for the gym
I need to be contacted by the seller. I have already started looking for new ear buds.

These are the best wireless headphones I've ever purchased. These are top quality for the price! They fit perfectly in your ear, limiting background noise. The sound is crisp and clear.  The best thing about these are, my girlfriend complains while we talk when I have my wireless headset (other brand) on but not with these! Thank you Senso for these amazing headphones!

So much bass these are unlistenable. If you can only turn "Meet the Beatles" (an album with almost no bass) up to 3/10 because your ears are taking a beating from the bass, there's a problem with the headphones.

Could not get them to fit my ears snugly, so sound quality and noise cancellation would have been horrible.  BUT, I never got the chance to find out.  Right out of the box, they appeared to charge properly (red LED lit at start, blue LED lit at end), but they would not power up.  After that, they completely died.  No LEDs light when trying to power up, nor when attempting to charge them.  Too bad.  With all the great reviews....
Excellent quality, comfortable and great little pouch to store them in. Comes with 2 cables and a double car charger! bargain.

I really appreciate the reliability of this product..
I have purchased this product multiple times because I have them in when I sleep.
I easily and quickly switch them out without hiccups.
The only reason I didn't give them a 5 star rating is that if I have them synched to more than one device I have to go into blue tooth settings to select them...
When they are synched up to only one device the automatic connection is very quick.
I have not had any problems so far with these headphones.  The sound is very clear and they fit beautifully.
These headphones are a great bang for your buck! Great quality sound and easy to charge. I accidentally ran mine through the laundry though 😔
I bought these for use during some of the OCT races I run because they are water resistant.  The sound quality is very quite
The sound quality is very good battery life is excellent and its also sturdy .

They sound good and have good battery life but hurt my ears after continuous wear with all three sizes.  My Samsung ones never did.  I'll eventually have to get a different brand as I wear them all day while working for music and phone calls
Was very sastisfied until last week when it stopped working.
Very good headphones for the price!

I'm way behind the times.... And these are my first pair of Bluetooth earbuds.
All I knew was that I wanted to vac the house and listen to music without having to carry my phone/with old school audio jack earbuds plugged in... Lol.
I figured sports style ones would be hassle free (not fall out easily, have the cord to prevent falling to ground).
I couldn't be more impressed. The countless positive reviews about this item are accurate (and certainly more detailed about the tech aspects than I know about)... Lol.
I'd highly recommend! Either for yourself or to gift. The box they came in was high end, packaging was stellar. The storage case is well made and really set this product apart from other similar earbuds. A small mesh pocket within case securely holds all the additional earbuds included. They included bonus gifts like a cellphone mount (magnet) and a cellphone pocket (to attach to cellphone to hold money or credit card). As for comfort/sound... I'm no expert. But they are quite secure and have excellent sound quality...even over the sound of my vacuum! Lol...

The headphones sound okay for the price, the ear buds that came with mine were a really hard rubber that felt weird to start and after a hour or so started to make my ears sore. Also the clip thing for the ears isn't adjustable so it doesn't really sit right. Other than  weird fitting issues though they seem well built and they don't have as much interruption as even some more expensive buds that I have bought in the past.
Great music sound and easy to use.
This are really nice bluetooth headphones, not only the sound quality is good but they can reduce noise very well, I will definitely use them on my next flight :)
Less then a week and one side already doesn't work. I wasn't even able to do what I was supposed to do with them. This really sucks

I haven't had a chance to work out using these yet, but setup was easy and they stay in while I actively cleaned my house. They fit well, despite having a tragus piercing (a main concern when buying earbuds) and the smallest size bud fit perfectly.

Update: I've worked out with these often and they work great! They stay in despite me moving around and sweating.

This may be sweatproof, but failed after a few swims in pool. This occurred on two different headsets. Swims were on kickboard, not submersing headsets more than a foot on occasion.

Mini-USB charging connection is very annoying due to its location by the ear hook and the rubber flat, which combine to make plugging in the charger frustrating.
Great sound
These work great. I didn't buy them for myself, but my dad says the sound quality is good and the battery life is too
Love them, very comfortable and amazing sound.
bought specifically to wear at football games
Stopped working a little over a month after buying.

Will be returning these. Just got them today, nothing wrong with them. But the fit is just TERRIBLE.
If you're someone with smaller ears like myself, do not waste your time.
They did not stay on for the life of me.
The hook that goes over your ear is VERY flimsy, almost making there no point for them unless you have dumbo ears. Also the ear piece itself buldged out way too much for my liking.
Stayed in OKAY for a bit, but once I started to sweat, they kept slipping off.
Thoroughly dissatisfied.
Excellent sound and functionality for the price:  it's a value buy that you will not be disappointed with.

My order said you get a free cell phone car mount... you don't

But as far as the headphone go.. they are ok.. they are fine for the gym as long as you do not get 3 feet from your phone.. but for $30 what can you expect

No problems connecting 2 phones. Volume is loud not a bad sound quality.. I was hopeful these would be my all day headphones but looks like for the gym only
They are perfect.
They fit nicely, have good battery duration (7 hours for music) and the sound quality is much better than expected.
Better then i expited
Good headphones. Sound good and connect easily. Drops one star since the boxes on the earpieces are so bulky and I can't actually control my volume with the controls on the connecting wire.

Got these as a present, must say I was taken by surprise. I've had them for almost a year now and been using them heavily since without any problems. The features for such an unknown and inexpensive brand is what struck me the most. They contain just about all the features you'd expect from a high $$ ones. They pair with phones, tablets, TVs, Firestick, and much more. They can also be paired with 2 devices at once. The description says that they are some sort of a waterproof but I have not tested this feature (no desire to either). The charging time is quick and they work a good while on each charge. The only thing this pair is missing is a noise cancellation feature, but for the price and the durability, I can't be complaining. Overall, great Bluetooth headphones and I'm truly impressed!

Actually decent earphones HOWEVER they are supposed to be "waterproof" and to come with 1yr warranty. I purchased them 2.5 months ago, dropped them in the pool literally for a few seconds and they stopped working. I called manufacturer Tekatron customer service 3x and each time I was told I would hear back from their warranty dept. 9 days after my first call I'm still waiting.
Sound good, comfortable and they stay put.  Great bargain.

These headphones are very comfortable and the cable fits perfectly around the neck, even for a big headed guy like me!

The sound is crisp and the signal is solid. I honestly have to give extra points for the packaging, it brought so much stuff, a charging cable that switches from lightning to android, a car charger, a case... All the works! Thanks guys, I hope you keep up the good stuff.
I was skeptical at buying them at first but I am so glad that I purchased them. it's the best $20 I have spent, especially on headphones. Great Sound and great quality, especially for the price.

Overall I like this product and would refer it to friends. Below are some pros and cons (that's why it's only 4 stars)

Pros:
Delivered promptly
Packaging is well thought out (very sleek)
The extra goodies are a nice touch!
Like that it specs and step up included pictures
Easy set up and was ready to go in 30 sec
I've charged it fully once and have used it for about 2.5hrs with no issues.
Sound didn't cut out when I was walking around the house without my paired device (15ft)
Fits well and I don't feel like it was going to fall off
Powerful sound and clear (haven't tried to make calls with it)

Cons:
Feels slightly bigger than other Bluetooth ear buds but that could be because of the quality of components used since the sound is good.

The lowest sound setting can be better. I personally feel there should be two more levels before going to no sound. I had to use the base reducer feature on my phone to lower the sound to a more comfortable level for me. My thought is that the lowest setting should still allow me to hear the surrounding ambient noises (faintly) like cars people talking

When I run around or walk fast the wind noise is quite loud that it impacts the music I'm listening too. I haven't tried the other size earbuds so maybe that would solve the issue.

I wear these bad boys running and I have gotten rained on several times. They still work great!!! My only complaint is that you can't use them while they are charging. I have had mine for about a year and they usually last about 8 hours after a full charge.
I like the wrap around retainers keep the buds in place.  I also like that can be used on more than one device, the TV and the phone.
Bought as a Christmas gift for my adult niece.  She loves it.....so i bought another for myself.  I like it too.  Do u really need to buy Beats?  Dont wast ur money....just buy this.
They sound great - however I often have trouble connecting.  When I first turn them on they connect fast - but if I shut them off and try to connect again it takes a while.  It's rather frustrating.
Good sound quality, very comfortable.  Comes in a nice package as well as a nice carry case and assorted ear bud sizes.  Great value for the price.
I ordered these for my husband and he loves them! He is able to listen to music while he works out, and has worn them while doing yard work, etc. Wireless is great.

The order was delivered on-time and in good condition.
Perfect quality. Perfect sound. Perfect fit both to my ears and style. This kit includes 3 spare ear tip pairs, manual, warranty card, nice carrying case, USB charging cord, plus 2 bonus things: magnetic car phone holder and cellphone card stick-on wallet. Plus everything is packaged in gift- quality box.
After reading the reviews I've bought 3 sets for my family.
Easy, fast setup with both a phone and a tablet. Much more convininient than one- ear headsets.

I have tried a handful of Bluetooth headphones escpecially to wear in gym. My biggest problem was that I have small ear openings and none of them stayed put while I ran. They kept popping out. My only option for a long time was over the ear headphones which were annoying. Finally ordered these and I love the cushiony ear plug. They stay put and don't move even with running. Love it !!!

Actually it's pretty good ,
It's very loud too which I like
These headphones are great. The volume seems to be separate from the phones allowing more volume in crowded/loud areas when needed. The headphones are better than i expected.

The SENSO Bluetooth headphones are good for their price. As a cheaper option for wireless earbuds, the sound quality isn't as good as other earbuds I have used during voice calls, although it works fine for music. Occasionally, the connection will bug out and disconnect, but it happens rather infrequently. Overall, for the price range of the item, it's quite good, but don't expect anything amazing from these earbuds.

I really like this Bluetooth, it came in a nice package with a cinch bag for your accessories,you have two batteries to fit either right or left ear It fits snugly into your ear and the sound is very vibrant!
The sound is very clear.  I have to get used to the cord having to go behind the neck but overall a very good product.  Received my order quickly as well.

Had these headphones  for over 4 months and they worked great. Recently the left earbud started to have issues. Contacted Senso support and their rep was fantastic. She only had me try one reset of the device and when it did not work a new set was sent. Very unusual to get great customer support these days. Thank you
This bluetooth headset is outstanding. The sound quality is phenomenal. I am impressed.
I loved my Senso wireless headphones so much that I decided to get another pair for a friend for Christmas!  I love them.
Very good quality and sounds great!
After 3 weeks of Use, they stop working😞😞 I just returned them for a full refund....IM SO DISAPPOINTED!
Works fantastic
good quality sound, comfortable fit , A+
Bought these for my nephew and he loved them. Great sound, comfortable and very easy to use.
Some of the cheapest best I’ve ever had. After 3 years it’s time to retire them.

I've only used your product once so far and am pleased with the sound... however I do have several early concerns. Neither your enclosed paperwork, nor does your website contain the following important information:

The dual port car charger unit has two female outlets, 2.1A & 1.0A. Which one should be used with this product & why are there two?

The 3' white charging cord has different connector ends than the short black one that fits Android phones. The enclosed paper folder describes the 3' white one as being compatible with Mini USB and Apple lightening ports. What USB ports is it compatible with? Any Android? A more comprehensive description would be appreciated.

What is the two little "wire tie" rubber buttons for? How are they used?

There is no phone number given in the enclosed paperwork for customer questions nor needed assistance.
Comprehensive detailed information about this product and it's components would certainly be welcomed in the enclosed paperwork, or at least on your website.

Checked out a lot of different headphones, then decided on this one. Glad I did. They have excellent sound, are comfortable to wear, and very easy to connect and use. I would recommend these to anyone looking for Bluetooth headphones.
So far so good! I ll recommended to buy
They work well.  Pretty reliable and sound nice.

Great headphones and accessories that came with it. They stay on while sprinting and jogging. They have survived my sweaty workouts and did not come off even once. Sound quality is superb and is worth the price. The rubber ear hook attachments are very flexible and do not hurt my ears. I had these on for four hours until I had to take them off because of slight discomfort, but that's a lot longer than my regular earphones.

All in all, I love these headphones and would buy them again if I ever lose them.
I've been using these for about a week now.  The sound quality is good and they connect immediately to my phone.  Both factors are vary important to me.  The noise cancelling effect is okay too.
Stopped working after 4 months of infrequent use.

My first day using these headphones so I can't speak to how they will stand the test of time, but these are by far the best headphones I have ever used. The sound is simply incredible. I have owned LG Bluetooth headphones before, but these are way better with regard to sound quality. Hard to believe BT headphones can sound this good. Stop researching ....buy them. You will thank me later for saving you from wasting a few more hours of your life :-)
great item
as expected
These headphones are value priced, were easy to pair with my devices, and provide very good sound. Exceeded my expectations.

These are good sounding earbuds for the price.  Plenty of different sized tips for ear canal sizes, has a car charger, and nice cable that works for android or apple lightning connector.  I have used these buds since May of 2017 pretty much every day, 8 hours a day listening to podcasts or music.  You can take calls, ignore calls, etc.  Only thing I don't like is the flimsy wire that connects the two buds together.  I have one side that is shorting out, but the company is honoring their 1 year warranty, and sending me out a new pair.  Are they Beats?  No, but they are darn close, and for the person who is just using these to work out or go for a bike ride, etc. they would be fine.  As a mechanic, I am constantly in different positions, and the wire sometimes gets in the way.  Those are minor issues though.  For the money, you can buy 3 pairs of these, and still wouldn't be as pricey as a set of Beats.
The ease of operating, along with great sound quality. Works great for me when I am on the treadmill or on walks.

I was sceptical at first because I've had Sony MDR, Beats etc. You name it and I've had them. These earbuds are solid in every way. They paired quickly, they sound great. They have a clear sound. Easy to operate! They even come with a car charger, as well as a house charger. Really can't go wrong with these!
I am VERY impressed. I purchased these to replace the " more expensive " brand and I have to say the sound is comparable if not better! In addition they come with useful accessories!
These heaphones work very well and work very smoothly. They're also stable for running, and jumprope. Highly recommend
Mic didn't pick up well.
These headphones died after just a few times of use. Don't buy these if you  sweat a lot as they will break.

What a great deal on great earbuds. Sound awesome and nice price. I have had many earbuds, but these are great sound. Solid bass, easy buttons, great charge - have been running several days without charge. So much better than the 10 other pairs of earbuds I have purchased and returned. I write few reviews, but had to for these - nice buy.

I have purchased 4 SENSO wireless Bluetooth headphones and have been very satisfied with this product. They are very easy to use and comfortable to wear. I had no trouble hearing my cell phone on a plane even with the engine noise. The price is super reasonable and the company stands behind its 1 year warranty. I know this from personal experience because I had a defective pair and SENSO replaced them promptly with a new set.

These headphones are great in the 3 days I've been using them.  Easy charge, connect, control and sound. Stay on ears without discomfort because the ear wrap is soft.  Highly recommend for music and phone use.
These are NOT noise cancelling. Very hard to hear, even at Max volume, on plane.

I'm very happy with these headphones.  They are simple to use, light, comfortable and provide high quality sound -- I listen to classical and pop, vocal and instrumental music.  The accompanying charger (12V auto) and charge/USB cable are above average quality.  I had a minor problem (my problem) when I received the unit and their tech-support was very prompt and very helpful in helping through the problem.
My ears are small so they fall off easy
Exactly what I was looking for

Just taken them out for the first time while cycling for 30 miles.  Sound is awesome! Way better than the beats I had previously.  .  After 2 hours of continuous use I've only used 10% of the battery.

Headphones worked great for about a month and then one day they just stopped working. I thought that they just needed to be charged but I charged them for hours and they still won't work. I am going to contact Senso to see if they will honor any kind of warranty but I don't know if it is even worth the trouble.

I contacted customer service and they are supposed to be sending me a new pair of headphones. I will give a better rating if I get the new pair and they last for more than a month.
good product but range is not optimal
I was really impressed with this headset.  The sound is very clear and I love the way they fit.  Very comfortable.  I use them for watching TV in bed so I don’t disturb my husband.

Headphones fit in ear okay and sound is okay if you are just using inside but if you want to use them outside and there is even a hint of wind where you live beware. I ended my run early and went home because all I could hear in these headphones was constant whooshing sound in my ears, not music, and there was barely any wind out.

Great sound quality for the price and great battery life, but they are very hard to get to stay in your ears and don't block any sound from coming in, so they aren't the best for "getting in the zone" so to speak. Also, they don't get very loud.

After two and a half years of constant use in my jogging and exercise routines, the plastic has degraded and still works. It was my longest-lasting headset in terms of battery life, sound quality, and button conditions. Recommended.
Sometimes difficult connecting, but great overall for the price.

Surprising sound, clear with good bass and loudness. Definitely recommended. Easy set up and use. Comfortable. Lightweight.  They aren't Bose or Beats, but for forty bucks, you won't find anything close to these earphones.  Easy buy decision, in my opinion.  Only had these for a few hours,  so durability is an unknown.

These are lightweight, comfortable, pair seamlessly, have great battery life, and offer very decent audio quality. I really have no complaints after one week of heavy use. They've been perfect for me at the gym and during my commute. The water resistance is great (I've showered with them, no problem) and they stay put when I'm working out. I was concerned they looked bulky in the photos, but they're really very light and comfortable when in my ears. As far as audio goes, to my ears, all earphones tend to fall into 2 categories of audio quality: on the tinny side or the bassy side. These have a slightly bassy quality, but it's not obnoxious. I find it pretty pleasant for my wide ranging tastes (mostly podcasts, jazz, rock, classical, and occasional hip-hop during workouts). They arrived packaged very nicely and, as noted by other reviewers, come with a host of accessories that really make the value unbeatable: a car charger, 2 usb cable (long and short), a zip case, multiple cup sizes, and a lightning cable. I am very happy with the purchase. Will post an update if anything fails, but I don't anticipate it.

As the stars say.... Its okay... if you are looking for the cheapest set of bluetooth headphones... this is a contender... Im not fond of them. i went back to the headphones that come with the iphone until i can save up and buy some nicer brand ones
the product was easy to use and in good quality. but what impressed me the most is Senso's  support center: friendly, prompt, and professional.  It's a great experience.

These are really great headphones. The sound with music is really nice. The only problem I've had is that once when talking on the phone I got an echo, but I spoke to the owner of the company and he told me how to fix it.
Great headphones especially for the price.
Great product for the money. Power on/off and connectivity process is better than much higher priced units.

Wow! What a set of headphones! They are better quality and sound better than Power Beats. They fit great and are easy to use. Why pay $180 for headphones when you can get these for $30.
So glad I got them.I know now why they are a best seller on Amazon.

Product itself seemed great. I'm a female and my ears are small. These fit inside my ear but were really uncomfortable. Also, as a runner I don't want to block out all noise for safety reasons and since these suction into your ear it's hard to hear anything but the music (which would normally be good). I like that it came with all these other pieces and accessories. The packaging was nice and the value was great - my ears are too small and I don't want to lose all sound so these weren't for me.
Dead after two months of light use. Now I'm trying to get the warranty to work.

Great product.
As advertised.
Husband loves these earphones. Thinking about getting myself and the kids some too.
I just received the warranty replacement headphones, and I am thrilled with not only the customer service I received but also the headphones themselves.  Thank you so much!
GREAT sound, easy pairing, good fit, good range.  Overall wonderful with my iPhone 7+
Love it! Fits and works well! I like the fact that it comes with extra items (two chargers, car charger and ear buds). Works well with my iPhone as well.
Fantastic sound. Quality construction. Very comfortable fit/wear.
It is good Bluetooth for the cell phone.
This was my husband birthday gift and he love it.
Stopped working within 6 months of purchase.

I've used these for a couple of months now. Almost everyday I wear them for an hour and a half in the gym. I haven't had any major issues. Just recently actually I've noticed that the Bluetooth connection maybe gets choppy and the music starts and stops, but considering how cheap they were, I think I got them for 35$, they are fine.

My wife has bought two of these headphones for me.  The first one a few years ago and used them religiously mowing grass and while working at my full time job.  The amount of battery life was good wished it was longer but they were good.  However the second set she bought me were horrible quality.  I think dollar tree has better wireless headphones.  First thing that happened when trying to switch the different ear bud size I popped the speaker off the headphone figured it was designed to do this to clean it better.  Should of been my first warning.  So I grab the included charger wire and plug it in no issue the light turns red.  However I noticed the light went out completely.  Checked the charger and it had completely broke inside the headphones making it now useless as it wouldn't even charge.  And to finish the icing the other ear piece came out completely to the point the wire stripped lose.  Absolutely garbage quality control.  She is sending it back for full refund and I supplied the 1 star review.  Guess it's time to find a better product.

After checking out other people's comments on how good these headphones were I decided to take the plunge. These are my first BT headphones. I just started hitting the gym again and I was  for something that didn't tie my cord to my phone.  I also didn't want to spend 100 bucks.  These headphones are everything everyone says they are at a great price.  I charged them when I got them and I've worked out for a whole week without recharging them so the battery life is great.  Only time will tell if they hold up but so far so good.  I loved the little extras like the Cigarette charger and the extra tips it makes the package well worth the cost.  I would recommend this product for somebody looking for a Bluetooth headset that's not gonna break the bank.

I've only had these headphones for a couple of days, but I loved them the instant I tried them. They fit well on my ears (try a different earbud size if you have trouble, they send different sizes with the product), the audio quality is AMAZING (I've used them to listen to music and to make phone calls), and they're so out of the way I almost forget I'm wearing them. And it comes with so many great accessories (I especially love the case for the headphones that fits easily in my small purse). It's such a great product for such a great price (I paid $36). It's rare that you actually get something of excellent quality without having to pay an arm and a leg for it (other headphones I looked at were between $50 and $200). I'm glad I didn't waste the extra dollars because these headphones are wonderful. I plan to get my husband a pair.
Great product!  Easy setup simple to use. Excellent sound
Worked great out of the box, like the combo charging cable. Would buy again for sure
Excellent product
Honestly just received today but wow. Obviously a high quality product exactly as described. Great sound and well built and packaged. Will update if my opinion changes but for now this is a steal.
Great headphones has quality sound no slip during exercise but could you a clip to keep cord in place from falling off onto ground!

These are must buy headphones! Straight Out of the Box everything was so well organized and easy to understand to get it connected to my Samsung Note 5. One of the first things I noticed was how even well-designed the cigarette portable charger was along with the USB cable itself was so Innovative that they combined both the iPhone charging cable along with the micro USB cable together. Once my new headphones we're synced up with my phone the first thing I had to do was test the quality of audio, why was I Blown Away with how great the audio sounded. They produce Dynamic audio quality such as the highs and the lows we're on point not to mention the sound isolation drownded out all of the background noise at the soccer fields so I could enjoy my music. I took a brief run and noticed that the headphones did not slipper slide around on my ears they stayed perfectly fit and it was like not having anything on at all. I would highly recommend not spending a bunch of money for headphones that can produce the same quality and fit such as these ones. I am starting to fall in love with my new Bluetooth headphones, not to mention they actually look pretty cool.
A1 love this bluetooth best price!!!

These are great for the price , lightweight , easy to use and connect , comes with a charge so it's ready out the box. Flexible , so fear buds and also very comfortable around the ears. The sound is a bit over bass but what do you expect ? I love them for what I paid , I would recommend them as a good buy , great for gift giving too . Loved the case it came in and also the accessories  that came with it , like the dual plug car charger and iPhone wires. Get it !!!!

I loved the headphones at first, but after 4 months they broke.  The button to turn them on seems to be physically damaged.  Senso replaced them, but the replacement headphones stutter constantly -- they're unusable. Terrible quality control;

What piece of junk! It's good when it works - sounds great during my workouts and long runs. BUT the headphones completely died after only like 10 uses. They no longer power on. Even tried charging them thinking they ran out of battery but nope... DEAD. If you want cheap short lived headphones that only last after a few uses, then these are for you. You really do get what you pay for with these.
Great product so far but they are a little goofy trying to put them on.
Excellent product and service!!!
Came open and used
I don't like it. The battery last only 2 hours in a day.
Bought these for a side by side with Bluesonic. These came with a free cell phone holder that I use all the time!

Right when I opened the Amazon brown box and saw the packaging I new these were going to be a quality set of earphones. Opening up the sturdy packaging presents you with yet another well designed carrying case that contains the earphones and all of the extra bits for swapping the ear tips and cable management. To top it all off, they've included what seems to be a really quality cable that can be switched between micro USB and thunderbolt for Android or iPhone users.

Now on to the quality of the headphones themselves: the construction is very nice. I wasn't sure of the ear loops (?) because they looked a bit floppy at first look but they perform their function very well while maintaining comfort. The button operation is very straightforward and easy once you go through the initial reading for it. And finally, the sound quality is pretty amazing. The bass can seem a tiny bit muddy at times but at this price point the sound could be considered excellent. My girlfriend has the Jaybird Bluetooth headphones which are much more expensive and there really isn't much of a difference in the sound quality. The button operation is also better on these Senso phones, in my opinion.
Really nice great sound great microphone, everything is good but couple things it falls of the ear easily and it's kinda big

Where should I start. THESE CAUGHT ON FIRE WHILE CHARGING IN MY CAR. I was driving while charging these - they'd been plugged in for about half an hour. The ear loops are so flimsy that they don't support any of the weight of the ear piece.

With a little weight reduction, slightly firmer ear loops, and the power button relocated so you don't push it when you go to push your headphones back in, these would be hard to beat for the price.

I bought this several months ago and I must say that I am most pleased with it's performance. BOSE maniacs will hate me for saying this but I also own a wireless bluetooth BOSE headphones( I use this at my home and the SENSO in my car) and quite frankly they're both compatible. In fact although the BOSE has a built in protection factor does not allow you to max out the volume to possibly be a hazard while driving, the SENSO does nto have this built-in so it;s an advantage for me but at the same time I don't overdo it as I tend to be a defensive driver and keep the volume not loud enough to be a hazard factor. Great headphones. Bluetooth works great. Sounds is much better than I'd expect from a wireless earbud. Invotek delivered quickly as promised!

Ordered these to replace my wired earbuds that I was using for running. I would describe the sound quality as pretty decent, but sometimes the device has a LOT of stuttering when listing to music. At least a couple times a song, it will "buffer" for half a second. This seems to improve the longer the connection has been established, and does not appear to be related to the location of the phone - for example, I get the stutter whether the phone is in my pocket, my hand, in the case or out of the case, or 15 feet away.

The other negative aspect of these headphones is the wind noise. It's AWFUL. I have to wear a beanie when I run outside or the noise gets too annoying. These are loud headphones with decent music clarity, so you can usually turn up the volume in order to compensate, but you'll still here the wind noise no matter what you do.

Overall, these are decent quality with good sound and stay on the ears well, but the stuttering ("buffering") along with the wind noise knocks these down to a 3/5 star review. Decent purchase for the low price point, and work well in the gym, just not outside.

Cons:
The headphones give you about a 5 minute warning when the battery is about to die; countless times I'd be mid-run and they'd start dying, giving me an annoying reminder every 30 seconds that the battery was low before shutting off
Connection can be weak; when first connecting these via bluetooth each time, it typically takes about 10-15 seconds to get a solid connection/sound output.

I'll be honest, my biggest issue is the stupid battery warning. That may not be as big of a thing to some people, so if it doesn't matter to you, it's a good buy.

These are the first wireless earbuds I've owned. I was looking for good earbuds that would stay in my ears while running or biking trails. They come with lots of extra accessories which you may find useful but the most important parts for me are the ear hooks and foam tips. The hooks are comfortable and keep your headphones where you put them, and the foam tips will prevent the muffled "wire bouncing" sound that you get with properly sealed silicone tips while running. The unfortunate thing is they don't sound good. It's as if everything you play through them is a YouTube video on the "240" setting. My daily earbuds are Skullcandy Titans which I've had for over 5 years and the sound quality on the these earbuds doesn't come close to those. SENSO got everything I wanted into these headphones except for good sound quality, which ultimately leaves me where I started: searching for good sounding workout headphones. Verdict: If all you're looking for are headphones that will stay put through a "high impact" workout, these are great for the price. However, if a noticeable lack of sound quality will distract you (like it does for me) I'd suggest looking elsewhere.
