Im just going to leave a quick review since there are so many reviews already.

These headphones are more than worth the money. They have really good sound for the price. Buy them.

Ive been using flat response earbuds for years so im not as big a fan of alot of bass as other people might be. That being said im much less a fan of very harsh high frequencies. These have a crisp and enjoyable high end. The low end and low mids were a little much for me. I find myself using an eq on my phone for most headphones anyway, and id much rather do a slight cut in the low end than have to do surgical eq in the highs and high mids.

I did a 6-8 dB cut at 60hz and around 200 hz. I left the rest of the frequencies alone. After doing that i was very suprised with how it opened not only cleaned up the low mids but also cleaned up the overall clarity of these buds.

That being said i cant suggest these enough for people. They are a little muddy but if you like more bass you can leave to lows alone and do a slight cut around 200 and you will not be disappointed. If you dont like using an eq, you really dont have to they sound fine without it.

Thanks Senso! Dont understand why the big companies like sony cant seem to get this right on any of their bluetooth earbuds under 200 dollars. These buds sound better than all the non studio headphones i own. Even wired ones.

Updated: i uploaded a picture of the eq settings of my specific set. This puts them pretty close to flat if anyone is interested.

This headphone set was easy to pair with the my phone and simple to operate. Handling the few buttons seemed confusing at first, but once long-press for on and off was established, taking calls, muting/pausing, and volume control was intuitive. The built-in voice that indicates on, off, etc., is appreciated. Seems to have a range of 15 to 20 from its source before losing contact.

After switching the ear pieces to one of the supplied pair that fits me, the SENSO had no problem staying "plugged into" my head.

Reviewing before a mirror, the SENSO looks chunky/blocky on my head. Most certainly not elegant compared to higher-end models. Nonetheless, works and performs well.

I'm very happy with my purchase. They work perfectly. Have a great sound and very easy to setup. I love all the accessories that come with it. I would most certainly recommend these head phones to anyone who asks. Thank you.

After using this product for 6 months, one day the battery overheated when charging and melted the plastic around the charging port. Now they don't work anymore. I cannot recommend buying headphones that only last 6 months.

I’ve been using this brand of headphones for the last six years. They are awesome and durable. My last pair lasted for 3 years and I use them every single day for mountain biking. There was one time when the mic wasn’t working on a new pair that I bought. Customer service was easy to reach, quick to replace it, no questions asked.

Not bad headphones for the price but the sound quality is what you would expect for headphones under $40. They haven't given out on me yet but I do have to charge often if I use them every day for a little while at a time. Don't know if I would buy again but not too bad of a buy.
I didn't expect that this headphone have a good bass and it's so easy to connect to any device that has bluetooth. I have it for more than a year now, never failed and still sounds good.

very good quality for the price. my husband has the dr dre beats and they are definitely the same quality. only issue is that the volume button is on the actual earpiece instead of the wire, so its not very convenient. also. the distance from phone to headphones until is disconnects is VERY short, about 5 ft.

overall good for the price
Love these! Very easy to set up, comfortable to wear and great connection range
Surprisingly adequate!  Solid low end, great sound quality for phone calls.  I was hesitant at first, but two thumbs up!
Their above my expectations  ☺

I bought these to wear while working out and shooting baskets at the gym. The earpiece material is flexible and does not slip off the ears. The earbuds need to be adjusted but fit into ears for the most part. Sound quality is not the best compared to what I have had but it does effectively block out sounds. The battery life is better than similar types of headphones I've had. Overall 3.75-4 stars.
The best!
So far so good! Comfortable and great sound!!

These were my first pair of wireless ear buds, I've waited and waited to spend extra money on new headphones and definitely made a great choice. There light weight and i can barely feel them while wearing them. The sound quality, connection and build of the earbuds are great. The best part was the price. These are the only pair you'll find that will work this well for this price.

Really happy with these headphones overall. They fit great, have excellent sound quality for the price and are very ergonomic to use while working on equipment. Very happy with its sounds quality for phone calls and all of the accessories included were a nice bonus. Overall really happy with the product.
Great
The earplugs bring a case, car conector, two cables and extra cushion for the ears. I like them so far and I hope to enjoy them for a long time.

Great product! It is as described and the battery life is awesome I love the sound quality when you speak on the phone and listen to music. I would definitely recommend buying. I workout with it and it stays in place even while running.

I bought specifically for my Peloton bike it is a perfect match. Sound and connection doesn’t diminish when sweat gets into it like more expensive alternatives. Would recommend for any type of workout!
I love it!!!!, the presentation of the product is great,I try other headphones and this is the best.

Great sound! Comfortable! Easy to use! I liked the first pair so well I bought a second.

I am adding to my review to say superb customer support as well. The on/off button stopped working on one set, and I contacted Senso. Within hours (at night) they responded and immediately said they would send a replacement pair. Amazon just notified me that they have been shipped and will arrive in two days. Thank you, Senso!
you can only use these if your phone/iPod is in your right pocket. The Bluetooth signal is just not strong enough to work from the left haha
Internal battery died after a few months of use
Sound quality is good but I tried every size earbud and they would not stay in my ears during a workout.  The hook around the ear is weak and useless.

comfortable and light weight.
These work well, sound is pretty good.
And for the price, I understand why so many ppl like these ear buds.
Don't spend more for the bigger name brands get these instead.

Really happy with this product.
Connects instantly with my iphone when I turn on Bluetooth.

Worked great for 10 days, then slowly faded into oblivion. After ten days, they would disconnect from my phone randomly, then they started making weird noises. After about a month, they just died. A waste of $40. Granted, I wore them every day in the gym during circuit training, so they got plenty of sweat on them. Still, they are advertised as sweat proof, but only made it 30 days. I'm back on the market for wireless ear buds. Whomp, whomp.

I thought they were high quality- but be careful when ordering if you have smaller ears.
They will fall.

These headphones help me work out by staying in place.  The bluetooth connection setup was very easy.  Sound quality is good.  The packaging is great and includes a circular storage case for the earbuds
Love this product.  Battery and sound quality are amazing. Would definitely recommend it. I run a lot (Marathons) and long runs and so far they have not failed me.

I am hearing impaired so it is hard to find headphones that sounds good and have enough volume for me to hear. In fact, I returned a pair of another brand because of poor sound quality and very little volume. I paid about the same price as the SENSO Bluetooth Headphones for the pair I returned. The SENSO headphones have superior HD sound and enough volume for me to hear every sound. Full volume is too loud for me with these headphones. If you do not have impaired hearing these headphones are going sound even better to you. I have always difficulties with headphone that insert in the ear. They always fall out. The SENSO headphones stay firmly in the ear and are comfortable. Easy to operate and to pair with any device. You can even pair two devices with these headphones which I really like because I can switch between my iPhone and iPad easily. I spend many hours listening to music so quality HD sound is important to me. For $36, these headphones are a great value. I highly recommend these headphones.

Every time I buy a new pair, the quality of these get worse and worse.

These used to be the best headphones, but now they're crap

Love them.  Can run, walk, and talk on the phone with no interference.  The charge lasts several days. And it comes with charge wire and various sizes of earbuds in a case.  I'm glad I made this purchase.

I was looking for a pair of bluetooth headphones to use while walking. I've used them twice so far, and am happy with my purchase. They fit well in the ear, and the sound quality is good. I was also happy with the price.
I think they work better than my then my Beats 3 a lot louder just don't hold charge very well after like 6 hours
All ok. Thank you.

Great set of head phones. The sound is amazing for the price of these. My only missing star is due to the battery life. It could be just a bit better, but with the warranty of these well worth the purchase.

Worked ok as bluetooth headphones. I've been using them exclusively for workouts for the past 5 months and this past week one of the two headphones became very low compared to the other one. I didn't bother contacting the manufacturer because I think the issue is due to my perspiration being extremely profuse and it's probably a simple issue of dry sweat on the speaker driver. They're good value for the money especially if you want something you won't cry over if it stops working. Update: Most recent pair lasted almost 6 months.
Much better than the older pair I had. 8 hour battery life now vs. 1 hour before. Connects easy and flexibility of ear hooks is amazing.

Been very happy with this. The only reason it doesn't have 5 stars is the buttons don't match my iPhone functions. For example, with Apple headphones, if you press the button once, it advances to the next song. With this, if you press the button twice, it redials the last number. Not what I was trying to do. With you could change or sync up the buttons. Not a big deal after you realize the diff functions though.

The sound is okay. Doesn't have much bass. If you have small ears, this won't fit. The ear strap doesn't even go over my ears. It just hovers over it and doesn't stay secure on my ears. I'll have to give these to my husband.

Sound quality is very good. Charges from 0-100% in little over an hour. Battery life is somewhat inconsistent... Can listen to a playlist for an entire 8hr work day Monday,  but only 2-3hrs Tuesday, 5 Wednesday etc. Same settings, same playlist.. Otherwise they are great
Got mine 8/10 used 5 days a week for 1-2 hours.  Completely dead and won’t take a charge already. Low price but no longevity
horrible don’t stay on your ears the plastic too light

One of the worst headphones I have used. Poor sound quality while listening to music, Calls were not clear, I kept hearing the choppy sound and same goes for what the other person heard. Connectivity was poor,

Update: Two pairs of these failed within a week of each other. Same  issue both times, mailed to Bluetooth pair and then  completely failed power on after charge.  These are not suitable for any kind of running or working out. Stay AWAY.
Huge fan of the sound quality, especially for the price, and they don't fall out of my ears when I run!
I feel like I still spend too much time adjusting these while running, but they have not fallen completely out yet. They are also not very comfortable, so I will not buy again when these wear out.

Kinda disappointed. I like the wireless capabilities and I have friends that like these. The sound is pretty good and the microphone works well. But if you're running, you can hear the wind noise. They are boxy. If they were a little more aerodynamic, I think the wind noise would be less. They also don't fit very well. The ear loop is a little big and not adjustable  (I consider myself to have a fairly standard head-size!).  Can't really recommend.

I had these headphones for years when I was making less money. They were a great value for the same sound quality as any other high brand headphones. I would recommend if you don’t want to spend big money. They sound quality is just as good!
They are still working but the cord is cracking I can see the interior wires.

The sound quality was really good but the usb cover was a bit challenging to open.  Had to basically tear it off so I could get easy access to it.  That worked fine but then it became finicky on what usb charger I could use (I always kept it clean and in a case).  I no longer could charge it.  Too bad, I really liked it.
Does not pair well with any Apple products. Tried for 2 hours to get this to pair with an IPod and IPad but it just was not connecting. A little disappointed with this.

I bought these headphones 2 years ago and they were great.  I accidentally broke them and had to buy a new pair.  Unfortunately the pair, even though they work just as good, the ear piece that goes around the ear to hold on is uncomfortable.  I bend them but they still fall off and they are just simply uncomfortable.

Use them at the office and they are great. At times I can barely tell they are on my ears. Sometimes the Bluetooth pairing can state it is connected and you have to unpair and re-pair the device but overall very satisfied
Beautiful sound. Sets up easy and looks great! Love it!

These headphones are fantastic. Both battery life and range are remarkable and the fit is both comfortable and functional for workouts. I  ended some minor assistance and their customer service department was amazing. Prompt, professional and incredibly helpful. I highly recommend this product.
Good price and Very good quality &  light.

They worked great for 2 months, then randomly died on me. I tried charging it and turning it on and off again but there's no power coming from the headphones anymore. I really wish I can get them replaced because I believe in the product and I'm hopeful it's just a bad pair.

Wow - these have been amazing! When I first put them on they had a good bit too much base. I use Spotify on my iPhone, so I found, purchased and installed for 3 bucks an equalizer app called Qu. I then adjusted base down and treble up a bit and compared these to my wife's VERY expensive Beats. These are as good if not better for a 3rd the price. Comfortable to wear, holds on tight when I exercise - I'm a BIG BIG fan...

So I lost my first pair and got a second pair - updated version - it's even better sound - love these!

Product worked fine for 3 months.  They are not great headphones but they worked for what I needed.  After 3 months they stopped taking a full charge.  They will charge just enough to use and then within minutes I receive a repeated "battery low" message.
Good sound quality for the price although fake waterproof, took one shower with it and that is it, not working. Pretty disappointed.

I'm a fan.  I've used them for work and I use them to run.  It blocks out the rest of the world and lets me focus at my task or mile in front of me.  1-2 months in, I had an issue with the left ear.  The sound quality was lower than the other.  I emailed Invotek, they responded immediately to my questions and no issues, fixed the issue at hand.  I've recommended this to others and would buy from again.  It's a great product and excellent customer service.
Great bluetooth headphones for the price.  My second pair of theses.  The first ones were misplaced, but still working well when lost.

Great sound out of these, was a bit skeptical at first, but love them. All the extras it came with were nice, but the charger cable wouldnt work with my iphone, but that really has no effect on the product itself. Would recommend to a friend for sure.
working fine
These wouldn't stay connected to my iphone. Had to return. They sounded great but it was super frustrating that they kept disconnecting.
it worked pretty good until 3 months,  after that Bluetooth wont get paired(bought 2 of them and it happened same) . don't waste your money, you get what you pay for.

Loud hiss in left ear when playing anything. I have large ears, yet these hooks are way too large for me and I suspect anyone other than an elephant. They wont stay on during a run. The reviews must be fake or paid
Perfect for what I needed
So far so good. Great battery life. Good value.
Worked great for a few months but now will not turn on,  even after a full charge.
Loved

I purchased this pair of headphones twice. I loved them so much for long runs. Unfortunately the first pair stopped working after 6 months and the 2nd pair after 2 weeks. I might have left them on the charger for too long, like 5 hours but that should not have ruined them. I am so disappointed by these headphones that I loved. Just not long term quality.
I am using my headphone during my work hours when my hands are busy.  I am enjoying its clear voice and convenience of multi-tasking.
Best buy for the money, a little light on bass, but great for work out sessions. Paired up with android phone in a snap
The best headphones I ever had. Using them while I am running, they fit perfectly and do not bother me during the run. Sound quality is good.
Overall great value. They are easy to use and work well with my iphone. The sound isn't terrific .... just ok. I also go a lot of interference when I was running in high wind areas.

Bought a total 3 pairs because the earpieces fit my ears.  It comes in different sizes.  First one went bad and the company was nice to replace it for me.  So that’s 5 stars for customer service.  Bought 2 more pairs and lost both.  Headphones hang around my neck but they keep falling off.
Easy to set up with great sound

I use these as my gym headphones, and sometimes in the bath.  I've had them for about a year, and they've held up pretty well.  They do seem like they may be nearing the end of their useful life though.  The left ear seems to have gotten quieter than the right recently, but I may just need to clean them.
This are not noise cancelling earphones. One cannot notice the difference between having them turned off and turned on. Street noise or any other kind of noise is the same.
Loud and last long
Gift for my daughter-in-laws Birthday Birthday shelved it
Left earpiece fit but right would not fit properly no matter what ear piece size I used. Sound was very decent just won't use because it wouldn't stay close to my ear.
I like it
Found them very easy to use. Love the sound. COMFORTABLE TOO

I bought this product again because it is amazing.
Battery life is long, sound quality is impressive, and they are really comfortable on the ears. I particularly loved the noise cancellation buds that came with in the package, an upgrade from the first time I bought them.
I have tried numerous bluetooth headphones but these are by far the best for their price range!
Bought this headphone in February 2018 and the headphone work great sound quality excellent. Now we're in November 2018 and the headphone kept shouting off.
as good as the Bose headphones i bought my wife. 1/4 of the price. buy two and keep at home and in your work bag

I’ve bought this headphones a couple times now for family and friends and they’ve always served well but this last one bought was waste of money, it hardly charges and it dies quickly, it’s like they gave a bad headphones hoping I won’t notice
Use these everyday at the gym. It's only been 2 weeks but so far they been great. No problem connecting, and audio quality is good.
Great Headphones at an awesome price

Don't waste your money. These are Chinese made, cheap quality headsets. And they won't work with you until its fixed either. They just keep sending you head sets that don't work according to the description then quit. Terrible experience and product.. F-

This is an excellent product! I couldn't be happier with the price and quality of these headphones. I ordered these with the Taotronics 4.1 Bluetooth transmitter to use these headphones to listen to my TV and they are amazing. I also use them at the gym, great sound, clear, and don't fall out. Excellent product highly recommended!

Great for phone conversation. Sound is clear for me and the person at the other side of the line. Playing music, it makes the job, not an amazing sound, bur good enough for training time. Actually a good product with a low price.

Today i’ve changed the eartips, and sound is awesome, deep and clear bass, mid and high frequencies are crystal clear. I rated this product with 4 stars, now I think it deserves 5.

Now I have a problem with the microphone, the sound at the other side of the line is not clear and with a lot of noise.

I need to contact the seller, by email or something like that
love, love, love.  just make sure you charge before every run!
Another waste of money on headphones...skips all the time and the sound quality is horrible. Piece of junk
The earbuds are exactly as advertised.  We bought 2.  Both were easy to charge, and the sound is very good.  There's no reason to spend a ridiculous amount on good sounding wireless earbuds.
love the sound.  great product
Arrived super quick. They fit my tiny ears and great sound

This product exceeded my expectations, not only is the product of great quality it is also packed with quality goodies and is very modestly priced for bluetooth and mic for voice calls. Like a car charger, cables, carrying case all in a neat little box (I've kept the box for storage).  I'll cut to the point, how's the sound quality?! I LOVE these Senso headphones!!! If you like your music loud it'll definitely supply you with very adequate levels of volume and bass. The sound keeps clean even when I just blasted Slipknot. I'd give these headphones 10 stars if I could. Quality, price, goodies, case, sound is more than enough for bluetooth headphones!!!! 💯👌
I use this product for my daily running routine and it feels great. This is my second time purchasing the same item and I super love it! Defitinaly would keep buying it. Keep it up!

Update: I contacted the seller about their warranty on these earbuds and they promptly replaced them. Very satisfied with the product and customer service.

These Bluetooth headphones are easy to use, have long lasting battery life, short charge time, and very good sound. However, the cable connecting the two can be annoying when they get stuck on your neck or when trying to listen with only one earbud in. Also, the connection on the left earbud has started to go in and out with the slightest movement of the right earbud after about 6 months. These still lasted longer than most of my wired headphones but at $30+ dollars I would have liked them to last longer. Still a good value and do what they say they will. I recommend using the provided case as it is very easy to lose the earbud tips if you keep them in your pocket.

I bought these headphones back in February and they were great. They stay on the ear well. So it's been almost 6 months and one of the earpieces is going out. So you can only hear out of 1 ear. The annoying part is that the faulty one keeps going in and out so it can't chose a side. I guess if you don't mind replacing them in a few months they're good.

Just used it for my gym time and it was exactly as advertised. Great volume, pretty good sound quality. Better than the pair of Skullcandy ones I got for twice the price. Stayed in my ears for my entire run, even at a sprint. Lifted afterward and barely noticed them, and the one button touch to pause the music is such a bonus. Definitely recommend.
The earphones work great! They're noise-cancelling and look and feel great. I've bought wireless, Bluetooth earphones before and they pale in comparison to these! HIGHLY recommend!
I love the quick response to the buttons and easy pairing. The sound is fantastic and clear also has base which is a plus.

I was really worried about this product and I thought it was not going to last very long but it has been used consistantly for a year and it is still going strong! I have over charged it many of times (leaving it in the fast charger over night or the entire day on accident) and it still keeps a charge for multiple days of working out. It fits comfortably on my ears. My only complaint would be... I find the noise canceling benefit of putting the earbuds completely in your ear completely uncomfortable when you run or work out so I usually leave some room in my ear for circulation. Overall would recommend this product for quality and durability and price.
These are everything I'd hoped for in headphones and more. Just follow the directions to become familiar and to set up, and it's smooth sailing from there.
Was too big for my ears.

Way cheaper than similar Powerbeats.  I like the earbuds, they fit really well into the ear and work great for running to keep out the wind noise that I have had problems with on other headphones.  Great sound.  The only problem is the audio breaks in and out now...almost like there is a short.  Only had them for 3 months. Seems to happen after I have them on for maybe 30 minutes.  They are cheap enough that I will probably buy another pair vs going with something more expensive.  I would hope to have gotten more useage out of them.

I usually don’t write reviews but this headphone Worked extremely well almost close to a year... sound effects were good and excellent noise cancellation ... When it stopped working I still had the warranty when I contacted the customer service they provided exceptional service.... Will order again in the future...Highly recommended... 5 stars for the quality and to the Service...
Great having this for workouts,

Wanted something loud so I could hear my YouTube videos over the gym's music and these work great. They have never fallen off and as long as you read the manual you should be fine. Hopefully these will last for some time!
Second time purchasing these and both pair have stopped working after a couple of months.  I at least expected a year but I didn't even get to 6 months.
Great headphones. Great packaging. Long battery life. Never had any problems connecting via bluetooth. Exceeded my expectations !
Bought these January 5th, it stopped charging in less than 3 months and now it doesn’t even work. Poor quality.

Arrived on time, nicely packaged, great sound. Only first day using it, batteries lasted well over 8 hours. If one negative comment, after a couple of hours, they could feel a little "heavy" on the ears.

I love the way these headphones fit and sound, and you can't beat the price.  I've been through a ton of sport headphones.  I'm an avid runner that sweats a lot and all the headphones/buds that I've tried over the years either slide out of my ears or short out due to the sweat.  I've mainly used these SENSO headphones running on a treadmill while I binge watching shows on my iPad, and they are pleasantly holding up.

Amazing, affordable headphones which absolutely destroy the competition. Not only is the product amazing, the customer support team at Senso is the best support team I have ever dealt with. If you are looking for any type of headphones, I would 100% recommend these SENSO's. I like them way better than my wireless Beats by Dre.
Have only used a couple of times so far but they sound really good. And stay in my ears good too.

These are junk. I liked them at first but now 5 weeks after getting them they just stopped working. They will not turn on.

UPDATE: The Replacement pair I was provided has now stopped working as well. These are garbage.
Lightweight and easy to pair and use. Comfortable. Sounds amazing as well. I love that the battery level is displayed on my device.
Awesome product with many extras! Worth every penny! 👍
Excellent product! Perfect for the gym, easy to use, quick to connect to blue tooth device, adjust sound, advance song...all a snap!
Really good fit, and even better sound quality!  They haven't come out once jogging.

These headphones have similar sound imaging as the Beats wireless version of a similar form factor.  Maybe a little less bass response but otherwise very good sound quality.  The ear loops are a more malable wire that is good for ear fit but less durable since they bend in the case. The accessories are nice and plentiful.  My headphones stopped taking a full charge after 6 months.  I ran with them for the last time this evening since they only lasted about 10 minutes with a full charge before shutting themselves off.  The charging chord is a nice design but stopped working after 5 months.  This kit includes a lot for the price.  Compared to the Beats, they cost less per month of use but I had hoped to get at least a year.  I only got 13 months out of the Beats so maybe I’m rough on headphones.
Solid fit, lightweight, great for working out.  But best of all was the quality of the support I received when I had a question about how to pair it with another product.

For the price and very good bass response, I would have given 5 stars except I wanted them for road cycling and the wind noise caused by the design is too high.  A clip for attaching the cord to the shirt would have been helpful.
Love the earbuds fit perfect and sound quality is great.

Perfect headphones for running, jogging, biking etc.  Also, works well at home when you want to listen to music or stream movies when the family wants quiet.  Never had a problem.  Charges fine and long battery life if you turn off the power when not in use.  But if you keep it on for the whole entire day without without much use, you can get a good 7 hours.  I once had it on for 5 hrs accidentally and towards the end (at night) streamed videos on Netflix and got a good extra 3 hrs.  Total of 8 hrs.
Sound quality is great. Only had it a month and headphone on one side keeps going in and out

Had these actually been $37 headphones I probably would have given them a 4 star rating, but they're not. They're billed as $170 headphones that are on sale, so that's how I'll rate them.

When I use them at the office, the sound quality is stellar. Feedback on the controls is almost instantaneous. It's when I use them to workout (you know, what they're advertised for?) is when I start to have problems. Even just a light walk with the dogs is enough for the connection to crap out. I've turned the phone on airplane mode with just Bluetooth, same issue. I've tried it on my ipod that's just WiFi enabled, same issue. I can only catch about every 3rd word of a spng before the connection cuts out. Worthless and annoying. As soon as the device that these headphones are trying to connect to is on the move, they can't keep up. And this is when it's in my pocket! 30 foot radius doesn't help when it can't stay connected 3 feet away.

$170 headphones should be miles better than this, I'm just lucky I got them on sale and didn't pay full price.
Absolutely love these for running.

The volume and range while listening to music is great. Strong signal and comfortable in the ear during activity. Unfortunately, I use headphones for hands free calling more than music and those I called couldn't hear me clearly. The signal also got really choppy during phone calls. I will try another model of Senso if they make one that has a microphone in the cable.
I've only used them for a few days and the sound and product quality are exceptional.
Quit working. Had it 4 months, used if for running and at the gym. Just didn't turn on one day.
Work really well not really that durible though so take good care of them. Long battery life

I love these headphones. They are exactly what I was looking for. The three different size earbud covers are great. I have small ear canals and most in ear headphones do not work for me. The sound is amazingly crisp and clear. I would highly recommend these earphones.
Have just had them for a week but WOW! Great sound, comfortable fit. I purchased these because of all the great reviews and was so glad I did.
This product only lasted about 6 months before they died. Used them to work out at the gym and yard work.
i use these while i do projects at work like cabling or installing things, and even when i use my drill i can still hear my music great.

dont stay in ear well. dont stay around ear well. I have to take them off when I do my crunches/sit ups which completely defeats the purpose. You get what you pay for but I suggest getting another brand.

Haven’t used these in the gym yet, the reason I purchased them.  I have talked on the phone using them and was told audio was very clear.  I’ll be checking out the different size ear pieces as One ear got a bit sore while talking on the phone (about an hour).
Excellent sound! Fast shipping! Very pleased!

These headphones are by far the best set of Bluetooth headphones that I own. I have several well known brand Bluetooth (LG, Jarbra, BBD) and these headphones are far more superior. The sound is great, including a more than decent bass tone. They connected easily right out of the box, additionally, the comfort level is excellent. I usually wear them for at least an hour at a time and I didn't experience any discomfort. I am not being paid for this review and trust me, I am a very picky shopper. The quality far outweighs the price that I paid for these headphones.

Decent for short workouts and runs but not great for anything over an hour. It seems like they aren't sweatproof at all and power off when they do get sweat on them. Was hoping for a better product for long runs
Good song quality
Love, love, loved them until they quit working? I think they should last longer than 3 months ...not sure if there is manufacturer's warranty or not?
Very well made I love them an sounds great
Great quality for the price. Easy to sync with phone. Comfortable fit.

Use these headphones for long conference calls.  Excellent sound, comfortable over the ear and inner ear earpieces. Just bought another set as a Christmas gift for someone who has trouble keeping earbuds in their ears while exercising. The over the ear earbuds will help.

These headphones work great. The sound quality is honestly amazing. And they are so unbelievably comfortable and easy to use! I have recommended these to couple of friends and they are in the process of ordering them also.

My son is running track again this year and he asked for a new set of earbuds. He picked the SENSO Bluetooth headphones out. With the price, quality and the shipping time, I went ahead and purchased them. He has been happy so far. He is very hard on his electronics but he works hard so I had no problems getting them for him. We had the headphones the very next day when he got home. Talk about a happy Son.......... LOL.

Thanks, I wish customer service, quality, price and shipping where always this way. It was a very well executed purchase.

It only worked for a week or two, then one side of speaker failed to work anymore. I returned the product to Amazon with full return labels according to instruction,but never acknowledge, but then said return period expired.

Even the smallest silicone plugs were to big and the plastic "ring" to put over the ear is not flexible enough. They keep coming off during normal movement and especially during excercise. This is of course very annoying. Otherwise the sound is good and I am happy with the battery life. I have also had no connectivity issues on Android 7.0.
The sound and the fit were great but, the noise canceling feature,didn't seem to work at all.
Sound is great nad the wireless function works well.  The headphones are wireless however you cannot receive a wireless signal while submerged.
I recently purchased Senso Bluetooth headphones to replace an older pair of wireless headphones.  So far I am extremely happy with this purchase.
Wish they could fit better for the e at. When running they slip a little and after awhile they start hurting my inside of the ears.
Wonderful sound I am very pleased with my headphones
